Title: Italian Peasant Bread Soup
Ingredients: ['5 slices Wonder® Classic White Bread', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 large yellow onion, chopped', '1 carrot, peeled and chopped', '1 rib celery, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes, with liquid', '2 cups low sodium vegetable juice cocktail or tomato juice', '2 cups water', '⅓ cup minced fresh basil', '2 tablespoons minced fresh flat-leaf parsley', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '6 tablespoons shredded Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 275 degrees F. Cut bread into 3 strips; cut each strip into thirds, making 9 cubes.
', 'Step 2: Place bread cubes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Bake 15 minutes or until very crisp.
', 'Step 4: Set bread aside to cool.
', 'Step 5: Heat olive oil in a Dutch oven.
', 'Step 6: Add onion, carrot, celery and garlic.
', 'Step 7: Cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are quite tender, about 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in remaining ingredients, except crisp bread cubes and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 9: Heat to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 10: To serve, ladle soup into individual serving bowls and top each with crisp bread cubes.
', 'Step 11: Top with shredded Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 12: Serve immediately.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '191 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '24 g', 'cholesterolContent': '4.4 mg', 'fatContent': '8.9 g', 'fiberContent': '2.9 g', 'proteinContent': '5.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '635.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.6 g'}

Title: Tuscan Pork Chops with Fettuccini
Ingredients: ['4 (4 ounce) boneless pork loin chops', '2 tablespoons Market Pantry® extra virgin olive oil', '8 ounces Market Pantry™ fettuccini', '1 tablespoon Market Pantry Apple Cider Vinegar', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Season pork chops with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 2: Heat 1 teaspoon of the oil in large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Add pork chops and cook 12 to 15 minutes, turning once, or until no longer pink and meat thermometer reads 160 degrees F. Meanwhile, cook and drain pasta as directed on package.
', 'Step 4: Pour pasta onto serving platter and arrange chops on pasta.
', 'Step 5: Stir vinegar into hot skillet.
', 'Step 6: Add remaining oil and remaining ingredients.
', 'Step 7: Saute just enough to heat through.
', 'Step 8: Season to taste with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Pour over chops and pasta.
']

Title: Culture-Blend Spaghetti
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 bunch fresh parsley, stems removed and leaves chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '9 cardamom pods', '1 cinnamon stick', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '½ teaspoon cumin seeds', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans Italian-style diced tomatoes', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '½ (7 ounce) container Greek yogurt', 'kosher salt to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and return spaghetti to pot.
', 'Step 4: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir onion in the hot oil until softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add parsley, garlic, cardamom pods, cinnamon stick, turmeric, and cumin seeds to onion; cook and stir until garlic is softened, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir tomatoes and sugar into onion mixture and cook until heated through and fragrant, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Pour tomato sauce mixture over spaghetti and mix well.
', 'Step 9: Stir yogurt and salt into spaghetti mixture.
']

Title: Easy Fettuccine Primavera
Ingredients: ['1 (26 ounce) jar RAGÚ® Old World Style® Traditional Sauce', '1 (16 ounce) package frozen assorted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers, onion, zucchini), cooked', '1 teaspoon dried basil leaves', '1 (16 ounce) package fettuccine, cooked and drained']

', 'Step 2: Stir in cooked vegetables and basil.

']

Title: Roasted Squash and Cashew Sage Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1-inch cubes', '1 large onion, coarsely chopped', '1 cup whole cashews', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup butter', '12 fresh sage leaves, cut in half', '2 cloves garlic, cut into slivers, or more to taste', '8 ounces whole-wheat spaghetti', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine butternut squash, onion, cashews in a large baking dish or on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Add olive oil, salt, and pepper; toss to coat.
', 'Step 4: Spread into a single layer.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven until squash is browned and tender, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir sage and garlic until sage is wilted, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain and return spaghetti to the pot.
', 'Step 10: Stir sage-butter mixture into spaghetti until coated; carefully fold in roasted squash mixture and Parmesan cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '702.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '88.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '39.3 mg', 'fatContent': '34.8 g', 'fiberContent': '14 g', 'proteinContent': '20.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '12.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '509.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '11.1 g'}

Title: Easy Pasta alla Norma
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons salt', '¼ cup olive oil, plus extra for drizzling', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '3 small eggplant, sliced', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', '2 sprigs fresh basil, plus more for garnish', '1 sprig fresh thyme', '1 ½ teaspoons sea salt, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat until smoking.
', 'Step 2: Add garlic and then eggplant and cook stirring regularly, until softened and lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add tomatoes, basil, and thyme.
', 'Step 4: Bring everything to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Season with sea salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of water to a boil and add 2 tablespoons salt.
', 'Step 7: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Drain well and pour hot pasta into the skillet with eggplant mixture.
', 'Step 9: Toss to combine.
', 'Step 10: Garnish with basil leaves and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 11: Drizzle some olive oil on top and serve topped with Parmesan cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '658.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '107.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '4.4 mg', 'fatContent': '17.5 g', 'fiberContent': '14.5 g', 'proteinContent': '21 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '1029.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '13.7 g'}

Title: Crostata Della Bisnonna
Ingredients: ['1 cup butter, room temperature', '1 cup white sugar', '3 egg yolks', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 cups apricot preserves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour a 10 inch pie plate or tart pan.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, mix together the butter and sugar using a wooden spoon until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Mix in the egg yolks one at a time, mixing well after each.
', 'Step 5: Sift the flour and baking powder into the bowl, and mix just until you can form a solid ball out of the pastry with no crumbs.
', 'Step 6: Reserve some of the dough for a lattice top.
', 'Step 7: On a floured surface, roll the rest of the dough out to 1/8 inch thickness.
', 'Step 8: Press into the bottom and up the sides of the prepared pan.
', 'Step 9: Pour the apricot preserves into the crust, and spread evenly.
', 'Step 10: Roll out the remaining dough, along with any scraps from the crust, to 1/8 inch thick.
', 'Step 11: Cut into strips, and lay across the apricot preserves in a crosswise pattern.
', 'Step 12: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the pastry is golden brown.
']

Title: Fuyu Persimmon and Burrata Caprese Salad
Ingredients: ['1 Fuyu persimmon, stem removed and sliced into rounds', '1 (4 ounce) ball burrata cheese', '1 ½ teaspoons balsamic glaze', '1 ½ teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil', '5 leaves fresh basil, or more to taste', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper']

', 'Step 2: Cut burrata ball into 5 or 6 pieces, ensuring that each piece has some of the firm outer shell (mozzarella) as well as some of the creamy inside (stracciatella and cream).
', 'Step 3: Distribute burrata pieces around persimmon rounds.
', 'Step 4: Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil.
', 'Step 5: Scatter basil leaves on top and sprinkle with pepper.
']

Title: Veal Milanese with Arugula Salad and Vodka Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 cup dry bread crumbs', '½ cup BUITONI® Freshly Shredded Parmesan Cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped parsley', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', '2 teaspoons salt, divided', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper, divided', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '2 large eggs large eggs, beaten', '6 (2 ounce) veal cutlets, pounded to 1/4 inch thickness', '1 (15 ounce) container BUITONI® Refrigerated Vodka Sauce', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '4 cups arugula or baby spinach', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 teaspoons white wine vinegar or lemon juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix bread crumbs, cheese, parsley, garlic, 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon pepper in small bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 2: Combine flour and remaining 1 teaspoon salt and remaining 1 teaspoon pepper on large plate.
', 'Step 3: Coat veal cutlets lightly in flour mixture and dip in beaten eggs, allowing excess to drip off.
', 'Step 4: Coat both sides of cutlets with bread crumb mixture.
', 'Step 5: Heat sauce in small saucepan over low heat; keep warm.
', 'Step 6: Heat 1/2 cup oil in large skillet over high heat.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to medium; cook cutlets for 1 minute on each side until golden brown.
', 'Step 8: Set on paper towels to drain.
', 'Step 9: Toss arugula with remaining 2 tablespoons oil and vinegar.
', 'Step 10: Spoon sauce on platter and top with veal cutlets.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle with additional cheese, if desired; top with arugula.
']

Title: KRETSCHMAR® Spectacular Sicilian Poor Boy
Ingredients: ['1 white hoagie (sub) roll, split', '3 tablespoons cream cheese, softened', '2 tablespoons (purchased) basil pesto', '2 tablespoons sliced ripe olives, drained', '1 pepperoncini, drained and thinly sliced', '2 piece (blank)s canned artichoke hearts, packed in brine, drained and thinly sliced vertically', '2 slices KRETSCHMAR® Genoa Salami', '2 slices KRETSCHMAR® Peppered Hickory Turkey Breast', '2 slices KRETSCHMAR® Brown Sugar Ham', '1 medium Roma tomato, cored and thinly sliced vertically', '3 leaves radicchio, washed and patted dry']

', 'Step 2: Stir in olives and sliced pepperoncini.
', 'Step 3: Open hoagie roll and evenly spread both insides with cream cheese mixture.
', 'Step 4: Place artichoke heart slices over cream cheese.
', 'Step 5: Place on top half of roll, layer Genoa, turkey and ham.
', 'Step 6: Place on bottom half of roll, radicchio and tomato slice.
', 'Step 7: Carefully place top onto bottom half of roll and press gently.
', 'Step 8: Secure with long toothpicks, cut in half.
', 'Step 9: Place on a plate and garnish with a whole pepperoncini and radicchio leaves (optional).
']

Title: Italian-Inspired Stew with Mushrooms
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon salted butter', '1 pound beef sirloin steak, cut into 1-inch cubes', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '½ large onion, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup crushed tomatoes in puree', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup red wine', '½ cup beef broth, or more as needed', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil and butter in a skillet over medium-high heat; stir in beef.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir until browned on all sides, 5 to 7 minutes, then remove to a plate.
', 'Step 3: Add mushrooms to the skillet and saute until soft, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove mushrooms to a plate.
', 'Step 5: Add onion and garlic to the skillet; saute until onion is beginning to turn translucent, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add tomatoes, parsley, oregano, salt, and pepper; simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add wine, 1/2 cup broth, and Parmesan cheese; simmer for 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in reserved beef and mushrooms.
', 'Step 9: Cover and cook until beef is tender, about 1 hour, adding more broth if needed.
']

Title: Linguine a Ragu di Prosciutto
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup dried morel mushrooms', '4 slices chopped fully cooked ham', '4 slices prosciutto', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 red onion, diced', '1 (10 ounce) can Italian plum tomatoes, drained and diced', '1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta, or more to taste', '¾ cup heavy whipping cream', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place morels in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Cover with lukewarm water and soak for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain.
', 'Step 4: Place morels, ham, and prosciutto in a food processor.
', 'Step 5: Grind to a coarse mixture.
', 'Step 6: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add onion; cook and stir until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add the ham mixture.
', 'Step 9: Cook, stirring occasionally, until flavors combine, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir tomatoes into the saucepan.
', 'Step 11: Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer until sauce is thickened, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 13: Cook linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Drain.
', 'Step 15: Fold cream into the sauce.
', 'Step 16: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese on top and serve over linguine.
']

Title: Mascarpone-Brandy Cream
Ingredients: ['5 eggs, separated', '7 tablespoons white sugar', '1 tablespoon brandy', '2 (8 ounce) containers mascarpone cheese', '¾ cup heavy cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine egg yolks and sugar in a large bowl; beat using an electric mixer until frothy and pale.
', 'Step 2: Add brandy and mascarpone cheese.
', 'Step 3: Continue beating until mixture becomes firm, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 5: Beat cream in a separate chilled glass or metal bowl using an electric mixer until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 6: Gently fold egg whites and whipped cream into mascarpone mixture with a spatula or wooden spoon.
']

Title: Sesame Anise Melts
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon baking soda', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¾ cup lard', '¾ cup white sugar', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon anise seed, crushed', '1 cup sesame seeds, toasted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease cookie sheets.
', 'Step 3: Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt, set aside.
', 'Step 4: In a medium bowl, cream together the lard and sugar.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the egg and anise seeds.
', 'Step 6: Add dry ingredients, mix well.
', 'Step 7: Put the sesame seeds into a shallow bowl or saucer.
', 'Step 8: Roll dough into 1 inch balls, roll them in the sesame seeds to coat.
', 'Step 9: Place them 1 1/2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets.
', 'Step 10: Flatten the balls slightly using the bottom of a glass.
', 'Step 11: Bake for 6 to 9 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 12: Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks.
', 'Step 13: Store in an airtight container.
']

Title: Portobello Mushroom Pizzas
Ingredients: ['olive oil cooking spray', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '4 tomatoes, diced', '1 leek, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '5 leaves fresh basil, chopped', '4 large portobello mushroom caps', '¼ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a baking sheet with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir onion in hot oil until slightly browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add tomatoes, leek, garlic, and salt; saute until tomatoes are soft, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle lemon juice over the vegetable mixture.
', 'Step 7: Stir in basil; heat until wilted, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 8: Arrange portobello mushroom caps onto the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Fill mushroom caps with onion mixture.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese on top.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until mushrooms are heated through and the Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese has melted, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Sprinkle with parsley.
']

Title: Real Neapolitan Cookies
Ingredients: ['8 ounces canned almond filling', '5 eggs, separated', '1 cup margarine', '1 cup white sugar', '2 ¼ cups sifted all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '3 drops green food coloring, or to taste', '3 drops red food coloring, or to taste', '¼ cup apricot preserves', '¼ cup seedless raspberry jam', '6 (1 ounce) squares semisweet chocolate']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease three 13x9x2-inch pans; line with waxed paper and grease waxed paper.
', 'Step 3: Mix almond filling, egg yolks, margarine, and sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 4: Combine flour and baking powder in a bowl.
', 'Step 5: Stir into almond mixture.
', 'Step 6: Beat egg whites together in a bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 7: Fold into almond batter.
', 'Step 8: Divide batter equally among 3 bowls.
', 'Step 9: Add green food coloring to 1 bowl; add red food coloring to another.
', 'Step 10: Leave the third bowl uncolored.
', 'Step 11: Pour the contents of each bowl into the prepared pans.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Invert onto wire racks, remove waxed paper, and turn right-side-up on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 14: Spread apricot jam onto the surface of the green cake; top with the plain cake.
', 'Step 15: Spread raspberry jam onto the plain cake; top with the red cake.
', 'Step 16: Cover with plastic wrap; set a heavy cutting board or flat pan on top.
', 'Step 17: Refrigerate 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 18: Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in the microwave until melted, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Spread melted chocolate onto the surface of the cake.
', 'Step 20: Allow to set, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Cut off all 4 sides of the cake to make the edges clean and even.
', 'Step 22: Cut the cake into 1-inch strips; cut strips into bite-size pieces.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '63 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '7.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '9.7 mg', 'fatContent': '3.4 g', 'fiberContent': '0.3 g', 'proteinContent': '1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '28.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.8 g'}

Title: Garlic Calamari Taglierini
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 rib celery, minced', '½ shallot, minced', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '½ cup water', '½ cup white wine', '¼ cup lemon juice from concentrate', '1 (1.6 oz) package dry garlic and herb sauce mix (such as Knorr®)', '1 tablespoon basil pesto', '10 ounces calamari rings', '½ cup frozen peas', '1 tablespoon capers', '1 pound taglierini pasta', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in celery, shallot, and garlic, and cook and stir until lightly browned, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Blend in water, wine, lemon juice, sauce mix, and basil pesto.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat and let simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir calamari, frozen peas, and capers into the sauce.
', 'Step 7: Continue to simmer until squid is opaque, checking frequently to avoid overcooking, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Cook taglierini pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 6 to 9 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain.
', 'Step 11: Season calamari mixture with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 12: Serve over cooked pasta.
']

Title: Cannellini Shrimp Salad
Ingredients: ['¼ cup red wine vinegar', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 teaspoon sugar', '¼ teaspoon dried cilantro', '¼ teaspoon dried basil', '¼ teaspoon dried tarragon', '1 (15 ounce) can white kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '1 roma (plum) tomato, diced', '¼ red onion, diced', '¾ pound cooked tiny shrimp']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, whisk vinegar, oil, sugar, cilantro, basil, and tarragon until well blended.
', 'Step 2: You may adjust these seasonings to your personal preference.
', 'Step 3: In a separate bowl, toss together the beans, tomato, onion, and shrimp.
', 'Step 4: Pour dressing over salad, and toss again to coat.
', 'Step 5: Cover and refrigerate several hours, or overnight, to develop flavors.
']

Title: Spicy Italian-Flavored Meatloaf
Ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray', '3 pounds ground beef', '1 cup Italian-style seasoned bread crumbs', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '⅔ cup ketchup', '3 large eggs, lightly beaten', '2 teaspoons chile sauce', '2 teaspoons hot sauce', '1 ½ teaspoons garlic salt', '1 teaspoon ground thyme', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x5-inch (or larger) loaf pan with nonstick spray.
', 'Step 3: Mix together ground beef, bread crumbs, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, ketchup, eggs, hot sauce, garlic salt, thyme, salt, and pepper until well combined.
', 'Step 4: Press mixture into the prepared loaf pan.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, about 1 hour 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Remove from the oven and drain any fat from the pan.
', 'Step 8: Let stand for 15 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Chef John's Pizza Rustica
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ cup very cold butter, cut into pieces', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large egg, beaten', '4 tablespoons cold water, or more as needed', '1 (16 ounce) container ricotta cheese, drained', '8 ounces low-moisture mozzarella cheese, cubed', '2 ounces grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '7 large eggs, beaten', '¾ pound cooked, crumbled Italian sausage', '¼ pound smoked ham, cubed', '¼ pound salami, cubed', '¼ pound pepperoni slices, cut into strips', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine flour, salt, butter, and olive oil for the crust in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Blend butter into the flour with a pastry cutter until it resembles coarse crumbs.
', 'Step 3: Make a well in the center of the flour-butter mixture, pour egg into the well, and mix with a fork until egg is mixed in, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Add cold water and mix briefly with a fork.
', 'Step 5: Switch to mixing with your hands and press mixture into a ball.
', 'Step 6: If it seems dry, sprinkle in some more water, 1 teaspoon at a time, until dough comes together.
', 'Step 7: Transfer dough to a work surface and press into a disc.
', 'Step 8: Wrap in plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator to rest for at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: While the dough is resting, combine drained ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, Pecorino Romano cheese, salt, black pepper, beaten eggs, cooked Italian sausage, smoked ham, salami, and pepperoni for the filling.
', "Step 10: Mix thoroughly until extremely well combined; don't worry about overmixing.
", 'Step 11: Cover and place in the refrigerator until ready to use.
', 'Step 12: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Rub a 9-inch springform pan with olive oil and dust with flour.
', 'Step 14: Place dough on a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 15: Cut off 1/3 of the dough and set aside for the top crust.
', 'Step 16: Roll out the remaining dough for the bottom crust, using only as much flour as needed, into a 15-inch circle, about 1/8 inch thick.
', 'Step 17: Roll the dough onto the rolling pin and transfer to the prepared pan.
', 'Step 18: Tuck the dough into the bottom and up the sides of the pan, being careful not to stretch it.
', 'Step 19: Remove any excess dough, dampen it with water, and use it to fill in where needed.
', 'Step 20: Transfer filling into the pan, press firmly into the edges to ensure there are no air pockets, and smooth out the top.
', "Step 21: Roll remaining dough into a circle that's slightly wider than the pan.
", 'Step 22: Roll dough onto the rolling pin and transfer to the pan.
', 'Step 23: Position the top crust properly and press to seal it with the side edges.
', 'Step 24: Mix egg and water for egg wash together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 25: Brush egg wash on top of dough to moisten entire surface.
', 'Step 26: Trim off excess dough if desired.
', 'Step 27: Fold the side dough down from the pan edges onto the top crust and crimp edges with your fingertips until fully sealed.
', 'Step 28: Brush once more with egg wash.
', 'Step 29: Place in the center of the preheated oven, and immediately reduce the heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 30: Bake until top crust is a beautiful golden brown, about 1 hour 15 minutes.
', 'Step 31: Remove from the oven and let cool for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 32: Carefully remove the ring and let cool another 15 minutes before slicing into wedges.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '766.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '35.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '332.2 mg', 'fatContent': '50.8 g', 'fiberContent': '1.1 g', 'proteinContent': '40.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '23.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '1816.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.3 g'}

Title: Spring Prosecco Strawberry Risotto for Two
Ingredients: ['4 cups low-sodium vegetable broth, or as needed', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '⅞ cup Arborio rice', '¾ cup Prosecco', '1 cup chopped fresh strawberries', '2 tablespoons soft goat cheese (chevre)', '¼ cup grated Grana Padano cheese', '2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Warm broth in a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 2: At the same time, heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Add rice and stir until fully coated with oil and pale gold in color, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Pour in Prosecco and stir constantly until wine is fully absorbed.
', 'Step 5: Add 1/2 cup warm broth and stir until broth is absorbed.
', 'Step 6: Add 1/2 cup broth and strawberries; stir until absorbed.
', 'Step 7: Add 1/2 cup broth, Grana Padana cheese, and goat cheese; stir until absorbed.
', 'Step 8: Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly, until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender yet firm to the bite.
', 'Step 9: Stirring in the broth should take about 18 minutes in all.
', 'Step 10: Turn off the heat and allow to rest 2 minutes before plating.
', 'Step 11: Divide rice onto 2 plates and top each with 1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar.
']

Title: Pizza Turkey Burgers with Quick Marinara
Ingredients: ['1 (15 ounce) can diced tomatoes, drained and divided', '1 pound ground turkey', '½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '½ cup panko bread crumbs', '½ cup sliced fresh basil leaves', '1 large egg, lightly beaten', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 2: Add 1/2 cup diced tomatoes to a large mixing bowl and mash with a fork until broken up.
', 'Step 3: Add turkey, Parmesan cheese, bread crumbs, basil, egg, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Gently mix until combined, then form into 4 patties.
', 'Step 5: Cook burgers on the preheated grill until cooked through, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, combine remaining tomatoes, oil, and Italian seasoning in a small blender or food processor; blend until smooth.
', 'Step 7: Serve on top of cooked burgers.
']

Title: Tammy's Favorite Lasagna
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 pounds lean ground beef', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', '1 ½ tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary', '1 ½ tablespoons garlic salt', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', '2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '1 cup water', '½ cup margarine', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 cup Parmesan cheese', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 quart milk', '1 egg, beaten', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 pound mozzarella cheese, shredded']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Saute onions until soft.
', 'Step 3: Stir in ground beef, and cook until evenly brown.
', 'Step 4: Drain excess fat.
', 'Step 5: Season with Italian seasoning, rosemary, garlic salt, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Stir in tomatoes, tomato paste and water.
', 'Step 7: Simmer 1 hour, or until sauce has thickened.
', 'Step 8: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Cook onion until soft and translucent.
', 'Step 10: Stir in flour until smooth.
', 'Step 11: Stir in Parmesan cheese, then milk.
', 'Step 12: Cook, stirring, until thick.

', 'Step 14: (Sauce will be very thick.

', 'Step 16: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 17: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 18: Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 19: In prepared baking dish, place a layer of noodles, meat sauce, cheese sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella.
', 'Step 20: Repeat layers.

', 'Step 22: Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour.
', 'Step 23: Let cool 15 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Cauliflower Antipasto Salad
Ingredients: ['1 medium head cauliflower, cut into bite-sized pieces', '½ cup mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon good-quality balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '½ teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts in water, drained', '1 cup cherry or grape tomatoes, halved', '⅓ cup sliced black olives', '⅓ cup sliced green olives', '1 green bell pepper, cut into 1/2-inch pieces', '2 ounces Genoa salami, cut into bite-sized pieces', '2 ounces Asiago cheese, diced', '3 ounces prosciutto, slices rolled and cut in half', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer.
', 'Step 2: Bring water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add cauliflower, cover, and steam until barely fork-tender, 6 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove to a metal mixing bowl and refrigerate, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, for the dressing, stir mayonnaise, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, mustard, and garlic together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper and set aside.
', 'Step 7: Add artichokes, tomatoes, olives, bell pepper, salami, and Asiago cheese to the cooled cauliflower.
', 'Step 8: Toss with the dressing and place prosciutto rolls around the top.
', 'Step 9: Refrigerate salad until ready to serve.
', 'Step 10: Garnish with fresh basil before serving.
']

Title: Pumpkin, Pecan, and Fig Risotto
Ingredients: ['3 cups chicken stock (such as Massel®)', '3 cups white wine', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 onions, diced', '2 ¼ cups Arborio rice', '1 cup green beans', '2 cups cooked and cubed pumpkin', '1 ½ cups grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '⅔ cup chopped dried figs', '½ cup toasted, chopped pecans', 'salt and cracked black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour chicken stock and wine into a small pot; bring to a simmer over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 2: Heat oil and butter in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Add onion; saute until translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the rice; cook and stir until golden, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Ladle enough of the chicken stock mixture into the saucepan to cover the rice.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir until the liquid is mostly absorbed, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Repeat this process with the remaining chicken stock mixture, stirring frequently until rice is tender and creamy, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Toss green beans into the risotto; cook until bright green, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in pumpkin; cook until broken down, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese, figs, pecans, salt, and pepper and mix well.
', 'Step 11: Garnish with remaining 6 tablespoons Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Cauliflower Spaghetti Soup with Garlic Bread
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) baguette', '3 tablespoons salted butter, softened, or more to taste', '2 cloves garlic, minced, or to taste', '1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste', '3 cups water', '1 teaspoon chicken bouillon base', '1 medium head cauliflower, cut into florets', '¾ (16 ounce) package spaghetti, broken into small pieces', '1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '8 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste', '3 (8 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '¼ teaspoon sea salt', '¼ teaspoon garlic salt', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Prepare garlic bread: slice baguette in half lengthwise and slather in butter.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle minced garlic and garlic salt over both sides.
', 'Step 4: Put halves together and wrap in aluminum foil.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from the oven and slice at an angle.
', 'Step 7: Set aside.
', 'Step 8: While the garlic bread is in the oven, combine water and bouillon for soup in a large stockpot; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Add cauliflower and broken spaghetti.
', 'Step 10: Stir to submerge pasta and return to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Cook for 8 minutes.
', 'Step 12: At the same time, heat a saucepan over medium-low heat for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Add olive oil and then garlic; simmer until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 14: Pour in tomato sauce to sear in the garlic and oil flavor; set aside.
', 'Step 15: When cauliflower and pasta have cooked for 8 minutes, pour tomato sauce into the stockpot; stir to mix.
', 'Step 16: Add sea salt, garlic salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 17: Reduce heat to low and cook until pasta is tender yet firm to the bite, 3 to 5 minutes longer.
', 'Step 18: Ladle soup into bowls and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 19: Serve with garlic bread.
']

Title: Roasted Eggplant and Red Bell Pepper Salad
Ingredients: ['6 medium red bell peppers, halved and seeded', '4 small baby eggplants, halved lengthwise', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or more as needed', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '2 dashes chile sauce', '1 (6 ounce) jar artichoke hearts', '½ cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained', '4 large fresh basil leaves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly oil a foil-lined baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Place bell peppers, cut-sides down, on the baking sheet.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until beginning to char, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 5: While peppers roast, score eggplant flesh deeply in a diamond cross-hatch pattern with the tip of a knife.
', 'Step 6: Press on the edges of the halves to open the cuts and sprinkle salt over the surface and into the cuts.
', 'Step 7: Set aside, cut-sides up, for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 9: Gently squeeze the eggplant over the sink to extract the salty juice and wipe them dry with a paper towel.
', 'Step 10: Brush each half with 1/2 tablespoon olive oil.
', 'Step 11: Arrange each half, cut-side down, on the lined baking sheet.
', 'Step 12: Remove bell peppers from the oven and cover with a dish towel.
', 'Step 13: Let stand for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Leave the oven on.
', 'Step 15: Roast eggplant in the preheated oven until tender, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Peel, seed, and slice the peppers while eggplant is roasting.
', 'Step 17: Whisk 3 tablespoons olive oil, balsamic, garlic, and chili sauce together in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 18: Slice 4 artichoke hearts; reserve any remaining artichoke hearts for another use.
', 'Step 19: Let eggplant cool for at least 20 minutes before handling.
', 'Step 20: Turn flesh-side up.
', 'Step 21: Use a kitchen knife to scrape the flesh from the skin.
', 'Step 22: Divide the flesh along the score lines into cubes.
', 'Step 23: Discard skin.
', 'Step 24: Combine eggplant, bell peppers, artichoke hearts, and sun-dried tomatoes in a bowl.
', 'Step 25: Sprinkle with pepper.
', 'Step 26: Pour dressing over vegetables and mix together.
', 'Step 27: Garnish with basil leaves.
']

Title: Pizza Dip with Wonder Bread Sticks
Ingredients: ['1 (15 ounce) can pizza sauce', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano leaves', '½ teaspoon dried basil leaves', '6 slices Wonder® Classic White Bread, crusts removed', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ cup margarine or butter, melted', '¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese']

', 'Step 7: Bake an additional 4 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle bread sticks evenly with Parmesan cheese.

']

Title: Tart with Zucchini, Prosciutto, and Pine Nuts
Ingredients: ['1 cup whole wheat flour', '⅓ cup all-purpose flour', '¼ cup butter', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons sour cream', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 zucchini, coarsely grated', '1 sprig fresh thyme, leaves stripped', 'sea salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 cup ricotta cheese', '1 egg', '10 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon bread crumbs', '3 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto', '6 tablespoons pine nuts']

['Step 1: Combine whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup butter, 1 egg, sour cream, and 1/4 teaspoon salt in a bowl; knead until dough comes together.
', 'Step 2: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 3: Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate until firm, at least 1 hour and up to overnight.
', 'Step 4: Roll out dough into a 10-inch circle on a lightly floured work surface.
', 'Step 5: Grease a 9-inch tart tin with 1 teaspoon butter.
', 'Step 6: Press dough into the tart tin.
', 'Step 7: Trim edges with a sharp knife.
', 'Step 8: Place crust in the refrigerator.
', 'Step 9: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over high heat.
', 'Step 11: Add zucchini; cook and stir until just tender, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Season with thyme, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 13: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 14: Mix ricotta cheese and 1 egg together in a bowl.
', 'Step 15: Fold in zucchini and Parmesan cheese gently.
', 'Step 16: Sprinkle bread crumbs over chilled crust; cover with prosciutto slices.
', 'Step 17: Spread ricotta-zucchini mixture evenly over prosciutto.
', 'Step 18: Smooth the top with a spatula; sprinkle pine nuts on top.
', 'Step 19: Bake in the preheated oven until center is firm and top is golden, about 35 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
']

Title: Vegan Italian Anise Christmas Cookies

Title: Pork Osso Buco
Ingredients: ['salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '6 thick-cut pork shank sections, 2 to 3 inches thick', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 large yellow onion, diced', '1 large carrot, diced', '2 ribs celery, diced', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ cup tomato paste', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 cup white wine', '2 cups chicken broth', '1 bay leaf', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon dried rosemary', '⅛ teaspoon ground cloves', 'Chopped Italian parsley', 'Freshly grated lemon zest']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Salt and pepper both sides of pork shank sections.
', 'Step 2: Heat oil and butter in a heavy pot over high heat.
', 'Step 3: Brown pork until it gets a nice sear, 3 or 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: Transfer pork to a plate; reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 5: Add onions, carrots, and celery to pot.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle with salt.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir until onions start to turn translucent.
', 'Step 8: Add tomato paste; cook and stir until tomato paste starts to caramelize, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle in flour; stir for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add white wine and raise heat to medium high.
', 'Step 11: When sauce comes to a simmer, cook until sauce reduces slightly.
', 'Step 12: Add bay leaf, thyme, rosemary, and ground cloves.
', 'Step 13: Add chicken stock and return to a simmer.
', 'Step 14: Transfer pork back to pot along with any accumulated juices.
', 'Step 15: Bring mixture to a very slow simmer.
', 'Step 16: Cover and cook until fork tender, 3 to 3 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 17: Serve shanks with plenty of sauce, topped with freshly chopped parsley and a sprinkle of lemon zest.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Zuppa Toscana
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 large onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '4 medium potatoes, cubed', '4 cups chicken broth', '4 cups chopped kale', '1 cup half-and-half']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Heat oil in the cooker.
', 'Step 3: Add sausage and cook until no longer pink, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in onion and garlic; cook until softened and translucent, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in Italian seasoning, salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 6: Add potatoes and chicken broth.
', 'Step 7: Close and lock the lid.
', 'Step 8: Select high pressure and set timer for 5 minutes.

', "Step 10: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes.
", 'Step 11: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 12: Stir kale into the cooker.
', 'Step 13: Select Saute function.
', 'Step 14: Cook, uncovered, for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Stir in half-and-half.
', 'Step 16: Turn off the cooker and serve.
']

Title: Tri-color Panna Cotta
Ingredients: ['3 cups heavy whipping cream, divided', '2 ounces dark chocolate, chopped', '6 tablespoons white sugar, divided', '1 tablespoon agar powder, divided', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons instant coffee granules (such as Nescafe®)']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1 cup heavy cream in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add dark chocolate and 2 tablespoons sugar before it boils; reduce heat and simmer, stirring constantly, until chocolate melts, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add 1 teaspoon agar and stir until it dissolves completely.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat, pour into a trifle bowl, and chill until set, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 5: Heat 1 cup heavy cream in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add 2 tablespoons sugar and vanilla extract; simmer, stirring constantly, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add 1 teaspoon agar and stir until it dissolves completely.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat, pour over chocolate layer and chill until set, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 9: Heat 1 cup heavy cream in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 10: Add 2 tablespoons sugar and instant coffee; simmer, stirring constantly, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Add 1 teaspoon agar and stir until it dissolves completely.
', 'Step 12: Remove from heat, pour over vanilla layer and chill until set, about 2 hours.
']

Title: Eggplant Parmesan with Chicken Meatballs
Ingredients: ['½ (1 pound) package frozen chicken meatballs', '2 tablespoons skim milk', '½ cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs', '1 large eggplant', 'cooking spray', '2 cups light spaghetti sauce', '4 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, cubed', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Thaw meatballs and cut into pieces.
', 'Step 2: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 3: Pour milk into a shallow bowl and bread crumbs onto an 8x10-inch piece of waxed paper.
', 'Step 4: Set both next to a cutting board.
', 'Step 5: Peel and slice eggplant into 1/2-inch slices.
', 'Step 6: Coat each slice of eggplant by dipping both sides in milk and then in bread crumbs.
', 'Step 7: Heat skillet over medium heat until hot.
', "Step 8: Spray with cooking spray, then place eggplant slices into the pan; you may need to work in batches so you don't overcrowd the pan.
", 'Step 9: Brown on each side and cook until eggplant becomes tender, 8 to 10 minutes.
', "Step 10: You can set aside the cooked pieces as you work, it doesn't matter if they get cold while you put more in the pan to brown.
", 'Step 11: Spread a thin layer of pasta sauce in the bottom of a casserole pan (size will depend on how big your eggplant is.
', 'Step 12: ) Place one layer of eggplant rounds on top of sauce.
', 'Step 13: Top with about 1/3 of the mozzarella and 1/3 of the meatballs.
', 'Step 14: Repeat with another layer of pasta sauce, eggplant, mozzarella, and chicken.
', 'Step 15: Repeat if you still have eggplant left.
', 'Step 16: Finish with a thin layer of pasta sauce, cheese, and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 17: Cover and bake in the preheated oven until golden and bubbly, 20 to 30 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '325.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '36.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '68.5 mg', 'fatContent': '10.7 g', 'fiberContent': '6.5 g', 'proteinContent': '25.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '868.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.1 g'}

Title: Creamy Chicken Lasagna
Ingredients: ['3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '6 uncooked lasagna noodles', '1 cube chicken bouillon', '¼ cup hot water', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 (26 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook lasagna noodles for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente.
', 'Step 3: Drain, rinse with cold water, and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, place the chicken in a saucepan with enough water to cover, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook for 20 minutes, or until no longer pink and juices run clear.
', 'Step 6: Remove from saucepan, and shred.
', 'Step 7: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Dissolve the bouillon cube in hot water.
', 'Step 9: In a large bowl, mix the chicken with the bouillon, cream cheese, and 1 cup mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 10: Spread 1/3 of spaghetti sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 11: Cover with the chicken mixture, and top with 3 lasagna noodles; repeat.
', 'Step 12: Top with remaining sauce, and sprinkle with remaining mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 13: Bake for 45 minutes in the preheated oven.
']

Title: Asparagus and Onion Lasagna (Very Delicious!)
Ingredients: ['1 bunch asparagus, cut into 2-inch pieces', '1 white onion, chopped', '1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 (16 ounce) package egg roll wrappers, cut into quarters', '1 (16 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine asparagus and onion in a 9x13-inch baking dish; season with garlic salt.
', 'Step 3: Pour olive oil over mixture and stir to coat.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until vegetables are tender, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Transfer vegetables to a plate and cover with aluminum foil or napkin.
', 'Step 6: Spread ricotta cheese over each egg roll wrapper; layer into the bottom of the baking dish.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle vegetable mixture over ricotta layer and top with a layer of mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 8: Repeat layering until vegetables are all used, ending with a layer of mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the oven until cheese is bubbling and melted, about 30 minutes.
']

Title: Checca
Ingredients: ['5 tomatoes, seeded and diced', '½ cup chopped fresh basil', '½ cup olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste']

', 'Step 2: n Cover bowl with plastic wrap and let mixture sit at room temperature until the flavors meld, 2 to 10 hours.
', 'Step 3: n Stir Parmesan cheese into the tomato mixture just before serving.

Title: Simply Traditional Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '½ cup warm water', '1 cup sliced black olives', '1 pinch basil', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 ½ teaspoons dried sage', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '1 tablespoon dried onion flakes', '2 (14 ounce) jars marinara sauce', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '8 ounces ricotta cheese', '1 pound mozzarella cheese, shredded']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Brown the ground beef and Italian sausage in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Drain excess grease.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the water and black olives, and season with basil, garlic powder, oregano, sage, pepper, minced garlic, and onion flakes.
', 'Step 4: Simmer for about 15 minutes, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the marinara sauce, and remove from the heat.
', 'Step 6: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Place a layer of the meat and sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Cover with a layer of dry noodles.
', 'Step 9: Spread a thin layer of ricotta cheese over the noodles, and sprinkle with a little mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 10: Cover with another layer of sauce, and repeat layering ending with the meat and sauce on top.
', 'Step 11: Reserve about 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese for later.
', 'Step 12: Bake for 45 minutes in the preheated oven, but check after 30 minutes depending on how thick the lasagna is.
', 'Step 13: Lasagna is cooked when you can easily stick a knife into it.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle the reserved cheese over the top, and return to the oven for about 10 minutes for a nice melted cheese topping.
']

Title: Chicken Parmesan Casserole
Ingredients: ['2 cups rotini pasta', '1 (12 ounce) can chicken chunks, drained', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 cups marinara sauce', '½ cup seasoned bread crumbs']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 3: Once the water is boiling, stir in the rotini, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 6: Stir together the rotini, chicken, and mozzarella cheese in a large casserole dish.
', 'Step 7: Pour the marinara sauce over the pasta mixture; sprinkle with bread crumbs.
', 'Step 8: Cover the dish with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese is entirely melted, about 35 minutes.
']

Title: Tuscan Kale Lasagna
Ingredients: ['6 lasagna noodles', '1 bunch lacinato kale, stemmed', '1 ¾ cups whole milk ricotta cheese', '½ cup soft goat cheese', '1 egg', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '¼ cup finely chopped fresh basil, or more to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '15 cremini mushrooms, sliced', '4 cloves garlic, minced', "2 cups tomato-basil sauce (such as Rao's Homemade®)", '⅔ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', 'aluminum foil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring 2 large pots of water (one heavily salted, and one lightly salted) to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add lasagna noodles to the heavily salted water and parboil for 6 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove noodles to an ice water bath to stop the cooking process; drain and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Add kale to the lightly salted water and cook for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain and rinse under cold water.
', 'Step 7: Dry thoroughly and rip into large, bite-sized pieces; set aside.
', 'Step 8: Mix ricotta cheese, goat cheese, and egg together in a bowl.
', 'Step 9: Mix in 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, basil, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 10: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat; stir in mushrooms and season with salt.
', 'Step 11: Saute until softened, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Add garlic and red pepper flakes and cook until mushrooms are tender, 3 minutes more.
', 'Step 13: Remove from the heat.
', 'Step 14: Coat the bottom of a 9-inch square baking dish with 1/2 cup tomato sauce.
', 'Step 15: Layer ingredients evenly as follows, pressing down firmly after adding each layer of noodles: 2 lasagna noodles, 1/2 the ricotta cheese mixture, all the kale, 1/2 cup tomato sauce, 1/8 cup Parmesan, 2 lasagna noodles placed in opposite direction as first layer, the remaining ricotta mixture, all the mushrooms, 1/2 cup tomato sauce, 1/8 cup Parmesan, the remaining lasagna noodles (alternating direction once more) and tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and remaining Parmesan.
', 'Step 16: Cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 17: Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Remove aluminum foil and bake until cheese is golden brown and bubble, about 15 more minutes.
']

Title: Fettuccini with Salsa Cruda and Feta
Ingredients: ['1 pound fresh fettuccine pasta', '5 ripe tomatoes, chopped', '½ small red onion, chopped', '1 cup chopped fresh basil', '½ cup pitted kalamata olives, chopped', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 cup crumbled feta cheese']

', 'Step 2: Add fettuccini and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl combine tomatoes, onion, basil, olives and black pepper.
', 'Step 4: Toss the fettuccini with olive oil.
', 'Step 5: Serve pasta topped with tomato mixture and feta cheese.
']

Title: Caprese Shrimp Salad
Ingredients: ['12 cherry tomatoes, halved and seeded', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 pinch oregano', '1 celery stalk, chopped', '1 carrot, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon peppercorns', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '8 large shrimp, peeled and deveined', '½ (8 ounce) ball fresh buffalo mozzarella', '1 slice stale bread', '1 ½ tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided, or to taste', '2 tablespoons sliced black olives', '8 fresh basil leaves, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Place cherry tomatoes on the prepared baking sheet, cut side up; sprinkle with sugar and oregano.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until completely wilted, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile combine celery, carrot, onion, peppercorns, and salt in a saucepan.
', 'Step 6: Add enough water to fill the saucepan halfway.
', 'Step 7: Cover and bring to a boil for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add shrimp and poach for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain, peel, and chop shrimp.
', 'Step 10: Cut buffalo mozzarella into cubes; place in a colander or sieve to drain off excess water.
', 'Step 11: Place bread in the bowl of a food processor and pulse to make breadcrumbs.
', 'Step 12: Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 13: Add breadcrumbs and cook until crispy and golden in color, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Mix the buffalo mozzarella cubes with cooked shrimp in a large bowl.
', 'Step 15: Add chopped black olives and season to taste with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 16: Arrange on a serving plate and top with caramelized tomatoes and toasted breadcrumbs.
', 'Step 17: Drizzle with some more olive oil and garnish with basil leaves.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '207.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '14.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '86.1 mg', 'fatContent': '9.7 g', 'fiberContent': '3.6 g', 'proteinContent': '16.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '268.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.4 g'}

Title: Lasagna Rolls with Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '3 eggs', '1 ½ tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 small onion, sliced', '3 (6 ounce) cans tomato sauce', 'salt to taste', '6 leaves fresh basil', '1 bunch fresh spinach', '2 tablespoons water', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 (7 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place flour on a work surface and make a well in the center.
', 'Step 2: Add eggs, 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 3: Beat eggs using a fork, progressively incorporating the surrounding flour to make a sticky dough.
', 'Step 4: Grease your hands with some oil and knead dough for 10 minutes into a smooth and soft ball.
', 'Step 5: Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a saucepan over medium-low heat and cook onion until soft and translucent, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add tomato sauce and increase heat to medium.
', 'Step 8: Season with salt and cook, covered, until sauce starts to thicken, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add basil and remove from heat, but keep warm.
', 'Step 10: Combine spinach and water in a skillet over medium heat and cook until spinach is wilted, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Drain spinach in a sieve and squeeze out as much liquid as possible.
', 'Step 12: Return spinach to the skillet.
', 'Step 13: Add Parmesan cheese, butter, and garlic; cook for 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Discard garlic and allow spinach to cool.
', 'Step 15: Chop cooled spinach and combine with ricotta, nutmeg, salt, and pepper for the filling.
', 'Step 16: Remove pasta dough from the refrigerator and roll out on a clean work surface into a very thin rectangle.
', 'Step 17: Spread spinach filling on top, leaving a 1/2-inch border on all 4 sides.
', "Step 18: Roll up dough from the long side and seal well on the edges so filling won't leak out.
", 'Step 19: Soak a large piece of parchment paper in water and squeeze out well.
', 'Step 20: Wrap the lasagna roll with the damp parchment paper and tie up the ends like a piece of candy.
', 'Step 21: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 22: Cook lasagna roll in the boiling water for about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Drain.
', 'Step 24: Discard parchment paper and let cool slightly.
', 'Step 25: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 26: Slice the lasagna roll into 1/2-inch pieces and place in a casserole dish.
', 'Step 27: Cover with tomato sauce and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 28: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '397.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '49.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '111.9 mg', 'fatContent': '14.9 g', 'fiberContent': '4.2 g', 'proteinContent': '16.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '885.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.7 g'}

Title: Fried Parmesan Cauliflower Bites
Ingredients: ['1 medium head cauliflower, cut into bite-sized pieces', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 large eggs', '¼ cup milk', '2 cups dry bread crumbs', '½ cup cracker meal', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste', '½ cup vegetable oil, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', "Step 2: Add cauliflower and cook until just tender, 3 to 5 minutes; don't overcook.
", 'Step 3: Drain.
', 'Step 4: Mix flour, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
', 'Step 5: Mix eggs and milk in a second bowl.
', 'Step 6: Mix bread crumbs, cracker meal, and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese in a third bowl.
', 'Step 7: Dip cooked cauliflower into the flour mixture, then into the egg mixture, and finally into the bread crumb mixture.
', 'Step 8: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Lower cauliflower carefully into the hot oil in batches, adding more oil if needed.
', 'Step 10: Fry until light golden brown and crispy, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain.
', 'Step 12: Repeat with remaining cauliflower.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '387.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '63.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '96.7 mg', 'fatContent': '7.9 g', 'fiberContent': '4.7 g', 'proteinContent': '15.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '380 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.2 g'}

Title: Caprese Chicken Casserole with Pesto
Ingredients: ['3 (4 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken thighs', '2 tablespoons salted butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ medium onion, diced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 ½ tablespoons gluten-free all-purpose flour', '2 ½ cups chicken stock', '1 (8 ounce) package fresh mozzarella cheese, cubed', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes, drained', '1 ½ cups quick-cooking brown rice', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil', '⅔ cup chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon pine nuts', '¼ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 clove garlic, halved', '¼ cup olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place chicken thighs in a large pot and pour in water to cover.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 4: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Remove chicken to a plate and shred with 2 forks.
', 'Step 6: Heat butter and olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add onions and saute until tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add garlic and saute an additional 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Whisk in flour and stir until the mixture becomes paste-like and light golden brown, being careful not to burn, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Whisk in chicken stock, 1/2 cup at a time.
', 'Step 11: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Add shredded chicken and mozzarella cheese to the onions; stir until well incorporated.
', 'Step 13: Add diced tomatoes and simmer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Add rice and simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 16: Stir in 1/4 cup chopped basil.
', 'Step 17: Spoon mixture into a 9-inch square baking dish.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven until hot and bubbly, 30 to 35 minutes.
', 'Step 19: While the casserole is baking, combine basil, pine nuts, salt, pepper, and garlic for pesto sauce in a food processor; pulse until blended.
', 'Step 20: Pour olive oil in slowly, with the processor running, until mixture is smooth.
', 'Step 21: Remove casserole from the oven and top with pesto sauce.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '438.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '24.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '75.2 mg', 'fatContent': '28.9 g', 'fiberContent': '2.3 g', 'proteinContent': '20.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '606.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.3 g'}

Title: Meatless Meatball Lasagna
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium white onion, chopped', '¾ cup Peppers, sweet, green, frozen, chopped, unprepared', '2 large cloves garlic, chopped', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 (16 ounce) package vegetarian meatballs (meatless)', '2 (28 ounce) jars spaghetti sauce', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '2 teaspoons vinegar', '2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce', '2 (15 ounce) containers part-skim ricotta cheese', '½ cup plain yogurt', '½ cup crumbled feta cheese', '2 (8 ounce) packages whole wheat lasagna noodles, dry', '2 (16 ounce) packages fresh mozzarella cheese, torn into pieces', '1 ¼ cups shredded Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onion, bell peppers, garlic, basil, oregano, rosemary, and parsley; cook until soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add thawed meatballs and break up with a spoon; cook until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add spaghetti sauce, sugar, vinegar, and Worcestershire sauce; cook until hot, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 6: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Mix ricotta, yogurt, and feta together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 8: Ladle 3/4 cup spaghetti sauce mixture into the bottom of two 9x13-inch baking pans.
', 'Step 9: Place 3 dry lasagna noodles over top, then spoon ricotta mixture over noodles, and top with mozzarella cheese and more sauce.
', 'Step 10: Repeat layers once more: noodles, ricotta mixture, mozzarella, and sauce.
', 'Step 11: Top with remaining mozzarella and sprinkle Parmesan over top.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is golden brown and sauce is bubbling, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Watch so cheese does not burn and cover if needed.
', 'Step 14: Remove from the oven and let cool for 15 minutes before cutting.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients: ['¼ cup unsalted butter', '¼ cup olive oil', '3 cups diced mushrooms', '1 cup chopped onion', '1 sprig rosemary', '1 ½ cups Arborio rice', '¾ cup white wine', '1 quart chicken stock', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Select the Saute function on an electric pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®).
', 'Step 2: Add butter and olive oil; stir until butter melts, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add mushrooms; cook, stirring occasionally, until slightly softened, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in onion; cook for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add rosemary sprig; cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 6: Stir rice into the pot until each grain is coated with butter-olive oil mixture, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour in wine; simmer for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Pour in chicken stock, stirring to scrape the sides of the pot.
', 'Step 9: Simmer for 1 minute.
', 'Step 10: Close and lock the lid.
', 'Step 11: Turn the venting knob to sealing.
', "Step 12: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 6 minutes.
", 'Step 13: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', 'Step 14: Tap venting knob a few times with a wooden spoon or spatula.
', 'Step 15: Stand back; turn knob to point at Vent.
', 'Step 16: Remove lid when pressure is released, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Stir risotto until creamy, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 18: Discard rosemary sprig.
', 'Step 19: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 20: Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted and combined.
']

Title: Mediterranean Rolls with Pesto and Olives
Ingredients: ['1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed', '⅓ cup BUITONI® Refrigerated Pesto with Basil', '½ cup BUITONI® Refrigerated Freshly Shredded Parmesan Cheese', '2 tablespoons kalamata olives, pitted and diced', '1 large egg, beaten']

['Step 1: Roll out dough into 12 x 10-inch rectangle on lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 2: Spread pesto over dough, leaving 1/2-inch border around edges.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle with cheese and olives.
', 'Step 4: Start at long end of dough and roll into 12-inch-long cylinder; pinch dough to seal.
', 'Step 5: Cut into twelve 1-inch slices and place on ungreased baking sheet.
', 'Step 6: Cover with damp cloth and set in warm place for about 45 to 60 minutes or until double in size.

Title: Charlotte alla Milanese
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ pounds apples - peeled, cored and cut into eighths', '¾ cup white sugar, divided', '½ cup dry white wine', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest', '½ cup raisins', 'water to cover', '3 tablespoons butter', '12 thin slices white bread, crusts removed', '1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger rum']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place apples, 1/2 cup sugar, lemon zest and wine in a heavy saucepan.
', 'Step 3: Pour in water to cover completely.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, covered 15 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Place raisins in a small bowl and cover with water.
', 'Step 6: Let soak 10 minutes, then drain and reserve.
', 'Step 7: In a small bowl, cream together butter and remaining sugar until well combined.
', 'Step 8: Coat the bottom and sides of a 2-quart baking dish with this butter mixture.
', 'Step 9: Butter the top edge of each slice of bread.
', 'Step 10: Starting from the bottom, roll each slice up into a log, using the buttered edge to seal.
', 'Step 11: Cut 1/4- to 1/2-inch thick slices to form pinwheels.
', 'Step 12: Repeat with remaining bread.
', 'Step 13: Line bottom and sides of the greased baking dish with bread rounds.
', 'Step 14: Drain the apples and combine them with the drained raisins.
', 'Step 15: Spoon the fruit mixture into the lined dish.
', 'Step 16: Cover the top with the remaining bread rounds.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle with the remaining sugar.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven 1 hour.
', 'Step 19: To serve, pour rum over the warm charlotte and light it with a long match or kitchen torch.
']

Title: Italian Egg Dough
Ingredients: ['5 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '½ cup milk', '½ cup white sugar', '5 eggs', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '5 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon lemon juice', '1 cup butter', '1 ½ fluid ounces anise flavored liqueur', "½ cup confectioners' sugar", '1 tablespoon milk', '3 drops almond extract', '2 ¼ cups pitted prunes', '1 ½ cups raisins', '1 cup chopped walnuts', '½ cup chopped candied cherries', '2 eggs']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix 1/2 cup sugar, salt, baking powder, flour and 1 cup butter or margarine and work in like a pie crust.
', 'Step 2: Set aside.
', 'Step 3: Beat 4 of the eggs with milk.
', 'Step 4: Add 1/2 teaspoon of lemon juice, and vanilla.
', 'Step 5: Make a well with dry ingredients and add lemon mixture.
', 'Step 6: Mix in Sambucca and the one egg.
', 'Step 7: Make ropes with dough about 4 inches long and shape into whatever you like.
', 'Step 8: I usually shape into spiral shape.
', 'Step 9: Bake on ungreased cookie sheet Bake for 15 minutes at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', "Step 10: Make a glaze with confectioners' sugar and flavor with the almond extract (or any other flavoring you like).
", "Step 11: Add enough milk to the confectioners' sugar to make a loose frosting.
", 'Step 12: Try to frost the cookies when cool.
', 'Step 13: Just dip tops into frosting and twist.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle colored candies, if you like them, while the cookies are still wet with frosting.
', 'Step 15: You can also use this recipe to make filled cookies.
', 'Step 16: For filled cookies you need to roll the dough into 12 x 4 inch oblong shapes and fill with filling.
', 'Step 17: To Make Filling: Poach prunes with a little water.
', 'Step 18: Remove from heat and add raisins, chopped walnuts, chopped candied cherries and 2 eggs.
', 'Step 19: Mix well.
', 'Step 20: Add a few drops of any flavoring you like, I like lemon.
', 'Step 21: After the dough is stretched, place the filling in the middle , lengthwise and roll dough.
', 'Step 22: Place on cookie sheet with seam on the bottom.
', 'Step 23: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until the crust is golden (about 20-30 min.
', 'Step 24: ) When cool you can frost the logs and let the frosting dry then slice on the bias.
', 'Step 25: (My husband loves the ends of the logs.
', 'Step 26: ) ENJOY!
', 'Step 27: !
']

Title: Cherry, Chocolate, and Pistachio Zuccotto
Ingredients: ['1 (1 pound) loaf panettone', '1 (16 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 (8.8 ounce) container mascarpone cheese', '⅓ cup chopped pistachio nuts', '⅓ cup mixed candied fruit', '¼ cup white sugar', '1 (2 ounce) bar dark chocolate, coarsely chopped', '½ (15 ounce) can cherries, syrup reserved', '1 cup vin santo (Italian dessert wine), or as needed', '3 (1 ounce) squares dark chocolate, broken into pieces']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line a large bowl with plastic wrap to make a mold.
', 'Step 2: Slice 1/2 inch off the top and bottom of the panettone.
', 'Step 3: Cut another horizontal slice off the top.
', 'Step 4: Slice remaining panettone vertically; cut each vertical slice in half.
', 'Step 5: Mix ricotta cheese, mascarpone cheese, pistachio nuts, candied fruit, sugar, and dark chocolate together to make the filling.
', 'Step 6: Mix in cherries to create a marbled effect.
', 'Step 7: Lay the top panettone slice in the bottom of the mold.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle vin santo on top.
', 'Step 9: Arrange vertical halves around the side of the bowl, overlapping slightly if needed.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle with more vin santo.
', 'Step 11: Spoon 1/2 the ricotta mixture into the center, smoothing into corners using the back of a spoon.
', 'Step 12: Lay second panettone slice on top; sprinkle with vin santo.
', 'Step 13: Add remaining ricotta mixture, again smoothing down with the spoon.
', 'Step 14: Cover with the bottom slice.
', 'Step 15: Drizzle more vin santo and reserved cherry syrup on top.
', 'Step 16: Cover with plastic wrap and place a plate on top.
', 'Step 17: Add bags of beans to press down on zuccotto.
', 'Step 18: Refrigerate until set, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 19: Melt chocolate in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in 15-second intervals, stirring after each melting, 1 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Invert zuccotto onto a serving plate and peel off plastic wrap.
', 'Step 21: Drizzle melted chocolate over the top.
']

Title: Candice's Butternut Squash Ravioli
Ingredients: ['1 butternut squash, halved and seeded', '½ cup bread crumbs', '¼ cup brown sugar', '¼ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '1 (16 ounce) package wonton wrappers', '1 egg white', '¼ cup olive oil', '¼ cup finely diced pancetta', '½ cup sweet corn', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place butternut squash in a microwave-safe dish; cook in microwave until soft, about 15 minutes on 70 percent.
', 'Step 2: Spoon the squash meat into a bowl and mash until smooth; allow to cool slightly, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir bread crumbs, brown sugar, Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, egg, and almond extract into cooled squash until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Spoon 1 teaspoon squash mixture in the center of half of the wonton wrappers.
', 'Step 5: Brush the outer edges of each wrapper with egg white and top with another wonton wrapper, pressing the edges together to seal each ravioli.
', 'Step 6: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil; cook 3 to 4 ravioli at a time in the boiling water until cooked through and floating on top of water, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove cooked ravioli with a slotted spoon and transfer to a serving bowl.
', 'Step 8: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir pancetta in hot oil until browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add corn, thyme, salt, and pepper; cook and stir until warmed, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Pour pancetta mixture over ravioli.
']

Title: Spinach and Potato Frittata
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter or margarine', '1 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '1 (20 ounce) package Simply Potatoes® Homestyle Slices', '2 cups fresh spinach, torn', '1 large tomato, coarsely chopped', '½ teaspoon seasoned salt', "3 (8 ounce) packages Better'n Eggs®*", '1 cup Crystal Farms® Shredded Mozzarella Cheese']

', 'Step 2: Add garlic and Simply Potatoes®.

', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to medium-low.

', 'Step 8: Top with spinach and tomatoes; sprinkle with seasoned salt.
', "Step 9: Pour Better'n Eggs® evenly over mixture in skillet.
", 'Step 10: Cook for 10 to 12 minutes or until eggs are almost set.
', 'Step 11: Heat broiler.
', 'Step 12: Wrap handle of skillet with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 13: Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Top with cheese; broil 30 seconds or until cheese is melted.
', 'Step 15: Cut into wedges.
']

Title: Fettuccini con Rinforza e Patata
Ingredients: ['½ pound beef roast, cut into 1/4-inch cubes', '¼ cup chopped green onion', '1 pinch garlic powder', '4 pinches Old Bay seasoning', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of potato soup', '1 ½ cups nonfat milk', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ pound dry fettuccini pasta']

Title: Cocoa Panforte
Ingredients: ['5 ounces honey', '4 ounces white sugar', '3 ounces chopped pine nuts', '3 ounces chopped walnuts', '3 ounces chopped almonds', '3 ounces chopped candied pineapple', '3 ounces chopped crystallized ginger', '3 ounces chopped dried dates', '2 ounces unsweetened cocoa powder', '½ teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon ground allspice', '⅓ teaspoon ground nutmeg', "2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar, or as needed for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line an 8- or 9-inch baking pan with a removable bottom with rice paper or parchment paper, including the sides.
', 'Step 3: Combine honey and sugar in a small pan over low heat and stir until sugar is dissolved, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a gentle boil, and do not stir once syrup begins to boil.
', 'Step 5: Heat to 240 degrees F (115 degrees C) or until a small amount of syrup dropped into cold water forms a soft ball that flattens when removed from water and placed on a flat surface.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat and stir in pine nuts, walnuts, almonds, pineapple, ginger, dates, cocoa powder, coriander, allspice, and nutmeg.
', 'Step 7: Mixture will be very stiff.
', 'Step 8: Press mixture into the prepared baking pan.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove from oven and place pan on a cooling rack to cool completely.
', "Step 11: Remove panforte from the baking pan and dust with confectioners' sugar.
"]
