Title: Tagliatelle with Mushrooms and Asparagus
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided, plus more to taste', '2 cloves garlic, smashed', '7 thin asparagus spears', '2 ½ cups sliced button mushrooms', '¾ cup dry white wine', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package tagliatelle pasta', '5 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Remove the tough ends of the asparagus spears and chop into 1-inch pieces.
', 'Step 2: Reserve the tips.
', 'Step 3: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large pot over medium-low heat and cook garlic until light golden, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add asparagus pieces and cook over medium heat, stirring often, until softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in mushrooms and coat well with oil.
', 'Step 6: Pour in wine and cook until liquid evaporates, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add reserved asparagus tips and cook for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Discard garlic and season sauce with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 9: In the meantime, fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 10: Cook tagliatelle at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Drain, reserving some of the cooking water.
', 'Step 12: Add tagliatelle to pot with the sauce, toss, and cook everything over high heat for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
', 'Step 13: Drizzle with remaining olive oil and add some cooking water to thin sauce.
', 'Step 14: Distribute tagliatelle on serving plates and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: My Nutty Semifreddo
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '2 cups white sugar', '1 cup water', '1 pound skinned, toasted hazelnuts', '2 ½ cups heavy whipping cream', '8 eggs, separated']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Lightly grease a baking sheet with oil.
', 'Step 2: Line a 10-inch springform tin with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 3: Combine 1 cup sugar and water in a small saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook, without stirring, until sugar dissolves and syrup starts to bubble and turn golden brown, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in hazelnuts.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat and pour evenly onto the oiled baking sheet.
', 'Step 7: Let praline cool until solid, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Place half of the hazelnut praline in a food processor; blend into a fine powder.
', 'Step 9: Pour into a bowl.
', 'Step 10: Blend remaining praline into coarse chunks.
', 'Step 11: Beat heavy cream in large bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed until firm peaks form.
', 'Step 12: Combine egg yolks and remaining 1 cup sugar in another bowl; beat with the electric mixer on medium speed until smooth and pale, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Fold into whipped cream.
', 'Step 14: Beat egg whites in another bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 15: Fold into the whipped cream and egg yolk mixture.
', 'Step 16: Fold in hazelnut powder and hazelnuts chunks.
', 'Step 17: Spoon into the prepared springform tin; cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 18: Freeze until semifreddo hold its shape, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 19: Stir well.
', 'Step 20: Return to freezer and freeze, stirring every hour, until firm, 4 to 5 hours more.
']

Title: Gluten-Free Blueberry and Sweet Ricotta Crostata
Ingredients: ['1 cup white rice flour', '⅓ cup buckwheat flour', '⅓ cup potato starch', '¼ cup tapioca starch', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '2 tablespoons dark brown sugar', '⅔ cup cold unsalted butter', '1 large egg', '1 large egg yolk', '1 ½ cups fresh ricotta cheese, well drained', '¼ cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons dark brown sugar', '2 large egg yolks', '2 cups fresh blueberries']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 355 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Prepare 2 pieces of parchment paper large enough to cover a 9-inch round tart pan.
', 'Step 3: Whisk rice flour, buckwheat flour, potato starch, tapioca starch, white sugar, and dark brown sugar together.
', 'Step 4: Cut in butter with your fingers until fully incorporated.
', 'Step 5: Mix in egg and egg yolk by hand.
', 'Step 6: Knead until the dough comes together to form a ball.
', 'Step 7: Roll out the dough between the 2 sheets of parchment paper until it is approximately 1/2-inch thick and large enough to cover the bottom and rim of the tart pan.
', 'Step 8: Place the crust in the pan.
', 'Step 9: Remove the top sheet of paper to poke holes with a fork.
', 'Step 10: Replace the paper.
', 'Step 11: Fill the pan with pie weights or dried beans.
', 'Step 12: Bake the tart shell on the bottom rack of the oven until slightly browned, 12 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove and set aside to cool, removing the weights.
', 'Step 14: Keep the oven on.
', 'Step 15: Meanwhile, whisk together ricotta, white sugar, dark brown sugar, and egg yolks in a bowl until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 16: Pour ricotta mixture over the crust and smooth out with a rubber scraper.
', 'Step 17: Top with fresh blueberries.
', 'Step 18: Bake until the blueberries and the ricotta cream are bubbly and beginning to brown, 35 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Allow to cool to set before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '372 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '49 g', 'cholesterolContent': '140.7 mg', 'fatContent': '18.2 g', 'fiberContent': '2.3 g', 'proteinContent': '4.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '16.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '19.8 g'}

Title: Summer Italian-Style Tomato Salad
Ingredients: ['6 slices Wonder® Classic White Sandwich Bread', '2 each large, ripe tomatoes', '2 slice (blank)s thin slices red onion, halved and separated into rings', '½ cup thinly sliced cucumber', '2 tablespoons minced fresh basil', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pinch Salt and pepper, to taste', '1 cup Torn romaine or crisp lettuce', '1 teaspoon Shredded Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut bread into 3 strips; cut each strip into thirds, making 9 cubes.
', 'Step 2: Arrange bread cubes in a single layer on a tray.
', 'Step 3: Allow to stand at room temperature several hours, or overnight, until dry and crisp.
', 'Step 4: Stir cubes once or twice to be sure they crisp evenly.
', 'Step 5: Set aside.
', 'Step 6: Cut each tomato into wedges about 3/4 to 1-inch thick.
', 'Step 7: Combine tomato wedges, red onion rings and sliced cucumber in a large salad bowl.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle with basil.
', 'Step 9: Whisk together oil, vinegar, garlic, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 10: When ready to serve, drizzle dressing mixture over salad.
', 'Step 11: Top with bread cubes and toss to combine.
', 'Step 12: Spoon onto salad plates lined with torn romaine and garnish with Parmesan cheese if desired.
']

Title: Chicken Piccata with Artichoke Hearts
Ingredients: ['¾ cup all-purpose flour', '⅛ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, pounded 1/2 inch thick and cut into thirds', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 onion, minced', '½ cup white wine', '1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 (13.75 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped, liquid reserved', '¼ cup capers, with liquid', '2 tablespoons butter']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix together the flour, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning on a plate.
', 'Step 2: One by one, dredge the chicken pieces lightly in the prepared flour mixture.
', 'Step 3: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook the chicken pieces for 2 minutes per side, or until nicely browned.
', 'Step 5: Remove from the skillet and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Using the same skillet, cook and stir the garlic and onion until translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour the white wine into the skillet, turn the heat to high, and cook until the wine reduces by half, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add the chicken broth, lemon juice, artichoke hearts, reserved artichoke liquid, and browned chicken to the skillet.
', 'Step 9: Reduce the heat to medium and cook until the sauce thickens, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir in the capers and butter.
']

Title: Polenta with Homemade Tomato-Seafood Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 celery stalk, minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon dried Italian seasoning', '2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley', '1 ½ cubes fish-flavored bouillon cubes', '1 cup dry red wine', '3 cups canned diced tomatoes', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 pinch paprika', '1 pound mixed frozen seafood', '4 squid, cleaned and cut into rings and tentacles', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 cups water', '1 cup coarse polenta (not instant)', '½ cup baby spinach leaves', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', 'garlic salt to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small red onion, diced', '2 zucchini, cut in half lengthwise then into 1/4-inch slices', '10 cremini mushrooms, sliced', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', 'sea salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in onion and garlic; cook until the onion has softened and the garlic has begun to turn brown, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the celery and cook for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add olive oil, Italian seasoning, parsley, bouillon cubes, and red wine; simmer for 5 minutes, stirring to break up the bouillon cubes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in canned tomatoes, sugar, cayenne, and paprika.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Take the tomato sauce off of the heat and puree with a stick blender until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the mixed seafood, and return to a boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 9: Stir in squid, reduce heat to medium-low, and gently simmer for 30 minutes; season to taste with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 10: While the tomato-seafood sauce is simmering, prepare the polenta by bringing water to a boil in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Reduce heat to medium, and slowly whisk in polenta with a wire whisk.
', 'Step 12: Allow to simmer 5 minutes, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 13: Stir in spinach, Parmesan cheese, and mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 14: Reduce heat to medium-low, and allow to slowly simmer 15 minutes, stirring frequently to keep from burning.
', 'Step 15: Once the polenta has softened and turned creamy, remove from heat, season to taste with garlic salt, and keep warm.
', 'Step 16: To prepare the vegetable mix, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 17: Stir in red onion and cook for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Add zucchini and cook for an additional 2 minutes, or until zucchini begins to brown.
', 'Step 19: Stir in mushrooms, and continue cooking until soft.
', 'Step 20: Season with balsamic vinegar and salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 21: To serve, scoop a pile of polenta into the center of each plate; ladle the seafood sauce around, then top with vegetable mixture.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '458.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '39 g', 'cholesterolContent': '256.8 mg', 'fatContent': '18.5 g', 'fiberContent': '5.4 g', 'proteinContent': '25.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '736.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.8 g'}

Title: 'Angry' Italian Bean Spread
Ingredients: ['¼ cup packed Italian parsley leaves', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '2 (15 ounce) cans red beans, rinsed and drained', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¾ cup BUITONI® Refrigerated Arrabbiata Sauce', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', 'Crackers or grilled bread']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine parsley and garlic in food processor; process for 30 seconds.
', 'Step 2: Add beans, salt and pepper; process for 1 minute.
', 'Step 3: Scrape down sides of bowl; process for 30 seconds.
', 'Step 4: With processor running, add sauce and oil.
', 'Step 5: Process for 30 seconds or until smooth.
', 'Step 6: Serve with crackers or grilled bread.
']

Title: Mamma Annette's Caponatina (Eggplant Salad)
Ingredients: ['1 cup vegetable oil, or as needed', '1 large eggplant, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '1 bunch celery, cut into 1/2-inch slices', '2 medium onions, sliced', '4 medium green bell peppers, thinly sliced', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '½ cup red wine vinegar', '¼ cup capers, rinsed', '1 tablespoon white sugar', 'salt to taste', '1 (5 ounce) jar pimento-stuffed green olives', '1 (6 ounce) can large black olives']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1/2 inch oil in a large frying pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add eggplant and saute until browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove with a slotted spoon and transfer to a Dutch oven.
', 'Step 4: Add celery to the frying pan with more oil if necessary.
', 'Step 5: Saute until softened, about 5 minutes; transfer to the Dutch oven.
', 'Step 6: Cut onion slices into 1-inch pieces.
', 'Step 7: Add to the frying pan with bell peppers and more oil if necessary.
', 'Step 8: Saute until softened, about 5 minutes; transfer to the Dutch oven.
', 'Step 9: Add tomato paste, vinegar, capers, sugar, and salt to the Dutch oven.
', 'Step 10: Heat over medium heat until simmering, then cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove from the heat and allow to cool.
', 'Step 12: Add green and black olives and place in the refrigerator to chill before serving, about 1 hour.
']

Title: Cheesy Meatloaf Muffins
Ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray', '¾ cup milk', '3 tablespoons Italian-style salad dressing', '1 tablespoon prepared yellow mustard', '1 egg', '½ cup quick-cooking oats', '¼ cup old-fashioned oats', '½ cup shredded Swiss cheese', '¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 ⅓ pounds ground beef', '⅓ cup diced onion', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '2 teaspoons celery seed', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons Italian-style salad dressing, or to taste', '2 tablespoons ketchup, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray two extra-large 6-cup muffin tins with nonstick cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Mix milk, 3 tablespoons Italian dressing, mustard, and egg together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Mix in quick-cooking and old-fashioned oats followed by Swiss cheese, Parmesan cheese, and mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 5: Let mixture sit for 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Mix in beef, onion, oregano, garlic, celery seed, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Let sit for another 3 to 5 minutes to absorb liquid, as mixture will seem very wet.
', 'Step 8: Scoop out mixture and mold into twelve 1/3- to 1/2-cup balls.
', 'Step 9: Place into the prepared muffin tins.
', 'Step 10: Drizzle tops with more Italian dressing.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the centers and browned on top, 35 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Remove muffins from the oven and drizzle tops with ketchup.
', "Step 13: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 14: Broil in the preheated oven until ketchup is cooked and meat muffins are crispy, 5 to 10 minutes.
']

Title: Chicken Saltimbocca Meatloaf
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or to taste', '6 cups baby spinach', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt, divided', '1 teaspoon freshly ground pepper, divided', '5 slices prosciutto, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '2 cups sliced mushrooms', '1 pound ground chicken', '½ cup almond meal', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '2 cups low-sodium chicken broth', '2 tablespoons arrowroot powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat an oven-safe skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add 2 tablespoons olive oil and spinach; toss until almost wilted, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 3: Stir in garlic, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper until just combined, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 4: Transfer cooked spinach to a bowl.
', 'Step 5: Cook prosciutto in the same skillet over medium heat, breaking apart with tongs, until brown but not crispy, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from skillet and place in a small bowl.
', 'Step 7: Melt butter in the skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Cook and stir mushrooms until softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove and place mushrooms in a bowl.
', 'Step 10: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Combine ground chicken, almond meal, Parmesan cheese, Italian seasoning, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper in a bowl using a fork.
', 'Step 12: Mix by hand and divide the mixture in half.
', 'Step 13: Flatten each portion to 1/2-inch thickness by pressing down with the palm of your hand.
', 'Step 14: Top with cooked spinach and prosciutto.
', 'Step 15: Roll each portion into a loaf, sealing the spinach and prosciutto inside.
', 'Step 16: Grease the skillet with the remaining 1 tablespoon oil.
', 'Step 17: Add meat loaves.
', 'Step 18: Place skillet in the preheated oven and bake until meat loaves are no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 35 minutes.
', 'Step 19: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 20: Whisk chicken broth and arrowroot powder together in a large glass measuring cup.
', 'Step 21: Microwave for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 22: Remove skillet from the oven and pour in the broth and cooked mushrooms.
', 'Step 23: Continue baking until liquid is reduced, about 15 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '452.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '12.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '142.2 mg', 'fatContent': '26 g', 'fiberContent': '2 g', 'proteinContent': '43.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '1331.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.4 g'}

Title: Italian Pesto Roasted Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 head garlic', '2 cups packed fresh basil leaves', '2 tablespoons grated Pecorino Romano cheese (such as Locatelli®)', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or more as needed', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (2 1/2 pound) whole chicken, rinsed and patted dry']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Cut off the top of the head of garlic to expose the cloves, trimming about 1/4 inch off of the top of each clove.
', 'Step 3: You may need to trim individual cloves along the sides of the head.
', 'Step 4: Brush the cut cloves with a small amount of olive oil and nestle the head into a piece of aluminum foil.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven until cloves begin to soften, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove garlic from the oven and let cool slightly.
', 'Step 7: Leave oven on.
', 'Step 8: Press on the bottom of each clove to push softened cloves out of their peels and into a small bowl.
', 'Step 9: Process basil in the bowl of a food processor until minced.
', 'Step 10: Add roasted garlic and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese; pulse a couple of times to mix together.
', 'Step 11: Pour olive oil in slowly, with the processor running, until pesto is smooth and has achieved your desired consistency.
', 'Step 12: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 13: Slide your fingers under the skin of the chicken to loosen it.
', 'Step 14: Rub pesto generously underneath the skin and inside the cavity of the chicken.
', 'Step 15: Place chicken on a rack inside a baking pan.
', 'Step 16: Place chicken in the oven and cook for 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Increase heat to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) and cook until no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, 10 to 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 18: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh, near the bone, should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 19: Remove from the oven, cover with a doubled sheet of aluminum foil, and allow to rest in a warm area for 10 minutes before slicing.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '521.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '5.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '124.9 mg', 'fatContent': '36.5 g', 'fiberContent': '0.6 g', 'proteinContent': '40.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '8.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '202.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.2 g'}

Title: Creamy Italian White Bean Soup
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 stalk celery, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 (16 ounce) cans white kidney beans, rinsed and drained', '1 (14 ounce) can chicken broth', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '⅛ teaspoon dried thyme', '2 cups water', '1 bunch fresh spinach, rinsed and thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large saucepan, heat oil.
', 'Step 2: Cook onion and celery in oil for 5 to 8 minutes, or until tender.
', 'Step 3: Add garlic, and cook for 30 seconds, continually stirring.
', 'Step 4: Stir in beans, chicken broth, pepper, thyme and 2 cups water.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and then simmer for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: With slotted spoon, remove 2 cups of the bean and vegetable mixture from soup and set aside.
', 'Step 7: In blender at low speed, blend remaining soup in small batches until smooth, (it helps to remove the center piece of the blender lid to allow steam to escape.
', 'Step 8: ) Once blended pour soup back into stock pot and stir in reserved beans.
', 'Step 9: Bring to a boil, occasionally stirring.
', 'Step 10: Stir in spinach and cook 1 minute or until spinach is wilted.
', 'Step 11: Stir in lemon juice and remove from heat and serve with fresh grated Parmesan cheese on top.
']

Title: Grandma's Waffle Cookies (Pizzelles)
Ingredients: ['6 eggs', '2 ½ cups white sugar', '½ cup vegetable oil', '½ cup butter, melted and cooled', '1 teaspoon anise oil, or more to taste', '5 cups all-purpose flour, or as needed', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, butter, and anise oil in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment.
', 'Step 2: Beat until creamy and well combined.
', 'Step 3: Mix in 1 cup flour, baking powder, and salt until combined.
', 'Step 4: Slowly add remaining flour, 1 cup at a time, mixing on low speed until mixture resembles a thick pancake batter.
', "Step 5: Preheat a pizzelle cooking iron according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 6: Drop a teaspoon of dough onto each plate of the cooking iron and close the lid.
', 'Step 7: Cook just until steaming slows, 10 to 20 seconds.
', 'Step 8: Repeat with remaining batches of batter.
']

Title: Trofie alla Genovese
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup pine nuts', '1 ½ cups chopped fresh basil', '½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or more to taste', '4 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '4 cups vegetable stock, or more as needed', '8 ounces haricots verts', '1 large russet potato, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '1 lb trofie pasta (preferably fresh)', '4 wedges fresh lemon']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Start by making the pesto: Heat a dry pan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 2: Add pine nuts and roast, tossing occasionally, until fragrant, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Transfer to a food processor.
', 'Step 4: Add basil, Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup olive oil, and garlic to the pine nuts; pulse until pesto is smooth.
', 'Step 5: Add more olive oil if pesto is too thick.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper and let rest for 1 hour.
', 'Step 7: Prepare pasta: Bring vegetable stock to a boil in a large pot.
', 'Step 8: Add haricots verts and boil for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat to a simmer, add potato, and cook until both are fork-tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove vegetables with a slotted spoon, leaving broth in the pot.
', 'Step 11: Add trofie pasta to the broth and boil until tender yet firm to the bite, 7 to 8 minutes for dry pasta and 3 to 4 minutes for fresh.
', 'Step 12: Drain.
', 'Step 13: Combine potatoes, green beans, and pasta with the reserved pesto and toss together.
', 'Step 14: Plate immediately with a wedge of lemon.
']

Title: Spring Risotto
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons butter', '1 bulb fennel, diced', '1 small red bell pepper, diced', '1 onion, diced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons grated lemon zest', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh mint leaves', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary', '½ teaspoon ground coriander', '1 ½ cups uncooked Arborio rice', '½ cup dry white wine', '3 ½ cups hot vegetable stock', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, or to taste', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil and butter in a medium-size heavy saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in fennel, red pepper, onion, and garlic.
', 'Step 3: In a small bowl, mix together lemon zest, mint, parsley, and rosemary.
', 'Step 4: Stir half of this herb mixture into saucepan, and set the rest aside.
', 'Step 5: Saute vegetables until slightly softened, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in coriander and rice.
', 'Step 7: Cook, stirring frequently, until rice grains are thoroughly coated with oil and butter.
', 'Step 8: Stir in wine, then reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 9: Stir in about 1 cup of vegetable broth.
', 'Step 10: Continue to stir while ladling in more broth as needed; rice should have a thin veil of broth over it at all times.
', 'Step 11: Cook for 20 to 25 minutes, until all broth is used and absorbed, and rice is tender.
', 'Step 12: Remove pan from heat and stir in remaining herb mixture, lemon juice and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 13: Season to taste with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 14: Cover pan loosely with waxed paper and allow to stand 8 to 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Chocolate Chocolate Biscotti
Ingredients: ['1 cup white sugar', '¼ cup margarine, softened', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¾ cup liquid egg substitute', '2 ¼ cups all-purpose flour', '1 ¼ cups unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 (5 ounce) milk chocolate candy bar, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease cookie sheets.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, cream together the sugar, margarine and olive oil until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the vanilla and egg substitute.
', 'Step 5: Combine the flour, cocoa, and baking powder.
', 'Step 6: Stir into the creamed mixture.
', 'Step 7: Fold in the chocolate pieces.
', 'Step 8: Cover, and chill dough for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Divide the dough into two equal pieces.
', 'Step 10: Roll each piece into a log about 9 inches long.
', 'Step 11: Place the logs onto the prepared cookie sheets about 4 inches apart.
', 'Step 12: Flatten each one down to 1 inch thickness.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until firm.
', 'Step 14: Cool on sheets for 15 minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely.
', 'Step 15: Move the cookie loaves to a cutting board.
', 'Step 16: Using a serrated knife, slice each loaf crosswise into 3/4 inch slices.
', 'Step 17: Return slices to the baking sheet cut side down and bake for an additional 8 to 10 minutes on each side, until dry and lightly toasted.
', 'Step 18: Cool completely before storing in an airtight container.
']

Title: Breaded Eggplant Rollatini
Ingredients: ['1 large eggplant, cut lengthwise into 1/4-inch slices', '½ cup milk', '½ cup whole wheat flour', '2 teaspoons garlic powder, divided', '1 teaspoon onion powder, divided', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste', '½ teaspoon salt, divided', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper, divided', '2 eggs', '1 cup panko bread crumbs', '¼ cup olive oil, divided', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ large onion, chopped', '2 teaspoons minced garlic, or to taste', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (14.5 ounce) can petite diced tomatoes', '½ (14.5 ounce) can chopped tomatoes', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons dried oregano, or to taste', '2 teaspoons dried basil, or to taste', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon poultry seasoning, or to taste', '1 (15 ounce) container low-fat ricotta cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package fresh spinach', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place eggplant slices in a large dish and cover with salted water.
', 'Step 3: Let soak, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain and cover with milk.
', 'Step 5: Combine flour, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper in a large resealable plastic bag.
', 'Step 6: Beat eggs lightly in a shallow bowl that is long enough for the eggplant slices to fit in.
', 'Step 7: Combine panko, remaining 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper in another large resealable plastic bag.
', 'Step 8: Place 1 slice eggplant in flour mixture, shaking to coat.
', 'Step 9: Dip in egg.
', 'Step 10: Transfer to bag with panko mixture, shaking to coat.
', 'Step 11: Repeat with remaining slices.
', 'Step 12: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet.
', 'Step 13: Cook coated eggplant slices in batches until golden brown and crisp, about 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 14: Transfer to a cooling rack.
', 'Step 15: Repeat with remaining eggplant, adding oil as needed.
', 'Step 16: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 17: Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until onion softens, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Stir in tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, chopped tomatoes, 2 teaspoons pepper, oregano, basil, 1 teaspoon salt, and poultry seasoning.
', 'Step 19: Reduce heat to low and cover; cook sauce, stirring occasionally, until flavors combine, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Mix ricotta cheese, spinach, egg, Parmesan cheese, 1 teaspoon garlic, nutmeg, salt, and pepper together gently in a bowl to make filling.
', 'Step 21: Spread 2 to 3 tablespoons of filling over each eggplant slice.
', 'Step 22: Roll slices into logs and arrange in a single layer in a 9x13-inch baking pan.
', 'Step 23: Pour tomato sauce evenly on top.
', 'Step 24: Bake in the preheated oven until sauce is bubbly, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '331.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '32.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '88.6 mg', 'fatContent': '18 g', 'fiberContent': '6.5 g', 'proteinContent': '15.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '1060.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.9 g'}

Title: Marsala Cream Chicken with Asparagus
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package penne pasta', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 shallot, minced', '1 cup sliced baby portabella mushrooms', '1 cup bite-sized pieces fresh asparagus', '¼ cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes', '1 cup chicken broth', '1 cup Marsala wine', '1 (3 pound) rotisserie chicken, bones removed and meat cut into bite-size pieces', '3 tablespoons heavy whipping cream', '1 tablespoon softened butter', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook penne pasta at a boil until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 3: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir shallot in melted butter until fragrant, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir mushrooms, asparagus, and sun-dried tomatoes into shallot and butter mixture; cook and stir until asparagus begins to soften, about 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 6: Pour chicken broth and Marsala wine into the skillet; bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and stir chicken and cream into mixture.
', 'Step 7: Mix softened butter and flour into a paste in a bowl; stir into chicken mixture.
', 'Step 8: Cook, stirring continually, until the flour is cooked and the liquid thickens, 1 to 2 minutes; ladle over the cooked penne pasta and top with Parmesan cheese to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '951.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '60.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '211.1 mg', 'fatContent': '41.8 g', 'fiberContent': '4.1 g', 'proteinContent': '65.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '16.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '380.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.4 g'}

Title: Baked Chicken Piccata
Ingredients: ['1 gallon lukewarm water', '¼ cup kosher salt', '8 chicken cutlets', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '8 tablespoons unsalted butter, divided', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 cup chicken stock', '2 large lemons, juiced', '3 ½ ounces capers, drained', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: For the brine: Combine lukewarm water and salt in a large bowl, stirring until the salt dissolves.
', 'Step 2: Add chicken cutlets and let stand at room temperature for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove chicken and pat dry, discarding brine.
', 'Step 4: Season each cutlet with salt and pepper, then dredge in flour; shake off any excess flour.
', 'Step 5: Place seasoned and floured cutlets on a plate.
', 'Step 6: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Grease a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Heat half the butter and olive oil in a large skillet over medium high-heat until butter is melted and oil is shimmering.
', 'Step 9: Add 4 floured cutlets and cook until browned, about 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 10: Transfer to the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 11: Repeat with the remaining cutlets.
', 'Step 12: Bake chicken cutlets in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 13: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: While chicken bakes, heat the original skillet over medium-high heat for the sauce.
', 'Step 15: Stir in chicken stock, lemon juice, and capers, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the skillet.
', 'Step 16: Season with garlic, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 17: Stir in remaining 4 tablespoons butter, 1 tablespoon at a time, and cook, stirring constantly, until a spoonable consistency is reached, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Drizzle sauce over the baked chicken to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '432.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '21.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '106.2 mg', 'fatContent': '27.6 g', 'fiberContent': '2.9 g', 'proteinContent': '26.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '11.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '4578.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.3 g'}

Title: Egg Yolk Pasta (Uova da Raviolo) with Cilantro Pesto
Ingredients: ['2 cups chopped fresh cilantro leaves and soft stems', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons toasted almonds', '1 ½ tablespoons plain non-fat yogurt', '1 ½ teaspoons lemon juice', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '1 cup whole wheat flour, or as needed', '4 eggs', '½ teaspoon olive oil', '1 cup light ricotta cheese', '⅓ cup Parmesan cheese', '4 egg yolks', '1 egg white', '2 teaspoons water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place cilantro leaves, garlic, 2 tablespoons olive oil, toasted almonds, yogurt, lemon juice, salt, and pepper into a food processor.
', 'Step 2: Pulse until mixture becomes a paste-like pesto, 6 or 7 pulses.
', 'Step 3: Mix all-purpose flour and whole wheat flour together in a bowl.
', 'Step 4: Mound flour on a work surface such as a large wooden cutting board.
', 'Step 5: Create a well in the center of the flour; add 4 eggs and 1/2 teaspoon olive oil into the middle of the well.
', 'Step 6: Beat the eggs and olive oil and gradually begin incorporating the flour a little at a time using a fork, lifting flour up from the sides until most of the flour is incorporated into the eggs.
', 'Step 7: Shape into a ball.
', 'Step 8: Knead dough until it is elastic, 5 to 10 minutes, adding additional flour if it is too sticky.
', 'Step 9: Roll dough out into a large rectangle about 1/16 inch thick.
', 'Step 10: Cut into 8 6x6-inch squares.
', 'Step 11: Mix ricotta cheese and Parmesan cheeses together in a small mixing bowl.
', 'Step 12: Transfer to a piping bag or plastic bag (cut a small piece off a corner of the bag).
', 'Step 13: Pipe a small circle of cheese mixture large enough to hold an egg yolk in the middle of 4 of the dough squares.
', 'Step 14: Place an egg yolk in the center of each circle.
', 'Step 15: Mix 1 egg white and 2 teaspoons water together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 16: Brush egg wash on edges of the pasta squares outside the egg yolk circle.
', 'Step 17: Carefully place remaining 4 pasta squares on the egg yolks.
', 'Step 18: Gently seal edges and try to eliminate any air pockets.
', 'Step 19: Use a 6-inch round cookie cutter to remove the corners of the squares.
', 'Step 20: Press edges of ravioli with tines of a fork to strengthen the seal.
', 'Step 21: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil; reduce heat to medium-high so water is just simmering.
', 'Step 22: Carefully transfer ravioli to water; gently stir.
', 'Step 23: Cook until pasta is tender, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Remove with a slotted spoon and place on 4 warm serving plates.
', 'Step 25: Serve topped with a spoonful of pesto.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '694.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '97.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '397.1 mg', 'fatContent': '21.8 g', 'fiberContent': '7.3 g', 'proteinContent': '27.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '357.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.8 g'}

Title: Spinach Arancini
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '¾ cup uncooked Arborio rice', '½ cup dry white wine', '2 cups Progresso® reduced sodium chicken broth, heated', 'Freshly ground pepper to taste', '1 cup chopped fresh spinach leaves', '1 tablespoon butter', '½ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '24 (1/2 inch) cubes mozzarella cheese', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '1 ½ cups Progresso® Italian style panko crispy bread crumbs', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water', 'Vegetable oil for frying']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line cookie sheet with cooking parchment paper.
', 'Step 2: In 3-quart saucepan, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Add onion; cook about 1 minute, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 4: Add garlic; cook and stir 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 6: Stir in rice and wine; cook 5 to 10 minutes, stirring frequently, until liquid is absorbed.
', 'Step 7: Add 1 cup broth; cook about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until broth is absorbed.
', 'Step 8: Add remaining 1 cup broth; cook about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until broth is absorbed.
', 'Step 9: Season with pepper.
', 'Step 10: Stir in spinach, butter and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
', 'Step 11: Spread onto cookie sheet.
', 'Step 12: Cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate at least 1 hour 30 minutes or until firm.
', 'Step 13: (Mixture can be refrigerated overnight.
', 'Step 14: ) On cookie sheet, shape rice mixture into 12x8-inch rectangle.
', 'Step 15: Cut into 6 rows by 4 rows to make 24 squares.
', 'Step 16: Place 1 mozzarella cheese cube in center of each square; shape rice around cheese cubes to make balls.
', 'Step 17: Place flour and bread crumbs in separate bowls.
', 'Step 18: In another bowl, beat egg and water until blended.
', 'Step 19: Coat each ball with flour, then dip into egg mixture and coat with bread crumbs.
', 'Step 20: Place coated balls on unlined cookie sheet; refrigerate 30 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Line platter or shallow pan with paper towels.
', 'Step 22: In 4-quart Dutch oven, heat about 2 inches vegetable oil to 350 degrees F. Fry 8 balls at a time 3 to 4 minutes, turning once, until golden brown.
', 'Step 23: With slotted spoon, remove balls from Dutch oven to towel-lined platter to drain.
', 'Step 24: Serve hot.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '161.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '16.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '13.5 mg', 'fatContent': '7.9 g', 'fiberContent': '0.2 g', 'proteinContent': '4.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '311.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.3 g'}

Title: New Year's "Good Luck" Pasta Fazool
Ingredients: ['12 ounces bacon, sliced into 1-inch pieces', '½ cup diced onion', '½ cup diced celery', '1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon dried thyme', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '4 cloves garlic, finely minced', '4 cups chicken broth', '1 cup water', '1 large bunch Swiss chard', '1 (15.5 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained', '1 ¼ cups orecchiette pasta', '1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano, or to taste', '1 drizzle olive oil', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place a cold soup pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add sliced bacon.
', 'Step 3: Cook, stirring occasionally, until most of the fat has rendered out and the bacon begins to crisp up, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain off most of the excess fat with a paper towel if desired, leaving about 1 tablespoon in the pot.
', 'Step 5: Add onions, celery, and salt.
', 'Step 6: Saute until and softened onions turn translucent, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in black pepper, cayenne, dried thyme, dried oregano, and tomato paste.
', 'Step 8: Cook, stirring occasionally, until the tomato paste starts to caramelize onto the bottom of the pan, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add the minced garlic, and cook, stirring, for 1 to 2 more minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir in chicken broth and water and raise the heat to high.
', 'Step 11: Bring to a simmer over high heat; reduce heat to medium and let simmer while you prep the Swiss chard.
', 'Step 12: Remove chard leaves from tough stems.
', 'Step 13: Gather a handful of leaves and slice across in one direction; turn and slice across again.
', 'Step 14: Repeat with remaining chard.
', 'Step 15: Place into a bowl and fill with water.
', 'Step 16: Swish around to remove dirt; transfer washed greens a handful at a time to another bowl to drain.
', 'Step 17: Stir the Swiss chard into the pot and simmer over medium heat until greens become tender, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Season with salt.
', 'Step 19: Stir in the drained beans and raise the heat to high; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 20: Stir in pasta and reduce heat to medium-high.
', 'Step 21: Cook until the pasta is tender, stirring occasionally, 12 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 22: Once the pasta is tender, check the seasoning.
', 'Step 23: Serve immediately in large bowls.
', 'Step 24: Garnish with Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, a drizzle of olive oil, and red pepper flakes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '293.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '34.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '25.3 mg', 'fatContent': '10 g', 'fiberContent': '5.6 g', 'proteinContent': '16.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '1761.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.3 g'}

Title: Roasted Eggplant Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 large eggplant, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed', '1 (16 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '2 cups shredded Italian cheese blend', '1 egg', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 sprigs fresh oregano, chopped', '3 sprigs fresh thyme, chopped', '10 grinds fresh black pepper', '2 ½ cups tomato sauce', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '6 slices part-skim mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place eggplant slices on a wire rack; sprinkle with salt.
', 'Step 3: Let sit until some liquid starts beading on slices, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Rinse salt off eggplant slices and pat dry.
', 'Step 5: Brush olive oil over both sides of each slice.
', 'Step 6: Arrange eggplant slices on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 7: Roast in the preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Flip eggplant slices and continue roasting until slices are tender and lightly browned, 15 to 20 more minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove eggplant from oven and reduce temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Mix ricotta cheese, Italian cheese blend, egg, garlic, oregano, thyme, and black pepper together in a bowl.
', 'Step 11: Line a 9-inch square pan with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 12: Coat the bottom of the pan with about 1/2 cup tomato sauce; top with 1/2 of the eggplant slices.
', 'Step 13: Layer eggplant slices with 1/2 of the spinach, 1/2 of the ricotta mixture, and 1/2 of the remaining tomato sauce.
', 'Step 14: Continue layering with remaining ingredients, ending with sauce.
', 'Step 15: Top with mozzarella slices.
', 'Step 16: Cover pan with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 17: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Remove aluminum foil and continue baking until cheese is brown and bubbling, 5 to 10 more minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '432.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '21.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '102 mg', 'fatContent': '26.9 g', 'fiberContent': '7.1 g', 'proteinContent': '29.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '14.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '1178.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.6 g'}

Title: Prego® Chicken Italiano with Pepperidge Farm® Garlic Bread
Ingredients: ['3 pounds bone-in chicken parts', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '¾ cup olive oil', '1 small onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '3 cups Prego® Italian Sausage & Garlic Italian Sauce', '1 (10 ounce) package Pepperidge Farm® Garlic Bread']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F for bread.
', 'Step 2: Season chicken with black pepper.
', 'Step 3: Coat chicken with flour.
', 'Step 4: Heat oil in 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Cook chicken in batches until well browned on all sides.
', 'Step 6: Remove chicken from skillet.
', 'Step 7: Pour off all but 2 tablespoons oil from skillet.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 9: Add onion and garlic and cook until onion is tender.
', 'Step 10: Stir sauce in skillet.
', 'Step 11: Return chicken to skillet.
', 'Step 12: Cover and cook 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
', 'Step 13: Meanwhile, bake bread according to package directions.
', 'Step 14: Cut bread into 2-inch diagonal slices and serve with chicken.
']

Title: Italian Flag Verrines
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', '2 large zucchini, grated', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (8 ounce) jar pesto', '1 (8 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ cup heavy whipping cream', '6 large red bell peppers, chopped', '1 (12 ounce) can diced tomatoes, drained', '⅛ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ cup fresh basil leaves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Saute zucchini, onion, and garlic until some of the liquid has evaporated and zucchini is softened, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat and stir in pesto.
', 'Step 4: Spoon mixture into 8 small, clear glasses and chill in the refrigerator.
', 'Step 5: While green layer is chilling, mix ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, sugar, garlic powder, nutmeg, and salt together in a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Whip heavy cream into stiff peaks and fold into ricotta mixture.
', 'Step 7: Layer over chilled zucchini mixture and return to the refrigerator.
', 'Step 8: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer.
', 'Step 9: Bring water to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Add bell peppers, cover, and steam until tender, 4 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Puree peppers with tomatoes and cayenne in a food processor until smooth and spread over chilled ricotta layer.
', 'Step 12: Chill for 1 hour.
', 'Step 13: Garnish with fresh basil and serve.
']

Title: Sicilian Lentil Pasta Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 cup chopped onion', '2 cups fresh sliced mushrooms', '1 small zucchini, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup dry lentils', '3 cups water', '2 (8 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 ½ teaspoons white sugar', '½ cup water']

', 'Step 2: Add onions, mushrooms, zucchini, and garlic.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir until tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: n Add lentils and 3 cups water to vegetables.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a rolling boil, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook 45 to 60 minutes.
', 'Step 7: n Stir in tomato sauce, tomato paste, sugar, and 1/2 cup water.
', 'Step 8: Bring to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 10: If necessary, add more water to keep the sauce from sticking.
', 'Step 11: Be careful not to dilute; the sauce should be quite thick.
']

Title: Sweet Pepper Pasta Toss with Kale
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package uncooked farfalle (bow tie) pasta', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 medium red bell pepper, chopped', '1 medium yellow bell pepper, chopped', '1 cup roughly chopped kale', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 pinch dried basil', '1 pinch ground cayenne pepper', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '8 ounces feta cheese, crumbled']

', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.

', 'Step 4: Stir in red pepper, yellow pepper, kale and garlic.
', 'Step 5: Season with basil, cayenne pepper, salt and black pepper.

Title: Unique Spinach Noodles
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups torn spinach leaves', '2 tablespoons water', '1 egg', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 ¼ cups all-purpose flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine spinach and water in a saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Cover, and cook till spinach is very tender.
', 'Step 3: Cool slightly.
', 'Step 4: Place spinach and liquid in blender container.
', 'Step 5: Add egg and salt.
', 'Step 6: Cover, and blend till smooth.
', 'Step 7: Transfer to a bowl.

', 'Step 9: Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface.

', 'Step 11: Roll very thin on a floured surface.
', 'Step 12: Let rest 20 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Roll up loosely.
', 'Step 14: Slice 1/4 inch wide.
', 'Step 15: Unroll.
', 'Step 16: Cut into desired lengths.
', 'Step 17: Spread out on a rack to dry for 2 hours.
']

Title: Vegetarian Italian Baked Ziti
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 large portobello mushroom caps, chopped', '1 medium white onion, chopped', '1 medium bell pepper, chopped', '2 stalks celery, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (28 ounce) jar meatless spaghetti sauce', '2 large tomatoes, chopped', '1 tablespoon minced fresh Italian parsley', '1 ½ teaspoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '½ (16 ounce) package ziti pasta', '2 cups cottage cheese', '1 cup shredded fresh mozzarella cheese', '¾ cup non-dairy Parmesan cheese substitute', '1 large egg, slightly beaten', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add mushrooms, onion, bell pepper, celery, and garlic; saute until tender, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in spaghetti sauce, tomatoes, parsley, 1 teaspoon oregano, and basil.
', 'Step 4: Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 2 hours.
', 'Step 5: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Oil a 9x13-inch baking pan.
', 'Step 7: Just before the sauce is finished, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Add ziti and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain.
', 'Step 10: Combine cottage cheese, mozzarella cheese, 1/2 of the Parmesan substitute, egg, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
', 'Step 11: Mix remaining Parmesan substitute and 1/2 teaspoon oregano in another small bowl.
', 'Step 12: Spread 1 cup sauce in the bottom of the prepared pan.
', 'Step 13: Layer 1/3 cup ziti, 1 cup sauce, and 1/3 cottage cheese mixture; repeat layers twice more.
', 'Step 14: Top with any remaining sauce, then sprinkle with oregano-Parmesan blend.
', 'Step 15: Cover with foil and bake in the preheated oven until bubbly, about 1 hour.
']

Title: Homemade Spaghetti and Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 (29 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', '19 fluid ounces tomato juice', '1 (5.5 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon dried thyme', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '1 ½ pounds lean ground beef', '16 soda crackers, crushed', '2 eggs, beaten', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 large clove garlic, crushed', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '⅛ teaspoon dried thyme', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine tomatoes, tomato juice, tomato paste, onion, parsley, salt, red pepper flakes, black pepper, thyme, and cloves in a large pot.
', 'Step 3: Bring to a boil over high heat; reduce heat to low and let simmer for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, combine beef, crackers, eggs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, parsley, and thyme in a bowl.
', 'Step 5: Form into large meatballs and place into a broiler pan.
', 'Step 6: Bake in the preheated oven until browned and no longer pink in the centers, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Transfer meatballs to sauce and continue to simmer, 2 to 2 1/2 hours more.
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain.
', 'Step 11: Serve sauce and meatballs over cooked spaghetti.
']

Title: Sea Salt and Rosemary Pizza Bianca Bites with Mortadella and Mozzarella
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast', '¼ cup warm water', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '3 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt (such as Diamond Crystal®)', '11 fluid ounces warm water', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons sea salt (such as Diamond Crystal®) Coarse Sea Salt)', '42 slices thinly sliced mortadella', '42 leaves fresh basil', '21 fresh mozzarella balls (ciliegine), cut in half', 'appetizer picks']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dissolve yeast in 1/4 cup warm water in a bowl; add sugar, stir, and let sit until foamy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Mix 3 1/2 cups flour with rosemary and kosher salt in the bowl of a stand mixer.
', 'Step 3: Pour the yeast mixture into flour mixture; slowly add 11 ounces warm water and mix until dough holds together and pulls away from the sides of the bowl.
', 'Step 4: Grease a large glass bowl with 1 tablespoon olive oil.
', 'Step 5: Place dough in the bowl, turning once to coat with oil.
', 'Step 6: Cover bowl with plastic wrap and place into a cool oven with the oven light on until dough has doubled in size, about 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 7: Line a rimless baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle 2 tablespoons flour over parchment paper.
', 'Step 9: Turn risen dough onto the parchment paper and flatten it gently with your hands, forming a 9x13-inch rectangle.
', 'Step 10: Place baking sheet into the oven, with the oven light on, until dough has risen, another 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 11: Drizzle the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil over dough and top with coarse sea salt.
', 'Step 12: Position your oven rack slightly lower than center, and place a baking stone on the rack.
', 'Step 13: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Gently slide the parchment off of the sheet pan and onto the baking stone.
', 'Step 15: Bake dough in the preheated oven for 8 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Gently lift the crust using a pizza peel or large spatula and pull the parchment paper out so that the crust is directly on the baking stone.
', 'Step 17: Continue to bake until crust is golden brown, 15 to 16 minutes more.
', 'Step 18: Transfer crust to a cooling rack to cool completely, at least 30 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Slice the crust into small squares.
', 'Step 20: Cut each square in half horizontally so that you have a top and a bottom.
', 'Step 21: Fold a mortadella slice in half and then in half again; place on top of the pizza bottom.
', 'Step 22: Layer a basil leaf on top of mortadella and top with a mozzarella slice.
', 'Step 23: Add the pizza top and secure with an appetizer pick.
', 'Step 24: Repeat with remaining ingredients.
']

Title: Chicken Stew and Mexican Cheese Alfredo
Ingredients: ['2 cups water', 'salt to taste', '2 ounces spaghetti', '4 teaspoons butter', '2 teaspoons all-purpose flour', '½ cup prepared chicken stew', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', '2 teaspoons minced onion', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1 tablespoon shredded Mexican blend cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring water and salt to a boil in a saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Cook spaghetti at a boil until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 3: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Stir flour into the melted butter; add chicken stew, garlic, onion, and oregano.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir the chicken stew mixture until thickened, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Melt 2 1/2 teaspoons cheese into the chicken mixture.
', 'Step 7: Add spaghetti and toss to combine.
', 'Step 8: Top with remaining cheese to serve.
']

Title: Red Plum, White Nectarine and Blue Cheese Pizza
Ingredients: ['1 pound pizza dough', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 large white California nectarine or peach, pitted', '1 large red California plum, pitted', '3 tablespoons white balsamic vinegar', '3 tablespoons honey', '¾ cup crumbled blue cheese', '¼ cup chopped toasted walnuts', '1 tablespoon Snipped fresh chives']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Divide pizza dough into 4 equal pieces.
', 'Step 2: Roll each out on a lightly floured board to make 6-inch circles.
', 'Step 3: Place dough circles on a baking sheet and brush both sides with oil.
', 'Step 4: Transfer dough circles to grill and cook over medium heat for a few minutes on each side until dough is cooked through and lightly marked by the grill.
', 'Step 5: Remove and let cool.
', 'Step 6: Cut each piece of fruit into 8 slices.
', 'Step 7: Cook on a well-oiled grill for a few minutes on each side to lightly char.
', 'Step 8: Remove from grill and arrange fruit on pizza crusts.
', 'Step 9: Stir together balsamic vinegar and honey and drizzle over fruit.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle with blue cheese and walnuts; place pizzas back on grill, cover with lid and cook for a few minutes more to melt cheese.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle with chives.
']

Title: Veggie Pasta Minus the Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups grape tomatoes, halved', '1 large spaghetti squash, halved and seeded', '⅓ cup water', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 red onion, chopped', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '1 baby eggplant, halved lengthwise and sliced crosswise', '1 carrots, sliced thin', '⅓ cup white wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Arrange the tomatoes on a baking sheet with the cut sides facing up.
', 'Step 3: Roast the tomatoes in the preheated oven until cooked through and slightly browned on the underside, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Place squash halves face down in glass baking dish with the water; cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 5: Microwave on High for 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Leave covered and set aside.
', 'Step 7: Once the squash is cool enough to handle, scrape in strands into a large bowl with a fork; season with salt and pepper and toss with 1 tablespoon olive oil.
', 'Step 8: Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat; cook and stir the garlic, basil, and Italian seasoning in the oil until the garlic is softened, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add the onion, green bell pepper, eggplant, and carrot to the garlic; increase heat to medium.
', 'Step 10: Continue cooking and stirring until the vegetables are nearly tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Mix the tomatoes and white wine into the vegetable mixture; cook another 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Transfer the vegetables to the bowl with the spaghetti squash; gently toss together.
']

Title: Tuscan Flank Steak
Ingredients: ['½ cup chopped fresh rosemary', '6 cloves garlic', '⅓ cup olive oil', '¼ cup lemon juice', '1 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 (1 1/2-pound) flank steak, trimmed of excess fat', '⅓ cup extra virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 teaspoons lemon zest', '1 teaspoon minced fresh rosemary', '⅛ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 pinch salt', '1 sprig fresh rosemary']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine 1/2 cup chopped fresh rosemary, garlic, 1/3 cup olive oil, 1/4 cup lemon juice, black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes, and 1/2 teaspoon salt in a blender or food processor.
', 'Step 2: Blend until smooth and set marinade aside.
', 'Step 3: Pierce the steak with a fork 20 to 30 times.
', 'Step 4: Place in a shallow baking dish.
', 'Step 5: Pour marinade over steak and flip to coat both sides.
', 'Step 6: Cover and refrigerate for 4 to 8 hours.
', 'Step 7: Combine 1/3 cup olive oil, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, lemon zest, 1 teaspoon minced rosemary, 1/8 teaspoon red pepper flakes, and a pinch of salt in a jar.
', 'Step 8: Cover and shake the dressing to combine.
', 'Step 9: Shake again before using.
', 'Step 10: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 11: Remove steak from marinade; scrape off any chunks of marinade.
', 'Step 12: Discard used marinade.
', 'Step 13: Season steak with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 14: Place steak on the preheated grill and cook until browned on the outside and red on the inside, about 6 to 8 minutes per side.
', 'Step 15: Place 2 tablespoons of the olive oil-lemon juice dressing in a small bowl.
', 'Step 16: Use rosemary sprig to baste the steak while it cooks.
', 'Step 17: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of a steak should read 125 degrees F (52 degrees C) for rare.
', 'Step 18: Remove steak to a platter and allow to rest about 6 minutes before slicing.
', 'Step 19: Cut in half lengthwise, then into 1/4-inch-thick slices at an angle against the grain.
', 'Step 20: Drizzle with additional dressing.
']

Title: Lemon Polenta Cake
Ingredients: ['2 ⅔ cups turbinado sugar', '1 pound butter, room temperature', '6 eggs, room temperature', '5 cups almond meal', '1 ⅓ cups fine cornmeal', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '6 lemons, juiced and zested', '¾ cup superfine sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line the bottom of a 10-inch cake pan with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Beat the sugar and butter with an electric mixer until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 4: The mixture should be noticeably lighter in color.
', 'Step 5: Add the room-temperature eggs one at a time, allowing each egg to blend into the butter mixture before adding the next.
', 'Step 6: In a separate bowl, combine the almond meal, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, and lemon zest.
', 'Step 7: Gently fold it into the butter mixture, stirring just until combined.
', 'Step 8: Pour the batter into the prepared pan and bake in the preheated oven until the cake is golden and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 90 to 120 minutes.
', 'Step 9: While the cake is baking, combine the lemon juice and superfine sugar in a saucepan.
', 'Step 10: Bring to a boil over medium-high heat and boil until the sugar has dissolved and the liquid is reduced by half.
', 'Step 11: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 12: Remove the cake from the oven and use a skewer or toothpick to prick holes in the cake.
', 'Step 13: Pour the lemon syrup over the surface.
', 'Step 14: Allow the cake to cool in the pan completely before serving.
']

Title: Blue Caramelized Stromboli
Ingredients: ['¾ cup vegetable oil', '4 yellow onions, cut into matchstick-size pieces', '1 ½ cups minced garlic', '1 cup butter', '2 ½ cups warm water', '½ cup olive oil', '6 ½ cups bread flour', '½ cup white sugar', '1 ½ tablespoons active dry yeast', '1 tablespoon coarse kosher salt', '¾ cup minced fresh parsley', '1 ½ tablespoons minced fresh rosemary', '½ teaspoon dried marjoram', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or as needed', '1 ½ cups crumbled blue cheese', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed', '2 tablespoons water, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 3/4 cup vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onions until golden brown and very tender, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add garlic and butter; cook and stir until butter is melted and garlic is fragrant, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove skillet from heat and cool onion mixture to room temperature.
', 'Step 4: Combine warm water and olive oil in the bowl of a stand mixer.
', 'Step 5: Combine bread flour, white sugar, yeast, and kosher salt in a bowl; sift into the bowl with oil and water.
', 'Step 6: Attach dough hook to mixer; add parsley, rosemary, and marjoram and mix on medium speed until dough holds together and is no longer sticky, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Turn dough onto a floured work surface and knead, adding flour if needed, until dough becomes somewhat firm.
', 'Step 8: Divide dough into six 10-ounce portions.
', 'Step 9: Roll each portion of dough into a 12-inch rectangle, dusting with flour if sticky.
', 'Step 10: Fill each rectangle with equal quantities onion mixture and 1/4 cup blue cheese.
', 'Step 11: Roll each rectangle into an oval baguette-shape stromboli, pinching the edges to close.
', 'Step 12: Grease 2 baking sheets with 1 tablespoon vegetable oil.
', 'Step 13: Generously brush the bottoms of each stromboli with water and transfer to the prepared baking sheets; cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 14: Allow stromboli to rise for 2 hours.
', 'Step 15: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, rotating the stromboli as needed for even browning, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '366.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '14.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '40 mg', 'fatContent': '33.2 g', 'fiberContent': '1.1 g', 'proteinContent': '4.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '12.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '625.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.6 g'}

Title: Garlic Scape Pesto on Spinach Linguine
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package spinach linguine', '½ pint grape tomatoes, cut into thirds', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup garlic scapes, chopped', '⅓ cup olive oil', '¼ cup fresh basil leaves', '4 sun-dried tomatoes', '½ lemon, juiced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', 'cooking spray', '1 (10 ounce) bag baby spinach leaves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 3: While pasta boils, process grape tomatoes, Parmesan cheese, garlic scapes, olive oil, basil leaves, sun-dried tomatoes, and lemon juice in a food processor until smooth; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Prepare a large skillet with cooking spray and place over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Cook spinach leaves in hot skillet until slightly wilted, about 3 minutes; add drained linguine and pesto sauce.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir to coat linguine is sauce and until everything is hot, 2 to 3 minutes.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Vitello Tonnato (Poached Veal with Tonnato Sauce)
Ingredients: ['1 cup water', '½ cup vegetable broth', '½ cup white wine', '1 clove garlic', '1 teaspoon whole black peppercorns', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', '1 teaspoon coriander seeds', '5 whole cloves', '2 large bay leaves', '1 pound "magatello" cut of veal', '1 yellow onion, halved', '2 large unpeeled potatoes, washed and halved', '2 large hard-boiled eggs, diced', '1 (3 ounce) can tuna in spring water, drained', '2 pieces anchovy fillets', '4 teaspoons capers, drained', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, or more to taste', 'salt and ground pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine water, vegetable broth, wine, garlic, peppercorns, fennel seeds, coriander seeds, cloves, and bay leaves in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®).
', 'Step 2: Add a steamer basket.
', "Step 3: It's okay if the liquid is higher than the bottom of the basket.
", 'Step 4: Leave veal whole, but trim off any excess fat or skin.
', 'Step 5: Place it into the basket.
', 'Step 6: Add onion and place potatoes on top.
', "Step 7: Make sure the potatoes aren't touching the liquid.
", 'Step 8: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 9: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 12 minutes.
", 'Step 10: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, prepare the sauce.
', 'Step 12: Combine eggs, drained tuna, anchovies, 3 teaspoons capers, and olive oil in a bowl.
', 'Step 13: Mash into a coarse paste with a fork.
', 'Step 14: Season with salt and pepper and set aside.
', "Step 15: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 16: Release any remaining pressure carefully using the quick-release method, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 18: Carefully remove the potatoes and onion; set aside.
', 'Step 19: Remove the veal and allow to cool.
', 'Step 20: Wrap the veal in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 2 hours.
', 'Step 21: Strain and reserve the broth.
', 'Step 22: Add some of the cooled broth to the sauce.
', 'Step 23: Use an immersion blender to blend the sauce until smooth and creamy, adding broth little by little as needed.
', 'Step 24: Refrigerate, reserving the broth in case you need it to thin the sauce before serving.
', 'Step 25: Slice the veal as thinly as possible with a carving knife.
', 'Step 26: Arrange the slices on a plate.
', 'Step 27: Slice the potatoes and onions and arrange them on the plate.
', 'Step 28: Top with tonnato sauce and garnish with remaining capers.
', 'Step 29: Serve cold or at room temperature.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '406 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '38.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '191.5 mg', 'fatContent': '12.1 g', 'fiberContent': '5.7 g', 'proteinContent': '29.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '399.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.6 g'}

Title: Gnocchi with Kabocha, Walnuts, and Scamorza
Ingredients: ['1 ¾ pounds kabocha squash', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 large shallot, minced', '¼ cup chopped raw walnuts', '½ cup Scamorza cheese', '1 pound potato gnocchi', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '5 tablespoons grated Grana Padano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut kabocha squash in half.
', 'Step 2: Scoop out the seeds and any stringy flesh.
', 'Step 3: Remove the stem and peel the outer skin.
', 'Step 4: Dice the flesh.
', 'Step 5: Heat olive oil in a heavy-bottomed pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add minced shallot and diced squash.
', 'Step 7: Cook over medium heat until completely softened, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add walnuts.
', 'Step 9: Cook and mash until smooth.
', 'Step 10: Add scamorza cheese and cook until cheese is melted and the sauce is creamy, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Cook gnocchi in the boiling water until they float to the top, 2 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Use a slotted spoon to scoop the gnocchi out of the water and into the sauce.
', 'Step 14: Use a bit of cooking water to thin out the sauce, if necessary.
', 'Step 15: Toss to coat the gnocchi.
', 'Step 16: Do not stir; this could break or deform the gnocchi.
', 'Step 17: Divide the gnocchi among 5 plates.
', 'Step 18: Top each plate with a pinch of nutmeg and 1 tablespoon Grana Padano cheese.
']

Title: Crescent Italiano Bake
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '1 cup chopped mushrooms', '½ onion, chopped', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package refrigerated crescent rolls', '¼ teaspoon chopped fresh basil', '¼ teaspoon chopped fresh oregano', '½ cup sour cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir ground beef, mushrooms, and onion in the hot skillet until beef is browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 5: Mix in tomato sauce, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Spread into an ungreased 8x12-inch baking dish and sprinkle with Cheddar cheese.
', 'Step 7: Separate crescent dough into 8 triangles.
', 'Step 8: Mix basil and oregano into sour cream.
', 'Step 9: Spread 1 teaspoon of the sour cream mixture onto each triangle.
', 'Step 10: Roll up into a crescent roll, starting at the wide end.
', 'Step 11: Arrange rolls on top of meat mixture in the dish.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until rolls are golden brown, 25 to 30 minutes.
']

Title: Cantaloupe Italian Ice
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups superfine sugar', '½ cup water', '¼ cup lightly packed fresh mint leaves', '2 cantaloupes (about 4 lbs each) - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1-inch wedges', 'mint leaves for garnish']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place a 7x12-inch glass dish in the freezer to chill.
', 'Step 2: Combine sugar and water in a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 3: Cook until sugar has completely dissolved.
', 'Step 4: Add mint, remove from heat, and set aside to cool.
', 'Step 5: Place melon in a food processor and process until pureed; pour into a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Strain mint leaves from cooled syrup and add syrup to the melon.
', 'Step 7: Stir until well combined.
', 'Step 8: Pour cantaloupe mixture into the chilled dish and freeze uncovered for 3 to 4 hours, stirring with a fork every 30 minutes.
', "Step 9: Continue until mixture is almost frozen and a bit grainy; don't let it freeze completely, otherwise you won't be able to serve it.
", 'Step 10: Place in a decorative bowl and garnish with mint leaves.
']

Title: White Chocolate Biscotti
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups sugar', '½ cup butter, plus more for greasing', '2 eggs', '2 ¾ cups all-purpose flour, plus more for dusting', '¾ cup chopped toasted almonds', '¾ cup chopped dried apricots', '¼ cup orange juice', '3 (1 ounce) squares white chocolate, melted and cooled', '3 (1 ounce) squares white chocolate, chopped', '2 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon almond extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour 2 cookie sheets.
', 'Step 3: Combine sugar, butter, and eggs in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 4: Add flour, almonds, apricots, orange juice, melted white chocolate, chopped white chocolate, baking powder, salt, and almond extract.
', 'Step 5: Mix until well blended; dough will be sticky and very soft.
', 'Step 6: Divide dough in 1/2 and carefully form into 2 long logs, each about 2-inches wide.
', 'Step 7: Place each log on a prepared cookie sheet.
', "Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 25 to 30 minutes, keeping a close eye that they don't get too brown.
", 'Step 9: Cool on the cookie sheets for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Cut logs into 1/2-inch wide strips.
', 'Step 11: Place cookies back on cookie sheets.
', 'Step 12: Return to the oven and bake for 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 13: Cool completely before serving.

', 'Step 2: Set aside until foamy, about 5 minutes.

Title: Strawberry Caprese Panzanella
Ingredients: ['2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons minced shallot', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '½ teaspoon honey', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil', '1 day-old baguette, cut into 1-inch cubes (about 4 cups cubed bread)', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 ½ cups yellow grape tomatoes, halved', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '6 ounces Stella® Fresh Mozzarella Cheese, cut into 1-inch pieces', '1 ½ cups strawberries, halved', '½ cup basil leaves, torn if large']

', 'Step 2: While whisking, slowly drizzle in oil until all oil is incorporated.
', 'Step 3: For the panzanella, preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Place bread cubes on rimmed baking pan and drizzle with oil; toss until all bread cubes are coated in oil.
', 'Step 4: Transfer to oven and bake 10 to 12 minutes or until bread is dry and dark golden brown.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, place tomatoes, salt, and pepper in large bowl; toss until well combined.
', 'Step 6: Let stand 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add Stella® mozzarella cheese, strawberries, basil, toasted bread, and Dressing to bowl with tomatoes; toss until well combined.
', 'Step 8: Serve immediately, or for best flavor, allow salad to sit at room temperature 30 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Panettone Muffins with Chocolate
Ingredients: ['½ cup heavy whipping cream, divided', '1 (2 ounce) bar dark chocolate, chopped into small pieces', '1 (12 ounce) panettone, cubed', '3 eggs', '⅓ cup milk', '¼ cup white sugar']

['Step 1: Heat 1/4 cup heavy cream in a saucepan over medium heat until almost boiling.
', 'Step 2: Remove from heat and stir in chopped chocolate until chocolate is melted and ganache is smooth.
', 'Step 3: Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Combine remaining 1/4 cup cream, cubed panettone, eggs, milk, and sugar in a bowl and mix until well combined.
', 'Step 6: Remove about 6 small tablespoons of panettone mixture and set aside.
', 'Step 7: Remove ganache from fridge and beat with an electric blender until creamy.
', 'Step 8: Grease a 6-cup muffin tin or line cups with paper liners.
', 'Step 9: Spoon panettone mixture into the prepared muffin cups, filling each 3/4 full.
', 'Step 10: Make an indention with your finger into each muffin and place 1 teaspoon of chocolate ganache inside.
', 'Step 11: Cover with the 6 tablespoons panettone that were set aside.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until golden, 15 to 20 minutes.
']
