Title: Black Pepper Rings
Ingredients: ['12 eggs', '½ cup butter, melted', '⅓ cup vegetable oil', '6 cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 tablespoons coarsely ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons baking powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of water to boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, beat eggs.
', 'Step 4: Stir in melted butter and oil.
', 'Step 5: In a separate bowl, mix together flour, salt, pepper and baking powder.
', 'Step 6: Make a well in the center of the flour mixture and pour in the egg mixture.
', 'Step 7: Mix until dough pulls together.
', 'Step 8: Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead briefly.
', 'Step 9: Divide dough into 12 equal pieces.
', 'Step 10: Roll each piece into an 8 inch long cylinder.
', 'Step 11: Bend each cylinder into a ring shape and pinch ends together.
', 'Step 12: With a sharp knife, score each ring around its outside edge.
', 'Step 13: Drop rings two at a time into boiling water and boil for 1 minute.
', 'Step 14: Remove rings from water and place on lightly greased cookie sheets.
', 'Step 15: Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes, until golden brown.
']

Title: Savory Panettone
Ingredients: ['2 eggs', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '½ cup lukewarm milk', '2 ½ tablespoons lukewarm milk, or more as needed', '½ ounce compressed fresh yeast', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '2 cups Italian-style tipo 00 flour', '2 cups strong bread flour', '¼ cup lukewarm water', '6 tablespoons butter, at room temperature', '1 (3 ounce) can tuna, drained', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '¼ cup sliced black olives', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 anchovy fillets', '1 tablespoon capers', '2 ounces cubed ham', '3 tablespoons cream cheese', '¾ cup cooked shrimp', '4 lettuce leaves', '4 slices mozzarella cheese', '3 slices prosciutto, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Beat eggs and salt lightly in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Stir 1/2 cup plus 2 1/2 tablespoons lukewarm milk, yeast, and sugar together in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Let stand until foamy, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Mix tipo 00 and bread flours together in a bowl.
', 'Step 5: Make a well in the center.
', 'Step 6: Add beaten eggs and yeast mixture.
', 'Step 7: Mix together with a fork.
', 'Step 8: Add water and mix again to form a sticky ball.
', 'Step 9: Knead butter into the dough a little bit at a time.
', 'Step 10: Transfer dough to a floured work surface and knead vigorously until smooth, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Place in a lightly floured bowl, cover with a clean, damp cloth and let rest in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 12: Turn dough out on a floured surface.
', 'Step 13: Stretch out one piece and fold it over the top.
', 'Step 14: Repeat with another section of dough, working your way around the circle.
', 'Step 15: Place dough in a paper panettone mold.
', 'Step 16: Cover with plastic wrap and let rise in a warm place until dough reaches the rim of the mold, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 17: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 18: Fill a baking dish with some water and place it on the bottom rack of the oven to keep the panettone moist as it bakes.
', 'Step 19: Brush the top of the panettone with some milk and place the mold on a flat baking sheet.
', 'Step 20: Bake in the preheated oven until a skewer inserted into the middle comes out clean, 40 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Allow to cool on a wire rack for a few minutes.
', 'Step 22: Pierce the side, near the bottom, with 2 long wooden skewers that will stick out the other side.
', 'Step 23: Flip the panettone gently and set the skewers on the rim of a tall pot.
', "Step 24: Cool panettone upside down so it doesn't collapse, at least 5 hours.
", 'Step 25: Mix tuna and mayonnaise together in a bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 26: Blend olives, olive oil, anchovy fillets, and capers in another bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 27: Mix cream cheese and ham together in a third bowl.
', 'Step 28: Remove skewers gently from the panettone and slice lengthwise to obtain 6 slices, including the top.
', 'Step 29: Lay the bottom slice on a serving plate; spread with tuna mixture.
', 'Step 30: Cover with shrimp and lettuce.
', 'Step 31: Press second slice on top; add third slice.
', 'Step 32: Spread olive mixture on top and cover with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 33: Press fourth slice on top; add fifth slice.
', 'Step 34: Spread cream cheese mixture on top and cover with prosciutto.
', 'Step 35: Cover with the top slice.
', 'Step 36: Wrap panettone in plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.
', 'Step 37: Slice into wedges from top to bottom.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '417.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '27.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '122.2 mg', 'fatContent': '25.7 g', 'fiberContent': '1.2 g', 'proteinContent': '18.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '986.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '2 g'}

Title: Keto Tuscan Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup French-fried onions, finely crushed', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ pound ground beef', '½ pound ground turkey', '3 tablespoons butter, divided', '1 (10 ounce) package fresh spinach', '½ cup heavy cream', '½ cup water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine Cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, onions, garlic, Italian seasoning, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper in a large mixing bowl and lightly mix.
', 'Step 2: Add beef and turkey; mix by hand until well combined.
', 'Step 3: Form mixture into 8 large meatballs.
', 'Step 4: Heat 1 to 2 tablespoons butter in a large saute pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Add meatballs to the melted butter and cook, uncovered, turning occasionally until a crust forms, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Cover and cook on low heat, turning occasionally, for 10 to 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 7: Transfer meatballs to a serving dish and cover.
', 'Step 8: Add remaining butter to the pan and melt over low heat.
', 'Step 9: Add spinach and stir until well wilted, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add cream and water; cook until reduced, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Add cooked meatballs and cook, 5 to 10 minutes, turning meatballs over every other minute.
']

Title: Easy Tuscan Chicken and Farro Skillet
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ½ pounds boneless, skinless chicken breasts', '1 ½ tablespoons Italian seasoning, divided', '1 ½ teaspoons garlic salt, divided', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 small onion, chopped', '8 ounces baby bella mushrooms, diced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '3 cups chicken broth', '1 ½ cups farro', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '½ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '2 tablespoons grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Season chicken breasts with 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning and 1/2 teaspoon garlic salt; place in the hot skillet.
', 'Step 4: Sear until golden but not cooked through, 1 to 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 5: Remove to a plate.
', 'Step 6: Add butter to the skillet.
', 'Step 7: Add onion to melted butter and cook, stirring occasionally, until onions have caramelized, 5 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add mushrooms and garlic and cook, stirring, until mushrooms have softened slightly, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Season with remaining 1 teaspoon garlic salt and 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning; stir until fragrant, another 30 seconds.
', 'Step 10: Add chicken broth and farro; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Reduce heat to medium-low, add chicken breasts back into the skillet, nestling them into the vegetables.
', 'Step 12: Cover skillet and simmer until farro has absorbed all the broth, 40 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle 1/2 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese over chicken and vegetables in the skillet.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese has melted and is golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Serve with remaining cheese, if desired.
']

Title: Farfalle with Marinated Grilled Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves', '¾ cup Wish-Bone® Italian Dressing', '1 (24 ounce) jar Bertolli® Tomato and Basil Sauce, heated', '1 (16 ounce) box farfalle or penne pasta, cooked and drained']

Title: Chicken Cacciatore II
Ingredients: ['2 (3 pound) whole chickens, each cut into 8 pieces', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 yellow onion, chopped', '1 large green bell pepper, seeded and chopped', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pound white button mushrooms, quartered', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh oregano', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes in juice, coarsely chopped', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '¾ cup white wine', '1 ½ cups chicken stock', '3 tablespoons capers, drained and rinsed', '2 tablespoons coarsely chopped fresh basil']

['Step 1: Season the chicken pieces with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 2: Place the flour in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 3: Press each chicken piece into the flour and tap off excess.
', 'Step 4: Heat the olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium heat until almost smoking hot.
', 'Step 5: Pan-fry the chicken until golden brown on both sides, about 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Work in batches so as to not overcrowd the pan.
', 'Step 7: Set the browned chicken aside.
', 'Step 8: Stir the onion, green bell pepper, and garlic into the Dutch oven; cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the mushroom; cook until they release their juice, 5 to 8 more minutes.
', 'Step 10: Mix in oregano, tomatoes, tomato paste, white wine, and chicken stock; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Return the chicken pieces to the sauce, cover the pan, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until the chicken is no longer pink inside and the juices run clear, 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Stir in capers and sprinkle with basil to serve.
']

Title: Grandma Anna's Italian Pepper Cookies

Title: Eggplant Parmigiana with Margherita® Pepperoni
Ingredients: ['2 (16 ounce) eggplants', '¼ cup Olive oil as needed', '4 large eggs eggs', '4 tablespoons water', '½ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano', '4 ½ cups seasoned bread crumbs, divided', '2 cups marinara sauce', '1 bunch fresh basil leaves, chiffonade', '1 pound fresh mozzarella, sliced 1/8-inch thick', '8 ounces deli-sliced Margherita® pepperoni, sliced thin']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Slice each eggplant lengthwise into slices about 1/4 to 1/2 inch thick.
', 'Step 2: In a large skillet, add olive oil (approximately 1/4 inch deep) and heat for frying.
', 'Step 3: In a bowl, mix eggs and water together.
', 'Step 4: On a large plate, mix grated Parmigiana-Reggiano cheese and 4 cups seasoned breadcrumbs together.
', 'Step 5: Dip eggplant into the egg mixture, then the breadcrumb mixture.
', 'Step 6: Place breaded eggplant slices into skillet and fry until golden brown, rotating once if necessary.
', 'Step 7: Remove from skillet.
', 'Step 8: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. In an 8 by 12-inch baking dish, place the 4 largest eggplant slices, evenly spaced apart from each other.
', 'Step 9: Over each slice, spread 1/4 cup of tomato sauce and sprinkle with a teaspoon of basil.
', 'Step 10: Place one slice of mozzarella and 3 slices pepperoni over each slice and sprinkle with 1 teaspoon grated Parmigiano.
', 'Step 11: Place the smaller slices of eggplant over each of the disks and repeat with tomato sauce, basil, pepperoni and the 2 cheeses.
', 'Step 12: Repeat the layering again until all the ingredients are used.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle the remaining 1/2 cup seasoned bread crumbs over the top of the eggplant dish, and bake uncovered until the cheese is melted and the tops turn light brown, about 20 minutes.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Tuscan Stew
Ingredients: ['⅔ cup dry navy beans', '⅔ ounce dry kidney beans', '⅔ ounce dry black beans', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 yellow onion, diced', '3 carrots, diced', '3 stalks celery, diced', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '1 (32 fluid ounce) container vegetable stock', '4 cups water', '1 (16 ounce) package kielbasa sausage, sliced', '2 tablespoons salt', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 bay leaf', '1 (16 ounce) package uncooked orzo pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine navy, kidney, and black beans in a multi-functional electric pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) with 6 cups water.
', 'Step 2: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 3: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 27 minutes.
", 'Step 4: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', 'Step 5: In the meantime, heat olive oil in a large stockpot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Saute onion, carrots, and celery until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add garlic and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 8: Add flour and stir until well coated.
', 'Step 9: Pour in stock and water.
', 'Step 10: Add kielbasa, salt, pepper, parsley, basil, thyme, and bay leaf.
', 'Step 11: Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
', "Step 12: Release pressure on the beans using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes.
", 'Step 13: Drain.
', 'Step 14: Bring stew back to a boil.
', 'Step 15: Add the beans and orzo.
', 'Step 16: Boil until orzo is soft and flavors come together, about 9 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Remove from heat and let cool slightly before serving.
']

Title: Versatile Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pound lean ground beef', '2 (29 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes', '½ pound pepperoni sausage, sliced', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '1 (4.5 ounce) can mushrooms, drained and chopped', '¼ teaspoon garlic salt', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon onion powder', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon Italian seasoning']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium skillet over medium heat, warm oil and saute onions and garlic until caramelized; set aside.
', 'Step 2: n In a large skillet over medium heat, cook ground beef until almost browned.
', 'Step 3: Add onions and garlic and cook for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: n In a large pot over medium heat, combine tomato sauce and stewed tomatoes; bring to a boil and then reduce heat.
', 'Step 5: Simmer sauce for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: n Stir pepperoni, ground beef mixture and green peppers into sauce; cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: n Stir in mushrooms, garlic salt, salt, ground black pepper, onion powder, oregano and Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 8: Simmer for 10 minutes and serve.
']

Title: Trofie al Pesto
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '¼ cup water, or more to taste', '2 large eggs', '1 splash olive oil', '2 pinches salt', '2 cloves garlic, roughly chopped', '2 ½ tablespoons pine nuts', '2 ½ cups lightly packed fresh basil', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pinch salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine flour, 1/4 cup water, eggs, olive oil, and salt for pasta in the bowl of a food processor; pulse a few times until just combined.
', 'Step 2: Pinch dough to see if it sticks together and forms a small clump.
', "Step 3: If it's dry or crumbly, add more water, 1 to 2 tablespoons at a time, just until the dough forms a ball.
", 'Step 4: Dump dough onto a floured surface.
', 'Step 5: Knead until dough is smooth and bounces back when you poke it.
', 'Step 6: Wrap in plastic and chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove dough from the refrigerator and pull off a small chunk, about 1/2 teaspoon or smaller.
', 'Step 8: Place dough at the bottom of a wooden cutting board and starting with the tips or your fingers, firmly roll up the board, like you are rolling the dough into a tube.
', 'Step 9: Once the dough is at the base of your palm, keep pressure on it and pull it back and down the board, diagonally at a 45-degree angle to create a spiral shape.
', 'Step 10: Repeat until all dough has been shaped.
', 'Step 11: Combine garlic and pine nuts in the bowl of a food processor; process until sandy in texture.
', 'Step 12: Add basil and oil and process until smooth.
', 'Step 13: Stir in grated Parmesan cheese until combined.
', 'Step 14: Taste and add salt if needed.
', 'Step 15: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 16: Add trofie and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Drain.
', 'Step 18: Toss cooked trofie with pesto and serve immediately.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '405.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '33.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '67.9 mg', 'fatContent': '25.4 g', 'fiberContent': '1.6 g', 'proteinContent': '10.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '204.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.5 g'}

Title: Italian-Inspired California Plum Flatbread
Ingredients: ['1 pound whole wheat pizza dough', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided', '2 cups shredded Italian blend cheese', '2 fruit (2-1/8" dia)s fresh California plums, pitted and very thinly sliced', '3 cups baby or chopped arugula', '½ cup slivered red onion', '2 tablespoons snipped fresh basil', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 pinch Freshly ground pepper and sea salt to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. Divide dough into 3 pieces; roll each into a very flat oval on a lightly floured board (about 7x11-inches).
', 'Step 2: Place dough on baking sheets and brush with 1 tablespoon oil.
', 'Step 3: Bake for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: (May be prepared ahead to this point.
', 'Step 5: ) Just before serving, top each flat bread with 2/3 cup cheese.
', 'Step 6: Bake at 425 degrees F for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: To prepare plum salad, toss remaining oil with remaining ingredients.
', 'Step 8: Place equal amounts on each warm cheese flat bread and cut into 3-inch slices to serve.
']

Title: Pasta con Seppioline e Zucchine alla Julienne (Zucchini and Calamari Pasta)
Ingredients: ['21 ounces fresh orecchiette pasta', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '½ shallot, thinly sliced', '12 ounces small squid, cleaned and cut into strips', '½ cup white wine', '6 tomatoes, quartered', '2 zucchini, cut into long, thin strips', 'salt', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', 'ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook orecchiette in the boiling water until tender yet firm to the bite, 3 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain, reserving 1 cup cooking water.
', 'Step 4: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Cook shallot in the hot oil until soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in squid; cook until coated with oil, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour in wine; simmer until reduced by half, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir tomatoes and zucchini into the saucepan; season with salt.
', 'Step 9: Cook until softened slightly, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir orecchiette into the saucepan.
', 'Step 11: Cook until coated with tomato and zucchini mixture, adding reserved cooking water a little at a time to make a moist sauce, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Garnish with parsley and black pepper.
']

Title: Garden Harvest Lasagna
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 medium (blank)s medium zucchini, sliced', '1 (10 ounce) package mushrooms, sliced', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '1 teaspoon dried basil leaves, crushed', '1 (26 ounce) jar RAGÚ® Old World Style® Traditional Sauce', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles, cooked and drained']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Heat olive oil in 12-inch skillet over medium heat and cook zucchini and mushrooms 3 minutes or until vegetables are tender; set aside.
', 'Step 2: Combine ricotta cheese, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, egg and basil in medium bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 3: Evenly spread 1/2 cup Pasta Sauce in 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 4: Arrange 4 lasagna noodles, lengthwise over sauce, overlapping edges slightly.
', 'Step 5: Spread 1/3 of the cheese mixture over noodles, then 3/4 cup sauce and 1/3 of the vegetable mixture; repeat layers, ending with noodles.
', 'Step 6: Top with remaining Sauce and sprinkle with remaining 1 cup mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 7: Loosely cover with aluminum foil and bake 45 minutes or until bubbling.
', 'Step 8: Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Minestrone-Stuffed Shells
Ingredients: ['24 jumbo pasta shells', '1 pound lean ground beef', '1 cup chopped green bell pepper', '½ cup chopped onion', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 (14.5 ounce) can dark red kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '1 cup mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup prepared basil pesto', '1 (28 ounce) jar pasta sauce, warmed', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook pasta shells in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir ground beef, bell pepper, onion, and salt in a skillet over medium heat until beef is browned and crumbly, 5 to 10 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 5: Mix kidney beans, mozzarella cheese, and pesto into ground beef mixture.
', 'Step 6: Spoon 1/4 cup ground beef mixture into each pasta shell.
', 'Step 7: Arrange stuffed shells in a serving dish and top with pasta sauce and Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Karen's Creamy Tomato Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package uncooked farfalle (bow tie) pasta', '½ pound sweet Italian sausage', '1 (6 ounce) jar roasted red peppers, drained and chopped', '½ pound sliced fresh mushrooms', '½ cup vodka', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '½ cup half-and-half', '⅛ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Place farfalle pasta in the pot, cook for 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente, and drain.
', 'Step 3: In a skillet over medium heat, cook the sausage until evenly brown.
', 'Step 4: Mix in the roasted red peppers, mushrooms, and vodka, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir 5 minutes, until most of the vodka has evaporated and mushrooms are tender.
', 'Step 6: Mix the tomatoes, half-and-half, and red pepper into the skillet.
', 'Step 7: Cover, reduce heat to low, and cook, stirring frequently, 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Serve over the cooked pasta, and top with Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Quick and Awesome Pasta alla Norma
Ingredients: ['2 large eggplants', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ cup olive oil', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 large bay leaf', '¼ teaspoon whole black peppercorns, or to taste', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 crushed dried red chile pepper', '10 medium tomatoes, chopped', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 (8 ounce) package crumbled feta cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil leaves, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut eggplants into french fry-sized strips and salt lightly.
', 'Step 2: Heat 1/2 cup olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Add eggplant strips and fry until lightly browned and fully cooked through, turning from time to time, 4 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Add spaghetti, bay leaf, and peppercorns to the boiling water and cook, stirring occasionally, until spaghetti is tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Heat extra-virgin olive oil in a skillet over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 8: Add garlic and chile pepper and fry lightly until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft but still holding shape, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Season to taste with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Drain pasta and immediately add to cooked tomatoes.
', 'Step 12: Add fried eggplant, feta, and basil.
', 'Step 13: Toss to combine and serve immediately.
']

Title: Pasta "Ro Malu Tempu"
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons raisins', '1 (12 ounce) package rigatoni pasta', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '4 anchovies anchovy fillets', '2 tablespoons minced onion', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 head broccoli, separated into florets', '4 threads saffron threads', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '¼ cup toasted bread crumbs', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 tablespoons toasted bread crumbs', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak raisins in warm water for 10 minutes; drain and set aside.
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook rigatoni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 4: At the same time, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a heavy-bottomed skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Lightly saute anchovies, onions, and garlic, until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Mash the anchovies a bit to help them dissolve to create a paste.
', 'Step 7: Add broccoli and begin to saute over medium heat, stirring often to avoid burning.
', 'Step 8: Cook evenly until softened, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Break up large florets as soon as they softens; ideally, you want bite-sized florets.
', 'Step 10: Add ladles of the pasta water to the skillet as needed to keep the broccoli from burning.
', 'Step 11: Add a ladle of pasta water to a small bowl, add the saffron threads, and allow to melt.
', 'Step 12: Add to the broccoli.
', 'Step 13: Mash some of the smaller florets to help create a creamy sauce.
', 'Step 14: Add the pine nuts, raisins, and cinnamon.
', 'Step 15: Stir often.
', 'Step 16: Drain cooked pasta, reserving the pasta water.
', 'Step 17: Stir pasta into the skillet.
', 'Step 18: Sprinkle in 1/4 cup bread crumbs and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 19: Toss to coat, adding a few tablespoons of pasta water if necessary.
', 'Step 20: Drizzle remaining oil and 2 tablespoons bread crumbs over the top and add black pepper.
', 'Step 21: Serve hot.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '516 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '80.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '3.4 mg', 'fatContent': '15.6 g', 'fiberContent': '6.2 g', 'proteinContent': '17.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '251.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.2 g'}

Title: Prego® Easy Party Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (4 pounds 3 ounces) jar Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce or Prego® Fresh Mushroom Italian Sauce', '12 each uncooked lasagna noodles', '1 (32 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

['Step 1: Spread about 2 cups sauce in a 13 1/2 x 9 1/2 x 3-inch disposable foil pan.
', 'Step 2: Top with 6 lasagna noodles, the ricotta cheese, 2 cups mozzarella cheese, the Parmesan cheese and about 2 cups sauce.
', 'Step 3: Top with the remaining lasagna noodles and sauce.
', 'Step 4: Cover the pan.
', 'Step 5: Bake at 375 degrees F for 1 hour 30 minutes or until the noodles are tender.
', 'Step 6: Uncover and top with the remaining mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 7: Let stand for 10 minutes.
']

Title: Chicken, Sausage, and Fennel Soup
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '2 tablespoons salted butter', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 bulb fennel, chopped', '1 medium sweet onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon fennel seed, crushed', '½ pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cubed into bite-sized pieces', '½ pound Italian sausage, casings removed', '½ cup uncooked brown rice', '1 ½ cups chicken stock', '1 (16 ounce) package frozen shelled edamame', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil and butter in a pot over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Add fennel, onion, and 1/4 teaspoon salt to the hot pot; saute for 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add fennel seed and saute, 15 minutes more, until vegetables are very soft and the flavors have developed; be careful not to brown them.
', 'Step 4: Increase the heat to medium.
', 'Step 5: Add chicken and sausage; cook and stir until browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain off fat.
', 'Step 7: Add remaining tablespoon oil and brown rice; cook and stir, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add chicken stock and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Cook, covered, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add frozen shelled edamame and cook, covered, another 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Taste and adjust salt and pepper.
', 'Step 12: Remove from the heat and serve, or remove the lid and evaporate some of the liquid if you want it to be thicker.
']

Title: Gianduja Chocolate Cheesecake
Ingredients: ['4 sheets phyllo dough', '½ cup butter, melted', '8 ounces gianduja chocolate, chopped', '1 (1 ounce) square unsweetened chocolate, chopped', '2 pounds mascarpone cheese', '¾ cup white sugar', '4 egg yolks', '¼ cup hazelnut liqueur', '4 egg whites']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C.) Butter a 9 inch springform pan.
', 'Step 2: Lay one sheet of phyllo dough in the pan.
', 'Step 3: Tuck it into the pan and let the edges overhang the rim.
', 'Step 4: Brush with butter and layer a second sheet of phyllo.
', 'Step 5: Butter this sheet.
', 'Step 6: Continue until you have used all four sheets of phyllo.
', 'Step 7: End with butter.
', 'Step 8: Use as little butter as possible.
', 'Step 9: Cover the phyllo-filled pan with a damp cloth.
', 'Step 10: In the top of a double boiler, heat gianduia chocolate and unsweetened chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth.
', 'Step 11: Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm.
', 'Step 12: In a large bowl, beat the mascarpone cheese until smooth.
', 'Step 13: When no lumps remain, begin to beat in the sugar a little at a time.
', 'Step 14: Beat in the egg yolks one at a time incorporating each yolk completely before adding the next.
', 'Step 15: Finally beat in the melted and cooled chocolates and the liqueur.
', 'Step 16: Beat the egg whites until they just get stiff.
', 'Step 17: Do not over beat.
', 'Step 18: Fold 1/3 of the egg whites into the cheese mixture, then quickly fold in the remaining whites until no streaks remain.
', 'Step 19: Be careful not to deflate the whites as much as possible.
', 'Step 20: Pour the filling into the phyllo-lined pan.
', 'Step 21: Tuck the edges of the phyllo into the pan making a bit of a rim.
', 'Step 22: Bake in the preheated oven for 45 to 60 minutes, or until filling is set.
', 'Step 23: It will still seem a little loose in the center.
', 'Step 24: When the cake appears done, turn off the oven, prop open the oven door with a wooden spoon and let the cake remain in the oven for another hour.
', 'Step 25: Then place the cake in the refrigerator until completely chilled.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '452.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '22.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '140.5 mg', 'fatContent': '38.3 g', 'fiberContent': '0.7 g', 'proteinContent': '7.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '20.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '123.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '11.1 g'}

Title: Lemon Artichokes and Eggs
Ingredients: ['3 whole artichokes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint', '¼ pinch salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '1 egg, beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Trim artichoke stems, cut away leaves, and remove the fibrous portion at the center of the artichoke, leaving the heart.
', 'Step 2: Slice the hearts.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir artichoke slices and garlic until garlic just begins to turn golden, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in lemon juice, mint, salt, and black pepper; continue to cook until artichoke slices are tender.
', 'Step 5: Spoon a little water into skillet if juices evaporate.
', 'Step 6: Pour beaten egg into the skillet and scramble gently until egg is set and not runny, 2 or 3 minutes; serve immediately.
']

Title: Tomato Basil Sherry Bread
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups tomato paste', '½ cup sherry', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 cups bread flour', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '⅔ cup diced sun-dried tomatoes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place all ingredients in the bread machine in order suggested by your manufacturer (except for the sun dried tomatoes).
', 'Step 2: Select regular setting, medium crust.
', "Step 3: At the beep or according to your manufacturer's suggestion add the sun dried tomatoes.

', 'Step 5: Let cool and slice, spread with your favorite topping.
']

Title: Accidental Spicy Spinach Shells
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package pasta shells', '4 spicy Italian sausages, casings removed', '1 (16 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese', '1 ½ cups chopped fresh spinach', '½ large tomato, diced', '½ onion, diced', '¼ cup diced red bell pepper', '1 (16 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 (26 ounce) jar tomato sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook pasta shells in boiling water until cooked through but firm to the bite, 12 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain.
', 'Step 5: Cook sausage in a large skillet over medium heat until completely browned, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Melt Monterey Jack cheese in a saucepan over medium-low heat, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir spinach, tomato, onion, and bell pepper into the cheese; cook until hot, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat and cool slightly.
', 'Step 9: Spoon sausage, Monterey Jack cheese mixture, and ricotta cheese into the pasta shells; arrange in a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Pour tomato sauce over the stuffed shells.
', 'Step 11: Bake in preheated oven until the sauce is hot and bubbling, 20 to 25 minutes.
']

Title: Italian Cake with Coconut Cream Cheese Frosting
Ingredients: ['2 cups white sugar', '1 cup unsalted butter, softened', '5 large eggs, separated, divided', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 cup buttermilk', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup flaked sweetened coconut', '1 ½ cups chopped pecans', '2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened', '1 cup unsalted butter, softened', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '10 cups powdered sugar, or to taste', '2 cups flaked sweetened coconut']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour three 9-inch round cake pans.
', 'Step 3: Cream sugar and butter for cake in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Beat in egg yolks, one at a time, until incorporated.
', 'Step 5: Sift flour, baking soda, and salt together in a separate bowl; gradually add to wet ingredients.
', 'Step 6: Slowly add buttermilk and vanilla; mix well.
', 'Step 7: Stir in coconut and pecans.
', 'Step 8: Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 9: Fold into the cake batter, and pour into the prepared cake pans.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Cool on a wire rack for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Run a table knife around the edges to loosen.
', 'Step 13: Invert carefully onto a serving plate or cooling rack.
', 'Step 14: Let cool, about 30 minutes, then transfer to the refrigerator or freezer while you make the frosting.
', 'Step 15: Combine cream cheese and butter for frosting in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy.
', 'Step 16: Add vanilla.
', 'Step 17: Slowly add in powdered sugar and mix to desired consistency.
', 'Step 18: Mix in 1 cup shredded coconut, reserving the rest to decorate the sides of the cake.
', 'Step 19: Place frosting in the refrigerator for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Frost the tops of each cake layer, then stack the layers and frost the sides.
', 'Step 21: Press reserved coconut onto the sides of the cake.
']

Title: Orange and Saffron Panettone
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups unbleached all-purpose flour', '⅛ teaspoon instant yeast', '⅔ cup cool water', '1 cup golden raisins', '¼ cup Cointreau', '¼ cup chopped candied orange peel', '¼ cup chopped candied lemon peel', '1 cup milk', '¼ teaspoon saffron threads', '2 eggs, room temperature', '2 ⅓ cups bread flour', '⅓ cup white sugar', '2 ¼ teaspoons instant yeast', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '½ cup unsalted butter, room temperature and cut into chunks', '2 paper panettone forms', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water', '2 tablespoons pearl sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Prepare the sponge the night before you mix the dough: Mix 1.
', 'Step 2: 5 cups all-purpose flour with 1/8 teaspoon yeast in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Add 2/3 cup cool water.
', 'Step 4: Cover with plastic wrap and let sponge stand at room temperature 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 5: Toss raisins with Cointreau in a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Mix orange and lemon peel in with raisins and add an extra tablespoon of Cointreau and let them soften, if they are on the hard side.
', 'Step 7: Cover with plastic wrap and let stand 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 8: Pour milk into a saucepan and crumble in saffron threads; heat just to a simmer.
', 'Step 9: Transfer to the bowl of a stand mixer, taking care to get all of the saffron bits into the bowl.
', 'Step 10: Let cool to just barely warm (110 degrees F) or room temperature.
', 'Step 11: Transfer sponge to a mixing bowl, breaking up slightly with a spoon.
', 'Step 12: Mix in eggs, stirring a few times by hand.
', 'Step 13: Add 2 1/3 cups bread flour, sugar, 2 1/4 teaspoons yeast, and salt.
', 'Step 14: Mix with the paddle attachment on low speed for about 5 minutes, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl occasionally; the dough will be very loose.
', 'Step 15: Switch to the dough hook attachment and increase speed to medium.
', 'Step 16: Add butter, one piece at a time, mixing until each piece is fully incorporated.
', 'Step 17: Increase to high speed for 1 minute if the mixer can handle it; the dough should be climbing the dough hook and starting to clear the sides of the bowl.
', 'Step 18: Add soaked raisins, orange peel, and lemon peel.
', 'Step 19: Mix on low speed for 2 minutes; the fruit may not be fully dispersed.
', 'Step 20: Transfer dough to a greased bowl.
', "Step 21: Flop the dough over itself a couple of times (it's a little too wet to fold), cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and let rise for 60 minutes.
", 'Step 22: Fold dough a few times to release gas and mix in fruit.
', 'Step 23: Cover again with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight.
', 'Step 24: Turn the dough onto a floured work space.
', 'Step 25: Divide in half and shape into 2 balls.
', 'Step 26: Place each ball seam-side down in a 6" paper panettone form and set on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 27: Beat egg with water, and brush egg wash onto each loaf.
', 'Step 28: Cover panettone forms loosely with plastic wrap and let rise until doubled, about 90 minutes.
', 'Step 29: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 30: Brush loaves with egg wash again and sprinkle pearl sugar on top.
', 'Step 31: Place baking sheet in the hot oven, immediately reducing the temperature to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 32: Bake for 20 minutes, then rotate the baking sheet and bake for an additional 10 minutes.
', 'Step 33: Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and continue baking until a tester inserted in the center of each loaf comes out clean, about 20 minutes more.
', 'Step 34: Cool completely on a wire rack before slicing.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '180.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '29.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '32.4 mg', 'fatContent': '5 g', 'fiberContent': '1 g', 'proteinContent': '3.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '161.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.4 g'}

Title: The Fridge Scavenger's Tomato and Cauliflower Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 stalk celery, sliced', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, quartered', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 head cauliflower, cut into small florets', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, drained and mashed', '1 teaspoon dried sage', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons chicken broth, or as needed', '1 (8 ounce) package linguine pasta', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']

['Step 1: Put a celery slice in a deep skillet with a cover; add olive oil.
', 'Step 2: Heat olive oil over medium-high heat until celery slice is sizzling, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add remaining celery, onion, and garlic to olive oil; turn heat to medium.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir onion mixture until slightly tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Mix cauliflower, tomatoes, sage, salt, and pepper into onion mixture; cook and stir over medium-high heat until bubbling, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Cover skillet with lid, reduce heat to low, and cook until a knife slides easily into cauliflower, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add chicken broth if tomato and cauliflower sauce begins to burn.
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Cook linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes; drain and transfer to a serving bowl.
', 'Step 10: Pour tomato and cauliflower sauce over pasta; add Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 11: Toss to coat.
']

Title: Italian Risotto con Quaglie (Quail Risotto)
Ingredients: ['2 whole quail, cleaned', '2 leaves fresh sage', '4 thin slices pancetta', '2 tablespoons butter, divided, or as needed', '2 tablespoons brandy', '1 cup beef stock, divided', '½ cup dry white wine, divided', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 cup Arborio rice', '4 tablespoons grated Parmigiano cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Season the insides of the quail with salt and pepper and insert a sage leaf into each.
', 'Step 2: Wrap each with pancetta slices, fastening with toothpicks.
', 'Step 3: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Brown quail, moistening with brandy, 1/2 of the beef stock, and 1/2 of the wine, until most of the wine has evaporated, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt and pepper, and transfer mixture to a baking dish.
', 'Step 6: Roast in the preheated oven until quail are no longer pink in the centers and juices run clear, about 12 minutes, moistening with juices as needed.
', 'Step 7: Remove baking dish from the oven and transfer juices to the saucepan; add quail.
', 'Step 8: Cover and cook over low heat, turning frequently, for another 6 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Meanwhile, heat 1/2 tablespoon butter in a large, heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 10: Add onion; cook and stir until the onion begins to turn golden brown at the edges, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Pour in rice and stir until coated in butter and starting to toast, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to medium and stir in remaining wine.
', 'Step 13: Let wine simmer until it has mostly evaporated, then stir in 1/3 of the remaining broth; continue stirring until the rice has absorbed the liquid and turned creamy.
', 'Step 14: Repeat this process twice more, stirring risotto constantly, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Stir remaining butter and 1/2 of the Parmigiano cheese into the risotto.
', 'Step 16: Serve each quail on a bed of risotto.
', 'Step 17: Drizzle edges of risotto with pan juices and sprinkle remaining Parmigiano cheese on each quail.
', 'Step 18: Serve hot.
']

Title: Gelato alla Crema (Egg Cream Gelato)
Ingredients: ['2 cups whole milk', '⅞ cup heavy whipping cream', '5 large egg yolks', '¾ cup sugar', '1 (3 inch) vanilla bean, split and scraped', '2 teaspoons chestnut flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine milk and cream in a saucepan and warm over low heat until foam forms around the edges.
', 'Step 2: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 3: Combine egg yolks, sugar, scraped vanilla bean seeds, and chestnut flour in a large bowl and beat with an electric mixer until frothy.
', 'Step 4: Gradually pour warm milk into egg yolk mixture, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 5: Return mixture to saucepan; add scraped vanilla bean and cook over medium heat, stirring with a wooden spoon until the mixture gels slightly and coats the back of the spoon.
', 'Step 6: If small egg lumps begin to show, remove from heat immediately.
', 'Step 7: Pour mixture through a sieve or fine strainer into a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Cover, and chill for several hours or overnight.
', "Step 9: Pour mixture into an ice cream maker, and freeze according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 10: Transfer to a sealed container, and freeze until firm.
', 'Step 11: If the gelato is too firm, place it in the refrigerator until it reaches the desired consistency before serving.
']

Title: Porchetta Italiano
Ingredients: ['8 pounds bone-in pork butt (shoulder) roast', '½ cup olive oil, divided', '¼ cup kosher salt, divided', '2 tablespoons ground black pepper', '½ onion, finely chopped', '10 cloves garlic, slivered, divided', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill weed', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '¼ cup red wine', '1 bunch broccoli rabe, trimmed and chopped', '2 red bell peppers, chopped', '24 hard rolls', '½ pound sharp provolone cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Slice pork roast horizontally through the middle, stopping short of the opposite edge so it stays in one piece.
', 'Step 2: Open the two sides and spread them out like an open book.
', 'Step 3: Rub 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons olive oil over both sides of the pork roast.
', 'Step 4: Rub 3 tablespoons salt and black pepper into the flesh.
', 'Step 5: Spread onion, 8 garlic cloves, dill, rosemary, and parsley over both sides of the roast.
', 'Step 6: Transfer to a cast iron pan and pour in wine.
', 'Step 7: Cover with plastic wrap and let marinate in the refrigerator for 3 days.
', 'Step 8: Remove roast from refrigerator, remove plastic wrap, and bring to room temperature, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Preheat oven to 225 degrees F (110 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Set cast iron pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 11: Cook roast until browned, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 12: Roast in the preheated oven, covered, until pork falls off the bone, about 5 hours.
', 'Step 13: Remove bone and stir pork; continue cooking until juices are absorbed, about 3 hours more.
', 'Step 14: Remove from oven and let cool, covered, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 15: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 16: Add remaining 2 garlic cloves and broccoli rabe; cook and stir until browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Heat remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil in another skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 18: Add red bell peppers and remaining 1 tablespoon salt; cook and stir until peppers have softened, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Divide pork among rolls.
', 'Step 20: Top with broccoli rabe mixture, red bell peppers, and provolone cheese.
']

Title: Island Style Linguine
Ingredients: ['14 ounces linguine pasta', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon anchovy paste', '1 tablespoon capers', '1 teaspoon caper juice', '1 pound tomatoes - peeled, seeded, and chopped', '12 pitted black olives, chopped', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1 pinch white sugar', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1 teaspoon parsley', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir garlic in hot oil until fragrant and golden, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Gently stir anchovy paste, capers, and caper juice into oil.
', 'Step 6: Stir tomatoes, olives, oregano, and sugar into hot oil mixture, increase heat to medium, and cook until fragrant and heated through, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove skillet from heat and stir in basil and parsley.
', 'Step 8: Season with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 9: Pour sauce over linguine and serve.
']

Title: Caprese Salad with Burrata
Ingredients: ['4 medium vine-ripened tomatoes', '16 ounces Burrata cheese', '1 bunch basil, leaves picked from stems', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil', 'coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons balsamic glaze, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Slice each tomato into 3 or 4 thick slices.
', 'Step 2: Place on a serving tray or platter.
', 'Step 3: Pull Burrata cheese apart into pieces and place on top of tomatoes.
', 'Step 4: Add basil leaves, then drizzle with olive oil.
', 'Step 5: Season generously with salt and pepper and drizzle with balsamic glaze.
']

Title: Pasta Pizza Pie
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 cup sliced mushrooms', '1 serving Vegetable cooking spray', '1 egg, beaten', '¼ cup milk', '3 ½ cups cooked tri-color or plain corkscrew-shaped pasta', '1 cup shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese', '1 ½ cups Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce or Prego® Tomato, Basil & Garlic Italian Sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onion and mushrooms and cook until tender and almost all liquid is evaporated.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 4: Spray 12-inch pizza pan with cooking spray.
', 'Step 5: Mix egg, milk, pasta and 1/2 cup cheese.
', 'Step 6: Spread pasta mixture in an even layer on prepared pan.
', 'Step 7: Bake at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Spread pasta sauce over pasta crust.
', 'Step 9: Top with onion mixture.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle with remaining cheese.
', 'Step 11: Bake for 18 minutes or until cheese is melted and sauce is hot.
', 'Step 12: Let stand 5 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '408.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '54.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '65.8 mg', 'fatContent': '13 g', 'fiberContent': '4.7 g', 'proteinContent': '17.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '638.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '12.9 g'}

Title: Braised Broccoli and Porcini with Polenta
Ingredients: ['1 ounce dried porcini mushrooms', '2 cups boiling water', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 large shallot, sliced', '1 teaspoon miso paste', '1 teaspoon yeast extract', '8 ounces broccoli, florets separated and stems chopped', '4 ounces sliced radicchio', '2 cups water', '1 cup vegetable broth', '½ cup hearty red wine', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 cup Italian polenta', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '2 tablespoons water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak porcini in 2 cups boiling water for at least 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: At the same time, heat olive oil in a medium Dutch oven over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Add shallot and slowly saute until soft and juices have been released, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove porcini from the water and use a damp paper towel to remove any grit.
', 'Step 5: Reserve soaking water.
', 'Step 6: Add porcini to the Dutch oven with miso paste and yeast extract.
', 'Step 7: Stir well and reduce heat to a simmer.
', 'Step 8: Add broccoli; put floret heads facing down and stem pieces nestled in so they are touching the bottom of the pot.
', 'Step 9: Layer radicchio slices evenly on top.
', 'Step 10: Pour in wine without disturbing the vegetables.
', 'Step 11: Cover and simmer, occasionally shaking the pan gently, for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Meanwhile, bring 2 cups water, vegetable broth, and salt to a boil.
', "Step 13: Sprinkle fistfuls of polenta into the boiling liquid while stirring constantly so clumps don't form.
", 'Step 14: Continue to stir in polenta until completely added.
', 'Step 15: Reduce heat to low and cook, stirring often, until polenta is thick and cooked through, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Strain the reserved soaking water, twice if necessary, to remove any sediment.
', 'Step 17: Pour 1/2 of the soaking water into the Dutch oven with the broccoli.
', 'Step 18: Gently shake the pot and use a wooden spoon to carefully loosen the florets without breaking them apart.
', 'Step 19: Gently fold vegetables over until coated with cooking sauce.
', 'Step 20: Continue to simmer, uncovered, occasionally shaking the pot.
', 'Step 21: Cook until broccoli is tender but still firm to the touch and radicchio is completely wilted.
', 'Step 22: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 23: Pour polenta onto a lightly oiled polenta board and spread it evenly over the board.
', 'Step 24: Use a slotted spoon to gently spoon vegetables over the polenta.
', 'Step 25: Pour remaining soaking water into the Dutch oven and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 26: Make a slurry with the remaining water and cornstarch; pour into the Dutch oven while whisking constantly.
', 'Step 27: Cook until sauce has thickened, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 28: Pour sauce over the broccoli and polenta or serve on the side.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '338.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '45.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '3.3 mg', 'fatContent': '10.9 g', 'fiberContent': '6 g', 'proteinContent': '10.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2 g', 'sodiumContent': '718.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.8 g'}

Title: Farm Stand Strata
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '1 (1 pound) loaf sourdough bread, sliced', '2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, divided', '½ cup diced sweet onion', '1 cup diced green bell pepper', '1 cup diced yellow bell pepper', '1 cup diced red bell pepper', '12 ounces cooked and crumbled bacon', '8 eggs', '1 cup sour cream', '½ teaspoon dry mustard', '1 tablespoon herb seasoning blend (such as Spice Merchant® Great Lakes blend)', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Spray a 9x13-inch glass baking dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 2: Lay slices of bread in the bottom of the prepared pan in a single layer, trimming and filling in gaps as necessary.
', 'Step 3: Spread 1 cup Cheddar cheese, onion, green bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, red bell pepper, and bacon on top, in that order.
', 'Step 4: Whisk eggs, sour cream, mustard, seasoning blend, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until well combined.
', 'Step 5: Pour mixture over bread, making sure to soak the top layer.
', 'Step 6: Cover baking pan and refrigerate strata at least 8 hours.
', 'Step 7: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Uncover strata and bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle remaining Cheddar cheese evenly on top and return to the hot oven.
', 'Step 10: Bake until Cheddar cheese is melted, 10 to 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 11: Let strata stand 5 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '450.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '25.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '172.9 mg', 'fatContent': '27.2 g', 'fiberContent': '1.6 g', 'proteinContent': '25.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '12.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '1141 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.7 g'}

Title: Burrata Caprese
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 medium ripe tomatoes, diced', '1 (4 ounce) ball burrata cheese, diced', '6 leaves fresh basil, finely chopped']

['Step 1: Mix together olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a large bowl until well combined.
', 'Step 2: Add tomatoes, burrata cheese, and basil.
', 'Step 3: Toss to combine.
', 'Step 4: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Italian Chicken and Fontina Soup
Ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small yellow onion, finely chopped', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', '6 cups chicken broth', '6 sprigs fresh rosemary', '½ cup milk', '1 ½ cups grated fontina cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place chicken breasts in a large pot; cover with water.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer until chicken is no longer pink in the center, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and cool until easily handled, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Cut into chunks.
', 'Step 5: Heat olive oil in a Dutch oven over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add onion, shallot, and garlic; cook and stir until translucent and soft, but not browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in flour until combined.
', 'Step 8: Pour chicken broth into the Dutch oven.
', 'Step 9: Add rosemary sprigs.
', 'Step 10: Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer, covered, until flavors combine, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Discard rosemary sprigs.
', 'Step 12: Whisk milk into the Dutch oven.
', 'Step 13: Add fontina cheese in batches, whisking until each batch is melted.
', 'Step 14: Stir in chicken chunks.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '403.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '10 g', 'cholesterolContent': '117.8 mg', 'fatContent': '23.2 g', 'fiberContent': '0.6 g', 'proteinContent': '36.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '1829.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.7 g'}

Title: Chicken Florentine Cheese Dip
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 cup diced mushrooms', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ teaspoon salt, or more to taste', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and finely chopped', '1 cup cooked spinach, squeezed dry and finely chopped', '5 ounces cream cheese, diced', '2 large eggs', '1 cup milk', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '½ pound cooked chicken breast, diced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Add onion and saute until tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add mushrooms and continue to cook until they begin to wilt, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper; cook until moisture from the mushrooms has evaporated, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add sun-dried tomatoes and stir thoroughly.
', 'Step 7: Add spinach and stir until incorporated.
', 'Step 8: Remove from the heat and gently stir in cream cheese until melted and creamy.
', 'Step 9: Beat eggs with a whisk in a large glass measuring cup.
', 'Step 10: Whisk in milk.
', 'Step 11: Pour mixture into the skillet and mix until thoroughly combined.
', "Step 12: Stir in mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses; it's okay it they do not melt.
", 'Step 13: Stir in chicken.
', 'Step 14: Spread mixture in a 2-quart glass baking dish and sprinkle with up to 1/2 cup mozzarella, if desired.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until beginning to bubble near the middle, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Remove from the oven and transfer the hot dip to a serving dish.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '135.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '3.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '53.3 mg', 'fatContent': '9.4 g', 'fiberContent': '0.7 g', 'proteinContent': '9.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4 g', 'sodiumContent': '175.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.3 g'}

Title: Spicy Sun-Dried Tomato and Clam Spread
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup sun-dried tomatoes', '1 clove garlic', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '½ teaspoon dried parsley', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '¼ teaspoon chili powder', '1 dash salt', '1 dash pepper', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '1 (6.5 ounce) can minced clams, drained']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a blender or food processor, puree the sun-dried tomatoes and garlic until smooth.
', 'Step 2: Blend in the red pepper, parsley, basil, chili powder, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Spoon in the cream cheese and clams, and continue to blend until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Transfer the spread to a serving bowl, and chill until ready to serve.
']

Title: Iced Italian Knot Cookies
Ingredients: ['4 cups all-purpose flour', '6 teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '¾ cup unsalted butter, melted', '¾ cup white sugar', '3 large eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup warm water', 'Icing:', '2 cups powdered sugar', '½ teaspoon anise extract', '1 pinch salt', '4 tablespoons water', 'candy sprinkles']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Mix flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Combine butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment; beat until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 4: Change to the dough hook and gradually mix in flour mixture.
', 'Step 5: Add warm water and mix until a smooth dough forms.
', 'Step 6: Roll dough into 1 1/2-inch balls.
', 'Step 7: Roll each ball out to a 4-inch long worm.
', 'Step 8: Bring one end over the other, then underneath and through the middle, like a knot.
', 'Step 9: Place 16 cookies on a baking sheet, four rows of four.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, 13 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
', 'Step 12: Repeat to bake remaining 2 batches of cookies.
', 'Step 13: Meanwhile, mix powdered sugar, anise extract, and salt together in a bowl.
', 'Step 14: Mix in water, a little at a time, until desired consistency.
', 'Step 15: Dip cooled cookies upside down into the icing, then turn over onto waxed paper.
', 'Step 16: Sprinkle with candy sprinkles.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '101.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '16.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '19.3 mg', 'fatContent': '3.3 g', 'fiberContent': '0.3 g', 'proteinContent': '1.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '72.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.3 g'}

Title: Risotto with Sunchokes, Butternut Squash, and Gorgonzola
Ingredients: ['4 cups vegetable broth', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium shallot, diced', '1 cup diced butternut squash', '⅔ cup sunchokes (Jerusalem artichokes)', '1 cup Arborio rice', '⅓ cup dry white wine', '2 ounces creamy Gorgonzola cheese, diced into small cubes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Warm broth in a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Warm olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Stir in shallot and butternut squash and cook until soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, peel and dice sunchokes, adding them to the saucepan immediately to prevent oxidation.
', 'Step 5: Mix with the other vegetables.
', 'Step 6: Add rice; stir and toast until pale, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour in white wine, stirring constantly until fully absorbed.
', 'Step 8: Pour 1/2 cup broth into the rice and stir until absorbed.
', 'Step 9: Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring continuously, until the liquid is absorbed and the rice is tender yet firm to the bite, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Turn off the heat and add Gorgonzola cheese.
', 'Step 11: Stir well until cheese is melted.
', 'Step 12: Allow to rest for 2 minutes before serving.
']

Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 cup milk', '6 thin slices prosciutto, cut into thin strips', '6 fresh figs, stemmed and quartered', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '¼ teaspoon lemon pepper seasoning, or to taste']

', 'Step 3: Remove from heat; gradually stir in milk until smooth.

', 'Step 5: Reduce heat and simmer over low heat.
', 'Step 6: n Cook and stir prosciutto and figs in a non-stick pan over medium heat until warm, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir lemon zest and lemon pepper seasoning into the white sauce.
', 'Step 8: Serve figs and prosciutto atop sauce.
']

Title: Chicken Agrodolce
Ingredients: ['4 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, peeled', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh ginger', '4 bay leaves', '⅓ cup dry white wine', '¼ cup balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons honey', '½ cup orange juice', '¼ cup lemon juice', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons toasted pine nuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Coat chicken with flour.
', 'Step 2: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat; cook chicken with garlic, ginger, and bay leaves until chicken is browned, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 3: Mix wine, vinegar, and honey together in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until sauce is reduced by half, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add orange juice, lemon juice, salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper and continue cooking until sauce is reduced by 2/3, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Strain reduction sauce.
', 'Step 6: Pour strained reduction sauce over chicken; add pine nuts and simmer over medium heat until chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 7: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Instant Pot® Italian Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon salted butter', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '2 (5 ounce) frozen skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '1 (4.5 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained', '2 (.7 ounce) packages dry Italian-style salad dressing mix', '1 cup chicken broth', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Add butter to melt; then add garlic and saute for about 1 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add chicken, mushrooms, and 1 package of salad dressing mix.
', 'Step 4: Pour broth over top.
', 'Step 5: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 6: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 15 minutes.

', "Step 8: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions for 5 minutes.
", 'Step 9: Take chicken out and shred with 2 forks.
', 'Step 10: Select Saute function.
', 'Step 11: Add cream of chicken soup, remaining Italian dressing mix packet, and cream cheese; stir to mix.
', 'Step 12: Add shredded chicken back in.
', 'Step 13: Heat through, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Serve.
']

Title: Zucchini Linguine Alfredo
Ingredients: ['6 zucchini, trimmed', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste', '1 (6 ounce) package portobello mushrooms, chopped', '1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta', '¾ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '1 (15 ounce) jar mushroom Alfredo sauce (such as Bertolli®)']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Shred zucchini with the shredding blade of a food processor and toss with 1/2 teaspoon salt in a colander.
', 'Step 2: Let the zucchini drain for 2 to 3 hours if possible.
', 'Step 3: Transfer zucchini to several layers of paper towels and squeeze out as much liquid as possible.
', 'Step 4: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir garlic with 1/2 teaspoon salt and black pepper until garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 5: Stir in portobello mushrooms and cook until mushrooms have released their liquid, the juice has evaporated, and the mushrooms are browned, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir shredded zucchini into the mushrooms and cook, stirring often, until the zucchini are tender but not mushy, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook the linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 8: Transfer linguine into a large serving bowl.
', 'Step 9: Toss pasta with zucchini-mushroom mixture, Parmesan cheese, and mushroom Alfredo sauce, tossing until thoroughly combined.
']

Title: Italian Style Chicken Salad
Ingredients: ['½ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 lemons, juiced', '1 (2 pound) roasted chicken, meat removed from bones and cut into bite-size pieces', '1 bulb fennel, cored and cut into thin slices', '3 stalks celery, thinly sliced', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '½ cup mayonnaise', '1 lemon, zested', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 bunch arugula']

', 'Step 2: Cook and stir garlic until softened and golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in lemon juice; set aside to cool.
', 'Step 4: Toss chicken, fennel, celery, red onion, and parsley together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the cooled garlic and olive oil, mayonnaise, lemon zest, salt, and black pepper.
', 'Step 6: Arrange arugula on a serving platter; serve chicken salad on arugula.
']

Title: Italian-Style Oven-Roasted Cauliflower
Ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower, cut into florets', '5 large mushrooms, coarsely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, sliced', '¼ medium red onion, sliced', '¼ medium red bell pepper, sliced', '¼ medium yellow bell pepper, sliced', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Toss cauliflower, mushrooms, garlic, red onion, red and yellow bell peppers, olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper together in a large bowl.

Title: Megan's Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups white sugar', '1 ½ cups boiling water', '1 cup brewed coffee', '½ cup vanilla citrus liqueur (tuaca)', '2 cups powdered sugar', '1 (8 ounce) container mascarpone cheese', '¼ cup vanilla citrus liqueur (tuaca)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups whipping cream', '1 (14 ounce) package ladyfinger cookies', '1 tablespoon grated semisweet chocolate']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Start syrup: Combine white sugar and boiling water in a medium bowl; stir until sugar dissolves.
', 'Step 2: Set aside.
', 'Step 3: Prepare filling: Combine powdered sugar, mascarpone cheese, 1/4 cup tuaca, and vanilla extract in a bowl; whip with the whisk attachment of an electric mixer until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Gradually add whipping cream and whip until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 5: Continue syrup: Mix coffee and tuaca into the sugar-water mixture.
', 'Step 6: Assemble tiramisu: Line the bottom of a 9x13-inch glass baking dish with ladyfingers.
', 'Step 7: Pour 1/2 of the syrup over top, then layer with 1/2 of the filling.
', 'Step 8: Add another layer of ladyfingers and cover with remaining syrup and filling.
', 'Step 9: Smooth with the back of a spoon and sprinkle with grated chocolate.
', 'Step 10: Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.
']

Title: Cappuccino Biscotti
Ingredients: ['1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon instant espresso coffee powder', '2 eggs', '¼ cup butter', '6 ounces semisweet chocolate chips', '1 teaspoon shortening']

', 'Step 2: Line baking sheet with parchment paper.

Title: Pasta with Cilantro Pesto and Barley
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups water', '½ cup pearl barley', '8 ounces uncooked orecchiette pasta', '1 bunch cilantro', '½ bunch green onions', '1 cup grape tomatoes, halved', '½ cup vegetable broth', '¼ cup Parmesan cheese', '1 cup torn arugula leaves', 'salt and pepper to taste']

', 'Step 2: Stir in the barley.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 30 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Add orecchiette pasta, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 6: In a food processor, finely chop the cilantro, green onions, and 1/2 the tomatoes.

Title: Tortellini Soup with Meatballs
Ingredients: ['extra-virgin olive oil', '1 clove garlic, smashed', '2 large carrots, chopped', '2 ribs celery, sliced', '1 bay leaf', '4 sprigs fresh thyme', '3 quarts low-sodium chicken broth', '5 parsley stems', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste', 'kosher salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', 'olive oil', '1 medium onion, diced', '6 links chicken-apple sausage. meat removed from casings', '1 egg', '¼ cup fresh parsley leaves, or to taste', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme leaves', 'kosher salt to taste', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 pounds frozen tortellini', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, or as desired', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or as desired', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Set a large stockpot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add extra-virgin olive oil, garlic, carrots, celery, bay leaf, and thyme.
', 'Step 3: Gently cook and stir until fragrant, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Pour in chicken broth and add parsley stems.
', 'Step 5: Add Parmesan cheese, kosher salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Bring soup to a boil, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat and allow to simmer while you make the meatballs.
', 'Step 8: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a saute pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Add onion and cook until softened and browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Transfer cooked onion to the bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 11: Add sausage, egg, parsley, Parmesan cheese, and thyme.
', 'Step 12: Season meatball mixture with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 13: Add remaining olive oil to the skillet and warm over medium heat until just smoking.
', 'Step 14: Use a small scoop to drop meatball mixture onto the skillet.
', 'Step 15: Cook meatballs, turning frequently, until golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Drop frozen tortellini into simmering soup and cook until they float, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Add browned meatballs to soup and return to a simmer.
', 'Step 18: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 19: Serve soup in shallow bowls with a shower of Parmesan cheese, olive oil, and parsley.
']

Title: Seashell Supper
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package seashell pasta', '1 pound sliced bacon, diced', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes, drained', '1 (10 ounce) can tomato sauce', '2 ½ cups water']

Title: Foglie Chef Doogie's D'Autunno with Chicken and Portobella Mushrooms
Ingredients: ["1 (16 ounce) package foglie d'autumn (autumn leaves) pasta", '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup chopped onion', '½ cup chopped green bell pepper', '1 whole boneless, skinless chicken breast, cubed', '2 portobello mushrooms, cut into 1/2 inch pieces', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon rubbed sage', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ cup Chardonnay wine', '½ cup Burgundy wine', '1 (32 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large pot bring 6 quarts of unsalted water to boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook pasta until al dente.
', 'Step 3: Drain well.
', 'Step 4: Place pasta back in the pot, add one Tablespoon of olive oil and mix to prevent the leaves from sticking together.
', 'Step 5: Cover and keep warm while the sauce finishes simmering.
', 'Step 6: Warm oven-safe dinner plates in a 150 degree F(65 degree C) oven.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, in a 12 inch saute pan, heat 2 tablespoons of extra virgin olive oil over medium high heat.
', 'Step 8: Add the minced garlic and saute until the aromatic oils are released - about 1 minute.
', 'Step 9: Add the chopped onion and bell pepper and saute 3 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add the cubed chicken breast, dried thyme, dried basil, rubbed sage, salt, and black pepper.
', 'Step 11: Cook until the chicken is no longer pink.
', 'Step 12: Add the Chardonnay and Burgundy wines, and pasta sauce and heat until bubbling.
', 'Step 13: Add the Portobella mushroom pieces and cook until the mixture has reduced and is thick and hot.
', 'Step 14: To serve, place two large serving spoonfuls of Autumn Leaves on each warmed plate and top with a large ladle of the chicken and Portobella sauce.
']

Title: Spaghetti Squash Chicken Tetrazzini
Ingredients: ['1 spaghetti squash, halved and seeded', '2 cups cubed skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '4 tablespoons salted butter, melted, divided', '2 tablespoons minced garlic, divided', '3 teaspoons chopped fresh basil, divided', '1 tablespoon dried minced onion', '½ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon white pepper', '1 cup half-and-half', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken and mushroom soup', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bake squash in the preheated oven until easily pierced with a knife, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, heat 2 tablespoons butter and 1 tablespoon oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Saute chicken in the pan with 1 tablespoon garlic and 1 teaspoon basil until browned and no longer pink, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 6: Remove squash from the oven and cool until easily handled, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Scrape insides of squash into strands with a fork and transfer to a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Discard skins.
', 'Step 9: Mix remaining olive oil, garlic, basil, dried onion, salt, and white pepper together in a bowl.
', 'Step 10: Pour half-and-half and remaining butter into a Dutch oven and heat over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Stir in soup.
', 'Step 12: Add the seasoning mixture and stir.
', 'Step 13: Stir in chicken.
', 'Step 14: Ladle a bit of the sauce from the pot to cover the bottom of a baking dish.
', 'Step 15: Put the spaghetti squash on top of the sauce and pour the remaining sauce and chicken on top.
', 'Step 16: Stir to combine.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over it.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven, uncovered, until cheese is melted, 20 to 25 minutes.
']

Title: Anneomelette (Baked Crusted Omelette)
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon butter, or as needed', '10 eggs', '¼ cup milk', '2 pinches Italian herb seasoning, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 dash chipotle hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)', '1 (8 ounce) ball fresh buffalo mozzarella', '12 slices bacon, halved', '1 (10 ounce) package ready-made pizza dough', '1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']

['Step 1: Preheat a convection oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease an ovenproof baking dish with butter.
', 'Step 3: Break eggs into a bowl.
', 'Step 4: Add milk, 1 pinch Italian herb seasoning, salt, black pepper, and chipotle hot pepper sauce and mix with a whisk.
', 'Step 5: Pour into the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 6: Tear mozzarella cheese into pieces and place on top of egg mixture in an even layer.
', 'Step 7: Place bacon slices on top of cheese in an even layer.
', 'Step 8: Roll pizza dough out halfway.
', 'Step 9: Stretch dough over sides of baking dish firmly, allowing about 1/4-inch extra on each side.
', 'Step 10: Use kitchen scissors to trim away any extra dough.
', 'Step 11: Pour olive oil in a small bowl and add remaining Italian seasoning and garlic powder.
', 'Step 12: Pour mixture over dough.
', 'Step 13: Top dough with shredded mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until dough is golden and cheese is nicely crisped, 15 to 20 minutes.
']
