Title: Savoiardi II
Ingredients: ['3 egg yolks', '⅜ cup sugar', '⅜ cup all-purpose flour', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '3 egg whites', '1 ½ tablespoons white sugar', "1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl, whip egg yolks and 3/8 cup of white sugar until thick and pale.
', 'Step 4: Whisk in flour and salt just until smooth.
', 'Step 5: Stir in vanilla.
', 'Step 6: In a separate glass or metal bowl, whip egg whites until they are able to hold firm peaks.
', 'Step 7: Fold egg whites into the egg yolk mixture until fully incorporated.
', 'Step 8: Drop the batter by tablespoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheet, and shape into 3 inch long strips.
', "Step 9: Stir together the remaining white sugar and confectioners' sugar, and sprinkle half of the mixture over the tops of the strips.
", 'Step 10: Let stand for 10 minutes, then sprinkle the remaining sugar mixture over them, and let stand for 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 11: Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden.
', 'Step 12: Cool on a wire rack.
']

Title: Beefy Lasagna Nachos
Ingredients: ['9 ounces lasagna noodles', '½ cup vegetable oil for frying, or as needed', 'salt to taste', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '8 ounces ground sirloin', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '½ cup marinara sauce', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', '1 cup whole milk', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '½ cup whole-milk ricotta cheese', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and pat dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 4: Cut each noodle into assorted desired shapes.
', 'Step 5: Pour vegetable oil to a depth of 3 inches into a Dutch oven; heat over high to reach 360 degrees F (182 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Add 8 to 10 pasta pieces, one at a time to avoid them sticking together, and cook, lightly tapping under the oil and stirring with a spider tool occasionally, until golden brown and crispy, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove using a spider or tongs to a paper towel-lined sheet tray, and sprinkle with salt.
', 'Step 8: Repeat with remaining pasta pieces, allowing oil temperature to reach back to 360 degrees F (182 degrees C) before adding next batch.
', "Step 9: Set an oven rack in the top third and preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 10: Line a large rimmed baking sheet with foil.
', 'Step 11: Heat a medium nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 12: Add olive oil and ground sirloin; cook, stirring occasionally, until beef is browned, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Add garlic and Italian seasoning; cook stirring constantly, until fragrant, 1 minute more.
', 'Step 14: Stir in marinara sauce and remove from heat.
', 'Step 15: Set aside.
', 'Step 16: Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 17: Whisk in flour and cook, whisking constantly, until starting to bubble, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 18: Slowly whisk in milk, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 19: Cook over medium heat, whisking often, until slightly thickened, about 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Remove from heat and stir in mozzarella, Parmesan, and remaining 1/8 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 21: Arrange lasagna chips in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 22: Drizzle 1/2 of the cheese sauce over top and evenly sprinkle with the sirloin mixture.
', 'Step 23: Dollop with ricotta.
', 'Step 24: Broil in the preheated oven until ricotta gets brown in spots, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Serve drizzled with remaining cheese sauce, basil, and parsley.
']

Title: Pizzadillas

Title: Focaccia Barese al Pomodoro e Olive (Homemade Italian Focaccia with Tomatoes and Olives)
Ingredients: ['1 potato, unpeeled', '6 cups bread flour', '2 cups lukewarm water, divided', '1 tablespoon active dry yeast', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '2 tablespoons salt, divided', '8 vine tomatoes, halved', '1 (6 ounce) can pitted black olives in brine', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon dried oregano']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place potato into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and rinse under cold running water.
', 'Step 4: Peel potato; mash in a large bowl with a fork.
', 'Step 5: Pour in flour and mix well with your fingertips.
', 'Step 6: Rub together until mixture is even and free of lumps.
', 'Step 7: Combine 1 cup water, yeast, and sugar in a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Mix well and let stand until frothy, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in 5 tablespoons olive oil.
', 'Step 10: Pour yeast mixture over flour mixture; mix, adding remaining 1 cup water a little at a time, until a soft dough forms.
', 'Step 11: Mix in 1 tablespoon salt.
', 'Step 12: Knead dough on a clean work surface until smooth and soft, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Transfer dough to a greased bowl.
', 'Step 14: Cover with a damp cloth; let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 15: Grease a large rimmed baking sheet with 2 tablespoons olive oil.
', 'Step 16: Place dough on the baking sheet; stretch into the corners.
', 'Step 17: Arrange tomatoes and olives over dough.
', 'Step 18: Mix remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil and 2 tablespoons water together in a bowl.
', 'Step 19: Brush mixture over dough.
', 'Step 20: Sprinkle remaining 1 tablespoon salt on top.
', 'Step 21: Cover with a damp cloth; let rise for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 22: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 23: Bake focaccia on the lower rack of the preheated oven for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Lift up with a fork to check bottom is golden brown.
', 'Step 25: Transfer to the middle rack and bake until top is golden, 10 to 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 26: Sprinkle oregano on top.
']

Title: Pesto Delicato di Camogli
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons pine nuts', '2 ½ cups fresh basil leaves', '1 teaspoon rock salt', '½ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or to taste', '2 tablespoons finely grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed', '1 (16-ounce) package fresh trofie pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Add pine nuts to a large mortar and pestle and crush until a past forms, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add 1/4 of the basil leaves and begin to crush and grind the basil leaves until they have begun to release their oil and leaves begin to break apart.
', 'Step 3: Add another 1/4 of the basil leaves and the salt.
', 'Step 4: Crush and grind the added leaves and the salt.
', 'Step 5: Continue this until all the basil leaves have been added and crushed; turning into a paste.
', 'Step 6: Add the Parmesan and Pecorino cheeses and mix with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 7: Once well combined, add the oil little-by-little until a creamy paste has been achieved.
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Add fresh trofie pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain.
', 'Step 11: Mix in pesto sauce, adding a bit more olive oil if needed.
']

Title: Slow Cooker Beet Green Risotto

['Step 1: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Saute onion until softened, about 3 minutes.

', 'Step 4: Add white wine and cook, stirring constantly, for 1 minute.

', 'Step 2: Marinate 4 hours.

Title: Polenta Taragna with Taleggio and Radicchio
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups whole grain polenta', '1 cup whole grain buckwheat flour', '3 ½ cups water', '1 cup vegetable broth', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ cup unsalted butter, at room temperature, cubed', '6 ounces Taleggio cheese at room temperature, cubed', '1 large head radicchio', '1 teaspoon olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk polenta and buckwheat flour together in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Combine water, broth, and salt in a large pot and bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle polenta mixture into the water little by little, whisking constantly to avoid clumping.
', 'Step 4: Immediately reduce heat and simmer, stirring often to avoid scorching, for about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Set aside 4 Taleggio cheese cubes.
', 'Step 6: Add butter and remaining Taleggio cheese to the polenta, stirring often until melted and the polenta is thick and creamy like grits, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, heat a griddle or skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Remove the outer leaves of the radicchio and cut the head into 4 equal wedges.
', 'Step 9: Drizzle oil onto the griddle and cook the radicchio on each side until heated and slightly charred and just beginning to wilt.
', 'Step 10: Distribute equal portions of polenta onto plates and top with a cube of Taleggio and a wedge of grilled radicchio.
', 'Step 11: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Chicken Cacciatore Linguine
Ingredients: ['4 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '½ (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes, undrained', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '½ cup red wine, or more if needed', '1 (4 ounce) can mushroom pieces and stems, drained', '3 tablespoons snipped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon dried rosemary', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '⅛ teaspoon black pepper', '12 ounces linguine pasta']

', 'Step 2: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.

Title: Poor Mamma's Spaghetti
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove garlic, peeled', '4 slices white bread, crusts trimmed', '1 (8 ounce) package uncooked spaghetti', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 2: Add the garlic clove, and cook until the clove is browned.
', 'Step 3: Remove the garlic from the oil, and finely crumble the slices of bread into the skillet.
', 'Step 4: Cook until nicely toasted, then scoop out the crumbs onto a paper towel.

', 'Step 7: Add the spaghetti, and cook for about 8 minutes, until tender.

', 'Step 10: Sprinkle with bread crumbs and freshly ground black pepper.

Title: Orange Semifreddo
Ingredients: ['½ cup orange juice', '1 (.25 ounce) package unflavored gelatin', '2 eggs, separated', '1 egg yolk', '½ cup white sugar', '1 cup heavy cream', '1 teaspoon orange extract', '1 orange, cut into wedges']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour orange juice into a saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle gelatin powder on top.
', 'Step 3: Let stand until softened, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Place over low heat; stir constantly until granules are completely dissolved, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from heat and allow to cool, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl until foamy.
', 'Step 7: Gradually add sugar, continuing to beat until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 8: Combine egg yolks and sugar in a large bowl; beat using an electric mixer until pale and fluffy.
', 'Step 9: Set aside.
', 'Step 10: Beat cream in a chilled glass or metal bowl using an electric mixer until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 11: Fold into the large bowl with the egg yolk-sugar mixture, followed by the stiff egg whites.
', 'Step 12: Fold orange-gelatin mixture and orange extract into the large bowl with the egg yolk-cream mixture.
', 'Step 13: Pour mixture into a mold and freeze 8 hours to overnight.
', "Step 14: When it's time to serve, dip mold in hot water to loosen bottom and sides; turn out onto a serving plate.
", 'Step 15: Decorate with orange wedges.
']

Title: Italian Fried Eggplant Balls
Ingredients: ['4 medium eggplants, peeled and quartered', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 egg', '½ teaspoon ground white pepper', '1 pepperoncini pepper, chopped', '1 cup vegetable oil', 'salt to taste']

', 'Step 2: Let eggplant cook until tender; drain well.
', 'Step 3: In an electric food processor, combine eggplant, flour, egg, white pepper, and pepperoncini.
', 'Step 4: Blend until a smooth paste is formed.
', 'Step 5: In a heavy pot or deep fryer, heat vegetable oil to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Drop eggplant paste into the oil one spoonful at a time.
', 'Step 7: Fry until the eggplant balls are golden.
', 'Step 8: Salt to taste and drain on paper towels before serving.

Title: Zucchini Noodles with Bolognese Sauce
Ingredients: ['6 medium zucchini, spiralized', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin oil, divided', '½ cup diced onion', '¼ cup diced carrots', '¼ cup diced celery', '12 ounces ground beef', '4 cloves garlic, minced, divided', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup red wine', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled San Marzano tomatoes', '½ cup whole milk', '¼ cup finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the spiralized zucchini on top of paper towels and sprinkle with salt.
', 'Step 2: This will help the zucchini release some of their excess water.
', 'Step 3: Set aside.
', 'Step 4: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Add onion, carrots, and celery, and saute until they begin to soften, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add ground beef and 2 cloves garlic.
', 'Step 7: Season with salt and pepper and continue cooking, breaking up the beef into a fine mince, until browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Drain off any excess grease.
', 'Step 9: Pour in red wine and cook until reduced slightly.
', 'Step 10: Place tomatoes and liquid from the can into a blender or food processor and quickly puree to break up the whole tomatoes.
', 'Step 11: Add tomatoes to the pan and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to low and continue to simmer for about 45 minutes, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 13: Pour in milk and heat through.
', 'Step 14: Heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 15: Add zucchini and remaining garlic; saute until zucchini reaches your desired tenderness, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Divide the zucchini noodles into 6 bowls.
', 'Step 17: Top with some Bolognese sauce and sprinkle with grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
']

Title: Grilled Tuscan-Style Porterhouse Steaks
Ingredients: ['2 (10 ounce) porterhouse steaks', 'kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '½ cup olive oil, divided', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 medium lemon, cut into quarters']
Cooking Instructions:

', 'Step 2: Season steaks with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Cook steaks on the preheated grill until they are beginning to firm and are hot and slightly pink in the center, about 12 to 14 minutes, flipping halfway.
', 'Step 4: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 140 degrees F (60 degrees C) for medium.
', 'Step 5: While the steaks are cooking, place garlic in a microwave-safe bowl.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle some salt over top and pour in 2 tablespoons of the olive oil.
', 'Step 7: Mash garlic with the back of a sturdy knife into a fine paste.
', 'Step 8: Stir in remaining oil and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 9: Heat in the microwave until hot, about 1 to 1 1/2 minutes, mixing every 30 seconds.
', 'Step 10: Remove steaks from the oven and let sit covered for 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Drizzle 2 tablespoons oil mixture over each steak and squeeze lemon wedges over top.

Title: Tortelli di Carnevale (Italian Carnevale Doughnuts)
Ingredients: ['12 fluid ounces water', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 pinch salt', '1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '5 fluid ounces anise-flavored liqueur', '¼ cup white sugar', '3 tablespoons grappa', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '3 eggs, separated', '2 cups lard, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine water, butter, and salt in a saucepan; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Remove from heat; stir in flour until well mixed.
', 'Step 3: Return saucepan to medium heat; cook and stir until dough starts to pull away from the sides of the saucepan, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove saucepan from heat and stir anise-flavored liqueur, sugar, grappa, and lemon zest into dough.
', 'Step 5: Cool dough to room temperature, at least 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Beat egg yolks into the cooled dough until well mixed.
', 'Step 7: Cover bowl with a clean towel and let rest for 3 hours.
', 'Step 8: Beat egg whites in a bowl until stiff peaks form; gently fold into the dough until no white streaks remain.
', 'Step 9: Heat lard in a heavy saucepan over medium heat or in a deep fryer.
', 'Step 10: Form dough into balls the size of golf balls; fry in the hot lard in batches, until doughnuts are lightly browned and cooked through, 4 to 5 minutes.
']

Title: Pullum Frontonianum (Apicus Chicken)

Title: Florentine Ranch Steak

Title: Nana's Italian Holiday Cream Cake
Ingredients: ['½ cup margarine', '½ cup shortening', '2 cups white sugar', '5 eggs, separated', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 cup buttermilk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup chopped pecans', '1 (3.5 ounce) can flaked coconut', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '¼ cup margarine, softened', "1 pound confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour three 9-inch baking pans.
', 'Step 3: Beat 1/2 cup margarine and shortening in a bowl with an electric mixer until creamy.
', 'Step 4: Beat in sugar.
', 'Step 5: Beat in egg yolks until smooth.
', 'Step 6: Combine flour and baking soda in a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Add to the margarine mixture in batches, alternating with buttermilk, until batter is smooth.
', 'Step 8: Mix in 1 teaspoon vanilla extract; add pecans and coconut.
', 'Step 9: Beat egg whites with clean beaters in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 10: Fold into the batter.
', 'Step 11: Pour into prepared pans.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Cool in the pans for 10 minutes; invert onto a cooling rack.
', 'Step 14: Cool completely, about 30 minutes.
', "Step 15: Beat cream cheese and 1/4 cup margarine in a bowl until smooth; stir in confectioners' sugar.
", 'Step 16: Beat in 1 teaspoon vanilla extract until frosting is combined.
', 'Step 17: Spread frosting onto the cooled cake layers.
', 'Step 18: Stack cakes; frost top and sides.
']

Title: X Cookies
Ingredients: ['4 cups all-purpose flour', '⅔ cup sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup butter, cubed', '1 egg', '¾ pound dried figs', '½ cup chopped almonds, toasted', '⅓ cup apricot preserves', '¼ cup golden raisins', '¼ cup chopped candied orange peel', '⅓ cup semisweet chocolate chips', '¼ cup dark rum', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 egg, beaten', '2 tablespoons milk', "½ cup confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
', 'Step 2: Cut in butter using a pastry blender, or pinching between your fingers.
', 'Step 3: Add egg, and mix until a dough forms.
', 'Step 4: It may take a couple of minutes of mixing.
', 'Step 5: When the dough starts to hold together, turn it out onto a floured surface and knead briefly.
', 'Step 6: Shape dough into a long roll, wrap, and set aside.
', 'Step 7: Place the figs, almonds, apricot preserves, raisins, orange peel, chocolate, rum, and cinnamon into a food processor or blender.
', 'Step 8: Process until finely chopped.
', 'Step 9: If the fruit is hard, it may be soaked in boiling water to soften for 15 minutes before processing.
', 'Step 10: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: In a small bowl, mix together the remaining egg and milk to make an egg wash.
', 'Step 12: Divide dough into 12 pieces.
', 'Step 13: On a lightly floured surface, roll each piece out into a 3x12 inch rectangle.
', 'Step 14: Brush the strips of dough lightly with egg wash.
', 'Step 15: Place a strip of the fruit mixture lengthwise down the center of each piece of dough, and fold the edges over.
', 'Step 16: Roll gently to seal.
', 'Step 17: This will make the filled tube of dough a little bit longer.
', 'Step 18: Cut each tube into 3 inch pieces.
', 'Step 19: Make a one inch long slit with a knife down the center of each cut end.
', 'Step 20: Spread the ends out to form an X shape.
', 'Step 21: Place cookies 2 inches apart onto lightly greased cookie sheets.
', 'Step 22: Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are golden.
', 'Step 23: Allow cookies to cool on the tray for at least 5 minutes, so they will not be too delicate, before removing to wire racks to cool completely.
', "Step 24: Dust with confectioners' sugar when cool.
"]
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '110.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '16.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '14.4 mg', 'fatContent': '4.3 g', 'fiberContent': '1.2 g', 'proteinContent': '1.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '70.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.1 g'}

Title: Jackie's Stuffed Hot Banana Peppers
Ingredients: ['1 pound hot Italian sausage', '5 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '1 (24 ounce) carton ricotta cheese', '1 cup diced stick pepperoni', '3 eggs, lightly beaten', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons fresh flat-leaf parsley', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '20 hot banana peppers, tops and seeds removed, or more to taste', '1 (28 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce, or more to taste']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Set aside to cool.
', 'Step 5: Mix cooked sausage, 4 cups mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, pepperoni, eggs, Parmesan cheese, parsley, garlic powder, and nutmeg together in a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Stuff each pepper with cheese mixture.
', 'Step 7: Cover the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish with 1 cup spaghetti sauce.
', 'Step 8: Add stuffed peppers, stacking them if needed.
', 'Step 9: Cover with remaining sauce.
', 'Step 10: Top with remaining mozzarella cheese and any remaining cheese mixture.
', 'Step 11: Cover baking dish with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and fragrant, at least 1 hour.
']

Title: Italian Escarole Pizza

Title: Bruschetta Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) box rigatoni pasta', '½ small red onion', '4 cloves garlic, peeled', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 medium tomatoes, cored', '½ teaspoon dried oregano, or to taste', '½ teaspoon dried parsley, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup diced fresh mozzarella cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook rigatoni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: While the pasta is cooking, puree onion and garlic in the bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 4: Heat oil and butter in a medium pan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 5: Add onion and garlic; simmer until fragrant, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Puree tomatoes in the food processor.
', 'Step 7: Add tomatoes to the onion mixture; simmer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Mix in oregano, parsley, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Add cooked rigatoni and Parmesan cheese; mix well.
', 'Step 10: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 11: Toss in mozzarella cheese and let rest for 5 minutes before serving.
']

Title: La Genovese
Ingredients: ['½ cup olive oil', '1 pound lean ground beef', '3 carrots, diced', '½ onion, minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons white wine']

['Step 1: Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook beef, stirring to break up clumps, until it begins to brown.
', 'Step 3: Stir in carrots, onion, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Continue to stir and cook until vegetables begin to soften and meat juices run clear, 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour in wine and cook one minute more.
', 'Step 6: Serve.
']

Title: Healthier Penne Rosa with Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 (13 ounce) package whole-wheat penne', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, sliced into thin strips', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '2 tomatoes, chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '4 cups fresh spinach', '1 ½ cups marinara sauce', '1 (6 ounce) container nonfat plain Greek yogurt', '1 bunch fresh basil, chopped', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Stir in penne and return to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until cooked through, but still firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain.
', 'Step 5: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add chicken; cook and stir until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Transfer chicken to a plate.
', 'Step 8: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in the same skillet.
', 'Step 10: Add garlic and red pepper flakes; cook and stir until garlic begins to soften, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Stir in tomatoes; cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 13: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 14: Stir in spinach; cover and let stand until wilted, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Pour marinara sauce into a separate saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 16: Cook until heated through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Transfer 1/2 the sauce into a bowl; stir in yogurt.
', 'Step 18: Whisk mixture into the rest of the marinara in the saucepan.
', 'Step 19: Uncover tomatoes and spinach and place back over low heat.
', 'Step 20: Stir in penne, sauce, and basil; cook until heated through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Divide penne into bowls and serve topped with chicken and Parmesan cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '612.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '81.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '69.8 mg', 'fatContent': '13.7 g', 'fiberContent': '6.4 g', 'proteinContent': '43.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '719.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '12.2 g'}

Title: Torta of Potatoes Alfredo
Ingredients: ['4 medium russet potatoes, peeled and sliced 1/4 inch thick', '1 (15 ounce) container BUITONI® refrigerated Alfredo Sauce', '¼ cup chopped Italian parsley', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ cup BUITONI® Refrigerated Freshly Shredded Parmesan Cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease 2 1/2-quart baking dish.
', 'Step 2: Combine potatoes, 2/3 cup sauce, parsley, oil, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl.
', 'Step 3: Arrange a single layer of potatoes in prepared baking dish and sprinkle with 1 tablespoon cheese.
', 'Step 4: Continue layering until all potatoes are used.
', 'Step 5: Top with remaining sauce and remaining cheese; cover tightly with foil.
', 'Step 6: Bake for 1 hour.
', 'Step 7: Uncover; increase oven temperature to 425 degrees F. Bake for an additional 15 to 20 minutes or until golden brown.
', 'Step 8: Cool for 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Lighter Fettuccine Alfredo with Greek Yogurt
Ingredients: ['½ (16 ounce) package whole wheat fettucine', '2 teaspoons cornstarch', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 tablespoon salted butter', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '¾ cup reduced-fat, low-sodium chicken broth', '¾ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, divided', '¾ cup Greek yogurt', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']

['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook fettuccine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, 9 to 11 minutes.
', 'Step 3: While the fettuccine is cooking, combine cornstarch and nutmeg together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 4: Add chicken broth and whisk until smooth.
', 'Step 5: Melt butter in a large pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour chicken broth mixture into the pan, raise heat to medium-high, and bring to a simmer, whisking occasionally.
', 'Step 8: Add 1/2 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese; whisk until melted.
', 'Step 9: Remove from heat and whisk in yogurt until sauce is smooth.
', 'Step 10: Drain fettuccine and place in a large bowl.
', 'Step 11: Add Alfredo sauce and toss to coat.
', 'Step 12: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 13: Top with remaining Parmigiano-Reggiano and serve.
']

Title: Italian White Bean Soup (Clean Eating)
Ingredients: ['4 (14 ounce) cans white kidney beans', '4 cups vegetable broth, divided', '1 (14.5 ounce) can fire-roasted diced tomatoes (such as Muir Glen®)', '½ cup chopped onion', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper']

', 'Step 2: Blend to a smooth puree and pour into a large saucepan.
', 'Step 3: Add remaining beans, remaining broth, tomatoes, onion, garlic, basil, thyme, and black pepper.
', 'Step 4: Bring soup to a boil over medium-high heat, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat to a simmer, cover, and cook until beans are tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
']

Title: Sicilian Pasta Salmon Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 (2 ounce) can anchovy fillets, undrained, or to taste', '1 onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon tomato paste', '1 (7.5 ounce) can salmon, undrained, or more to taste', '½ (7.5 ounce) can water', '¼ cup pine nuts, or to taste', '¼ cup raisins, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch saffron', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghettini']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour about 2 teaspoons oil from anchovy can into a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onion in the hot anchovy oil until softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add anchovy fillets; cook and stir until fish dissolves, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir tomato paste into onion-anchovy mixture; add juice from canned salmon, water, pine nuts, raisins, salt, and black pepper.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir mixture until flavors have blended, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Cook spaghettini in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain.
', 'Step 8: Mix salmon and saffron into onion-anchovy mixture; cook until salmon is heated through, about 15 more minutes.
', 'Step 9: Serve salmon sauce over spaghettini.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Italian Butternut Squash Risotto
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '⅛ cup chopped onion', '⅛ cup chopped carrot', '⅛ cup chopped celery', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon fresh rosemary, minced', '2 cups peeled and diced butternut squash', '½ cup chopped leek', '1 ½ cups Arborio rice', '½ cup dry white wine', '4 cups warm vegetable broth', '½ cup shredded smoked mozzarella cheese', '¾ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '4 teaspoons balsamic vinegar (such as Aceto Balsamico di Modena)']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Add olive oil, onion, carrot, and celery.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir until tender, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add garlic and rosemary and stir to combine.
', 'Step 5: Add butternut squash and leek; cook, stirring occasionally, until slightly softened, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir rice into the pot until each grain is coated with the olive oil-vegetable mixture, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour in wine to deglaze and simmer for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Pour in vegetable broth, stirring to scrape the sides of the pot.
', 'Step 9: Simmer for 1 minute.
', 'Step 10: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 11: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 6 minutes.
", 'Step 12: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 13: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 10 minutes.
", 'Step 14: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 15: Stir in smoked mozzarella and 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 16: Evenly distribute the balsamic vinegar among 4 plates.
', 'Step 17: Spoon equal amounts of risotto onto each plate.
', 'Step 18: Top with the remaining Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 19: Serve hot.
']

Title: Individual Cacio e Pepe Lasagnas

Title: Instant Pot® Minestrone Soup
Ingredients: ['½ pound Italian turkey sausage links, casings removed', '2 cups water', '2 teaspoons chicken soup base (such as Better than Bouillon®)', '1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 zucchini, sliced into half moons', '1 medium yellow onion, diced', '2 carrots, peeled and coarsely diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 bunch fresh spinach, chopped', '½ teaspoon dried Italian herbs', '¼ teaspoon dried rosemary', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese']

Title: Roasted Vegetable and Kale Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced', '1 yellow bell pepper, thinly sliced', '1 zucchini, thinly sliced', '6 large mushrooms, thinly sliced', '6 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '1 cup water', '1 bunch kale, torn into bite-sized pieces', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 (26 ounce) cans pasta sauce', '1 (12 ounce) box no-boil lasagna noodles', '9 cups grated mozzarella cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package bocconcini cheese, thinly sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 3: Toss red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, zucchini, mushrooms, and 4 tablespoons olive oil together in a bowl.
', 'Step 4: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Transfer vegetables to the prepared baking sheet in a single layer.
', 'Step 6: Roast in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Turn vegetables and roast 10 to 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 8: Meanwhile, bring water to a boil in a saucepan.
', 'Step 9: Add torn kale and cook until just darkened in color, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 10: Drain.
', 'Step 11: Heat remaining olive oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 12: Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 13: Add drained kale and cook until wilted, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 15: Remove bell peppers from the oven and adjust oven temperature to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Layer pasta sauce, lasagna noodles, roasted bell pepper mixture, and grated mozzarella cheese into a 9x13-inch baking pan.
', 'Step 17: Add another layer of noodles, pasta sauce, kale, and sliced bocconcini cheese.
', 'Step 18: Continue layers until ingredients are used up, being sure to place noodle layers and sauce next to each other to prevent dry noodles.
', 'Step 19: Bake lasagna in the hot oven until bubbling and noodles are soft, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Let cool 20 to 30 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Passatelli
Ingredients: ['2 large eggs', '2 teaspoons Lemon peel, raw', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch ground nutmeg, or to taste', '7 ounces finely grated Grana Padano cheese', '½ cup dry bread crumbs', '4 cups chicken broth']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Beat eggs, lemon zest, salt, and nutmeg with an electric blender until foamy.
', 'Step 2: Add Grana Padano cheese and bread crumbs and mix with your hands into an compact, yet soft dough.
', 'Step 3: Cover and allow dough to rest in a cool place for at least 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, bring chicken broth to a boil in a large pot over high heat.
', 'Step 5: Use a potato ricer to mash dough directly into the broth, forming small "snakes" about 2 to 3 inches in length.
', 'Step 6: Use a sharp knife to cut passatelli directly from the bottom of the potato ricer so they drop into the water.
', 'Step 7: Cook until passatelli float to the surface, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Immediately scoop them out with a slotted spoon and drain.
', 'Step 9: Transfer passatelli to soup bowls and serve with hot chicken broth.
']

Title: Paleo Spaghetti Squash with Spinach and Bacon Cream
Ingredients: ['½ pound bacon', '1 tablespoon bacon drippings', '1 large spaghetti squash, halved and seeded', '¼ cup water', '1 large onion, coarsely chopped', '1 eggplant, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced, or to taste', '1 teaspoon Italian herb blend', '1 (14 ounce) can coconut milk', '2 cups fresh spinach leaves', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons nutritional yeast, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain the bacon slices on paper towels; crumble and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Leave 1 tablespoon bacon drippings in the skillet.
', 'Step 4: Place halved and seeded spaghetti squash cut sides down in a large glass baking dish with 1/4 cup water.
', 'Step 5: Microwave on high until squash is steaming and tender, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Using a fork, scrape spaghetti squash strands from skin.
', 'Step 7: Set aside in a large serving dish and keep warm.
', 'Step 8: Cook and stir onion and eggplant in remaining bacon drippings in a large skillet over medium heat until the onion turns translucent and eggplant is tender, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in garlic and Italian herb blend.
', 'Step 10: Add coconut milk, bring to a simmer, and cook until warmed through, 2 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove from heat and use an immersion blender to puree the eggplant-coconut mixture until smooth.
', 'Step 12: Return blended coconut milk sauce to skillet over medium-high heat and stir in crumbled bacon and spinach.
', 'Step 13: Simmer, stirring often, until spinach is wilted and sauce is heated through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Pour sauce over spaghetti squash and sprinkle with nutritional yeast to taste.
']

Title: Fennel-Prawn Conchiglie
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package conchiglie(seashell) pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 large fennel bulb, cut into thin strips', '1 zucchini, halved lengthwise and sliced', '1 stalk celery with leaves, sliced', '4 shallots, cut into thin strips', '3 cloves garlic, sliced thin', '1 red chile pepper, sliced thin', '15 prawns, or more to taste, peeled and deveined', '1 (14 ounce) can tomato puree', '1 teaspoon fennel seed', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 10 minutes; drain, reserving 3 tablespoons of the water.
', 'Step 3: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.

', 'Step 5: Pour tomato puree over the vegetables; add fennel seed and stir.
', 'Step 6: Bring mixture to a simmer and cook until the vegetables are slightly tender, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir reserved water from boiling the pasta into the sauce mixture.
', 'Step 8: Season sauce with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
', 'Step 9: Pour sauce and vegetable mixture over the drained pasta, add 1 tablespoon olive oil, and stir to coat.
']

Title: Yummy Summer Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 (13.25 ounce) package whole wheat rotini pasta', '½ pound fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1-inch pieces', '1 (8 ounce) package sugar snap peas, ends and strings removed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '½ cup freshly grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '¼ cup thinly sliced fresh basil', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ tablespoon coarsely ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook the whole-wheat rotini at a boil until just beginning to become tender, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir in asparagus and snap peas and cook until vegetables are bright green and pasta is tender, about 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain pasta and vegetables, reserving 1/2 cup of the cooking water.
', 'Step 4: Transfer rotini, asparagus, peas, and the cooking water to a large serving bowl and keep warm.
', 'Step 5: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onion until barely golden, 10 to 12 minutes; stir in lemon juice and lemon zest and cook until lemon zest is fragrant, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Toss onion mixture, Pecorino Romano cheese, and basil into the pasta and vegetables; season with salt and black pepper.
']

Title: Light Panettone
Ingredients: ['½ cup lukewarm water, divided, or as needed', '2 ¼ cups Italian-style tip 00 flour', '¾ ounce fresh yeast', '2 eggs', '6 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '¼ cup raisins', '¼ cup dried blueberries', '¼ cup chopped dried apricots', '3 tablespoons stevia powder', '2 tablespoons sugar-free candied fruit', '10 drops sugar substitute (such as Truvia®)']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine 1/4 cup lukewarm water, 1/3 of the flour, and yeast in a bowl and dissolve yeast.
', 'Step 2: Cover with a clean dish towel and let rise in a warm place, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 3: Stir in 1/3 more of the flour and enough warm water to make the dough soft and elastic.
', 'Step 4: Knead together, cover, and let rise in a warm place, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 5: Add remaining flour and a few tablespoons of warm water, knead into a soft and elastic dough, cover, and let rise in a warm place, about 3 hours.
', 'Step 6: Work in eggs, olive oil, raisins, blueberries, apricots, stevia, candied fruit, and sweetener and knead everything into a soft dough.
', 'Step 7: Place dough in a panettone mold, cover, and let rise in a warm place until dough has almost doubled, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until panettone is baked through and lightly browned, about 45 minutes.
']

Title: Pecan Parsley Pepper Pesto

Title: Grilled Chicken and Artichoke Soup
Ingredients: ['1 ounce dried porcini mushrooms', '1 cup boiling water', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', 'salt and pepper to taste', '6 cups chicken broth', '½ cup sun-dried tomatoes (not packed in oil), snipped into small pieces', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '⅓ cup olive oil', '2 cloves cloves garlic, minced', '1 red onion, minced', '2 (13.75 ounce) cans artichoke bottoms, drained and chopped', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '½ cup dry white wine', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the dried mushrooms into the boiling water and set aside until softened, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Once softened, squeeze excess water from mushrooms and finely chop.
', 'Step 3: Reserve the mushroom-flavored water.
', 'Step 4: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil grate.
', 'Step 5: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Grill chicken breasts until no longer pink in the center, about 6 minutes per side.
', 'Step 7: Once cooked, set aside.
', 'Step 8: Pour chicken broth into a large pot, and bring to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 9: Stir in sun-dried tomatoes, tomato paste, and reserved mushroom liquid.
', 'Step 10: Reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 12: Stir in garlic and onion, and cook until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir in the chopped mushrooms, artichokes, pepper, parsley, lemon juice, and white wine.
', 'Step 14: Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes; add to the simmering chicken broth.
', 'Step 15: Slice the grilled chicken breasts into strips and stir into the simmering soup.
', 'Step 16: Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '262.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '17.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '36.7 mg', 'fatContent': '12.1 g', 'fiberContent': '5 g', 'proteinContent': '19.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '806.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.7 g'}

Title: Chicken Oliver
Ingredients: ['¼ cup butter or margarine', '6 (6 ounce) boned, skinned chicken breast halves', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 ½ teaspoons minced fresh garlic', '1 cup pitted ripe olives, drained', '1 cup pimiento-stuffed green olives, drained', '½ pound fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1 cup frozen pearl onions, thawed and drained', '1 cup chicken stock or canned low-salt broth', '3 medium potatoes - peeled and cubed', '1 (16 ounce) package frozen green peas, thawed and drained', '¼ cup dry white wine', 'salt and pepper to taste']

['Step 1: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook chicken breasts, turning occasionally and reducing heat when necessary, 5 minutes per side, or until no longer pink in center and juices run clear.
', 'Step 3: Add thyme, rosemary, garlic, black and green olives, mushrooms, pearl onions, and chicken stock to the skillet.
', 'Step 4: Cover and simmer for 30 minutes, or until chicken is to desired tenderness.
', 'Step 5: Stir in potatoes, peas, and wine.
', 'Step 6: Cover and continue simmering another 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until potatoes are tender.
', 'Step 7: Season to taste with salt and pepper, and serve.
']

Title: Vegan Melanzane (Eggplant) Pasta Sauce

', 'Step 2: Cook and stir onion, carrot, and garlic until onion is golden, about 5 minutes.

Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 carrot, finely chopped', '1 (14.5 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', '½ teaspoon white sugar', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup vegetable oil for frying', '1 eggplant, thinly sliced', '10 ounces tortiglioni (tube-shaped) pasta', '2 tablespoons pitted Kalamata olives, sliced', '2 tablespoons grated Grana Padano cheese', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise']

Title: Turkey Zuppa Toscana

Title: Easy Risotto-Style Rice

Title: Braccialoni
Ingredients: ['1 (2 pound) boneless round steak', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs', '8 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto', '2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (32 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 (16 ounce) package uncooked spaghetti']

', 'Step 5: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large saucepan, or stock pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Sear the outside of the roast on all sides.
', 'Step 7: Pour spaghetti sauce over the roast, and reduce heat to medium-low.
', 'Step 8: Cover and simmer for 2 to 3 hours, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 9: Remove meat from the sauce to a serving platter, and let stand for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Add spaghetti, and cook until tender, about 7 minutes.

Title: Fusion Lasagna Meatloaf
Ingredients: ['⅔ cup Italian-seasoned panko (Japanese bread crumbs)', '⅓ cup milk', '1 egg', '1 pound ground beef', '1 (3.5 ounce) link Italian sausage, casing removed and chopped', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '⅓ cup marinara sauce, divided', '½ teaspoon garlic salt', '4 (1 ounce) sticks string cheese', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '5 fluid ounces heavy whipping cream', '2 cups finely shredded Parmesan cheese', '1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a loaf pan.
', 'Step 3: Combine panko, milk, and egg in a small bowl and allow to soften, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Combine ground beef, sausage, onion, 3 tablespoons marinara sauce, and garlic salt in a bowl.
', 'Step 5: Add panko mixture and mix by hand until combined.
', 'Step 6: Pat 1/2 of the mixture into the prepared pan.
', 'Step 7: Lay 2 string cheese sticks side-by-side horizontally on top, leaving about 1/2 inch from the ends of the pan; stack remaining cheese sticks on top.
', 'Step 8: Cover with remaining meat mixture.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven for 40 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove from the oven and cover with remaining marinara sauce.
', 'Step 11: Bake for 20 minutes more.

', 'Step 13: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat, stirring with a wooden spoon, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 14: Add heavy cream and stir until combined.
', 'Step 15: Add Parmesan cheese and stir until blended.
', 'Step 16: Season with nutmeg.
', 'Step 17: Remove meatloaf from the oven and allow to rest for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Pour Alfredo sauce down the middle of meatloaf.
', 'Step 19: Slice and serve.
']

Title: Chickpea Maltagliati e Fagioli
Ingredients: ['1 cup dried cranberry beans', '2 sprigs fresh sage', '1 sprig fresh rosemary', '1 bay leaf', 'kitchen twine', '4 ounces chickpea lasagna sheets', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup diced onion', '½ cup diced carrots', '½ cup diced red bell pepper', '20 fresh green beans, cut into 1-inch pieces', '10 cherry tomatoes, quartered', '1 clove garlic, minced', "1 bird's eye chile, minced", '4 cups water', '1 cube vegetable bouillon', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 cups boiling water', '4 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil']

['Step 1: Soak beans in water, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 2: Drain beans and briefly rinse under cold water.
', 'Step 3: Allow to drain.
', 'Step 4: Tie sage, rosemary, and bay leaf with kitchen twine.
', 'Step 5: Set aside.
', 'Step 6: Break lasagna sheets into uneven pieces that are relatively the same size.
', 'Step 7: Heat a stovetop pressure cooker over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 8: Add 2 tablespoons oil, onion, carrots, and red bell pepper; stir until onion is translucent.
', 'Step 9: Add drained beans, herb bundle, green beans, cherry tomatoes, garlic, and chile pepper.
', 'Step 10: Stir to ensure beans are evenly distributed.
', 'Step 11: Add 4 cups water and bouillon cube.
', 'Step 12: Secure the lid and bring to pressure.
', 'Step 13: Cook for 8 minutes from the first whistle.
', "Step 14: Turn off heat and allow pressure to release naturally according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 15: Remove cover and discard herb bundle.
', 'Step 16: Season stew with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 17: Bring to a boil.
', 'Step 18: Add pasta pieces a few at a time, stirring constantly to avoid sticking.
', 'Step 19: Add boiling water a little at a time if the stew becomes too thick.
', 'Step 20: Stir frequently until pasta is tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Ladle into 4 bowls.
', 'Step 22: Top each bowl with 1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil.
']

Title: Italian Christmas Cookies with Cocoa and Orange Liqueur
Ingredients: ['3 ½ cups all-purpose flour, or as needed', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1 cup white sugar', '½ cup butter, softened', '4 eggs', '1 cup cocoa powder', '2 tablespoons orange-flavored liqueur', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', "2 cups sifted confectioners' sugar", '2 tablespoons orange-flavored liqueur', '2 tablespoons water', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease 2 baking sheets.
', 'Step 3: Sift flour and baking powder together in a bowl.

Title: Red Winter Minestrone with Winter Greens Pesto
Ingredients: ['1 bunch beet greens', '1 bunch turnip greens', '1 bunch kale', '⅔ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '2 cloves garlic', '1 ounce Parmigiano Reggiano cheese, grated', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '6 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '1 white onion, finely chopped', '2 Roma (plum) tomatoes, peeled and grated', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon minced fresh rosemary', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 bay leaf', '1 pinch dried chili flakes', '1 leek, white and light green parts only, halved lengthwise, cleaned, and cut into 1/2-inch slices', '1 carrot, peeled and sliced', '½ pound turnips, peeled and cubed', '½ pound beets, peeled and cubed', '1 cup dry white wine', '2 cups cooked cannellini beans', '½ cup green beans, cut into 1-inch pieces', '5 cups water', '¼ cup chopped flat-leaf (Italian) parsley', '½ tablespoon fresh lemon juice, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Prepare a bowl of ice water.
', 'Step 3: Strip beet greens, turnip greens, and kale from their coarse stems and wash leaves well.
', 'Step 4: Working in batches, cook each bunch in boiling water until bright green and slightly limp, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 5: Transfer immediately to ice water and repeat with remaining greens.
', 'Step 6: Discard cooking water.
', 'Step 7: Remove greens from ice water and squeeze out as much water as possible.
', 'Step 8: Combine greens, 2/3 cup olive oil, 2 cloves garlic, Parmigiano Reggiano cheese, and 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt in blender or food processor; blend until smooth.
', 'Step 9: Transfer pesto to a bowl and cover surface with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 10: Heat 1/4 cup olive oil in large pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 11: Stir in onion, grated tomato, 4 cloves minced garlic, rosemary, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, bay leaf, and chili flakes.
', 'Step 12: Cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes; reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 13: Continue cooking and stirring until vegetables are a deep golden brown, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Pour remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil over onion mixture.
', 'Step 15: Stir in leek, carrot, turnips, and beets.
', 'Step 16: Increase heat to medium-high and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Pour white wine over vegetable mixture and scrape browned bits off the bottom of the pot.
', 'Step 18: Mix cannellini beans and green beans into vegetable mixture; pour in 5 cups water.
', 'Step 19: Bring liquid to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until green beans are tender, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 20: Stir in parsley and lemon juice.
', 'Step 21: Divide soup among heated bowls and serve with a generous dollop of the winter greens pesto.
']

Title: Chicken Rollatina
Ingredients: ['¾ cup ricotta cheese', '¾ cup shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '1 ¼ teaspoons Italian seasoning', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, pounded 1/4-inch thick', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced mushrooms', '¾ cup white wine', '½ cup lemon juice', '2 tablespoons butter, cut into small pieces, divided', '1 pound penne pasta']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Stir ricotta cheese, 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese, 1/2 of the Parmesan cheese, and Italian seasoning together in a bowl.

', 'Step 6: Place rolled chicken into a 9x13-inch glass baking dish.

', 'Step 8: Scatter 1/2 of the butter over chicken and sprinkle remaining mozzarella cheese and Parmesan cheese over the top.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the middle and juices run clear, 40 to 45 minutes.

', 'Step 11: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Drain, return penne to the pot, and stir remaining butter into pasta.
', 'Step 13: Ladle pasta into bowls, place chicken over pasta, and spoon pan juices over the top.

Title: Air Fryer Mini Italian Meatloaves for Two
Ingredients: ['10 ounces ground sirloin', '3 tablespoons tomato sauce, divided', '2 tablespoons finely chopped onion', '2 tablespoons quick-cooking oats', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '¼ teaspoon salt, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste', 'cooking spray']

Title: Neapolitan Ice Cream Cake
Ingredients: ['½ gallon vanilla ice cream, softened', '1 (15.25 ounce) package chocolate cake mix', '1 (15.25 ounce) package strawberry cake mix', '2 cups water, divided', '1 cup vegetable oil, divided', '6 large eggs, divided', '1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line a 9-inch round cake pan with plastic wrap or waxed paper.
', 'Step 2: Fill with softened ice cream.
', 'Step 3: Place in the refrigerator until hardened, at least 3 hours.
', 'Step 4: When the ice cream has been in the freezer for 2 hours, preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Grease the bottom and sides of two 9-inch round, nonstick cake pans.
', 'Step 6: Place chocolate cake mix in a large bowl.
', 'Step 7: Add 1 cup water, 1/2 cup oil, and 3 eggs; beat with an electric mixer on medium speed for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: In another large bowl, repeat Step 2 with the strawberry cake mix.
', 'Step 9: Pour 1/2 of the chocolate batter into one of the prepared pans and 1/2 of the strawberry batter into the remaining pan.
', 'Step 10: Discard remaining batter or save for another use.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the centers comes out clean, 24 to 29 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Cool on a wire rack for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Run a table knife around the edges to loosen.
', 'Step 14: Invert carefully onto a cooling rack.
', 'Step 15: Let cool, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Place the chocolate cake on a serving plate with the top side down.
', 'Step 17: Pull the ice cream layer out of the pan with the plastic wrap and place it on top of the chocolate cake.
', 'Step 18: Place the strawberry cake on the ice cream with the top side up.
', 'Step 19: Frost cake with whipped topping.
', 'Step 20: Serve immediately or place in the freezer until ready to serve.
']

Title: Tangy Mediterranean Tuna Salad
Ingredients: ['1 cup whole, pitted kalamata olives', '1 tablespoon garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon capers, drained', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (5 ounce) can water-packed tuna, drained', '½ one lemon, juiced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine the olives, garlic and capers in an electric food processor, and process to form a paste.
', 'Step 2: With the motor still running, slowly add the olive oil through the feed tube and blend thoroughly.
', 'Step 3: Then add the tuna and lemon juice, and continue processing until smooth.
']

Title: Smoked Gouda and Leek Chicken
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 leek, thinly sliced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '8 ounces smoked Gouda cheese, shredded', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded 1/4 inch thick', '4 thin slices prosciutto']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook the leek and garlic in the melted butter until the leek softens and the garlic turns translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the Gouda until melted.
', 'Step 6: Divide the cheese mixture among the chicken breasts; roll the chicken around the filling.
', 'Step 7: Wrap each chicken breast with a slice of prosciutto, and secure with toothpicks.
', 'Step 8: Place seam side down on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Cook the chicken breasts until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 10: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Remove the chicken from the oven and allow to rest 5 minutes before slicing and serving.
']

Title: Italian Lentil Salad
Ingredients: ['4 cups water', '1 ½ cups dried lentils, rinsed', '4 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced', '4 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto', '1 bunch fresh basil, leaves stripped from stems', '¼ cup balsamic vinaigrette dressing, or as needed']

['Step 1: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan; add lentils.
', 'Step 2: Cover and simmer until lentils are tender, about 35 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and and cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 4: Divide lentils among 4 salad plates; layer with mozzarella cheese slices, prosciutto, and fresh basil.
', 'Step 5: Drizzle balsamic vinaigrette over each salad.
']

Title: Stuffed Flank Steak in the Oven
Ingredients: ['1 (2 pound) flank steak', '5 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '½ (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '¼ cup diced celery', '¼ cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes (not oil-packed)', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '¾ (15 ounce) jar roasted red peppers, drained', '1 cup plain dry bread crumbs', '¼ cup minced fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons capers', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ pound thinly sliced prosciutto', '½ pound thinly sliced provolone cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place flank steak in the freezer for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet.
', 'Step 3: Add mushrooms, celery, sun-dried tomatoes, and garlic; saute until softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove from the heat and place in a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Pat roasted red peppers dry.
', 'Step 6: Chop and add to the vegetable mixture.
', 'Step 7: Add bread crumbs, parsley, 2 tablespoons olive oil, capers, salt, pepper flakes, and black pepper.
', 'Step 8: Mix to combine.
', 'Step 9: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Remove steak from the freezer and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Turn the long side of the steak towards you and place on a flat work surface.
', 'Step 12: Slice horizontally through the middle to within 1/2 inch of the opposite edge, being careful not to cut all the way through to the other side.
', 'Step 13: Open the 2 sides and spread them out like an open book.
', 'Step 14: Leaving a 1-inch border around the edges, layer prosciutto and provolone cheese over the entire steak.
', 'Step 15: Top with bread crumb mixture, patting down to adhere.
', 'Step 16: Roll steak up tightly starting at the small end.
', 'Step 17: Use kitchen twine to tie steak in 1-inch increments taking care to tie tightly at both ends.
', 'Step 18: Season with more salt and pepper and brush with remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil.
', 'Step 19: Place steak carefully on a broiler pan.
', 'Step 20: Bake in the preheated oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads 145 degrees F (63 degrees C) for medium-rare, 160 degrees F (71 degrees C) for medium, or 170 degrees F (77 degrees C) for well done, 35 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Turn on the broiler and broil for an additional 10 minutes.
', 'Step 22: Remove from the oven and let stand for 10 minutes before slicing and serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '365.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '11.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '55.9 mg', 'fatContent': '24.6 g', 'fiberContent': '1.2 g', 'proteinContent': '23.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '1053.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.5 g'}

Title: Buffalo Chicken Layered Mashed
Ingredients: ['1 (4 ounce) package Idahoan® Roasted Garlic Flavored Mashed Potatoes', '1 package dry Ranch dressing mix*', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 celery rib, finely chopped', '1 large carrot, grated', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1 ½ pounds rotisserie chicken, shredded', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes, drained', '1 (12 fluid ounce) bottle buffalo wing sauce*', '½ cup water', '1 ½ teaspoons Italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '½ cup Italian flat leaf parsley, minced', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '12 ounces part-skim mozzarella cheese, shredded', '8 ounces white cheddar cheese, cut into thin slices', '7 ounces crumbled bleu cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Prepare mashed potatoes following package directions.
', 'Step 2: Stir in packet of dry Ranch dressing.
', 'Step 3: Set aside.
', 'Step 4: In a Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Add the onion, celery and carrot; cook and stir until the vegetables are tender.
', 'Step 6: Add the garlic and cook 2 minutes longer.
', 'Step 7: Add the shredded chicken.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the tomatoes, wing sauce, water, Italian seasoning, salt and pepper; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Reheat; cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 10: In a medium size bowl, mix the ricotta cheese, 3/4 cup bleu cheese, parsley and egg.
', 'Step 11: Spread 1 1/2 cups sauce into a greased 13x9-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 12: Layer with a third of the mashed potatoes, 1 1/2 cups sauce, 2/3 cup ricotta mixture, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, 1/3 of the cheese slices and 1/3 cup bleu cheese.
', 'Step 13: Repeat layers twice.
', 'Step 14: Bake covered at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Uncover; bake 20 to 25 minutes longer or until bubbly and cheese is melted.
', 'Step 16: Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Nutella® Biscotti
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '3 large eggs', '1 cup white sugar', '⅓ cup unsalted butter, melted', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '⅓ cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®)', '1 ¼ cups bittersweet chocolate chips', '1 cup chopped raw hazelnuts', '½ cup milk chocolate candy wafers']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Position racks in top and bottom third of the oven.
', 'Step 3: Line two large rimmed baking sheets with parchment paper and lightly spray with cooking spray.
', 'Step 4: Whisk flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt together in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 5: Beat eggs in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a whisk attachment on medium-high speed until pale and frothy, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Gradually add sugar and mix until pale and thickened, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Beat in melted butter and vanilla on low speed until combined.
', 'Step 8: Add chocolate-hazelnut spread and beat on low speed, scraping down sides and bottom of bowl as needed, until just combined, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 9: Gradually mix in flour mixture and on low speed until just combined, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 10: Fold in chocolate chips and hazelnuts until just combined.
', 'Step 11: Divide dough in half.
', 'Step 12: Place each half in the center of a prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 13: Lightly spray your hands with cooking spray and shape each piece of dough into a 3/4-x2 1/2-x13-inch log.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven, rotating cookie sheets halfway through, until set and firm to the touch, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove from the oven and let cool on the baking sheets for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Reduce oven temperature to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 17: Carefully transfer one log to a cutting board.
', 'Step 18: Use a serrated knife to cut 1/2-inch slices on the diagonal.
', 'Step 19: Transfer slices back to the baking sheet in an even layer, with cut-sides up.
', 'Step 20: Repeat with the remaining log.
', 'Step 21: Bake in the preheated oven until dried, about 30 minutes, flipping cookies and rotating baking sheets halfway through.
', 'Step 22: Transfer biscotti to a wire rack and let cool completely, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Meanwhile, microwave candy wafers in a medium microwave-safe bowl on high power for 30 seconds, then stir.
', 'Step 24: Continue microwaving and stirring in 30-second increments, until melted and smooth, about 1 to 1 1/2 minutes total.
', 'Step 25: Drizzle melted chocolate over one end of each biscotti.
', 'Step 26: Refrigerate, uncovered, until chocolate hardens, about 15 minutes.
']

Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '9 sage leaves', '1 cup heavy whipping cream', '1 cup pumpkin puree', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese']

Title: Zucchini and Shells
Ingredients: ['¼ cup olive oil', '½ medium onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 large zucchini, peeled and cubed', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '2 cups water', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '⅛ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '½ cup white sugar', '1 (8 ounce) package uncooked pasta shells', '¼ cup grated Romano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the onion and garlic, and cook until tender.
', 'Step 3: Mix in zucchini and coat in the olive oil.
', 'Step 4: Pour in tomato sauce and water.
', 'Step 5: Season with oregano, basil, and red pepper.
', 'Step 6: Dissolve sugar in the sauce.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low, and simmer 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 10: In a large bowl, mix sauce and cooked past shells.
', 'Step 11: Top with cheese to serve.
']

Title: Spinach, Ricotta and Pumpkin Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound peeled and seeded pumpkin, cut into pieces', '1 tablespoon butter, softened', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'sea salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 cup milk', '2 bay leaves', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '1 fennel bulb, thinly sliced', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (10 ounce) bag baby spinach', '1 (16 ounce) container low-fat ricotta cheese', '1 ½ teaspoons ground nutmeg', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ pound lean ground beef', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 (14.25 ounce) can tomato puree', '12 dry lasagna noodles', '⅓ cup freshly grated Parmesan']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a saucepan with 1/2 inch of water, then add pumpkin pieces.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and steam until the pumpkin is very tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain pumpkin, then mash with 1 tablespoon butter, cinnamon; salt and pepper to taste, then set aside.
', 'Step 4: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Whisk in flour and cook, stirring constantly, until the paste just begins to turn golden, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Whisk in milk gradually so that no lumps form.
', 'Step 7: Bring to a gentle boil.
', 'Step 8: Add the bay leaves, and reduce heat to low or warm.
', 'Step 9: Allow to gently cook for 10 to 15 minutes, stirring frequently, then remove from heat.
', 'Step 10: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Stir in onion, fennel, and garlic; cook until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Add spinach and cook until wilted.
', 'Step 13: Scrape mixture into a large bowl, and mix well with ricotta cheese and nutmeg.
', 'Step 14: Using the same skillet, heat another 1 tablespoon olive oil over high heat.
', 'Step 15: Brown ground beef in oil, mixing thoroughly to break into small pieces.
', 'Step 16: Once browned, reduce heat to medium-low and pour off excess grease.
', 'Step 17: Stir in tomato paste and tomato puree.
', 'Step 18: Gently simmer until thickened, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 20: Grease a 9x13 inch lasagna dish.
', 'Step 21: Line the bottom of the lasagna dish with 4 noodles, do not overlap.
', 'Step 22: Spread the ricotta mixture evenly over noodles, then sprinkle with 1/3 of the Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 23: Place another 4 noodles on top of the ricotta, then spread with evenly with the mashed pumpkin.
', 'Step 24: Place the remaining 4 noodles on top of the pumpkin and top with the tomato sauce; sprinkle with another 1/3 of the Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 25: Stir the white sauce until smooth, then discard the bay leaves; pour the sauce over top of the lasagna.
', 'Step 26: Sprinkle with remaining Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 27: Place lasagna dish onto a foil-lined baking sheet (to catch any spills).
', 'Step 28: Bake in preheated oven until the noodles have softened, and the white sauce has turned bubbly and golden brown, about 30 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '856.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '93.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '103.3 mg', 'fatContent': '37 g', 'fiberContent': '9.8 g', 'proteinContent': '43.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '17.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '1004 mg', 'sugarContent': '15 g'}

Title: Pan-Seared Marinated Pork Cutlets with a Parmesan-Garlic Crust
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ cup lemon juice', '2 teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 pound pork tenderloin, thinly sliced crosswise', '¼ cup dry bread crumbs', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 cloves garlic, chopped, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '1 sprig fresh parsley, or as desired']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk 3 tablespoons olive oil, lemon juice, Italian seasoning, kosher salt, and black pepper together in a bowl; transfer to a large resealable bag.
', 'Step 2: Place pork pieces in marinade and turn to coat.
', 'Step 3: Marinate in refrigerator for 4 to 8 hours.
', 'Step 4: Mix bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and 1 tablespoon olive oil in a small bowl.
', "Step 5: Set oven rack about 5 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 6: Heat canola oil in a large, heavy, oven-safe skillet, such as a cast-iron skillet, over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Remove pork from marinade and reserve the marinade.
', 'Step 8: Sear marinated pork pieces in the hot oil just until lightly browned but still pink in the center, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Turn pork over and pour in reserved marinade.
', 'Step 10: Turn heat to high and cook pork for 1 more minute.
', 'Step 11: Spoon crust mixture over cutlets in skillet and broil in the preheated oven until the crust is crisp and golden brown, 1 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Garnish with parsley.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '305.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '53.3 mg', 'fatContent': '21.3 g', 'fiberContent': '1 g', 'proteinContent': '20.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '648.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.9 g'}

Title: Ma Bethie's Zucchini Bake
Ingredients: ['3 zucchini, thinly sliced or shredded', '1 cup all-purpose biscuit baking mix', '4 eggs, beaten', '½ cup butter, melted', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup shredded mozzarella or Cheddar cheese', '½ cup chopped onion', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 C).
', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, toss zucchini with baking mix until well coated.
', 'Step 3: Add beaten eggs, melted butter, and Parmesan and mozzarella cheeses.
', 'Step 4: Using a large spoon or your hands, work mixture together until well blended.
', 'Step 5: Add onion, garlic, oregano, parsley, salt, and pepper, and mix again.
', 'Step 6: Spread mixture into a 13x9 inch baking pan.
', 'Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean and top is golden brown.
', 'Step 8: Serve warm or at room temperature.
']

Title: Rigatoni With Eggplant, Peppers, and Tomatoes
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 eggplants, diced with skin', '1 red bell pepper, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '6 tomatoes - peeled, seeded, and chopped', '1 sprig fresh thyme, chopped', '1 pound rigatoni pasta', '12 basil leaves, chopped', '12 black olives, sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook the diced eggplant in the hot oil, stirring frequently, until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the red pepper and garlic; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the chopped tomatoes, and bring to a simmer; season with fresh thyme, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until the tomatoes have reduced slightly, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: bring a large pot of lightly-salted water to a boil; stir in the rigatoni and cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until tender but still firm to the bite, about 13 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain and return to the pot.
', 'Step 10: Stir the eggplant mixture into the pasta along with the basil and olives.
', 'Step 11: Spoon the tomato sauce overtop to serve.
']

']

Title: Nonna's Italian Crostoli
Ingredients: ['12 eggs', '¼ cup water', '1 teaspoon almond flavoring', '1 pinch salt', '8 cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed', '1 ¼ cups oil for frying, or as needed', '3 cups white sugar', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 drop green food coloring', 'red food coloring']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Beat eggs, water, and almond flavoring together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Add salt; gradually stir in flour to make a stiff dough.
', 'Step 3: Knead the dough until it can be rolled out very thinly.
', 'Step 4: Split dough into fist-sized balls; roll out into thin strips using a pasta machine.
', 'Step 5: Cut dough strips into triangles.
', 'Step 6: Divide sugar among 3 bowls.
', 'Step 7: Add cinnamon to one bowl, green food coloring to the next, and red food coloring to the last.
', 'Step 8: Stir to evenly distribute the additions.
', 'Step 9: Heat oil in a skillet over high heat.
', 'Step 10: Place the dough triangles into the hot oil.
', 'Step 11: Fry, turning until golden brown on both sides, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 12: Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate and immediately sprinkle both sides with one of the sugar toppings.
']
