Title: Aglio e Olio alla Fremont
Ingredients: ['½ cup hazelnuts', '½ pound spaghetti', '⅓ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed', '2 jarred pepperoncini peppers, sliced', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '¼ cup sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, sliced', '1 teaspoon anchovy paste', '¼ cup Marsala wine', '8 large Kalamata olives']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spread hazelnuts onto a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Bake in the preheated oven until hazelnuts become fragrant, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Allow hazelnuts to cool completely on baking sheet.
', 'Step 5: Rub cooled hazelnuts between your palms to remove the bitter paper-like skins.
', 'Step 6: Transfer hazelnuts to a resealable bag and close.
', 'Step 7: Crush nuts using a rolling pin.
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain.
', 'Step 11: Pour enough olive oil into a skillet over medium heat to coat the bottom; cook and stir pepperoncini peppers and garlic in the hot oil until garlic is golden, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Add sun-dried tomatoes, hazelnuts, and anchovy paste; cook and stir until warmed, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Transfer spaghetti to the hazelnut mixture; add Marsala wine.
', 'Step 14: Toss mixture in skillet over medium heat until evenly combined and wine is slightly evaporated, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Split spaghetti mixture onto 2 plates; top with olives.
']

Title: Bucatini alla Gricia
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package bucatini pasta', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '10 ounces guanciale (cured pork cheek), cut into strips', '4 tablespoons finely grated Pecorino Romano cheese, or more to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 2: Cook bucatini in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until almost tender yet still pretty firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes.

Title: Chicken Florentine Artichoke Bake
Ingredients: ['6 ounces farfalle (bow tie) pasta', '1 ½ heads broccoli, cut into bite-sized pieces', '3 tablespoons butter, divided', '1 small red onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, or more to taste, minced', '2 cups baby spinach leaves', '1 ½ cups shredded cooked chicken', '½ cup sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, drained and chopped', '1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and quartered', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded Italian cheese blend', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '1 ½ cups milk, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add broccoli and cook for 2 more minutes; pasta will be slightly undercooked.
', 'Step 5: While the pasta is cooking, melt 1 tablespoon butter in a skillet over medium heat; stir in onion and garlic.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Transfer to a large bowl.
', 'Step 8: Drain pasta and broccoli.
', 'Step 9: Run under cold water and drain again.
', 'Step 10: Add to the onion mixture along with spinach, cooked chicken, sun-dried tomatoes, artichoke hearts, and Italian cheese.
', 'Step 11: Melt remaining 2 tablespoons butter in a medium skillet over medium heat until bubbly.
', 'Step 12: Slowly whisk in flour; cook and whisk for 1 minute.
', 'Step 13: Gradually add milk, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 14: Add enough milk to thin the sauce enough so it will coat all ingredients in the bowl; it will thicken more in the oven.
', 'Step 15: Pour sauce into the bowl and mix until well combined.
', 'Step 16: Transfer contents to a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over top.
', 'Step 18: Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until hot and bubbly, 20 to 30 minutes.
']

Title: Raw Pasta Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tomatoes, chopped', '¼ cup chopped green bell pepper', '¼ cup chopped onion', '1 ½ teaspoons lime juice', '1 clove garlic, minced', '⅛ teaspoon sea salt', '⅛ teaspoon dried oregano', '⅛ teaspoon dried rosemary']

', 'Step 2: Transfer to a lidded 2-cup container.

Title: Herbed Italian Loaf
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 ½ cups high-gluten bread flour', '1 tablespoon active dry yeast', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '2 tablespoons water', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds, toasted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place warm water, sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, flour and yeast in the pan of the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer.
', 'Step 2: Select dough cycle; press Start.
', "Step 3: Most machines have a 'beep' toward the end of their cycle that allows you to add additional ingredients.
", 'Step 4: Sprinkle in oregano and basil at this time.
', "Step 5: When machine's Dough cycle has ended, turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and shape into an oval or round loaf.
", 'Step 6: Place loaf on a baking sheet that has been well greased with olive oil.
', 'Step 7: Cover with a damp towel and let rise in warm place until doubled, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 8: Meanwhile, preheat oven to 400 degrees.
', 'Step 9: In a small bowl, mix 2 tablespoons water with 1/4 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 10: Cut three slits on top of bread.
', 'Step 11: Brush entire loaf with salt water mixture and sprinkle with toasted sesame seeds.
', 'Step 12: Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, until golden and bottom of loaf sounds hollow when tapped.
', 'Step 13: This bread will be hard when it comes out of the oven.
', 'Step 14: Let sit 10 minutes to soften before cutting.
']

Title: Stinging Nettle Pesto

Title: Pan-Fried Chicken With Spinach and Pine Nuts
Ingredients: ['1 cup brown rice', '2 cups water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, pounded 1/2-inch thick', 'coarse salt to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 bunch fresh spinach leaves, trimmed and rinsed', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', '2 tablespoons crumbled goat cheese', '½ lemon, juiced']

Title: Chicken Lombardy
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package applewood smoked bacon', '¼ cup brown sugar', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '6 (4 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '¼ cup butter', '½ cup chicken broth', '½ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '2 stalks green onions, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lay bacon strips side by side and slightly overlapping on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Rub brown sugar on bacon until all brown sugar is gone.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until bacon is done, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from the oven and set aside to cool.
', 'Step 6: Increase the oven temperature to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Melt 2 tablespoon butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 9: Add mushrooms and cook, stirring constantly, until just tender, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove from the heat.

', 'Step 12: Place between 2 sheets of heavy-duty plastic wrap and flatten with a meat mallet or rolling pin to a thickness of 1/8 inch.
', 'Step 13: Place flour in a shallow plate and dredge chicken.
', 'Step 14: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large, nonstick skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 15: Working in batches, cook chicken until golden, 3 to 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 16: Transfer to the prepared baking dish and cook remaining chicken, adding more butter as needed.
', 'Step 17: Reserve pan drippings in the skillet.
', 'Step 18: Sprinkle mushrooms evenly over chicken.
', 'Step 19: Add chicken broth to the pan drippings and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 20: Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered and stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 22: Pour sauce over the chicken.
', 'Step 23: Chop bacon and combine with mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, and green onions.
', 'Step 24: Sprinkle over the chicken.
', 'Step 25: Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until cheese melts, 12 to 14 minutes.
']

Title: Lamb Casserole
Ingredients: ['2 sprigs fresh parsley', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 bay leaves', '2 pounds lamb shank, cooked and diced', '1 pound cubed ham steak', '10 small onions', '5 tomatoes - blanched, peeled and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '4 cups chicken stock', '2 (15 ounce) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '6 links pork sausage links, halved']

['Step 1: Tie the sprigs of parsley and thyme together with the bay leaves or place them in a cheesecloth and tie closed, because you will want to easily remove the herbs later.

', 'Step 3: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for about 1 hour.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the beans and sausage and continue to simmer for about 15 minutes, or more if you want a thicker consistency.
']

Title: Summer Sandwich

['Step 1: Preheat broiler.
', 'Step 2: Slice ciabatta bread in half lengthwise.
', 'Step 3: Spread pesto on the cut side of each half.
', 'Step 4: Top bottom half with slices of fontina cheese, and then place slices of tomato on top of cheese.
', 'Step 5: Broil until cheese melts, and remove from broiler.
', 'Step 6: Place lettuce over tomatoes, and then position top half of bread on top of everything.

Title: Patrick's Arrabiata Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 cup olive oil', '¼ cup unsalted light butter', '6 large cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '5 yellow onions, sliced 1/4-inch thick', '1 cup red cooking wine', '15 Italian plum tomatoes, coarsely chopped', '20 leaves fresh basil', '5 tablespoons double concentrated tomato paste', '1 tablespoon smoked paprika', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '2 teaspoons cayenne pepper', '2 teaspoons salt, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place olive oil, butter, and garlic in a large pot; turn heat to high until garlic begins to sizzle, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Turn heat down to medium; stir in onions and cook and stir until onions are translucent, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour wine over onion mixture; simmer until wine is partially evaporated, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: n Place tomatoes and basil in the bowl of a food processor; pulse to blend until tomatoes are chunky.
', 'Step 5: Pour tomatoes into onion mixture; cook, stirring about every 5 minutes, until sauce darkens to a deep red color, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Turn off heat.
', 'Step 7: n Working in batches, pour the sauce into a food processor and blend until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Stir tomato paste, smoked paprika, sugar, and cayenne pepper into tomato mixture; season to taste with salt.
']

', 'Step 2: Add onions and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes.

', 'Step 5: Add onions and stir until well coated with butter.

Title: Spaghetti Risottati alle Vongole
Ingredients: ['8 cups water', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 red Thai chile pepper, seeded and chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 pounds verace clams in shell, scrubbed', '¾ cup white wine', '12 ounces spaghetti', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '½ cup chopped flat-leaf (Italian) parsley', '1 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring water to a boil in a stockpot; add salt.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to a simmer.
', 'Step 3: Heat a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Add oil, followed by chile pepper and garlic.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir gently until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 6: Remove garlic and chile pepper; discard.
', 'Step 7: Add clams to the fragrant oil.
', 'Step 8: Pour wine over the clams and cover immediately.
', 'Step 9: Let simmer until clams have opened, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove clams using a slotted spoon to a large bowl.
', 'Step 11: Cover to avoid losing their steam.
', 'Step 12: Discard any unopened clams.
', 'Step 13: Pour four ladles of salted water into the skillet with the juice of the clams.
', 'Step 14: Bring to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 15: Add spaghetti; move around with a pasta fork to keep from sticking together.
', 'Step 16: Cook, adding a ladle or two of salted water as needed to keep spaghetti barely covered, until pasta is tender yet firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Add clams and sprinkle in lemon zest.
', 'Step 18: Give the skillet a hefty toss to gently mix the clams in the thickened sauce.
', 'Step 19: Divide into four pasta bowls.
', 'Step 20: Cover with parsley and serve immediately with empty plates on the side for the shells while eating.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '422.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '65.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '2.5 mg', 'fatContent': '8.2 g', 'fiberContent': '3.2 g', 'proteinContent': '12.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '1774.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.9 g'}

Title: Lemon-Flavored Italian Ice
Ingredients: ['2 cups water', '½ cup cane sugar', '1 cup light corn syrup', '⅔ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine water and sugar in a saucepan and bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat and stir in light corn syrup and lemon juice.
', 'Step 4: Allow to cool to room temperature, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Divide cooled mixture amongst 3 plastic containers and freeze for 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Scrape ice crystals with a fork and return to freezer until ice is semi-frozen, 1 to 2 hours, scraping ice crystals every 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Scoop Italian ice into small serving cups or cones and serve.
']

Title: Pignoli Cookies I
Ingredients: ['12 ounces almond paste', '½ cup white sugar', "1 cup confectioners' sugar", '4 egg whites', '1 ½ cups pine nuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line 2 cookie sheets with foil; lightly grease foil.
', 'Step 3: Mix almond paste and granulated sugar in food processor until smooth.
', "Step 4: Add confectioners' sugar and 2 egg whites; process until smooth.
", 'Step 5: Whisk remaining 2 egg whites in small bowl.
', 'Step 6: Place pine nuts on shallow plate.
', 'Step 7: With lightly floured hands, roll dough into 1 inch balls.
', 'Step 8: Coat balls in egg whites, shaking off excess, then roll in pine nuts, pressing lightly to stick.
', 'Step 9: Arrange balls on cookie sheets, and flatten slightly to form a 1 1/2 inch round.
', 'Step 10: Bake 15 to 18 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned.
', 'Step 11: Let stand on cookie sheet 1 minute.
', 'Step 12: Transfer to wire rack to cool.
']

Title: Italian Pine Nut Cookies
Ingredients: ['1 cup pine nuts', '1 cup white sugar', '11 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature', '3 large eggs', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder, or as needed', '4 cups crushed corn flakes', "1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar, or as needed"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Heat a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir pine nuts in the hot skillet until toasted and fragrant, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Beat white sugar and butter together in a large bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 6: Beat eggs, 1 at a time, into creamed butter mixture, beating well after each addition.
', 'Step 7: Whisk flour and baking powder in a separate bowl; stir into creamed butter mixture until dough is just mixed.
', 'Step 8: Fold pine nuts into dough.
', 'Step 9: Spread corn flakes into a shallow baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Form dough into balls, about 1 tablespoon per cookie; roll each in the corn flakes, pressing gently to coat.
', 'Step 11: Arrange cookies, 1-inch apart, on the prepared baking sheets.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 23 minutes.
', "Step 13: Cool cookies on the baking sheets and dust with confectioners' sugar.
"]

Title: Pumpkin-Coffee Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['2 cups heavy cream, divided', '1 (8 ounce) container mascarpone cheese', '1 cup unsweetened pumpkin puree', '½ cup Sugar In The Raw®', '1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice', '2 tablespoons Sugar In The Raw®, divided', '¾ cup brewed coffee', '3 tablespoons dark rum', '2 (3.5 ounce) packages ladyfingers', '2 ounces shaved white chocolate']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl or a stand mixer fitted with the whisk, combine 1 1/2 cups cream, mascarpone, pumpkin, 1/2 cup sugar, and pumpkin spice.
', 'Step 2: Beat on high speed with a hand mixer or on medium-high speed in the stand mixer until stiffly whipped.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl, beat remaining 1/2 cup heavy cream with 1 tablespoon sugar until stiffly whipped.
', 'Step 4: In a small bowl, stir together coffee, rum, and remaining 1 tablespoon sugar.
', 'Step 5: Have ready 6 approximately 4-inch wide cups or ramekins.
', 'Step 6: Dip ladyfingers in coffee mixture and line cups or ramekins with a single layer.
', 'Step 7: Depending on size of cups or ramekins, ladyfingers may need to be cut shorter with a serrated knife.
', 'Step 8: Top with a layer of pumpkin mixture.
', 'Step 9: Top with another layer of soaked ladyfingers and another layer of pumpkin mixture.
', 'Step 10: Top each serving with a generous spoonful of the whipped cream and sprinkle with white chocolate.
', 'Step 11: Serve immediately or refrigerate, covered, up to 1 day.
']

Title: Tortiera di Alici (Italian Baked Anchovies)
Ingredients: ['1 pound fresh anchovies, rinsed', '2 cups white vinegar', '7 ounces dried bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons capers, minced', '2 tablespoons minced Italian parsley', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Slice open the bottom of each anchovy and pull out the bone.
', 'Step 2: Open each fillet as you would a book and arrange in the bottom of a shallow dish.
', 'Step 3: Pour white vinegar on top.
', 'Step 4: Marinate in the refrigerator for 2 hours.
', 'Step 5: Drain and discard the vinegar.
', 'Step 6: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Brush a baking dish lightly with olive oil.
', 'Step 8: Mix bread crumbs, capers, parsley, and garlic together in a bowl.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle some of the bread crumb mixture into the bottom of the baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Arrange some anchovies in a single layer in the baking dish, still open like a book.
', 'Step 11: Brush lightly with olive oil; cover with some of the bread crumb mixture.
', 'Step 12: Repeat layers with remaining anchovies, olive oil, and bread crumb mixture.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until top is crispy and lightly browned, about 20 minutes.
']

Title: Pumpkin Seed Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 cup raw pumpkin seeds', '1 tablespoon cayenne pepper', '3 pounds roma (plum) tomatoes, halved', '2 bunches green onions, cut into 1/2-inch pieces', '6 cloves garlic, chopped', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 (10 ounce) package goat cheese', '1 (16 ounce) package gemelli pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spread pumpkin seeds in a single layer on a cookie sheet.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle the seeds with cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 4: Roast in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Watch them carefully so that they do not burn.
', 'Step 6: Set aside.
', 'Step 7: Place the tomatoes in a single layer on a cookie sheet.
', 'Step 8: Scatter the green onion and garlic over the tomatoes.
', 'Step 9: Drizzle the vegetables with olive oil to coat.
', 'Step 10: Roast in the preheated oven 45 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove from oven and cool slightly; remove the skins from the tomatoes.
', 'Step 12: Meanwhile, fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 13: Once the water is boiling, stir in the gemelli, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 14: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 16: Stir the goat cheese into the hot pasta until melted.
', 'Step 17: Then, stir in the roasted peeled tomatoes.
', 'Step 18: Place the pumpkin seeds on top of pasta to serve.
']

Title: Mushroom Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package uncooked lasagna noodles', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (16 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '2 cups chopped baby bella mushrooms', '1 large sweet onion, chopped', '½ cup minced fresh parsley', '2 thin slices prosciutto, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 ½ teaspoons Italian seasoning', '⅔ cup dry white wine', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes, drained', '1 cup shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese, divided', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '½ cup heavy cream', '¼ cup milk']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x13-inch baking pan.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook 9 lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain.
', 'Step 6: While the noodles are cooking, heat oil in a Dutch oven over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add both mushrooms and onion; cook and stir until tender, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add parsley, prosciutto, garlic, and Italian seasoning; cook for 2 minutes longer.
', 'Step 9: Add wine; cook and stir until liquid has evaporated, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add tomatoes and cook until heated through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Spread sauce in the bottom of the prepared pan.
', 'Step 12: Layer with 3 noodles, 1 1/3 cups sauce, and a scant amount of mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses.
', 'Step 13: Repeat with the next 2 layers.

', 'Step 15: Spoon over lasagna.
', 'Step 16: Cover and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Uncover and bake until cheese is melted, about 10 minutes longer.
', 'Step 18: Let stand 10 minutes before cutting.
']

Title: Kahala's Shrimp and Broccoli Toss
Ingredients: ['1 bunch broccoli florets', '1 (16 ounce) package uncooked angel hair pasta', '¼ cup margarine', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ medium chopped onion', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '1 pound small frozen shrimp, thawed', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese']

Title: Skillet Lasagna Dip with Pasta Chips
Ingredients: ['9 ounces lasagna noodles', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '8 ounces 93% lean ground beef', '8 ounces hot Italian pork sausage, casing removed', '1 cup finely chopped yellow onion', '6 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 (16 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '½ cup whole-milk ricotta cheese', '¼ cup prepared basil pesto', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '½ cup vegetable oil for frying, or as needed', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain, rinse with cold water, and drain again.
', 'Step 5: Lay each noodle flat on a rimmed baking sheet and thoroughly pat dry with a paper towel.
', 'Step 6: Set aside.
', 'Step 7: Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a large cast iron skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 8: Add ground beef and sausage; cook, stirring often and breaking up with a wooden spoon, until browned, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate and wipe out the pan.
', 'Step 10: Add remaining 1 teaspoon olive oil and onion and cook until softened, about 2 more minutes.
', 'Step 11: Add garlic and Italian seasoning; cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 12: Stir in marinara sauce and cooked meats and remove from heat.
', 'Step 13: Dollop with ricotta cheese and pesto.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle with mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and bubbly, 12 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Let sit for 15 minutes before serving.
', 'Step 17: While dip sits, pour vegetable oil to a depth of 3 inches into a Dutch oven; heat over high heat to reach 360 degrees F (182 degrees C).
', 'Step 18: Cut each lasagna noodle into desired shapes.
', 'Step 19: Add 8 to 10 pasta pieces, one at a time to avoid them sticking together, and cook, lightly tapping under the oil and stirring with a spider tool occasionally, until golden brown and crispy, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Remove using a spider or tongs to a paper towel-lined sheet tray, and sprinkle with salt.
', 'Step 21: Repeat with remaining pasta pieces, allowing oil temperature to reach back to 360 degrees F (182 degrees C) before adding the next batch.
', 'Step 22: Sprinkle dip with parsley and basil and serve with hot pasta chips.
']

Title: Cheater's Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['1 (16.25 ounce) package white cake mix', '1 ¼ cups water', '⅓ cup vegetable oil', '3 large eggs', '1 pint heavy whipping cream', '¼ cup white sugar', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract, or to taste', '12 fluid ounces brewed coffee, chilled', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease the bottom only of a 9x13-inch glass baking pan.
', 'Step 3: Combine cake mix, water, oil and eggs in a large bowl with a mixer on medium speed until well combined.
', 'Step 4: Pour into the prepared pan.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 29 to 34 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from the oven and let cool completely, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Poke 12 holes in the cooled cake with the base of a serving spoon or any utensil that has a rounded bottom.
', "Step 8: Whip whipping cream, adding sugar and vanilla when it's about halfway whipped; you want it to hold its shape, but don't overwhip.
", 'Step 9: Pour coffee over the cake, then immediately spread whipped cream evenly over top.
', 'Step 10: Dust with cocoa powder, covering it completely.
', 'Step 11: Cut and serve or chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve.
']

Title: Stuffed Chicken Parmesan Sub
Ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '2 cups Italian-style salad dressing', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 ½ cups milk', '1 egg', '3 cups Italian-seasoned bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons butter, divided, or as needed', '10 slices prosciutto, chopped into chunks', '4 cups marinara sauce', 'canola oil as needed', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, or more to taste', '4 Italian sub rolls', '8 slices provolone cheese', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Slice each chicken breast down the center to make 4 cutlets.
', 'Step 2: Place each between 2 pieces of plastic wrap and pound to about 1/2 inch thinness with a meat mallet.
', 'Step 3: Marinate chicken breasts in Italian dressing in the refrigerator overnight.
', 'Step 4: Remove chicken to bring to room temperature 1 hour before cooking.
', 'Step 5: Combine flour and baking powder in one bowl, milk and egg in another bowl, and bread crumbs in a third bowl.
', 'Step 6: Set aside.
', 'Step 7: Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Cook prosciutto in the hot butter until it starts to brown, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.
', 'Step 10: Bring marinara sauce to a simmer in a saucepan.
', 'Step 11: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Lay chicken cutlets out flat.
', 'Step 14: Line 1/4 of mozzarella cheese down the center of each and sprinkle 1/4 of prosciutto over cheese.
', 'Step 15: Fold cutlets in half over the stuffing and secure edges together with toothpicks.
', 'Step 16: Dunk rolled chicken into the flour mixture, then egg mixture, and finally bread crumbs.
', 'Step 17: Drop chicken into the preheated fryer and cook until crumbs are golden brown, chicken floats, and is no longer pink in the center, 6 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to let grease run off.
', 'Step 19: Cut sub rolls down the centers and spread remaining butter into interiors.
', 'Step 20: Assemble sandwiches in the following manner: bottom sub half, chicken cutlet, marinara, provolone cheese, Parmesan cheese, and top sub half.
', 'Step 21: Transfer subs to a baking pan.
', 'Step 22: Toast in the preheated oven until bread is crisp and cheeses are melted, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Serve hot.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '1103.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '109.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '106 mg', 'fatContent': '54 g', 'fiberContent': '7.1 g', 'proteinContent': '43.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '17.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '3562.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '20.4 g'}

Title: Gingerbread Pizzelle
Ingredients: ['4 cups whole wheat flour', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '½ teaspoon ground allspice', '½ teaspoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup butter', '1 cup white sugar', '½ cup brown sugar', '¼ cup molasses', '1 teaspoon grated orange zest', '6 medium eggs']
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: Preheat pizzelle baker according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 2: Mix whole wheat flour, baking powder, cinnamon, ginger, allspice, cloves, and black pepper together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 3: Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 5: Stir white sugar, brown sugar, molasses, and orange zest into saucepan until well-combined.
', 'Step 6: Add 1/2 of the flour mixture, stirring until smooth.
', 'Step 7: Add eggs; mix until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Stir in remaining flour mixture, mixing until batter is smooth.
', 'Step 9: Drop spoonfuls of batter onto the preheated pizzelle baker.
', 'Step 10: Bake until browned, about 1 1/2 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '85.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '12.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '26.7 mg', 'fatContent': '3.7 g', 'fiberContent': '1 g', 'proteinContent': '1.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '62.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.9 g'}

Title: Taralles Cookies
Ingredients: ['6 eggs', '1 cup vegetable oil', '1 orange, zested and juiced', '1 cup white sugar', '5 cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed', '4 tablespoons baking powder', '1 envelope vanilla powder', '½ cup lemon juice', "2 cups confectioners' sugar"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Beat eggs in a large bowl using an electric mixer until fluffy.
', 'Step 4: Add oil, orange zest, and juice; mix well.
', 'Step 5: Beat in sugar slowly.
', 'Step 6: Combine flour, baking powder, and vanilla powder in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 7: Slowly add to the egg mixture, 1 cup at a time, mixing well after each addition.
', 'Step 8: Beat until almost blended; mix the rest by hand.
', 'Step 9: Roll dough into 2 ropes; cut into 3- to 4-inch pieces.
', 'Step 10: Twist 2 pieces together or roll individual ropes into circles to make round cookies.
', 'Step 11: Place cookies 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden but cookies are not yet brown, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Let cookies cool completely, at least 30 minutes.
', "Step 14: Meanwhile, slowly mix lemon juice into a bowl of confectioners' sugar to make a runny icing.
", 'Step 15: Line a few trays with waxed paper.
', 'Step 16: Dip cooled cookies into the icing and transfer them onto the trays to harden.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '269.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '40 g', 'cholesterolContent': '46.5 mg', 'fatContent': '10.6 g', 'fiberContent': '0.8 g', 'proteinContent': '4.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '262 mg', 'sugarContent': '19.1 g'}

Title: Instant Pot® Pasta e Fagioli
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon salted butter', '2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil', '½ cup frozen diced carrots', '¼ cup minced shallot', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '3 ounces prosciutto, chopped', '2 ½ cups chicken broth', '1 (14.3 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '½ cup ditalini pasta', '½ sprig fresh rosemary', '1 large California bay leaf', '2 sprigs thyme', '1 teaspoon granulated garlic', '⅛ teaspoon truffle salt', 'cheesecloth', "butcher's twine"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Add butter, olive oil, carrots, shallot, and garlic.
', 'Step 3: Saute for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add prosciutto and saute for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Mix in chicken broth, cannellini beans, and pasta.
', 'Step 6: Prepare a bouquet garni by placing rosemary, bay leaf, and thyme onto a piece of cheesecloth.
', "Step 7: Secure cheesecloth with butcher's twine.
", 'Step 8: Add to the soup.
', 'Step 9: Cancel Saute mode.
', 'Step 10: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 11: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 7 minutes.
", 'Step 12: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 13: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 10 minutes.
", 'Step 14: Release remaining pressure carefully using the quick-release method, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 16: Season soup with garlic granules and truffle salt.
', 'Step 17: Remove bouquet garni prior to serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '285 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '29.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '30.1 mg', 'fatContent': '13 g', 'fiberContent': '5.2 g', 'proteinContent': '11.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '1448.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.2 g'}

Title: Lamb Scallopini with Pepper and Onion Agrodolce
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or more as needed', '⅔ cup diced yellow onion', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '⅓ cup diced Fresno chile pepper', '1 clove garlic, minced', '½ teaspoon dried mint', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, divided, or to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon minced fresh rosemary', '⅓ cup chopped flat-leaf (Italian) parsley', '1 pound boneless lamb top sirloin', 'kosher salt and freshly ground pepper to taste', '½ cup all-purpose flour, or as needed', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil for agrodolce in a pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Saute onion with a pinch of salt in the hot oil until they start to soften up and take on some color, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drizzle in more olive oil if the onions look dry.
', 'Step 4: Add chile peppers and garlic; cook until peppers just start to soften, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add dried mint and 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar; cook, stirring, for exactly 1 minute.
', 'Step 6: Turn off the heat.
', 'Step 7: Transfer to a small bowl and let cool to room temperature, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Meanwhile, cut the lamb into four equal 4-ounce pieces and pound between plastic wrap to about 1/8-inch thick medallions.
', 'Step 9: Trim any easy-to-cut silver skin off if you like.
', 'Step 10: Transfer to a Silpat®-lined baking sheet and season generously with kosher salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Dust both sides of the meat generously with flour using a sifter and let sit for at least 10 minutes before frying.
', 'Step 12: While lamb rests, stir salt and pepper to taste, cayenne, remaining 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil, rosemary, and parsley into the agrodolce mixture.
', 'Step 13: Taste and adjust, adding more salt, oil, and/or vinegar as you see fit.
', 'Step 14: Reserve until needed; keep in fridge if making ahead, but let come to room temperature before serving.
', 'Step 15: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering, but not quite smoking.
', 'Step 16: Pan-fry the lamb medallions until browned, about 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 17: They are very thin, so be careful not to overcook.
', 'Step 18: Serve immediately topped with the agrodolce.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '947 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '35.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '134.5 mg', 'fatContent': '72.1 g', 'fiberContent': '2.5 g', 'proteinContent': '38.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '18.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '398.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.7 g'}

Title: Italian Chicken with Pesto Potatoes
Ingredients: ['¾ cup balsamic vinegar', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '4 ½ ounces sliced mozzarella cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 slices Parma ham', '1 pint cherry tomatoes', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pound small potatoes', '2 tablespoons prepared basil pesto']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a saucepan, bring the vinegar to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat, and simmer 15 minutes, stirring frequently, until thickened.
', 'Step 4: Cut a pocket in each chicken breast.
', 'Step 5: Fill each pocket with an equal amount of mozzarella cheese, and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Wrap each chicken breast with a slice of ham.
', 'Step 7: Arrange the wrapped chicken breasts in a baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Place the tomatoes around the chicken, sprinkle all with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Bake 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear.
', 'Step 10: In a saucepan with enough lightly salted water to cover, boil the potatoes 15 minutes, or until tender.
', 'Step 11: Drain, return to the pan, and coat with the pesto.
', 'Step 12: Place chicken breasts, tomatoes, and potatoes on serving plates, and drizzle with the reduced balsamic vinegar to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '472.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '31.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '115.4 mg', 'fatContent': '18.8 g', 'fiberContent': '3.5 g', 'proteinContent': '44.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '1176.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.9 g'}

Title: Gnocchi Alla Romana (Baked Semolina Gnocchi)
Ingredients: ['1 quart milk', '5 tablespoons butter, divided', 'salt to taste', '1 ½ cups fine semolina flour', '2 egg yolks', '1 ¼ cups grated Grana Padano cheese, divided', '⅓ cup grated Gruyere cheese', '1 (3 ounce) package pancetta bacon, diced', '1 pinch ground nutmeg, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine milk, 1/4 cup butter, and a pinch of salt in a saucepan; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Whisk semolina into boiling milk, mixing well to prevent lumps.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat and cook, stirring often, until thickened, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove saucepan from heat.
', 'Step 5: Add egg yolks, 1 cup Grana Padano, and Gruyere cheese; stir well.
', 'Step 6: Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat; cook and stir pancetta until crisp, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir pancetta into semolina mixture.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Grease 2 baking sheets with 1 1/2 teaspoon butter.
', 'Step 10: Spread semolina mixture onto 1 of the prepared baking sheets, about 1/2-inch thick.
', 'Step 11: Allow to cool to room temperature, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Cut small disks out of cooled semolina using a juice glass or cookie cutter.
', 'Step 13: Place the disks onto the other prepared baking sheet, slightly overlapping the disks.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle the remaining Grana Padano cheese over disks and dot with remaining 1 1/2 teaspoon butter.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until gnocchi are nicely crisp and golden, about 20 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '422.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '13 g', 'cholesterolContent': '189.8 mg', 'fatContent': '31.6 g', 'fiberContent': '0.1 g', 'proteinContent': '21.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '18.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '789 mg', 'sugarContent': '11.8 g'}

Title: Chocolate Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['6 egg yolks', '¾ cup white sugar', '⅓ cup evaporated milk', '⅓ cup chocolate milk', '½ cup heavy whipping cream', "3 tablespoons confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 (8 ounce) container mascarpone cheese', '½ cup strong brewed coffee, room temperature', '1 ½ teaspoons coconut-flavored rum (such as Malibu®)', '1 ½ teaspoons coffee-flavored liqueur (such as Kahlua®)', '10 ladyfingers, split lengthwise', '1 tablespoon Marsala wine (such as Cremovo®)', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon 70% cacao chocolate shavings']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk together egg yolks and white sugar in a saucepan off heat until well blended.
', 'Step 2: Whisk in evaporated milk and chocolate milk; place pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Stir constantly until boiling, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Boil for 1 minute; remove from heat and cool slightly.
', 'Step 5: Cover tightly with plastic wrap; chill in refrigerator for 1 hour.
', "Step 6: Beat heavy cream, confectioners' sugar, and vanilla extract together in a bowl until stiff peaks form.
", 'Step 7: Remove yolk mixture from refrigerator; whisk in mascarpone until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Combine coffee, coconut-flavored rum, and coffee-flavored liqueur in a small bowl.
', 'Step 9: Place ladyfingers in a bowl; drizzle coffee mixture over ladyfingers.
', 'Step 10: Arrange half of the soaked ladyfingers in the bottom of a 9x5-inch baking pan.
', 'Step 11: Spread half the mascarpone mixture over ladyfingers, then half the whipped cream.
', 'Step 12: Repeat with remaining ladyfingers and whipped cream; end with a layer of mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle the tiramisu with cocoa powder and chocolate shavings.
', 'Step 14: Cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate until set, 4 to 6 hours.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '462.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '47.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '291.2 mg', 'fatContent': '26.7 g', 'fiberContent': '0.7 g', 'proteinContent': '9.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '13.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '100.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '24.4 g'}

Title: Sesame Seed Cookies III
Ingredients: ['3 cups all-purpose flour', '¾ cup white sugar', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup unsalted butter, softened', '¼ cup shortening', '2 eggs, beaten', '¼ cup milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '¼ cup milk', '¾ cup sesame seeds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease cookie sheets.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.
', 'Step 4: Blend in butter and shortening until the mixture resembles coarse meal.
', 'Step 5: Make a well in the center and add eggs, 1/4 cup of milk and vanilla.
', 'Step 6: Mix until a soft dough forms.
', 'Step 7: Divide the dough into 4 pieces.
', 'Step 8: Roll each piece out into a long snake 1/2 inch in diameter.
', 'Step 9: Cut snakes into 2 inch pieces.
', 'Step 10: Dip each piece in remaining milk, then roll in sesame seeds.
', 'Step 11: Place 1 inch apart onto the prepared cookie sheets.
', 'Step 12: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown.
', 'Step 13: Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Creamy Chicken Marsala Florentine
Ingredients: ['¼ cup all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons butter', '1 cup small fresh mushrooms, stems removed', '¼ cup diced onion', '½ cup Marsala wine', '½ cup water', '⅓ cup sun-dried tomatoes', '1 cube porcini-flavored bouillon', '2 cups firmly packed spinach leaves', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '2 tablespoons water', '½ tablespoon potato starch', '¼ cup half-and-half']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix together flour, oregano, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Dust chicken slices with flour mixture and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 4: Add olive oil and allow to get hot.
', 'Step 5: Add chicken and fry until nicely browned, about 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Remove to a plate.
', 'Step 7: Add butter and allow to melt.
', 'Step 8: Stir in mushroom caps and onions; cook for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Mix in wine, water, sun-dried tomatoes, and bouillon cube.
', 'Step 10: Bring to a simmer and turn off Saute mode.
', 'Step 11: Place chicken pieces on top of the sauce in the pot.
', 'Step 12: Layer spinach on top of the chicken.
', 'Step 13: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 14: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 4 minutes.
", 'Step 15: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', 'Step 16: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 17: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Drain.
', "Step 19: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 20: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 21: Open lid and remove chicken to a plate.
', 'Step 22: Make a slurry by mixing water with potato starch.
', 'Step 23: Mix slurry into the Marsala sauce.
', 'Step 24: Set mode to Saute, and bring sauce to a simmer.
', 'Step 25: Whisk until sauce is thickened then turn Saute mode off.
', 'Step 26: Stir in half-and-half until sauce is golden and creamy.
', 'Step 27: Distribute spaghetti amongst 4 plates, ladle sauce on top of the noodles and place chicken onto pasta.
']

Title: Cheesy Chicken Lombardy
Ingredients: ['½ cup all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon garlic and herb seasoning blend (such as Mrs. Dash®)', '8 (4 ounce) boneless skinless chicken breast halves, pounded to 1/4-inch thickness', '6 tablespoons salted butter, or as needed', '1 cup sliced mushrooms', '½ cup Marsala wine', '⅓ cup chicken broth', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste', '½ cup mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x13-inch baking pan.
', 'Step 3: Combine flour and seasoning in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 4: Dredge chicken pieces lightly in the flour mixture.
', 'Step 5: Melt 2 tablespoons of butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 6: Add chicken breasts in batches, 4 pieces at a time, and brown for, 3 to 4 minutes on each side, adding more butter as needed.
', 'Step 7: Transfer browned chicken to the prepared baking pan.
', 'Step 8: Heat remaining 4 tablespoons butter in the same skillet and saute mushrooms until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle evenly over the chicken.
', 'Step 10: Pour wine and chicken broth into the pan drippings in the skillet, scraping up all the browned bits with a spoon.
', 'Step 11: Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer liquid for 10 minutes over low heat.
', 'Step 12: Spoon sauce evenly over chicken.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove chicken from the oven.
', 'Step 15: Combine Parmesan cheese and mozzarella cheese in a bowl and evenly sprinkle over chicken.
', 'Step 16: Return to the oven and bake until cheese is melted and chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 17: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Baked Polenta with Sausage
Ingredients: ['3 cups water', '1 cup milk', '9 ¼ ounces instant polenta', '½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 (3.5 ounce) links sweet Italian sausage, casings removed', '1 cup sliced mushrooms', '½ cup chopped onions', '3 cloves garlic, diced', '1 ½ cups dry white wine', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']

', 'Step 5: Pour polenta into a large, round casserole dish, filling about 1 inch deep.

', 'Step 9: Pour tomato sauce mixture over polenta.
', 'Step 10: Top with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 20 minutes.
']

Title: Pasta Sauce - Vegan
Ingredients: ['¼ cup chopped celery', '¼ cup chopped green bell pepper', '¼ cup chopped red bell pepper', '¼ cup chopped yellow bell pepper', '¼ cup chopped carrot', '2 tablespoons basil, or to taste', '2 tablespoons oregano, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon thyme, or to taste', '1 tablespoon salt, or to taste', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ cup chopped white onion', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '20 ripe tomatoes - peeled, seeded, and chopped', '½ cup red wine, divided', '2 tablespoons cornstarch']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix celery, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, carrot, basil, oregano, thyme, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl until the vegetables are evenly coated in seasonings.
', 'Step 2: n Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir onion and garlic in hot oil until onion is soft and garlic is light golden brown, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add vegetable mixture to the skillet; cook and stir until hot, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove skillet from heat.
', 'Step 6: n Combine tomatoes and 1/4 cup red wine in a large pot over low heat.
', 'Step 7: Cook, stirring occasionally, until the tomatoes begin to soften, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: n Pour tomato mixture into a blender with remaining 1/4 cup red wine and cornstarch to no more than half full.
', 'Step 9: Cover and hold lid down; pulse a few times before leaving on to blend.
', 'Step 10: Puree in batches until smooth.
', 'Step 11: n Return blended tomatoes to pot over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 12: Stir vegetable mixture through tomato sauce; bring to a simmer and cook until thick, about 1 hour.
']

Title: Basic Italian Biscotti
Ingredients: ['5 cups all-purpose flour', "1 ½ cups sifted confectioners' sugar", '2 tablespoons baking powder', '1 cup shortening', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Sift flour and measure.
', 'Step 2: Resift with sugar and baking powder onto a flat surface.
', 'Step 3: Cut shortening into dry ingredients until mixture resembles coarse cornmeal.
', 'Step 4: Make a well in flour and break eggs into it.
', 'Step 5: Add vanilla, and knead dough well for about 5 minutes until it is smooth, adding a little more flour if dough seems to soft and sticky.
', 'Step 6: Pinch off bits of dough about the size of an apricot, and form into desired shapes.
', 'Step 7: Cookies may be baked as rings, strips, or in letters, such as S. Place 1 inch apart on greased cookie sheet and bake in hot 450 degree F (230 degrees C) oven for 10 minutes, until golden brown.
', 'Step 8: Watch carefully, because they burn easily.
']

Title: Butternut Squash Soup With Sage and Sausage
Ingredients: ['½ pound spicy bulk breakfast sausage', '8 fresh sage leaves', '1 pound butternut squash, peeled and chopped', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '2 small carrots, chopped', '1 small onion, chopped', '¼ cup sherry', '3 cups chicken broth', '1 cup beef broth', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '¼ teaspoon pumpkin pie spice', '¼ cup half-and-half', 'freshly ground black pepper, or to taste', '4 teaspoons sour cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook and stir pork sausage in a large heavy pot or Dutch oven over medium heat until sausage is browned and crisp, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Remove sausage with a slotted spoon, leaving drippings in the pot.
', 'Step 3: Brown the sage leaves in the hot drippings until crisp, about 30 seconds; remove sage leaves and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Cook butternut squash, celery, carrots, and onion in the remaining sausage drippings until the vegetables are softened, stirring only one time after about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour sherry into the pot and stir to dissolve any browned bits of food on the bottom of the pot.
', 'Step 6: Pour in chicken and beef broth and stir in brown sugar and pumpkin pie spice.
', 'Step 7: Bring the soup to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer until squash is tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Puree soup with an immersion blender, leaving a few chunks of vegetables.
', 'Step 9: Pour in half-and-half and season with black pepper.
', 'Step 10: Divide soup into 4 large bowls and top each serving with 1 teaspoon sour cream, cooked sausage, and 2 fried sage leaves.
']

Title: One-Pot Tortellini and Sausage
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound spicy Italian sausage, casings removed, crumbled', '3 cups spaghetti sauce', '½ cup water', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 (20 ounce) package fresh cheese tortellini', '1 cup mozzarella cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

', 'Step 2: Add crumbled sausage.

', 'Step 4: Stir in spaghetti sauce, water, and Italian seasoning.

', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until tortellini are tender, about 8 minutes.

", 'Step 9: Remove skillet from heat.

']

Title: Tennille's Italian Pasta Salad
Ingredients: ['1 cup fresh broccoli florets', '1 cup fresh cauliflower florets', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (32 ounce) package seashell pasta', '1 (16 ounce) bottle Italian-style salad dressing', '1 cup shredded carrots', '2 cucumbers, diced', '3 tomatoes, diced', '8 ounces shredded Cheddar cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Steam broccoli and cauliflower florets until tender.
', 'Step 2: Place broccoli and cauliflower in a large bowl, toss with butter and salt.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the macaroni and return the water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Let cook until the noodles are al dente, drain well.
', 'Step 6: In a large mixing bowl, mix the Italian dressing with the hot macaroni.
', 'Step 7: Next, mix in the carrots, cucumbers, tomatoes, broccoli, and cauliflower.
', 'Step 8: Cover the bowl and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: After the pasta and vegetables have been chilling for 30 minutes, stir in the cheese.
', 'Step 10: Return the bowl to the refrigerator for another 30 to 45 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Taco Pie Pizza
Ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 cup yellow cornmeal', '½ cup sugar', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 cup milk', '¼ cup vegetable oil', '1 egg, beaten', '2 cups shredded Mexican cheese blend, divided', '1 (16 ounce) can refried beans', '½ cup mayonnaise', '¼ cup blue cheese salad dressing', '1 (15 ounce) can turkey chili without beans', '2 cups shredded iceberg lettuce', '1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, drained']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a medium bowl, mix together the flour, cornmeal, sugar and baking powder.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the milk, oil and eggs, mixing until just moist.
', 'Step 4: Spread in a greased 12 inch deep-dish pizza pan, or a 10x15 inch baking pan.
', 'Step 5: Bake the crust for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from the oven, and sprinkle with 1 cup of the cheese.
', 'Step 7: Bake for another 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Spread the refried beans and mayonnaise over the melted cheese.
', 'Step 9: Top with blue cheese dressing, turkey chili, and remaining cheese.
', 'Step 10: Bake for 12 to 15 more minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 11: Top with lettuce and diced tomatoes before slicing and serving.
']

Title: Risotto with Fresh Figs and Prosciutto
Ingredients: ['4 cups vegetable broth', '6 tablespoons butter, divided', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 green onion, finely chopped', '1 (12 ounce) package Arborio rice', '½ cup dry white wine', '14 small fresh figs, divided', '4 thin slices prosciutto, finely chopped', '1 cup grated Pecorino-Romano cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat vegetable stock in a large pot and keep warm over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Heat 2 tablespoons butter and 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large, heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 3: Add green onion; cook and stir until softened, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Pour in rice and stir until coated in butter and oil and starting to toast, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Increase heat and pour in wine.
', 'Step 6: Simmer until alcohol has evaporated and the wine is mostly absorbed.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to medium and stir in 1 ladle of boiling broth.
', 'Step 8: Continue stirring until the rice has absorbed the liquid and turned creamy.
', 'Step 9: Once the liquid has been fully absorbed, add the next ladle.
', 'Step 10: Repeat this process, stirring constantly until all liquid has been used or rice is tender yet firm to the bite (al dente).
', 'Step 11: Stirring in the broth should take 12 to 15 minutes in all.
', 'Step 12: Meanwhile, chop 10 figs.
', 'Step 13: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a medium skillet and cook chopped figs until soft and coated in butter, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Crush figs gently with a wooden spoon while cooking.
', 'Step 15: Stir in prosciutto.
', 'Step 16: Add fig-prosciutto mixture to the risotto when there are about 5 minutes left to cook.
', 'Step 17: Remove risotto from heat; stir in remaining 2 tablespoons butter and grated Pecorino romano cheese.
', 'Step 18: Let stand for a few minutes.
', 'Step 19: Divide risotto evenly onto 4 plates, garnishing each with a whole fig before serving.
']

Title: Strufoli I
Ingredients: ['4 eggs', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '16 ounces honey', '½ vanilla bean, halved lengthwise', '4 tablespoons chopped semisweet chocolate', '½ cup blanched slivered almonds', '1 (1.75 ounce) package multicolored sprinkles (jimmies)', '1 cup vegetable oil for frying', "⅓ cup confectioners' sugar for decoration"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place eggs in bowl and beat until they have tripled in volume.
', 'Step 2: Add flour gradually until well blended (do not use all the flour).
', 'Step 3: The dough should remain slightly sticky.
', 'Step 4: Transfer to floured board.
', 'Step 5: Cut off a piece at a time.
', 'Step 6: Using a little flour, if needed, roll between your hands to form pencil shapes.
', 'Step 7: Cut into 1/4 inch pieces.
', 'Step 8: Place each on floured cloth.
', 'Step 9: In a large pan on top of the stove, heat oil to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Deep-fry pieces about 1/2 cup at a time, turning constantly until golden.
', 'Step 11: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 12: (Note: after several batches, dough begins to turn brown quickly.
', 'Step 13: This means it is time to change the oil) In large pan, bring honey to boil with vanilla bean.
', 'Step 14: Discard bean.
', 'Step 15: Place deep-fried pieces into hot honey and toss until all are coated.
', 'Step 16: Cool and stir in chocolate, nuts, and multi-colored jimmies.
', 'Step 17: Place on plate, shaping firmly into tall cone.
', "Step 18: Sprinkle with confectioner's sugar.
"]

Title: Grilled Chicken Pizza with Mozzarella and Roasted Garlic
Ingredients: ['2 heads garlic, top of bulbs trimmed off so tops of cloves are exposed', '1 ball pizza dough, store-bought or homemade', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '½ cup prepared pizza sauce', '1 ½ cups cooked and pulled/chopped chicken', '4 ounces Stella® Fresh Mozzarella Cheese, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon everything bagel seasoning', '1 cup spinach leaves, torn']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Wrap garlic heads in foil and place on small rimmed baking pan.
', 'Step 2: Transfer to oven and cook 1 hour or until garlic is dark golden brown and very soft.
', 'Step 3: Remove from oven and let stand for 5 minutes or until cool enough to touch.
', 'Step 4: Squeeze garlic cloves from their skin into a small bowl.
', 'Step 5: Preheat grill for two-zone grilling: half of grill should be set to medium-high; other half should be off (indirect heat).
', 'Step 6: Stretch and shape dough into 14-inch circle and place on pizza pan or large tray.
', 'Step 7: Brush one side of dough with 1 tablespoon oil.
', 'Step 8: Use hands to transfer dough to direct heat side of grill, oiled side down.
', 'Step 9: Do not worry if dough becomes a little misshapen during the transfer.
', 'Step 10: Cook 2 minutes, or until the dough releases itself from the grates (do not disturb dough before it releases).
', 'Step 11: Brush top side of dough with remaining 1 tablespoon oil, then use tongs to flip dough.
', 'Step 12: Cook 2 minutes or until dough releases from grates.
', 'Step 13: Continue cooking dough 3 to 4 minutes longer or until dough is firm and grill-marked in all areas, flipping and rotating frequently but keeping grill closed when not flipping.
', 'Step 14: Remove dough from grill and spread with sauce.
', 'Step 15: Top with chicken, Stella® Mozzarella Cheese, everything bagel seasoning, and roasted garlic cloves.
', 'Step 16: Transfer pizza back to grill on indirect heat side.
', 'Step 17: Close grill and cook 8 to 10 minutes or until toppings are warmed through and crust is fully cooked.
', 'Step 18: Remove pizza from grill and top with spinach.
', 'Step 19: Cut and serve immediately.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '520.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '67.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '19.8 mg', 'fatContent': '17.8 g', 'fiberContent': '2.7 g', 'proteinContent': '18.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '1368.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.2 g'}

Title: Gramma Good's Fennel Bread
Ingredients: ['2 (.25 ounce) packages instant yeast', '1 cup lukewarm water', '1 quart warm water', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '½ cup fennel seed', '⅓ cup unsulfured molasses', '1 tablespoon melted butter', '2 cups rye flour', '1 ½ cups golden raisins', '9 cups bread flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, dissolve the yeast in 1 cup of lukewarm water.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until foamy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, stir together the quart of warm water, salt, ginger, sugar, fennel, molasses, and melted butter.
', 'Step 4: Mix in the yeast slurry and rye flour, breaking up any lumps of flour with a whisk.
', 'Step 5: Stir in raisins.
', 'Step 6: Work in the bread flour 1/2 cup at a time, until the dough becomes stiff.
', 'Step 7: Then, turn it out onto a floured surface and knead in as much of the remaining flour as necessary to make a stiff but workable dough.
', 'Step 8: Knead for an additional 10 minutes to develop the gluten.
', 'Step 9: Place dough into a greased bowl, and turn to coat.
', 'Step 10: Cover and let rise until double, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 11: Punch down the dough and let it rise again until double.
', 'Step 12: Remove dough from bowl, and divide into 4 equal pieces.
', 'Step 13: press out air bubbles, and roll dough into loaves.
', 'Step 14: Place the loaves into four 8x4 inch well greased loaf pans.
', 'Step 15: Let rise in a warm place until doubled in size.
', 'Step 16: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 17: Bake the loaves for 40 to 45 minutes, or until the tops are nicely browned, and the loaves sound hollow when tapped on the bottom.
']

Title: Spicy and Creamy Vegetable Soup
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ white onion, chopped', '½ cup diced carrot', '½ cup diced celery', '4 large cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 bay leaves', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried dill weed', '6 cups water', '3 tablespoons chicken soup base', '1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL®)', '1 cup peeled and cubed potatoes', '½ cup fresh green beans, trimmed and snapped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 (8 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, sliced', '½ cup heavy whipping cream', '½ bunch kale, stemmed and chopped']

['Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large pot over medium heat; cook and stir onion, carrot, and celery until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add garlic, bay leaves, parsley, thyme, rosemary, and dill weed; cook until garlic is fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour water into onion mixture and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Stir chicken base into the boiling water until dissolved, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add tomatoes with green chiles, potatoes, and green beans; bring soup to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir mushrooms until golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add browned mushrooms to the soup.
', 'Step 9: Stir heavy cream and kale into soup; cook until kale is tender and soup is heated through, about 5 minutes.
']

Title: Italian Bread I
Ingredients: ['¼ cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '1 cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese', '¼ cup chopped green onions', '1 egg', '1 ½ cups buttermilk', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove crushed garlic']

Title: Gluten-Free Homemade Orecchiette with Rice Semolina
Ingredients: ['¼ teaspoon salt', '½ cup warm water, or more as needed', '7 ounces rice semolina, or more as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dissolve salt in warm water in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Place semolina flour into a separate bowl and add salted water.
', 'Step 3: Mix together until dough becomes a ball you can work with, adding more flour or warm water as needed; mixture should be slightly wet, barely sticking to your hands.
', 'Step 4: Knead dough until slightly more stiff.
', 'Step 5: Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove dough from the refrigerator and separate into 4 pieces.
', 'Step 7: Use a small amount of semolina flour to dust your work table and work each piece of dough into a cylinder or snake shape.
', 'Step 8: Dust your hands lightly with flour and pinch off a 1-inch piece of dough; make a dent using your thumb while rolling it away from you.
', 'Step 9: Repeat with remaining dough.
', 'Step 10: Let pasta sit for 7 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil; place pasta into the boiling water and cook until pasta floats to the top, making sure not to stir, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Scoop out cooked pasta using a slotted spoon from the water and transfer to a plate.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '174.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '38 g', 'fatContent': '1.7 g', 'proteinContent': '4.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '156.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.6 g'}

Title: Italian Christmas Cream Cake
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups sweetened flaked coconut', '1 cup buttermilk, at room temperature', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 ½ cups cake flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '1 ¾ cups white sugar', '1 ½ cups butter, softened', '¼ cup shortening', '5 eggs', '¾ cup pecans, chopped', '2 ¼ cups powdered sugar', '½ cup butter, softened', '½ cup cream of coconut (such as Coco Lopez®)', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened', '1 ¼ cups pecans, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease two 9-inch round cake pans and line with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Spread coconut flakes thinly over a microwave-safe plate.
', 'Step 4: Microwave on high until lightly browned, stirring every 30 seconds, 2 to 3 minutes total.
', 'Step 5: Place coconut in a blender and grind into a fine powder.
', 'Step 6: Combine coconut powder, buttermilk, and vanilla extract in a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Combine cake flour, baking powder, salt, and baking soda in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 8: Beat sugar, butter, and shortening until fluffy.
', 'Step 9: Add eggs, one at a time.
', 'Step 10: Add flour mixture alternately with coconut-buttermilk mixture, mixing between additions.
', 'Step 11: Mix in pecans.
', 'Step 12: Divide batter between the pans.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the centers comes out clean, 28 to 32 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Cool cakes in pans for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove cakes from pans and cool on wire racks, at least 20 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Meanwhile, beat powdered sugar and butter until fluffy.
', 'Step 17: Mix in cream of coconut, vanilla extract, and salt.
', 'Step 18: Add cream cheese; beat until well combined.
', 'Step 19: Place 1 cooled cake on a serving platter and spread frosting all over.
', 'Step 20: Place the other cake on top; coat with remaining frosting.
', 'Step 21: Press remaining pecans around and on top of the cake to garnish.
']

Title: Bruschetta with Peas and Mint
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '4 shallots, minced', '¾ cup fresh or frozen peas', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint', '6 slices ciabatta bread', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed', '1 clove garlic, peeled']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter in a skillet and cook shallots and peas until soft, but not browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Transfer to the bowl of a food processor and pulse until coarsely pureed.
', 'Step 4: Mix in mint.
', 'Step 5: Cut ciabatta slices in half and drizzle with olive oil.
', 'Step 6: Cut garlic in half and rub onto each slice.
', "Step 7: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 8: Place ciabatta slices on a baking sheet and toast in the oven until lightly browned, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove from oven and spread with pea mixture.
', 'Step 10: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Zuppa di Orzo e Fagioli (Bean and Barley Soup)
Ingredients: ['½ pound pearl barley', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 ounces pancetta bacon, diced', '¾ onion, chopped', '1 carrot, chopped', '1 stalk celery, chopped', '2 (15 ounce) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed, divided', 'water to cover', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 sprig fresh rosemary', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as desired']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place barley into a bowl and cover with several inches of cool water; let stand for 1 hour.
', 'Step 2: Drain.
', 'Step 3: Heat the oil in a heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Add pancetta and cook until slightly crisp, about 3 or 4 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir onion, carrot, and celery into pancetta and cook until vegetables are slightly softened, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Mix half of the beans into vegetable-pancetta mixture and pour in enough water to cover; stir in barley and remaining beans.
', 'Step 7: Season mixture with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 8: Bring liquid to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer for 40 minutes, stirring regularly and adding more water if soup gets too thick.
', 'Step 9: Remove saucepan from heat and allow to sit for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Serve soup with rosemary leaves and a drizzle of olive oil.
']

Title: Shieldzini
Ingredients: ['3 cucumbers', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '3 tablespoons rice wine vinegar', '3 tablespoons soy sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut cucumbers lengthwise, scoop out seeds with a spoon, and slice cucumbers into bite-sized pieces.
', 'Step 2: Transfer to a salad bowl.
', 'Step 3: In a small bowl, mix together salt, oil, sugar, rice wine vinegar, and soy sauce.
', 'Step 4: Pour over cucumbers, and gently toss.
', 'Step 5: Refrigerate several hours before serving, tossing every now and then.
']

Title: Easy Instant Pot® Tuscan Chicken
Ingredients: ['½ cup all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons cantanzaro herbs (such as Savory Spice Shop®) or Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon granulated garlic', '4 (4 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken breasts', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 red bell pepper, cut into matchsticks', '1 clove garlic, minced', '½ (16 ounce) package penne pasta', '2 cups heavy cream', '¼ cup chicken broth', '½ cup white wine', '½ pound fresh spinach, stemmed', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Combine flour, cantanzaro herbs, salt, pepper, and garlic in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 3: Dredge chicken through the mixture, shaking off excess flour.
', 'Step 4: Add olive oil and butter to the pot; allow butter to melt.
', 'Step 5: Add chicken and cook, in batches if necessary, until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Remove chicken to a plate.
', 'Step 7: Cook bell pepper with garlic until softened, about 2 minutes, and transfer to a small silicone bowl.
', 'Step 8: Add pasta to the bottom of the Instant Pot® and pour heavy cream on top.
', 'Step 9: Add chicken broth and lightly stir to ensure all the pasta is coated with liquid.
', 'Step 10: Add the elevated steamer rack.
', 'Step 11: Place chicken on top of rack.
', 'Step 12: Add silicone bowl of peppers to the side of the chicken.
', 'Step 13: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 14: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 7 minutes.
", 'Step 15: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 16: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 15 minutes.
", 'Step 17: Release remaining pressure carefully using the quick-release method, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Remove chicken, peppers, and the elevated rack.
', 'Step 19: Select Saute function.
', 'Step 20: Pour white wine into the cream sauce and add spinach.
', 'Step 21: Cook and stir until spinach is wilted, 2 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 22: Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted.
', 'Step 23: Sauce will thicken slightly as it cools.
', 'Step 24: Serve pasta, sauce, and chicken together immediately.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '716.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '41.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '173.9 mg', 'fatContent': '46.8 g', 'fiberContent': '3.1 g', 'proteinContent': '30 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '24.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '769.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.7 g'}

Title: Tiramisu Dessert
Ingredients: ['1 cup brewed espresso', '1 cup white sugar, divided', '¼ cup coffee liqueur', '1 (16 ounce) container mascarpone cheese', '4 extra large egg yolks', '2 tablespoons sweet Marsala wine', '1 tablespoon coffee liqueur', '1 cup heavy cream', '1 (14 ounce) package ladyfingers', '¼ cup unsweetened cocoa powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine espresso, 1/2 cup sugar, and 1/4 cup coffee liqueur in a heavy saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Whisk and simmer until sugar dissolves, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat and let syrup cool.
', 'Step 4: Combine remaining 1/2 cup sugar, mascarpone cheese, egg yolks, Marsala, and remaining 1 tablespoon coffee liqueur in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment; whip on medium speed until light and airy, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Transfer to another bowl and clean mixer bowl and whisk attachment.
', 'Step 6: Put heavy cream in the mixer bowl and whisk until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 7: Gently fold cream into the mascarpone-Marsala mixture.
', 'Step 8: Remove 40 ladyfingers from the package and reserve any extra for another use.
', 'Step 9: Dip ladyfingers, one by one, into the cooled espresso syrup and arrange in a single layer in the bottom of an 8x12-inch pan.
', 'Step 10: Spoon 1/2 of the cream mixture over top.
', 'Step 11: Dip more ladyfingers and arrange another layer perpendicular.
', 'Step 12: Spoon remaining cream mixture over top.
', 'Step 13: Dust tiramisu with cocoa powder.
', 'Step 14: Refrigerate for 2 hours before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '352 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '30.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '173.9 mg', 'fatContent': '22.5 g', 'fiberContent': '0.7 g', 'proteinContent': '6.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '12 g', 'sodiumContent': '62.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '14.5 g'}

', 'Step 2: Remove from heat, and drain.

', 'Step 4: Toss with Italian dressing until evenly coated, and serve.
']

Title: Cherry Italian Ice
Ingredients: ['1 (3 ounce) package cherry flavored Jell-O®', '1 (0.13 ounce) package unsweetened cherry-flavored soft drink mix (such as Kool-Aid®)', '1 cup white sugar', '2 cups boiling water', '2 cups cold water']

Title: All Day Versatile Sauce

', 'Step 7: n Before serving, remove neck bones and discard.

Title: Richard and Suzanne's Famous Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 large onion, diced', '1 large green bell pepper, chopped', '6 fresh basil leaves, minced', '1 bunch green onions, diced', '1 bay leaf', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 (10 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '1 (15 ounce) can stewed tomatoes', '1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chilies, undrained', '2 ½ cups water', '2 teaspoons white sugar']

', 'Step 2: Cook the garlic in the hot oil 1 to 2 minutes; add the onion, bell pepper, basil, green onion, and bay leaf and cook until the bell pepper softens; season with salt and pepper.

']

Title: Bolognese on a Budget

', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, place guanciale in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until crisp, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add pasta water, cooked spaghetti, and grated Pecorino Romano cheese.
