Title: Hot Wheels Pasta
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup chopped green onions', '1 anchovy fillet', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 zucchini - alternating strips of peel removed lengthwise and zucchini sliced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 cups tomato sauce', '¾ cup chicken stock', '1 pinch white sugar', '1 cup seeded and sliced jalapeno peppers', '1 cup seeded and sliced red Fresno chile peppers', '½ cup seeded and sliced yellow mini bell pepper', '½ cup seeded and sliced orange mini bell pepper', '2 ½ cups rotelle pasta', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, divided', '2 teaspoons freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Place heavy skillet over medium heat and pour olive oil into hot skillet; add green onions and anchovy fillet.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir until anchovy breaks down and green onions are tender, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add garlic to skillet and cook until translucent, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 5: Stir zucchini into green onion mixture; cook, stirring occasionally, until zucchini slices just start to become tender, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle with salt and black pepper; cook until zucchini centers start to change color to slightly green, 1 to 2 more minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour tomato sauce and chicken stock into skillet.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to low; add sugar.
', 'Step 9: Mix jalapeno, Fresno, yellow mini pepper, and orange mini pepper rings into mixture.
', 'Step 10: Bring sauce to a simmer and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 11: Pour rotelle pasta into boiling water and cook, stirring often, until pasta is still slightly firm, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Drain and let pasta stand for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Bring sauce to a boil; stir in rotelle pasta.
', 'Step 14: Reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 15: Cook, stirring often, until pasta, zucchini, and peppers are tender, 2 to 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 16: Taste and adjust levels of salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 17: Mix in about 1 1/2 teaspoon parsley.
', 'Step 18: Serve in bowls and top with Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese and remaining 1/2 teaspoon parsley.
']

Title: Easy Cacio e Pepe

', 'Step 13: Serve immediately topped with shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese and more black pepper.

Title: Hazelnut and Almond Cookies

Title: Laurel's Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '3 pounds lean ground beef', '3 pounds ground pork', '3 onions, chopped', '1 pound mushrooms, chopped', '4 cups chopped fresh tomato', '1 ⅓ (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '8 cloves crushed garlic', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '2 bay leaves', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '2 (16 ounce) packages cottage cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '6 eggs', '3 pounds shredded mozzarella cheese', '16 ounces shredded Colby cheese']

', 'Step 2: Drain grease well.

', 'Step 8: Mix grated Colby and mozzarella cheeses together in a medium bowl.

', 'Step 10: Repeat until all ingredients are used up.
', 'Step 11: Bake in a preheated 375 degree F (190 degree C) oven for one hour and 45 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Let stand 15 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Twenty Minute Lasagna
Ingredients: ['¾ pound ground beef', '2 packets dry spaghetti sauce mix', '1 (1 ounce) package dry mushroom gravy mix', '2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '4 cups water', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '1 (16 ounce) package mozzarella cheese, shredded']

Title: Fettuccine Bombay
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package fettuccine', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 large onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', '2 tablespoons curry powder, divided', '1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '2 tablespoons tomato paste']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly-salted water to a rolling boil over high heat; add the fettuccine and return to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook uncovered until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 3: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Fry the cumin seeds in the hot oil until they begin to pop, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir the onion and garlic in the oil until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add the chicken and continue cooking until the chicken is cooked through, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Season with 1 tablespoon curry powder; cook and stir another 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Pour the diced tomatoes over the mixture and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the tomato paste and remaining 1 tablespoon curry powder.
', 'Step 10: Simmer 15 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Stir the cooked pasta into the sauce to coat.
', 'Step 12: Simmer 2 to 5 minutes, until pasta is reheated.
']

Title: Tuna Italiano

Title: Stuffed Caprese Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon butter, or as needed', '2 ½ cups shredded mozzarella, divided', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package fresh spinach, chopped', '½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '4 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 pinch lemon-pepper seasoning, or to taste', '2 medium tomatoes, thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinaigrette dressing, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Butter a 9x13-inch glass baking pan.
', 'Step 3: Combine 1/4 cup mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, chopped spinach, cream cheese, and garlic powder in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 4: Slice chicken lengthwise on the side of each breast to make a pocket, being careful not to cut all the way through to the other side.
', 'Step 5: Stuff cheese and spinach mixture into each breast.
', 'Step 6: Secure filling by sealing each pocket with 2 to 3 toothpicks.
', 'Step 7: Season with lemon-pepper seasoning and place in the prepared baking pan.
', "Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes; it's okay if some of the cheese and spinach mixture spills out while baking.
", 'Step 9: Remove from the oven and top with tomato slices and remaining mozzarella.
', 'Step 10: Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette and return to the oven.
', 'Step 11: Bake until chicken is cooked through and cheese on top is bubbly and golden, 10 to 15 more minutes.
']

Title: Pissaladiere (Onion, Olive, and Anchovy Pizza)
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup cold unsalted butter, cut into 1/2-inch pieces', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons water, or as needed', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 ½ pounds onions, thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 small bay leaf', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon drained capers', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '20 large Niçoise olives, pitted and coarsely chopped', '16 anchovies anchovy fillets']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix flour and salt together in the bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 2: Add butter and 2 tablespoons oil.
', 'Step 3: Pulse until mixture resembles coarse meal.
', 'Step 4: Pulse in enough water, 1 tablespoon at a time, to form moist clumps.
', 'Step 5: Gather dough into a ball; flatten into a disk.
', 'Step 6: Wrap in plastic and chill, at least 2 hours.
', 'Step 7: Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a heavy, large skillet over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 8: Add onions, garlic, bay leaf, and thyme; stir to blend.
', 'Step 9: Cover and cook until onions are very tender, stirring occasionally, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Uncover and sauté until most liquid evaporates and onions are golden, about 10 minutes longer.
', 'Step 11: Stir in capers.
', 'Step 12: Season mixture with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 13: Cool completely; discard bay leaf.
', 'Step 14: Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 15: Lightly oil a large baking sheet.
', 'Step 16: Roll out dough on a floured surface to an 11-inch round.
', 'Step 17: Transfer dough to the prepared sheet.
', 'Step 18: Crimp edges of dough to form a stand-up border.
', 'Step 19: Spread filling evenly over dough.
', 'Step 20: Arrange olives and anchovies decoratively atop filling.
', 'Step 21: Bake in the preheated oven until crust is crisp and golden, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 22: Transfer to a platter and serve.
']

Title: Sardinian Papassini Cookies
Ingredients: ['8 ounces frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed', '8 ounces water', '1 pound unsalted butter, cut into pieces', '8 cups all-purpose flour, or as needed', '1 ½ cups chopped walnuts', '1 cup white sugar', '1 cup raisins', '3 tablespoons grated orange zest', '½ tablespoon salt', '4 cups powdered sugar, or as needed', '½ cup milk, or as needed', '1 (1.75 ounce) package multicolored candy sprinkles, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Dilute thawed orange juice concentrate with water.
', 'Step 3: Cut butter into flour until texture resembles coarse crumbs.
', 'Step 4: Add walnuts, white sugar, raisins, orange juice mixture, orange zest, and salt; mix together with your hands.
', 'Step 5: Add more flour as needed until dough is not sticky.
', 'Step 6: Roll dough on a floured board into a square shape.
', 'Step 7: Cut into diamond shapes or squares.
', 'Step 8: Arrange on ungreased cookie sheets.
', 'Step 9: Bake in batches the preheated oven until edges are golden, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove from the oven and let cool, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, combine powdered sugar and milk in a bowl.
', 'Step 12: Frost cookies and add sprinkles.
']

Title: Asparagus Sformato
Ingredients: ['1 pound fresh thin asparagus, trimmed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup pancetta bacon, diced', '1 teaspoon butter', '3 ½ tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '5 eggs', '⅓ cup milk']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and spread asparagus out in one layer.
', 'Step 3: Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper; mix.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until asparagus is tender, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, saute pancetta in a skillet over medium-high heat until crisp, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 7: Remove asparagus from the oven.
', 'Step 8: Cut off asparagus tips and set aside.
', 'Step 9: Puree asparagus stalks in a blender.
', 'Step 10: Reduce oven temperature to 315 degrees F (160 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Grease a loaf pan with butter and sprinkle with 1/2 tablespoon Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 12: Beat eggs with an electric mixer until foamy, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Carefully fold in milk, remaining Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 14: Fold in pureed asparagus.
', 'Step 15: Pour mixture into the prepared loaf pan.
', 'Step 16: Place asparagus tips on top in a decorative pattern.
', 'Step 17: Bake in the preheated oven until sformato is lightly browned and starts to pull away from the edges, 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Remove from oven, cool for a few minutes, and serve.
']

Title: Spaghetti Aglio, Olio, e Peperoncino con Bottarga
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or more to taste', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 red chile pepper, seeded and minced', '2 ounces grated Sardinian mullet bottarga, divided', '4 tablespoons chopped flat-leaf (Italian) parsley', '1 small lemon, zested']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Add garlic to the oil and cook until just warmed through, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add chile pepper and stir together, reducing the temperature to medium-low.
', 'Step 6: Continue stirring.
', 'Step 7: The garlic should never become dark brown or crispy.
', 'Step 8: If this has happened, the garlic is burnt and no longer appropriate for consumption.
', 'Step 9: Drain the pasta, reserving at least 1 cup pasta water.
', 'Step 10: Add the spaghetti to the oil mixture, still on medium-low heat.
', 'Step 11: Stir or toss until all the spaghetti is well coated.
', 'Step 12: Add 3/4 of the bottarga and stir to mix with the spaghetti, adding the reserved pasta water to hydrate as needed.
', 'Step 13: There should be a little "sauce" when serving but not soupy.
', 'Step 14: Divide onto 4 plates and sprinkle with chopped parsley and lemon zest; squeeze lemon juice over and sprinkle remaining bottarga on top right before serving.
']

Title: Italian-Style Roasted Chicken Breasts
Ingredients: ['1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '¼ cup olive oil', '¼ cup vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons dry white wine', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh mushrooms', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti']

Title: Biddy's Butternut Squash and Turkey Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 large butternut squash, peeled and cubed', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed', '1 teaspoon dried sage', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (20 ounce) jar spicy red pepper marinara sauce', '1 small yellow onion, diced', '4 cloves minced garlic, divided', 'olive oil, divided', '1 (16 ounce) bag fresh spinach', '1 pound 93% lean ground turkey', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '9 lasagna noodles', '10 ounces ricotta cheese, or more to taste', '2 large eggs', '1 cup shredded low-fat mozzarella cheese', '½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Toss butternut squash, olive oil, sage, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Transfer to a baking sheet.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until soft, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, heat marinara sauce in a saucepan over low heat until warm, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil a saute pan over medium heat; cook and stir onion and 2 garlic cloves until golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add onion mixture to marinara in the saucepan and remove from heat.
', 'Step 8: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in the saute pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Add spinach and cook until wilted, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Transfer spinach to a plate lined with paper towels to absorb the moisture; move spinach to a bowl.
', 'Step 11: Add turkey, remaining garlic, Italian seasoning, and crushed red pepper to the pan.
', 'Step 12: Cook until brown, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Season with salt and black pepper and mix into the bowl with the spinach.
', 'Step 14: Remove butternut squash from the oven and leave oven on.
', 'Step 15: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 16: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Drain and lay noodles separately on a plate to keep from sticking.
', 'Step 18: Combine cooked butternut squash, ricotta cheese, and eggs together in a bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 19: Coat the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking pan with a thin layer of marinara sauce.
', 'Step 20: Layer 3 lasagna noodles over the marinara, followed by ricotta mixture and ground turkey.
', 'Step 21: Repeat marinara, noodles, ricotta mixture, and turkey 2 more times.
', 'Step 22: Top with mozzarella cheese and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 23: Bake in the hot oven for about 45 minutes; let cool 10 minutes before cutting.
']

Title: Sassanelli
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups almonds', '8 cups all-purpose flour', '1 ¼ cups sweet dessert wine, such as Marsala or Port', '15 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '½ cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 lemons, zested', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cloves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Spread out almonds evenly on the baking sheet.
', 'Step 4: Bake almonds in the preheated oven until toasted, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from the oven and cool for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Place almonds in the bowl of a food processor; pulse until finely chopped.
', 'Step 7: Increase heat to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 9: Place flour in a large bowl and pour in 1/2 the sweet dessert wine, a little at a time.
', 'Step 10: Stir and mix into a wet, sticky dough.
', 'Step 11: Fold in almonds, olive oil, sugar, 1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon cocoa powder, lemon zest, vanilla extract, baking powder, and baking soda.
', 'Step 12: Pour remaining port wine into a saucepan and heat until warmed.
', 'Step 13: Stir in cinnamon and cloves and add mixture to the dough.
', 'Step 14: Knead dough for a few minutes until it holds together well but is still sticky.
', 'Step 15: Shape dough into walnut-sized oval balls that resemble little rocks.
', 'Step 16: Place cookies 2 inches apart onto the baking sheet.
', 'Step 17: Bake in the preheated oven until browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Remove from the oven and allow to cool completely.
']

Title: Grilled Sausage with Pepperonatta
Ingredients: ['2 red bell peppers', '1 yellow bell pepper', '1 orange bell pepper', '8 (3.5 ounce) links Italian sausage', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1 large yellow onion, cut into large dice', '½ cup red wine', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 2: Roast red, yellow, and orange bell peppers on the preheated grill until blackened on all sides, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Turn peppers as they blacken.
', 'Step 4: Transfer peppers to a large resealable plastic bag and close the bag; set peppers aside until cool.
', 'Step 5: Strip off and discard the skins, remove stems and seeds, and dice the peppers.
', 'Step 6: Cook sausages on the grill until browned and no longer pink inside, about 8 minutes per side.
', 'Step 7: An instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the center of a sausage should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat and cook onion until tender, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add diced peppers to the onion mixture; cook and stir until heated through.
', 'Step 10: Slice cooked sausages on the diagonal into bite-size pieces and stir into the onion and peppers.
', 'Step 11: Raise heat to medium-high and stir in red wine and oregano.
', 'Step 12: Bring to a boil and cook, stirring often, until the red wine has reduced by one third, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Season to taste with salt and black pepper.
']

Title: Cheesy Italian Bread Wedges
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon active dry yeast', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 cup warm water', '2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 (1 ounce) packages dry Italian-style salad dressing mix', '1 teaspoon dried oregano, or to taste', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 cup shredded Colby-Monterey Jack cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until the yeast softens and begins to form a creamy foam, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Combine yeast mixture with vegetable oil, salt, and half the flour in a large mixing bowl; stir mixture until no dry spots remain.
', 'Step 4: Stir in remaining flour, 1/2 cup at a time, mixing well after each addition.
', 'Step 5: When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Place dough in a large, lightly-oiled bowl and turn to coat.
', 'Step 7: Cover with a towel and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about at least 2 hours.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Place risen dough into an 8x8-inch square baking pan.
', 'Step 10: Cover the top of the dough with Italian salad dressing mix and sprinkle loaf with oregano, black pepper, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 11: Bake in preheated oven until the top is golden brown and the bottom of loaf sounds hollow when tapped, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 12: About 5 minutes before bread is finished baking, sprinkle the loaf with Colby-Monterey Jack cheese; bake until cheese has melted.
', 'Step 13: Cut into wedges and serve warm.
']

Title: Stewed Burgers
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cups sliced mushrooms', '1 bell pepper, sliced', '1 medium onion, vertically sliced', '12 ounces lean ground beef', '4 ounces ground pork', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '¼ cup Italian-seasoned panko bread crumbs', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 cups marinara sauce (such as Classico® Tomato and Basil)', '½ cup red wine', '½ teaspoon white sugar', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '1 tablespoon water as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add mushrooms, bell pepper, and onion.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir until vegetables are tender, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove from skillet and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Mix ground beef, ground pork, bread crumbs, egg, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Divide meat mixture into four equal portions and form into burgers.
', 'Step 7: Heat skillet over medium-high heat and brown burgers for about 4 minutes on each side.
', 'Step 8: Remove burgers to a plate and set aside.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat to low and add garlic to the skillet.
', 'Step 10: Stir until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 11: Add marinara sauce, red wine, sugar, basil, and crushed red pepper flakes; mix to combine.
', 'Step 12: Add burgers back to the skillet, spoon sauce over them, cover, and simmer for about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Check occasionally and stir in a little water if the sauce becomes too dry.
', 'Step 14: Remove cover and add mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions back to the skillet.
', 'Step 15: Cook until heated through, 3 to 4 minutes.
']

Title: Roasted Spaghetti Squash Lasagna Boats
Ingredients: ['3 medium spaghetti squash', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup part-skim ricotta cheese', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '½ large onion, minced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 (14 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Cut squash in half lengthwise with a large kitchen knife.
', 'Step 3: Scoop out seeds and membrane.
', 'Step 4: Season lightly with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Place in a baking dish, cut-side down.
', 'Step 6: Bake in the preheated oven until soft, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove from the oven and let cool for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Keep the oven on.
', 'Step 9: Meanwhile, begin preparing sauce.
', 'Step 10: Combine ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, and parsley in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 11: Mix well.
', 'Step 12: Heat oil in a large, deep skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 13: Saute onion and garlic in the hot oil until onion is soft, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Add sausage and cook and stir until browned, 5 to 7 minutes, breaking up meat into small pieces as it cooks.
', 'Step 15: Add tomatoes, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 16: Simmer over low heat for 25 minutes; stir in basil and simmer for 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 17: Remove flesh from the cooled squash by scraping with a fork, creating spaghetti strands.
', 'Step 18: Reserve the shells.
', 'Step 19: Drain the squash strands in a paper towel-lined colander to soak up excess liquid.
', 'Step 20: Toss squash strands with the tomato sauce mixture.
', 'Step 21: Spoon into the 6 squash shells.
', 'Step 22: Top with 1 to 2 tablespoons of the ricotta cheese mixture and 2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 23: Place in the baking dish.
', 'Step 24: Roast in the preheated oven until heated through and cheese is melted, about 30 minutes.
']

Title: Fravioli
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ cups all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '¼ teaspoon salt', '⅜ cup shortening', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons dry white wine', '1 ½ cups ricotta cheese', '1 egg', '¼ cup white sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 cups vegetable oil for frying']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, stir together 2 cups of the flour, sugar and salt.
', 'Step 2: Cut in the shortening until the mixture resembles coarse meal.
', 'Step 3: Make a well in the center and pour the eggs and white wine into it.
', 'Step 4: Stir with a fork, gradually bringing the dry mixture into the center until a dough forms.
', 'Step 5: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead in remaining flour until smooth.
', 'Step 6: Cover and let rest for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: In a small bowl, stir together the ricotta cheese, egg, sugar and vanilla until well blended.
', 'Step 8: On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to 1/8 inch thickness.
', 'Step 9: Cut out 3 inch circles using a cookie cutter or a glass.
', 'Step 10: Place 1 tablespoon of the ricotta cheese mixture in the center of each circle.
', 'Step 11: Fold edges over into a half-moon shape and press to seal.
', 'Step 12: Raviolis can be frozen at this point and saved for later.
', 'Step 13: It seems to help keep the filling from oozing out while frying.
', 'Step 14: In a large heavy skillet, heat oil, one inch deep, to 365 degrees F (180 degrees C).
', 'Step 15: Place the ravioli into the hot oil so that they are not crowded.
', 'Step 16: Fry on both sides until golden.
', 'Step 17: Drain on paper towels.
', "Step 18: If you like, dust with confectioners' sugar or drizzle with honey before serving.
"]

Title: Italian-Flavored Turkey Meatloaf
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '1 pound lean ground turkey', '½ cup Italian-style seasoned bread crumbs', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 large egg', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon chopped garlic', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese']

Title: Instant Pot® Spaghetti Squash Primavera
Ingredients: ['1 (3 pound) spaghetti squash, halved across the middle and seeds removed', '1 cup water', '3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '½ sweet onion, diced', '½ red bell pepper, diced', '1 carrot, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 zucchini, diced', '1 cup yellow cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 lemon, zested', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place spaghetti squash, cut-sides down, on a steaming rack inside a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®).
', 'Step 2: Add water.
', 'Step 3: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 4: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 7 minutes.
", 'Step 5: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 6: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 7: Unlock and remove the lid.

', 'Step 9: Empty, rinse, and dry pressure cooker pot.

', 'Step 12: Add onion, bell pepper, carrot, Italian seasoning, salt, and black pepper.
', 'Step 13: Cook, stirring frequently, until onion is just tender, about 4 minutes.

', 'Step 16: Stir in remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil and saute until combined, about 2 minutes more.
']

Ingredients: ['1 (12 ounce) box whole wheat rotini pasta', '2 cups garlic mushroom marinara sauce', '1 cup chopped kimchi', '½ cup shredded cooked chicken', '½ cup diced white onion', '1 tablespoon red chile paste', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon chopped scallion']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of heavily salted water to a boil; cook the rotini at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 15 minutes; drain and transfer to a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Bring marinara sauce to a simmer in a saucepan.
', 'Step 3: Add kimchi, chicken, onion, and red chile paste; stir until completely mixed and heated through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Mix butter into pasta and toss to coat.
', 'Step 5: Pour marinara sauce over pasta and top with scallions.
']

Title: Penne with Sausage and Portobello Mushrooms
Ingredients: ['4 mild Italian sausage links', '1 (12 ounce) package penne pasta', '4 tomatoes, diced', '½ pound baby portobello (cremini) mushrooms, chopped', '½ cup chopped red onion', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 ½ cups red wine', '1 tablespoon crushed dried rosemary', '1 tablespoon crushed dried oregano', '1 tablespoon crushed dried thyme', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a pot with water and bring to a boil; cook the sausages in the boiling water until no longer pink in the center, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Cut the sausages into bite-sized pieces.
', 'Step 3: Fill a large pot with lightly-salted water and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Stir the penne into the water and return to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain well.
', 'Step 7: Combine the tomatoes, mushrooms, onion, garlic, wine, rosemary, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir until the liquid is reduced to about half its original volume, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add the sausage and the drained pasta to the mixture and continue cooking until the liquid is reduced to about one-quarter its original volume, 10 to 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the dish to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '678.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '80.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '42.4 mg', 'fatContent': '21 g', 'fiberContent': '7.3 g', 'proteinContent': '29.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '2254.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.3 g'}

Title: Chef Nick's Amazing Calamari
Ingredients: ['1 cup ricotta cheese', '⅓ cup mascarpone cheese', '12 sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', '½ cup dry bread crumbs', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano, or to taste', '1 pinch salt and pepper to taste', '8 large squid, cleaned and tentacles removed', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a medium bowl, mix together the ricotta cheese, mascarpone cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, bread crumbs, oregano, salt and pepper until well blended.
', 'Step 3: Set aside.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Trim the ends of the squid bodies to make them an even size, and rinse out the tubes.
', 'Step 6: Spoon the cheese mixture into the cavities of the squid until full, and secure the open ends with toothpicks.
', 'Step 7: Place in boiling water, and cook for 6 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove the stuffed calamari tubes from the water, and place in a baking dish.
', 'Step 9: Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 10: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Add garlic and sesame seeds.
', 'Step 12: Place the calamari tubes in the skillet, and fry on all sides until golden brown.
', 'Step 13: Remove toothpicks before serving.
']

Title: Tami's Tri Color Caprese Salad
Ingredients: ['3 large yellow tomatoes, sliced', '1 (4 ounce) package fresh basil, leaves stripped from stems', '3 large red tomatoes, sliced', '10 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced', '1 shallot, very thinly shaved', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste', '1 ½ tablespoons aged balsamic vinegar, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions: ['Step 1: Arrange alternate slices of yellow tomato, whole basil leaves, slices of red tomato, and mozzarella cheese slices on a serving platter in rows; sprinkle with shaved shallot.\n', 'Step 2: Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad; season with salt and black pepper.\n']

Title: Instant Pot® Farro Risotto
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 cup farro', '2 cups chicken stock', '2 tablespoons heavy whipping cream', '¾ cup grated mozzarella cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', "1 teaspoon Greek seasoning (such as Cavender's®)"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Melt butter and stir in farro.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir for about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Pour in chicken stock and stir to combine.
', 'Step 5: Change to Manual setting.
', 'Step 6: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 7: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 10 minutes.
", 'Step 8: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 9: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 10: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 11: Add cream, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, and Greek seasoning.
', 'Step 12: Stir until melted.
']

Title: Dairy-Free Chicken Florentine Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups penne pasta', '10 slices bacon', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into bite-sized pieces', '1 tablespoon seasoned salt', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 medium onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (6 ounce) jar oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella-style vegan cheese (such as Daiya®)', '1 ½ cups coconut milk', '½ cup chicken broth', '½ cup vegan sour cream (such as Tofutti®)', '2 cups baby spinach leaves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 3: At the same time, place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain bacon slices on paper towels and chop when cool enough to handle.
', 'Step 5: Drain pasta.
', 'Step 6: While the bacon is cooking, heat olive oil in another skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add chicken, seasoned salt, and cayenne pepper, then stir in onion and garlic.
', 'Step 8: Cook and stir for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add sun-dried tomatoes; cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink in the center, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add vegan cheese, coconut milk, chicken broth, and vegan sour cream.
', 'Step 11: Mix well, cover, and cook until sauce begins to thicken, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Add spinach and bacon and cook, stirring continually, until sauce reaches desired consistency.
', 'Step 13: Serve over penne.
']

Title: Evelyn's Spicy Italian Sausage and Zucchini
Ingredients: ['5 (3.5 ounce) links hot Italian sausage links', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon salt', 'ground black pepper to taste', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes', '2 zucchinis, sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook sausages in hot skillet, turning regularly, until no longer pink in the center, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Transfer to a cutting board and slice.
', 'Step 5: Heat olive oil in a separate skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir onion, bell pepper, and garlic in hot oil until tender, about 5 minutes; season with red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper and cook 1 minute more.
', 'Step 7: Add sliced sausage, crushed tomatoes, and sliced zucchini; bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and continue cooking until the zucchini is tender, about 10 minutes.
']

Title: Eggless Zucchini Lasagna
Ingredients: ['3 large zucchini, trimmed and cut lengthwise into long strips', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 cup seasoned bread crumbs', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon Italian herb seasoning', '3 cups tomato sauce', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x12-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and add zucchini slices; boil for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain.
', 'Step 5: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook onion and garlic, stirring frequently, until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Mix bread crumbs, 1 cup Parmesan cheese, and Italian herb seasoning in a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Spoon 3 tablespoons tomato sauce into bottom of the prepared baking dish and top with 1/3 of the zucchini slices, 1/3 of the onion-garlic mixture, and 1/3 of the crumb-Parmesan cheese mixture.
', 'Step 8: Repeat layers twice more, starting with 1/2 of remaining tomato sauce and layers of zucchini, onion, and crumb mixture.
', 'Step 9: End with remaining tomato sauce in a layer; sprinkle 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese over the top.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until lasagna begins to bubble, about 30 minutes.
', "Step 11: Preheat oven's broiler and broil the lasagna until cheese topping is browned, 2 to 3 minutes.
", 'Step 12: Let casserole stand for 15 minutes to set before serving.
']

Title: Special Italian Meat
Ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon paprika, or to taste', '1 cube beef bouillon', '1 cup boiling water', '¼ cup sherry, or to taste', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed tomato soup', '¾ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '¾ teaspoon dried oregano', '¾ teaspoon dried thyme', '¾ teaspoon ground dried rosemary', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed', '2 pounds cubed beef stew meat', '1 large onion, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Whisk together the flour, salt, pepper, and paprika in a large bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 3: Dissolve the bouillon cube in the water in a 2 quart casserole dish, then whisk in the sherry, tomato soup, garlic powder, sugar, oregano, thyme, rosemary until blended; set aside.
', 'Step 4: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Toss the beef in the flour mixture to coat, and shake off excess.
', 'Step 6: Cook the beef in the hot oil, turning occasionally, until browned on all sides.
', 'Step 7: Remove the beef to the casserole dish, and reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the onion, and cook until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir the onion into the beef mixture.
', 'Step 10: Cover, and bake in the preheated oven until the meat is very tender, 2 to 2 1/2 hours.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '361.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '22.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '97.5 mg', 'fatContent': '13.1 g', 'fiberContent': '1.2 g', 'proteinContent': '36.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '441.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.3 g'}

Title: Arancini II
Ingredients: ['3 cups uncooked Arborio rice', '6 cups water', '1 ½ pounds ground beef', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '⅓ cup tomato paste', '¼ cup water', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 eggs', '1 cup bread crumbs', '½ cup grated Romano cheese', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '2 eggs, beaten', '3 cups bread crumbs', '4 cups oil for frying, or as needed', '1 (14 ounce) jar marinara sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine water and rice in a large saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil, then cover, and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 3: Simmer for 20 minutes, or until tender.
', 'Step 4: Set aside to cool completely.
', 'Step 5: Place ground beef in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Add onion and garlic, and cook, stirring to crumble until evenly browned.
', 'Step 7: Drain excess grease, then stir in the tomato paste and water.
', 'Step 8: Set aside to cool.
', 'Step 9: When cool, stir in mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 10: In a medium bowl, stir together 2 eggs, Romano cheese, salt, pepper, and 1 cup of the bread crumbs.
', 'Step 11: Stir into the cooled rice until well blended.
', 'Step 12: Place about 2 1/2 tablespoons of the rice mixture into the palm of your hand.
', 'Step 13: Make a well in the center, and place a heaping tablespoon of the beef mixture into it.
', 'Step 14: Mold rice around the filling into the shape of an egg.
', 'Step 15: Dip in beaten egg, then roll in remaining bread crumbs until well coated.
', 'Step 16: Repeat with remaining rice and filling.
', 'Step 17: Heat oil in a deep-fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 18: Carefully place the rice balls into the hot oil, a few at a time, and fry until golden brown on all sides, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Remove with a slotted spoon, and set on paper towels to drain.
', 'Step 20: Serve hot with marinara sauce for dipping.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '924.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '118.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '162.5 mg', 'fatContent': '32 g', 'fiberContent': '5.4 g', 'proteinContent': '37.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '1089.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '10 g'}

Title: Italian-Style Quinoa-Stuffed Sole
Ingredients: ['¼ cup quinoa', '½ cup water', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '4 (2 ounce) sole fillets', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '4 lemon slices', 'ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '½ cup water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir together the quinoa, 1/2 cup water, parsley, basil, and lemon zest in a small saucepan over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the quinoa is tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour into a mixing bowl, fold in the Parmesan cheese, and allow the mixture to cool.
', "Step 4: Preheat the oven's broiler and set the oven rack at about 6 inches from the heat source.
", 'Step 5: Lightly grease a small baking dish.
', 'Step 6: Spoon a quarter of the quinoa mixture onto one end of each sole fillet.
', 'Step 7: Fold the other side of the sole overtop, sprinkle with black pepper, and place a lemon slice on top.
', 'Step 8: Place the sole into the prepared baking dish, and add the vinegar and remaining water.
', 'Step 9: Broil in the preheated oven until the sole flakes easily with a fork, and the flesh is opaque, 3 to 4 minutes.
']

Title: Eggplant Bake with Ricotta and Spinach
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package frozen breaded eggplant cutlets', '1 (15 ounce) container part-skim ricotta cheese', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '1 large egg', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (24 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '2 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place eggplant cutlets on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Bake on the center rack of the preheated oven for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Flip, and continue to bake until both sides are golden brown and cutlets are cooked through, 6 to 7 minutes more.
', 'Step 5: Remove from the oven and reduce temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Mix ricotta cheese, spinach, egg, and garlic together in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 7: Place 1/2 cup spaghetti sauce in the bottom of an 8-inch square baking dish and layer with 1/2 of the eggplant cutlets, 1/2 of the ricotta mixture, and 1/2 of the remaining sauce.
', 'Step 8: Repeat layers with remaining eggplant, ricotta mixture, and sauce.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over top.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until cooked through and bubbling, about 30 minutes.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Chicken Saltimbocca
Ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh sage', '4 slices prosciutto', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 shallot, diced', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 cup chicken broth', '¼ cup lemon juice', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '4 slices mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place chicken breasts on a flat work surface.
', 'Step 2: Slice horizontally through the middle, being careful not to cut all the way through to the other side.
', 'Step 3: Open the 2 sides and spread them out like an open book.
', 'Step 4: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Open each butterflied chicken breast and sprinkle with sage.
', 'Step 6: Add a slice of prosciutto and close each chicken breast.
', 'Step 7: Dredge in flour.
', 'Step 8: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 9: Melt butter in the hot pot; add olive oil.
', 'Step 10: Sear chicken breasts until golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes on each side.
', 'Step 11: Remove and set aside.
', 'Step 12: Stir shallot and garlic into the hot pot and cook until softened, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Deglaze the pot with chicken broth, bringing to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 14: Stir in lemon juice and lemon zest.
', 'Step 15: Turn off the pot.
', 'Step 16: Place a trivet into the pot and place chicken on top.
', 'Step 17: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 18: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 5 minutes.
", 'Step 19: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 20: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions for 15 minutes.
", 'Step 21: Remove chicken and trivet and place chicken into a baking pan.
', 'Step 22: Combine water and cornstarch in a small bowl, creating a slurry.
', 'Step 23: Set the Instant Pot® to Saute.
', 'Step 24: Stir in cornstarch slurry and cook until sauce has thickened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Pour over chicken and top with mozzarella cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '416.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '12.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '111.9 mg', 'fatContent': '24.5 g', 'fiberContent': '0.6 g', 'proteinContent': '34.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10 g', 'sodiumContent': '881 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.5 g'}

Title: Italian Sausage Bread
Ingredients: ['1 cup raisins', '1 pound raw, bulk Italian sausage', '1 ½ cups brown sugar', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '1 cup chopped pecans', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon ginger', '1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice', '1 cup cold coffee', '1 teaspoon baking soda']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour a 9-inch Bundt pan.
', 'Step 3: Place the raisins in a saucepan with enough water to cover.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer 5 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 5: In a large bowl, mix the sausage, brown sugar, white sugar, and eggs.
', 'Step 6: Fold in the raisins and pecans.
', 'Step 7: In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, ginger, and pumpkin pie spice.
', 'Step 8: Blend the coffee and baking soda in a small bowl, and mix into the flour mixture.
', 'Step 9: Mix the moistened flour mixture into the sausage mixture.
', 'Step 10: Transfer to the prepared pan.
', 'Step 11: Bake 1 hour and 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
']

Title: Italian Ricotta Cake
Ingredients: ['½ cup unsalted butter, softened', '½ cup white sugar', '2 large eggs', '¼ cup brandy', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '3 pounds ricotta cheese', '5 large eggs', '1 ¾ cups white sugar', '1 cup heavy cream', '3 large egg whites, beaten stiff', '½ medium lemon, zested', '½ medium lime, zested', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cream butter and gradually add sugar.
', 'Step 2: Beat until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 3: Add eggs, one at a time, while continuing beating.
', 'Step 4: Add brandy.
', 'Step 5: Add flour and baking powder.
', 'Step 6: Mix into a dough until the consistency is like Play-Doh®.
', 'Step 7: Press dough into a greased and floured 9x13-inch pan.
', 'Step 8: Refrigerate for 2 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 9: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Beat ricotta cheese in a large bowl 4 to 5 minutes on high speed.
', 'Step 11: Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating after each addition.
', 'Step 12: Add sugar and heavy cream and beat until blended.
', 'Step 13: Fold in egg whites.
', 'Step 14: Spoon 1/2 of the mixture into the crust.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle 1/2 of the zests and 1/2 of the cinnamon on top.
', 'Step 16: Repeat with remaining filling, zest, and cinnamon.
', 'Step 17: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 1 hour and 15 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Turn off the oven and let cake cool in the oven for 2 hours.
', 'Step 19: Remove from the oven and chill completely before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '576.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '61.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '191.2 mg', 'fatContent': '27.1 g', 'fiberContent': '0.9 g', 'proteinContent': '20.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '16 g', 'sodiumContent': '286.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '38.2 g'}

Title: Prosciutto Fave Minestrone alla Riso
Ingredients: ['5 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ pound bacon, chopped', '¾ cup diced cooked ham', '3 large stalks celery, thinly sliced, leaves reserved and chopped', '1 onion, finely chopped', '3 carrots, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, chopped', '1 quart chicken broth', '⅔ cup brown rice', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (15 ounce) can cranberry beans, drained', '1 (15 ounce) can white beans, drained', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large pot over medium heat, cook bacon in olive oil until brown.
', 'Step 2: Stir in ham and cook a few minutes more.
', 'Step 3: Stir in celery (reserve the leaves), onion and carrot and cook until vegetables are tender, 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in garlic and cook 1 minute more.
', 'Step 5: Stir in tomatoes, broth, rice, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, cover and simmer 20 minutes, or until vegetables are soft and rice is nearly tender.
', 'Step 7: Stir in cranberry beans and white beans and heat through.
', 'Step 8: Stir in parsley and celery leaves and remove from heat.
', 'Step 9: Serve hot.
']

Title: Eggplant-Ziti Parmesan
Ingredients: ['1 medium eggplant, peeled and thinly sliced', '1 (16 ounce) package dry ziti pasta', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 pound mozzarella cheese, shredded', '½ cup grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '1 (26 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce, or your favorite recipe', '1 pinch salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the eggplant slices in a bowl, and sprinkle with salt.
', 'Step 2: Let drain over a bowl in the refrigerator for at least an hour.
', 'Step 3: I like to do this overnight.
', 'Step 4: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Add ziti pasta, and cook for about 6 minutes, or until almost tender.
', 'Step 7: It will cook the rest of the way in the oven.
', 'Step 8: Drain.
', 'Step 9: Mix together the ricotta cheese and eggs in a small bowl.
', 'Step 10: Stir in half of the mozzarella cheese and Pecorino Romano cheese.
', 'Step 11: Spread a thin layer of sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 12: Arrange layers of eggplant, cheese, ziti pasta, and more sauce all the way to the top of the pan.
', 'Step 13: Top with remaining mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 14: Bake for 45 minutes in the preheated oven, until heated through and cheese is lightly browned.
']

Title: Buffalo Chicken Flatbread Pizza
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 (16 ounce) package chicken tenders, cut into small pieces', '½ (1 ounce) package ranch dressing mix', '1 pinch cracked black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon salted butter', '1 shallot, thinly sliced', '2 flatbread pizza crusts (such as Stonefire® Artisan Flatbread)', '¼ cup hot Buffalo wing sauce', '1 cup finely shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup pickled banana pepper rings', '½ cup Gorgonzola cheese crumbles']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Add chicken, sprinkle with ranch dressing mix, and season with cracked pepper.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: At the same time, melt butter in another skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add shallot and saute until soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Brush each flatbread with remaining olive oil, lightly coat with Buffalo wing sauce, and sprinkle with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 8: Layer with chicken, shallots, and banana pepper rings, then sprinkle with Gorgonzola cheese crumbles.
', 'Step 9: Bake directly on the middle rack of the preheated oven until flatbreads are crispy and cheese is melted, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Slice and serve.
']

Title: Italian Wedding Soup with Venison Meatballs
Ingredients: ['½ pound ground venison', '½ pound bulk Italian sausage', '½ cup bread crumbs', '½ cup finely shredded Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 large egg', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 ribs celery, sliced', '1 large carrot, chopped', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '2 (32 ounce) cartons chicken broth', '1 cup acini di pepe pasta', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh oregano leaves', '½ (6 ounce) package fresh baby spinach', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup finely shredded Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine venison, sausage, bread crumbs, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, parsley, and egg in a large bowl; mix until evenly combined.
', 'Step 2: Form mixture into fifty 1-inch meatballs.
', 'Step 3: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Add meatballs and cook for 4 minutes, flipping halfway, to get an even brown on all sides.
', 'Step 5: Transfer with tongs to a paper towel-lined plate.
', 'Step 6: Heat oil for soup in a large soup pot.
', 'Step 7: Add celery, carrot, and onion and cook until soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute more.
', 'Step 9: Add broth and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Stir in pasta, oregano, and meatballs.
', 'Step 11: Reduce heat, cover, and cook for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Turn heat off and let soup sit for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir in spinach and lemon juice.
', 'Step 14: Ladle into bowls, season with salt and pepper, and garnish with Parmesan cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '332.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '31.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '67.9 mg', 'fatContent': '13.6 g', 'fiberContent': '2 g', 'proteinContent': '19.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '1537.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.1 g'}

Title: Struffoli o Cicerchiata (Italian Honey Dough Balls)
Ingredients: ['4 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '4 eggs', '5 ½ tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '1 egg yolk', '½ lemon, zested', '½ teaspoon rum extract', '1 pinch salt', '1 ½ (12 ounce) jars honey', 'vegetable oil for frying', '¼ cup sugar sprinkles, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix flour, eggs, butter, sugar, egg yolk, lemon zest, rum extract, and salt together in a large bowl to create a soft dough.
', 'Step 2: Cover with plastic wrap; let stand for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Roll dough into a thin log the width of your pinky finger, about 1/4 inch.
', 'Step 4: Cut log into small pieces; roll into balls.
', 'Step 5: Dust with flour to prevent from sticking.
', 'Step 6: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan.
', 'Step 7: Place a few balls of dough in a sieve to shake off excess flour.
', 'Step 8: Cook in the hot oil until golden brown, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate using a slotted spoon.
', 'Step 10: Repeat with remaining balls of dough.
', 'Step 11: Pour honey into a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 12: Cook until a small amount of honey dropped into cold water forms a soft ball.
', 'Step 13: Add fried balls of dough to the hot honey; stir gently with a wooden spoon until coated.
', 'Step 14: Rinse a serving plate and shake off the water.
', 'Step 15: Pile dough balls onto the serving plate in the shape of a dome or ring using damp hands or a damp wooden spoon.
', 'Step 16: Garnish with sugar sprinkles.
', 'Step 17: Let cool completely.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '635.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '110.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '111.7 mg', 'fatContent': '19.1 g', 'fiberContent': '1.8 g', 'proteinContent': '9.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6 g', 'sodiumContent': '94 mg', 'sugarContent': '65.4 g'}

Title: Spaghetti alla Puttanesca
Ingredients: ['3 (28 ounce) cans diced tomatoes', '⅔ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1 white onion, diced', '1 bunch fresh basil leaves, torn', '1 tablespoon anchovy paste', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '⅛ teaspoon baking soda', 'salt to taste', '3 (6 ounce) cans pitted black olives, chopped', '1 cup balsamic capers, drained', '1 bunch parsley leaves, chopped', '3 (16 ounce) packages spaghetti', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine tomatoes, olive oil, onion, basil, anchovy paste, garlic, oregano, baking soda, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a simmer; reduce heat, and simmer, stirring occasionally, until flavors blend, 1 to 2 hours.
', 'Step 3: Add olives, capers, and parsley during the last 20 to 30 minutes of cooking.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain.
', 'Step 7: Divide spaghetti among serving bowls; ladle sauce over noodles and sprinkle red pepper flakes on top.
']

Title: Italian Paleo Chicken Meat Loaf
Ingredients: ['6 carrots', '1 celery stalk', '¼ large onion', '2 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '7 chicken tenderloins', '4 eggs', '1 (8 ounce) can no-salt-added tomato sauce, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan.
', 'Step 3: Place carrots, celery, onion, garlic, Italian seasoning, and black pepper in a food processor; pulse until vegetables are minced.
', 'Step 4: Transfer vegetable mixture to a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Process chicken tenderloins in the food processor until ground.
', 'Step 6: Stir eggs into vegetable mixture using a fork until incorporated; add half the tomato sauce and mix.
', 'Step 7: Fold chicken into vegetable-tomato sauce mixture; pour into prepared loaf pan.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour 30 minutes; spread remaining tomato sauce over meatloaf.
', 'Step 9: Continue baking until meatloaf is cooked through, about 30 more minutes.
', 'Step 10: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Let cool in pan for 20 minutes before slicing.
']

Title: Zucchini Ribbons With Goat Cheese
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '¼ cup finely minced shallot', '1 clove garlic, finely minced, or to taste', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '½ cup chicken broth', '2 large zucchini, sliced into long ribbons using a vegetable peeler, discarding the seedy core', '¼ cup thinly sliced basil leaves', '2 ½ ounces goat cheese, crumbled', 'salt and pepper to taste']

Title: Buddy's Maple Mascarpone Cream
Ingredients: ['4 each eggs, separated', '½ cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 ¼ cups mascarpone cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk egg whites in a stand mixer fitted with a wire whisk attachment until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 2: Set aside in another bowl.
', 'Step 3: Beat egg yolks and sugar together in the bowl using the paddle attachment until smooth and pale.
', 'Step 4: Add maple syrup and beat until fully combined.
', 'Step 5: Slowly mix in mascarpone cheese.
', 'Step 6: Fold in egg whites.
', 'Step 7: Keep in the refrigerator for up to 48 hours, loosely covered with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 8: Cream may begin to separate after 24 hours.
', 'Step 9: Gently stir before serving.
']

Title: Tyrolean Nut Cake (Tiroler Nusskuchen)
Ingredients: ['⅞ cup unsalted butter, room temperature, plus more for baking dish', '¼ cup dry bread crumbs', '6 eggs', '⅞ cup white sugar', '3 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '¾ cup dry white wine', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 ½ cups ground hazelnuts', '¾ cup chocolate chips, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Grease a fluted tube pan (such as Bundt®) generously with butter and sprinkle with bread crumbs.
', 'Step 2: Turn pan so bread crumbs are evenly distributed.
', 'Step 3: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Beat butter using an electric mixer on high speed for a few minutes until foamy.
', 'Step 5: Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition.
', 'Step 6: Add sugar and vanilla sugar in batches.
', 'Step 7: Beat batter for a few minutes until mixture is light and foamy.
', 'Step 8: Mix in white wine.
', 'Step 9: Combine flour, cinnamon, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
', 'Step 10: Mix flour mixture into egg mixture quickly on low speed.
', 'Step 11: Fold in hazelnuts and chocolate chips.
', 'Step 12: Pour batter into the prepared baking pan and level with the back of a spoon.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 1 hour.
']

Title: Anisette Cookies I

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, beat eggs.

Title: Italian Stuffed Pork Loin with Olive Relish
Ingredients: ['3 pounds boneless pork loin', '1 cup Italian salad dressing', '1 (10 ounce) can large, pitted black olives, drained and chopped', '1 (8 ounce) jar Spanish olives, drained and chopped', '4 cloves garlic', '¼ white onion, chopped', '10 pepperoncini peppers, drained and chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar', 'cracked black pepper to taste']

['Step 1: Place pork in a shallow dish and coat with Italian dressing.
', 'Step 2: Cover and refrigerate for two hours.
', 'Step 3: For the relish, stir the black olives, green olives, garlic, onion, and peppers together in a bowl; stir in olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
', 'Step 4: Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.
', 'Step 5: When pork has finished marinating, preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Slice the pork loin down the center lengthwise, cutting about 3/4 of the way through to the other side.
', 'Step 7: Stuff full with the olive relish.
', 'Step 8: Cover and bake in the preheated oven for about 2 hours, or until internal temperature has reached 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
']

Title: Coffee Semifreddo
Ingredients: ['¼ cup strong brewed coffee', '6 ½ tablespoons white sugar', '5 egg yolks', '3 ½ ounces mascarpone cheese', '1 ½ cups heavy cream', '2 tablespoons crushed candied walnuts, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine coffee and sugar in a saucepan over medium heat and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally so sugar does not stick to the bottom of the pan.
', 'Step 2: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 3: Whisk egg yolks in a heatproof bowl until frothy.
', 'Step 4: Add sweetened coffee 1 tablespoon at a time, whisking vigorously to prevent egg yolks from curdling.
', 'Step 5: Place bowl on top of a pot with simmering water, making sure the bottom of the bowl does not touch the water.
', 'Step 6: Continue whisking vigorously until mixture thickens and gets creamy, 4 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove bowl from heat and place over a bowl of ice; whisk until cooled.
', 'Step 8: Fold in mascarpone cheese.
', 'Step 9: Beat cream in a chilled glass or metal bowl with an electric mixer until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 10: Stir 2 tablespoons of whipped cream into the coffee mixture to thin it out.
', 'Step 11: Fold in remaining cream carefully with a spatula until just combined.
', 'Step 12: Fold in walnuts.
', 'Step 13: Pour mixture into 4 serving or ice cream glasses and freeze until firm, at least 5 hours.
']

Title: Amariette Cookies
Ingredients: ['7 egg whites', '2 ½ cups white sugar', '2 pounds ground almonds', '2 tablespoons almond extract', '1 cup chopped almonds', '⅓ cup granulated sugar for decoration']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Beat egg whites and sugar until fluffy.
', 'Step 3: Add the ground almond and almond extract, mixing well.
', 'Step 4: Shape dough into walnut sized balls, roll in sugar and put a piece of almond or candied cherry on top.
', 'Step 5: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees F) until firm.
', 'Step 6: Bottom should be light brown.
']
