Title: Spicy Chicken Orecchiette
Ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 cup uncooked orecchiette pasta', '1 cup tomato pasta sauce', '½ cup broccolini, cut into 1 inch pieces', '½ (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, drained', '⅓ cup sliced portobello mushrooms', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '2 teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 2: Grill chicken breast halves until they show dark grill marks and are no longer pink inside, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 3: Let the chicken breasts cool, then place into a bowl and coarsely shred with 2 forks.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook orecchiette pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain and return pasta to pot.
', 'Step 7: Stir chicken breast meat, pasta sauce, broccolini, stewed tomatoes, portobello mushrooms, garlic, and red pepper flakes into the cooked pasta.
', 'Step 8: Place over medium heat and cook, stirring frequently, until the mushrooms and broccolini are cooked through and tender, 5 to 10 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '223.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '30.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '34.8 mg', 'fatContent': '3.8 g', 'fiberContent': '3.5 g', 'proteinContent': '17.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '402.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.2 g'}

Title: Cassava Flour-Apple Cake
Ingredients: ['¼ cup raisins', '¼ cup Marsala wine', '1 cup cassava flour', '¾ cup superfine white sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '¾ cup almond meal', '¼ cup buckwheat flour', '3 large eggs', '½ cup butter, softened', '¼ cup whole milk', '¼ cup light vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup grated Granny Smith apple', '1 Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored, and sliced', '⅛ cup raw cane sugar', '¼ cup raw pine nuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9-inch square, deep baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Combine raisins and Marsala wine in a bowl; set aside to soak.
', 'Step 4: Sift cassava flour twice into a large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 5: Mix in superfine sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
', 'Step 6: Add almond meal and buckwheat flour and sift all the dry ingredients together.
', 'Step 7: Combine eggs, butter, milk, oil, and vanilla extract in a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Beat on low for with a hand mixer for 1 minute until well combined.
', 'Step 9: Beat on high until fluffy, for a full 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: (This is a crucial step to ensure a fluffy cake.
', 'Step 11: ) Mix in grated apple.
', 'Step 12: Stir in raisins and wine until combined.
', 'Step 13: Carefully fold egg mixture into flour mixture with a rubber scraper, folding with light, yet deep strokes from the bottom to the top, until batter is just combined and still a bit lumpy, with no visible pockets of flour, being careful not to overmix.
', 'Step 14: Pour batter into the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 15: Arrange apple slices to completely cover the batter, making sure they do not overlap too much; you may not need all of the slices.
', 'Step 16: Sprinkle with raw cane sugar and pine nuts.
', 'Step 17: Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Switch to the broiler function and cook until the top is slightly browned, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Remove from the oven and allow to cool slightly before cutting and serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '433.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '47.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '89.8 mg', 'fatContent': '25.2 g', 'fiberContent': '2.5 g', 'proteinContent': '6.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '8.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '161.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '25.6 g'}

Title: Sourdough Focaccia alla Genovese
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups high-protein bread flour (such as King Arthur Flour®), divided', '1 cup water, divided', '¾ cup sourdough starter discard, at room temperature', '6 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided, or as needed', '1 teaspoon fine sea salt', '1 tablespoon water', '12 pitted green olives', '6 cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 sprig fresh rosemary', '½ teaspoon flaked salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix 1/2 cup bread flour, 1/4 cup water, and sourdough discard together with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 2: Add a little flour to the bowl of a stand mixer.
', 'Step 3: Add starter mixture and allow to rise in a warm area, without direct sunlight, until doubled in size, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 4: Attach dough hook and begin to mix the starter.
', 'Step 5: Add remaining flour, 3 tablespoons oil, and 1 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 6: Mix in enough of the remaining water until dough pulls from the sides of the bowl and forms a ball; you may not need the full 3/4 cup.
', 'Step 7: Knead dough in the mixer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Transfer dough to a work surface and knead by hand for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Score and cover with a cloth.
', 'Step 10: Allow to rise in a draft-free place until doubled in volume, at least 2 hours, and up to overnight.
', 'Step 11: Lightly oil a shallow 12x16-inch baking pan.
', 'Step 12: Knead dough for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Spread into the pan using your hands.
', 'Step 14: Whisk 1 tablespoon oil and 1 tablespoon water together.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle a little bit over the focaccia.
', 'Step 16: Cover with plastic wrap and let rise until doubled in height.
', 'Step 17: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 18: Push into the focaccia with your fingertips, leaving indentations about 1 1/2 inches apart.
', 'Step 19: Evenly distribute olives and cherry tomatoes on top, pushing them into the dough.
', 'Step 20: Sprinkle rosemary leaves and flaked salt on top.
', 'Step 21: Sprinkle a little more of the oil-water mixture on top.
', 'Step 22: Bake in the preheated oven until browned and cooked through, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Drizzle olive oil on top before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '269.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '34.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '0.1 mg', 'fatContent': '11.7 g', 'fiberContent': '1.6 g', 'proteinContent': '6.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '478.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.7 g'}

Title: Sweet and Sour Pickled Fennel
Ingredients: ['1 pound fennel bulbs, cored and sliced', '3 cups water', '2 cups white wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '½ cup turbinado cane sugar', '⅓ cup extra virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh chives']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Inspect 2 jars for cracks and rings for rust, discarding any defective ones.
', 'Step 2: Immerse in simmering water until fennel is ready.
', 'Step 3: Wash new, unused lids and rings in warm, soapy water.
', 'Step 4: n Place sliced fennel in a colander and rinse well.
', 'Step 5: n Combine water, vinegar, and salt in a large saucepan and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Add the fennel, sugar, olive oil, and chives; stir to combine.
', 'Step 7: Bring back to a boil and cook for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: n Remove fennel from the cooking liquid with a slotted spoon and pack into sterilized jars.
', 'Step 9: Fill the jars with the hot cooking liquid, leaving 1/2-inch head space.
', 'Step 10: Wipe the tops of the jars with a clean cloth.
', 'Step 11: Place lids on the jars and tighten.
', 'Step 12: n Place a rack in the bottom of a large stockpot and fill halfway with water.
', 'Step 13: Bring to a boil and lower jars 2 inches apart into the boiling water using a holder.
', 'Step 14: Pour in more boiling water to cover jars by at least 1 inch.
', 'Step 15: Bring to a rolling boil, cover, and process for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: n Remove the jars from the stockpot with a jar lifter and let rest on a kitchen towel, several inches apart, for 12 to 24 hours.
', 'Step 17: Press the center of each lid with a finger to ensure the lid does not move up or down.
', 'Step 18: Remove the rings for storage and store in a cool, dark area for 1 week before consuming.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '119.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '8.4 g', 'fatContent': '9.5 g', 'fiberContent': '1.8 g', 'proteinContent': '0.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '758.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.3 g'}

Title: Rotisserie Chicken Lasagna Roll-Ups
Ingredients: ['8 lasagna noodles', '1 rotisserie chicken - skinned, deboned, and meat shredded', '2 cups shredded Italian cheese blend', '½ (8 ounce) container mascarpone cheese', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '¼ teaspoon ground white pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '¼ cup diced onion', '1 large egg, beaten', '1 (16 ounce) jar Alfredo sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile mix shredded chicken, Italian cheese, mascarpone cheese, garlic, Italian seasoning, and white pepper together in a large bowl until combined.
', 'Step 5: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat; add onion.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir until the onion is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to low and continue cooking and stirring until onion begins to brown, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 9: Add garlic and saute until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add to the chicken mixture with egg; mix to combine.
', 'Step 11: Spread chicken mixture onto a lasagna noodle and roll up.
', 'Step 12: Place roll-up seam-side down in an 8-inch square baking dish.
', 'Step 13: Repeat with remaining roll-ups.
', 'Step 14: Pour Alfredo sauce over top.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until hot and bubbly, about 45 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '534.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '22.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '128.4 mg', 'fatContent': '37.5 g', 'fiberContent': '1.2 g', 'proteinContent': '28.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '16.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '854.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.9 g'}

Title: Wedding Soup Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 small onion, chopped - divided', '1 clove garlic, chopped - divided', '2 large carrots, shredded', '1 head escarole, chopped', '2 (32 ounce) cartons low-sodium chicken broth', '3 small skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 pound ground meat loaf mix (beef, pork, veal)', '¼ cup bread crumbs, or as needed', '1 egg', '½ teaspoon onion powder, or to taste', '½ teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste', '9 lasagna noodles', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 teaspoon chopped parsley, or to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ⅓ cups grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste', '2 ⅔ cups shredded mozzarella cheese, or to taste', '2 tablespoons cornstarch']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a large pot; cook and stir 1/2 small onion and 1/2 garlic clove until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir shredded carrots and escarole into onion mixture; cook and stir until escarole is wilted, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour chicken broth into pot with vegetables and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Reduce heat to low and simmer chicken breasts in broth until chicken is no longer pink inside, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove chicken breasts and vegetables from broth with a slotted spoon, let chicken cool, and chop into bite-size pieces.
', 'Step 6: Set chicken and vegetables aside; retain chicken broth in pot.
', 'Step 7: Combine meat loaf mix, bread crumbs, egg, remaining 1/2 small onion, remaining 1/2 garlic clove, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper in a bowl; mix thoroughly.
', 'Step 8: Scoop about 1 1/2 teaspoon meat mixture and roll into a small meatball; repeat with remaining mixture.
', 'Step 9: Refrigerate meatballs until firm, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Bring chicken broth back to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer meatballs in broth until no longer pink inside, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove meatballs from chicken broth with a slotted spoon.
', 'Step 12: Retain chicken broth in pot.
', 'Step 13: Bring chicken broth back to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook lasagna noodles until cooked through but still slightly firm to the bite, about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 14: Drain and set noodles aside.
', 'Step 15: Reserve remaining chicken broth.
', 'Step 16: Combine chopped chicken, vegetables, ricotta cheese, and parsley in a bowl; season with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 17: Chill mixture for 10 minutes to become firm.
', 'Step 18: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 19: Coat the bottom of a large, deep baking dish with olive oil.
', 'Step 20: Place 3 cooked lasagna noodles into baking dish.
', 'Step 21: Layer 1/3 the ricotta-chicken mixture and 1/3 the meatballs over noodles; sprinkle layers with 1/3 cup Parmesan cheese and 2/3 cup mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 22: Repeat layers twice more, using 3 lasagna noodles, 1/3 the ricotta mixture, 1/3 the meatballs, 1/3 cup Parmesan cheese, and 2/3 cup mozzarella cheese per layer.
', 'Step 23: Bring remaining chicken broth to a boil, reduce heat to low, and whisk cornstarch into chicken broth until thickened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Pour thickened chicken broth over casserole.
', 'Step 25: Sprinkle remaining 1/3 cup Parmesan and 2/3 cup mozzarella cheese over top.
', 'Step 26: Bake casserole in the preheated oven until bubbling and cheese topping has melted, about 20 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '359.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '23.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '86.2 mg', 'fatContent': '16.6 g', 'fiberContent': '2.9 g', 'proteinContent': '29.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '8.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '481.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.8 g'}

Title: Chicken Florentine with Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '1 cup chopped onion', '½ cup cream cheese, softened', '3 tablespoons butter, melted', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '2 cups spaghetti sauce', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper, divided', '1 teaspoon crushed garlic', '4 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken cutlets, pounded to 1/4-inch thickness']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Butter a 1 1/2-quart loaf pan.
', 'Step 3: Combine spinach, onion, cream cheese, butter, and Parmesan cheese in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 4: Lay 1/2 of the spinach mixture over the bottom of the prepared pan.
', 'Step 5: Combine spaghetti sauce, 1 teaspoon pepper, and garlic in another bowl.
', 'Step 6: Stuff each chicken cutlet with 1/4 of the remaining spinach mixture.
', 'Step 7: Fold in half and place in the pan.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle with remaining pepper and pour spaghetti sauce mixture over top.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 50 minutes.
']

Title: Shrimp-Asparagus Alfredo Pasta
Ingredients: ['½ (12 ounce) package rotini pasta', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 pound raw shrimp, peeled and deveined', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '3 cups chopped fresh asparagus', '¼ cup water', '1 cup grape tomatoes, halved', '¾ cup Parmesan cheese', '½ cup half-and-half', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', 'cracked black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook pasta at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, 7 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 2: While the pasta is cooking, melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Add shrimp and garlic; saute until the shrimp are bright pink on the outside and the meat is opaque, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove shrimp to a covered dish; keep warm.
', 'Step 5: Add asparagus and water to the hot skillet; cover and steam until the asparagus is tender-crisp, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add tomatoes; steam until heated through, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Uncover and reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 8: Drain pasta and add to the skillet.
', 'Step 9: Add shrimp, Parmesan cheese, and half-and-half, stirring gently to combine.
', 'Step 10: Cook until sauce thickens, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle with parsley and season with pepper to serve.
']

Title: Chicken Tetrazzini II
Ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 stalk celery', '1 (4.5 ounce) can sliced mushrooms', '1 (12 fluid ounce) can evaporated milk', '8 ounces processed cheese food (eg. Velveeta)', '½ cup butter', '⅓ cup dry sherry', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '¼ cup cornflakes cereal', '1 pinch paprika', '¾ (12 ounce) package egg noodles, cooked and drained']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Boil chicken breasts and celery in 4 cups of water for about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Remove from heat and remove chicken from water to cool.
', 'Step 3: When chicken is cooled, shred and set aside.
', 'Step 4: In a large skillet, melt butter or margarine.
', 'Step 5: Drain mushrooms, reserving liquid, and add to skillet.
', 'Step 6: Heat thoroughly, seasoning with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Add evaporated milk, reserved mushroom liquid and sherry, stirring well.
', 'Step 8: Add cheese a few slices at a time until thoroughly melted and blended.
', 'Step 9: Add shredded chicken and bring to a slow boil.
', 'Step 10: Preheat oven to 350 degrees (175 C).
', 'Step 11: Grease a 9x13x2 glass baking dish.
', 'Step 12: Put in noodles at about a 1 1/2 inch depth and pour chicken mixture over noodles.
', 'Step 13: Stir to coat.
', 'Step 14: Top with cornflake crumbs and paprika, cover dish and bake for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Uncover dish and bake for 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 16: Serve warm.
']

Title: Rich Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['1 cup strong brewed coffee', '¼ cup milk', '¼ cup white sugar, divided', '3 tablespoons rum, divided', '36 ladyfingers', '2 egg yolks', '9 ounces mascarpone cheese', '2 egg whites', '⅛ teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix coffee, milk, 2 tablespoons sugar, and 2 tablespoons rum together in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Soak lady fingers in the coffee mixture.
', 'Step 3: Layer 1/2 of the soaked ladyfingers in the bottom of a 9x13 inch pan.
', 'Step 4: Beat egg yolks and 2 tablespoons sugar together in a bowl; add mascarpone cheese and 1 tablespoon of rum and mix well.
', 'Step 5: Beat egg whites in a bowl using an electric mixer until stiff peaks form; fold into mascarpone cheese mixture.
', 'Step 6: Spread 1/2 of mixture over soaked lady fingers; cover with second 1/2 of soaked lady fingers and cover evenly with remaining mascarpone cheese mixture.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle top with cocoa powder.
', 'Step 8: Refrigerate at least 3 hours.
']

Title: Tuscan Savory Sweet Potato Soup
Ingredients: ['5 sweet potatoes, peeled and quartered', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 large onion, diced', '1 pound bulk sweet Italian sausage', '2 cloves minced garlic', '8 ounces mushrooms, sliced', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 quart half-and-half, or as needed', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the sweet potatoes into a large pot and cover with cold water.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil; reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until tender, 6 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and allow to steam dry for a minute or two.
', 'Step 4: Puree potatoes in a food processor or blender in batches until smooth.
', 'Step 5: Return pureed potatoes to the large pot; set aside.
', 'Step 6: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook the onion in the hot oil until translucent, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add the sausage to the skillet and cook until completely browned, breaking the meat apart with the back of a wooden spoon as it cooks.
', 'Step 8: Stir the garlic, mushrooms, and Italian seasoning into the sausage-and-onion mixture; continue cooking until the mushrooms are tender, another 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Season with salt and pepper; transfer to the pot with the potatoes.
', 'Step 10: Place the large pot over low heat.
', 'Step 11: Pour the half-and-half over the mixture, stirring to mix.
', 'Step 12: Allow the soup to slowly heat until hot and to your desired consistency.
', 'Step 13: Garnish with Parmesan cheese to serve.
']

Title: Balsamic-Glazed Stuffed Chicken Breasts with Pesto and Parmesan
Ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '6 teaspoons sun-dried tomato oil, divided', '4 tablespoons shredded Parmesan cheese', '8 tablespoons basil pesto', '8 teaspoons drained and chopped oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', 'toothpicks', '⅓ cup balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '4 cloves garlic, minced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Cut a pocket 3/4 of the way through the thickest side of each chicken breast.
', 'Step 3: Season chicken with oregano, basil, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Pour 1 teaspoon sun-dried tomato oil on each breast, rubbing it and some of the seasoning inside each pocket.
', 'Step 5: Fill each breast with 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons basil pesto, 2 teaspoons sun-dried tomatoes, and 1/4 cup mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 6: Insert 3 to 4 toothpicks diagonally into each breast to seal.
', 'Step 7: Heat remaining 2 teaspoons sun-dried tomato oil in a cast iron skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Add stuffed chicken breasts and cook until golden, about 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 9: While the chicken is cooking, mix together balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, and garlic in a small bowl.
', 'Step 10: Pour into the skillet around the chicken.
', 'Step 11: Bring to a simmer and cook, stirring occasionally, until the balsamic glaze has thickened slightly, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Spoon some glaze over each breast.
', 'Step 13: Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and cook until cheese has melted and chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove toothpicks and drizzle with pan juices to serve.
']

Title: Spicy Clam Sauce
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '3 (10 ounce) cans chopped clams, drained with juices reserved', '3 tablespoons dried oregano leaves, crumbled', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese for topping']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add the garlic and drained clams; cook and stir for about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Season with oregano, pepper, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 4: Pour in the reserved clam juice.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat to low, and simmer for about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat and serve over pasta.
', 'Step 7: Garnish with Parmesan cheese, if desired.

Title: Vegan Polenta with Ragu
Ingredients: ['2 cups boiling water', '1 cup dry lentils', '1 cup texturized vegetable protein (TVP)', '1 cup vegetable broth', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small yellow onion, diced', '1 medium carrot, diced', '1 stalk celery, diced', '1 small red bell pepper, diced', '1 fresh hot pepper, minced', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 bay leaf', '¼ cup vegan red wine', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '2 cups vegetable broth', '1 cup water', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup Italian coarse-ground polenta cornmeal', '4 tablespoons vegan butter', '¼ cup shredded vegan white cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine boiling water and lentils in a bowl and set aside for 1 hour.
', 'Step 2: Combine texturized vegetable protein and broth in a separate bowl and set aside until liquid is absorbed.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a stew pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Add onion, carrot, celery, red bell pepper, and hot pepper.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir until onion is translucent, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add drained lentils and undrained texturized vegetable protein.
', 'Step 7: Stir and add oregano and bay leaf.
', 'Step 8: Add red wine and continue stirring, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 9: Add tomatoes.
', 'Step 10: Stir and simmer ragu until thickened and lentils are soft, 5 to 10 minutes; add a bit more water if needed.
', 'Step 11: Bring vegetable broth, water, and salt to a boil in a saucepan.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to low and sprinkle polenta into the water, stirring constantly to ensure there are no lumps.
', 'Step 13: Cook, stirring often, for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Add vegan butter, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 15: Distribute polenta evenly among 4 pasta bowls.
', 'Step 16: Remove bay leaf from ragu and discard.
', 'Step 17: Top each bowl with equal amounts of ragu.
', 'Step 18: Sprinkle 1 tablespoon vegan white cheese over each bowl and serve warm.
']

Title: Strufoli III
Ingredients: ['2 cups sifted all-purpose flour', '3 eggs', '1 pinch salt', '2 cups vegetable oil', '1 ¼ cups honey', '½ cup white sugar', '3 tablespoons pine nuts', "2 teaspoons confectioners' sugar"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Sift flour.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in center, and break eggs into it.
', 'Step 3: Add salt, and knead until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Roll dough out on lightly floured board until 1/4 inch thick.
', 'Step 5: Cut into 1/2 inch strips, and cut strips into tiny pieces 1/2 inch long.
', 'Step 6: With the palm of hands, shape these tiny pieces into balls the size of a filbert nut.
', 'Step 7: Heat oil to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Drop balls into oil 3 at a time.
', 'Step 9: Fry until lightly browned, turning them constantly with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 10: Remove balls and drain them.
', 'Step 11: Combine honey and sugar in saucepan and boil over low flame about 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 12: Add fried dough balls, 1 cup at a time, and cook in honey syrup, stirring constantly, for 1 minute.
', 'Step 13: Remove and put strufoli on flat plate to cool.
', "Step 14: Sprinkle with pine nuts and confectioners' sugar as soon as they are cool enough to handle, and mold about 5 together in a cluster.
", 'Step 15: Enough for 8, or so.
', 'Step 16: Strufoli will stay fresh for weeks if they are kept in a cool place.
']

Title: Melanzane Ripiene con Capperi e Olive (Stuffed Eggplant with Capers and Olives)
Ingredients: ['9 small eggplants, halved lengthwise', '2 eggs', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons capers', '2 tablespoons pitted and sliced black olives', '2 (16 ounce) cans tomato sauce, divided', '1 bunch fresh parsley, chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Arrange eggplant halves cut-side up in a baking pan.
', 'Step 3: Cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Cool until easily handled, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Increase oven temperature to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Scoop pulp out of the eggplants using a spoon, leaving skins intact.
', 'Step 8: Chop pulp coarsely and transfer to a bowl.
', 'Step 9: Mix in eggs, Parmesan cheese, capers, and olives.
', 'Step 10: Add 2 tablespoons tomato sauce, parsley, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Stuff eggplant skins with mixture.
', 'Step 12: Spread half of the remaining tomato sauce in the bottom of a baking dish.
', 'Step 13: Arrange stuffed eggplants on top.
', 'Step 14: Spoon remaining tomato sauce over each eggplant.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until topping is golden brown and tomato sauce is bubbly, 25 to 30 minutes.
']

Title: Risotto Con Radicchio, Gorgonzola, Noci, e Crema di Balsamico
Ingredients: ['1 quart vegetable stock, or as needed', '¼ cup olive oil, divided', '½ medium carrot, minced', '½ stalk celery, minced', '2 tablespoons minced onion', '¾ cup Arborio rice', '2 tablespoons red wine', '1 head radicchio, thinly sliced', '3 ounces Gorgonzola cheese, cut into cubes', '⅓ cup chopped walnuts', '2 tablespoons balsamic glaze (reduced balsamic vinegar)', '2 tablespoons grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring vegetable stock to a boil in a saucepan; reduce heat to low and keep simmering.
', 'Step 2: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a stockpot over medium heat; cook and stir carrot, celery, and onion until onion is translucent, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil; stir in rice.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir until rice is coated with oil and warm, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour in red wine and stir until rice is coated and wine is absorbed, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Pour 1 ladleful of warm vegetable stock into the rice mixture; cook, stirring continuously, until stock is absorbed, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Continue adding stock, 1 ladleful at a time, cooking and stirring after each addition until liquid is absorbed and risotto is easily broken when chewed, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir radicchio, Gorgonzola cheese, and walnuts into risotto until cheese is completely melted, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add more stock and cook until risotto is tender yet firm to the bite, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 10: Remove from heat and cover stockpot for 1 minute.
', 'Step 11: Spoon risotto onto plates and top with balsamic glaze and Parmigiano-Reggiano.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '965.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '92.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '49.4 mg', 'fatContent': '54.4 g', 'fiberContent': '5.7 g', 'proteinContent': '23.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '13.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '1453.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.2 g'}

Title: Miller's Marinara
Ingredients: ['¼ cup canola oil', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (10.75 ounce) can tomato puree', '2 ½ tablespoons garlic powder', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '2 tablespoons dried basil', '2 tablespoons salt', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the canola oil in a skillet over medium heat, and saute the onion until tender.
', 'Step 2: n In a slow cooker, mix the onion and remaining oil, crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, tomato puree, garlic powder, oregano, basil, salt, sugar, and pepper.
', 'Step 3: n Cover slow cooker, and cook sauce 8 hours on Low.
']

Title: Cucidati II
Ingredients: ['1 pound dried figs', '1 cup raisins', '2 ½ teaspoons orange zest', '½ pound chopped walnuts', '1 cup honey', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips', '1 cup orange marmalade', '2 ½ cups sifted all-purpose flour', '½ cup white sugar', '2 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '½ cup shortening', '2 eggs, beaten', '¼ cup milk', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Grind the figs, raisins, orange zest and walnuts in a food processor, blender or food grinder.
', 'Step 2: If the mixture is too thick, a couple of tablespoons of water can be added.
', 'Step 3: Gradually blend in the honey, cinnamon, chocolate chips and orange marmalade.
', 'Step 4: Set aside.
', 'Step 5: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Grease two baking sheets.
', 'Step 7: In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar and baking powder.
', 'Step 8: Cut in the shortening until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the eggs, milk and vanilla until the mixture can be gathered into a ball.
', 'Step 10: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface, and roll out to 1/4 inch thickness.
', 'Step 11: Cut the dough into strips that are 4 inches wide.
', 'Step 12: Spread filling onto one half of each strip lengthwise.
', 'Step 13: Fold the dough over to cover and seal the edges by pressing on them with the tines of a fork.
', 'Step 14: Slice the filled strips crosswise at an angle about every inch or so.
', 'Step 15: This will make diamond shapes.
', 'Step 16: Place the cookies onto the prepared cookie sheet.
', 'Step 17: Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown.
', 'Step 18: Remove from the baking sheet to cool on wire racks.
', "Step 19: Glaze with your favorite confectioners' glaze and top with sprinkles for added festivity.
"]

Title: Italian Capezzoli di Venere (Chocolate Truffles of Venus)
Ingredients: ['12 ounces high quality dark chocolate, chopped', '16 ounces canned whole chestnuts, drained', '6 tablespoons butter, softened', '½ cup white sugar', '¼ cup brandy', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '12 ounces high quality white chocolate, chopped - divided', '1 dash powdered red food coloring']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the dark chocolate into the top part of a double boiler over simmering water, and let the chocolate melt.
', 'Step 2: Turn off the heat and let the chocolate cool.
', 'Step 3: Place the chestnuts into the work bowl of a food processor, and process until the chestnuts are smoothly pureed, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Beat together the butter and sugar with an electric mixer until the mixture is light and fluffy, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the chestnuts, brandy, and vanilla extract until the mixture is smooth.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the chocolate, and pinch off about 1 tablespoon of filling per truffle.
', 'Step 7: Roll the mixture into balls about 1 inch in diameter.
', 'Step 8: If the mixture is too soft to hold its shape, chill for several minutes in refrigerator.
', 'Step 9: Reserve about 1 ounce of white chocolate for tempering, and about 1 ounce for coloring.
', 'Step 10: Melt the remaining 10 ounces of white chocolate over simmering water in a double boiler until the chocolate is melted and warm but not hot (about 105 degrees F (40 degrees C)).
', 'Step 11: Remove the pan containing the melted chocolate from the double boiler, and add about 1 ounce of chopped, unmelted white chocolate.
', 'Step 12: Stir the chocolate until the unmelted pieces of chocolate melt, and the temperature drops to 80 to 82 degrees F (27 to 28 degrees C)).
', 'Step 13: Carefully dip each center in the melted white chocolate, and gently place the truffle onto a piece of parchment paper or waxed paper to cool and harden, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Melt the remaining 1 ounce of chopped white chocolate over simmering water in a double boiler until the chocolate is melted and warm but not hot.
', 'Step 15: Stir in a very small amount of powdered red food coloring until you get a desired shade of pink.
', 'Step 16: Dip a little colored chocolate out with a spoon, dot each truffle with a pink dot, and allow the pink chocolate dots to set, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Place the truffles into paper candy cups to serve.
']

Title: Calzagatti (Pan-Fried Polenta and Beans)
Ingredients: ['3 cups water', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 cup polenta', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 ½ ounces guanciale, minced', '¼ cup minced white onion', '1 sprig fresh rosemary, leaves stripped and finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, whole', '1 cup Romano (cranberry) beans, rinsed and drained', '¼ cup canned, diced tomatoes', 'cheesecloth', '¼ cup light vegetable oil, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring 3 cups of water to boil in a large pot.
', 'Step 2: Add 1/2 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle in polenta, whisking constantly, to avoid lumps from forming.
', 'Step 4: Reduce heat and simmer, stirring often, until polenta is creamy and no longer gritty, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Turn off the heat.
', 'Step 6: While polenta is cooking, heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a skillet.
', 'Step 7: Add guanciale and saute until crispy.
', 'Step 8: Add minced onion, garlic clove, and rosemary and cook until garlic is lightly browned and fragrant but not burned, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 9: Remove and discard garlic clove.
', 'Step 10: Stir in cranberry beans and tomatoes and simmer until thickened a bit, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Fold bean mixture into polenta and mix well.
', 'Step 12: Pour into a 9-inch square glass dish or silicone cake pan and allow to cool, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Flip cooled polenta over and set out, covered with cheesecloth, to air-dry until most of the moisture has evaporated, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 14: Cut dried polenta into 2x3-inch rectangles.
', 'Step 15: Heat a pan over medium-high heat and add 2 tablespoons oil.
', 'Step 16: Add a few polenta rectangles to the hot oil and cook until brown and crisp, 3 to 4 minutes, without disturbing the calzagatti.
', 'Step 17: Flip, and cook until brown and crisp on the other side.
', 'Step 18: Remove and drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 19: Continue with the rest of the calzagatti, adding more oil as necessary.
']

Title: Pangiallo laziale (Italian Christmas Cakes)
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups chopped pitted prunes', '1 ¼ cups raisins', '¾ cup whole almonds, skin removed', '¾ cup chopped walnuts', '¾ cup toasted hazelnuts', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '1 tablespoon orange marmalade', '2 tablespoons chopped candied orange peel', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste', '2 tablespoons white wine', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '¾ cup all-purpose flour, or more as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Combine prunes, raisins, almonds, walnuts, hazelnuts, sugar, orange marmalade, candied orange peel, and cinnamon in a large bowl and stir to combine with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 4: Pour in wine and olive oil.
', 'Step 5: Add flour and mix everything into a sticky dough, adding more flour if mixture does not stick together.
', 'Step 6: Shape mixture into 8 similar sized logs with wet hands and place onto prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 30 minutes.
']

Title: Two Meatballs in One
Ingredients: ['4 sweet Italian pork sausage, casings removed', '½ cup water, or as needed', '2 ¼ pounds ground beef', '½ cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs', '¼ cup ketchup', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 egg', '2 teaspoons granulated garlic', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ sweet onion, minced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can no salt-added diced tomatoes with Italian herbs', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon dried sweet basil', '½ teaspoon lemon juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Form pork sausage into small 1/2-inch meatballs using a small scoop.
', 'Step 2: Fill a skillet with enough water to make a 1-inch depth; bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer.
', 'Step 3: Cook meatballs in the simmering water until cooked through, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove meatballs with a slotted spoon and cool on a paper towel-lined plate.
', 'Step 5: Drain water.
', 'Step 6: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Mix ground beef, bread crumbs, ketchup, Parmesan cheese, Worcestershire sauce, egg, granulated garlic, and 1 teaspoon black pepper in a large bowl.
', 'Step 8: Scoop ground beef mixture into about 1-inch portions using an ice cream scooper; form each portion around 1 small pork meatball to cover completely.
', 'Step 9: Arrange double meatballs on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until meatballs are browned and partially cooked, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat; cook and stir onion and garlic in the hot oil until onion is softened, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Add crushed tomatoes, diced tomatoes, sugar, Italian seasoning, 1 teaspoon black pepper, basil, and lemon juice; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 13: Reduce heat and simmer sauce for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Add meatballs to sauce and simmer, stirring gently, until meatballs are fully cooked, about 20 more minutes.
']

Title: Florentine Curried Chicken
Ingredients: ['2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup', '½ cup creamy salad dressing', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '3 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 teaspoon paprika', '2 (8 ounce) packages shredded Monterey Jack cheese']

', 'Step 2: In a medium bowl, thoroughly blend soup, creamy salad dressing, lemon juice, and curry powder.

Title: Strawberry and Balsamic Homemade Gelato
Ingredients: ['3 ½ cups fresh strawberries, hulled', '½ cup white sugar, divided', '1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar', '½ cup heavy whipping cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with a silicone non-stick mat that is larger than the tray to prevent juice from spilling onto the tray.
', 'Step 3: Combine strawberries, 1/4 cup sugar, and balsamic vinegar in a bowl; toss gently to coat.
', 'Step 4: Transfer to the baking sheet, scraping down the bowl with a spatula to ensure all the liquid is included.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from oven and set aside to cool, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Transfer cooled strawberries and all juice to the bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 8: Add remaining 1/4 cup sugar and cream; mix until smooth.
', "Step 9: Pour strawberry mixture into an ice cream maker and freeze according to manufacturer's instructions until it reaches the creamy texture of a gelato, 40 to 45 minutes.
", 'Step 10: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Butternut Squash Stuffed Shells
Ingredients: ['2 butternut squash, quartered and seeded', '3 cloves garlic', '½ cup cream', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 teaspoon minced rosemary', 'salt to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package jumbo pasta shells', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 red onion, sliced thin', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '¼ cup butter', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '3 ½ cups cream', '2 tablespoons goat cheese', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', 'cooking spray', '1 (10 ounce) bag spinach', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with water and bring to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Boil squash until very tender, 8-10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Lift squash out of water with a slotted spoon; cool slightly and peel.
', 'Step 4: Combine cooked squash, garlic, 1/2 cup cream, 2 tablespoons butter, and 1 teaspoon rosemary in a food processor; process until squash is smooth.
', 'Step 5: Salt to taste.
', 'Step 6: Bring the water back to a boil, adding more if necessary.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the shell pasta, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still very firm to the bite, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 10: Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Heat olive oil in a large skillet.
', 'Step 12: Stir in red onion and brown sugar.
', 'Step 13: Cook and stir over low heat, until onion is very soft and sweet, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove from skillet; reserve.
', 'Step 15: Melt 1/4 cup butter in the same skillet.
', 'Step 16: Sprinkle flour into butter and stir until incorporated.
', 'Step 17: Pour in 3 1/2 cups cream; whisk in goat cheese and remaining 1 teaspoon rosemary.
', 'Step 18: Cook until sauce is thick, 4-6 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Stir in the reserved onions.
', 'Step 20: Spray a 9 x 13-inch baking pan with cooking spray.
', 'Step 21: Scatter spinach over bottom of dish.
', 'Step 22: Stuff pasta shells evenly with butternut squash mixture and place atop spinach.
', 'Step 23: Bake shells in preheated oven until hot, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Top with sauce, and sprinkle with parsley to serve.
']

Title: Pizzelles IV
Ingredients: ['3 eggs, beaten', '¾ cup white sugar', '3 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons anise extract', '¾ cup butter, melted', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '¼ cup anise seed']

['Step 1: Preheat the pizzelle iron.
', 'Step 2: In a medium bowl, mix together the eggs and sugar.
', 'Step 3: Slowly add melted butter, vanilla, and anise extract, while mixing.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the flour, baking powder, and anise seeds.

', 'Step 6: Drop cookies by rounded tablespoons onto the center of the grid.
', 'Step 7: Close the iron and cook until steaming stops.
', 'Step 8: This could take 30 to 90 seconds, depending on the iron used.
']

Title: Cheesy Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (12 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese', '2 large eggs eggs', '2 cups shredded provolone cheese', '½ cup creamed cottage cheese', '6 slices bacon', '1 dash garlic powder', '2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add lasagna pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and rinse with cold water.
', 'Step 4: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet.
', 'Step 5: Cook over medium-high heat until evenly brown.
', 'Step 6: Drain, crumble and set aside.
', 'Step 7: Cook spinach according to directions; drain well.
', 'Step 8: In a bowl beat the cream cheese on medium speed with electric mixer.
', 'Step 9: Add eggs and beat until fluffy.
', 'Step 10: Stir in provolone cheese, cottage cheese, bacon and garlic powder.
', 'Step 11: Layer half of lasagna noodles in a greased baking dish.
', 'Step 12: Spread with half of cheese mixture and half of the spinach.
', 'Step 13: Top with the remaining lasagna noodles, spinach and cheese.
', 'Step 14: Cover and bake in a preheated oven for 30 minutes or until heated through.
']

Title: Anisette Biscotti
Ingredients: ['1 cup white sugar', '3 eggs', '1 cup chopped walnuts', '½ cup vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons anisette liqueur', '2 tablespoons brandy', '1 tablespoon anise seeds', '2 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Beat sugar and eggs in a large bowl with an electric mixer until smooth.
', 'Step 2: Mix in walnuts, oil, anisette liqueur, brandy, and anise seeds.
', 'Step 3: Fold in flour and baking powder until dough comes together.
', 'Step 4: Cover with plastic wrap and chill, about 3 hours.
', 'Step 5: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Grease 2 baking sheets.
', 'Step 7: Remove dough from refrigerator.
', 'Step 8: Use greased hands to shape half the dough into a 1 1/2-inch-wide log on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Repeat with remaining dough on second baking sheet.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven, switching baking sheets halfway through, until dough is pale golden and a toothpick inserted in the centers comes out clean, 17 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove from oven and cool until easily handled, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Transfer logs to a cutting board and slice into 1-inch pieces at a 45-degree angle using a sharp or serrated knife.
', 'Step 13: Arrange slices on their sides on the baking sheets.
', 'Step 14: Bake again in the preheated oven, flipping slices over halfway through, until lightly browned, about 14 minutes.
']

', 'Step 2: Blend until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Mix in the chives and cilantro.

Title: Pasta al Forno
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', '2 red onions, finely chopped', '½ pound ground beef, or more to taste', '½ pound bacon, chopped', '¼ cup white wine, or as needed', '2 (26 ounce) packages chopped tomatoes (such as Pomi®)', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '4 tablespoons white sugar, or more to taste', 'salt to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package rotini pasta (such as Barilla®)', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste', '⅓ pound chopped provolone cheese', '⅓ pound chopped mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a skillet over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onions and cook slowly until moisture has evaporated but onions are not dark brown, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add ground beef and bacon.
', 'Step 4: Increase heat to medium-high and cook, stirring frequently, until meat is browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour wine into the skillet and cook until evaporated, 1 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add chopped tomatoes and tomato paste.
', 'Step 7: Fill tomato paste can with water and pour in.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to a simmer and cook sauce, uncovered, until oil no longer appears on the surface, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add sugar and salt; cook and stir until dissolved, about 3 minutes more.
', 'Step 10: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Cook the rotini pasta at a boil for about 5 minutes; drain and rinse with cold water.
', 'Step 12: Return pasta to the pot and add a splash of olive oil to prevent sticking.
', 'Step 13: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Grease two 9x13-inch baking dishes.
', 'Step 15: Add about 1 cup sauce and 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese to the pot with the cooked pasta.
', 'Step 16: Spoon a thin layer of pasta into each prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 17: Top each with a thin layer of provolone and mozzarella cheeses.
', 'Step 18: Add sauce.
', 'Step 19: Repeat layers with remaining pasta, cheeses, and sauce; finish with a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 20: Bake in the preheated oven until hot and melted, 30 to 45 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '366.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '41.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '36.8 mg', 'fatContent': '12.5 g', 'fiberContent': '3.1 g', 'proteinContent': '19.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '688.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '11 g'}

Title: Farinata (Italian Flatbread)
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 green onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 cup chickpea flour', '1 cup lukewarm water', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons shredded Gruyere cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Brush a 9-inch tart pan with 2 tablespoons olive oil and place in the oven to warm up.
', 'Step 3: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a medium skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Add green onion and garlic.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir until softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 7: Mix chickpea flour with lukewarm water until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Set aside for 20 minutes at room temperature.
', 'Step 9: Skim foam from the top of chickpea-water mixture.
', 'Step 10: Add remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil.
', 'Step 11: Mix in onion-garlic mixture.
', 'Step 12: Season with salt, pepper, and nutmeg.
', 'Step 13: Add Gruyere cheese and mix well.
', 'Step 14: Remove tart tin from oven and pour in chickpea mixture.
', 'Step 15: Bake it in the preheated oven until crispy, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Remove from the oven and cut into triangles before serving.
']

Title: Dulcia Domestica
Ingredients: ['12 pitted dates', '¼ cup chopped, toasted pine nuts', '3 tablespoons red wine', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ cup honey']

', 'Step 2: Place dates in a small pan.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle with pepper if desired.
', 'Step 4: Add wine, then drizzle honey over dates.
', 'Step 5: Cook over medium heat until the skins begin to peel off the fruit.
', 'Step 6: Transfer dates to a serving dish, and allow to cool slightly before serving.
']

Title: Breaded Chicken Limone
Ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded to 1/2 inch thickness', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '2 cups bread crumbs', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 tablespoons butter, divided', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen Brussels sprouts, thawed and diced', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '¾ cup water', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 (16 ounce) can navy beans, drained', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon salt', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, for garnish', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese for topping']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Season flour, eggs, and bread crumbs with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Mix cayenne pepper into the flour only.
', 'Step 4: Dip each breast into flour, then into the beaten eggs, and then into the bread crumbs, coating evenly.
', 'Step 5: Place onto a greased cookie sheet.
', 'Step 6: Bake for 15 minutes on each side or until brown and crispy.
', 'Step 7: While chicken bakes, heat oil and 2 tablespoons of the butter in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Add garlic and Brussels sprouts and stir until garlic releases its fragrance and sprouts are heated through, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the flour.
', 'Step 10: Then add the water, lemon juice, drained beans, and sugar.
', 'Step 11: Stir over medium heat until sauce thickens, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Add additional water if sauce is too thick.
', 'Step 13: Remove from the heat and stir in remaining butter, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 14: Place each piece of chicken onto a serving plate.
', 'Step 15: Spoon the sauce over it and garnish with chopped parsley and remaining Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Spinach, Artichoke, and Carrot White Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 large head garlic', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (10 ounce) bag baby spinach', 'hot water to cover', '1 (32 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan-Romano cheese blend', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '12 lasagna noodles', '6 tablespoons butter', '1 cup heavy whipping cream', '½ cup milk', '4 ounces Neufchatel cheese', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 egg yolks', '1 cup shredded carrots', '1 (16 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Slice off the top portion of the garlic head to expose each clove.
', 'Step 4: Place garlic head on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 5: Drizzle olive oil over garlic and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Roast garlic in the preheated oven until tender and fragrant, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Cool garlic until easily handled.
', 'Step 8: Remove garlic cloves from the peels.
', 'Step 9: Place spinach in a bowl.
', 'Step 10: Pour enough hot water over spinach to cover; set aside until wilted.
', 'Step 11: Drain and squeeze liquid from spinach.
', 'Step 12: Mix ricotta cheese, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, Parmesan-Romano cheese blend, egg, and Italian seasoning together in a bowl.
', 'Step 13: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 14: Cook lasagna in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Drain.
', 'Step 16: Heat butter in a saucepan over medium heat until melted.
', 'Step 17: Stir cream and milk into melted butter until thickened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Stir Neufchatel cheese into cream mixture until melted, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Add roasted garlic cloves, garlic salt, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper; stir well.
', 'Step 20: Stir 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese into cream mixture; cook until cheese sauce is smooth, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Stir egg yolks into cheese sauce until fully incorporated.
', 'Step 22: Remove saucepan from heat.
', 'Step 23: Arrange 4 lasagna noodles in the bottom of the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 24: Layer 1/2 of the carrots, 1/2 of the artichoke hearts, 1/2 of the ricotta mixture, 1/2 of the spinach, 1/2 of the alfredo sauce, 4 lasagna noodles, respectively, over the lasagna noodles.
', 'Step 25: Repeat layering with remaining ingredients, ending with a layer of lasagna noodles topped with 2 cups mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 26: Cover dish loosely with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 27: Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 28: Remove foil and continue baking until cheese is bubbling and lightly browned, about 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 29: Remove lasagna from oven and let rest for 5 minutes before slicing.
']

Title: Linguine with Portobello Mushrooms

Title: Garlic Anchovy Linguine
Ingredients: ['6 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '6 cloves garlic, chopped', '¾ cup finely chopped broccoli florets', '½ cup sliced mushrooms', '6 ounces anchovy fillets, chopped', '1 cup water', '¼ cup chopped green onions', '½ cup diced tomatoes', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta', '1 ½ tablespoons crushed red pepper flakes', '1 pinch black pepper']

Title: Blue Cheese Lasagna
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '½ pound ground beef', '½ pound lean ground pork', '1 (24 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1 cup cottage cheese', '1 cup crumbled blue cheese', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 large egg, lightly beaten', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 (12 ounce) box no-boil lasagna noodles', '6 slices provolone cheese', '1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Coat the inside of a glass 9x5-inch loaf pan with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.

', 'Step 6: Mix spaghetti sauce and brown sugar into beef-pork mixture until sauce is well blended.

', 'Step 10: Spread 1/2 of the cheese mixture over noodle layer.
', 'Step 11: Layer 3 slices provolone, slightly overlapping, over cheese layer.
', 'Step 12: Sprinkle 1/2 of the Cheddar cheese over provolone cheese.
', 'Step 13: Repeat layering with the remaining ingredients ending in a layer of sauce.
', 'Step 14: Place the loaf pan on the prepared baking sheet and top loaf pan loosely with a piece of aluminum foil.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbling and cooked through, about 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 16: Let stand for 15 minutes before slicing.
']

Title: Homemade Saffron Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 pinch saffron threads', '2 tablespoons hot water', '2 ½ cups Italian-style tipo 00 flour', '3 large eggs', '1 pinch salt']

['Step 1: Soak saffron threads in hot water for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Place flour on a marble or wooden work surface.
', 'Step 3: Make a well in the center and crack in eggs; add salt and saffron water.

', 'Step 9: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 10: Place in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 11: Refrigerate until firm, 30 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 12: Roll out the dough with a pasta machine or with a rolling pin and cut into lasagna sheets or tagliatelle.
']

Title: Baby Portobella Alfredo Sauce

Title: Roasted Peppers with Pine Nuts and Parsley
Ingredients: ['2 red bell peppers', '2 yellow bell peppers', '2 ounces pine nuts', '⅓ cup golden raisins', '1 clove garlic, minced', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '½ cup olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 10: Slice the roasted peppers into strips, and arrange decoratively onto a serving platter, alternating red and yellow strips.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle the peppers with toasted pine nuts, raisins, garlic, and parsley, drizzle with olive oil, and season to taste with salt and black pepper.
']

Title: Italian Lemon Knot Cookies
Ingredients: ['3 cups all-purpose flour', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '½ teaspoon salt', '¾ cup white sugar', '½ cup unsalted butter, at room temperature', '¼ cup shortening', '4 large eggs', '2 tablespoons lemon extract', "1 ½ cups confectioners' sugar", '4 tablespoons milk, or more as needed', '1 teaspoon lemon extract', '2 tablespoons multicolored candy sprinkles, or to taste']

['Step 1: Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Cream sugar, butter, and shortening together in a large bowl until light and fluffy.

', 'Step 4: Beat in lemon extract.
', 'Step 5: Add flour mixture gradually, beating well to combine.
', 'Step 6: Wrap dough in waxed paper and refrigerate for 1 hour.

', 'Step 8: Grease 2 baking sheets.

', 'Step 10: Break off golf ball-sized pieces of dough.

', 'Step 17: Spread icing evenly on top of the slightly warm cookies and add sprinkles.
']

Title: Three Pepper Pesto

Title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Banana Biscotti
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '4 ripe bananas, mashed', '1 (15.25 ounce) package chocolate cake mix', '½ cup water', '2 large eggs', '¼ cup vegetable oil', '1 ½ cups peanut butter chips', '¼ cup honey']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray two 9x5-inch loaf pans with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Combine bananas, cake mix, water, eggs, and oil in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Whisk until well blended, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Gently fold in peanut butter chips.
', 'Step 6: Divide batter evenly between the prepared loaf pans.
', 'Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the centers comes out clean, 40 to 50 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Reduce oven temperature to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Let bread cool in pans for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove and finish cooling on a wire rack.
', 'Step 11: Place a second cooling rack on top of a baking sheet.
', 'Step 12: Slice loaves in half horizontally and then into 1-inch-thick pieces.
', 'Step 13: Brush 1 side of each slice lightly with honey and place on the prepared cooling rack.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until golden and crispy, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Cool on the rack for at least 10 minutes; the biscotti will become crispier as they cool.
']

Title: Naunie's Pastera (Leftover Easter Pasta Bake)
Ingredients: ['2 ½ tablespoons olive oil, divided', '¼ pound elbow macaroni', '¼ pound ziti pasta', '¼ pound farfalle (bow tie) pasta', '¼ pound radiatore pasta', '1 pound sweet Italian sausage links, cut into 1/2- inch slices', '12 jumbo eggs, or more if needed', '½ cup shredded Pecorino Romano cheese, or more if needed', 'salt to taste', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or more to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a large baking sheet with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 3: Grease a 2-quart and a 1 1/2-quart round glass baking dish each with 3/4 teaspoon olive oil; drizzle 1 tablespoon of remaining olive oil into bottom of each baking dish.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook macaroni, ziti, farfalle, and radiatore pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain.
', 'Step 7: Arrange sausage slices on foil-lined baking sheet.
', 'Step 8: Bake sausage in the preheated oven until browned and crisp, 30 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Lower oven heat to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Beat eggs in a large bowl until foamy, using an electric mixer.
', 'Step 11: Add Pecorino-Romano cheese, salt, and black pepper; continue to beat egg mixture with electric mixer on highest speed until eggs and cheese are blended, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Stir cooked pasta into eggs and cheese; mixture should be runny and look like pasta is floating in egg mixture.
', 'Step 13: Stir additional beaten eggs and Pecorino-Romano cheese into mixture if more egg mixture is needed.
', 'Step 14: Ladle spoonfuls of egg-pasta mixture into each casserole, followed by a layer of sausage; continue layering pasta mixture and sausage until all sausage has been used.
', 'Step 15: Top casseroles with final layer of pasta mixture.
', 'Step 16: Drizzle top of each casserole with 1 tablespoon olive oil.
', 'Step 17: Small pieces of pasta should stick out of the egg mixture.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the oven until casseroles are set in the center, about 1 hour; raise oven heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and continue baking until the tops of casseroles are browned and crispy, 1 to 1 1/2 more hours.
']

Title: Fire and Ice Pasta
Ingredients: ['⅔ cup chopped fresh basil', '1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 ½ teaspoons minced garlic', '1 (6 ounce) can sliced black olives', '1 ½ cups olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ cup chopped fresh chives', '½ cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes', '1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '6 ounces goat cheese', '2 (16 ounce) packages farfalle pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl mix together the basil, diced tomatoes, garlic, olives, olive oil, salt, pepper, chives, sun dried tomatoes, and red pepper chile flakes.
', 'Step 2: Cover and place in refrigerator for a few hours or overnight.
', 'Step 3: Remove sauce from refrigerator 2 hours before serving, to allow ingredients to come to room temperature.
', 'Step 4: In a large pot with boiling salted water cook farfalle pasta until al dente.
', 'Step 5: Drain.
', 'Step 6: Toss cooked pasta with room temperature sauce.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle with goat cheese, if desired.
']

Title: Sunday Gravy
Ingredients: ['1 ½ slices white bread, left out overnight to become stale', '1 ½ pounds ground beef', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup finely chopped Italian leaf parsley', '1 large egg', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '⅓ cup extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '1 ½ pounds sweet Italian sausage', '1 ½ pounds pork ribs', '6 cloves garlic, finely chopped, or more to taste', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 medium sweet onion, chopped', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', '3 (28 ounce) cans unpeeled crushed tomatoes, or more as needed', '1 (28 ounce) can tomato puree', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '8 leaves fresh basil, chopped, or more to taste', '1 bay leaf, or to taste', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 ½ cups dry red wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Break stale bread into very small pieces and add to a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Add beef, Parmesan cheese, parsley, and egg.
', 'Step 3: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 4: Mix well and use wet hands to roll mixture into meatballs.
', 'Step 5: Heat about 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Brown meatballs on all sides, about 5 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 7: Transfer meatballs to a platter.
', 'Step 8: Add sausage and pork ribs to the skillet and brown, about 5 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 9: Transfer to the platter with the meatballs.
', 'Step 10: Heat about 2 tablespoons olive oil in an 8- to 10-quart pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Add garlic and cook just until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 12: Add tomato paste and stir to combine.
', 'Step 13: Add onion and cook until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Add whole tomatoes and mash using a potato masher.
', 'Step 15: Add crushed tomatoes and tomato puree; cook, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 16: Add browned sausage and ribs to the pot.
', 'Step 17: Stir in sugar, basil, bay leaf, and oregano.
', 'Step 18: Cook until bubbling with lid ajar, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Reduce heat to lowest setting and cook, stirring frequently to prevent sticking, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 20: Stir in red wine.
', 'Step 21: Continue cooking about 1 and 1/2 to 2 hours more.
', 'Step 22: Remove sauce from heat and cover.
', 'Step 23: Let sit 30 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 24: Return sauce to medium heat and add meatballs.
', 'Step 25: Cook, stirring frequently, until bubbling, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 26: Reduce heat to lowest setting until ready to serve.
']

Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', '2 slices Italian bread', '1 tablespoon pesto', '2 slices mozzarella cheese', '¼ pound sliced cooked chicken breast']

', 'Step 2: Spread olive oil on one side of each bread slice.
', 'Step 3: Place one slice of bread, oil-side down, on the preheated grill.
', 'Step 4: Spread 1/2 of the pesto on the bread and put a slice of mozzarella cheese over top.

', 'Step 6: Spread remaining pesto on the other slice of bread and place on top of the sandwich.
', 'Step 7: Close the grill and cook until cheese is melted and bread is golden brown and crispy, about 4 minutes.
']

Title: Homemade Red Pasta Dough
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups Italian tipo "00" flour, or more to taste', '3 large eggs', '1 pinch salt', '1 ½ tablespoons tomato paste', '1 tablespoon water, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place flour on a marble or wooden work surface.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the center and crack in eggs; add salt and tomato paste.
', 'Step 3: Gently beat eggs with a fork, incorporating the surrounding flour, until batter is runny.
', 'Step 4: Bring remaining flour into the batter using a bench scraper until dough forms a ball.
', 'Step 5: Mix in water, 1 tablespoon at a time, if dough feels too stiff.
', 'Step 6: Knead dough with your hands by flattening the ball, stretching it, and folding the top towards the center.
', 'Step 7: Turn 45 degrees and repeat until dough is soft and smooth, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 9: Place in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 10: Refrigerate until firm, 30 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 11: Roll dough out using a pasta machine or rolling pin and turn into your favorite pasta shape.
']

Title: Angeletti (Italian Christmas Cookies)
Ingredients: ['¾ cup white sugar', '½ cup unsalted butter, melted', '¼ cup whole milk', '3 large eggs', '1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', "2 cups confectioners' sugar", '3 ½ tablespoons water', '½ cup colored candy sprinkles']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a large cookie sheet.
', 'Step 3: Whisk together sugar, butter, milk, eggs, and vanilla in a large bowl until blended.
', 'Step 4: Mix flour, baking powder, and salt in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 5: Add to the wet ingredients and stir until evenly blended.
', 'Step 6: Cover the surface of the dough with plastic wrap or waxed paper and let stand for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: With floured hands, shape dough by level tablespoon into 1-inch balls.
', 'Step 8: Place balls 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheet.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until puffed on top and light brown on the bottom, 7 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove from the oven and transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Shape remaining dough into cookies and baking instructions.
', "Step 12: Whisk together confectioners' sugar and water in a small bowl until blended.
", 'Step 13: Dip the top of each cooled cookie into the glaze, then place on a wire rack set over waxed paper (this will catch any drips.
', 'Step 14: ) Immediately sprinkle cookies with candy sprinkles.
', 'Step 15: Allow glaze to set for about 20 minutes.
']

Title: Chiacchiere with Sanguinaccio
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '5 tablespoons white sugar', '1 pinch salt', '2 eggs', '3 tablespoons butter, melted', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons dry white wine', '2 tablespoons rum', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest', '5 cups white sugar', '1 cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 ½ cups cornstarch', '1 quart whole milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '13 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate', '1 quart vegetable oil for frying', '½ cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips', "¼ cup confectioners' sugar"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Sift the flour, 5 tablespoons sugar, and salt into a large bowl, and make a well in the center.
', 'Step 2: Whisk together the eggs, butter, olive oil, wine, rum, and lemon zest in a separate bowl until smooth; pour into the flour mixture.
', 'Step 3: Stir together until a dough forms, then knead on a lightly floured work surface until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Place into a lightly oiled bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and set aside for 1 hour.
', 'Step 5: While the dough rests, stir together 5 cups white sugar, cocoa powder, cinnamon, and cornstarch in a large saucepan.
', 'Step 6: Slowly pour in the milk, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the vanilla.
', 'Step 8: Add the unsweetened chocolate, and bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 9: Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring constantly, then remove from the heat and allow the sauce to cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 10: Transfer the dough to a lightly floured work surface.
', 'Step 11: Roll with a well-floured rolling pin to a thickness of 1/8 of an inch.
', 'Step 12: Use a sharp knife to cut the dough into 2x5 inch rectangles.
', 'Step 13: Alternately, pinch off an egg-sized piece of dough and roll it through a pasta machine.
', 'Step 14: Repeat with the remaining dough.
', 'Step 15: Heat oil in deep-fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Fry the Chiacchiere a few at a time until golden brown; remove and drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
', 'Step 17: To serve, pour the cooled Sanguinaccio sauce into a bowl, and sprinkle with chocolate chips to garnish.
', "Step 18: Place the fried Chiacciere onto a serving platter and sprinkle with confectioner's sugar to serve.
"]
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '215.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '35.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '11.7 mg', 'fatContent': '8.5 g', 'fiberContent': '2.2 g', 'proteinContent': '2.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '19.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '24.8 g'}

Title: Instant Pot® Risotto alla Milanese
Ingredients: ['3 cups low-sodium chicken broth', '2 pinches saffron', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup finely diced onion', '¼ cup dry white wine', '1 ½ cups Arborio rice', '3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese, plus more for serving', '1 tablespoon butter']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat chicken broth in a sauce pan over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Add saffron threads and simmer without boiling.
', 'Step 3: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 4: Add oil and allow to get hot.
', 'Step 5: Stir in onion and cook until soft and translucent, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in rice and saute, stirring frequently, for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Deglaze with white wine and allow to reduce by half.
', 'Step 8: Pour hot broth and saffron mixture into the Instant Pot® and stir to combine.
', 'Step 9: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 10: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 6 minutes.
", 'Step 11: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 12: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method in short bursts according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 13: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 14: Stir in Parmesan cheese and butter and allow to sit for 3 minutes before serving.
', 'Step 15: Top each serving with additional Parmesan cheese, if desired.
']

Title: Fusion Risotto Vegan
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons margarine (such as Earth Balance®)', '3 basil leaves, finely chopped', '2 bunches fresh chives, finely chopped', '6 cups vegetable stock, or more if needed', '1 onion, cubed', '1 tomato, cubed', '3 Yukon gold potatoes, cubed', '2 tablespoons garlic powder', '2 tablespoons onion powder', '1 tablespoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon paprika', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (16 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained and rinsed', '2 cups Arborio rice']

', 'Step 2: Heat vegetable stock in a separate saucepan over medium-low heat; keep warm.

', 'Step 6: Stir warm vegetable stock, 1 cup at a time, into rice mixture, waiting until the broth is absorbed before adding next cup.

']

Title: Wild Risotto
Ingredients: ['5 cups water', '¼ cup uncooked wild rice', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '6 green onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 ½ cups uncooked Arborio rice', '½ cup white wine', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh tarragon', '2 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped', '⅔ cup coconut milk', '1 cup frozen green peas, thawed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a saucepan, bring 1 cup water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add the wild rice, cover the pan, and reduce the heat.
', 'Step 3: Simmer for 25 minutes; drain well.
', 'Step 4: Bring 4 cups water to simmer in a large saucepan.
', 'Step 5: Keep the water simmering while you begin step number 3.
', 'Step 6: Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan.
', 'Step 7: Saute the scallions and garlic over medium-high heat for 1 minute.
', 'Step 8: Add the Arborio rice; stir it for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Pour the wine, the wild rice, and the tarragon into the frying pan.
', 'Step 10: Cook, stirring frequently, for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Pour 1/2 cup of the heated water into the frying pan.
', 'Step 12: Stir frequently until the liquid is absorbed, then add 1/2 cup more water.
', 'Step 13: Continue adding the water in this manner, waiting between additions until the liquid is absorbed and stirring frequently.
', 'Step 14: After about 18 to 20 minutes most of the liquid should be absorbed, and the rice should be tender but still slightly chewy.
', 'Step 15: When all of the water is absorbed, add the tomatoes, coconut milk, and peas.
', 'Step 16: Stir in the mixture, and simmer it, stirring often, until most of the liquid is absorbed.
', 'Step 17: Serve at once.
']

Title: Italian Gravy
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 large yellow onion, diced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '4 pounds pork shoulder roast', '½ cup white wine', '3 cups water', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '3 tablespoons garlic powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '2 (28 ounce) cans tomato puree', '6 cups water', '¼ cup white sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large stock pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Saute onions and garlic until lightly browned.

Title: Pantry Pasta Salad

Title: Meatball Grinders with a Yummy Sauce
