Title: Chicken Lasagna with Spinach
Ingredients: ['8 tablespoons butter, divided', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces', '12 fresh mushrooms, sliced', '½ cup chopped onion', '8 cloves garlic, minced, divided', 'salt, divided', '¾ teaspoon ground black pepper, divided', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '3 (9 ounce) packages fresh spinach', '2 cups whipping cream', '2 cups half-and-half', '2 teaspoons onion powder', '1 teaspoon crushed dried sage', '1 bay leaf', 'cooking spray (such as Pam®)', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '3 ½ cups shredded Parmesan cheese, divided', '⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 (32 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 3 tablespoons butter and olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add chicken, mushrooms, onion, 1/2 of the minced garlic, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper; cook until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove from the heat and stir in spinach; set aside.
', 'Step 4: While chicken is cooking, bring 2 large pots of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water in one pot, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 7: Drop spinach into the boiling water in the second pot and blanch for 1 minute; pour into a colander to drain.
', 'Step 8: Combine cream, half-and-half, remaining garlic, onion powder, sage, and bay leaf in a microwave-safe bowl.
', 'Step 9: Microwave on high power in 1-minute increments until boiling; stir well.
', 'Step 10: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Spray a 12x15-inch piece of aluminum foil with cooking spray.
', 'Step 12: Melt remaining 5 tablespoons butter in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 13: Add flour; stir and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Continue stirring and add cream mixture.
', 'Step 15: Cook until thickened, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Stir in 1 1/2 cups Parmesan cheese, remaining 1/2 teaspoon each salt and pepper, and nutmeg.
', 'Step 17: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 18: Meanwhile, mix ricotta cheese and 3 cups mozzarella cheese in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 19: Fold in 1/4 cup of the cream sauce.
', 'Step 20: Assemble lasagna in a deep 9x13-inch baking dish as follows, spreading ingredients in each layer: 1/2 cup cream sauce, 1/3 of the chicken-spinach mixture, 1/3 of the noodles, 1/2 cup cream sauce, 1/3 of the chicken-spinach mixture, 1/2 of the ricotta mixture, 1/4 cup cream sauce, 1/3 of the noodles, 1/2 cup cream sauce, remaining chicken-spinach mixture, remaining ricotta mixture, remaining noodles, remaining cream sauce, remaining Parmesan, and remaining mozzarella.
', 'Step 21: Cover with the aluminum foil, sprayed-side down.
', 'Step 22: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Remove foil and bake until top starts to turn golden, about 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 24: Remove from oven and let rest for 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Halloumi Parmigiana
Ingredients: ['1 small eggplant, cut into 1/2-inch rounds', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 large egg', '1 cup bread crumbs', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '1 cup oil for frying, or as needed', '1 (8.8 ounce) package halloumi cheese, cut into 4 sticks', '½ (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 ¼ cups spaghetti sauce', '8 tablespoons finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place sliced eggplant into a large pot.
', 'Step 2: Cover with salt and add enough water to cover.
', 'Step 3: Place a plate on top of the rounds to keep them submerged; allow to sit for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: While eggplant soaks, whisk egg in a shallow dish.
', 'Step 5: Combine bread crumbs, oregano, black pepper, and cayenne pepper in another shallow dish.
', 'Step 6: Heat oil in a deep skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Drain eggplant and discard water.
', 'Step 8: Rinse eggplant and squeeze out as much water as possible.
', 'Step 9: Pat slices dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 10: Dredge eggplant slices in egg and then bread crumb mixture and place on a plate.
', 'Step 11: Dredge halloumi cheese sticks in egg and then bread crumb mixture and place on a plate.
', 'Step 12: Fry breaded eggplant slices in the hot oil until browned, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Flip and fry on the other side, about 2 minutes more.
', 'Step 14: Drain on clean paper towels.
', 'Step 15: Repeat with halloumi cheese sticks.
', 'Step 16: Meanwhile bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 17: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Toss cooked pasta with extra-virgin olive oil.
', 'Step 19: Pour spaghetti sauce into a small saucepan and heat over medium heat until hot, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Divide cooked spaghetti onto 4 plates.
', 'Step 21: Evenly distribute eggplant and halloumi cheese.
', 'Step 22: Top with equal amounts of spaghetti sauce and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
']

Title: Rich Panettone
Ingredients: ['¼ cup milk', '¼ cup heavy cream', '¼ cup dark rum', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '⅓ cup butter, softened', '2 eggs', '¼ cup white sugar', '¾ teaspoon salt', '1 ½ teaspoons lemon zest', '3 cups flour', '1 tablespoon yeast', '½ cup candied fruit', '½ cup golden raisins', '¼ cup chopped almonds', '1 egg white, room temperature', '2 tablespoons water', '¼ cup white sugar', '½ cup sliced almonds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the milk, cream, rum, vanilla extract, butter, eggs, sugar, salt, lemon zest, flour, and yeast into the pan of a bread machine in the order listed.
', 'Step 2: Set machine to Bread Dough for a 1.
', 'Step 3: 5 pound loaf; press start.
', 'Step 4: When dough has been kneaded 10 minutes, add the candied fruit, raisins, and chopped almonds and continue to knead.
', 'Step 5: Grease 2 9x5-inch pans.
', 'Step 6: When the kneading and rising cycles of the bread machine have completed, remove the dough.
', 'Step 7: Turn out onto a lightly floured board and divide into two equal portions.
', 'Step 8: Spread dough into prepared bread pans.
', 'Step 9: Cover loosely with plastic wrap; allow to rise for 1/2 hour.
', 'Step 10: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Whisk together the egg white, water, 1/4 cup sugar, and the sliced almonds.
', 'Step 12: Spoon mixture evenly over loaves.
', 'Step 13: Bake in preheated oven until a knife inserted into the center of a loaf comes out clean, about 35 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Cool on rack for 5 minutes before slicing.
', 'Step 15: Serve warm or at room temperature.
']

Title: Slow Cooker Chicken Meatballs in Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['5 cups crushed and strained tomatoes (such as Aurora®)', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 pound lean ground chicken', '1 large egg', '½ cup fresh bread crumbs', '½ cup finely grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup grated onion', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 large clove garlic, minced', '½ teaspoon salt', 'ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 4: Use your hands to gently mix together.
', 'Step 5: Roll into 1 1/2-inch balls and place into the sauce.

', 'Step 7: Place the lid on the slow cooker and drape a thick kitchen towel over it.
', 'Step 8: Cook on High for 2 1/2 hours until meatballs are cooked through.

Title: Potato, Rice and Zucchini Bake
Ingredients: ['¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '1 tomato, diced', '2 tablespoons chopped onion', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 sprig fresh parsley, chopped', '2 pounds potatoes, thickly sliced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup rice', '2 large zucchini, thinly sliced', '1 cup vegetable broth, or as needed', '2 tablespoons bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']

Title: Italian Pistachio Gelato
Ingredients: ['¾ cup Bronte pistachios, shelled', '¾ cup whole milk', '2 eggs', '6 tablespoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon orange blossom water', '¾ cup heavy cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and boil pistachios for 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain and remove the skin from the pistachios by rubbing them inside a clean and dry cloth.
', 'Step 3: Spread out on another clean cloth and let them dry completely, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 4: Grind pistachios in a blender or using a mortar and pestle until they form a paste.
', 'Step 5: Set aside.
', 'Step 6: Pour milk into a saucepan over medium heat and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 7: Remove from heat and set aside to cool slightly.
', 'Step 8: Combine eggs and sugar in a bowl and beat using an electric mixer until pale and fluffy, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Pour into the saucepan with the milk and stir well.
', 'Step 10: Return the pan to low heat and cook until just simmering.
', 'Step 11: Remove from heat and transfer to a bowl to stop the cooking process.
', 'Step 12: Stir in orange blossom water.
', 'Step 13: Transfer ground pistachios to a bowl, add egg-milk mixture, and stir well to combine.
', 'Step 14: Set aside.
', 'Step 15: Beat cream in a chilled glass or metal bowl using an electric mixer until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 16: Gently fold pistachio mixture into the bowl with the cream.
', "Step 17: Pour mixture into an ice cream maker and freeze according to manufacturer's instructions, about 20 minutes.
", 'Step 18: Transfer to an airtight container and freeze until firm, about 4 hours.
']

Title: Vegan Spaghetti
Ingredients: ['1 large zucchini', '½ cup vegetable broth, or as needed, divided', '1 small onion, diced', '1 ½ tablespoons tomato paste', '1 small tomato, diced', '1 small portobello mushroom, cubed', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon dried tarragon', '½ teaspoon dried marjoram', '½ (12 ounce) package veggie meat substitute (such as Yves® Ground Round)', '2 cups fresh spinach, roughly chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut zucchini into noodles using a spiralizer fitted with the large shredding blade.

', 'Step 4: Cook until onion begins to soften, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add tomato, mushroom, garlic, oregano, thyme, tarragon, and marjoram.
', 'Step 6: Cook until the mushroom just begins to soften, about 3 minutes more.
', 'Step 7: Stir veggie meat, spinach, and remaining 1/4 cup broth into the pan with the mushroom mixture.
', 'Step 8: Add an additional 1/4 cup broth if the pan seems dry.
', 'Step 9: Cook and stir until vegetables are tender and sauce is beginning to thicken, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir zucchini noodles into the pan with the sauce and cook to desired firmness, 3 to 5 minutes more.
']

Title: Risotto ai Funghi Porcini in Pentola a Pressione (Porcini Mushroom Risotto)
Ingredients: ['4 ounces fresh porcini mushrooms', '3 cups beef stock', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 cup white wine, divided', '1 bunch fresh parsley, chopped, divided', 'salt to taste', '1 spring onion, finely sliced', '1 ½ cups Arborio rice', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons butter']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Brush dirt off porcini mushrooms with a clean cloth or vegetable brush.
', 'Step 2: Slice into bite-sized pieces.
', 'Step 3: Pour beef stock into a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 4: Cover and keep warm.
', 'Step 5: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Cook garlic until lightly golden, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 7: Stir in mushrooms; cook until slightly softened, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Pour in 1/2 cup wine; cook until alcohol evaporates, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Continue cooking until mushrooms are tender but still firm, adding a little beef stock if they look dry, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove skillet from heat; sprinkle half the parsley over mushrooms.
', 'Step 11: Season with salt.
', 'Step 12: Cover and keep warm.
', 'Step 13: Heat remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil in a stovetop pressure cooker.
', 'Step 14: Cook spring onion until softened, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 15: Add Arborio rice; cook and stir until toasted and coated with oil, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Increase heat and pour in remaining 1/2 cup wine; simmer until alcohol has evaporated and rice has absorbed most of the wine, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Stir beef stock into the pressure cooker.
', "Step 18: Seal according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 19: Increase heat to high; cook until cooker whistles, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Reduce heat to low and cook for 4 minutes.
', "Step 21: Remove cooker from heat and release pressure according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 22: Remove the lid.
', 'Step 23: Fold mushroom mixture, with 1 to 2 tablespoons cooking liquid, into the rice.
', 'Step 24: Stir in Parmesan cheese and butter.
', 'Step 25: Let stand for 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 26: Sprinkle remaining parsley on top.
']

Title: Thanksgiving Turkey with Italian Meat Stuffing
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '½ (1 pound) loaf day-old Italian bread', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 large stalks celery with leaves, chopped', '½ cup chopped fresh mushrooms', '4 cloves garlic, chopped, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', '½ cup freshly shredded Parmesan cheese', '1 large egg', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (15 pound) whole turkey, neck and giblets removed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 lemons, cut in half', '2 cloves garlic, chopped, or to taste', '2 teaspoons garlic powder, or to taste', '1 cup water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place the ground beef into a skillet, and cook and stir the meat until browned and crumbly, breaking it up into chunks as it cooks, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain grease.
', 'Step 4: Place the ground beef into a large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 5: Tear the bread into rough chunks, and place into a bowl; soak bread in water until moistened, and squeeze the water out of the bread.
', 'Step 6: Crumble the wet bread into the bowl with the ground beef.
', 'Step 7: Mix in the onion, celery, mushrooms, 4 cloves of garlic, flat-leaf parsley, Parmesan cheese, and egg until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 8: Season with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 9: Rinse the turkey, and pat dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 10: Lightly stuff the turkey with the ground beef mixture, and place into a roasting pan with a lid.
', 'Step 11: Rub the turkey with olive oil, squeeze lemons over the turkey, and sprinkle 2 more cloves of garlic, the garlic powder, and more salt and black pepper over the bird.
', 'Step 12: Roast the turkey uncovered in the preheated oven until the skin is browned, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Reduce heat to 350 degrees C (175 degrees C), and cover the turkey with the lid.
', 'Step 14: Continue roasting until the juices run clear and an instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part of a thigh reads 180 degrees F (80 degrees C), about 5 more hours.
', 'Step 15: Baste occasionally.
', 'Step 16: If the bottom of the roasting pan looks dry, pour in water.
']

Title: Italian One Step Casserole
Ingredients: ['1 pound sausages', '4 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '2 carrots, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '3 (15 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes with juice', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '1 pinch dried oregano']

', 'Step 2: Remove casings from sausages and cut into 1-inch pieces.

', 'Step 4: Layer the potatoes, carrots and onions over the sausages.
', 'Step 5: Then pour the tomatoes over all.

Title: Bon Appetit's Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds coarsely ground pork', '1 ½ pounds sweet Italian sausage without fennel, casings removed', '1 ½ pounds ground beef sirloin', '1 ½ pounds ground beef chuck', '½ loaf day-old (hard) Italian bread, torn into chunks', '1 (32 ounce) carton low-sodium chicken broth', '1 whole head garlic, minced', '1 cup packed fresh Italian parsley leaves', '4 large eggs, beaten', '8 ounces Pecorino Romano cheese (such as Locatelli®), grated', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine ground pork, Italian sausage, ground sirloin, and ground chuck in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Mix them with your hands until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 3: Soak bread chunks in chicken broth in a bowl until completely soft.
', 'Step 4: Combine garlic and parsley in a mini chopper or food processor and grind to a fine paste.
', 'Step 5: Squeeze the excess broth out of the bread, reserving the broth in a bowl, and add the bread to the meats along with the garlic and parsley paste.
', 'Step 6: Gently mix in beaten eggs and grated Pecorino Romano cheese with your hands until fully incorporated into the meat mixture.
', 'Step 7: If the mixture seems dry, pour in some of the reserved chicken broth.
', 'Step 8: Pinch off golf ball-sized pieces of the meat mixture and roll them into meatballs, taking care not to pack them too tightly, and set them on a baking tray.
', 'Step 9: Depending on how big you make them, you should end up with about 30 meatballs.
', 'Step 10: Heat the olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 11: Working in two or three batches, brown the meatballs on all sides and drain on paper towels.
', "Step 12: If you're adding them to a pot of sauce, you may undercook them slightly, as they will finish cooking in the sauce.
"]

Title: Merguez Bolognese Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 ounce pancetta, cut into 1/4-inch dice', '1 carrot, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch dice', '1 small yellow onion, cut into 1/4-inch dice', '1 stalk celery, cut into 1/4-inch dice', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ pound ground beef', '½ pound merguez sausage, casings removed', '½ cup Chianti wine', '4 ounces tomato paste', '½ cup whole milk, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a medium Dutch oven over medium heat until simmering.
', 'Step 2: Add pancetta and cook, stirring often, until fat has rendered, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add carrot, onion, and celery and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are soft and lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add ground beef and merguez sausage and increase heat to medium-high.
', 'Step 6: Cook, stirring to break meat into small pieces, until browned, 12 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain excess fat as needed.
', 'Step 8: Add Chianti and cook until liquid has almost evaporated.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat to medium and stir in tomato paste.
', 'Step 10: Cook until sauce turns dark red, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Add enough milk to barely cover the meat.
', 'Step 12: Continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until milk has evaporated and the mixture turns into a thick rich sauce, 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 13: Adjust salt and pepper, if necessary.
']

Title: Slow Cooker Turkey Sausage Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped, divided', '2 (28 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 ¾ teaspoons salt, divided', '2 pounds turkey sausage, casings removed and crumbled', '1 ¼ pounds lean ground turkey', '1 ¼ cups plain dry bread crumbs', '¾ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '2 large eggs', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add 1/2 of the garlic and saute for 30 seconds.
', 'Step 3: Scrape into the bottom of a slow cooker and stir in tomatoes, oregano, and 3/4 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 4: Combine remaining garlic, remaining salt, turkey sausage, ground turkey, bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, eggs, and parsley in a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Blend using your hands and form into 2-inch balls.
', 'Step 6: Place into the slow cooker.
', 'Step 7: Spoon tomato mixture over meatballs.
', 'Step 8: Cover and cook on Low until no longer pink in the center, 4 to 5 hours.
']

Title: Italian Heroes
Ingredients: ['1 (14 ounce) can marinated artichoke hearts, drained', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '4 (6 inch) French sandwich rolls', '¾ cup sliced roasted red peppers', '2 cups arugula leaves or spring mix', '8 ounces thinly sliced hard salami', '8 ounces thinly sliced provolone cheese', '4 pepperoncini peppers, drained and chopped', '½ cup sliced black olives', '½ red onion, thinly sliced']

', 'Step 2: Process until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Season with salt and pepper to taste.

', 'Step 5: Spread the artichoke paste onto each side of each roll.

', 'Step 7: Press sandwiches together, and wrap tightly in aluminum foil.

Title: Cannoli Crumb Pie
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '½ cup white sugar', '1 packet Lievito Pane Degli Angeli (such as Paneangeli®)', '1 packet vanillina (such as Paneangeli®)', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '½ cup unsalted butter, melted', '1 large egg, beaten', '1 (15 ounce) container whole-milk ricotta cheese', '½ cup white sugar', '½ cup mini semisweet chocolate chips']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray a deep-dish pie plate with nonstick cooking spray and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Place flour, sugar, livieto, vanillina, and salt in the bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 4: Pulse a few times to combine.
', 'Step 5: Drizzle in the butter and egg while pulsing.
', 'Step 6: Pulse only until the mixture is crumbly.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle 1/2 of the crumb mixture into the prepared pie plate and spread around until it covers the bottom.
', 'Step 8: Do not press down.
', 'Step 9: Stir ricotta cheese, sugar, and chocolate chips together with a rubber scraper until combined.
', 'Step 10: Spread filling evenly over the base crust.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle the remaining crumb mixture evenly on top of the ricotta layer, making sure that all of the ricotta layer is covered.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Switch the oven to broil and continue to bake until the top is nicely browned, about 3 minutes more.
', 'Step 14: Remove from the oven and cool completely.
', 'Step 15: Refrigerate until ready to serve.
']

Title: No Frying Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients: ['2 cups seasoned dry bread crumbs', '1 ½ cups grated Parmesan cheese', '2 (1 pound) medium eggplants, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices', '4 large eggs eggs, beaten with', '3 tablespoons water', '1 (26 ounce) jar Ragu® Robusto!® Pasta Sauce', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese']

', 'Step 2: Dip eggplant slices in egg mixture, then bread crumb mixture.

', 'Step 5: Evenly spread 1 cup Pasta Sauce in 13 x 9-inch baking dish.

Title: Cotechino and Braised Beans
Ingredients: ['1 pound dried cranberry beans', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '4 cups chicken broth', 'water as needed', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 bay leaf', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 sprig fresh rosemary', '1 sprig fresh thyme', '1 pound Cotechino sausage', '1 bunch Swiss chard, trimmed and chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place cranberry beans into a large container and cover with several inches of cool water; let stand 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 2: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Stir in onion.
', 'Step 4: Cook, stirring, until onions are softened and translucent, 6 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in cranberry beans, chicken broth, water, Italian seasoning, bay leaf, red pepper flakes, rosemary, and thyme.
', 'Step 6: Pierce Cotechino all over with the tip of a knife, then place in broth and beans mixture.
', 'Step 7: Bring to a simmer, skimming any foam that accumulates.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to low; cook until beans are tender, 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Transfer Cotechino to a cutting board; discard string and casing, then slice into 1/4-inch rounds.
', 'Step 10: Stir Swiss chard into bean and broth mixture.
', 'Step 11: Simmer until chard is wilted, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
', 'Step 13: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 14: Working in batches, cook the Cotechino rounds until crisped and browned, about 1 minute per side.
', 'Step 15: Ladle beans into bowls and top with Cotechino rounds.
']

Title: Italian Chocolate Balls (Tuttu Balls)
Ingredients: ['½ pound almonds', '8 cups all-purpose flour', '¼ pound unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 tablespoons baking powder', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 cups white sugar', '1 ½ cups shortening', '6 eggs', '1 (6 ounce) can evaporated milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', "1 cup confectioners' sugar", '¼ teaspoon almond extract', '1 tablespoon water, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spread almonds onto a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Bake almonds until toasted and fragrant, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove baking sheet from oven and cool almonds slightly; chop.
', 'Step 5: Sift flour 2 times.
', 'Step 6: Mix cocoa powder, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt together with flour in a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Beat white sugar, shortening, and eggs together in a separate bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 8: Mix creamed mixture into flour mixture.
', 'Step 9: Add almonds, evaporated milk, and vanilla extract to flour mixture and mix well using your hands or a large spoon until dough holds together and is smooth.
', 'Step 10: Roll dough into 1-inch balls and place on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the oven until bottoms are slightly brown, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool completely.
', "Step 13: Stir confectioners' sugar and almond extract together in a bowl; add enough water to make a thin frosting.
", 'Step 14: Roll cookies in the frosting and place on a wire rack to dry.
']

Title: Crostoli Pastries
Ingredients: ['½ teaspoon salt', '1 ½ tablespoons sugar', '3 large eggs, room temperature', '1 (5 ounce) can evaporated milk', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons rum', '3 ½ cups all-purpose flour', 'vegetable oil for frying', "confectioners' sugar"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: With an electric mixer on high speed, beat together salt, sugar, and eggs until very fluffy.
', 'Step 2: Stir in evaporated milk, vanilla extract, and rum.
', 'Step 3: Gradually mix in flour; knead well with dough hook until dough begins to blister, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: (If dough is still sticking to bowl after 5 minutes, mix in 2 tablespoons of additional flour, 1/2 tablespoon at a time.
', 'Step 5: ) Remove dough, and cover with plastic wrap; set aside 20 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Pour oil into a deep fryer or Dutch oven to a depth of 2 inches, and heat over medium heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Separate dough into small portions.
', 'Step 8: On a lightly floured surface, roll out dough portions until very thin.
', 'Step 9: Cut into long, narrow strips (about 6 inches by 1 inch).
', 'Step 10: With a sharp knife, make a slit in the center of each strip, and draw one end through the slit.
', 'Step 11: Fry in hot oil until puffy, blistered, and very light golden brown, about 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Remove to paper towels to cool.
', "Step 13: Sprinkle with confectioners' sugar.
", 'Step 14: Store in an airtight container.
']

Title: Italian Sausage with a KICK!
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '5 (3.5 ounce) links hot Italian sausage, cut into bite-size pieces', '1 white onion, chopped', '1 (4.5 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup white wine', '½ cup heavy whipping cream', '3 tablespoons freshly shredded Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons butter']

']

Title: Italian-Style Broccoli Rabe
Ingredients: ['½ cup olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon anchovy paste', '½ teaspoon salt', '3 bunches broccoli rabe, trimmed', '1 teaspoon crushed red pepper', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '½ cup pine nuts', '1 wedge lemon']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine 1/2 cup olive oil, garlic, anchovy paste, and salt in the bowl of a small food processor; blend into a paste.
', 'Step 2: Remove leaves from broccoli rabe and cut off and discard the bottom 1/4 of the stalks.
', 'Step 3: Cut remaining stalks into pieces.
', 'Step 4: Fill a large bowl with ice and cold water.
', 'Step 5: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Add broccoli rabe and cook uncovered for 1 minute.
', 'Step 7: Drain in a colander and immediately immerse in the ice water for several minutes to stop the cooking process.
', 'Step 8: Drain.
', 'Step 9: Wrap broccoli rabe in cheesecloth, place in a strainer, and run under water for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Periodically press the rabe to "wring out" any bitter fluids.
', 'Step 11: Pat dry and transfer to a resealable bag.
', 'Step 12: Add anchovy paste and crushed red peppers; marinate for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Meanwhile, toast pine nuts in a skillet over medium heat, stirring frequently until browned and fragrant but not burned, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove from the pan and set aside.
', 'Step 15: Reduce heat to medium-low and add 1 teaspoon olive oil to the skillet.
', 'Step 16: Add broccoli rabe and cook until fork tender and lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Transfer to a plate, top with pine nuts, and drizzle with lemon juice.
']

Title: Nonna's Pizzelle
Ingredients: ['3 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '6 eggs', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '¾ cup shortening (such as Crisco®), melted and cooled slightly', '2 tablespoons shortening (such as Crisco®), melted and cooled slightly', '1 tablespoon anise seeds, crushed', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']

', 'Step 8: Bake until golden, 30 to 40 seconds, or a few seconds longer for darker pizzelle.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Shrimp Risotto
Ingredients: ['2 cups seafood stock', '3 each green onions', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter, divided', '1 large clove garlic, minced', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste', '¾ cup Arborio rice', '1 pinch pinch dried thyme', '2 tablespoons dry white wine', '½ pound shrimp, peeled and deveined', '¼ cup frozen peas', '1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', '4 wedge (blank)s lemon wedges for garnish']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat seafood stock in a microwave-safe container for about 3 minutes on High.
', 'Step 2: Leave in the microwave until ready to use.
', 'Step 3: Slice green onions.
', 'Step 4: Separate green and white parts.
', 'Step 5: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 6: Melt 1 tablespoon butter.
', 'Step 7: Add garlic and white part of the green onions.
', 'Step 8: Season with salt and pepper and cook, stirring, until onion has softened and garlic is fragrant, about 2 1/2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add rice and thyme.
', 'Step 10: Saute, stirring occasionally, until rice begins to have a little color, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Pour in wine and cook, stirring, until wine evaporates, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 12: Stir in the heated seafood stock, making sure contents of the pot move freely.
', 'Step 13: Turn off Saute function.
', 'Step 14: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 15: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 5 minutes.
", 'Step 16: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 17: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 18: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 19: Add shrimp, peas, and reserved green onion tops.
', 'Step 20: Close the lid and allow the shrimp to cook using the Keep Warm function, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Open lid and check to see if shrimp are done.
', 'Step 22: Add grated Parmesan cheese and remaining 1 tablespoon butter, stirring until butter is melted.
', 'Step 23: Serve with fresh parsley and lemon wedges.
']

Title: Ragu® No Boiling Baked Ziti
Ingredients: ['1 (26 ounce) jar Ragu® Chunky Pasta Sauce', '1 ½ cups water', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '8 ounces uncooked ziti pasta']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Combine Pasta Sauce and water in large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Stir in ricotta cheese, 1 cup mozzarella cheese and Parmesan cheese, then uncooked ziti.
', 'Step 3: Evenly spoon ziti mixture into 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 4: Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake 55 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove foil and sprinkle with remaining 1 cup mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 6: Bake uncovered an additional 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Let stand 10 minutes before serving.

Title: Chicken Murphy II
Ingredients: ['½ cup all-purpose flour', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch cubes', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound hot Italian sausage', '2 medium baking potatoes, peeled and cubed', '½ large red onion, diced', '1 green bell pepper, seeded and diced', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 (12 ounce) jar sliced jalapeno peppers', '1 ½ cups dry white wine', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '1 (12 ounce) package rotini pasta', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix together the flour, salt and pepper in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 2: Dredge the cubed chicken breast in the flour to coat.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Fry the chicken cubes until browned on the outside.
', 'Step 5: Remove chicken, and set aside.
', 'Step 6: In a separate pan, or indoor grill, fry the Italian sausage links until cooked through.
', 'Step 7: Cut into 1/4 inch slices.
', 'Step 8: Place potatoes into a saucepan with enough water to cover.
', 'Step 9: Bring to a boil, and cook until fork tender, but not mushy, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 11: Heat the skillet from cooking the chicken over medium heat.
', 'Step 12: Add more oil if necessary.
', 'Step 13: Saute onion and bell pepper until soft.
', 'Step 14: Stir in garlic, and cook for about 1 minute.
', 'Step 15: Pour in the whole jar of jalapenos, and the wine.
', 'Step 16: Scrape any bits of food from the bottom of the pan, and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 17: Return the chicken to the pan, and add the sliced sausage and potatoes.
', 'Step 18: Simmer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 20: Add pasta, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until tender.
', 'Step 21: Drain.
', 'Step 22: Mix cornstarch with a small amount of water, and stir into the skillet with the sauce.
', 'Step 23: Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until thick enough to coat the pasta.
', 'Step 24: Serve sauce over pasta with freshly grated Parmesan cheese.
']

Ingredients: ['3 ¾ cups water', '1 cup polenta', '½ teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons heavy cream', '½ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '½ cup grated Pecorino Romano cheese']

Title: Apple Lasagna
Ingredients: ['8 lasagna noodles', '2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese', '1 cup ricotta cheese', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '¼ cup white sugar', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '2 (20 ounce) cans apple pie filling', '6 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '6 tablespoons brown sugar', '¼ cup quick cooking oats', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '3 teaspoons margarine', '1 cup sour cream', '⅓ cup packed brown sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add lasagna noodles, and cook until tender, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain, and rinse noodles, and set aside.
', 'Step 5: In a medium bowl, mix together the Cheddar cheese, ricotta cheese, egg, white sugar, and almond extract.
', 'Step 6: Spread one can of apple pie filling in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 7: Layer half of the noodles to cover the filling.
', 'Step 8: Spread the cheese mixture over the noodles.
', 'Step 9: Top with the remaining noodles, and spread the remaining can of apple pie filling over the top of those.
', 'Step 10: In a small bowl, stir together the flour, 6 tablespoons brown sugar, oats, cinnamon and nutmeg.
', 'Step 11: Mix in margarine until the mixture is crumbly.
', 'Step 12: Sprinkle over the top of the pie filling.
', 'Step 13: Bake for 45 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 14: Cool for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 15: While the lasagna cools, stir together the sour cream and 1/3 cup brown sugar.
', 'Step 16: To serve, cut into squares and top with sour cream as a garnish.
']

Title: Pasta Frolla (Italian Pastry Dough)
Ingredients: ['4 cups Italian-style tipo 00 flour', '2 medium eggs', '¾ cup superfine sugar', '2 tablespoons superfine sugar', '1 medium lemon, zested', '1 stick cold, unsalted butter, cut into cubes', '5 tablespoons cold, unsalted butter, cut into cubes', '1 teaspoon baking powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Put the flour in a mixing bowl.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the center.
', 'Step 3: Add eggs, 3/4 cups plus 2 tablespoons sugar, and lemon zest.
', 'Step 4: Mix by hand, working in circles, pulling in the flour little-by-little until all the ingredients are incorporated into a dough.
', 'Step 5: Add 1 stick plus 5 tablespoons cubed cold butter and baking powder.
', 'Step 6: Quickly work the dough with your hands until a smooth ball is formed.
', 'Step 7: Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 20 minutes before rolling out.
']

Title: Tuscan Chicken with Cherry Tomatoes
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '4 (4 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, butterflied', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup chopped onion', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pint cherry tomatoes, halved', '½ (8 ounce) package fresh spinach', '1 ½ cups coconut cream', '1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Season chicken with cayenne, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Add chicken to the hot skillet and brown for 4 minutes on each side.
', 'Step 4: Remove chicken to a plate; it will not be cooked through yet.
', 'Step 5: Add onion to the hot skillet; saute until translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 7: Add cherry tomatoes; cook until skins begin to wrinkle, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add spinach and cook until wilted, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add coconut cream and Parmesan cheese; simmer for 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Return chicken to the pan and simmer, basting with the sauce as it cooks, until the juices run clear, another 7 to 10 minutes.
']

Title: Italian Scallop and Shrimp Salad
Ingredients: ['5 cloves garlic, minced', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '3 tablespoons chopped celery leaves', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ cup corn oil', '2 cups frozen petite peas', '2 pounds bay scallops', '2 pounds peeled and deveined small shrimp']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, stir together the garlic, parsley, celery leaves, salt, and corn oil; set aside.
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 3: Pour in the peas, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the scallops, and boil for 3 minutes, then add the shrimp and continue cooking for 1 1/2 minutes more.
', 'Step 5: Drain well, then cool in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Once the seafood has cooled, toss it with the garlic dressing until coated.
', 'Step 7: Refrigerate overnight before serving.
']

Title: Homemade Tagliatelle
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ cups Italian-style tipo 00 flour', '3 large eggs', '1 pinch salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place flour on a marble or wooden work surface.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the center and crack in eggs; add salt.
', 'Step 3: Gently beat eggs using a fork, incorporating the surrounding flour, until mixture is runny.
', 'Step 4: Pull remaining flour into the center using a bench scraper, incorporating it until dough forms a ball.
', 'Step 5: Knead dough with your hands by flattening the ball, stretching it, and folding the top towards the center.
', 'Step 6: Turn 45 degrees and repeat until dough is soft and smooth, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 8: Place in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 9: Refrigerate until firm, 30 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 10: Divide the dough into 3 equal portions.
', 'Step 11: Flatten the first portion and pass through the thickest setting of the pasta machine.
', 'Step 12: Dust with more flour, fold in half like a book and repeat 3 to 4 times, flouring, folding, and passing through the thickest setting,until the dough is smooth in texture, even in size, and no longer sticky.
', 'Step 13: Move the pasta machine to a middle setting and pass each sheet through once.
', 'Step 14: Move to the next-to-last setting and pass through once.
', 'Step 15: Cut in half.
', 'Step 16: Repeat with remaining 2 portions.
', 'Step 17: Add the tagliatelle attachment to the pasta machine and pass each piece through.
', 'Step 18: Roll the machine handle with one hand and collect the pasta with the other.
', 'Step 19: Gently toss pasta with some more flour.
', 'Step 20: Air dry for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Cook tagliatelle in plenty of salted, boiling water until tender yet firm to the bite, 3 to 5 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '297.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '49.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '139.5 mg', 'fatContent': '4.8 g', 'fiberContent': '1.6 g', 'proteinContent': '12.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '92.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.5 g'}

Title: Tomato-Pesto Hummus
Ingredients: ['1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained and rinsed', '¼ cup water', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '⅓ cup tahini', '¼ cup tomato paste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil']
Cooking Instructions: ['Step 1: Blend chickpeas, water, lime juice, garlic, and kosher salt in a food processor until the chickpeas are broken up, about 20 seconds.\n', 'Step 2: Add tahini, tomato paste, basil, and Parmesan cheese; blend again while streaming olive oil into the mixture until smooth, about 20 seconds more.\n']

Title: Italian Vegetable Stew
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 large onions, chopped', '1 (4 ounce) package sliced pepperoni sausage, cut into 1/4-inch dice', '4 cloves garlic', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 large carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces', '½ head cabbage - cored, cut into 1-inch wedges, and wedges halved crosswise', 'kosher salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 ½ pounds tomatoes, coarsely chopped', '2 zucchini, cut into 1-inch rounds', '½ pound fresh green beans, trimmed', '3 potatoes', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large, heavy pot over medium heat; cook and stir onions, pepperoni sausage, and garlic until garlic is golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Transfer pepperoni mixture to a bowl and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Heat 3 tablespoons olive oil in same pot; cook and stir carrots, cabbage, kosher salt, and black pepper until coated in hot oil.
', 'Step 4: Place tomatoes, zucchini, and green beans into pot and scatter onion-pepperoni mixture over the top.
', 'Step 5: Partially cover the pot and simmer until vegetables are tender, about 50 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with lightly-salted water.
', 'Step 7: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Drain and let potatoes cool.
', 'Step 9: When cool enough to handle, cut potatoes into 1 1/2-inch pieces.
', 'Step 10: Gently fold potatoes into the vegetable stew and cook until heated through, about 3 more minutes; drizzle stew with 1 tablespoon olive oil and serve.
']

Title: Jan's Cavatelli with Broccoli Rabe
Ingredients: ['2 pounds ricotta cavatelli', '1 pound broccoli rabe, chopped', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pound Italian sausage, removing from casings and cut into bite-size pieces', '1 large onion, diced', '10 ounces roasted red peppers, cut into 1-inch strips', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '2 tablespoons concentrated chicken stock (such as Knorr®)', '½ cup dry white wine', '½ cup water', '1 ½ teaspoons cornstarch', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook cavatelli in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, 9 to 11 minutes.

', 'Step 4: Fill the same pot with salted water and bring to a boil.

', 'Step 16: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 17: Pour sauce over cooked cavatelli and top with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 18: Toss lightly and serve.
']

Title: Creamy Tuscan-Inspired Shrimp
Ingredients: ['6 ounces spaghetti', '2 tablespoons salted butter', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pound shrimp', '1 small yellow onion, diced', '½ cup sliced fresh mushrooms', '½ cup white wine', '5 ounces oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and cut into strips', '3 cups baby spinach leaves', '1 ¾ cups half-and-half', '⅔ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '2 teaspoons dried Italian herb seasoning', '1 tablespoon water', '1 teaspoon cornstarch', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and keep warm.
', 'Step 4: While the pasta is cooking, melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 6: Add shrimp and cook until are bright pink on the outside and the meat is opaque, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove shrimp and garlic to a plate.
', 'Step 8: Add onion and mushrooms to the hot skillet; cook until softened, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add white wine and cook until reduced by half, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add sun-dried tomatoes and cook for 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 12: Add spinach and half-and-half; cook until spinach wilts, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir in Parmesan cheese and Italian seasoning; simmer until cheese has melted, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 14: If sauce is not thick enough, stir water and cornstarch together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 15: Clear a spot in the center of the skillet and add cornstarch mixture to the center of the pan.
', 'Step 16: Let it simmer while stirring the mixture quickly until the sauce thickens.
', 'Step 17: Add shrimp back to the sauce and cook until reheated, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 18: Serve sauce over pasta.
', 'Step 19: Top with parsley.
']

Title: Valerie's Bolognese Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 carrot, finely chopped', '1 stalk celery, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '½ pound ground beef', '½ cup red wine', '½ cup milk', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-low heat, and cook and stir the onion, carrot, celery, and garlic until the vegetables are soft and beginning to brown, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Place the ground beef into the pan, and cook and stir, breaking the meat apart as it cooks, until well browned, about 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour in the red wine, bring to a boil, and cook until the liquid is almost absorbed, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Pour in the milk and nutmeg, and cook, stirring occasionally, until the milk is almost absorbed, 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 5: n Stir in the crushed tomatoes, sugar, and oregano, bring to a simmer, and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 6: Simmer uncovered 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 7: Season to taste with salt and pepper.
']

Title: Tuscan Cannellini Beans
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 cup chopped pancetta', '½ cup chopped white onion', '⅓ cup chopped carrots', '⅓ cup chopped celery', '2 tablespoons garlic, minced', '½ cup dry white wine', '2 (15 ounce) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '2 cups chicken stock', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '⅓ cup heavy cream', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 bay leaf', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter in a medium pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add pancetta; cook and stir until browned, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove pancetta but leave grease in the pot.
', 'Step 4: Add onion, carrots, and celery.
', 'Step 5: Saute until fragrant, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in garlic and cook for 30 seconds.
', 'Step 7: Pour in white wine and bring to a boil while scraping up any browned bits from the pot with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 8: Boil until reduced by half, 6 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add in cannellini beans, chicken stock, Parmesan cheese, cream, rosemary, oregano, red pepper flakes, bay leaf, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 10: Increase heat to high and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Reduce heat to a simmer.
', 'Step 12: Cook, stirring every so often to avoid burning, until the cheese and starch in the beans have thickened the liquid to a sauce-like consistency, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
']

Title: Margherita Flatbread Pizza
Ingredients: ['16 leaves fresh basil, or more to taste, divided', '2 (16 ounce) cans peeled whole plum tomatoes', '8 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '6 sprigs thyme', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 flatbread pizza crust', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 pinch crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 (4 ounce) ball fresh mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced and chopped', '1 ripe tomato, thinly sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Chop 1/2 of the basil leaves.
', 'Step 3: Place a large saucepan over medium heat to warm.
', 'Step 4: Put plum tomatoes in the pan and chop them up with a spatula.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a simmer and add garlic, thyme sprigs, and chopped basil.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper and simmer until most of the moisture is gone, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove and discard thyme sprigs.
', 'Step 8: Place flatbread on a baking sheet and cook in the preheated oven for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove from the oven.

Title: Chicken Florentine in Puff Pastry
Ingredients: ['1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach', '3 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 large egg', '1 tablespoon water', '1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed', '1 tablespoon butter, or as needed', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon ground thyme', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 slices provolone cheese']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

', 'Step 3: Place spinach in a microwave-safe bowl.

', 'Step 5: Remove cover and stir.
', 'Step 6: Remove to a strainer and let cool.

', 'Step 8: Whisk egg and water together in a small bowl.

', 'Step 12: Remove to a plate.

', 'Step 14: Combine spinach with garlic, lemon juice, mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, thyme, salt, and pepper; mix well.
', 'Step 15: Put 1/3 of the spinach mixture in each open chicken breast and top with a 1 slice of provolone cheese.
', 'Step 16: Fold the top of each chicken breast in order to sandwich the spinach and cheese in between.
', 'Step 17: Place each chicken breast on a piece of puff pastry; wrap the pastry around the breast and tuck underneath to seal.
', 'Step 18: Transfer to the prepared baking sheet and brush with egg wash.

']

Title: Lighter Simple Lasagna Roll Ups
Ingredients: ['8 whole wheat lasagna noodles', '½ pound ground turkey', '6 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '½ cup chopped fresh chives', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried parsley', '¼ teaspoon dried basil', '2 egg whites', '1 (15 ounce) container reduced-fat ricotta cheese', '2 tablespoons crumbled low-fat feta cheese', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 (28 ounce) jar low-fat tomato pasta sauce', '½ cup shredded low-fat Cheddar cheese']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

', 'Step 3: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through, about 8 minutes.

', 'Step 5: Brown ground turkey with garlic in a nonstick skillet over medium heat, breaking the turkey up as it cooks, until no longer pink, about 10 minutes.

', 'Step 8: Season with black pepper.
', 'Step 9: Stir ground turkey mixture into cheese mixture.
', 'Step 10: Lay cooked lasagna noodles flat onto a sheet of waxed paper.
', 'Step 11: Divide filling into 8 equal portions and roll the filling into balls.
', 'Step 12: Place a filling ball on one end of a noodle and roll the pasta up around the filling; repeat with remaining noodles and filling.
', 'Step 13: Spread a thin layer of pasta sauce over the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish; place rolls into dish with seam sides down.
', 'Step 14: Pour remaining pasta sauce over rolls and sprinkle with Cheddar cheese.
', 'Step 15: Cover dish with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese topping has melted and the sauce is bubbling, about 40 minutes.
']

Title: Buffalo Cheesy Chicken Lasagna

Title: Italian Cream Cheese Cake
Ingredients: ['½ cup margarine', '½ cup vegetable shortening', '2 cups white sugar', '5 egg yolks', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 cup buttermilk', '1 cup chopped nuts', '1 (3.5 ounce) can sweetened flaked coconut (such as Bakers® Angel Flake®)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '5 egg whites', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature', '¼ cup butter', "1 (16 ounce) box confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup mixed nuts, or as desired for garnish']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour 3 9x1.
', 'Step 3: 5-inch cake pans.
', 'Step 4: Beat margarine, shortening, and white sugar together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy; add egg yolks one at a time, thoroughly beating each yolk into the butter mixture before adding the next.
', 'Step 5: Mix flour and baking soda together in a bowl; alternately stir portions of flour mixture and buttermilk into the butter mixture, mixing until just incorporated into a cake batter.
', 'Step 6: Stir 1 cup nuts, coconut, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract into the batter.
', 'Step 7: Beat egg whites in a glass or metal bowl until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 8: Lift your beater or whisk straight up: the egg whites will form soft mounds rather than a sharp peak.
', 'Step 9: Fold egg whites into the batter; pour into prepared pans.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack.
', 'Step 12: Beat cream cheese and butter together in a bowl until smooth.
', "Step 13: Beat confectioners' sugar and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract into the cream cheese mixture until smooth; spread over completely cooled cakes; garnish with 1/4 cup nuts.
"]

Title: Breadsticks with Parmesan Butter
Ingredients: ['1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '7 tablespoons white sugar', '1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour, or as needed', '½ cup butter, softened', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder']

['Step 1: Mix 1 cup warm water, 1 tablespoon sugar, and yeast together in a large bowl; let stand until yeast softens and begins to form a creamy foam, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add vegetable oil, egg, salt, 2 cups flour, 7 tablespoons sugar, and 1 cup warm water; beat with an electric mixer until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Stir in remaining 2 1/2 cups flour until dough is soft.
', 'Step 4: Turn dough onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, 6 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease the top of dough.

', 'Step 9: Punch dough down and turn onto a floured surface.
', 'Step 10: Divide dough into 36 pieces.
', 'Step 11: Shape each piece into a 6-inch rope.
', 'Step 12: Arrange on the prepared baking sheet, 2 inches apart.
', 'Step 13: Cover and let rise until doubled in size, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Beat butter, Parmesan cheese, and garlic powder together in a bowl until creamy; serve alongside baked breadsticks.
']

Title: Neapolitan Sauce
Ingredients: ['4 pounds tomatoes', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '10 leaves fresh basil, roughly chopped']

['Step 1: Score an "x" in the bottom of each tomato.
', 'Step 2: place tomatoes in boiling water for a minute, carefully remove tomatoes and plunge into an ice bath.

', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Working in several batches, place tomatoes in the boiling water for 1 minute.
', 'Step 6: Carefully remove and plunge into an ice bath.
', 'Step 7: Transfer to a work surface and remove skins.
', 'Step 8: Heat oil in a heavy saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Add garlic and cook until lightly browned and fragrant, about 45 seconds.
', 'Step 10: Add tomatoes, crushing each one by hand.
', 'Step 11: Add salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 12: Cook, stirring every few minutes, until sauce starts to thicken, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir in fresh basil and remove from the heat.
', 'Step 14: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Italian Breakfast Bread Pudding
Ingredients: ['4 teaspoons unsalted butter, divided', '1 cup chopped white onions', '½ cup chopped green bell peppers', '½ cup chopped red bell peppers', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper, divided', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon salt, divided', '1 ½ tablespoons dried parsley', '1 pound Italian-flavored bulk pork sausage', '8 large eggs', '3 cups whole milk', '½ cup half-and-half', '1 ½ tablespoons Italian seasoning', '8 cups cubed stale French bread (1-inch cubes)', '2 ounces cooked crumbled bacon', '2 cups grated Cheddar cheese', '1 cup fine seasoned dry bread crumbs, divided', '1 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with 2 teaspoons butter and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Melt 2 teaspoons butter in a medium-sized skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Add onions, green and red bell peppers, 1 teaspoon black pepper, garlic powder, and 1/4 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 5: Cook, stirring, until vegetables are soft, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add parsley, stir, and remove from heat.
', 'Step 7: Let vegetables cool.
', 'Step 8: Heat a medium-sized skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Cook and stir sausage in the hot skillet until lightly browned, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain sausage on a plate lined with a paper towel.
', 'Step 11: Beat eggs in a large bowl.
', 'Step 12: Add milk, half-and-half, Italian seasoning, remaining 1 teaspoon pepper, and remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt and whisk to combine.
', 'Step 13: Add bread cubes and let sit for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Add cooked sausage, bacon, vegetables, Cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup bread crumbs, and 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese and stir to incorporate.
', 'Step 15: Spoon mixture into prepared baking dish and cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until almost set, 50 to 55 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Combine remaining 1/2 cup bread crumbs, remaining 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons melted butter, and remaining 1/2 tablespoon Italian seasoning in a small bowl.
', 'Step 18: Remove pudding from oven, leaving oven on.
', 'Step 19: Uncover and sprinkle bread crumb mixture evenly over the top.
', 'Step 20: Return to the oven and increase heat to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 21: Continue baking until pudding is completely set in the center, puffed, and golden brown on top, about 20 minutes more.
', 'Step 22: Remove from oven and allow to stand for 10 to 15 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Chicken Marsala Meatballs
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '4 leaves fresh sage', '1 pound ground chicken', '1 egg', '¼ cup almond flour', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 large shallot, minced', '1 cup low-sodium chicken broth', '⅓ cup Marsala wine', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '2 teaspoons arrowroot flour']

', 'Step 5: Remove skillet from heat, reserving oil.

Title: Risotto con Zafferano e Pancetta in Pentola a Pressione (Saffron and Pancetta Risotto)
Ingredients: ['2 ¾ cups vegetable broth', '3 ½ tablespoons hot water', '1 pinch saffron threads', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '½ onion, thinly sliced', '10 ½ ounces Arborio rice', '½ cup white wine', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 ¾ ounces pancetta, cubed', '2 tablespoons butter']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour vegetable stock into a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Cover and keep warm.
', 'Step 3: Combine hot water and saffron threads in a small bowl.
', 'Step 4: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a stovetop pressure cooker.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir onion until softened, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add Arborio rice; cook and stir until toasted and coated with oil, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Increase heat and pour in wine; simmer until alcohol has evaporated and rice has absorbed wine, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir vegetable stock and saffron mixture into the pressure cooker.
', "Step 9: Seal according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 10: Increase heat to high; cook until cooker whistles, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Reduce heat to low and cook for 4 minutes.
', "Step 12: Remove cooker from heat and release pressure according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 13: Remove the lid.
', 'Step 14: Stir in 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese, pancetta, and butter.
', 'Step 15: Let stand until rice absorbs remaining stock and Parmesan cheese melts, 2 to 3 minutes.
']

Title: Prosciutto-Stuffed Baked Chicken Breasts with Pesto
Ingredients: ['olive oil cooking spray', '4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 slices smoked provolone cheese', '4 thin slices prosciutto', '½ cup pesto', '8 cherry tomatoes, quartered', '2 ⅔ tablespoons Italian-seasoned bread crumbs']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray an 11x7-inch baking dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Slice a pocket lengthwise, horizontal to the cutting board, in each breast, leaving the tips intact and not slicing all the way through.
', 'Step 4: The larger end of the breast should be a sort of cupped shape.
', 'Step 5: Gently open each pocket, pointing the cut edge up, and leaving them on the cutting board.
', 'Step 6: Lightly season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Place 1 slice provolone cheese on each chicken breast.
', 'Step 8: Layer 1 slice prosciutto over cheese, lightly folding it so it does not hang over the edge of the chicken.
', 'Step 9: Spoon 2 tablespoons pesto over each chicken breast and top with tomato pieces.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle seasoned bread crumbs over chicken.
', 'Step 11: Arrange chicken in a single layer in the prepared baking dish, stuffing-side up.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 13: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Tortellini Alfredo with Grilled Chicken Breasts
Ingredients: ['2 large skinless, boneless chicken breasts', 'olive oil', '1 pinch Italian seasoning, or to taste', '1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste', 'kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 (12 ounce) package frozen cheese tortellini', '¼ cup butter', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup heavy cream', '1 ¼ cups freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '2 pinches Italian seasoning, or to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 2: Place chicken in a bowl and add oil, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, kosher salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Toss to coat.
', 'Step 4: Cook chicken on the preheated grill until no longer pink in the centers and the juices run clear, about 6 minutes per side.
', 'Step 5: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Remove from the grill and allow to cool.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil; stir in tortellini and return to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the tortellini float to the top and the filling is hot, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain and set aside; keep warm.
', 'Step 10: Slice chicken breast into bite-size pieces.
', 'Step 11: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 12: Add garlic and cook, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Add cream and heat to room temperature, about 3 minutes more.
', 'Step 14: Stir in Parmesan cheese and allow to melt, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Add Italian seasoning and pepper.
', 'Step 16: Bring to a slow boil for about 1 minute before tossing in cooked tortellini and grilled chicken breast.
']

Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds ground beef', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '½ cup chopped onion', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon oregano', '½ teaspoon anise seed', '1 bay leaf']

', 'Step 2: Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 3: n Stir beef, diced tomatoes, onion, tomato paste, sugar, Parmesan cheese, garlic, salt, oregano, anise seed, and bay leaf together in a slow cooker.

Title: Pasta with Tuna, Sun-Dried Tomatoes, Artichoke Hearts, Lemon, and White Wine
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta', '¼ cup olive oil, divided', '½ cup diced onion', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme', '1 ½ pounds fresh tuna steaks, cubed', '½ cup dry white wine', '2 cups chicken stock', '¼ cup fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '½ cup chopped oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', '¾ cup sliced marinated artichoke hearts', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add linguine pasta, cook for 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente, and drain.
', 'Step 3: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat, and cook the onion 4 minutes, until tender.
', 'Step 4: Mix in the thyme, and continue cooking 2 minutes, until onion is golden brown.
', 'Step 5: Set aside onion and thyme.
', 'Step 6: Place the tuna in the saucepan, and cook 2 to 3 minutes, until browned.
', 'Step 7: Set aside, and keep warm.
', 'Step 8: Heat the remaining oil in the saucepan.
', 'Step 9: Return the onion and thyme to saucepan, and stir in the white wine.
', 'Step 10: Cook until reduced by about 1 tablespoon.
', 'Step 11: Mix in the chicken stock, lemon juice, and lemon zest.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to medium, and continue cooking 10 minutes, until reduced to about 3/4 cup.
', 'Step 13: Mix the sun-dried tomatoes and artichoke hearts into the saucepan, and cook just until heated through.
', 'Step 14: Return tuna to the saucepan, and cook to desired doneness.
', 'Step 15: Toss the cooked pasta into the saucepan.
', 'Step 16: Season with salt and pepper.
']

Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package cavatelli pasta', '1 head broccoli, cut into florets', '½ cup butter', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 (4.5 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

Title: Tiramisu Angel Cake
Ingredients: ['1 (18.25 ounce) package angel food cake mix', '1 ¼ cups water', '1 (3.3 gram) packet instant coffee (such as Starbucks VIA®)', '¾ cup water', '3 tablespoons coffee-flavored liqueur', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '½ cup heavy cream', '2 tablespoons butter, softened', '1 (3.5 ounce) package instant French vanilla pudding mix', '1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '2 tablespoons heavy cream', "1 cup confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place cake mix and 1 1/4 cup of water in a large glass or metal mixing bowl; beat with an electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds to mix the ingredients.
', 'Step 3: Change mixer speed to medium and beat 1 minute more.
', 'Step 4: Pour the batter into an ungreased 9x13-inch baking pan.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven on the center rack until the cake is golden brown and a toothpick inserted into the middle comes out clean, 35 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove cake from the oven, allow to cool completely, and remove from the pan.
', 'Step 7: Cut the cake horizontally into 2 layers.
', 'Step 8: Place 1 layer onto a serving platter to serve as the bottom of the cake; set the second layer aside.
', 'Step 9: Mix instant coffee with 3/4 cup of water in a bowl until dissolved; drizzle the coffee mixture evenly over the bottom cake layer.
', 'Step 10: Drizzle coffee liqueur over the bottom cake layer.
', 'Step 11: Beat 8 ounces cream cheese, 1/2 cup cream, butter, and French vanilla pudding mix with an electric mixer in a bowl until the mixture is smooth and creamy, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Spread pudding mixture over the bottom cake layer.
', 'Step 13: Place the top cake layer onto the filling.
', "Step 14: Beat 4 ounces cream cheese, 2 tablespoons cream, confectioners' sugar, and vanilla extract with an electric mixer in a bowl until smooth.
", 'Step 15: Spread the frosting over the top and sides of the cake.
', 'Step 16: Refrigerate leftovers.
']

Title: Crispy Grilled Pizza Margherita
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package pizza dough, at room temperature', '¼ cup olive oil', '4 ounces shredded Asiago cheese', '3 large tomatoes, thinly sliced', '1 cup packed whole basil leaves', '8 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, shredded', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat, and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 2: Place pizza dough in a bowl to rise 2 to 3 times the original size, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 3: Flour a work surface and a rolling pin.
', 'Step 4: Divide dough in half; roll each half to a 10- to 12-inch diameter circle.
', 'Step 5: Place pizza dough rounds on the preheated grill using a wooden paddle (pizza peel) and close lid; cook until grill marks appear on the bottom of each round, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from grill and flip over on a work surface.
', 'Step 7: Lower grill heat to medium.
', 'Step 8: Brush each round with olive oil.
', 'Step 9: Spread half the Asiago cheese on each crust; add tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella.
', 'Step 10: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Transfer pizzas to grill with wooden paddle and close lid.
', 'Step 12: Cook until bottom of rounds is cooked with grill marks and cheese is melted, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove from grill and let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Vegan Lasagna II
Ingredients: ['3 cloves garlic, minced', '½ pound mushrooms', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 (10.75 ounce) can tomato puree', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen spinach, thawed and drained', '2 teaspoons garlic salt', '2 tablespoons Italian-style seasoning', '1 (12 ounce) package soft tofu', '⅔ (16 ounce) package instant lasagna noodles']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a large skillet, saute garlic and mushrooms in oil until all the liquid is cooked out.
', 'Step 3: Add 1/3 tomato puree to mushrooms and garlic, cook 2 to 3 minutes, and remove from heat.
', 'Step 4: In a microwave-safe bowl, combine spinach, garlic salt, Italian seasoning and tofu.
', 'Step 5: Blend until the mixture is an even consistency.
', 'Step 6: Heat in a microwave on high for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: In a 9x9 inch baking pan, pour one thin layer of remaining tomato puree, a layer of noodles, 1/2 the tofu mixture, the mushroom sauce, a layer of noodles, 1/2 the tofu mixture, a layer of tomato puree, a layer of noodles, and a final layer of tomato puree.
', 'Step 8: Bake 45 minutes in the preheated oven.
']

Title: Shrimp Linguine with Tomatoes
Ingredients: ['1 (12 ounce) package linguine pasta', '¼ pound bacon', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '3 roma (plum) tomatoes, seeded and chopped', '½ cup chopped green onions', '1 cup half-and-half cream', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese', '1 pound cooked shrimp', '¼ cup toasted pine nuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook pasta in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet.
', 'Step 4: Cook over medium-high heat until evenly brown.
', 'Step 5: Drain, crumble, and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Saute garlic, basil, and oregano in oil for 1 minute.
', 'Step 8: Stir in tomatoes and green onions, and saute for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add bacon, half and half, Parmesan cheese, and Monterey Jack cheese.
', 'Step 10: Cook until cheese is just melted.
', 'Step 11: Stir in shrimp, and cook until heated through, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Serve sauce over pasta, and sprinkle with pine nuts.
