Title: Lasagna-Stuffed Manicotti Shells
Ingredients: ['14 manicotti shells, or more as desired', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '½ pound sweet Italian sausage', '½ pound ground beef', '1 white onion', '½ cup basil leaves', '2 sprigs rosemary', '2 tablespoons thyme', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper', '2 (8 ounce) cans tomato sauce, divided', '¼ cup chopped onion', '1 teaspoon chopped rosemary, or to taste', '1 pinch thyme, or to taste', '1 bunch chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon red pepper flakes', '1 pound shredded mozzarella cheese', '4 cups cottage cheese, strained', '2 quarts vegetable oil for frying', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '2 cups plain bread crumbs', '3 eggs, beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 2: Stir in manicotti and return to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain and place on a baking sheet to cool.
', 'Step 5: Place in freezer until hardened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large saute pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Add sausage, beef, and onion; saute 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add basil, rosemary, thyme, Italian seasoning, and black pepper.
', 'Step 9: Cook until meat is browned, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir in 1/2 can tomato sauce and cook until heated through, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Transfer to a large bowl and set aside to cool.
', 'Step 12: Heat a skillet over medium-high heat for the sauce.
', 'Step 13: Add onion and saute 1 minute.
', 'Step 14: Add remaining tomato sauce, rosemary, and thyme.
', 'Step 15: Stir in basil and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 16: Fold mozzarella cheese and cottage cheese into the cooled meat mixture.
', 'Step 17: Stuff each manicotti shell with meat mixture and place back onto the baking sheet.
', 'Step 18: Place filled shells in the freezer to firm up, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Slice shells into bite-sized pieces.
', 'Step 20: Heat 2 quarts vegetable oil in a saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 21: Place flour, bread crumbs, and beaten eggs each in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 22: Dredge manicotti slices in flour, then eggs, and then bread crumbs and place on the baking sheet.
', 'Step 23: Fry slices in the hot oil until golden brown and crispy, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
', 'Step 25: Serve with the spicy tomato dipping sauce.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '974.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '77.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '151.7 mg', 'fatContent': '51.4 g', 'fiberContent': '5.6 g', 'proteinContent': '51.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '16.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '1580.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.2 g'}

Title: Spinach Pasta Dough
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups spinach, washed and stemmed', '2 tablespoons water, or more as needed', '2 ½ cups Italian-style tipo 00 flour', '3 large eggs', '1 pinch salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place spinach and water in a skillet over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 2: Cover and simmer, stirring once, until spinach is wilted, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and let cool, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Squeeze out as much water as possible, getting the spinach very dry.
', 'Step 5: Chop spinach very finely.
', 'Step 6: Place flour on a marble or wooden work surface.
', 'Step 7: Make a well in the center and crack in the eggs; add the salt and finely chopped spinach.
', 'Step 8: Gently beat eggs with a fork, incorporating the surrounding flour and spinach, until batter is runny.
', 'Step 9: Bring remaining flour into the batter using a bench scraper until dough forms a ball.
', 'Step 10: Mix in water, 1 tablespoon at a time, if dough feels too stiff.
', 'Step 11: Knead dough with your hands by flattening the ball, stretching it and folding the top towards the center.
', 'Step 12: Turn 45 degrees and repeat until dough is soft and smooth, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 14: Place in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 15: Refrigerate until firm, at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 16: Roll out the dough with pasta machine or with a rolling pin and turn into your favorite pasta shape.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '328.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '55.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '139.5 mg', 'fatContent': '5 g', 'fiberContent': '2.2 g', 'proteinContent': '14.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '107.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.6 g'}

Title: Cacio e Pepe Taralli (Savory Italian Pretzels)
Ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ cup white wine', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine flour, pepper, and salt in a mixing bowl, and stir with a spoon to combine.
', 'Step 2: Pour in wine and olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Mix until dough starts to come together.
', 'Step 4: Knead by hand until dough is smooth and slightly elastic, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Wrap dough in plastic and let rest at room temperature for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Unwrap dough and cut into 4 pieces.
', 'Step 7: Roll each piece out with your palms into ropes about 10 to 12 inches long.
', 'Step 8: Cut each rope into 3 pieces; roll each piece to a length of 5 or 6 inches.
', 'Step 9: Twist the ends a few times and press them together to form a ring, twisting as needed to fully seal the ends.
', 'Step 10: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Line a baking sheet with a silicone mat (such as SILPAT®).
', 'Step 12: Bring a pan of water (at least 3 inches) to a boil.
', 'Step 13: Drop in 4 rings of dough at a time.
', 'Step 14: Boil until rings float to the top, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove with a slotted spoon onto a towel-lined plate.
', 'Step 16: Transfer to the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese over each ring; flip and grate more cheese on the other side.
', 'Step 18: Flip back to the first side and apply one last grating of cheese, or until rings are thoroughly coated.
', 'Step 19: Bake in the preheated oven until lightly golden and crunchy, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Remove from the baking sheet onto a wire rack and let cool completely before serving.
']

Title: Pasta with Clam Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 pound fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1 green bell pepper, diced', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 pound fettuccini pasta', '½ large head broccoli, cut into florets', '¾ cup butter, divided', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried parsley', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '1 pint heavy cream', '1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth', '2 (6.5 ounce) cans minced clams, drained']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook mushrooms and bell pepper in 2 tablespoons butter until tender.
', 'Step 2: Remove from heat and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 5: Steam broccoli in colander over pasta water, or in steamer, until bright green, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Toss cooked pasta with 1/4 cup butter, Parmesan, oregano, parsley, garlic powder and black pepper.
', 'Step 7: Cover and set aside to keep warm.
', 'Step 8: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, melt 1/2 cup butter.
', 'Step 9: Dump in flour all at once and whisk until smooth.
', 'Step 10: Whisk in cream and chicken broth a little at a time and cook until mixture thickens.
', 'Step 11: Stir in clams and reserved broccoli, mushrooms and bell pepper.
', 'Step 12: Heat through and toss with pasta.
', 'Step 13: Serve at once.
']

Title: Grandma's Artichokes
Ingredients: ['4 whole artichokes, trimmed and coarse outer leaves removed', '8 large cloves garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon salt, or to taste', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper', '¼ cup grated Romano cheese', '1 bunch flat-leaf parsley, leaves torn', '½ cup peanut oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Trim artichoke stems flat so the artichokes can stand upright and rinse artichokes thoroughly in running water.
', 'Step 2: Hold artichokes upside down over a work surface and smash the artichokes lightly to open the leaves.
', 'Step 3: Spread 1/4 of the garlic into the spaces between leaves of each artichoke.
', 'Step 4: Season artichokes with salt, black pepper, and 1 tablespoon grated Romano cheese per artichoke, opening the leaves and letting the seasonings and cheese into the leaves.
', 'Step 5: Push torn leaves of parsley into the spaces between the leaves to hold the seasonings in.
', 'Step 6: Set the artichokes upright in a saucepan and pour peanut oil over the artichokes, letting the oil seep into the crevices between leaves.
', 'Step 7: Gently pour water into the saucepan, taking care not to let the water splash on the artichokes and wash off the oil.
', 'Step 8: Cover pan.
', 'Step 9: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer gently until the outer leaves of the artichoke are easy to strip off but are not mushy or falling apart, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 10: Test for salt and season with more if desired; simmer 5 to 10 more minutes to let the salt dissolve.
']

Title: Nutty Pina Colada Biscotti
Ingredients: ['4 ¼ cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 cup butter, softened', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '3 eggs', '2 tablespoons rum', '2 tablespoons pineapple juice', '1 ½ teaspoons coconut extract', '1 cup shelled pistachio nuts', '½ cup chopped dried pineapple', '½ cup sweetened flaked coconut']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, cream together the butter and 1 1/3 cups of sugar until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 2: Beat in the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each one.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the rum, pineapple juice and coconut extract until well blended.
', 'Step 4: Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; stir into the batter.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the pistachio nuts, pineapple and coconut until evenly distributed.
', 'Step 6: Cover and refrigerate for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Lightly grease two cookie sheets.
', 'Step 9: Divide the dough into four equal parts.
', 'Step 10: Form each piece of dough into a 12 inch long log shape on a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 11: Place two logs onto each cookie sheet, and pat down until they are about 3 inches wide.
', 'Step 12: There should be at least 2 inches of space between each log.
', 'Step 13: Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm but not crisp.
', 'Step 14: Remove from the oven, and allow to cool for at least 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Place the biscotti bars on a cutting board, and use a serrated knife to cut into 3/4 inch wide diagonal slices.
', 'Step 16: Return the slices to the baking sheets cut side down.
', 'Step 17: Return to the oven.
', 'Step 18: Bake for 8 minutes, then turn the cookies over, and bake for an additional 8 minutes, or until lightly toasted.
', 'Step 19: Cool completely, then store in an airtight container.
']

Ingredients: ['¼ cup olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pound lean ground beef', '¼ pound thinly sliced prosciutto, chopped', '4 tablespoons butter', '2 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped', '¼ cup tomato paste', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper']

['Step 1: In a large saucepan saute the onion and garlic in the olive oil.
', 'Step 2: Add ground beef and continue cooking.
', 'Step 3: Stir in prosciutto and cook for 5 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add 2 tablespoons of the butter, chopped tomatoes, and tomato paste.
', 'Step 5: Let sauce simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 7: n Simmer for one hour.
', 'Step 8: Add additional butter and simmer for an additional half hour.
']

Title: Italian Bread Salad with Strawberries and Tomatoes
Ingredients: ['1 loaf Italian bread, cut into 1-inch cubes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 pint fresh strawberries, diced', '3 roma (plum) tomatoes, seeded and diced', '2 ounces crumbled feta cheese', '3 tablespoons red onion, diced', '¼ cup olive oil', '¼ cup red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons honey']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Toss bread cubes with 2 tablespoons olive oil, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper on a large baking sheet until evenly coated; spread mixture into a single layer.
', 'Step 3: Bake in preheated oven until toasted, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Transfer toasted bread to a large bowl and mix with strawberries, tomatoes, feta cheese, and onion.
', 'Step 5: Whisk 1/4 cup olive oil, red wine vinegar, and honey in a small bowl; drizzle over bread and tomato salad.
', 'Step 6: Toss to coat.
']

Title: Struffoli
Ingredients: ['4 eggs', '¼ cup white sugar', '¼ cup vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '¼ cup all-purpose flour, or as needed', '2 cups vegetable oil for frying, or as needed', '½ cup honey, or more to taste', '½ cup white sugar, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon rainbow nonpareil sprinkles, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Beat eggs, 1/4 cup white sugar, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, and vanilla extract together in a bowl; stir in baking powder.
', 'Step 2: Slowly stir flour, about 1 tablespoon at a time, into egg mixture until a soft dough forms.
', 'Step 3: Roll dough into small balls.
', 'Step 4: Heat 2 cups vegetable oil in a large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) or until you see little waves on the bottom of the saucepan.
', 'Step 5: Working in small batches, fry dough balls in the hot oil until lightly browned, 2 to 3 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 6: Transfer struffoli to a paper towel-lined plate using a slotted spoon.
', 'Step 7: Heat honey in a saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 8: Slowly mix 1/2 cup sugar, a few tablespoons at a time, into honey until sugar is melted and glaze is smooth, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Transfer struffoli to a large bowl and pour glaze over the top; toss quickly to evenly coat before glaze hardens.
', 'Step 10: Form struffoli into a tower-shape or Christmas tree-shape on a serving plate.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle nonpareils sprinkles over the struffoli.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '303.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '41 g', 'cholesterolContent': '93 mg', 'fatContent': '14.8 g', 'fiberContent': '0.1 g', 'proteinContent': '3.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '97 mg', 'sugarContent': '37.4 g'}

Title: Roasted Veggie Antipasto
Ingredients: ['1 green bell pepper, chopped', '1 red bell pepper, chopped', '1 yellow bell pepper, chopped', '1 ½ cups fresh green beans, cut into 1/2-inch pieces', '1 large white onion, finely chopped', '12 cloves garlic, pressed', '1 head broccoli, finely chopped', '½ head cauliflower, finely chopped', '2 stalks celery, finely chopped', '2 cups finely chopped fresh mushrooms', '¼ cup olive oil', '2 cups ketchup', '4 tomatoes, peeled and chopped', '¾ cup white vinegar', '1 dash balsamic vinegar', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (6 ounce) can pitted black olives, drained and coarsely chopped', '1 (5 ounce) jar pitted green olives, drained and coarsely chopped', '1 bunch fresh basil, chopped', '12 half-pint canning jars with lids and rings']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spread green, red, and yellow peppers, green beans, white onion, garlic, broccoli, cauliflower, celery, and mushrooms onto several baking sheets and drizzle with olive oil; toss lightly to coat.
', 'Step 3: Roast the vegetables in the preheated oven until slightly browned and softened, about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 4: While vegetables are roasting, pour ketchup into a large pot over medium heat and stir in tomatoes, white vinegar, balsamic vinegar, salt, and black pepper; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes; stir in roasted vegetables, black olives, green olives, and basil.
', 'Step 6: Simmer until cooked through, about 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 7: Sterilize jars and lids in boiling water for at least 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Pack the roasted vegetable mixture into the sterilized jars, filling the jars to within 1/4 inch of the top.
', 'Step 9: Run a knife or a thin spatula around the insides of the jars after they have been filled to remove any air bubbles.
', 'Step 10: Wipe the rims of the jars with a moist paper towel to remove any food residue.
', 'Step 11: Top with lids and screw on rings.
', 'Step 12: Place a rack in the bottom of a large stockpot and fill halfway with water.
', 'Step 13: Bring to a boil and lower jars into the boiling water using a holder.
', 'Step 14: Leave a 2-inch space between the jars.
', 'Step 15: Pour in more boiling water if necessary to bring the water level to at least 1 inch above the tops of the jars.
', 'Step 16: Bring the water to a rolling boil, cover the pot, and process for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Remove the jars from the stockpot and place onto a cloth-covered or wood surface, several inches apart, for 24 hours.
', 'Step 18: Once cool, press the top of each lid with a finger, ensuring that the seal is tight (lid does not move up or down at all).
', 'Step 19: Store in a cool, dark area.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '53.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '7.2 g', 'fatContent': '2.7 g', 'fiberContent': '1.4 g', 'proteinContent': '1.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '292.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.5 g'}

Title: Spicy Chicken Spaghetti II
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package uncooked spaghetti', '1 cup Worcestershire sauce', '1 cup ketchup', '1 cup tomato sauce', '1 cup chopped green bell pepper', '1 cup chopped onion', '½ cup brown sugar', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 whole cooked chicken, deboned and chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Place spaghetti in the pot, cook 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente, and drain.
', 'Step 3: In a separate pot, mix the Worcestershire sauce, ketchup, tomato sauce, green bell pepper, onion, brown sugar, and chili powder.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Mix in the chicken, reduce heat to low, and simmer 10 minutes, or until chicken is heated through.
', 'Step 6: Mix in the cooked spaghetti, and serve warm.
']

Title: Italian Tomato Pie
Ingredients: ['3 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon active dry yeast', '2 ½ tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 cup water', '6 tablespoons water', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', '5 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '4 cloves garlic, finely grated', '1 medium shallot, minced', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 tablespoon white sugar', 'kosher salt to taste', '¼ cup finely grated Pecorino Romano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk together flour, salt, and yeast in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook attachment.
', 'Step 2: Add olive oil and 1 cup plus 6 tablespoons water.
', 'Step 3: Knead on low speed just until dough comes together, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Let dough rest for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Knead once more on low speed for 10 minutes until dough pulls away from the sides of the bowl.
', 'Step 6: Remove dough hook, cover top of mixing bowl tightly with plastic wrap, and let rise in the refrigerator for at least 8 hours (up to 24 hours).
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, for the sauce, add tomatoes to a food processor and roughly puree.
', 'Step 8: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil and butter in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat until butter is melted.
', 'Step 9: Add garlic, shallot, oregano, and pepper flakes.
', 'Step 10: Cook and stir until softened and fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 11: Add pureed tomatoes and season with sugar.
', 'Step 12: Bring to a simmer and cook, stirring occasionally, until sauce has thickened, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Season with salt.
', 'Step 14: Remove from heat, bring to room temperature, and refrigerate until dough has finished rising.
', 'Step 15: Generously grease the inside of a 13x18-inch rimmed baking sheet with 3 tablespoons olive oil.
', 'Step 16: Remove dough from the refrigerator 2 hours before baking.
', 'Step 17: Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and form into a flat ball.
', 'Step 18: Transfer ball to the greased baking sheet.
', 'Step 19: Coat the ball on all sides with olive oil using your hands, loosely cover with plastic wrap and let dough rise in a warm spot for 1 hour.
', 'Step 20: The dough should spread out .
', 'Step 21: Carefully stretch and push the dough into the corners and edges of the pan.
', 'Step 22: Cover loosely, and let rise for 1 hour longer.
', 'Step 23: Adjust an oven rack to the upper middle position.
', 'Step 24: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 25: When dough has risen, gently dock center with fingertips and use your hands to create a risen ridge about 1 inch wide around the edge.
', 'Step 26: Spread dough generously with sauce, leaving the raised 1-inch edge without the sauce.
', 'Step 27: Bake until edges are lightly browned and crisp, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 28: Remove from oven and allow to cool at room temperature for at least 15 minutes.
', 'Step 29: Sprinkle with Pecorino Romano cheese, cut into slices, and serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '386.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '49.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '11.5 mg', 'fatContent': '17.4 g', 'fiberContent': '3 g', 'proteinContent': '8.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '770.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.3 g'}

Title: Ivan's Mega Frutti Di Mare
Ingredients: ['1 ½ (16 ounce) packages linguine pasta', '1 cup olive oil, or as needed', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste', '1 (2 ounce) can anchovy fillets packed in olive oil, drained', '1 (14.5 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 ½ pounds clams in shell, scrubbed', '⅓ pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, tails left on', '⅓ pound bay scallops', '½ pound squid - tentacles and tubes, cleaned and cut into rings', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 lemon, cut into wedges', '1 tablespoon grated Manchego cheese', '1 tablespoon julienned fresh basil leaves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Once the water is boiling, stir in the linguine, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 5: Heat a large skillet covered with about 1/4-inch of olive oil over low heat.
', 'Step 6: Add garlic, 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, and anchovies; cook and stir until the anchovies melt into the oil, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the crushed tomatoes; increase the heat to medium, and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the clams.
', 'Step 9: Once they begin to open, arrange the shrimp in a single layer and allow to simmer.
', 'Step 10: Flip the shrimp when they become pink on one side, about 2 minutes, then drop in the scallops and squid.
', 'Step 11: Continue cooking until the shrimp are bright pink on the outside and the meat is no longer transparent in the center, about 2 more minutes.
', 'Step 12: Season with salt, pepper, and remaining 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 13: Toss the cooked pasta into the sauce.
', 'Step 14: Garnish with a lemon wedge, Manchego cheese, and basil before serving.
']

Title: Italian Baked Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '¾ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs', '¼ cup flax seed meal', '3 tablespoons grated Romano cheese', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '3 eggs, beaten', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly coat a medium baking dish with the butter.
', 'Step 3: In a shallow dish, mix the bread crumbs, flax seed, Romano cheese, and parsley.
', 'Step 4: Place the beaten eggs and flour in 2 separate shallow bowls.
', 'Step 5: Dredge chicken in the flour, dip in eggs, and press into the bread crumb mixture to coat.
', 'Step 6: Arrange coated chicken in the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 7: Cover, and bake 40 minutes in the preheated oven, or until chicken juices run clear.
', 'Step 8: Turn on the oven broiler.
', 'Step 9: Remove cover, and broil chicken 5 minutes, until coating is lightly browned.
']

Title: Ricotta Cheese
Ingredients: ['¼ cup water', '1 teaspoon citric acid powder', '1 gallon raw milk', '2 tablespoons heavy whipping cream', '2 teaspoons salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine water and citric acid in a small bowl; mix until dissolved.
', 'Step 2: Pour milk into a large pot set over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Heat milk, stirring occasionally, until it registers 185 degrees F (85 degrees C) on an instant-read thermometer.
', 'Step 4: Do not boil and stir often to prevent scorching.
', 'Step 5: Stir in citric acid.
', 'Step 6: Keep stirring until curds form.
', 'Step 7: Scoop curds into a sieve lined with several layers of cheesecloth using a slotted spoon.
', 'Step 8: Fold the edges of the cheesecloth over the curds and let drain over a bowl at room temperature, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove the cheese from the cheesecloth and cream and salt.
', 'Step 10: Stir well to combine.
', 'Step 11: Serve right away as-is or use in your favorite recipe.
']

Title: Lemon-Glazed Panettone (Italian Easter Bread)
Ingredients: ['1 cup warm water (105 to115 degrees F/40 to 45 degrees C)', '2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast', '4 ½ cups all-purpose flour, divided', '½ cup unsalted butter', '¾ cup white sugar, divided', '2 large eggs', '2 teaspoons grated lemon zest', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ cup golden raisins', '½ cup slivered almonds', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter, melted, or more as needed', '1 ½ cups powdered sugar, sifted', '¼ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine warm water and yeast in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 2: Let stand for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in 1 cup flour.
', 'Step 4: Cover the bowl and let rise in a warm place for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, beat butter in a large bowl until soft.
', 'Step 6: Gradually add 1/2 cup sugar and blend until light and creamy.
', 'Step 7: Beat in eggs, one at a time.
', 'Step 8: Mix in lemon zest and salt.
', 'Step 9: Beat in flour-yeast mixture that was resting, along with raisins.
', 'Step 10: Gradually add remaining 3 1/2 cups flour, then beat dough for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Cover the bowl with a clean cloth and let rise in a warm place until almost doubled, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 12: Generously grease two 9-inch tube pans.
', 'Step 13: Punch down the risen dough and divide it in half.
', 'Step 14: Place each half in a prepared tube pan and let rise until puffy, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Combine almonds and remaining 1/4 cup sugar in a small bowl.
', 'Step 17: Lightly brush the tops of the panettone with melted butter and sprinkle almond-sugar mixture over top.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 19: While the panettone are baking, beat powdered sugar, lemon juice, and vanilla extract in a bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 20: Spread glaze on the warm panettone.
']

Title: Primo Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 pound spicy Italian sausage', '¼ cup white wine', '½ onion, chopped', '½ cup sliced mushrooms', '½ green bell pepper, chopped', '¼ cup red wine', '¼ cup Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon crushed red pepper', '6 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 pinch dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon dried sage', '½ teaspoon dried marjoram', '6 (8 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '¼ cup brown sugar', "¼ cup confectioners' sugar"]

Title: Magaricz

', 'Step 7: Serve chilled as a condiment with your favorite bread or crackers.

Title: Double Chocolate Biscotti II
Ingredients: ['1 cup white sugar', '¼ cup olive oil', '¼ cup margarine', '¾ cup egg substitute', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 ⅛ cups unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 (5 ounce) milk chocolate candy bar, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line cookie sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, beat the sugar, olive oil and margarine until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the egg substitute and vanilla.
', 'Step 5: Combine the flour, cocoa and baking powder, gradually stir into the wet ingredients.
', 'Step 6: Mix in the chopped candy bar.
', 'Step 7: Chill dough for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Divide the dough into two equal pieces.
', 'Step 9: Roll each piece into a 9 inch long log.
', 'Step 10: Place the logs onto the prepared cookie sheet 4 inches apart and flatten to 1 1/2 inch thickness.
', 'Step 11: If there is not enough room, put each one onto a separate sheet.
', 'Step 12: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven until somewhat firm.
', 'Step 13: Cool on the baking sheets until cool enough to handle.
', 'Step 14: Remove baked loaves to a cutting board and cut each one crosswise into 1/2 inch slices with a sharp knife.
', 'Step 15: Place the slices cut side down back onto the baking sheets, and toast on each side for an additional 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Cool on wire racks and store in an airtight container.
']

', 'Step 4: Season with salt and pepper.
']

Title: Vegan Mushroom Bolognese
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 medium carrot, diced', '1 celery stalk, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 cups button mushrooms, quartered', '1 cup red wine', '1 (14.5 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon dried sage', '3 bay leaves', '½ teaspoon basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; stir in onion.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add carrot, celery, and garlic; cook until soft, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add mushrooms; cook until tender, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour in red wine; cook until wine has almost evaporated, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: n Add tomatoes and season with salt, black pepper, sage, and bay leaves.
', 'Step 7: Cook over medium-high heat and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove bay leaves and stir in basil.
']

Title: Italian Meat Sauce I
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '6 cloves garlic, sliced', '3 (15 ounce) cans seasoned tomato sauce', '3 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with juice', '6 cups water', '8 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '2 pounds sweet Italian sausage', '2 pounds ground sirloin', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, divided', '1 cup grated Romano cheese', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 pound pork meat, cubed', '1 cup dry bread crumbs', '3 tablespoons garlic powder', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 eggs']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In large pot heat 2 tablespoons olive oil over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Add chopped onion and two-thirds of sliced garlic.
', 'Step 3: Saute 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, water and tomato paste.
', 'Step 5: Simmer.
', 'Step 6: n Meanwhile, in large skillet, heat remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Saute remaining garlic 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add sausage and brown, about three minutes on each side.
', 'Step 9: After browning, cover and reduce heat.
', 'Step 10: Cook for 10 minutes, remove from heat, and cut sausages into halves.
', 'Step 11: Add to tomato mixture.
', 'Step 12: n Cook pork over medium heat in sausage skillet until brown.
', 'Step 13: Add to tomato mixture.
', 'Step 14: Add 3 tablespoons parsley, Romano, oregano, salt and pepper to tomato sauce.
', 'Step 15: Continue to simmer over low heat.
', 'Step 16: n Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 17: Cover a cookie sheet with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 18: In large bowl combine ground sirloin, bread crumbs, garlic powder, remaining parsley, parmesan and eggs.
', 'Step 19: Form 1 inch balls and place on cookie sheet.
', 'Step 20: Cook until golden brown, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Add meatballs to sauce.
', 'Step 22: Continue to cook sauce for 5 hours.
', 'Step 23: Serve over fusilli or ravioli.
']

Title: Grandma's Italian Pizzelle Cookies
Ingredients: ['3 eggs, beaten', '¾ cup white sugar', '¾ cup butter, softened', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon anise extract', 'cooking spray', '¼ cup powdered sugar, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: Preheat a pizzelle iron according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 2: Beat eggs, sugar, and butter together using an electric mixer.
', 'Step 3: Add flour and extracts; beat until combined.
', 'Step 4: Spray the inside of iron lightly with cooking spray.
', 'Step 5: Drop batter by teaspoonfuls into the center of each pizzelle grid.
', 'Step 6: Close lid and bake until steam stops and cookies are light golden brown, 45 to 60 seconds.
', 'Step 7: Peel pizzelle off using a fork and lay flat on a newspaper.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle with powdered sugar while warm and let sit for 1 minute.
', 'Step 9: Dust the other side.
', 'Step 10: Repeat with remaining batter to make about 30 cookies.
']

Title: Butternut Squash Gnocchi with Garlic-Sage Butter over Wilted Spinach
Ingredients: ['1 cup water', '1 pound butternut squash, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '½ pound Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes', '1 large egg', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 cups all-purpose flour, plus more as needed', '2 bunches fresh spinach, rinsed and chopped', '4 tablespoons salted butter', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '¼ cup chopped fresh sage', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour water into the pot of a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and place a steamer basket inside.
', 'Step 2: Place butternut squash and potatoes in the steamer basket.
', 'Step 3: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 4: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 5 minutes.
", 'Step 5: Allow 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 6: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 7: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 8: Use a pot holder to remove the steamer basket and set aside to allow the squash and potatoes to cool slightly, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Press the squash and potatoes through a ricer into a large bowl.
', 'Step 10: Add egg and salt, and mix thoroughly.
', 'Step 11: Sift about 1 1/2 cups of flour over the mixture and mix to combine.
', 'Step 12: If the mixture is still sticky, add a bit more flour until it comes together.
', 'Step 13: Turn out mixture onto a well-floured surface and knead slightly, adding more flour until the dough is no longer sticking to your hands or to the surface.
', 'Step 14: Divide dough into 4 parts.
', 'Step 15: Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper and dust with flour.
', 'Step 16: Take 1 piece of dough and roll it into a 1/2-inch thick rope on the floured surface.
', 'Step 17: Cut the rope lengthwise into 1/2-inch pieces.
', 'Step 18: Working with 1 piece at a time, roll each piece down a floured gnocchi board to make ridges.
', 'Step 19: Transfer gnocchi onto the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 20: Repeat with remaining dough.
', 'Step 21: Place baking sheets in the freezer while you prepare the sauce and spinach.
', 'Step 22: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 23: Meanwhile, place wet spinach in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 24: Cover and allow condensation to build until the spinach starts to wilt, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Remove lid and stir the spinach until wilted and the pan begins to dry.
', 'Step 26: Divide spinach among 4 serving plates.
', 'Step 27: Combine butter and olive oil in the same skillet that you cooked the spinach.
', 'Step 28: Heat over medium-high heat until mixture begins to foam.
', 'Step 29: Add sage, garlic, and red pepper and swirl the pan to combine.
', 'Step 30: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 31: Cook gnocchi in boiling water until they float, 3 to 4 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 32: Remove with a slotted spoon and transfer to the skillet with the garlic-sage butter.
', 'Step 33: Toss lightly to coat.
', 'Step 34: Place gnocchi on top of spinach on the serving plates and sprinkle each with 1 tablespoon Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
', 'Step 35: Serve immediately.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '572.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '79.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '81.4 mg', 'fatContent': '22.5 g', 'fiberContent': '8.7 g', 'proteinContent': '17.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '1484.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.6 g'}

Title: Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients: ['2 cups butter', '4 cups milk', '12 cups all-purpose flour', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '1 cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 ½ teaspoons baking soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '3 ½ cups semisweet chocolate chips', '2 cups chopped walnuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease cookie sheets.
', 'Step 3: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine the butter and milk.
', 'Step 4: Cook until melted, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 5: Set aside to cool.
', 'Step 6: In a large bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg and cloves.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the milk mixture by hand until the dough is firm and not tacky.
', 'Step 8: Mix in the chocolate chips and walnuts.
', 'Step 9: Roll the dough into 1 1/2 inch balls and place onto the prepared cookie sheets.
', 'Step 10: These cookies do not spread much, so you can place them fairly close together.
', 'Step 11: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm.
', 'Step 12: Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks.
', "Step 13: Glaze with a thin confectioners' icing when cool to preserve freshness.
"]

Title: Beet and Goat Cheese Ravioli
Ingredients: ['¾ pound fresh beets', '1 whole onion', '1 head garlic, unpeeled', '¼ teaspoon salt or to taste', '¼ teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper, or to taste', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh dill', '4 ounces goat cheese', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 ½ cups whole wheat flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '3 eggs, lightly beaten', '⅓ cup warm water, or as needed', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 sprigs chopped fresh dill', '2 ounces crumbled goat cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Individually wrap beets, onion, and head of garlic in aluminum foil.
', 'Step 3: Place on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until beets are fork-tender, about 1 hour depending on size.
', 'Step 5: Remove garlic once soft, after about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Allow beets, onion, and garlic to cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, prepare the dough.
', 'Step 8: In a large bowl, mix together all purpose flour, whole wheat flour, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 9: Make a well in the center and add in eggs.
', 'Step 10: Gradually add in the water, 1 tablespoon at a time, until dough comes together (more water may be needed depending on how dry your dough is).
', 'Step 11: Turn dough out onto a work surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Divide dough into 4 portions, wrap in plastic, and refrigerate at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 13: For the filling: Peel skin off beets, onion, and 3 cloves of the roasted garlic.
', 'Step 14: Reserve the rest of the garlic for another use.
', 'Step 15: Cut beets in half, and place them in a food processor.
', 'Step 16: Add onion and garlic cloves; pulse until smooth, scraping down sides as necessary.
', 'Step 17: Add in 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon fresh dill, and 4 ounces goat cheese; pulse several times until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 18: Remove 1 piece of chilled dough from the fridge.
', 'Step 19: Shape into a rough rectangle about 3x4 inches.
', 'Step 20: Set pasta maker to the widest setting, and run dough through 3 times.
', 'Step 21: Reduce pasta width setting to the next narrowest setting, and run pasta through twice.
', 'Step 22: Continue to run pasta through pasta maker, dropping the width each time, until about 1/16-inch-thick.
', 'Step 23: Cover pasta sheet with a kitchen towel to prevent it from drying out.
', 'Step 24: Repeat with additional pieces of pasta dough, as needed.
', 'Step 25: Lay one sheet of pasta on your work surface.
', 'Step 26: Scoop teaspoon-sized portions of beet filling onto the dough about 3 inches apart.
', 'Step 27: Lightly brush water around the edges of the filling.
', 'Step 28: Gently place another sheet of pasta over the filling and press pieces together around the filling, removing as much air as possible.
', 'Step 29: Seal firmly.
', 'Step 30: Using a 2 1/2-inch cutter, cut raviolis from the dough, ensuring the filling is as centered as possible.
', 'Step 31: Gently press edges again to seal.
', 'Step 32: Place finished ravioli on a lightly floured baking sheet.
', 'Step 33: Continue making pasta and filling raviolis until all the beet filling is used.
', 'Step 34: Reserve any extra dough for another use.
', 'Step 35: When ready to serve, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 36: Add a few ravioli at a time to the boiling water.
', 'Step 37: Boil until they rise to the top, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 38: Remove from water with a slotted spoon and set aside.
', 'Step 39: Melt 2 tablespoons of unsalted butter in a second saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 40: Add a few ravioli at a time to the pan and cook for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 41: Flip over and cook an additional 2 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '331.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '44 g', 'cholesterolContent': '94.2 mg', 'fatContent': '11.9 g', 'fiberContent': '5.2 g', 'proteinContent': '13.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '391.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '5 g'}

Title: Orange Pizzelle
Ingredients: ['1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '3 eggs, at room temperature', '¾ cup white sugar', '½ cup butter, melted', '1 tablespoon orange extract', '2 teaspoons triple sec (orange-flavored liqueur)', '8 drops yellow food coloring', '4 drops red food coloring', '2 teaspoons finely grated orange zest']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Sift flour and baking powder together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 2: Beat the eggs in a large bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed, adding sugar gradually until mixture thickens.
', 'Step 3: Beat in melted butter gradually until well-blended.
', 'Step 4: Stir in orange extract, triple sec, yellow food coloring, and red food coloring.
', 'Step 5: Carefully stir in sifted flour and baking powder until batter is stiff and smooth.
', 'Step 6: Fold in grated orange zest.
', "Step 7: Grease and preheat pizzelle baker according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 8: Use a small ice cream scoop or tablespoon cookie scoop to drop batter onto the preheated pizzelle baker.
', 'Step 9: Bake until browned, 30 to 40 seconds.
', 'Step 10: Transfer to a cooling rack to cool completely.
']

Title: Pizza Shells
Ingredients: ['2 (28 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 (12 ounce) box jumbo pasta shells', '1 (6 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained', '½ green bell pepper, chopped', '½ onion, chopped', '2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese', '1 (6 ounce) package of sliced mini pepperoni']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place crushed tomatoes, canola oil, oregano, basil, and sugar into a large saucepan, cover, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to a simmer, and cook the sauce, stirring frequently, until the flavors have blended, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water, and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the shell pasta, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the shells are cooked but still firm, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain thoroughly.
', 'Step 8: Mix the mushrooms, green pepper, and onion in a bowl.
', 'Step 9: To stuff the shells, spoon about 1 teaspoon of tomato sauce into a shell; sprinkle with the mushroom, green pepper, and onion mixture.
', 'Step 10: Top the shell with about 1 tablespoon of Monterey Jack cheese.
', 'Step 11: Repeat for remaining shells and filling, and place the stuffed shells into a 9x13-inch baking dish side by side and touching.
', 'Step 12: Place several slices of mini pepperoni on each shell.
', 'Step 13: Pour the remaining tomato sauce gently around the shells.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese is melted and browned and the pepperoni slices are crisp, about 30 minutes.
']

Title: Spinach Mushroom and Ricotta Fettuccine
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package spinach fettuccine pasta', '1 teaspoon butter', '3 cups mushrooms', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 lemon, juiced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: In a large saucepan over medium heat, melt butter.
', 'Step 4: Stir in mushrooms and cook until tender.
', 'Step 5: Stir in spinach and cook until thawed and tender.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat and stir in ricotta cheese; mix well.
', 'Step 7: To the spinach mixture add the lemon juice; pour over cooked pasta.
', 'Step 8: Mix well and serve.
']

Title: Chocolate and Orange Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['1 pound mascarpone cheese, room temperature', '¼ cup orange-flavored liqueur (such as Grand Marnier), divided', '2 cups heavy whipping cream', '¼ cup white sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups orange juice (such as Simply®)', '3 (3 ounce) packages soft ladyfingers', '¼ cup unsweetened cocoa powder, or as needed, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir mascarpone and 2 tablespoons orange liqueur together in a large bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 2: Beat cream, sugar, and vanilla together with an electric mixer in a separate bowl until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 3: Fold about 1/4 of the whipped cream into the mascarpone mixture with a large rubber spatula until smooth; add remaining whipped cream and fold until the color of the mixture is consistent.
', 'Step 4: Mix orange juice and remaining orange-flavored liqueur together in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 5: Separate ladyfingers.
', 'Step 6: Quickly dip two or three ladyfingers at a time in the orange juice mixture just long enough to absorb a small amount of liquid.
', 'Step 7: Arrange soaked cookies into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Repeat soaking and placing cookies until you cover the bottom of the dish in a single layer.
', 'Step 9: Spread about half the mascarpone mixture over the layer of cookies.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle about half the cocoa powder over the mascarpone.
', 'Step 11: Repeat soaking and layering with remaining cookies, orange juice mixture, mascarpone mixture, and cocoa powder.
', 'Step 12: Cover baking dish with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled completely, at least 5 hours to overnight.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '433 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '25.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '148 mg', 'fatContent': '34.5 g', 'fiberContent': '0.9 g', 'proteinContent': '6.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '19.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '67.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.8 g'}

Title: Crispy Italian Chicken Topped with Mozzarella
Ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 egg', '1 cup panko bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed', '1 pound chicken tenders', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '15 cherry tomatoes, halved', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '10 fresh basil leaves', '1 small onion, chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '4 slices of fresh mozzarella cheese, or as needed - cut in half']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Whisk together the flour, 1 1/2 teaspoons of salt, 1 teaspoon of black pepper, and cayenne pepper in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: In a separate shallow bowl, beat the egg.
', 'Step 4: Place the panko crumbs into a third bowl.
', 'Step 5: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Dip each chicken tender into the seasoned flour, then into the egg; roll in panko crumbs.
', 'Step 7: Pan fry the chicken tenders until golden brown on both sides, about 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 8: Transfer the chicken pieces to a baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Heat 2 more tablespoons of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, and stir in the tomatoes, garlic, basil, onion, and a pinch of salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 10: Reduce heat and simmer the tomato sauce until it starts to thicken, stirring often, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Spoon about 1 tablespoon of sauce over each chicken piece; top with a half piece of mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese is melted and bubbly, 8 to 10 minutes.
']

Title: Roasted Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 pound roma (plum) tomatoes, halved and seeded', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '10 leaves basil, torn']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
', 'Step 3: Place tomato halves skin-side down on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 4: Add garlic cloves.
', 'Step 5: Evenly drizzle tomatoes and garlic with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Roast in the preheated oven until tomatoes are bubbling, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Increase heat to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Roast until tomatoes just begin to brown, 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 9: Turn off the heat.
', 'Step 10: Let tomatoes sit in the hot oven with the door closed until further caramelized, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Transfer roasted tomatoes and garlic to a bowl.
', 'Step 12: Add basil and use a wooden spoon to crush the mixture and break apart the tomatoes, leaving them a bit chunky.
', 'Step 13: Remove peels, if desired.
', 'Step 14: Serve over your favorite cooked pasta.
']

Title: Arancini III
Ingredients: ['1 pinch saffron threads, crushed', '1 cup white wine', '2 tablespoons butter', '6 cups chicken broth, or as needed', '3 cups Arborio rice', '1 small white onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pound fontina cheese, cubed', '2 cups plain dried bread crumbs', '1 quart olive oil for frying']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the wine and saffron in a cup or small bowl.
', 'Step 2: Stir briefly, then let it sit.
', 'Step 3: Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Add the onion; cook and stir until transparent, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Mix in the rice, and continue cooking and stirring until the rice has absorbed most of the butter.
', 'Step 6: Slowly stir the white wine and saffron into the rice, stirring continuously until the wine is absorbed and rice is creamy.
', 'Step 7: Season with thyme, then pour in 1 cup of chicken broth at a time, cooking and stirring constantly until each cup of broth is absorbed before adding the next.
', 'Step 8: Stop adding broth when the rice is tender.
', 'Step 9: If you run out of broth, you may use water.
', 'Step 10: Remove from the heat, stir in the Parmesan cheese and allow to cool until you can touch it without burning your hands.
', 'Step 11: Lightly grease a large cookie sheet with olive oil.
', 'Step 12: Pour the risotto out onto the sheet and spread evenly.
', 'Step 13: Place in the refrigerator for about 1 hour or until chilled.
', 'Step 14: When the rice is cool, roll small portions into balls about the size of golf balls.
', 'Step 15: Tuck a cube of fontina cheese into the center of each one.
', 'Step 16: Roll each ball in bread crumbs to coat.
', 'Step 17: Heat the olive oil in a heavy saucepan or deep fryer to 375 degrees F 190 degrees C).
', 'Step 18: The oil should be about 3 inches deep.
', 'Step 19: When the oil is hot, fry the arancini until they reach a golden orangish brown, about 3 minutes.
', "Step 20: Arancini literally means 'little oranges'.
", 'Step 21: Cool for 5 minutes, then serve with any marinara sauce.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '761.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '85.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '73.1 mg', 'fatContent': '32.4 g', 'fiberContent': '1.9 g', 'proteinContent': '25.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '14.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '735.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.1 g'}

Title: Italian-Inspired Deep-Dish Pizza Quiche
Ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray', '1 tablespoon fine cornmeal', '1 (16 ounce) package refrigerated pizza dough', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 cups shredded extra-sharp Cheddar cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste', '½ cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes, or to taste', '8 ounces Italian sausage, cooked, pork', '4 ounces sliced baby portobello mushrooms', '1 small sweet red pepper, thinly sliced', '¼ cup sliced black olives, or to taste', '2 cups heavy cream', '4 large eggs', '1 teaspoon crushed dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon whole fennel seeds', '½ teaspoon garlic salt', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '14 slices pepperoni']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray the bottom and sides of a 2 1/2-inch deep, 9 1/2-inch round springform pan with nonstick spray, then evenly dust with cornmeal.
', 'Step 3: Roll out and stretch pizza dough to a diameter of about 15 1/2 inches.
', 'Step 4: Carefully place it in the prepared pan to cover the bottom and sides with some overhang, re-stretching as needed.
', 'Step 5: Toss mozzarella, Cheddar, and Parmesan cheeses together to mix.
', 'Step 6: Set aside 1 cup in the refrigerator for later.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle 1/2 of the remaining cheese over the dough.
', 'Step 8: Layer with sun-dried tomatoes, sausage, mushrooms, sweet pepper, and olives, in that order.
', 'Step 9: Prepare custard: Whisk eggs in a 4-cup liquid measure.
', 'Step 10: Add cream, eggs, basil, oregano, fennel seeds, garlic salt, crushed red pepper, and garlic powder and whisk until well combined.
', 'Step 11: Pour 1/2 of the custard mixture over the layered ingredients.
', 'Step 12: Top with remaining (non-refrigerated) cheese, then pour the remaining custard evenly over top.
', 'Step 13: Roll the dough overhang inward over the cheese and custard.
', 'Step 14: Place the springform pan on a large sheet of foil, and gather the foil up and around the pan in case it leaks.
', 'Step 15: Transfer to the preheated oven and bake for 1 hour 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Tent the top with foil to prevent excessive browning, and bake until fully set, about 45 minutes longer.
', 'Step 17: Carefully remove from the oven.
', 'Step 18: Sprinkle with reserved 1 cup cheese and pepperoni slices.
', 'Step 19: Pop back into the oven and bake until cheese melts, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Remove from the oven and place on a cooling rack.
', 'Step 21: Tent loosely with foil and let rest for about 2 hours.
', 'Step 22: (It will stay hot and be completely set after 2 hours.
', 'Step 23: ) Release the ring.
', "Step 24: Slice through the outer crust with a serrated knife, then a sharp chef's knife to finish slicing the pieces.
"]

Title: Catfish Tuscany
Ingredients: ['4 (4 ounce) fillets catfish', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons butter, softened', '1 ½ tablespoons mayonnaise', '4 roma tomatoes or sun-dried tomatoes, sliced thin']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat broiler to 500 degrees.
', 'Step 2: Coat a broiling pan with nonstick cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Brush both sides of fillets with lemon juice, and then sprinkle with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Place fillets flat side up on prepared pan.
', 'Step 5: In a small bowl, mix Parmesan cheese, butter, and mayonnaise.
', 'Step 6: Broil fish about 4 inches from heat for 6 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove pan from oven, and turn fillets over.
', 'Step 8: Spread the cheese mixture evenly over each fillet.
', 'Step 9: Top with tomato slices.
', 'Step 10: Broil an additional 4 to 6 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
']

Title: Spaghetti Al Amatraciana
Ingredients: ['¼ pound thinly sliced pancetta bacon, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '1 (14.5 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '¼ cup white wine', '½ pound uncooked spaghetti', 'salt and pepper to taste']

', 'Step 2: Stir in the tomatoes and wine; simmer for about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.

', 'Step 6: Add salt and black ground pepper to taste; serve.

Title: Italian Almond Macaroons
Ingredients: ['16 ounces almond paste', '6 egg whites', '1 cup white sugar', "1 cup confectioners' sugar", '½ cup sifted all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons lemon extract', '3 drops red food coloring', '½ cup slivered almonds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line cookie sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl, stir together the almond paste, egg whites and lemon extract until smooth.
', "Step 4: Sift together the white sugar and confectioners' sugar, then combine sugars with the flour and salt.
", 'Step 5: Stir the dry ingredients into the egg mixture along with the food coloring of your choice.
', 'Step 6: Drop by teaspoonfuls, two inches apart, onto the prepared cookie sheets.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle some nuts on top of each cookie.
', 'Step 8: Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are golden around the edges.

', 'Step 10: Store or freeze in an airtight container.
']

Title: Grilled Chicken and Portobello Lasagna Rollups
Ingredients: ['18 lasagna noodles, cooked and drained', '2 cups marinara sauce', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '2 portobello mushrooms, diced', '1 cup frozen chopped spinach', '2 cups diced cooked chicken', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 cups Alfredo sauce', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup pine nuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the lasagna noodles, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the noodles are cooked, but still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes; drain and rinse.
', 'Step 4: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Spread the marinara sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 glass baking dish; set aside.
', 'Step 6: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir mushrooms until they soften, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in spinach, and cook until hot; remove from heat.
', 'Step 8: Stir together the chicken, ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, oregano, and the cooked spinach mixture in a large bowl.
', 'Step 9: Season to taste with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 10: Spread about 1/4 cup of the mixture on each lasagna noodle.
', 'Step 11: Roll the noodle up, and place seam-side down into the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 12: Repeat for each noodle.
', 'Step 13: Spoon Alfredo sauce over the rollups.
', 'Step 14: Bake, covered, in the preheated oven for 40 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Uncover; sprinkle with mozzarella cheese and pine nuts.
', 'Step 16: Return to the oven and bake until the cheese is melted and bubbly and the pine nuts are toasted, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Serve hot.
']

Title: Penne with Asparagus and Mushrooms
Ingredients: ['½ cup olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 (10 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1 bunch fresh asparagus, trimmed and chopped', '1 (14.5 ounce) can pureed tomatoes', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package uncooked penne pasta', '1 cup heavy cream']

', 'Step 2: Place mushrooms in the skillet, and cook 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Mix in asparagus, and cook 5 minutes, or until tender.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the tomatoes.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low, and simmer 20 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Place penne pasta in the pot, cook for 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente, and drain.

', 'Step 10: Serve over the cooked pasta.

Title: Risotto with Butternut Squash and White Beans
Ingredients: ['1 butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cubed', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1 onion, diced', '1 small tomato, diced', '1 (16 ounce) package Arborio rice', '½ cup white wine', '1 teaspoon dried marjoram', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '8 cups chicken broth, or more as needed', '1 dash hot pepper sauce, or more to taste', '1 (14 ounce) can small white beans, drained', '¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Season butternut squash cubes with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 2: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer.
', 'Step 3: Cover and bring the water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Add butternut squash, cover, and steam until just tender, 10 to 12 minutes depending on thickness.
', 'Step 5: Transfer squash to a bowl and mash.
', 'Step 6: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir onion in the hot oil until softened, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir tomato into onions until onions become translucent, 3 to 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add Arborio rice to onion mixture and stir to coat with oil; cook and stir until rice becomes translucent with a white spots in the middle of each grain, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir white wine into rice mixture; cook and stir until wine is completely absorbed, 2 to 4 minutes; add marjoram, oregano, and basil.
', 'Step 11: Pour chicken broth into rice mixture, about 1/2 cup at a time, stirring until liquid is absorbed, until rice is creamy but firm to the bite, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Stir squash into rice mixture until fully incorporated.
', 'Step 13: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 14: Stir hot pepper sauce, white beans, Parmesan cheese, and parsley into risotto until cheese is melted.
', 'Step 15: Season with salt and black pepper.
']

Title: Creamy Chicken Francese
Ingredients: ['2 large eggs, beaten', '¼ cup finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta', '4 (4 ounce) chicken breast cutlets', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or more as needed', '1 medium lemon, cut into 8 slices', '2 tablespoons minced fresh garlic', '¾ cup chicken broth', '½ cup dry white wine', '2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice', '1 cup half-and-half', '1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir beaten eggs and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese together in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 2: Stir flour, salt, and pepper together in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 3: Dredge cutlets in the seasoned flour.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, heat butter and oil in a 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Swirl the skillet once the butter has melted to combine butter and oil.
', 'Step 8: Add lemon slices and cook, topped with a splatter screen, for 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 9: Dip floured chicken cutlets into the egg mixture and cook in the same skillet, about 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 10: Be careful not to disturb the cutlets as they brown.
', 'Step 11: Remove browned cutlets to a rack and keep warm.
', 'Step 12: Add garlic and cook about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 13: Pour in chicken broth, wine, and lemon juice.
', 'Step 14: Bring to a boil and cook until liquid has reduced to about 1/3 cup, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove skillet from heat and cool sauce slightly, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Gradually add half-and-half, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 17: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 18: Drain linguine, reserving some of the cooking water.
', 'Step 19: Place skillet back on low heat.
', 'Step 20: If the sauce is too thick, add cooking liquid from the pasta, 1 tablespoon at a time, until thinned to your desired consistency.
', 'Step 21: If the sauce is too thin, create a paste from the leftover flour and about 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
', 'Step 22: Quickly stir or whisk the paste into the sauce and allow to cook to desired consistency.
', 'Step 23: Return chicken pieces and lemon slices to the sauce to warm through, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Serve each cutlet with two lemon slices and sauce over hot, cooked linguine.
', 'Step 25: Garnish with fresh parsley.
']

Title: Italian (Arborio) Rice Pudding
Ingredients: ['2 cups water', '1 cup Arborio rice', '1 tablespoon butter', '¼ teaspoon salt', '3 cups half-and-half', '1 cup sugar', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 (1 1/2 inch) piece lemon peel, or more to taste', '1 pinch ground cinnamon, for garnish']

['Step 1: Bring water to a boil in a large saucepan; add rice, butter, and salt.
', 'Step 2: Place a cover on the saucepan, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook rice at a simmer until the rice is tender and the moisture is mostly absorbed, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir half-and-half and sugar into the rice until the sugar dissolves; add cinnamon stick and lemon peel.

', 'Step 5: Place a large stainless steel bowl atop a pot of simmering water.
', 'Step 6: Pour the rice mixture into the top of the double boiler and simmer, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour rice pudding into a serving dish.
', 'Step 8: Remove and discard cinnamon stick and lemon peel from pudding; let cool slightly before garnishing with cinnamon to serve.
']

Title: Slow Cooker Stuffed Zucchini
Ingredients: ['2 large zucchini, trimmed and halved lengthwise', '4 ripe tomatoes, cored', '¼ cup olive oil', '¾ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon crushed garlic', '4 fresh basil leaves', '1 teaspoon dried Italian herb seasoning', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, diced', '1 pound bulk sweet Italian sausage', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 cup grated mozzarella cheese']

['Step 1: Scoop out flesh from the zucchini halves, leaving shells about 1/8 inch thick.
', 'Step 2: (Zucchini flesh may be saved for another use.

']

Title: Chocolate Cantucci
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups white sugar', '3 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '¾ cup chopped dark chocolate']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Combine sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until frothy.
', 'Step 4: Add flour and baking powder and mix well.
', 'Step 5: Fold in chocolate pieces until a sticky dough forms.
', 'Step 6: Separate dough into 2 portions and shape each portion into a long, thick log.
', 'Step 7: Place logs 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheet.

', 'Step 13: Cool to room temperature, about 10 minutes, before serving.

Title: Jac's Ground Chicken Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground chicken', '2 cloves garlic, minced, or to taste', '1 (24 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '½ cup dry red wine', '½ cup water', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 ½ cups grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '2 eggs, beaten', '2 teaspoons dried basil, or to taste', '2 teaspoons dried parsley, or to taste', '9 no-boil lasagna noodles', 'aluminum foil']

Title: Pumpkin Pecan Biscotti
Ingredients: ['2 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '¾ cup white sugar', '½ cup brown sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon ground ginger', '2 eggs', '½ cup pumpkin puree', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup finely chopped pecans']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Whisk together the flour, white sugar, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger in a large bowl until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 4: In a separate bowl, beat the eggs with pumpkin puree and vanilla extract; stir in pecans.
', 'Step 5: Pour in the dry ingredients, and stir to make a stiff dough.
', 'Step 6: Divide the dough in half, and form each half into a log about 10 inches long and 2 inches wide.
', 'Step 7: Place the logs onto the parchment-lined baking sheet.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Let the logs cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes; remove to a work surface and slice the logs into individual cookies about 1/2-inch thick.
', 'Step 10: Use a sharp knife and a light sawing motion to cut up the cookies.
', 'Step 11: Place the cookies back onto the parchment-lined baking sheet.
', 'Step 12: Return the cookies to the oven, and bake until lightly browned, about 8 minutes; turn the cookies over and bake until crisp, another 8 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Let cool on wire racks.
']

Title: Perfect Lasagna Bolognese
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '½ pound pancetta (Italian bacon), diced', '2 cups chopped celery', '1 ¾ cups chopped carrots', '1 ¼ cups chopped onion', '1 ½ pounds coarsely ground chuck', '1 pound coarsely ground pork shoulder', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 cup dry white wine', '1 ½ cups no-salt crushed tomatoes in puree', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '½ cup beef broth', '½ cup heavy whipping cream', '½ cup whole milk', '5 tablespoons butter', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '4 cups whole milk', '1 bay leaf', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '8 (9x13-inch) fresh lasagna sheets', '2 cups finely grated Parmesan cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil and 1 tablespoon butter in a large Dutch oven over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add pancetta; cook and stir until browned, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add celery, carrots, and onion; cook, stirring occasionally, until very soft, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in beef and pork.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Cook until evenly browned, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour white wine into the Dutch oven; cook until alcohol evaporates, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, and sugar.
', 'Step 9: Bring to a simmer; reduce heat to low, cover and simmer Bolognese sauce, stirring occasionally and skimming fat off the surface, about 3 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 10: Stir in beef broth, 1/4 cup at a time, if sauce looks dry.
', 'Step 11: Stir heavy cream and 1/2 cup milk into the Bolognese sauce; mix well.
', 'Step 12: Cover and cook over very low heat until flavors combine, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Melt 5 tablespoons butter in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 14: Stir in flour until a smooth paste forms; cook and stir until paste turns a golden sandy color, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Increase heat to medium-high and slowly whisk 4 cups milk into the saucepan.
', 'Step 16: Bring to a gentle simmer; reduce heat to medium-low and add bay leaf.
', 'Step 17: Continue simmering, stirring occasionally until bechamel sauce is thick and smooth, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Season with salt and nutmeg; discard bay leaf.
', 'Step 19: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 20: Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with butter.
', 'Step 21: Spread 1/4 cup bechamel sauce in the bottom of the baking dish.
', 'Step 22: Cover with 1 lasagna sheet; prick in several places with a paring knife.
', 'Step 23: Spread 1/2 cup bechamel sauce and 1/2 cup Bolognese sauce on top.
', 'Step 24: Sprinkle 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese on top.
', 'Step 25: Repeat layers 7 times with remaining lasagna sheets, bechamel sauce, Bolognese sauce, and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 26: Cover lasagna with aluminum foil and place on a rimmed baking sheet.
', 'Step 27: Bake lasagna in the preheated oven until bubbly, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 28: Remove aluminum foil and continue baking until cheese is browned, about 20 minutes more.
', 'Step 29: Let cool before serving, about 15 minutes.
']

Title: Jo's Manicotti
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package manicotti pasta', '1 pint part-skim ricotta cheese', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 onion, chopped', '¼ cup grated Romano cheese', '1 tablespoon chicken bouillon powder', '½ teaspoon garlic salt', '⅛ teaspoon dried thyme', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large pot cook manicotti pasta with boiling salted water until al dente.
', 'Step 2: Rinse with warm water and drain.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl mix together ricotta cheese, eggs, onion, grated Romano cheese, chicken bouillon, garlic, thyme, ground black pepper, and spinach.
', 'Step 4: To assemble, fill manicotti noodles with cheese filling.
', 'Step 5: Arrange noodles in a greased 9x13 inch pan.
', 'Step 6: Pour tomato sauce down center of shells.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle with shredded Mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 8: Bake in a preheated 350 degree(175 degree C) oven for 25 minutes, or until hot and bubbly.
']

Title: Italian Ricotta Cheese Pie
Ingredients: ['1 cup graham cracker crumbs', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 cup honey', '4 eggs', '4 cups ricotta cheese', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons whole wheat flour', '2 teaspoons lemon zest, cut into thin slivers', '2 tablespoons blanched slivered almonds', '1 tablespoon shelled pumpkin seeds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small mixing bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs, butter and honey and mix well.
', 'Step 2: Place in a 9 inch springform pan and spread evenly across the bottom.
', 'Step 3: Refrigerate 30 minutes to chill.
', 'Step 4: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: In a large electric mixer bowl, combine ricotta and eggs (beat in one at a time until incorporated).
', 'Step 6: Add tablespoon of honey, vanilla and flour.
', 'Step 7: Beat until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Fold in lemon peel and almonds.
', 'Step 9: Pour mixture into chilled crust and scatter pumpkin seeds on top.
', 'Step 10: Bake for 1 hour or until just firm and lightly colored on top.
', 'Step 11: Turn oven off, open door and leave pie inside to cool for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Remove pie from oven, refrigerate and chill for 2 hours to overnight before serving.
']

Title: Meatloaf al Italiano
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', '1 cup chopped mushrooms', '½ cup chopped red bell pepper', '½ cup finely chopped onion', '1 clove garlic, minced', '½ cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs with Romano cheese', '3 sprigs Italian parsley, finely chopped', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '11 ounces ground pork', '18 ounces lean ground beef', '¼ cup tomato sauce', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard (such as Maille®)', '1 teaspoon dark brown sugar', '1 teaspoon white vinegar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan.
', 'Step 3: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Add mushrooms, bell pepper, and onion; cook and stir until just soft, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 6: Set mixture aside and let cool.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, mix bread crumbs, parsley, egg, and Italian seasoning together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 8: Add cooled veggie mixture; mix well.
', 'Step 9: Gently mix in ground pork and ground beef.
', 'Step 10: Place mixture into the prepared loaf pan and form into a loaf shape.
', 'Step 11: Mix tomato sauce, Dijon mustard, brown sugar, and vinegar together in a bowl.
', 'Step 12: Set glaze aside.
', 'Step 13: Bake meatloaf in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove from the oven and brush glaze over loaf.
', 'Step 15: Return to the oven and continue to bake, brushing with glaze every 10 to 15 minutes, until no longer pink in the center, about 30 minutes more.
', 'Step 16: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
', 'Step 17: Remove from the oven and drain excess oil.
']

Title: Garlic Chicken Pizza
Ingredients: ['1 ⅛ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '1 ¼ teaspoons salt', '1 ½ teaspoons vegetable oil', '3 cups bread flour', '2 tablespoons dry milk powder', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '2 tablespoons cornmeal', '1 cup roasted garlic and parmesan cheese sauce', '¼ teaspoon granulated garlic', '10 ounces mozzarella cheese, shredded', '2 grilled skinless, boneless chicken breast, diced', '¼ red onion, sliced', '1 tomato, cut into thin wedges', '1 green bell pepper, seeded and diced']

['Step 1: Place ingredients in the pan of the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer.
', 'Step 2: Select dough cycle; press Start.
', 'Step 3: Preheat oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Sprinkle a large pizza pan with cornmeal.
', 'Step 5: Roll or pat dough out on a lightly floured surface until it is the diameter of the pizza pan; place on pan.
', 'Step 6: Spread dough with sauce, then sprinkle with garlic.
', 'Step 7: Cover with cheese.
', 'Step 8: On top of the pizza, arrange chicken, green pepper, onion and tomato.
', 'Step 9: Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until dough is baked, cheese is melted and toppings are lightly browned.
']
