Title: Champagne Cookies
Ingredients: ['½ cup multicolored candy sprinkles', '½ cup shortening', '1 cup white sugar', '1 cup champagne', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '4 drops red food coloring, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place the sprinkles in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 3: Beat the shortening and sugar in a bowl with an electric mixer until the mixture is light and creamy.
', 'Step 4: Pour in the champagne, and mix for about 1 minute on low speed.
', 'Step 5: Mixture will be lumpy.
', 'Step 6: Mix in the baking powder, and stir in flour to make a smooth dough.
', 'Step 7: Stir in red food coloring by drops until the mixture is desired shade of pink.
', 'Step 8: Pinch off about 1 rounded tablespoon of dough, roll into a ball, and dip the ball into the sprinkles, covering the top.
', 'Step 9: Place the ball onto a baking sheet with the sprinkles up, and repeat with the rest of the dough.
', 'Step 10: Use the bottom of a glass to press the cookies flat.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until the edges of the cookies are very lightly browned and the cookies are crisp, 12 to 14 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Let cool 1 minute on baking sheet before removing to a rack to finish cooling.
']

Title: Ricotta Gnudi
Ingredients: ['16 ounces ricotta cheese', '½ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '1 large egg, beaten', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '⅛ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '¾ cup Italian-style tipo 00 flour', '½ cup semolina flour', '1 tablespoon flour for dusting', '1 (16 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or to taste', '2 tablespoons fresh basil, cut into ribbons']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a gentle boil.
', 'Step 2: Meanwhile, combine ricotta cheese, 1/2 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, egg, salt, pepper, and nutmeg in a bowl; mix well.
', 'Step 3: Add in 00 flour.
', 'Step 4: Sift in semolina flour and carefully fold into ricotta mixture until semolina flour is just incorporated and a soft dough forms.
', 'Step 5: Place dough on a lightly floured work surface and cut dough into 4 pieces.
', 'Step 6: Roll each section into a long rope about 3/4 inch in diameter.
', 'Step 7: Cut the rope into 1-inch long pieces with a butter knife.
', 'Step 8: Use your forefinger and press down into the middle of each gnudi to create a small dimple.
', 'Step 9: Set the gnudi on a lightly floured baking sheet.
', 'Step 10: Drop gnudi in batches into the simmering water and cook until they float to the surface, less than 1 minute.
', 'Step 11: Drain gnudi and transfer to bowls.
', 'Step 12: Meanwhile, heat marinara sauce in a saucepan until hot, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Top each portion generously with marinara sauce, Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, and basil ribbons.
']

Title: Delicious Meatballs
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 onion, minced', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 pound medium ground beef', '1 pound lean ground pork', '2 large eggs eggs, beaten', '1 cup bread crumbs', '1 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 cup milk', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Drizzle a large baking sheet with about 2 tablespoons olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Heat remaining olive oil in a small saute pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir onion in the hot oil until translucent, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add garlic and Italian seasoning; continue to saute until garlic is softened, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat and allow to cool enough to handle.
', 'Step 7: Combine beef, pork, bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, milk, onion mixture, salt, and pepper in a large bowl.
', 'Step 8: Mix together using your hands as quickly as possible as overmixing can produce a tough meatball.
', 'Step 9: Form 1 1/2-inch meatballs and place on the prepared sheet.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until browned and no longer pink in the centers, about 30 minutes, turning them over after 15 minutes.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Chicken Florentine Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds cubed boneless chicken breast', '2 teaspoons Cajun seasoning, or to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ medium onion, finely chopped', '1 (16 ounce) package whole grain penne pasta', '1 (10 ounce) bag baby spinach leaves', '2 cups water, or as needed', '1 pint heavy whipping cream', '2 ½ tablespoons basil pesto', '6 ounces grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place chicken in a bowl and sprinkle with Cajun seasoning.
', 'Step 2: Stir until coated.
', 'Step 3: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®), add olive oil, and select Saute function.
', 'Step 4: Add seasoned chicken to the hot oil and saute, stirring occasionally, for 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add onion and continue to saute until chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 5 minutes longer.
', 'Step 6: Stir to scrape up any bits from the bottom of the pot.
', 'Step 7: Pour dry pasta on top of chicken and add water just until pasta is barely covered.
', 'Step 8: Place spinach on top of pasta and cancel Saute function.
', 'Step 9: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 10: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 1 minute.
", 'Step 11: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 12: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 13: Unlock and remove the lid, and stir to combine ingredients.
', 'Step 14: Switch to Saute function.
', 'Step 15: Add whipping cream and then add basil pesto; stir to combine.
', 'Step 16: Stir in Parmesan cheese and close the lid.
', 'Step 17: Cook, covered, until cheese melts, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Remove lid, stir to combine, and serve.
']

Title: Green Minestrone
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 white onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, pressed', '1 ½ cups frozen cut green beans', '1 cup frozen peas', '2 large zucchini, chopped', '10 cups vegetable broth', '½ teaspoon minced fresh rosemary', '2 cups cooked great Northern beans', '¾ cup ditalini pasta', '½ cup minced fresh parsley', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a heavy-bottomed pot over medium-high heat; cook and stir onion and garlic until onion is translucent, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add green beans, peas, and zucchini; toss to coat vegetables with oil.
', 'Step 3: Slowly stream vegetable broth into vegetable mixture; bring to a simmer over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Stir in rosemary and great Northern beans and bring back to a simmer, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add ditalini pasta and simmer soup until pasta is tender but firm to the bite and soup has thickened, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat; stir in parsley.
', 'Step 7: Ladle soup into serving bowls and top each serving with 1 heaping tablespoon Parmesan cheese; season with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 8: Garnish soup with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil.
']

Title: Spicy Creamy Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large red onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 (14 ounce) cans diced tomatoes', '1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 red chile pepper, seeded and minced', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '⅔ cup mascarpone cheese']

Title: Frittata di Zucchine e Fiori di Zucca (Italian Zucchini Frittata)
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '1 small white onion, finely chopped', '1 bunch parsley, stems and leaves chopped separately', '3 zucchini, cut into long, thin strips', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '7 ½ cups zucchini blossoms, pistils removed', '6 eggs', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '4 leaves fresh mint, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onion and parsley stems; cook and stir until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add zucchini and salt; cook and stir until softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir zucchini blossoms into the skillet.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and cook for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Uncover skillet and cook until moisture evaporates, 2 to 3 minutes more.
', 'Step 7: Whisk parsley leaves, eggs, Parmesan cheese, Pecorino Romano cheese, and mint together in a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Fold in zucchini mixture from the skillet.
', 'Step 9: Mix well; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 10: Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over high heat.
', 'Step 11: Pour in egg mixture and spread evenly across the skillet.
', 'Step 12: Cook for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Prick surface in several places with a fork.
', 'Step 14: Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove from heat and cover; let stand until top is just set, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Invert frittata onto a large plate and slide back into the skillet.
', 'Step 17: Cook over low heat until second side is set, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 18: Remove from heat and let stand 5 to 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Italian Cookies with Icing
Ingredients: ['6 cups all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons baking powder', '1 cup unsalted butter, softened', '1 cup white sugar', '6 large eggs', '4 teaspoons almond extract', "1 ½ cups confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon almond extract, or to taste', '¼ cup milk', '2 tablespoons nonpareils, or to taste']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line cookie sheets with parchment paper.

Title: Tortellini with Sausage and Peppers
Ingredients: ['12 ounces sweet Italian sausage links', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 cup chopped onion', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '¼ cup tomato paste', '¼ cup dry red wine', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 green bell pepper, diced', '1 (16 ounce) package fresh tortellini']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine sausage links and water in a large skillet and bring to a boil, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Cover, reduce heat, and simmer until juices run clear, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain off water and cook links in the skillet, stirring frequently, until browned, 2 to 4 minutes more.
', 'Step 4: Remove from skillet, allow to cool, and cut into 1/2-inch diagonal slices.
', 'Step 5: Wipe skillet clean using a paper towel.
', 'Step 6: Place skillet over medium heat and add olive oil.
', 'Step 7: Add onion to hot oil and cook until tender but not brown, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 9: Stir in tomatoes, tomato paste, wine, oregano, and red pepper.
', 'Step 10: Add cooked sausage and bell pepper to the skillet.
', 'Step 11: Bring to a boil, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat and cover.
', 'Step 13: Simmer to desired thickness, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Meanwhile, bring 4 quarts of water to a boil in a saucepan, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Add tortellini, reduce heat slightly and boil until pasta is tender but still firm to the bite, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Drain and return pasta to the warm saucepan.
', 'Step 17: Stir parsley into the sausage mixture, pour over pasta, and serve immediately.
']

Title: Sweet and Sour Sicilian Tuna
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, cut into chunks', '4 tuna steaks', '1 cup red wine vinegar', '1 cup sugar']

['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a heavy-bottomed skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the onion; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat to medium-low, and continue to cook and stir until the onion is very tender and dark brown, 15 to 20 minutes more.
', 'Step 4: Remove the onion from the skillet.
', 'Step 5: Place the tuna steaks in the same skillet over medium-high heat and cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Remove the tuna steaks to a serving tray; keep warm.
', 'Step 7: Stir the vinegar and sugar together in the same skillet until sugar is dissolved.
', 'Step 8: Return the onions to the pan, and simmer until the liquid reduces and is slightly thickened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Return the tuna to the pan and cook for 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Place the tuna on the warm serving tray and top with the onion and sweet and sour mixture.
']

Title: Jen's Tomato Arugula Bruschetta
Ingredients: ['20 roma (plum) tomatoes', '¼ cup olive oil', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '8 cloves garlic, minced', '1 bunch arugula - rinsed, dried and chopped', '20 sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, drained and chopped', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring 4 quarts of water to boil in a large saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Place the roma tomatoes in the boiling water for about 1 minute to loosen the skins.
', 'Step 3: Drain, and rinse with cold water.
', 'Step 4: Peel, core, seed, and coarsely chop.

Title: Panelle (Sicilian Chickpea Fritters)
Ingredients: ['3 cups chickpea flour', 'salt to taste', '6 cups water', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 quart vegetable oil, or as needed']

['Step 1: Place chickpea flour and some salt in a large saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Pour in water, a little at a time, while whisking to prevent lumps.

', 'Step 7: Pour chickpea mixture onto a greased baking sheet.
', 'Step 8: Spread evenly to form a 1 1/2 inch thick layer.

', 'Step 10: Slice chickpea mixture into 1 1/2- x 2-inch rectangles.
', 'Step 11: Heat vegetable oil in a deep pot until 250 degrees F (120 degrees F).
', 'Step 12: Drop a few rectangles at a time into the hot oil and deep fry until crispy, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Drain on paper towels and serve hot.
']

Title: Italian Panzanella Bread Salad
Ingredients: ['8 ounces country style white bread, cut into 1 inch cubes', '3 tablespoons garlic flavored olive oil', '½ teaspoon coarse salt', '1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained', '2 cups red or yellow teardrop tomatoes, halved', '⅓ cup chopped green bell pepper', '⅓ cup chopped red bell pepper', '1 small red onion, cut into 3/4 inch slices', '10 kalamata olives, pitted and halved', '⅓ cup basil pesto', '¼ cup balsamic vinegar', '1 tablespoon minced fresh rosemary', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '4 ounces crumbled goat cheese', '1 head green or red leaf lettuce', '¼ cup toasted pine nuts']

', 'Step 2: Toss the bread cubes with the olive oil to evenly coat.

', 'Step 10: Line a serving platter with a few lettuce leaves.
', 'Step 11: Shred the remaining lettuce, and mound in the center of the platter.

']

Title: Italian Vegetable Soup with Beans, Spinach & Pesto
Ingredients: ['1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, cut into small dice', '3 medium carrots, peeled and sliced 1/4-inch thick', '3 medium celery stalks, sliced 1/4-inch thick', '1 medium bell pepper (red or yellow), stemmed, seeded and cut into medium dice', '1 pound all-purpose potatoes, unpeeled and cut into medium dice', '1 (16 ounce) can petite diced tomatoes', '2 (15.5 ounce) cans cannellini or other white beans, undrained', '6 cups low-sodium chicken broth in can or carton', '7 ounces loosely packed baby spinach', '1 cup frozen green peas', 'Salt and ground black pepper', "Prepared pesto (found in grocer's refrigerated section)"]

', 'Step 8: For lunch, pack soup in separate leakproof containers.

Title: Galliano

Title: Chocolate Semifreddo
Ingredients: ['¼ cup chocolate wafer cookie crumbs', '¼ cup toasted sliced almonds', '1 (4 ounce) bittersweet chocolate bar, chopped', '1 (4 ounce) bar semisweet chocolate, chopped', '3 large eggs', '⅓ cup white sugar', '¼ teaspoon salt', '2 cups heavy cream, divided', '¼ cup water', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon almond extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line the bottom and sides of a 9x5-inch loaf pan with plastic wrap, allowing 4 to 5 inches to extend over all sides.
', 'Step 2: Stir cookie crumbs and almonds together in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Set aside.
', 'Step 4: Place chopped bittersweet and semisweet chocolate in a large bowl and set a fine wire-mesh strainer over the bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 5: Whisk eggs, sugar, and salt together in a medium bowl until well combined.
', 'Step 6: Heat 1/2 cup cream and water in a small saucepan over medium heat until mixture begins to simmer, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Slowly whisk hot cream mixture into egg mixture until completely combined.
', 'Step 8: Return mixture to the saucepan and attach a candy thermometer to the pan.
', 'Step 9: Cook over medium-low heat, stirring constantly with a rubber spatula and scraping the bottom of the pan, until mixture is slightly thickened and registers 160 to 165 degrees F (70 to 74 degrees C), 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Do not let mixture simmer.
', 'Step 11: Immediately pour into the strainer over the chocolate.
', 'Step 12: Discard any solids left in the strainer.
', 'Step 13: Let chocolate mixture stand for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Whisk until chocolate is melted and smooth; whisk in vanilla and almond extracts.
', 'Step 15: Let stand until completely cool, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Beat remaining 1 1/2 cups cream with an electric stand mixer, using the whisk attachment, on medium-high speed until soft peaks form, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Whisk 1/3 of whipped cream into chocolate mixture until completely combined.
', 'Step 18: Gently fold remaining whipped cream into the chocolate mixture using a rubber spatula until incorporated and no streaks of whipped cream remain.
', 'Step 19: Spoon mixture into the prepared pan and smooth evenly with a small offset spatula.
', 'Step 20: Sprinkle evenly with cookie crumb mixture.
', 'Step 21: Pull excess plastic wrap at sides tightly over cake, gently pressing down on cookie crumb mixture.
', 'Step 22: Freeze, 12 to 24 hours.
', 'Step 23: Lift semifreddo from pan, using plastic wrap as handles, and transfer to a serving plate.
', 'Step 24: Let stand for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Cut semifreddo into 8 slices, using a serrated knife dipped in hot water and wiped dry after each slice.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '451.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '29.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '151.9 mg', 'fatContent': '35.2 g', 'fiberContent': '2.5 g', 'proteinContent': '6.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '20 g', 'sodiumContent': '142.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '23.3 g'}

Title: Garlicky Tortellini Soup With Sausage, Tomatoes, and Spinach
Ingredients: ['1 pound mild sausage, removed from casings', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '6 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 (32 ounce) carton chicken broth', '1 (14 ounce) can chicken broth', '1 pound frozen cheese tortellini', '1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (10 ounce) package fresh spinach, coarsely chopped', '10 leaves fresh basil, chopped', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or as needed']

', 'Step 3: Add garlic and cook 1 to 2 minutes more.
', 'Step 4: Pour all chicken broth into the pot and bring to a boil, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add tortellini and cook 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 6: Add tomatoes with juice and return to a boil.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low and simmer soup for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir spinach into soup; it will look like too much, but it will wilt quickly.
', 'Step 9: Add basil and red pepper flakes and simmer 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 10: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Pass Parmesan cheese at the table when you serve the soup.
']

Title: Feta and Slow-Roasted Tomato Salad with French Green Beans
Ingredients: ['12 cherry tomatoes', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 bay leaf, crumbled', '¼ cup pine nuts', '⅔ pound thin green beans, trimmed', '1 (5 ounce) package arugula leaves', '6 fresh basil leaves, torn into pieces', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons whole-grain mustard', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '½ teaspoon honey', '¼ cup olive oil', '6 ounces crumbled feta cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 225 degrees F (110 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Slice the cherry tomatoes in half, and arrange them, cut sides up, on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle them with salt, pepper, and the bay leaf; drizzle with 1/4 cup olive oil.
', 'Step 4: Bake the tomatoes until they are shriveled and dry on the outside, but a little moist inside, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 5: Toast the pine nuts in a small pan over medium-low heat, gently shaking the pan as they toast, until beginning brown and fragrant, 2 to 3 minutes; set aside.
', 'Step 6: Bring a saucepan of water to a boil; cook the green beans in the boiling water until bright green but still crisp, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain and rinse immediately with cold water.
', 'Step 8: Combine the roasted tomatoes, toasted pine nuts, green beans, arugula, and basil in a salad bowl.
', 'Step 9: Whisk together the red wine vinegar, mustard, garlic, honey, and 1/4 cup olive oil in a bowl, and pour the dressing over the salad.
', 'Step 10: Stir in the crumbled feta cheese just before serving.
']

Title: Italian-Seasoned Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients: ['12 medium mushrooms', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or more as needed', '¼ cup chopped red onion', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '¼ cup crushed saltine crackers', '2 tablespoons grated Asiago cheese', '1 tablespoon ricotta cheese', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']

Title: The Italian Irishman's Pie
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '2 tablespoons sausage drippings', '2 tablespoons margarine', '2 apples, cored and sliced', '1 large onion, sliced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', '1 cup water', '3 cups prepared mashed potatoes', '1 tablespoon melted margarine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 2-quart casserole dish.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir Italian sausage until browned and crumbly, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Use a slotted spoon to transfer sausage to prepared casserole dish.
', 'Step 5: Drain drippings and reserve 2 tablespoons drippings in the skillet.
', 'Step 6: Melt 2 tablespoons margarine in a separate skillet over medium heat; cook and stir apple and onion slices until tender, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Place apple and onion in casserole dish with sausage.
', 'Step 8: Lightly stir sausage, apple, and onion together; season with salt, black pepper, and oregano.
', 'Step 9: Brown flour in reserved drippings in skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 10: Whisk water into flour until thick gravy forms, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Pour gravy over sausage mixture in the casserole dish; spread mashed potatoes over the top with a spoon, creating peaks.
', 'Step 12: Lightly brush mashed potatoes with 1 tablespoon melted margarine.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until the potatoes are lightly browned and the sausage mixture is bubbling, about 30 minutes.
']

Title: Three-Cheese Baked Ziti with Italian Sausage
Ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded Italian cheese blend', '1 (16 ounce) package ziti pasta', '3 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '¼ teaspoon baking soda', '1 cup diced onion', '3 cloves garlic, diced', '5 cups lower-sodium pasta sauce', '⅓ cup sliced black olives', '1 tablespoon whole fennel seeds', '2 teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon anchovy paste', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray a 4-quart rectangular baking dish with nonstick spray.
', 'Step 3: Combine mozzarella and Italian blend cheeses in a bowl and place in the refrigerator.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Add ziti and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain.
', 'Step 7: At the same time, heat 3 tablespoons oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 8: Add sausage and break up into morsels.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle baking soda onto sausage, then add onion and garlic.
', 'Step 10: Cook and stir, continuing to break up any clumps as it cooks, until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Pour off and discard any grease.
', 'Step 12: Add pasta sauce, olives, fennel seeds, Italian seasoning, anchovy paste, black pepper, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 13: Add up to 3 tablespoons more oil if desired, and continue stirring until mixture comes to a boil.
', 'Step 14: Reduce heat and simmer, stirring regularly, until thickened, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove from the heat and stir in ziti.
', 'Step 16: Spread 1/2 of the sauced ziti into the prepared baking dish and sprinkle 1/2 of the shredded cheese mixture evenly on top.
', "Step 17: Spoon or ladle the rest of the ziti evenly on top without disturbing the layers underneath; it's okay to have some ziti partially exposed as they will brown handsomely and deliciously as they bake.
", 'Step 18: Sprinkle remaining shredded cheese mixture on top and sprinkle Parmesan across the surface.
', 'Step 19: Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until bubbly, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Remove from the oven and let rest for 15 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Hearty Italian Lentil Soup

', 'Step 14: Sprinkle with remaining Parmesan cheese to serve.

Title: Stracciatella II
Ingredients: ['1 (3 pound) whole chicken', '3 quarts water', '11 carrots', '6 stalks celery', '2 onions', '½ cup uncooked white rice', '6 ounces baby spinach, chopped', '½ cup grated Romano cheese', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '3 (14 ounce) cans chicken broth', '4 eggs, lightly beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut up chicken into large pieces and place in a large soup pot with the water.
', 'Step 2: Chop 8 carrots, 3 stalks of celery and 1 onion and place them in the pot as well.
', 'Step 3: Bring to a boil, then cover, reduce heat and simmer 45 minutes, until chicken is tender.
', 'Step 4: Remove chicken and reserve stock.
', 'Step 5: When cool enough to handle, bone chicken and cut meat into bite-size pieces.
', 'Step 6: Process reserved stock in a blender or food processor or using an immersion blender and return it to the pot with the chicken meat.
', 'Step 7: Chop the remaining 3 carrots, 3 stalks of celery and 1 onion and stir into the chicken mixture with the rice.
', 'Step 8: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove chicken mixture from heat and stir in spinach, Romano, salt, pepper, lemon juice and oregano.
', 'Step 10: Set aside.
', 'Step 11: In large saucepan, bring chicken broth to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Pour the eggs into the boiling broth, slowly, in a thin stream.
', 'Step 13: Remove the broth from the heat and stir it into the chicken mixture.
', 'Step 14: Serve hot.
']

Title: Northern Italian-Style Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['1 (4 pound) whole chicken, cut into 4 pieces', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (8 ounce) package mushrooms, chopped', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 stalk celery, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '½ cup dry white wine', '1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '½ cup chicken broth', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Rinse chicken pieces and pat dry.
', 'Step 2: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Add chicken and brown, 4 to 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: Remove chicken to a plate.
', 'Step 5: Add mushrooms, onion, and celery to the pan drippings and sauté until soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 2 more minutes.
', 'Step 7: Return chicken to the skillet.
', 'Step 8: Add white wine and cook until it has almost completely evaporated, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add diced tomatoes, chicken broth, parsley, oregano, pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 10: Cover and simmer until chicken is no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 30 minutes.
']

Title: Creamy Polenta with Roasted Corn and Fresh Sage
Ingredients: ['2 ears corn', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '½ yellow onion, diced', '3 cups water', '2 cups milk', '1 cup cornmeal', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh sage leaves', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Grill corn in the husks, or roast in the oven; cut kernels from cob.
', 'Step 2: In a heavy 4-quart saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Stir in garlic and onions; reduce heat to low and cook until onions are translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in water and milk and bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Slowly stir in cornmeal, whisking thoroughly.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring often to prevent sticking and burning.
', 'Step 7: Season with salt and pepper; simmer 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 8: When mixture is thick and the cornmeal is tender, stir in corn, sage and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 9: Transfer to a large bowl to serve.
']

Title: Enzo's Spaghetti all'Amatriciana
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '12 ounces guanciale (cured pork jowl), sliced and cut into 1/2-inch pieces', '1 cup diced onion', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '½ cup white wine', '1 (28 ounce) can whole Italian plum tomatoes (such as San Marzano)', '1 cup water, divided', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '2 (16 ounce) packages spaghetti', '1 cup freshly grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '2 tablespoons thinly sliced fresh basil leaves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add guanciale and cook, stirring frequently until slightly browned, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove guanciale to a plate.
', 'Step 4: Leave a bit of the rendered fat in the skillet and discard the rest.
', 'Step 5: Add onion to the skillet and cook and stir until softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add garlic and red pepper flakes; cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 7: Return guanciale to the skillet and cook for 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Pour in white wine and cook until wine has reduced slightly, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in canned tomatoes, breaking up whole tomatoes with a spoon.
', 'Step 10: Pour 1/3 cup water into the tomato can, swirl around to rinse the can, and pour into the skillet with remaining 2/3 cup water and tomato paste.
', 'Step 11: Bring sauce to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 1 hour.
', 'Step 13: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 14: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Ladle out about 1/2 cup of the pasta water, add to the sauce in the skillet, and mix well.
', 'Step 16: Drain spaghetti and stir into the sauce until well combined.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle generous amounts of Pecorino Romano cheese over each serving, and garnish with basil.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '671.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '75.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '43 mg', 'fatContent': '31.2 g', 'fiberContent': '4.7 g', 'proteinContent': '19.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '11.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '405.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.2 g'}

Title: Alfredo Chicken Lasagna
Ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '2 tablespoons seasoned salt (such as Mrs. Dash® Italian blend)', '2 tablespoons minced garlic, divided', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans chicken broth, or as needed', '9 lasagna noodles', '1 (16 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 egg', 'dried Italian seasoning, divided', '2 (16 ounce) jars Alfredo sauce, or more to taste', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small white onion, diced', '¼ cup chopped baby bella mushrooms', '1 (6 ounce) package fresh spinach', '1 roma tomato, seeded and chopped', '1 (16 ounce) package fresh mozzarella cheese, cubed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place chicken, seasoned salt, and 1 tablespoon garlic in a pot and pour enough broth over top to cover.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Cover, reduce heat to medium, and simmer until chicken is cooked through, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Transfer chicken to a bowl and shred when cool enough to handle.
', 'Step 6: Discard broth.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Rinse with cold water, drain, and lay out on aluminum foil to cool.
', 'Step 10: Mix ricotta cheese, egg, and 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning together in a large bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 11: Combine Alfredo sauce, Parmesan cheese, remaining 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning, and pepper in a pot over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 12: Cook, stirring frequently, until hot, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Meanwhile, heat oil in a skillet over medium heat; stir in onion and mushrooms.
', 'Step 14: Saute until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Add spinach and remaining 1 tablespoon garlic; cook until spinach is tender, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Remove from the heat and add spinach mixture to the ricotta mixture.
', 'Step 17: Add tomato and mix well.
', 'Step 18: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 19: Put enough sauce in a 9x13-inch casserole dish to cover the bottom.
', 'Step 20: Place 3 lasagna noodles on top of sauce, followed by all of the ricotta mixture, 3 more noodles, all of the shredded chicken, 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese, 3 remaining noodles, the remaining sauce, and the remaining mozzarella.
', 'Step 21: Cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 22: Bake in the preheated oven until hot and bubbly, about 45 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '388.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '17 g', 'cholesterolContent': '70.7 mg', 'fatContent': '27.6 g', 'fiberContent': '0.9 g', 'proteinContent': '19.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '11.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '1380.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.3 g'}

Title: Shrimp Primavera with Goat Cheese
Ingredients: ['½ (16 ounce) package whole wheat rotini pasta', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '3 green onions, slivered', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (8 ounce) jar quartered marinated artichoke hearts, drained', '1 (14.5 ounce) can no-salt-added whole tomatoes, undrained and chopped', '2 tablespoons capers', '¼ teaspoon chipotle chile powder', '1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined', '⅓ pound crumbled goat cheese']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook the rotini at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 2: Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir green onions and garlic until onions are tender, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add artichokes, tomatoes, capers, and chipotle chile powder; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Reduce heat to low and simmer.
', 'Step 5: Place shrimp into sauce; cook and stir until they are bright pink on the outside and the meat is no longer transparent in the center, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Divide pasta evenly into 4 bowls and top with shrimp and tomato sauce.
', 'Step 7: Scatter goat cheese over sauce.
']

Title: Italian Wheat Rolls
Ingredients: ['½ cup olive oil', '¼ cup white sugar', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 cups boiling water', '2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast', '⅓ cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '2 eggs', '2 cups whole wheat flour', '4 cups bread flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, combine olive oil, white sugar and salt.
', 'Step 2: Add boiling water and stir to dissolve sugar; let cool to lukewarm.
', 'Step 3: In a small bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water.
', 'Step 4: Let stand until creamy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: When sugar and water mixture has cooled, add yeast mixture, eggs, whole wheat flour and 2 cups bread flour.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the remaining flour, 1/2 cup at a time, beating well after each addition.
', 'Step 7: When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Divide the dough into twenty four equal size pieces and form into rounds.
', 'Step 9: Place the rounds on lightly greased baking sheets.
', 'Step 10: Cover the rolls with a damp cloth and let rise until doubled in volume, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Bake in preheated oven until golden brown, about 15 to 20 minutes.
']

Title: Mango Bruschetta
Ingredients: ['1 (1 pound) loaf French bread, cut into 1/2 inch pieces', '1 mango - peeled, seeded and diced', '1 tablespoon fresh basil, minced', '1 cup grated Romano cheese']

', 'Step 2: Arrange French bread slices in a single layer on a large baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Broil in the preheated oven 1 to 2 minutes per side, until lightly toasted.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 5: In a medium bowl, mix mango and fresh basil.
', 'Step 6: Top each bread slice with equal amounts of the mango and basil mixture.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle with Romano cheese, adjusting the amount to taste.
', 'Step 8: Return topped bread to broiler.
', 'Step 9: Broil 2 to 3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and lightly browned.
', 'Step 10: Serve hot.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Minestrone
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, diced', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 packet Italian dressing and seasoning mix', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '⅛ teaspoon celery seed', '3 tomatoes, diced', '3 carrots, chopped', '1 zucchini, chopped', '1 (32 fluid ounce) container vegetable broth', '1 cup uncooked elbow macaroni', '1 (15.5 ounce) can white beans, drained', '1 (15.25 ounce) can corn, undrained', '1 (5 ounce) package spinach, chopped', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Add olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Add onion and garlic to the hot oil and cook until translucent, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add Italian dressing mix, oregano, basil, and celery seed.
', 'Step 5: Saute until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add tomatoes, carrots, and zucchini to the pot and stir to coat.
', 'Step 7: Add broth, macaroni, beans, and corn.
', 'Step 8: Stir to be sure macaroni is covered by the broth.
', 'Step 9: Press cancel and select Soup setting; set timer for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Allow 10 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 11: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions for 5 minutes.
", "Step 12: Release remaining pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 13: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 14: Stir in chopped spinach.
', 'Step 15: Add Parmesan cheese to individual bowls to taste.
']

Title: Italian Holiday Pie

Title: Elise's Slow Cooker Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 cup dry red wine', '1 cup chicken stock', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 cubes chicken bouillon', '1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '2 tablespoons dried Italian seasoning', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed', '2 bell peppers, thinly sliced', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '1 cup sliced crimini mushrooms (baby bella)', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '1 cup sliced black olives', '3 tablespoons prepared pesto (Genovese)', '1 ½ teaspoons white sugar, or to taste']

', 'Step 4: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-low heat.

Title: Nutella® Gelato
Ingredients: ['2 cups whole milk', '¾ cup heavy cream', '½ cup white sugar', '1 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®), divided', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']

['Step 1: Combine milk, cream, and sugar in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until sugar dissolves, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add 1/2 cup of chocolate-hazelnut spread and vanilla and whisk until incorporated, and you no longer see any specks of chocolate.
', 'Step 3: Do not let mixture come to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat and let cool.
', 'Step 5: Refrigerate mixture until cold, about 3 hours.

', 'Step 8: Transfer gelato from the ice cream maker into a freezer-safe storage container.
', 'Step 9: Drizzle with melted spread.
', 'Step 10: Run a knife through to swirl the chocolate-hazelnut spread throughout the gelato.
', 'Step 11: Freeze until set, 4 hours to overnight.
']

Title: Semolina Cake

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour a 9x13-inch baking pan.
', 'Step 3: Sift together the flour, semolina flour, and baking powder.
', 'Step 4: Set aside.
', 'Step 5: Cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 6: Add the egg yolks one at a time, beating well after each addition, until incorporated.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the orange juice, orange zest, vanilla extract, and brandy.
', 'Step 8: Beat the egg whites in a clean, dry bowl until medium peaks form.
', 'Step 9: Fold 1/3 of the beaten egg whites into the butter-sugar-egg yolk mixture until combined.
', 'Step 10: Gently stir in 1/3 of the flour mixture.
', 'Step 11: Continue adding the remaining egg whites alternately with the flour, folding in until just combined.
', 'Step 12: Stir in the coarsely chopped and finely chopped almonds.
', 'Step 13: Pour batter into the prepared baking pan and sprinkle with sliced almonds.
', 'Step 14: Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Reduce the heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and bake until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Remove from oven and sprinkle with the tablespoon of brandy, if desired.
', 'Step 17: Allow to cool completely before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '482.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '26.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '216 mg', 'fatContent': '37.3 g', 'fiberContent': '2.7 g', 'proteinContent': '10.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '16.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '252.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '14.6 g'}

Title: Limoncello II
Ingredients: ['2 pounds lemons, zested', '35 fluid ounces vodka', '2 pounds white sugar', '35 fluid ounces water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine the lemon zest and vodka in a 2-gallon jar.
', 'Step 2: Cover, and let stand 3 to 4 days at room temperature.
', 'Step 3: Remove and discard the lemon zest.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the sugar and water until the sugar has dissolved.
', 'Step 5: Pour into bottles or other containers, and store in the freezer.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '176.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '30.1 g', 'fatContent': '0.1 g', 'fiberContent': '2.7 g', 'proteinContent': '0.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '1.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '27 g'}

Title: Italian Knot Cookies
Ingredients: ['1 cup white sugar', '½ cup unsalted butter, at room temperature', '½ cup margarine', '¼ cup milk', '1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon almond extract', '6 large eggs', '4 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', "1 cup confectioners' sugar", '1 tablespoon milk, or more as needed', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon colored sugar or festive sprinkles']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Cream sugar, butter, margarine, milk, vanilla extract, and almond extract together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating briefly after each addition.
', 'Step 5: Combine flour, baking powder, and salt; add 1 cup at a time to the creamed mixture until a dough forms, using your hands if and when necessary.
', 'Step 6: Turn out onto a floured board and knead briefly until smooth and a bit sticky, but not sticking to your hands.
', 'Step 7: Set aside to rest for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Pull off small pieces of dough, 1 at a time, and roll into a rope.
', 'Step 9: Gently place one end towards the middle, followed by the other end, in a way to slightly overlap each other.
', 'Step 10: Repeat to form remaining cookies and place on the prepared cookie sheets.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven in batches until just turning a light brown on the bottom, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Remove to a wire rack and allow to cool slightly.
', 'Step 13: Meanwhile mix confectioners sugar, milk, and lemon juice together in a small bowl to form a thin glaze.
', 'Step 14: Dip warm cookies in the glaze and sprinkle with sugar or sprinkles.
', 'Step 15: Let set on waxed paper or a cooling rack to dry.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '90.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '12.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '22.8 mg', 'fatContent': '3.6 g', 'fiberContent': '0.3 g', 'proteinContent': '1.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '53 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.4 g'}

Title: Baked Rigatoni for a Crowd
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 pounds mild Italian sausage links, casings removed', '2 (28 ounce) cans Italian-style crushed tomatoes, undrained', '2 cups water', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 ½ (16 ounce) packages rigatoni pasta', '1 pound mozzarella cheese, shredded', '1 ½ cups freshly shredded Parmesan cheese, divided', 'aluminum foil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onion and cook until soft, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add sausage; stir to break up lumps and cook until lightly browned and crumbly, 6 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 5: Add undrained tomatoes, water, basil, oregano, and parsley to the pan; bring to a boil over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low and cook, partially covered, for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 7: While the sauce is cooking, preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Cook rigatoni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain, rinse under cool water, and drain again.
', 'Step 11: Transfer to a large bowl and set aside.
', 'Step 12: Uncover the sauce and increase heat to medium.
', 'Step 13: Cook, stirring occasionally, until sauce thickens, 6 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove from the heat.
', 'Step 15: Add 2/3 of the sauce to the pasta; toss to combine.
', 'Step 16: Stir in mozzarella cheese and 1 cup Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 17: Transfer to a 9x13-inch baking dish, pour remaining sauce over top, and cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Uncover, sprinkle with remaining Parmesan, and bake until lightly browned, about 10 minutes longer.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '579.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '53.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '62.7 mg', 'fatContent': '26.1 g', 'fiberContent': '3.3 g', 'proteinContent': '31.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '11 g', 'sodiumContent': '1325.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.4 g'}

Title: Spaghetti Squash Chicken Parm
Ingredients: ['1 (3 pound) spaghetti squash, halved lengthwise and seeded', 'extra-virgin olive oil cooking spray', '2 large egg whites', '½ cup blanched almond flour', '2 tablespoons shredded Parmesan cheese', 'sea salt and ground black pepper to taste', '5 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breasts, pounded flat', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 (28 ounce) can fire-roasted diced tomatoes', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Spray spaghetti squash flesh with cooking spray, then place cut-sides down on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 4: Cover with foil.
', 'Step 5: Roast in the preheated oven until tender when pierced with a fork, 40 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 6: After the squash has been cooking for about 20 minutes, place egg whites in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 7: Combine almond flour, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper in a second bowl.
', 'Step 8: Dip each chicken breast in egg whites, then move to flour mixture and coat completely.
', 'Step 9: Heat olive oil in a large saute pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 10: Add chicken breasts and cook until they begin to brown slightly, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Flip and cook until golden brown on the other sides, 7 to 8 more minutes.
', 'Step 12: As the chicken is cooking, combine tomatoes, garlic, parsley, and Italian seasoning in a large saucepan over medium-low heat; cook until hot, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove squash from the oven and use a fork to shred the flesh directly into the sauce.
', 'Step 14: Mix until well coated and heated through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Spoon squash-sauce mixture onto 5 plates and top each with a chicken breast.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '382.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '28.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '82 mg', 'fatContent': '14.5 g', 'fiberContent': '3.1 g', 'proteinContent': '37.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '802.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.6 g'}

Title: Colorful Spinach and Prosciutto Side
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry', '4 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto, chopped', '1 (4 ounce) jar roasted red peppers, drained and chopped', '1 (6.5 ounce) jar artichoke hearts, drained and sliced', '1 tablespoon garlic powder']

', 'Step 2: Add the spinach, prosciutto, red peppers and artichoke hearts.
', 'Step 3: Season with garlic powder.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir for 15 minutes, until heated through.
']

Title: Margherita Mug Eggs
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter, or as needed', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons ricotta cheese', '¼ cup diced tomatoes', '2 leaves fresh basil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch dried oregano', '2 teaspoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Brush the inside of a microwave-safe mug with butter.
', 'Step 2: Crack eggs into mug and top with ricotta cheese, tomatoes, and basil; season with salt, pepper, and oregano.
', 'Step 3: Cook in the microwave for 1 minute; stir and continue cooking in 15-second intervals, until set, about 1 minute more.
', 'Step 4: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over eggs.
']

Title: Grandma's Easter Bread
Ingredients: ['5 cups bread flour, or more as needed', '1 cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '⅔ cup grated Romano cheese', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 cup warm water', '2 tablespoons active dry yeast', '1 medium Oranges, raw, California, valencias', '½ cup unsalted butter, melted and cooled slightly', '3 large eggs, beaten slightly', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine 5 cups flour, 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons sugar, Romano cheese, cinnamon, and salt in a large bowl; stir well and set aside.
', 'Step 2: Stir warm water and yeast together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 3: Set aside until dissolved and bubbly, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Zest and juice orange into a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Stir in melted butter, eggs, and vanilla extract until well combined.
', 'Step 6: Stir in yeast mixture.
', 'Step 7: Add flour mixture gradually, stirring as you go.
', 'Step 8: Turn dough onto a lightly floured surface and knead for 8 to 10 minutes, adding up to 1 extra cup of flour as needed to keep dough manageable.
', 'Step 9: Transfer to an oiled bowl, cover, and let rise until almost doubled in size, about 30 to 60 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Punch dough down, cover and let rise again until almost doubled in size, 30 to 60 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Grease two 8-inch round loaf pans.
', 'Step 13: Cut dough into 2 equal pieces and shape into loaves.
', 'Step 14: Place in the prepared pans, cover, and let rise again until almost doubled in size, 30 to 60 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 70 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Remove from the oven and let cook on a wire rack.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '284.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '43.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '55.3 mg', 'fatContent': '8.7 g', 'fiberContent': '1.6 g', 'proteinContent': '8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '293.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '14.4 g'}

Title: Italian Pan-Fried Potatoes
Ingredients: ['4 russet potatoes, scrubbed', '3 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or as needed', '2 teaspoons salted butter, or to taste', '1 medium onion, sliced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup pitted Kalamata olives, halved', '1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Stab the potatoes with a fork and microwave until cooked, about 9 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Let cool, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Slice into wedges.
', 'Step 5: Heat 1 tablespoon oil and butter in a small pan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 6: Saute onion and garlic with salt and pepper until tender and sweet, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 8: Heat enough remaining oil to coat the bottom of a large nonstick pan over medium-high heat.
', "Step 9: Cook potatoes in batches, making sure they aren't crowded in the pan.
", 'Step 10: Turn carefully until golden and crispy, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Keep the first batch in the preheated oven until the second batch is done.
', 'Step 12: Add olives to the second batch and cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 13: Add potatoes from the oven and onion-garlic mixture.
', 'Step 14: Toss in the pan until everything is heated.
', 'Step 15: Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with parsley, salt, and pepper.
']

Title: My Italian Grandfather's Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste', '8 (8 ounce) chicken leg quarters with skin', '1 large bell pepper, finely chopped', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 stalk celery with leaves, finely chopped', '1 medium carrot, finely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed San Marzano tomatoes', '1 cup red wine', '1 tablespoon ground allspice', '1 large bay leaf', '⅛ teaspoon seasoning sauce (such as Maggi®)', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Heat olive oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat until shimmering.
', 'Step 3: Add chicken and cook until well browned, 3 to 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: Remove to a plate.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat to medium and add bell pepper, onion, celery, carrot, and garlic.
', 'Step 6: Sauté until translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add tomato paste and stir to blend into the vegetables.
', 'Step 8: Add crushed tomatoes, wine, allspice, bay leaf, seasoning sauce, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Return chicken to the pan and toss to coat all pieces.
', 'Step 10: Cover the Dutch oven and place in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 11: Braise until chicken is falling off the bone and the juices run clear, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
', 'Step 12: An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Low-Fat Chocolate Sicilian Gelato
Ingredients: ['1 ¾ cups skim milk, divided', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '⅓ cup white sugar', '⅓ cup high-quality unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons instant espresso powder', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk 1/4 cup milk and cornstarch together in a small bowl until smooth to make a slurry.
', 'Step 2: Combine the remaining milk, sugar, and cocoa powder in a small saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Bring to a boil while stirring constantly.
', 'Step 4: Add espresso powder and the cornstarch slurry.
', 'Step 5: Bring back to a boil; stir gelato mixture until thickened like pudding, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat; transfer to a metal bowl.
', 'Step 7: Stir in vanilla extract and salt.
', 'Step 8: Fill a large bowl with ice water; set the bowl of gelato mixture inside.
', 'Step 9: Stir frequently until cooled, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove metal bowl from ice bath; cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 11: Refrigerate until completely chilled, about 20 minutes.
', "Step 12: Transfer gelato mixture into an ice cream maker; freeze according to manufacturer's instructions, about 20 minutes.
", 'Step 13: Pour gelato into a freezer-safe container; cover and freeze until solid, about 10 minutes.
']

Title: Roasted Italian Herb Chicken
Ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '2 cups Italian-style salad dressing', '1 cup Italian-style dried bread crumbs']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place chicken breasts in a 9x13 inch baking dish.

', 'Step 5: Roll each chicken piece in stuffing crumbs.

Title: Pasta Ai Fiori Di Zucca (Pasta With Zucchini Blossoms)
Ingredients: ['½ teaspoon salt', '1 (8 ounce) package penne pasta', '15 fresh zucchini blossoms', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 bunch fresh parsley, chopped', '1 teaspoon saffron threads', '2 tablespoons fine cornmeal', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with water, stir in 1/2 teaspoon salt, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Stir in penne and return to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but still firm to the bite, about 11 minutes; drain, reserving 1/2 cup of pasta-cooking water.
', 'Step 4: Clean and rinse zucchini blossoms, removing the inner parts (stigma or anthers); coarsely chop the flowers.
', 'Step 5: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat; cook and stir garlic in the hot oil until it begins to brown, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir parsley, saffron, and reserved 1/2 cup of pasta-cooking water into skillet; stir to combine.
', 'Step 7: Add zucchini blossoms and simmer until tender, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle cornmeal into mixture and stir constantly until thickened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Gently fold penne pasta into zucchini blossom mixture and top with Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper.
']

Title: Souper Skillet Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 pound lean ground beef', '1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, undrained and chopped', '2 cups water', '2 cups macaroni', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a skillet over medium heat, brown the ground beef until no pink shows; drain.
', 'Step 2: Stir in onion soup mix, oregano, tomatoes and water.
', 'Step 3: Bring to boil; stir in macaroni.
', 'Step 4: Simmer covered, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes or until macaroni is tender.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle in Parmesan cheese and top with Mozzarella cheese.
']

Title: Crystal's Chicken Saltimbocca
Ingredients: ['8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded thin', '3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained well', '8 slices thinly sliced prosciutto', '8 slices provolone cheese', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 ½ cups dry white wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Brush each chicken cutlet with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 2: Squeeze excess water out of the frozen spinach, then season with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Place 1 piece of prosciutto, 1 piece of provolone, and a thin layer of spinach on each chicken cutlet.
', 'Step 4: Then sprinkle Parmesan over the tops.
', 'Step 5: Beginning at the short, tapered end, roll up each chicken cutlet, and secure with a toothpick.
', 'Step 6: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Place chicken in the skillet, then pour in wine.
', 'Step 8: Cook, turning the chicken, until the wine evaporates, and the chicken is cooked through and its juices run clear, about 20 minutes.
']

Title: Healthier Alfredo Sauce with Shrimp and Broccoli
Ingredients: ['1 slice bacon, diced', '3 cups broccoli florets, cut into 1/2-inch pieces', '¼ lemon, juiced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 cup 2% milk', '4 tablespoons low-fat whipped cream cheese', '2 cups chicken broth', '1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese, divided', '½ cup shredded Italian cheese blend', '1 (7 ounce) container plain 2% Greek yogurt', '¾ pound raw medium shrimp - peeled, tails off, and deveined', '1 teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '6 sprigs fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place bacon in a large frying pan and cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until mostly but not fully cooked, about 6 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to medium, add broccoli, and saute until bright green and crisp-tender, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour broccoli and bacon into a bowl lined with a paper towel to absorb excess oil; discard paper towel and toss broccoli mixture with lemon juice.
', 'Step 4: Heat olive oil and butter in a deep saucepan over medium heat until bubbling.
', 'Step 5: Whisk in flour to create a roux; continue whisking until mixture turns golden brown, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Slowly whisk in milk until smooth.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low, add cream cheese, and whisk until no lumps remain.
', 'Step 8: Stir in chicken broth, increase heat to medium, and simmer until thick, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese and Italian cheese; stir until incorporated.
', 'Step 10: Stir in Greek yogurt.
', 'Step 11: Add shrimp and cook until bright pink on the outside and the meat is opaque, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Add garlic powder, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 13: Remove from heat and stir in broccoli-bacon mixture.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle with remaining Parmesan and garnish with parsley.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '328.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '13 g', 'cholesterolContent': '129.2 mg', 'fatContent': '20.5 g', 'fiberContent': '2.3 g', 'proteinContent': '23.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '953.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.1 g'}

Title: Pasta with Broccoli Rabe (Cima di Rapa)
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon salt', '1 (12 ounce) box gluten-free tortiglioni pasta', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '3 anchovies', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 pounds broccoli rabe, stemmed and cut into large pieces', '1 ½ cups toasted plain gluten-free bread crumbs, divided', '1 cup grated Pecorino Siciliano cheese, divided', '1 tablespoon red pepper flakes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook tortiglioni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large saute pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Add anchovies and garlic.
', 'Step 5: Saute until slightly brown, 3 to 4 minutes, but do not overcook garlic, as this will make the dish bitter.
', 'Step 6: Add broccoli rabe and stir to coat.
', 'Step 7: Alternately add 1/2 of the bread crumbs and 1/2 of the Pecorino Siciliano cheese, stirring constantly, adding 1/2 tablespoon oil while mixing.
', 'Step 8: Drain pasta and fold into the mixture, taking care not to break the pasta.
', 'Step 9: Fold in remaining cheese and bread crumbs gently.
', 'Step 10: Top with remaining oil.
', 'Step 11: Transfer to serving plates and sprinkle with red pepper.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '696.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '101.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '34.4 mg', 'fatContent': '21.7 g', 'fiberContent': '9.4 g', 'proteinContent': '25.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '1144 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.8 g'}

Title: Pasta with the Works
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package corkscrew-shaped pasta, cooked and drained', '1 (4 pound 4 ounce) jar Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce', '1 cup thinly sliced pepperoni, cut in halves', '2 medium green peppers, chopped', '1 cup large pitted ripe olives, cut in halves', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup Grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:

Title: Instant Pot® Shrimp Scampi Risotto
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons salted butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 shallot, minced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup Arborio rice', '1 ½ cups chicken broth', '½ pound frozen raw shrimp - peeled, deveined, and tail off', '¼ cup Pinot Grigio wine', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 tablespoon freshly squeezed lemon juice, or to taste', '1 teaspoon minced fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function to heat the pot.

', 'Step 4: Add Arborio rice; cook and stir for 2 minutes.

', 'Step 6: Cancel Saute function.
', 'Step 7: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 8: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 12 minutes.
", 'Step 9: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', 'Step 10: Allow pressure to naturally release for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Release remaining pressure carefully using the quick-release method, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 13: Add frozen shrimp and white wine.
', 'Step 14: Do not stir.
', 'Step 15: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 16: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 3 minutes.
", 'Step 17: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', 'Step 18: Release pressure using the quick-release method, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 20: Stir in Parmesan cheese and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 21: Garnish risotto with a squeeze of lemon juice and parsley.
']

Title: Torta Caprese con le Noci (Italian Chocolate Cake)
Ingredients: ['3 eggs, separated', '1 (4 ounce) bar dark chocolate, chopped', '½ cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '½ cup butter', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 cup ground walnuts', '⅓ cup all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour a 9-inch round cake pan.
', 'Step 3: Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 4: Beat egg yolks lightly in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 5: Heat chocolate in top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently and scraping down the sides, until melted, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 7: Combine 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons sugar and 1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon butter in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy.
', 'Step 8: Stir in egg yolks, melted chocolate, walnuts, flour, and baking powder until smooth.
', 'Step 9: Fold egg whites gently into the batter.
', 'Step 10: Pour batter into the prepared cake pan.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Let cool completely before serving.
']

Title: Shortcut Chicken Manicotti
Ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed', '1 egg, beaten', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '½ cup drained, creamed cottage cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '10 manicotti shells', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup', '1 (8 ounce) container sour cream', '1 cup milk', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 cup boiling water', '1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a medium skillet over medium heat, cook chicken until opaque and juices run clear.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl, combine cooked chicken, egg, spinach, cottage cheese and Parmesan.
', 'Step 4: Stuff uncooked manicotti shells with chicken mixture.
', 'Step 5: Arrange shells, not touching one another, in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 6: In a medium bowl, combine soup, sour cream, milk and Italian seasoning and stir until smooth.
', 'Step 7: Pour over shells in dish and spread to cover completely.
', 'Step 8: Carefully pour boiling water around the edge of the dish.
', 'Step 9: Cover tightly with foil.
', 'Step 10: Bake in preheated oven 60 minutes, or until pasta is tender.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle with Cheddar and parsley and let stand 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Shrimp, Leek and Spinach Risotto
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '2 cups Arborio rice', '4 cups boiling vegetable broth', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', '1 medium leek, chopped', '1 fresh red chile pepper, chopped', '1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined', '½ pound small scallops', '1 (14 ounce) bag fresh spinach leaves', '½ red bell pepper, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon fresh ground pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large, heavy bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Pour in the rice, and stir until the rice is coated in oil and has started to toast, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Reduce the heat to medium and stir in one-third of the boiling vegetable broth; continue stirring until incorporated.
', 'Step 4: Repeat this process twice more, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 5: Incorporating the broth should take 15 to 20 minutes in all.
', 'Step 6: While you are cooking the rice, heat the remaining tablespoon of oil in a pan.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the garlic, leeks, red chili, shrimp, and scallops.
', 'Step 8: Cook until the seafood is just beginning to turn color.
', 'Step 9: Add the red bell pepper and spinach; cook until the seafood is opaque.
', 'Step 10: Combine with the rice, and season to taste with pepper.
']

Title: Risotto ai Frutti di Mare
Ingredients: ['1 pound mussels, cleaned and debearded', '1 pound fresh clams, cleaned', '1 pound shell-on medium shrimp', '2 quarts water', '1 large tomato, quartered', '1 onion, quartered', '1 carrot, sliced', '1 stalk celery, sliced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '5 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 (16 ounce) package Arborio rice', '2 cups white wine, divided', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 bunch fresh parsley, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak mussels, clams, and shrimp in separate bowls of salted cold water for 1 hour.
', 'Step 2: Drain.
', 'Step 3: Clean and devein shrimp, reserving heads and shells.
', 'Step 4: Combine shrimp heads and shells, 2 quarts water, tomato, quartered onion, carrot, and celery in a large pot; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until flavors combine, 40 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Strain stock through a fine-mesh sieve, discarding solids.
', 'Step 8: Keep warm over low heat.
', 'Step 9: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 10: Add chopped onion; cook and stir until softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Stir in rice until translucent and coated with oil, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Increase heat to medium-high; pour in 1 cup white wine.
', 'Step 13: Simmer until alcohol has evaporated, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Reduce heat to medium and stir in 1 ladle of stock until rice has absorbed the liquid.
', 'Step 15: Repeat with remaining stock, stirring after each addition, until rice is creamy and almost tender, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 17: Add 1 clove garlic and cook until golden, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Add mussels and 1/2 cup white wine; cover and cook until mussels open, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Remove from heat; discard garlic and any mussels that did not open.
', 'Step 20: Remove shells and keep mussels warm.
', 'Step 21: Strain cooking liquid through a fine-mesh sieve into a bowl.
', 'Step 22: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in the same saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 23: Add 1 clove garlic and cook until golden, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Add clams and 1/2 cup white wine; cover and cook until opened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Remove from heat; discard garlic and any clams that did not open.
', 'Step 26: Remove shells and keep clams warm.
', 'Step 27: Strain cooking liquid through a fine-mesh sieve into a bowl.
', 'Step 28: Heat remaining olive oil in the same saucepan.
', 'Step 29: Add 1 clove garlic and shrimp; cook and stir until shrimp turn pink, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 30: Remove from heat and discard garlic.
', 'Step 31: Pour some of the mussel and clam cooking water over the rice; cook for 3 to 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 32: Remove rice from heat.
', 'Step 33: Fold in mussels, clams, and shrimp.
', 'Step 34: Sprinkle parsley on top.
', 'Step 35: Let stand before serving, about 5 minutes.
']

Title: KK's Italian Meatball Soup
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed', '1 cup chopped onion', '2 carrots, chopped', '1 stalk celery, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '5 ¼ cups chicken broth', '2 ½ cups water', '2 (14 ounce) cans white beans, drained and rinsed', '20 frozen cooked small meatballs', '1 (5 ounce) bag baby spinach, coarsely chopped', '½ cup finely grated Asiago cheese', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a large pot over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Saute onion, carrots, celery, and garlic until onion is pale golden, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour broth and water into pot; cover the pot and bring mixture to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Stir beans and meatballs into broth mixture; bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, cover the pot, and simmer, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender and meatballs are heated through, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Mix spinach, Asiago cheese, salt, and pepper into soup; simmer until spinach wilts, about 1 minute.
']

Title: Asparagus and Tomato Panzanella
Ingredients: ['3 cups cubed crusty bread', '¼ cup olive oil, as needed', '3 cloves garlic, minced', 'kosher salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 pound fresh asparagus, trimmed', '1 English cucumber - peeled, seeded, and sliced', '10 cherry tomatoes, halved', '2 small yellow tomatoes, cut into wedges', '1 red onion, cut into wedges', '¾ cup pitted kalamata olives', '¼ cup capers, drained', '¾ cup fresh mozzarella balls (bocconcini)', '¼ cup red wine vinegar', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Toss bread, 1/4 cup olive oil, and garlic in a bowl until coated.
', 'Step 3: Season with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 4: Transfer mixture to a baking sheet.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven until toasted, about 15 minutes, stirring and flipping bread cubes about halfway through.
', 'Step 6: Allow bread to cool.
', 'Step 7: Fill a large bowl with iced water; set aside.
', 'Step 8: Bring a pot of salted water to a boil; cook asparagus in boiling water until bright green and just tender, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Transfer asparagus to iced water to cool.
', 'Step 10: Drain and dry on a clean towel.
', 'Step 11: Cut asparagus into thirds.
', 'Step 12: Mix asparagus, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, yellow tomatoes, red onion, olives, capers, mozzarella balls, and bread cubes in a large bowl.
', 'Step 13: Whisk red wine vinegar and 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil in a small bowl; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 14: Pour vinegar dressing over bread mixture; toss to combine.
', 'Step 15: Allow bread salad to rest for 20 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Neapolitan Struffoli
Ingredients: ['5 cups gluten-free all-purpose flour (such as King Arthur®)', '1 lemon, zested', '½ orange, zested', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '⅓ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '6 jumbo eggs', '½ cup cane sugar', '2 quarts vegetable oil for frying, or as needed', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '2 cups honey', '¼ cup multi-colored sprinkles, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine flour, lemon zest, orange zest, baking powder, and salt together in a food processor; pulse to combine.
', 'Step 2: Mix eggs and sugar together in a separate bowl; add 1/3 cup olive oil and vanilla extract and beat again.
', 'Step 3: Mix together with flour mixture using hands to knead.
', 'Step 4: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 5: Heat frying oil in a deep saucepan over medium heat until the temperature reaches 375 degrees F (190 degrees C), about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Transfer dough to a floured work surface; continue to knead sticky dough with floured hands.
', 'Step 7: Flatten dough into a thin loaf about 10 inches long.
', 'Step 8: Cut long ropes from the loaf, then slice ropes into 1/2-inch pieces and transfer to the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Fry dough pieces in batches in the hot oil until golden brown, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Transfer to a plate lined with paper towels.
', 'Step 11: Heat honey in a saucepan until warm and fluid, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 12: Pour hot honey over struffoli and toss to coat.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle with multi-colored sprinkles.
']

Ingredients: ['5 large Yukon Gold potatoes', '1 large cucumber, chopped', '5 stalks celery, chopped', '1 large red onion, chopped', '¾ cup green olives with pimento, chopped', '¼ cup olive oil', '½ cup red wine vinegar', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
