Title: Quiche au Chou Romanesco (Romanesco and Mushroom Quiche)
Ingredients: ['1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed', '1 cup Romanesco cauliflower florets', '1 ½ tablespoons butter', '1 ½ cups sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 tablespoon fresh oregano leaves', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons water', '3 eggs', '½ cup milk', '2 tablespoons milk', '½ cup heavy whipping cream', '2 tablespoons heavy whipping cream', '¾ cup shredded Swiss cheese', '1 tablespoon shredded Swiss cheese']

Title: Tiramisu I
Ingredients: ['6 eggs, separated', '3 tablespoons white sugar', '1 pound mascarpone cheese', '2 tablespoons brandy', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 ½ cups strong brewed coffee, room temperature', '30 ladyfinger cookies', '8 ounces finely chopped bittersweet chocolate']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large mixing bowl, beat egg yolks and sugar with electric mixer until light yellow, 1 minute.
', 'Step 2: Beat in mascarpone, brandy, and vanilla until smooth.
', 'Step 3: In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff, but not dry.
', 'Step 4: Fold egg whites into mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 5: Quickly dip ladyfingers, one at a time, in cooled coffee and arrange them in a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 6: Use 15 cookies to cover the bottom of the dish.
', 'Step 7: Spread half the mascarpone mixture over the cookie crust and sprinkle the chocolate on top.
', 'Step 8: Repeat the soaked cookie and cheese layers.

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).

Title: Eggs Poached in Tomato Sauce

Title: Italian Fig Cookies (Cuccidati)
Ingredients: ['2 cups dried figs, stems removed, cut in quarters', '1 cup dried dates, halved and pitted', '1 medium orange', '1 cup raisins', '1 cup toasted pecans', '¼ cup honey', '2 tablespoons brandy', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon ground allspice', '⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 tablespoon water, or more as needed', '3 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '½ cup white sugar', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ cup cold unsalted butter', '¼ cup shortening', '½ cup milk', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon almond extract', '2 cups powdered sugar', '¼ cup milk', 'red and green food coloring as needed', 'candy coated sprinkles as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Prepare filling: Working in two batches with ½ of the figs and ½ of the dates at a time, pulse dried fruit in a food processor until finely chopped; transfer to a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Use a vegetable peeler to peel orange zest into the empty food processer.
', 'Step 3: Juice the orange until you have 3 tablespoons juice; add it to the food processor.
', 'Step 4: Add raisins, pecans, honey, brandy, cinnamon, cloves, allspice, and nutmeg and process until finely mixed.
', 'Step 5: Add fig-date mixture and process until well combined, adding water 1 tablespoon at a time as needed to reach a thick consistency.
', 'Step 6: Refrigerate filling for 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 7: Prepare dough: Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a food processor and process for 5 seconds to combine.
', 'Step 8: Add butter and shortening and pulse until crumbly.
', 'Step 9: Add milk, egg, vanilla, and almond extract and process until a dough forms.
', 'Step 10: Turn dough onto a well-floured surface and knead until smooth.
', 'Step 11: Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours.
', 'Step 12: When ready to bake, preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Turn dough onto a floured surface and cut into 4 pieces.
', 'Step 14: Roll one piece into a 4x12-inch rectangle, about 1/8-inch thick.
', 'Step 15: Trim off any excess to form straight edges and save to make more cookies.
', 'Step 16: Place about ¼ of the filling in a 1-inch log shape down the rectangle, just to the right of the center line.
', 'Step 17: Dampen the edges of the dough with water and fold the right edge over the filling.
', 'Step 18: Continue rolling the dough toward the left edge, then rock back and forth gently to stretch and seal the edges.
', 'Step 19: Cut the log into 2- to 3-inch pieces.
', 'Step 20: Make 2 or 3 slits in the top of each cookie to allow steam to escape.
', 'Step 21: Transfer to a parchment-lined baking sheet.
', 'Step 22: Bake in the preheated oven until golden on the bottom and cooked through, 12 to 14 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Remove from the oven and let cool completely.
', 'Step 24: Repeat to form, cut, and bake remaining cookies.
', 'Step 25: Prepare icing by whisking powdered sugar and milk together in a bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 26: Divide icing into thirds in 3 small bowls.
', 'Step 27: Color one bowl with red food coloring to make pink icing, color another bowl with green food coloring to make green icing, and leave the remaining icing white.
', 'Step 28: Dip each cookie into a different color icing and allow excess to drip off.
', 'Step 29: Place iced cookies on parchment paper and decorate lightly with sprinkles.
', 'Step 30: Allow to dry for at least 20 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '159.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '27.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '9.3 mg', 'fatContent': '5.2 g', 'fiberContent': '2 g', 'proteinContent': '2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '65.9 mg'}

Title: Vegan Baked Polenta with Radicchio
Ingredients: ['3 teaspoons olive oil, divided', '1 ½ cups vegetable broth', '1 ½ cups water, divided', '¾ cup unsweetened oat milk', "1 ½ cups medium grind, whole-grain cornmeal (such as Bob's Red Mill®)", '½ cup sliced yellow onion', '½ cup shredded carrot', '1 medium head radicchio, cored and thinly sliced', '½ teaspoon coarse ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '3 (1 ounce) slices vegan smoked Gouda', '3 ½ ounces vegan shredded mozzarella']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 355 degrees F (180 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease an 8x8-inch baking pan with 1 teaspoon olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Combine vegetable broth and 1 cup water in a large pot and bring to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 4: Reduce heat to medium and keep at a low boil.
', 'Step 5: Pour in unsweetened oat milk and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle in cornmeal, whisking constantly to avoid clumps from forming.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to medium-low and continue stirring until polenta begins to thicken.
', 'Step 8: Add more water if needed.
', 'Step 9: Stir until polenta has softened and thickened, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Meanwhile, heat remaining 2 teaspoons olive oil in a skillet.
', 'Step 11: Add onion and carrot.
', 'Step 12: Saute until vegetables have just begun to soften.
', 'Step 13: Add radicchio and saute until wilted.
', 'Step 14: Season with pepper and turmeric.
', 'Step 15: Cook until vegetables are tender and cooked throughout, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Spread out 1/2 of the polenta in the greased baking dish.
', 'Step 17: Evenly layer 1/2 of the vegan Gouda and 1/2 of the vegan mozzarella on top.
', 'Step 18: Top with 1/2 of the radicchio mixture.
', 'Step 19: Repeat layers with remaining polenta, cheeses, and radicchio mixture.
', 'Step 20: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese has melted and is bubbling, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Allow to rest for 5 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Creamy Pasta Casserole

Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 medium (2-1/2" dia)s onions, peeled and chopped', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '2 teaspoons dried thyme leaves', '1 pound lean ground beef', '½ pound lean ground pork, veal or crumbled sausage', '4 cups Heinz® Tomato Juice', '1 (455 ml) bottle Heinz® Chili Sauce, Chunky with Sweet Peppers', '1 (156 ml) can Heinz Tomato Paste', '1 tablespoon Heinz Worcestershire Sauce', '12 noodles oven-ready lasagna noodles', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']

Title: Miles of Mozzarella Baked Mostaccioli
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil, divided', '½ cup finely chopped onion, divided', '3 cloves garlic, minced, divided', '2 cups beef broth', '2 (15 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons dried parsley', '½ teaspoon thyme', '½ teaspoon dried savory', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '¼ teaspoon ground marjoram', '1 pound ground beef', '½ cup diced green bell pepper', '2 cups water', '1 (16 ounce) package mostaccioli pasta', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir 1/4 cup onion and 2 garlic cloves in the hot oil until onion is slightly transparent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Increase heat to medium-high; add beef broth, tomato sauce, oregano, basil, sugar, parsley, thyme, savory, red pepper flakes, and marjoram.
', 'Step 3: Simmer mixture, stirring occasionally, until flavors have blended, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat; cook and stir 1/4 cup onion and 1 garlic clove in the hot oil until onion is tender and slightly transparent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir ground beef into onion mixture until browned and crumbly, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain excess grease.
', 'Step 7: Stir ground beef mixture and green bell pepper into tomato sauce mixture; simmer for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Pour meat sauce, water, mostaccioli, and shredded mozzarella cheese into a 3-quart glass baking dish; stir well.
', 'Step 10: Cover dish with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Remove aluminum foil and lay mozzarella cheese slices over mostaccioli mixture.
', 'Step 13: Bake until cheese is melted and bubbling, about 10 minutes.
']

Title: Italian Christmas Bread with Eggnog Glaze
Ingredients: ['½ cup hazelnuts', '1 cup eggnog, plus', '1 tablespoon eggnog', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '½ teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons butter, softened', '1 egg', '1 egg yolk', '3 cups bread flour', '1 ½ teaspoons instant yeast', '2 tablespoons anise seed', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', "½ cup confectioners' sugar", '1 tablespoon eggnog']

['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spread hazelnuts evenly on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Bake until lightly toasted, about 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove the pan from the oven, transfer the nuts to a bowl, and let them cool.
', 'Step 5: Place the eggnog, sugar, salt, butter, egg, egg yolk, bread flour, yeast, anise seed, and cinnamon into the bread machine.
', 'Step 6: Program the machine for a basic cycle with the crust as "medium".
', 'Step 7: Press start.
', 'Step 8: Do not use the delay timer.
', 'Step 9: Place the cooled toasted hazelnuts into the machine between Knead Cycle 1 and Knead Cycle 2.
', 'Step 10: When the baking cycle ends, immediately remove the bread from the pan and allow it to cool on a rack.
', "Step 11: Prepare the glaze by combining the confectioners' sugar and eggnog in a bowl; mix well.
", 'Step 12: It should be a drizzling consistency.

']

Title: Bacon, Tomato, and Avocado Flatbread
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '2 flour tortillas', '1 cup grated Cheddar cheese', '1 small tomato, seeded and diced', '½ cup onion, diced', '3 slices cooked bacon, crumbled, or more to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and sliced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro', '1 teaspoon ranch dressing, or to taste', '1 teaspoon buffalo ranch dressing, or to taste']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray a large cast iron skillet with cooking spray.

', 'Step 4: Add 1 flour tortilla and cook until bottom is browned and hardened, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 5: Top tortilla with 1/2 of the Cheddar cheese, 1/2 of the tomato, 1/2 of the onion, and 1/2 of the bacon; season with salt and pepper.

Title: Sicilian Lemon Chicken with Raisin-Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['¾ cup golden raisins', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 medium onion, halved and thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', '2 tablespoons chopped black olives', '2 bay leaves', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 (15 ounce) can diced tomatoes, drained', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '2 tablespoons julienned fresh basil', '1 (16 ounce) package angel hair pasta', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '4 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '¼ cup shaved Parmesan cheese', '4 sprigs fresh basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak the raisins in warm water until they plump, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Heat 3 tablespoons of olive oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the onion, garlic, pine nuts, and olives.
', 'Step 5: Season with bay leaves, oregano, and cayenne.
', 'Step 6: Cook until the onions have softened and begun to turn golden, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the tomatoes and season with salt and pepper; cook for 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add the raisins, balsamic vinegar, and sugar; cook, stirring occasionally until thickened, about 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove the bay leaves, and stir in the julienned basil.
', 'Step 10: Cover and keep warm.
', 'Step 11: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 13: While the pasta is cooking, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 14: While the skillet is heating, toss the chicken with the lemon juice to coat (the lemon zest will be used later).
', 'Step 15: Cook the chicken on both sides until golden brown and the juices run clear, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Transfer to a warm plate, and allow to rest for about five minutes.
', 'Step 17: To serve, slice each chicken breast against the grain into thin slices.
', 'Step 18: Divide the pasta into four wide, shallow bowls.
', 'Step 19: Fan the chicken slices out over top of the pasta, and spoon the tomato sauce over them.
', 'Step 20: Sprinkle with lemon zest, Parmesan cheese, and a sprig of basil to garnish.
']

Title: Jansen's Spaghetti Sauce and Meatballs
Ingredients: ['2 (28 ounce) cans chopped tomatoes', '2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '2 (8 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '4 teaspoons dried oregano', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '½ teaspoon salt', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ cup red wine', '1 ¼ pounds ground meatloaf mix (beef, pork veal)', '1 ½ cups crushed corn flakes cereal', '3 eggs', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '3 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '½ teaspoon garlic salt', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper']

Title: Deborah's Grilled Chicken
Ingredients: ['6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 tablespoon olive oil, divided', '¼ teaspoon garlic salt', '3 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped', '½ cup chopped fresh basil', '¼ cup chopped green onions', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '½ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '6 8x8-inch squares of heavy duty aluminum foil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 2: Place the chicken breast halves between two sheets of heavy plastic (resealable freezer bags work well) on a solid, level surface.
', 'Step 3: Firmly pound the chicken with the smooth side of a meat mallet to a thickness of about 1/2 inch.
', 'Step 4: Brush each chicken breast with olive oil, and sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt.
', 'Step 5: Grill the chicken breasts on the preheated grill until the meat is no longer pink inside and the chicken has good grill marks, 5 to 8 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Move chicken to a cooler part of the grill to keep warm.
', 'Step 7: While the chicken is cooking, mix together the tomatoes, basil, green onions, garlic, salt, black pepper, and lemon juice in a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Place an 8-inch square piece of aluminum foil onto the grill, and move a cooked chicken breast onto the foil.
', 'Step 9: Top the chicken breast with about 1/4 cup of the tomato mixture, and sprinkle the topping with about 2 teaspoons of Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 10: Repeat for the other pieces of chicken.
', 'Step 11: Close the lid on the grill, and grill the chicken breasts until the topping is hot, 2 to 3 more minutes.
']

Title: Porchetta (Pork Belly-Wrapped Pork Loin)
Ingredients: ['1 (2 pound) skin-on, boneless pork belly', '1 (3 pound) boneless pork loin, trimmed and silver skin removed', '8 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '2 teaspoons fennel seeds', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground dried sage', '3 sprigs fresh rosemary, leaves stripped', '1 pinch dried oregano', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon salt, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Score the skin of the pork belly in a diamond pattern; avoid cutting all the way through to the meat.
', 'Step 2: Combine garlic, olive oil, lemon zest, fennel seeds, coriander, sage, rosemary leaves, oregano, and cayenne pepper in a blender; pulse into a paste.
', 'Step 3: Rub pork belly and pork loin with salt.
', 'Step 4: Flip pork belly so the skin is facing down.
', 'Step 5: Place the loin in the center and wrap the belly around it.
', 'Step 6: Cut off any overlapping ends of the belly and any overhanging portions of the loin; you want a nice, neat package.
', 'Step 7: Unwrap the belly from the loin.
', "Step 8: Rub all sides of the loin with the paste; don't skimp-use all of it.
", 'Step 9: Re-roll the belly around the loin.
', 'Step 10: Pat the skin dry with a paper towel and use kitchen twine to tie it off in 2-inch segments.
', 'Step 11: (This will make it hold its appealing cylinder shape as it cooks.
', 'Step 12: ) Place roast on a wire rack on top of a rimmed pan or pot.
', 'Step 13: Place in the refrigerator, uncovered, until the skin is air-dried, about 48 hours.
', 'Step 14: When ready to cook, remove roast from the refrigerator.
', 'Step 15: Transfer to a roasting pan and let sit for 1 hour.
', 'Step 16: Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).
', 'Step 17: Place the roast in the lower half of the preheated oven and cook for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Reduce heat to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) and cook until meat is tender and an instant-read thermometer inserted in the center reads 145 degrees F (63 degrees C), about 2 1/2 more hours.
', 'Step 19: Remove from the oven and tent with foil; let sit for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Remove twine and cut into 1-inch slices.
', 'Step 21: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies
Ingredients: ['7 cups all-purpose flour', '2 cups white sugar', "1 cup unsweetened cocoa powder (such as Hershey's®)", '¼ cup baking powder', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cloves', '1 ½ teaspoons ground allspice', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 large orange, zested', '½ cup vegetable shortening (such as Crisco®)', '½ cup margarine (such as Parkay®)', '5 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract, or to taste', '¼ cup orange juice', '¼ cup whole milk', '½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '½ cup chopped walnuts', '3 tablespoons whole milk, or more as needed', '1 teaspoon orange juice, or as needed', "3 cups confectioners' sugar, or more as needed"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Whisk flour, white sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, cinnamon, cloves, allspice, and salt in a large bowl.
', 'Step 3: Stir orange zest into flour mixture.
', 'Step 4: Mix vegetable shortening and margarine into dry ingredients, using your hands, until mixture is crumbly.
', "Step 5: Beat eggs and vanilla extract in a bowl with an electric mixer until foamy; add egg mixture, 1/4 cup orange juice, and 1/4 cup milk to flour mixture and knead dough in the bowl until thoroughly combined and dough doesn't stick to your hands, about 8 minutes.
", 'Step 6: Dough will be stiff.
', 'Step 7: Knead cream cheese thoroughly into dough, followed by walnuts.
', 'Step 8: Form dough into balls about 1 1/2 inches in diameter and place onto ungreased baking sheets.
', 'Step 9: Bake cookies in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 12 to 14 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Cool cookies on racks.
', "Step 11: Beat 3 tablespoons milk, 1 teaspoon orange juice, and 1 cup confectioners' sugar in a bowl until smooth; gradually beat in remaining confectioners' sugar until frosting is thick and drizzles slowly from a spoon.
", 'Step 12: Dip tops of cookies into frosting and place frosted cookies on racks with waxed paper underneath to catch drips.
', 'Step 13: Let cookies dry overnight.
']

Title: Sicilian Pizza Crust
Ingredients: ['1 cup warm water (95 to 110 degrees F/35 to 43 degrees C)', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '2 tablespoons shortening', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '3 cups all-purpose flour']

', 'Step 8: Punch dough down gently.
', 'Step 9: Let stand for 3 to 5 minutes for air to release.
', 'Step 10: Roll into a ball; spread and stretch over the bottom of a pizza pan.
', 'Step 11: Let rise for 15 minutes before topping and baking.
']

Title: Sun-Dried Tomato Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients: ['½ pound penne pasta', '6 ounces bacon, chopped', '½ pound boneless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch pieces', '½ teaspoon garlic salt', '1 teaspoon cantanzaro herbs (from Savory Spice Shop®)', '¼ cup butter', '5 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 cups milk', '½ cup grated fontina cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup provolone cheese', '1 ¾ ounces chopped sun-dried tomatoes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned and desired crispness is reached, 6 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain bacon on paper towels.
', 'Step 5: Add chopped chicken thighs, garlic salt, and cantanzaro herbs to skillet and cook until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 6 minutes.
', 'Step 6: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Remove chicken to a plate.
', 'Step 8: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat until a pinch of flour sprinkled into the oil just begins to bubble.
', 'Step 9: Whisk in flour to form a thick paste the consistency of cake frosting.
', 'Step 10: Slowly add in milk, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 11: Allow mixture to thicken, while stirring.
', 'Step 12: Mix in fontina cheese, Parmesan, provolone, and sun-dried tomatoes.
', 'Step 13: Stir to combine.
', 'Step 14: Add drained pasta to sauce and mix well.
', 'Step 15: Stir in cooked chicken and bacon.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '707.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '62.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '116.8 mg', 'fatContent': '35.3 g', 'fiberContent': '3.9 g', 'proteinContent': '36.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '17.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '1230.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '12.6 g'}

Title: Pasta Salad a la Honeybear
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package tri-color rotini pasta', '1 small red onion, diced', '1 cup diced roasted red peppers', '1 cup cubed mozzarella cheese', '1 (6 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped', '¼ pound salami, diced', '¾ cup sliced stuffed green olives', '1 (4 ounce) can sliced black olives', '½ cup sliced pepperoncini peppers', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste', '1 pinch seasoned salt, or to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', "⅓ cup Italian-style salad dressing (such as Newman's Own®)", '¼ cup mayonnaise (such as Best Foods®)', '½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook rotini at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain and run under cold water to cool.
', 'Step 3: Mix rotini, red onion, roasted red peppers, mozzarella cheese, artichoke hearts, salami, green olives, black olives, pepperoncini peppers, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, seasoned salt, and black pepper in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Whisk Italian-style dressing and mayonnaise together in a small bowl; pour over rotini mixture and toss to coat.
', 'Step 5: Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.
', 'Step 6: Refrigerate salad at least 2 hours before serving.
']

Title: Sinful Chocolate Biscotti
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon instant espresso powder', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '¾ cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 cup mini chocolate chips', '1 cup white sugar', '3 eggs', '½ cup vegetable oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Combine vanilla extract and espresso powder in a small bowl; mix until espresso powder is dissolved.
', 'Step 4: Sift flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt into a bowl; mix in chocolate chips.
', 'Step 5: Whisk vanilla mixture, sugar, eggs, and oil together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 6: Add flour mixture; stir, by hand if needed, until dough comes together and is thick and stiff.
', 'Step 7: Divide dough into 2 equal pieces and place onto the baking sheets.
', 'Step 8: Shape each piece into a log as long as the baking sheet; press down with wet hands to about 1/2 inch thickness.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until firm, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove from oven and cool until easily handled, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Move cooled logs to a cutting board and slice into 1/2-inch long slices with a serrated knife.
', 'Step 12: Return the slices to the baking sheets, placing them on their sides.
', 'Step 13: Bake until dry, about 6 minutes per side.
', 'Step 14: Remove from oven and let cool until hardened on wire racks.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '103.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '14.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '14 mg', 'fatContent': '4.7 g', 'fiberContent': '1 g', 'proteinContent': '1.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '60.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.5 g'}

Title: Minestrone Vegetable Soup
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 (32 ounce) carton chicken broth', '4 cups tomato juice', '1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes, undrained', '2 cups chopped fresh spinach', '2 zucchini, chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '1 (15.5 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 cups rotini pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large soup pot over medium heat; cook and stir onion and garlic in the hot oil until onion is tender, 2 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir chicken broth, tomato juice, diced tomatoes and their juice, spinach, zucchini, carrots, celery, cannellini beans, Italian seasoning, salt, and black pepper.
', 'Step 3: Bring soup to a boil, reduce heat to low, and cover pot.
', 'Step 4: Simmer soup for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Bring soup back to a full boil and stir in rotini pasta.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low and simmer until pasta is tender, 10 to 15 more minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '174.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '31.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '2.2 mg', 'fatContent': '2.3 g', 'fiberContent': '5 g', 'proteinContent': '7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '1166.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.8 g'}

Title: My Sicilian Ex-Mother-in-Law's Peperonata
Ingredients: ['3 large red bell peppers, seeded', '1 large yellow bell pepper, seeded', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste', '1 large red onion, cut into 8 wedges', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '⅓ cup dry white wine', '2 medium ripe plum tomatoes, diced', '⅓ cup sliced black and green olives', '1 bunch fresh basil, chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '1 small fresh red chile pepper, finely chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut red and yellow bell peppers into 1-inch pieces.
', 'Step 2: Heat oil in a large, nonstick skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Add onion and garlic; saute until fragrant, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add bell peppers; cook and stir until onion becomes translucent, about 7 more minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in wine.
', 'Step 6: Add tomatoes, mix, and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 7: Cook until tomatoes have begun to soften, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in olives, basil, and oregano.
', 'Step 9: Simmer, stirring occasionally, until bell peppers have softened, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 10: Add chile pepper and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Serve warm.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '171.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '18 g', 'fatContent': '8.8 g', 'fiberContent': '4.7 g', 'proteinContent': '3.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '115.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.1 g'}

Title: North End Sunday Gravy
Ingredients: ['¼ cup olive oil', '2 pork neck bones', '1 country-style pork rib', '1 (8 ounce) beef chuck in 1 piece', '1 beef rib, or more to taste', '1 lamb shank', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 pinch dried basil, or to taste', '1 pinch dried mint, or to taste', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 (12 ounce) can tomato paste', '2 (28 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes', '7 cups water, or as needed', '2 pinches dried basil', '2 pinches dried mint', '2 pinches crushed red pepper flakes', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '½ tablespoon white sugar, or to taste', '1 pound ground beef', '¼ pound ground pork', '2 eggs', '½ cup milk', '1 cup Italian bread crumbs', '½ cup chopped Italian flat leaf parsley', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 ½ teaspoons olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1/4 cup olive oil in a stockpot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook neck bones, country-style pork rib, beef chuck, beef rib, and lamb shank in hot oil, turning regularly, until browned on all sides, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove all the meat to a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: n Pour another 1/4 cup olive oil into the stockpot and heat over medium heat; stir a pinch of basil, a pinch of mint, and a pinch of red pepper flakes into the oil.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir onions in hot oil until translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add garlic; cook and stir 1 minute more.
', 'Step 7: Stir the tomato paste into the onion mixture until incorporated.
', 'Step 8: Pour crushed tomatoes and water into the mixture and bring to a low boil.
', 'Step 9: Add an additional 2 pinches each of basil, mint, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 10: Season with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 11: n Return the browned meats to the tomato mixture; bring to a simmer and cook, stirring every 15 minutes, for 2 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 12: Remove the neck bones and discard.
', 'Step 13: n Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 14: Crumble Italian sausage into the skillet; cook and stir until crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Drain and discard any excess grease.
', 'Step 16: Stir sausage into the tomato sauce with sugar.
', 'Step 17: Return the sauce to a simmer and cook another 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 18: n Mix ground beef, ground pork, eggs, milk, Italian bread crumbs, parsley, Parmesan cheese, and garlic with your hands in a large bowl until evenly mixed; shape into 2-inch balls.
', 'Step 19: n Heat 1 1/2 teaspoons in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 20: Cook the meat balls in hot oil until evenly browned, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 21: n Add meatballs to the tomato sauce.
', 'Step 22: Cook at a simmer for 1 hour, adding water as needed to keep sauce from becoming too thick.
', 'Step 23: Remove stockpot from heat; let sit 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Skim and discard any fat from the top of the sauce.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '527 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '25 g', 'cholesterolContent': '110.1 mg', 'fatContent': '35.8 g', 'fiberContent': '4.5 g', 'proteinContent': '28.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '868.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.7 g'}

Title: Zuppa Inglese
Ingredients: ['1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries', '1 teaspoon rum flavored extract', '1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix', '1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix', '2 (3 ounce) packages ladyfinger cookies', '1 pint heavy cream', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '2 ounces almonds, lightly toasted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, drain cherry juice and add rum; set aside.
', 'Step 2: Prepare vanilla and chocolate puddings in separate bowls, according to package directions.
', 'Step 3: Allow to set up 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: In a 9x13 inch baking dish, place a layer of cookies on the bottom of the dish; cut a few of the cookies in order to create a tight fit, if needed.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle cookie layer with 1/3 of the cherry juice mixture and spoon vanilla pudding over the cookies, spreading to the edge of the pan.
', 'Step 6: Repeat steps with cookies, cherry juice and chocolate pudding.
', 'Step 7: Make final layer with cookies and remaining juice.
', 'Step 8: In a medium bowl, whip cream and sugar together until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 9: Top dessert with whipped cream, sprinkle with almonds, and garnish with whole cherries.
', 'Step 10: Refrigerate for 2 hours or more before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '309 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '33 g', 'cholesterolContent': '85.3 mg', 'fatContent': '18.7 g', 'fiberContent': '1.2 g', 'proteinContent': '3.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '280.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '12.7 g'}

Title: Italian Spaghetti Squash
Ingredients: ['½ cup water', '1 spaghetti squash, halved and seeded', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, diced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with onion, celery, and green pepper', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese, plus more for topping']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Pour water in baking dish and place halved squash cut-sides down in the dish.
', 'Step 3: Bake squash in preheated oven until a fork pierces the skin very easily, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Let squash cook while preparing remainder of recipe.
', 'Step 5: Melt butter with olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Saute onion in hot butter until softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add garlic and continue to saute until fragrant, about 1 minute more.
', 'Step 8: Pour diced tomatoes over the onion mixture; season with basil.
', 'Step 9: Place a cover on the skillet, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook at a simmer until the tomatoes are soft, about 30 minutes; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 10: Once squash is cool enough to handle, use a fork to strip flesh from the skin in strands.
', 'Step 11: Stir squash and Parmesan cheese into tomato mixture.
', 'Step 12: Replace cover on skillet and cook until squash is heated through, 5 to 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle additional Parmesan cheese over the dish to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '204.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '22.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '19.7 mg', 'fatContent': '12.5 g', 'fiberContent': '1.7 g', 'proteinContent': '5.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '1229.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.1 g'}

Title: Spinach Lasagna I
Ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '3 tablespoons water', '1 pint part-skim ricotta cheese', '1 pound firm tofu, crumbled', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 ½ pounds fresh spinach, washed and chopped', '2 egg whites, beaten', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 ½ tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '8 lasagna noodles', '6 ounces mozzarella cheese, shredded', '6 cups tomato sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Cook the noodles according to package directions.
', 'Step 3: Drain.
', 'Step 4: Saute the onion and garlic in the olive oil, adding water as needed to keep from sticking.
', 'Step 5: Combine the ricotta, tofu, Parmesan cheese, spinach, egg whites, black pepper, parsley, and sauteed onion and garlic.
', 'Step 6: Mix well.
', 'Step 7: Spray a 9 x 13 inch casserole dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 8: Arrange a layer of cooked noodles on the bottom.
', 'Step 9: Top with 1/3 each of the ricotta mixture, the mozzarella and the tomato sauce.
', 'Step 10: Repeat layers twice more, ending with tomato sauce.
', 'Step 11: Cover with foil.
', 'Step 12: Cover with foil and bake for 40 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove foil and bake 10 to 15 more minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '421.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '38.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '37.8 mg', 'fatContent': '17.6 g', 'fiberContent': '6.9 g', 'proteinContent': '32.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '1313.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.6 g'}

Title: Turkey Lasagna with Butternut Squash, Zucchini, and Spinach
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 onion, diced', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 (20 ounce) package ground turkey', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '3 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '1 ½ cups water', '1 ½ teaspoons dried basil', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '3 ½ cups peeled and cubed butternut squash', '1 (10 ounce) package fresh spinach', '1 (15 ounce) container fat-free ricotta cheese', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 (6 ounce) package shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese, divided', '9 no-boil lasagna noodles', '2 zucchini, sliced lengthwise']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook the onion and garlic in the hot oil until fragrant, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Break the turkey into small pieces into the skillet; cook and stir until completely browned, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, water, basil, fennel seeds, Italian seasoning, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, and 1/4 cup parsley into the turkey mixture.
', 'Step 4: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring occasionally, until the sauce reaches a desired consistency, 60 to 90 minutes.
', 'Step 5: While the sauce simmers, place the butternut squash in a large, microwave-safe bowl; cover with plastic wrap and cook in microwave on High until tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Set aside.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir the spinach in a large skillet over medium heat until wilted, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Set aside.
', 'Step 9: Stir the ricotta cheese, egg, 2 tablespoons parsley, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, and about 2/3 of the mozzarella cheese together in a bowl.
', 'Step 10: Set aside.
', 'Step 11: Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Pour 1 1/2 cups of the sauce into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 13: Arrange 3 of the lasagna noodles in a layer over the sauce.
', 'Step 14: Spread 1 cup of the ricotta cheese mixture over the noodles.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle about half of the butternut squash over the ricotta cheese mixture.
', 'Step 16: Layer about half the wilted spinach over the butternut squash.
', 'Step 17: Lay about half the zucchini slices over the spinach in a layer.
', 'Step 18: Repeat the layering.
', 'Step 19: Top with the 3 remaining lasagna noodles.
', 'Step 20: Spread any remaining ricotta cheese mixture over the top of the lasagna.
', 'Step 21: Finish by topping with any remaining sauce mixture.
', 'Step 22: Cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 23: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Remove the aluminum foil and sprinkle the remaining mozzarella over the top of the lasagna.
', 'Step 25: Return to oven and bake uncovered until the top is golden brown, about 30 minutes more.
', 'Step 26: Remove and allow the lasagna to rest 15 minutes before cutting to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '476.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '56.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '97.5 mg', 'fatContent': '14.3 g', 'fiberContent': '8.6 g', 'proteinContent': '34.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '906.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '13.9 g'}

Title: Chicken Florentine Alfredo Lasagna Cups
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '5 ounces baby spinach leaves', '4 cups shredded cooked chicken', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '3 cups Alfredo sauce, divided', '2 ¼ cups whole-milk ricotta cheese', '½ cup prepared basil pesto', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Spray two 12-cup standard muffin tins with cooking spray.
', 'Step 2: Set aside.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook 12 lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove with a slotted spoon or a pair of tongs to a colander, leaving water to boil.
', 'Step 6: Rinse noodles with cold water and drain again.
', 'Step 7: Lay noodles flat on a large baking sheet.
', 'Step 8: Place spinach in boiling pasta water and stir until wilted, about 30 seconds; drain.
', 'Step 9: Squeeze dry and coarsely chop.
', 'Step 10: Stir spinach, chicken, 1 cup mozzarella, and 1 1/2 cups Alfredo sauce together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 11: Set aside.
', 'Step 12: Stir ricotta cheese, pesto, and salt together in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 13: Spread 3 tablespoons ricotta mixture onto each lasagna noodle.
', 'Step 14: Working one noodle at a time, cut noodle in half lengthwise.
', 'Step 15: Spread 2 tablespoons chicken mixture onto each noodle half.
', 'Step 16: Roll up lengthwise and place cut-side down in the prepared muffin cups.
', 'Step 17: Top each lasagna cup with 1 tablespoon Alfredo sauce.
', 'Step 18: Sprinkle tops of lasagna cups evenly with remaining 2 cups mozzarella and Parmesan, making sure any stray strands of cheese are pushed into the muffin cups around the roll-up.
', 'Step 19: Cover muffin tins with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 20: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and cheese is melted, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Uncover and continue to bake until even more bubbly and cheese is browned, about 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 22: Let sit for 5 minutes before removing from muffin tin.
', 'Step 23: Sprinkle with basil and parsley and serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '625 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '34.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '103.5 mg', 'fatContent': '38.6 g', 'fiberContent': '1.8 g', 'proteinContent': '36.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '16.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '1141.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.7 g'}

Title: Tuscan Tomato Soup (Pappa al Pomodoro)
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 carrot, finely chopped', '1 rib celery, finely chopped', '4 cups passata (crushed tomatoes)', '2 tablespoons milk', 'salt', '1 onion, peeled', '1 carrot', '1 stalk celery', '4 cups water', '8 cups stale Italian bread, crumbled', '1 ¼ cups grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese, shaved', '5 leaves chopped fresh basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 3 tablespoons olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat; add chopped onion, chopped carrot, and chopped celery.
', 'Step 2: Cook until softened, stirring often, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in tomato passata and milk.
', 'Step 4: Season with salt, cover and simmer tomato sauce until flavors are well combined, 20 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Combine whole onion, whole carrot, and whole celery stalk in a stockpot; cover with water and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Simmer for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Strain vegetables and keep stock warm.
', 'Step 8: Stir 1 1/2 cups stock into tomato sauce.
', 'Step 9: Add stale bread; stir and set aside for 15 to 20 minutes to allow the bread to soften.
', 'Step 10: Combine tomato-bread mixture, 1 1/4 cups grated Parmesan cheese, and 1 teaspoon of olive oil in a blender; blend until mixture has consistency of a mousse.
', 'Step 11: Ladle soup into bowls and serve with shaved Parmesan cheese and drizzled with remaining olive oil.
', 'Step 12: Garnish with basil leaves.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '561.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '65.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '24.8 mg', 'fatContent': '24.8 g', 'fiberContent': '8.8 g', 'proteinContent': '22.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '1225.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.4 g'}

Title: Creamy Italian Chicken
Ingredients: ['3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cubed', '¼ cup water', '1 packet dry Italian salad dressing mix (such as Kraft® Zesty Italian)', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese', '1 (4.5 ounce) can mushroom pieces and stems, drained']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the chicken breast pieces into the bottom of a slow cooker.
', 'Step 2: Pour in water, and stir in the salad dressing mix.
', 'Step 3: Cover the cooker, set on low, and cook 3 or more hours (see note).
', 'Step 4: With an electric mixer, beat the soup, cream cheese, and mushrooms in a bowl until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 5: Mix with the chicken and any juices in the slow cooker.
', 'Step 6: Cover and cook 1 more hour.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '375.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '11.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '107.2 mg', 'fatContent': '25.9 g', 'fiberContent': '0.8 g', 'proteinContent': '23.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '13.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '1965.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.4 g'}

Title: Asparagus with Pecans and Parm
Ingredients: ['1 bunch asparagus spears, ends trimmed', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced mushrooms', '1 onion, minced', '½ cup coarsely chopped pecans', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Steam the asparagus spears in a basket-style steamer over boiling water until tender, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain and remove to a serving dish; keep warm.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, melt half of the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', "Step 4: Once melted (it's ok if it begins to brown), stir in the sliced mushrooms, and cook until they brown, soften, and begin to release their liquid; pour into a serving dish, and set aside.
", 'Step 5: Melt the remaining butter in the skillet, and stir in the onions.
', 'Step 6: Cook until the onions soften and turn translucent, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Season with garlic powder, basil, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the chopped pecans, and cook for a minute more.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle the onion mixture with half of the Parmesan cheese, and stir in the reserved mushrooms.
', 'Step 10: Pour over the asparagus in the serving dish and sprinkle with remaining cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '170.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '7.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '17.5 mg', 'fatContent': '13.6 g', 'fiberContent': '3.3 g', 'proteinContent': '7.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '255.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.3 g'}

Title: Italian Meat Sauce II
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided', '1 white onion, diced', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 (28 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes', '2 (28 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes', '¾ cup chopped Italian flat leaf parsley, divided', '2 teaspoons garlic powder, divided', '1 pound ground beef chuck', '1 cup bread crumbs', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons milk', 'salt and pepper to taste', '½ pound hot Italian sausage', '½ pound mild Italian sausage', '½ pound pork neck bones', '¼ cup red wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Saute onion and garlic until onion is soft and translucent.
', 'Step 3: Pour in crushed tomatoes and whole tomatoes.
', 'Step 4: As you are adding the whole tomatoes, let them slowly slide through your fingers and crush them coarsely on the way into the pot.
', 'Step 5: Season with 1/4 cup of the parsley and 1 teaspoon garlic powder.
', 'Step 6: Cover, and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 7: n In a large bowl, mix the ground beef chuck, breadcrumbs, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/8 cup parsley, egg, milk, and salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 8: Mix ingredients with your hands until well blended.
', 'Step 9: Form into small, golf ball-size meatballs.
', 'Step 10: Slice all of the sausage links but one hot and one mild link into 1/2 inch chunks.
', 'Step 11: n Heat 2 tablespoons in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 12: The oil should be slightly smoking.
', 'Step 13: Slice open the remaining links of hot and mild sausage, and crumble into the pan.
', 'Step 14: Saute, continually breaking up the pieces, until they are all golden brown.
', 'Step 15: Transfer to the sauce.
', 'Step 16: Brown the meatballs, chopped sausage links, and pork bones on all sides until they are a deep golden brown.
', 'Step 17: You may need to do this in stages, and continually transfer into the sauce when browned.
', 'Step 18: Drain excess fat.
', 'Step 19: n Pour the red wine into the skillet and deglaze all of the brown chunks on the bottom of the pan.
', 'Step 20: Let the wine reduce to about half, then transfer into the sauce.
', 'Step 21: Frequently stir, and season with salt and pepper to taste for about another hour after the last meat has been transferred into the pan.
', 'Step 22: Finish by stirring the remaining fresh parsley into the sauce.
', 'Step 23: Spoon sauce over your favorite pasta and serve the meat on a separate plate.
']

Title: Anise Walnut Biscotti

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F ( 190 degrees C ).
', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, cream together butter and sugar Gradually add the vanilla and eggs while mixing.

Title: Orzo with Tomatoes, Basil, and Gorgonzola
Ingredients: ['1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup uncooked orzo pasta', '1 red onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 ¼ cups vegetable broth', '1 pint cherry tomatoes, halved', '12 leaves fresh basil, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup crumbled Gorgonzola cheese, or to taste']

['Step 1: Heat 1 1/2 tablespoons of olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the orzo pasta; cook and stir until the orzo has lightly browned, 3 to 4 minutes.

', 'Step 4: Add 1 clove of garlic; cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.

Title: Cherry Almond Biscotti
Ingredients: ['1 ¾ cups dried cherries', '½ cup amaretto liqueur', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup butter, softened', '1 cup white sugar', '3 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '¾ cup chopped blanched almonds', '1 egg, beaten', '3 tablespoons white sugar, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Stir dried cherries and amaretto liqueur together in a saucepan over medium heat until the amaretto comes to a simmer; drain, reserving 2 tablespoons of the liquid for later use.
', 'Step 4: Sift flour, baking powder, and salt together onto a sheet of waxed paper.
', 'Step 5: Beat butter with 1 cup sugar in a bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Beat 3 eggs into butter-sugar mixture, one at a time, blending in each egg before adding the next.
', 'Step 7: Stir reserved cherry liquid and vanilla extract into the wet ingredients.
', 'Step 8: Beat butter with 1 cup sugar in a bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Beat 3 eggs into butter-sugar mixture, one at a time, blending in each egg before adding the next.
', 'Step 10: Stir reserved cherry liquid and vanilla extract into the wet ingredients.
', 'Step 11: Stir flour mixture into the wet ingredients a little at a time to form a smooth dough.
', 'Step 12: Gently fold cherries and almonds into dough.
', 'Step 13: Turn the dough out onto a floured work surface, divide in half, and form each half into a log 12 inches long and 2 1/2 inches wide.
', 'Step 14: Gently press the logs with your fingers to flatten to a thickness of 3/4 inch.
', 'Step 15: Transfer loaves to the prepared baking sheets, brush with beaten egg, and sprinkle each with 1 1/2 tablespoon white sugar.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until the loaves are golden brown, about 35 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Transfer loaves to wire racks and cool for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Use a sharp knife to slice each loaf on the diagonal into 16 pieces.
', 'Step 19: Transfer the biscotti to baking sheets.
', 'Step 20: Reduce oven heat to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 21: Bake in the oven for 8 minutes; flip biscotti and bake until crisp and lightly browned, about 8 more minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '144.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '24.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '27.1 mg', 'fatContent': '3.4 g', 'fiberContent': '1.2 g', 'proteinContent': '2.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '87.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '13.4 g'}

Title: Coconut Panna Cotta
Ingredients: ['1 cup coconut milk, divided', '1 (.25 ounce) package unflavored gelatin', '1 cup heavy cream', '4 tablespoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons coconut flour', '1 tablespoon shredded coconut, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour ¼ cup coconut milk into a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle gelatin powder on top.
', 'Step 3: Let stand until softened, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Combine remaining coconut milk, cream, sugar, and vanilla extract in a small saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 5: Cook and whisk constantly without simmering for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add coconut flour.
', 'Step 7: Continue cooking over low heat while stirring until smooth and lump free, 7 minutes longer.
', 'Step 8: Add gelatin mixture to the cream mixture and whisk vigorously to dissolve gelatin.
', 'Step 9: Remove from heat and pass mixture through a fine sieve.
', 'Step 10: Wet an aluminum panna cotta mold with water and pour in cream mixture; wetting the mold first makes it easier to unmold later.
', 'Step 11: Refrigerate at least 4 hours.
', 'Step 12: Flip panna cotta onto a serving plate, carefully unmold, and sprinkle the top with some coconut.
']

Title: Cheese and Bacon-Stuffed Pasta Shells
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package jumbo pasta shells', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 slices smoked bacon, chopped', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 cup fresh bread crumbs', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', 'ground black pepper to taste', '3 cups tomato puree', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', '5 ounces fresh Buffalo mozzarella']

', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.

Title: Swordfish Calabrian-Style
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 ¼ pounds fresh swordfish, cut into chunks', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon all-purpose flour', '1 ½ cups dry white wine', '1 (19 ounce) can fava beans, drained', '1 bunch fresh parsley, chopped']

', 'Step 2: Add the fish and stir enough to get it coated.

Title: Baked Italian Chicken Breast with Brie
Ingredients: ['¾ cup dry white wine', '¼ cup water', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', '2 roma tomatoes, chopped', '2 large mushrooms, sliced', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '2 slices prosciutto', '4 ounces Brie cheese, cut into 1/4-inch slices']

', 'Step 2: Pour white wine and water into a 9x13-inch baking dish.

Title: Mushroom Risotto Cooked in the Instant Pot®
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or as needed', '1 large shallot, minced, or more to taste', '1 cup Arborio rice', '¼ cup dry white wine', '2 cups vegetable broth or chicken broth', '1 (8 ounce) package white button mushrooms, sliced', '1 (8 ounce) package baby bella mushrooms, sliced', 'garlic salt and pepper to taste', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh chives']

', 'Step 4: Add rice and stir until toasted, about 2 minutes.

', "Step 10: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 10 minutes.
", 'Step 11: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 12: Meanwhile, heat up more olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 13: Add mushrooms, garlic salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 14: Saute until mushrooms are tender and have released their juices, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Add risotto to the mushrooms.
', 'Step 16: Stir in Parmesan cheese and chives until the cheese has melted.
', 'Step 17: Adjust seasoning as needed.
']

', 'Step 2: Cook orzo in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes; drain.

', 'Step 4: Combine cooked orzo, artichoke hearts, tomatoes, olives, and Parmesan cheese in a large bowl.

Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts with Artichoke Hearts, Feta Cheese, Capers, and Black Olives
Ingredients: ['1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 (8 ounce) bottle Italian-style salad dressing', '½ (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped', '½ (6 ounce) can sliced olives, drained', '¼ (4 ounce) jar capers, drained', '1 (4 ounce) container crumbled feta cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the chicken breast halves into a plastic zipper bag.
', 'Step 2: Shake the bottle of Italian dressing and pour into the bag.
', 'Step 3: Seal the bag and shake to thoroughly coat the chicken with the dressing; refrigerate at least 8 hours or overnight.
', 'Step 4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Grease a baking dish with olive oil.
', 'Step 6: Remove the chicken breast halves and shake off excess marinade.
', 'Step 7: Discard the leftover marinade.
', 'Step 8: Place the chicken between two sheets of heavy plastic (resealable freezer bags work well) on a solid, level surface.
', 'Step 9: Firmly pound the chicken with the smooth side of a meat mallet to a thickness of 1/2 inch.
', 'Step 10: Mix together the artichoke hearts, olives, capers, and feta cheese in a bowl; spoon about 2 tablespoons of the feta mixture into the middle of each flattened chicken breast.
', 'Step 11: Roll each chicken breast around the filling and secure with toothpicks.
', 'Step 12: Place the rolled chicken breasts into the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken has browned and the juices run clear, about 30 minutes.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Easy Chicken Marsala
Ingredients: ['3 boneless chicken breasts, cut into strips', '1 ½ teaspoons salt , divided', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper, divided', '3 tablespoons butter, divided', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 tablespoons minced shallots', '1 cup button mushrooms, sliced', '1 cup chicken broth', '⅔ cup Marsala wine', '¼ cup water', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '½ cup heavy whipping cream', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Season chicken breasts with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
', 'Step 2: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 3: Heat 1 tablespoon butter and 1 tablespoon olive oil; cook chicken breasts on both sides until golden brown, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove chicken from the pot.
', 'Step 5: Melt remaining 2 tablespoons butter and 1 tablespoon olive oil; add garlic and shallots; cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in mushrooms and cook until tender, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour chicken broth into the pot and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon for deglazing, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Return chicken to the pot and cover with Marsala wine.
', 'Step 9: Close and lock the lid.
', 'Step 10: Select Poultry function; set timer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 12: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 10 minutes.
", 'Step 13: Release remaining pressure using the quick-release method, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 15: Select Saute function.
', 'Step 16: Dissolve cornstarch in water and stir into the pot with heavy whipping cream.
', 'Step 17: Season with remaining teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper; cook until sauce has slightly thickened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Serve and sprinkle with fresh parsley.
']

Title: Pesto Tomatoes
Ingredients: ['10 small ripe tomatoes', '½ cup homemade or purchased pesto', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']

', 'Step 2: Slice tomatoes in half, and scoop out about a tablespoon of flesh from the center of each half.
', 'Step 3: Fill pocket with pesto, and sprinkle generously with cheese.
', 'Step 4: Place tomato halves in a well oiled baking dish.
', 'Step 5: Bake in preheated oven until cheese is melted and bubbly, and slightly browned.
', 'Step 6: Serve warm.
']

Title: Fried Garlic Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 pound angel hair pasta', '2 cups olive oil for frying', '2 bulbs garlic, peeled and diced', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat until a piece of garlic dropped into the oil slowly bubbles.
', 'Step 4: Add the garlic, and cook and stir until golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove garlic from the oil with a slotted spoon and set aside; reserve oil.
', 'Step 6: To serve, place the pasta onto individual serving dishes and sprinkle with fried garlic.
', 'Step 7: Drizzle with a little of the frying oil and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

Title: Kale Lasagna with Meat Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 pound Italian pork sausage, casings removed', '1 pound ground beef', '½ cup minced onion', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 (14.5 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '½ cup vegetable broth', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '1 (16 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '2 cups chopped kale', '1 egg', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pound shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir Italian sausage, ground beef, onion, and garlic together in a large saucepan over medium-high heat until meats are browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, vegetable broth, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a gentle boil.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat and let simmer, stirring occasionally, for about 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 7: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Combine ricotta cheese, kale, and egg in a bowl.
', 'Step 9: Layer lasagna in a 9x13-inch pan starting with a small amount of meat sauce and noodles, followed by 1/2 of the ricotta mixture, more noodles, and most of remaining meat sauce.
', 'Step 10: Continue with Parmesan cheese, noodles, 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese, noodles, remaining ricotta mixture, remaining noodles, and remaining meat sauce.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle with remaining mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 12: Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until bubbly and browned, 30 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Let cool and set up for 10 minutes before cutting.
']

Title: Saffron Risotto in the Pressure Cooker
Ingredients: ['1 pinch saffron', '⅓ cup hot water', '4 tablespoons butter, divided', '1 small shallot, finely chopped', '1 ½ cups Arborio rice', '¾ cup dry white wine', '3 ¼ cups boiling vegetable stock', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak saffron threads in hot water in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Melt 2 1/2 tablespoons butter in a pressure cooker over low heat.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir shallot until soft, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add rice; cook and stir for a few minutes until rice has absorbed butter and is toasted, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour in wine and allow alcohol to cook off, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 6: Add boiling stock all at once and stir.
', "Step 7: Close cooker securely and place pressure regulator over vent according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 8: Increase heat to high.
', 'Step 9: Heat until steam escapes in a steady flow and makes a whistling sound.
', 'Step 10: Reduce heat to low and cook for 4 minutes.
', "Step 11: Remove cooker from heat and release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 12: Carefully open once pressure is completely released and stir well.
', 'Step 13: Stir in saffron, remaining 1 1/2 tablespoon butter, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 14: Let risotto rest for 3 minutes in order to expand, soak up the stock, and absorb flavor.
', 'Step 15: Serve in warmed bowls with extra grated Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Light Chicken Piccata
Ingredients: ['8 ounces lowfat plain yogurt', '4 boned and skinned chicken breast halves', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon margarine', '1 ½ tablespoons lemon juice', '1 cup white vermouth', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '½ cup lemon juice', '½ cup water', '2 tablespoons capers']

['Step 1: Coat chicken with yogurt, cover, and refrigerate at least 2 hours, preferably overnight.
', 'Step 2: Rinse chicken, and pat dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 3: In a bowl, stir together flour, paprika, salt, and pepper.

', 'Step 6: Place chicken in skillet; cook, turning to brown both sides, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove chicken to a plate, and keep warm.
', 'Step 8: Pour vermouth into skillet, and scrape brown bits with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 9: Stir in garlic, 1/4 cup lemon juice, water, and capers.
', 'Step 10: Cook until reduced by half.
', 'Step 11: Return chicken to the pan, and simmer 3 minutes.
']

Title: Tomato-Cream (Vodka) Sauce for Pasta

Title: Butterscotch Biscotti
Ingredients: ['½ cup butter', '1 cup packed brown sugar', '5 tablespoons bourbon whiskey', '4 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '½ tablespoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 cup whole almonds', '1 cup butterscotch chips']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) In a small saucepan, melt butter and cook over low heat until browned.
', 'Step 2: Remove from heat immediately to a medium bowl.
', 'Step 3: Mix the brown sugar and bourbon into the butter until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Beat in the eggs one at a time, and stir in the vanilla.
', 'Step 5: Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; stir into the egg mixture.
', 'Step 6: Mix in the almonds and butterscotch chips.
', 'Step 7: Form into 2 long loaves and place onto a cookie sheet.
', 'Step 8: Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until firm.
', 'Step 9: Allow the loaves to cool on the baking sheet.
', 'Step 10: When they are cool enough to handle, slice diagonally into 1/2 inch slices.
', 'Step 11: Return the slices cut side up to the baking sheet and bake for 15 to 20 additional minutes, turning once, until toasted on both sides.
', 'Step 12: Cool completely and store in an airtight container at room temperature.
']

', 'Step 4: Watch carefully to prevent burning.
', 'Step 5: Slice toasted bread into 2-inch thick slices.
', 'Step 6: Dip toasted side of each slice into garlic butter.
']

Title: Grandma's Homemade Pizza ala 'Da Boys'
Ingredients: ['2 (.25 ounce) packages fast-rising dry yeast', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '2 ½ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C), divided', '⅓ cup olive oil', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste', '5 cups all-purpose flour, or more if needed', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '1 tablespoon dried oregano, or to taste', '2 tablespoons ricotta cheese', '1 (29 ounce) can tomato puree (such as Contadina® Tomato Puree)', '1 teaspoon onion powder, or to taste', '1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '1 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste', '1 ½ teaspoons olive oil, divided', '3 Italian sausage links, casings removed', '1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste', '1 pinch crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 ½ teaspoons melted butter, divided', '1 cup shredded pizza cheese blend, or as needed', '24 slices pepperoni sausage, or as needed', '¾ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, or as needed', '3 dashes Louisiana-style hot sauce, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, mix together the yeast, 1 teaspoon sugar, and 1/2 cup of warm water.
', 'Step 2: Let the mixture stand until the yeast begins to bubble and form a layer of creamy foam on top, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in 2 more cups of warm water, olive oil, 1 tablespoon salt, garlic powder, and about 2 cups of flour.
', 'Step 4: Mix together to form a loose batter, and begin beating in flour, about 1/2 cup at a time, until the dough is slightly sticky but not wet, about 3 more cups.
', 'Step 5: Turn the dough out onto a floured surface, and knead until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Form the dough into a ball, place into an oiled bowl, cover with a cloth, and let rise in a warm place until double, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Melt 2 tablespoons of butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat, and stir in the oregano.
', 'Step 8: Let the oregano fry in the butter for a few seconds, then whisk in the ricotta cheese until the mixture makes a smooth paste.
', 'Step 9: Whisk in the tomato puree, onion powder, 1 pinch garlic powder, 1 teaspoon of salt, black pepper, and 1 teaspoon sugar until the sauce is smooth.
', 'Step 10: Bring the sauce to a boil, stirring occasionally, cover, and remove from heat.
', 'Step 11: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Coat 3 12-inch pizza pans with about 1/2 teaspoon olive oil apiece.
', 'Step 13: Place the sausage into a skillet over medium heat and sprinkle with 1 pinch dried oregano and 1 pinch crushed red pepper flakes, if desired.
', 'Step 14: Brown the sausage, breaking it into small chunks as it cooks, until the sausage is no longer pink, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Set the sausage aside.
', 'Step 16: Place the dough on a floured surface, punch down the dough, and cut it into 3 equal pieces.
', 'Step 17: Roll a dough piece out to the size of a prepared pizza pan, and place the dough on the pan.
', 'Step 18: Stretch the edges of the dough a little beyond the pan, and fold the excess dough over to make a thicker edge.
', 'Step 19: Press the folded dough together to seal.
', 'Step 20: Repeat for the other 2 crusts.
', 'Step 21: Bake the crusts in the preheated oven for about 15 minutes, then remove from oven and brush each crust with about 1/2 teaspoon melted butter (see Notes for details).
', 'Step 22: Using a large spoon, spread a layer of sauce over each crust.
', 'Step 23: Sprinkle with pizza cheese blend, dot pieces of browned sausage evenly over the cheese, spread pepperoni slices over the pizzas, and sprinkle each pizza with about 1/4 teaspoon of crushed red pepper.
', 'Step 24: Shake 1 or more dashes of hot sauce over each pizza.
', 'Step 25: Return the pizzas to the oven, and bake until the cheese is melted, bubbling, and beginning to brown, 15 to 20 more minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '212.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '24.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '14.6 mg', 'fatContent': '9.7 g', 'fiberContent': '1.6 g', 'proteinContent': '7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '724.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.2 g'}

Title: Easy Rosemary Focaccia
Ingredients: ['5 tablespoons warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C), or more as needed', '2 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon salt, or more to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '3 sprigs fresh rosemary, leaves stripped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine 5 tablespoons warm water, yeast, and sugar in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until creamy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add flour and 1/4 teaspoon salt to the yeast mixture; stir well to combine.
', 'Step 4: Stir in 1 tablespoon additional water at a time, if necessary, until all flour is absorbed and mixture has pulled together into a dough.
', 'Step 5: Turn out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until springy, 4 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Lightly oil a large bowl.
', 'Step 7: Place dough in the bowl and turn to coat with oil.
', 'Step 8: Cover with a damp cloth and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Preheat the oven to 465 degrees F (240 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Lightly grease a baking sheet.
', 'Step 11: Deflate dough and turn out onto a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 12: Knead briefly, then pat or roll dough into a sheet and transfer to the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 13: Brush with remaining oil and make dimples across the surface with your fingertips.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle with rosemary leave and extra salt to taste.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven to desired crispness, about 10 minutes for light and fluffy or 20 minutes for crunchier and darker on the outside.
']

Title: Pesto Tofu Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 pound tri-colored spiral pasta', '¼ cup olive oil', '2 cups milk', '1 (1.2 ounce) package creamy pesto sauce mix', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (16 ounce) package firm tofu, drained and cubed', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 pound fresh mushrooms, coarsely chopped', '1 cup sliced black olives', '1 tablespoon capers', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 sprig fresh basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Stir in spiral pasta, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl, blend 1/4 cup olive oil, milk, and pesto sauce mix.
', 'Step 4: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Place tofu in the skillet, and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir until evenly browned.
', 'Step 7: Remove from heat, and drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 8: Place mushrooms into the skillet, and cook about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the olives, capers, and 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 10: Mix in the tofu and pesto sauce.
', 'Step 11: Continue cooking about 5 minutes before serving over the rotini.
', 'Step 12: Top with remaining Parmesan cheese and basil.
']

Title: Focaccia Alla Genovese
Ingredients: ['½ cup warm water', '½ teaspoon active dry yeast', '2 ½ cups unbleached bread flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ cup cold water', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1/4 cup Biga', '1 tablespoon additional extra-virgin olive oil for brushing', '2 teaspoons cornmeal for dusting']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place 1/2 cup warm water in a small bowl, and sprinkle yeast over the surface.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until yeast is absorbed, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Combine flour and salt in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Make a well in the center, and pour in the cold water, yeast mixture, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and biga.
', 'Step 5: Stir together using a sturdy wooden spoon.
', 'Step 6: When the dough comes together, turn out onto a floured surface, and knead vigorously for about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Take a few 1 to 2 minute breaks if you like.
', 'Step 8: The dough will be somewhat sticky until it is fully kneaded.
', 'Step 9: Form dough into a ball.
', 'Step 10: Rub the inside of a clean bowl with oil, and place the dough in it.
', 'Step 11: Turn to coat the ball with oil.
', 'Step 12: Cover with a towel and let rise at room temperature until doubled in size.
', 'Step 13: This will take about 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 14: Punch down the dough by folding the edges into the center and turning it over so the top is once again smooth.
', 'Step 15: Cover the bowl again, and let the dough rise a second time until doubled, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and gently flatten into an 8 inch square using the palms of your hands.
', 'Step 17: Cover and let rise again.
', 'Step 18: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 19: Place a baking stone in the oven while it preheats.
', 'Step 20: Dust a bakers peel with cornmeal, and gently slide it under the dough square.
', 'Step 21: Use your fingers to make a dimpled surface by pressing them about 3/4 of the way down into the dough.
', 'Step 22: Mist with water.
', 'Step 23: Sprinkle a little cornmeal over the surface of the baking stone.
', 'Step 24: Slide the square off of the peel onto the baking stone.
', 'Step 25: Mist some water into the hot oven, and quickly shut the door.
', 'Step 26: Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until the top is golden brown.
', 'Step 27: Remove from the oven to cool on a wire rack.
', 'Step 28: Brush the surface with remaining olive oil while the foccacia is still hot.
']
