Title: Chocolate Hazelnut Tartufo
Ingredients: ['2 cups whole milk', '1 cup heavy cream', '⅓ cup white sugar', '4 egg yolks', '⅓ cup white sugar', '½ cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®)', '2 tablespoons instant espresso powder', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 ounces fine quality bittersweet chocolate, finely chopped', '8 maraschino cherries', '½ cup frozen whipped topping, thawed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine milk, cream, and 1/3 cup sugar in a medium saucepan over medium heat; stir until the sugar dissolves, about 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: In a separate bowl, beat egg yolks and 1/3 cup sugar until the egg yolks are light in color, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir 1/2 cup of the milk mixture into the egg yolks, then pour all of the egg mixture into the saucepan, stirring continuously.
', 'Step 4: Cook, stirring continuously, until mixture thickens enough to coat the back of a metal spoon, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 6: Add the chocolate hazelnut spread, espresso powder, and vanilla, stirring until well combined.
', 'Step 7: Pour through a mesh strainer into a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Refrigerate several hours until cold.
', "Step 9: Pour into an ice cream maker and freeze according to manufacturer's directions.
", 'Step 10: Transfer gelato into an airtight container and place in freezer until solid.
', 'Step 11: To make the tartufo: Scoop 4-ounce portions of gelato and form into balls using your hands.
', 'Step 12: Poke a hole in each ball and place 1 cherry in each, cover with gelato, and place on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 13: Roll gelato balls in the grated chocolate until coated and return to the freezer until ready to serve.
', 'Step 14: Serve with whipped topping, if desired.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '393.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '39.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '149.7 mg', 'fatContent': '24.4 g', 'fiberContent': '0.9 g', 'proteinContent': '5.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '12.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '56.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '33.8 g'}

Title: Best Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '1 pound ground beef', '1 onion, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '4 cups ricotta cheese', '1 cup grated Romano cheese', '2 ½ cups spaghetti sauce', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 medium zucchini, sliced', '1 cup fresh basil leaves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of water to a rapid boil.
', 'Step 2: Boil lasagna noodles 6 to 8 minutes until al dente.
', 'Step 3: Drain and rinse with cold water.
', 'Step 4: Lay noodles flat and remove excess water with a paper towel.
', 'Step 5: In a skillet, brown the ground beef over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Add onion, salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 7: Cook until there is no remaining pink color in beef.
', 'Step 8: Drain any liquids and set aside.
', 'Step 9: In a large bowl, mix together ricotta cheese, Romano cheese, 2 cups of the spaghetti sauce and the seasoned ground beef.
', 'Step 10: Mix until well blended.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Add a thin layer of spaghetti sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 13: Add a layer of noodles lengthwise and a few noodles in the opposite direction.
', 'Step 14: Pour in a generous layer of ricotta mixture on top of noodles.
', 'Step 15: Top ricotta layer with several basil leaves.
', 'Step 16: Add another layer of noodles lengthwise.
', 'Step 17: Spread on 1 cup of the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 18: Line up the zucchini slices on top of the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 19: Add another thin layer of ricotta cheese.
', 'Step 20: Add the last layer of noodles lengthwise.
', 'Step 21: Top the noodles with the remaining spaghetti sauce, several more basil leaves in an eye catching arrangement and top with the remaining 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 22: Bake in a preheated oven for 50 to 55 minutes.
', 'Step 23: If Mozzarella cheese becomes too browned, loosely cover with a piece of foil.
']

Title: Ricotta Eggplant Rolls
Ingredients: ['½ cup vegetable oil, divided', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes in puree', '1 (10 ounce) can tomato sauce', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 cups plain dried bread crumbs', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '2 eggs', '¼ cup heavy cream', '2 large eggplants, peeled and sliced lengthwise into 1/4 inch slices', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¾ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon fresh parsley, for garnish']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon of the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add garlic, and cook until fragrant and lightly browned.
', 'Step 3: Pour in the crushed tomatoes and tomato sauce.
', 'Step 4: Season with Italian seasoning, salt, sugar, and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Simmer covered over medium-low heat for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat and set aside.
', 'Step 7: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: In a large shallow dish, stir together the bread crumbs and flour.
', 'Step 9: In a separate dish, whisk together the eggs and cream with a fork.
', 'Step 10: Heat the remaining olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 11: Dip each eggplant slice into the egg mixture, then coat with breadcrumbs.
', 'Step 12: Fry each slice until golden brown in the hot oil, turning once.
', 'Step 13: Drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 14: Spread a thin layer of the marinara sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 15: In a large bowl, stir together the ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese and parsley.
', 'Step 16: Spread 2 to 3 tablespoons of the cheese mixture onto one side of each slice of eggplant.
', 'Step 17: Roll up, and place in the baking dish seam side down.
', 'Step 18: Spoon the remaining tomato sauce over the rolls.
', 'Step 19: Cover the baking dish with a lid or aluminum foil.
', 'Step 20: Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 21: Garnish with additional chopped parsley before serving if desired.
']

Title: Chicken Florentine Salad with Orzo Pasta
Ingredients: ['2 cups orzo pasta', '2 (10 ounce) packages baby spinach', '3 cups chopped grilled chicken', '2 roma tomatoes, diced', '½ cup pine nuts', '¼ cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes', '2 tablespoons capers, or to taste', '1 cup balsamic vinegar', '⅓ cup olive oil', '¼ cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '2 cloves garlic, pressed', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook orzo in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 10 to 11 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and rinse under cold water.
', 'Step 4: Mix orzo, spinach, chicken, tomatoes, pine nuts, sun-dried tomatoes, and capers in a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Whisk balsamic vinegar, olive oil, sugar, parsley, basil, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper together in a bowl; drizzle over salad.
', 'Step 6: Toss to coat.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over salad.
']

Title: Hearts of Palm Risotto
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ cup finely chopped onion', '⅔ cup Arborio rice', '¼ cup dry white wine', '3 cups boiling vegetable broth', '½ cup sliced hearts of palm', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon butter']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon of butter and olive oil in a large, heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add the onion; cook and stir until it begins to turn golden brown at the edges, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour in the rice, and stir until the rice is coated in oil and has started to toast, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Reduce the heat to medium and stir in the white wine.
', 'Step 5: Let it cook until it has mostly evaporated, then stir in one-third of the boiling vegetable broth; continue stirring until incorporated.
', 'Step 6: Repeat this process twice more, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 7: Incorporating the broth should take 15 to 20 minutes in all.
', 'Step 8: When the rice is mostly tender, but still has a very slight crunch, stir in the hearts of palm and Parmesan cheese; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Cook for another minute to heat through then stir in parsley and butter, and serve immediately.
']

Title: Strawberry Tiramisu Without Eggs
Ingredients: ['3 ½ cups fresh strawberries, hulled, divided', '7 tablespoons white sugar, divided', '2 lemon, juiced, divided', '2 tablespoons water, or as needed', '2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened', '1 cup heavy whipping cream', '½ (12 ounce) package ladyfinger cookies, or more as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Reserve 3 or 4 strawberries for the garnish.
', 'Step 2: Slice 1/2 of the remaining strawberries and place in a bowl with 2 tablespoons sugar and the juice of 1 lemon.
', 'Step 3: Stir to combine and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Transfer remaining strawberries into a blender.
', 'Step 5: Add 2 1/2 tablespoons sugar and remaining lemon juice.
', 'Step 6: Blend until smooth.
', 'Step 7: Transfer strawberry puree to a small saucepan.
', 'Step 8: Cook over low heat, stirring often, until thickened to a sauce-like consistency, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Taste and add more sugar if strawberry sauce is not sweet enough.
', 'Step 10: Add some water if sauce is too thick.
', 'Step 11: Remove from heat and let cool completely.
', 'Step 12: Combine cream cheese and 2 1/2 tablespoons sugar in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 13: Whip cream in a separate bowl until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 14: Fold into the cream cheese mixture.
', 'Step 15: Arrange ladyfingers snugly in a single layer inside a square glass dish.
', 'Step 16: Pour 1/2 of the strawberry sauce over the ladyfingers.
', 'Step 17: Spread 1/2 of the cream cheese mixture on top.
', 'Step 18: Scatter 1/2 of the marinated sliced strawberries onto the cream cheese mixture.
', 'Step 19: Repeat layers with remaining ladyfingers, sauce, and sliced strawberries.
', 'Step 20: Spread the remaining cream mixture evenly over the top; garnish with the reserved strawberries.
', 'Step 21: Cover tiramisu with plastic wrap and refrigerate, 4 hours to overnight.
']

Title: Caper Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['1 (4 pound) chicken, cut into pieces', 'salt and pepper to taste', '¼ cup olive oil', '2 onions, thinly sliced', '½ cup fresh sliced mushrooms', '1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup', '1 cup white wine', '¼ cup pitted green olives', '¼ cup black olives', '2 tablespoons capers', '8 ounces pepperoni sausage, sliced']

Title: Aphrodisiac Tagliatelle with Blue Cheese Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) box tagliatelle pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup heavy cream', '3 ½ ounces crumbled blue cheese', '⅔ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '1 pinch ground white pepper', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 pinch dried oregano', '1 pinch dried basil', '1 tablespoon toasted walnuts, chopped']

Title: Italian Style Short Ribs
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '3 slices bacon, chopped', '2 pounds beef short ribs, cut into 2 inch pieces', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup beef broth', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '¼ cup red wine', '⅛ teaspoon dried oregano, crushed']

Title: Canadian Moose Lasagna
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '4 mushrooms, sliced', '1 bunch spinach, washed and chopped', '1 (16 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 pound ground moose', '½ teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder', '½ teaspoon brown sugar', '1 (24 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '¾ cup water', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (9 ounce) package no-boil lasagna noodles', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly coat a 9x13 inch pan with olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Heat oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook onions and garlic in oil until tender and semi-transparent.
', 'Step 5: Stir in mushrooms, and cook until soft.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 7: In a sauce pan, combine spinach and 1/4 cup water.
', 'Step 8: Cover, and cook over medium heat until wilted.
', 'Step 9: Drain.
', 'Step 10: In a large bowl, mix together spinach, onion mixture, and ricotta cheese.
', 'Step 11: In a frying pan, brown moose meat over medium-high heat, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 12: When the pink color is almost gone, stir in the cocoa and brown sugar.
', 'Step 13: This removes the gamey-ness.
', 'Step 14: Once the meat is well browned, drain to remove excess grease.
', 'Step 15: Stir in spaghetti sauce and water, and season with oregano, Italian seasoning, and salt and pepper.
', 'Step 16: Ladle enough of the meat sauce into a 9x13 inch baking dish to cover the bottom in a thin layer.
', 'Step 17: Arrange a single layer of oven ready noodles over the sauce.
', 'Step 18: Spread one half of the ricotta cheese mixture over the noodles, and top with some of the tomato sauce and a sprinkle of parmesan and mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 19: Repeat with remaining ingredients, ending with a generous layer of mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 20: Cover pan with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 21: Bake for 45 minutes, or until lasagna is hot and bubbly.
']

Ingredients: ['18 roma (plum) tomatoes', '2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '½ cup butter', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '5 bay leaves', '1 large white onion, chopped', '1 large zucchini, chopped', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '1 red bell pepper, chopped', '1 (8 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, sliced', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '2 teaspoons chili powder', '¼ cup brown sugar', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese']

Title: Hearty Italian Sausage and Bean Soup
Ingredients: ['1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '½ cup chopped onion', '1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste', '10 cups beef broth', '3 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained', '2 (15.5 ounce) cans butter beans, rinsed and drained', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes, undrained', '1 ½ tablespoons minced fresh basil', '1 ½ teaspoons chopped fresh oregano', '2 tablespoons shredded Parmesan cheese, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir sausage, onion, and garlic in the hot skillet until sausage is browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 4: Add broth, black beans, butter beans, diced tomatoes, basil, and oregano; bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 5: Cover and cook for at least 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle each serving with Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Southern Italian Thanksgiving Stuffing
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds bulk Italian sausage', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '6 ounces pancetta bacon, diced', '2 onions, chopped', '7 large stalks celery, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '6 cups day-old French bread, cut into 1/2 inch cubes', '3 cups crumbled cornbread', '1 ½ tablespoons rubbed dried sage', '1 ½ tablespoons poultry seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup toasted pine nuts', '4 cups chicken broth', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ cup butter', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh sage', '1 ounce shaved Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a deep 9x13 inch baking dish or roasting pan.
', 'Step 3: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and stir in the sausage.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir until the sausage is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink.
', 'Step 5: Drain and discard any excess grease.
', 'Step 6: Place the browned sausage into a large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, heat the olive oil and pancetta in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Once the pancetta begins to brown, stir in the onions and celery, and cook until the onion softens and turns translucent, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the garlic, and cook another 3 minutes until the aroma of the garlic mellows.
', 'Step 10: Scrape the onion mixture into the bowl with the crumbled sausage.
', 'Step 11: Add the French bread, cornbread, dried sage, poultry seasoning, salt, and pine nuts; stir well.
', 'Step 12: Pour in the chicken broth and mozzarella cheese; stir until the chicken stock has been absorbed by the bread and the stuffing is evenly mixed.
', 'Step 13: Pack the stuffing into the prepared baking dish, and dot the butter overtop.
', 'Step 14: Cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, then remove the foil, and continue baking until the top has turned golden brown, about 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 16: Sprinkle with the fresh sage and shaved Parmesan cheese to serve.
']

Title: Strawberry Tiramisu Trifle
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon instant coffee granules (such as Nescafe®)', '¼ cup hot water', '1 cup cottage cheese', '¾ cup heavy whipping cream', "½ cup confectioners' sugar", '1 (5.3 ounce) package ladyfinger cookies', '½ (16 ounce) package fresh strawberries, hulled and sliced', '4 whole fresh strawberries']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir instant coffee granules and water together in a bowl until dissolved.
', 'Step 2: Let cool.
', "Step 3: Beat cottage cheese, cream, and confectioners' sugar together in a separate bowl with an electric mixer on medium-high speed until thickened, 1 to 2 minutes.
", 'Step 4: Brush each ladyfinger cookie with coffee.
', 'Step 5: Arrange a few ladyfingers in the bottom of 4 serving glasses.
', 'Step 6: Spread a layer of cream filling atop the ladyfingers.
', 'Step 7: Layer a few strawberry slices atop cream filling.
', 'Step 8: Repeat with remaining ladyfingers, cream filling, and sliced strawberries, ending with a layer of cream filling.
', 'Step 9: Garnish each glass with a whole strawberry.
']

Title: Mexican Lasagna Rollups
Ingredients: ['10 uncooked lasagna noodles', '1 (16 ounce) jar salsa', '1 pound ground beef', '1 (1 ounce) packet taco seasoning mix', '1 (16 ounce) package cottage cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (15.5 ounce) jar prepared salsa con queso sauce', '1 ½ cups shredded Mexican cheese blend']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 2: Once the water is boiling, stir in the lasagna noodles, about 3 or 4 at a time, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook the noodles uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through but is still firm to the bite, about 10 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 4: Drain well in a colander set in the sink, and lay the cooked noodles flat on waxed paper or aluminum foil while you finish cooking the rest of the noodles.
', 'Step 5: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish, and spread the salsa evenly over the bottom of the dish.
', 'Step 7: Place the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat, sprinkle with taco seasoning, and cook and stir the meat, breaking it up as it cooks, until the meat is browned and crumbly, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Drain the fat, and place the meat in a large bowl.
', 'Step 9: Mix cottage cheese and Parmesan cheese into the meat.
', 'Step 10: Place a cooked lasagna noodle out flat, and spread about 1/3 cup of the cheese and meat mixture along the length of the noodle.
', 'Step 11: Roll up the noodle, and place the filled rolls, seam sides down, into the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 12: Spoon about 1 1/2 tablespoons of the queso sauce over each roll.
', 'Step 13: Cover the dish with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until the sauce is hot and bubbling, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Uncover the dish, and spread the Mexican cheese blend over the rolls.
', 'Step 16: Return to the oven, and bake until the cheese is melted, 8 to 10 more minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '395.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '30.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '61.3 mg', 'fatContent': '20.5 g', 'fiberContent': '2.2 g', 'proteinContent': '24.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '1258.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.1 g'}

Title: Meatloaf Roll
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 cup chopped onion', '½ cup chopped green bell pepper', '½ cup chopped celery', '1 (14.5 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes with juice', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 ½ teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons dried oregano', '¾ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '2 cups water', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 ½ pounds ground beef chuck', '½ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon Creole seasoning', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '2 teaspoons Italian seasoning']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To make tomato sauce, heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium-low heat; cook and stir the onion, green pepper, and celery in the hot oil until the onion is soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Pour the undrained whole tomatoes, tomato sauce, 1 1/2 teaspoons Italian seasoning, sugar, oregano, 3/4 teaspoon garlic powder, Worcestershire sauce, and water into a blender and blend until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Pour the tomato mixture into the saucepan and simmer over low heat for 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 4: Stir in 1/4 cup parsley.
', 'Step 5: Set aside.
', 'Step 6: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 8: In a bowl, mix together the ground beef, bread crumbs, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, Creole seasoning, cayenne pepper, and salt until the mixture is thoroughly combined; spread into the bottom of the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 9: Scatter the mozzarella cheese over the meat; spread 1/4 cup of the sauce over the cheese.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle the sauce with 1/4 cup chopped parsley and 2 teaspoons of Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 11: Pick up one end of the meat layer (short side), and gently roll the meat around the filling.
', 'Step 12: Reposition the meat roll in the center of the dish, and pour the remaining tomato sauce over the roll.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until the roll is no longer pink in the center, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 14: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
']

Title: Anise Pizzelles
Ingredients: ['12 eggs', '2 cups white sugar', '2 cups vegetable oil', '½ teaspoon anise oil', '1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger whiskey', '4 cups all-purpose flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, whisk together eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, anise oil, and whiskey until well blended.
', 'Step 2: Gradually stir in flour until fully incorporated.
', 'Step 3: Cover, and refrigerate overnight.
', 'Step 4: Preheat a pizzelle iron, and spray once with cooking spray.
', 'Step 5: Drop tablespoons of batter onto the centers of the patterns.
', 'Step 6: Close the lid, and cook until steam no longer comes out, about 1 1/2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Check, and adjust cooking time if necessary.
', 'Step 8: Carefully remove cookies, cool, and store in an airtight tin at room temperature.
']

Title: Prosciutto Wrapped Melon Balls
Ingredients: ['¼ cup lime juice', '1 honeydew melon, fruit removed with a melon baller', '9 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto', '36 sprigs fresh mint']

', 'Step 2: Stir gently to coat.
', 'Step 3: Wrap each ball with a slice of prosciutto, and secure with a sprig of mint.
', 'Step 4: Arrange on a serving tray.
', 'Step 5: Refrigerate until serving.

Title: Mexican-Style Spaghetti and Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground turkey', '1 ½ teaspoons Mexican-style chili Powder', '1 teaspoon guajillo chile powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ onion, finely chopped', '1 small jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced', '½ Anaheim (New Mexico) chile pepper, seeded and minced', '2 tostada shells, crushed into fine crumbs', '¼ cup bread crumbs', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '½ onion, diced', '1 chipotle chile in adobo sauce, finely chopped', '1 (24 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 tablespoon taco seasoning mix']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place a sheet of aluminum foil onto a baking sheet, and lightly grease with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Place the ground turkey into a large mixing bowl and sprinkle with the Mexican chili powder, guajillo chile powder, salt, black pepper, and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 4: Add the egg, olive oil, chopped onion, jalapeno pepper, and Anaheim pepper.
', 'Step 5: Mix well with your hands until evenly blended, then sprinkle with the tostada crumbs and bread crumbs.
', 'Step 6: Mix again until the bread crumbs are incorporated.
', 'Step 7: Form the meatball mixture into 1-inch balls and place onto the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven until the meatballs have lightly browned and are no longer pink in the center, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Turn the meatballs over after 20 minutes to ensure even cooking.
', 'Step 10: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 11: Once the water is boiling, stir in the spaghetti and return to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 14: After you have flipped the meatballs, stir together the diced tomatoes, diced onion, chipotle chile, spaghetti sauce, and taco seasoning in a large saucepan.
', 'Step 15: Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat, then reduce the heat to medium-low, and simmer 10 to 15 minutes until the onion is tender.
', 'Step 16: Once the meatballs are ready, stir them into the sauce, and cook 5 minutes longer.
', 'Step 17: Spoon the meatballs and sauce over the spaghetti to serve.
']

Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Lightly toss tomato, mozzarella cheese, and avocado cubes in a salad bowl.
', 'Step 2: Mix balsamic vinegar, red wine vinegar, dried basil, sugar, salt, and black pepper in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 3: Pour dressing over salad and mix again to coat.
']

Title: Chef John's Panettone
Ingredients: ['½ cup all-purpose flour', '¼ cup cold water', '¼ cup sourdough starter', '½ cup golden raisins', '½ cup dried cherries, quartered', '½ cup diced dried pineapple', '¼ cup rum', '¼ cup warm water', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '2 large eggs', '⅓ cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon freshly grated lemon zest', '1 tablespoon freshly grated orange zest', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 ¼ teaspoons fine salt', '6 tablespoons butter, at room temperature', '1 large egg', '1 tablespoon water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: The day before baking, mix flour, cold water, and sourdough starter together in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Cover and leave out at room temperature, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 3: At the same time, combine raisins, cherries, and pineapple in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 4: Stir in rum.
', 'Step 5: Let fruit soak, tossing occasionally, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 6: Pour warm water into large bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a dough hook attachment.
', 'Step 7: Add yeast and let dissolve for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add eggs, 1/3 cup plus 2 tablespoons sugar, vanilla extract, orange zest, and lemon zest.
', 'Step 9: Whisk together.
', 'Step 10: Scoop in the panettone starter.
', 'Step 11: Add flour and salt.
', 'Step 12: Knead until dough is very smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stop and scrape down the sides if needed.
', 'Step 14: Add butter; knead until butter is completely mixed in and dough is soft and somewhat sticky, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Transfer to your work surface.
', 'Step 16: Toss and fold your dough into a rough ball shape using wet fingers and a bench scraper.
', 'Step 17: Transfer dough back to the bowl.
', 'Step 18: Cover and let rise until doubled, about 3 hours.
', 'Step 19: Transfer dough back to your work surface and shape into a rough ball.
', 'Step 20: Place into a resealable plastic bag.
', 'Step 21: Refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 22: Remove dough from the bag and press out into a flat rectangle.
', 'Step 23: Sprinkle with flour and roll out to at least 1/2-inch thickness.
', 'Step 24: Spread the dried fruit all over the surface.
', 'Step 25: Roll dough up into a log, sealing in the fruit.
', 'Step 26: Roll both ends of the log toward the middle and smooth it over into a ball.
', 'Step 27: Place dough ball into a short, wide paper panettone mold.
', 'Step 28: Cover with plastic wrap and let rise until dough is at least 2/3 of the way up the sides, 3 to 4 hours.
', 'Step 29: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 30: Mix egg and water together and brush mixture on top of the panettone.
', 'Step 31: Cut 2 slits crosswise on top.
', 'Step 32: Bake in the preheated oven until beautifully browned, 40 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 33: Poke 2 skewers through either side of the panettone and flip it over into a panettone hole or a Dutch oven.
', 'Step 34: Let cool upside-down for 2 hours.
', 'Step 35: Pull out the skewers and slice into pieces.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '290.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '46.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '61.8 mg', 'fatContent': '7.5 g', 'fiberContent': '1.9 g', 'proteinContent': '6.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '305.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '14.4 g'}

Title: Spinach and Ricotta Tortellini
Ingredients: ['10 cups fresh spinach, trimmed', '2 tablespoons water', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 ¼ cups ricotta cheese', '1 ¼ cups grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg', '1 pinch nutmeg', '2 pounds fresh spinach pasta dough', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place spinach, water, and a pinch of salt in a pot over medium-high heat; cover pot and cook until spinach is completely wilted, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain and squeeze out all the water; let spinach cool to room temperature in a colander.
', 'Step 3: Soften ricotta cheese in a large bowl using a fork until creamy.
', 'Step 4: Squeeze out any excess water from the cooled spinach.
', 'Step 5: Finely chop spinach with a knife or process in a blender.
', 'Step 6: Transfer to the bowl with ricotta.
', 'Step 7: Add Parmesan cheese, egg, nutmeg, salt, and pepper; mix well.
', 'Step 8: Divide pasta dough into 6 equal pieces.
', 'Step 9: Take 1 piece and cover the rest with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 10: Flatten the piece between your palms and press through the widest setting of your pasta machine.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle flour over flattened pasta dough, fold in half lengthwise, and run through the pasta machine again.
', 'Step 12: Repeat this process 3 or 4 times, always flouring, folding, and passing through the widest setting until dough is smooth and even in size.
', 'Step 13: Change pasta machine to the middle setting and pass dough through.
', 'Step 14: Move pasta machine setting to the next to the last setting and pass dough through.
', 'Step 15: Cut the sheet in half, widthwise.
', 'Step 16: Pass each half through the pasta machine in the thinnest and last setting, creating 2 long and very thin sheets; gently transfer to a floured work surface, trimming edges.
', 'Step 17: Cut into 2 even rectangles.
', 'Step 18: Cut dough into 1 1/2-inch squares.
', 'Step 19: Drop a teaspoon of ricotta filling in the middle of each square.
', 'Step 20: Brush the edges with water and fold over diagonally into a triangle shape.
', 'Step 21: Press well to squeeze out any air.
', 'Step 22: Stretch the 2 ends of the triangle and a fold them together, wrapping them around your finger; seal.
', 'Step 23: Gently fold back the top corner.
', 'Step 24: Transfer the tortellini to a floured plate or work surface.
', 'Step 25: Proceed the same way with remaining dough and filling.
', 'Step 26: Let tortellini stand for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 27: Bring a pot of generously salted water to a boil; cook tortellini, working in batches, until they float, 6 to 7 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '167.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '26.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '19.2 mg', 'fatContent': '3.2 g', 'fiberContent': '1.3 g', 'proteinContent': '8.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '132.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.6 g'}

Title: Italian Anise Cookies
Ingredients: ['4 large eggs', '1 cup white sugar', '¾ cup vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon anise oil', '5 cups all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons baking powder', "½ cup confectioners' sugar, or more as needed", '2 tablespoons milk, or more as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Beat eggs together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Gradually stir white sugar into beaten eggs until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Slowly pour vegetable oil and anise oil into sugar mixture until incorporated.
', 'Step 4: Mix flour and baking powder together in a separate bowl; slowly add to sugar mixture, stirring with a wooden spoon until dough is dry.
', 'Step 5: Refrigerate dough, 30 minutes to overnight.
', 'Step 6: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Lightly grease a baking sheet.
', 'Step 8: Roll dough into walnut-size balls and arrange on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are crisp around the edges, 12 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Cool cookies on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack.
', "Step 11: Mix confectioners' sugar and milk together in a bowl until desired consistency is reached.
", 'Step 12: Dip a fork into the icing and drizzle over cookies.
', 'Step 13: Allow icing to harden.
']

Title: Italian-Style Zucchini Boats
Ingredients: ['1 drizzle olive oil', '1 extra large zucchini, quartered lengthwise, seeds scooped out', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 pounds ground beef', '1 onion, chopped', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '3 tablespoons dried basil', '3 tablespoons dried oregano', '4 teaspoons garlic salt', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 cup water', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil, or to taste', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 3: Drizzle olive oil on zucchini and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Place on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven until zucchini is fork-tender, 30 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 6: While zucchini is cooking, heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir ground beef with onion and garlic until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in dried basil, dried oregano, and garlic salt.
', 'Step 9: Combine tomato paste with 1 cup of water in a small bowl.
', 'Step 10: Mix thoroughly.
', 'Step 11: Drain fat from beef mixture if needed.
', 'Step 12: Add tomato paste mixture and heat through.
', 'Step 13: Turn off heat, add fresh basil leaves, and mix until well blended.
', 'Step 14: Remove zucchini from the oven; leave the oven on.
', 'Step 15: Scoop meat mixture generously into each zucchini quarter and sprinkle each with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 16: Return to the oven and bake until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
']

Title: Authentic Homemade Italian Egg Pasta Dough
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ cups Italian-style tipo 00 flour', '3 large eggs', '1 pinch salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place flour on a marble or wooden work surface.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the center and crack in eggs; add salt.
', 'Step 3: Gently beat eggs using a fork, incorporating the surrounding flour, until mixture is runny.
', 'Step 4: Pull remaining flour into the center using a bench scraper, incorporating it until dough forms a ball.
', 'Step 5: Knead dough with your hands by flattening the ball, stretching it, and folding the top towards the center.
', 'Step 6: Turn 45 degrees and repeat until dough is soft and smooth, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 8: Place in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 9: Refrigerate until firm, 30 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 10: Roll out the dough with a pasta machine or with a rolling pin and cut into your favorite pasta.
']

Title: Brown Rice and Vegetable Risotto
Ingredients: ['1 quart vegetable broth, or as needed', '5 cups water, or as needed', '½ pound asparagus, cut into 2-inch pieces', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup finely chopped onion', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 cups short-grain brown rice', '2 carrots, peeled and diced', '2 zucchini, diced', '½ cup green peas, thawed if frozen', '⅔ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon butter', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring vegetable broth and water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add asparagus, reduce heat to low, and simmer until just tender, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Use a slotted spoon to transfer asparagus to a bowl of ice water; let chill for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, cover saucepan and keep broth mixture at a near-simmer on low heat.
', 'Step 6: Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Stir in onion and garlic; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add rice and cook, stirring gently, until toasted and fragrant, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Pour 1 cup of the hot broth mixture into the rice and cook, stirring constantly, until liquid is almost absorbed.
', 'Step 10: Adjust heat if necessary to maintain a simmer.
', 'Step 11: Repeat, using 1/2 cup liquid at a time, until rice is just beginning to become tender, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Stir in diced carrots.
', 'Step 13: Continue adding broth and stirring rice mixture until carrots are just tender, about 20 minutes more.
', 'Step 14: Mix in zucchini; if broth mixture gets low, add hot water as needed.
', 'Step 15: Cook and stir, adding broth, until rice is tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Mix in drained asparagus and peas and cook until heated through, 2 to 3 minutes, Add Parmesan and butter, stirring until butter melts.
', 'Step 17: Season to taste with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 18: Pour in an additional 1/2 cup hot broth to the finished risotto for a softer consistency, if desired.
']

Title: Rosemary Tomato Leek Soup

Title: Florentine Cookies
Ingredients: ['⅔ cup butter', '2 cups quick-cooking oats', '1 cup white sugar', '⅔ cup all-purpose flour', '¼ cup corn syrup', '¼ cup milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 cup semisweet chocolate chips (such as Nestle® Toll House®)']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line 2 cookie sheets with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 3: Melt butter in a large saucepan.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat and mix in oats, sugar, flour, corn syrup, milk, vanilla, and salt until well combined.

', 'Step 6: Spread cookies out thin with a rubber spatula.

', 'Step 9: Meanwhile, place chocolate chips in the top of a double boiler over simmering water.
', 'Step 10: Stir frequently, scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching, until chocolate is melted and smooth, about 5 minutes.

', 'Step 12: Spread melted chocolate on 1/2 of the cookies.
', 'Step 13: Top with the remaining cookies.
']

Title: Chombolini (Italian Anise Cake)
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon shortening', '3 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '1 cup unsalted butter, softened to room temperature', '4 eggs, beaten', '⅓ cup orange juice', '⅓ cup milk', '2 tablespoons anise extract', '1 drop lemon extract', '1 cup chopped dates', '½ cup chopped walnuts']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a fluted tube pan (such as Bundt®) with shortening and dust with flour.
', 'Step 3: Sift flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl.
', 'Step 4: Mix sugar and butter in a bowl with a spoon until creamy.
', 'Step 5: Mix in eggs.
', 'Step 6: Combine orange juice and milk in a separate bowl; pour into the sugar mixture.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the flour mixture, anise, and lemon extract until well combined.
', 'Step 8: Fold in dates and walnuts.
', 'Step 9: Pour batter into the prepared pan.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until the top of the cake springs back when touched and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 45 minutes to 1 hour.

Title: Cannoli II

Title: Easy Shrimp Fra Diavolo
Ingredients: ['1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined', '2 tablespoons red pepper flakes', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 vine-ripe tomatoes, seeded', '1 tablespoon butter, or to taste', '1 cup dry white wine', 'olive oil', '½ white onion, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '3 plum tomatoes, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons dried basil', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '1 tablespoon dried oregano']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place shrimp in a resealable container or zip-top bag.
', 'Step 2: Add red pepper flakes, lemon juice, and salt; toss together.
', 'Step 3: Seal and let marinate for 1 hour.
', 'Step 4: Pulse vine tomatoes in a blender until smooth.
', 'Step 5: Melt butter in a frying pan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 6: Add marinated shrimp and increase heat to medium.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir until slightly browned on the outsides but not cooked through, about 1 1/2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove shrimp and set aside.
', 'Step 9: Add a splash of white wine to the frying pan and scrape up any browned bits from the bottom using a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 10: Pour in olive oil.
', 'Step 11: Add onion to the hot oil and saute until translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Stir in garlic and cook for 30 seconds.
', 'Step 13: Pour in remaining wine and cook until reduced by half, 6 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Add the pureed tomatoes, plum tomatoes, basil, parsley, and oregano to the sauce.
', 'Step 15: Reduce heat to medium-low.
', 'Step 16: Simmer, stirring frequently, until flavors combine, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Toss shrimp back into the pan and cook until heated through, about 5 minutes more.
']

Title: Pasta alla Norma (Eggplant Pasta)
Ingredients: ['3 eggplant', 'coarse salt', '5 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided', '1 clove garlic', '1 (18 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 small bunch fresh basil, chopped, divided', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 (8 ounce) container ricotta cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Wash eggplants, cut off the ends, and cut into 1/3-inch slices.
', 'Step 2: Layer eggplant slices in a large bowl, sprinkling coarse salt over each layer.
', 'Step 3: Let sit for at least 2 hours to draw out any bitterness.
', 'Step 4: In the meantime, prepare the tomato sauce.
', 'Step 5: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat and cook garlic until browned, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove garlic.
', 'Step 7: Add peeled tomatoes and bring to a boil; cook until tomatoes start breaking down, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat and simmer until sauce thickens, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 10: Add 2/3 of the basil and simmer for another 3 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Rinse eggplant slices under cold running water and pat dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 12: Heat remaining 3 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat and fry the eggplant slices in batches until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 13: Drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 14: Cut into small cubes.
', 'Step 15: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 16: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Drain.
', 'Step 18: Mix eggplant pieces into the tomato sauce.
', 'Step 19: Simmer for 10 minutes over low heat.
', 'Step 20: Stir in ricotta and mix well.
', 'Step 21: Season with salt, pepper, and remaining basil.
', 'Step 22: Mix in drained spaghetti and cook until warm, about 3 minutes.
']

Title: Italian Style Winter Soup
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons chopped onion', '4 (3.5 ounce) links Italian sausage, sliced', '8 cups chicken stock', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '2 cups uncooked white rice', '½ cup heavy cream']

Title: Pasta with Ricotta and Turmeric

Title: Italian White Bean and Pancetta Soup

Title: Tiramisu al Marsala
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups brewed espresso coffee, cooled', '1 ¼ cups Marsala wine', '4 medium eggs, separated', '½ cup white sugar, divided', '14 ounces mascarpone cheese', '40 Savoiardi biscuits (ladyfingers)', '3 tablespoons cocoa powder, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon chocolate shavings, or to taste']

', 'Step 4: Beat the egg whites with the remaining sugar in a separate bowl using an electric mixer until they form peaks; fold gently into mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 5: Dip half of the savoiardi biscuits into coffee-Marsala mixture.
', 'Step 6: Arrange dipped biscuits carefully in a glass dish.
', 'Step 7: Cover dipped biscuits with half of the mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 8: Smooth out mascarpone until evenly distributed; top with half of the cocoa powder.
', 'Step 9: Repeat layering with dipped savoiardi biscuits, mascarpone mixture, and cocoa powder; top with chocolate shavings.

Title: Cheesy Butternut Squash Pasta Sauce

Title: Cube Steaks Parmigiana with Fresh Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '8 Roma tomatoes - peeled, seeded, and chopped', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup fresh basil leaves, thinly sliced', '4 cube steaks', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon garlic salt', '2 eggs', '1 cup garlic-and-herb panko bread crumbs', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed', '1 (8 ounce) package fresh mozzarella, thinly sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a saucepan and cook garlic until lightly golden brown and fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 2: Carefully add tomatoes, tomato paste, salt, and pepper; stir to combine.
', 'Step 3: Simmer sauce, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat and mix in basil.
', 'Step 5: Stir to combine, taste, and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Set aside.
', 'Step 7: Season cube steaks with salt and pepper on both sides.
', 'Step 8: Set 3 shallow dishes on the counter.
', 'Step 9: Add flour and garlic salt to the first, beaten eggs to the second, and bread crumbs to the third.
', 'Step 10: Season eggs with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
', 'Step 11: Coat each cube steak lightly with flour and tap off excess.
', 'Step 12: Dip cube steak in beaten eggs, allowing excess egg to drip off before turning cube steak in bread crumbs.
', 'Step 13: Press bread crumbs into the cube steak to make sure they adhere.
', 'Step 14: Transfer breaded cube steak to a wire rack-lined baking sheet.
', 'Step 15: Continue this process until all cube steaks are coated.
', 'Step 16: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat until shimmering.
', 'Step 17: Place cube steak gently into the skillet and cook on the first side until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Turn over carefully and cook on the second side until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes longer.
', 'Step 19: Return to the baking sheet to drain.
', "Step 20: Set an oven rack about 8 to 10 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 21: Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 22: Transfer cube steaks to the lined baking sheet and place the sliced mozzarella cheese evenly on top.
', 'Step 23: Broil until mozzarella has melted and begins to brown, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Spoon the tomato sauce over each cube steak before serving.
']

Title: Stuffed Peppers Italian Style
Ingredients: ['4 green bell peppers, halved and seeded', '1 (1 pound) loaf stale Italian bread, crumbled', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (2 ounce) can anchovy fillets, chopped', '8 pitted green olives, chopped', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place peppers in a greased baking dish; set aside.
', 'Step 3: Place crumbled bread in a large bowl, and sprinkle with 1/2 cup water; set aside.
', 'Step 4: Heat oil in a large heavy skillet over low heat.
', 'Step 5: Saute onion until translucent, then stir in garlic.
', 'Step 6: Let garlic cook for 2 minutes, then stir into bread.
', 'Step 7: Add anchovies, olives, olive oil, black pepper and red pepper.
', 'Step 8: Mix until well blended.
', 'Step 9: Mound pepper halves with stuffing.
', 'Step 10: Surround peppers with tomato sauce and a small amount of water.
', 'Step 11: Cover with foil.
', 'Step 12: Bake in preheated oven for 45 to 60 minutes, or until peppers are tender.
', 'Step 13: Uncover for the last 15 minutes of baking, and baste occasionally with sauce.

Title: Sesame Seed Cookies I
Ingredients: ['4 cups all-purpose flour', '1 cup white sugar', '1 ½ cups shortening', '¾ cup milk', '1⁄16 teaspoon anise oil', '2 ounces sesame seeds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine flour and sugar in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Cut in shortening with a pastry blender-or work with your hands - until mixture resembles coarse meal.
', 'Step 3: Add anise oil (optional) small amount for it is very strong, to 1/2 cup of the milk and add to flour mixture.
', 'Step 4: Gradually add more of the milk mixing until dough holds together.
', 'Step 5: Pull off small portions of dough and roll between palms of the hands into a roll about finger size.
', 'Step 6: Roll in sesame seeds.
', 'Step 7: Seeds stick better if put in sugared water and taken out and put on a clean lintless cloth.
', 'Step 8: Roll on cloth with seeds, then flatten out too about 1/4-inch thickness.
', 'Step 9: Cut into 2 inch strips, place on ungreased baking sheet.
', 'Step 10: Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes, or until golden brown.
', 'Step 11: Remove, cool completely, then store in an airtight container.
']

Title: Italian Special Sweet Fried Ravioli Cookies
Ingredients: ['4 (1 ounce) squares semisweet chocolate', '1 (1 ounce) square unsweetened chocolate', '2 cups shortening for frying', '1 cup garbanzo beans, drained and pureed', '1 cup white sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ cup pureed dates', '¾ cup ground walnuts', '3 eggs', '¼ cup melted shortening', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '¼ cup white sugar', '¼ teaspoon salt', "⅓ cup confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt semisweet chocolate and unsweetened chocolate in the top of a double boiler or in a bowl in the microwave.
', 'Step 2: Stir until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Set aside to cool.
', 'Step 4: Heat the 2 cups shortening in a large, heavy skillet or deep fryer.
', 'Step 5: In a small bowl, stir together the pureed garbanzo beans, sugar, and cinnamon.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the dates and nuts.
', 'Step 7: Blend with the cooled chocolate.
', 'Step 8: Chill while you make the dough.
', 'Step 9: In a medium bowl, beat the eggs until fluffy.
', 'Step 10: Stir in the 1/4 cup melted shortening.
', 'Step 11: Sift together the flour, sugar, and salt, and fold into the egg mixture.
', 'Step 12: Add extra flour if necessary to make the dough easy to handle.
', 'Step 13: On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/8 inch thickness.
', 'Step 14: Cut into 3 inch circles using a cookie cutter or a large drinking glass.
', 'Step 15: Place 1 teaspoon of the chocolate filling mixture onto the center of each cookie, fold over into a half circle, and pinch to seal.
', 'Step 16: Fry cookies in 1 1/2 inches of hot oil, turning once.
', 'Step 17: Cookies should be light brown.
', 'Step 18: Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 19: Refrigerate when cool.
', "Step 20: Sprinkle with confectioners' sugar before serving.
"]

Title: Meatball Grinder
Ingredients: ['Meatballs:', '1 cup soft bread crumbs', '1 cup dry bread crumbs', '½ cup milk', '1 pound ground beef', '1 pound sweet Italian sausage', '1 cup prepared marinara sauce', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 cup olive oil for frying', '1 cup prepared marinara sauce', 'Filling:', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, sliced', '1 red bell pepper, sliced', '1 serrano pepper, sliced', '2 tablespoons Marsala wine', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', 'Assembly:', '4 Italian-style hoagie buns, split lengthwise', '1 cup mascarpone cheese, divided', '¼ cup garlic basil spread (see footnote for recipe link)', '4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '½ cup chopped fresh basil, divided', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine soft bread crumbs, dry bread crumbs, and milk in a large bowl and allow to soak until the bread crumbs absorb most of the milk, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add ground beef, Italian sausage, 1 cup marinara sauce, eggs, garlic, Italian seasoning, and red pepper flakes and mix until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 4: Form into 16 large meatballs.
', 'Step 5: Heat 1 cup olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Cook meatballs until browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Transfer to a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Bring 1 cup marinara sauce to a simmer in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Add cooked meatballs and heat through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir onion, red bell pepper, and serrano pepper in the hot oil until onion softens, 5 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Add Marsala wine, salt, and black pepper; cook until wine has evaporated and onion turns golden, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Spread each hoagie bun with 1/4 cup mascarpone cheese and 1 tablespoon garlic basil spread.
', 'Step 13: Place four meatballs and a spoonful of marinara sauce on top.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle each sandwich with 1 cup mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 15: Place sandwiches onto a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and buns are toasted, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Top each sandwich with 1/4 of the onion mixture; garnish each sandwich with 2 tablespoons of basil and 2 tablespoons of Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Lighter Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '1 cup low-fat cottage cheese', '1 egg', 'cooking spray', '1 onion, chopped', '2 large garlic cloves, minced', '2 cups chopped mushrooms', '1 cup shredded carrots', '1 pound ground turkey breast', '1 (26 ounce) jar low-fat pasta sauce (such as Healthy Request®)', '1 cup water', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary, crushed', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '6 no-boil lasagna noodles', '1 cup shredded low-fat mozzarella cheese', '1 cup tomato-vegetable juice cocktail']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Mix the spinach, cottage cheese, and egg in a large bowl.
', 'Step 3: Place a large skillet over medium-high heat, and coat with nonstick cooking spray.
', 'Step 4: Cook the onion, garlic, mushrooms, and carrot until the onion is soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add the ground turkey, and stir until cooked through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Pour the pasta sauce and water into the skillet.
', 'Step 7: Season with rosemary,oregano, and basil.
', 'Step 8: Simmer sauce for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Spray a 9x13 baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.
', 'Step 10: Spread 1/3 of the sauce on the bottom of the pan, and top with 3 noodles.
', 'Step 11: Spoon an additional 1/3 of the sauce on the noodles; top with the spinach mixture.
', 'Step 12: Sprinkle with 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 13: Top with remaining 3 noodles and the rest of the sauce.
', 'Step 14: Pour the vegetable juice evenly over the lasagna, and top with the remaining mozzarella.
', 'Step 15: Cover the dish with foil.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Remove foil, and bake for an additional 10 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Remove from oven and let lasagna rest for 10 to 15 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Raspberry Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['1 pound fresh or frozen raspberries', '6 tablespoons white sugar', '1 cup white sugar', '⅓ cup hot water', '¼ cup brandy-based orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)', '½ cup cold water', '4 egg yolks', '6 tablespoons white sugar', '1 pound mascarpone cheese', '4 egg whites', '6 tablespoons white sugar', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '12 ounces ladyfingers', '4 ounces grated semisweet chocolate', '3 tablespoons sliced almonds, toasted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium bowl, combine raspberries with 6 tablespoons sugar.
', 'Step 2: Crush a few of the berries; set aside.
', 'Step 3: In a small bowl, dissolve 1 cup sugar in 1/3 cup hot water.
', 'Step 4: When dissolved, stir in Grand Marnier and cold water; set aside.
', 'Step 5: Beat egg yolks with 6 tablespoons sugar until ribbons form, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: mix in mascarpone until smooth.
', 'Step 7: In a large glass or metal mixing bowl, with clean beaters, beat egg whites until foamy.
', 'Step 8: Gradually add 6 tablespoons sugar, continuing to beat until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 9: Fold 1/3 of the whites into the mascarpone mixture, then quickly fold in remaining whites until no streaks remain.
', 'Step 10: Brush ladyfingers on both sides with Grand Marnier syrup.
', 'Step 11: Place on bottom and sides of a 9x13 inch glass baking dish.
', 'Step 12: Spoon raspberries evenly over ladyfingers.
', 'Step 13: Spread 1/2 of the mascarpone mixture over the raspberries.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle chocolate shavings over cream, then cover with the remaining cream mixture.
', 'Step 15: Top with toasted almonds.
', 'Step 16: Cover with plastic, and refrigerate overnight.
']

Title: Scallop and Prosciutto Bites
Ingredients: ['1 pound large scallops', '4 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto', 'toothpicks', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons white wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Wrap each scallop with a thin slice of prosciutto and secure with a toothpick.
', 'Step 2: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Place the scallops into the pan, and cook for about 2 minutes on each side.
', 'Step 4: Season each side with pepper as it is cooking.
', 'Step 5: Once each side has been fried, sprinkle the white wine over the scallops, and cook for another 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove the scallops from the pan to drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 7: When slightly cooled, transfer to a serving tray, and remove the toothpicks to serve.
']

Title: Risotto alla Pavese
Ingredients: ['6 cups vegetable broth', '18 ounces fresh cranberry beans, shelled', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons butter', '1 small onion, diced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 sprig fresh rosemary', '1 fresh bay leaf', '1 sprig fresh sage', '1 ¼ cups uncooked carnaroli rice', '½ cup dry white wine', '¾ cup tomato sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour vegetable broth into a large saucepan and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add fresh cranberry beans and return to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat and simmer until beans are soft but not mushy, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove beans with a slotted spoon, leaving the vegetable broth over the heat source on medium-low.
', 'Step 5: Heat olive oil and butter in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Add onion, garlic, whole rosemary sprig, bay leaf, and sage.
', 'Step 7: Sauté until onion is soft and translucent, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add rice and stir to toast the rice, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Once rice is toasted, add drained beans and stir until well coated.
', 'Step 10: Add white wine and stir until wine is fully absorbed.
', 'Step 11: Add 1/2 cup broth to the rice and stir until the broth is absorbed.
', 'Step 12: Continue adding 1/2 cup of broth at a time, stirring continuously, until the liquid is absorbed and the rice is al dente.
', 'Step 13: Add tomato sauce and stir until creamy and thick.
', 'Step 14: This whole process will take about 18 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove risotto from the heat source and let stand for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Remove rosemary twig, bay leaf, and sage and serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '931.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '145.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '22.9 mg', 'fatContent': '21.2 g', 'fiberContent': '34.4 g', 'proteinContent': '36.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '1002.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.4 g'}

Title: Chicken Piccata with Fettuccine
Ingredients: ['6 ounces fettuccine', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon lemon-pepper seasoning', '1 pound chicken breasts, cut into four 1/2-inch thick pieces', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '⅓ cup white wine', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons water', '½ teaspoon chicken bouillon granules', '1 tablespoon capers, rinsed and drained', '½ lemon, cut into wedges, or as desired', '4 sprigs fresh parsley, or as desired']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the fettuccine, bring back to a boil, and cook pasta over medium heat until cooked through but still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain.
', 'Step 4: Whisk flour and lemon-pepper seasoning together in a shallow bowl; dredge chicken through mixture until evenly coated, shaking excess back into bowl.
', 'Step 5: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat; cook chicken until light golden brown and no longer pink in the center, 6 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Transfer chicken to a plate, retaining oil mixture in the skillet.
', 'Step 8: Mix white wine, lemon juice, water, and chicken bouillon granules into oil mixture in the skillet.
', 'Step 9: Bring liquid to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off of the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon until sauce is slightly reduced, 2 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir capers into sauce.
', 'Step 11: Divide pasta among serving plates; top with chicken.
', 'Step 12: Spoon sauce over chicken and garnish with lemon wedges and parsley.
']

Title: Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['3 slices bacon, chopped', '1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 large onion, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 cup sliced mushrooms', '1 cup red wine', '2 teaspoons brown sugar', '½ cup balsamic vinegar', '½ cup baby carrots, sliced', '1 tablespoon red wine', '2 teaspoons cornstarch']

['Step 1: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet.
', 'Step 2: Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown.
', 'Step 3: Saute chicken in bacon grease, with salt and pepper, until browned.
', 'Step 4: Discard bacon and set chicken aside.
', 'Step 5: To the pan add butter and melt; saute onion, garlic and mushrooms until onions are transparent.
', 'Step 6: Stir in 1 cup wine, brown sugar and vinegar.
', 'Step 7: Cook, stirring, until hot and bubbly; add chicken and carrots.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to medium and cook 30 minutes, until chicken is well cooked and carrots are tender crisp.
', 'Step 9: Blend together 1 tablespoon wine and cornstarch.
', 'Step 10: Stir into chicken and mix well to thicken.
']

Title: Smoked Turkey and Spring Pea Fettuccine
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1 tablespoon minced shallot', '6 ounces smoked turkey, cut into strips', '1 ¾ cups heavy whipping cream', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '8 ounces fettuccine', '½ cup green peas', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh tarragon leaves', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or to taste - divided']

['Step 1: Set a heavy skillet over medium heat and pour olive oil into the skillet.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir garlic and shallot in the hot oil until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 3: Add smoked turkey to skillet; cook and stir until heated, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Pour heavy cream into the skillet and raise heat to medium-high; bring sauce to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until sauce has thickened slightly, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the fettuccine, bring back to a boil, and cook pasta over medium heat until cooked through but still firm to the bite, 7 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain.
', 'Step 10: Turn heat under cream sauce to low and stir in peas; toss fettuccine with sauce until coated.
', 'Step 11: Mix in tarragon and lemon zest and cook until flavors have blended, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 12: Adjust seasonings if desired.
', 'Step 13: Serve in bowls and sprinkle each serving with about 3/4 teaspoon Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese for garnish.
']

Title: Cantuccini
Ingredients: ['9 ounces all-purpose flour', '9 ounces superfine sugar', '2 medium eggs', '1 egg yolk', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 ounces roughly chopped hazelnuts', '1 ½ ounces roughly chopped almonds', '1 teaspoon whole anise seeds', '1 egg yolk', '1 tablespoon water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Combine flour, sugar, eggs, egg yolk, baking powder, and vanilla extract in a food processor.
', 'Step 4: Blend until the mixture forms a ball, scraping the sides of the bowl once or twice.
', 'Step 5: Turn mixture onto a lightly floured surface and knead in hazelnuts, almonds, and anise seeds.
', 'Step 6: Beat egg yolk and water together in a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Divide dough into 3 pieces and roll into logs about 1 1/2 inches wide.
', 'Step 8: Place onto the prepared baking sheet at least 2 inches apart.

', 'Step 12: Cut logs diagonally into 1-inch slices and lay cut-sides down on the baking sheet.
', 'Step 13: Return cantuccini to the oven until dry and firm, 30 to 40 minutes more.

']

Title: Spicy Eggplant and Pasta with Pancetta
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '⅓ pound pancetta bacon, diced', '1 eggplant, diced', '1 (28 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '1 (10.5 ounce) container cherry tomatoes, halved', '½ cup red wine', '2 teaspoons red pepper flakes, or to taste', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper, or to taste', '1 teaspoon garlic salt, or to taste', '1 pinch white sugar, or to taste', '1 pinch ground white pepper, or to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package penne pasta']

Title: Vegetarian Baked Ziti
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cups cubed eggplant', '2 cups cubed zucchini', '2 large tomatoes, chopped', '1 medium red bell pepper, cubed', '1 medium onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste', '2 teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (16 ounce) package ziti pasta', '1 (32 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 (15 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes', '½ cup non-dairy Parmesan cheese substitute', '1 (16 ounce) package sliced fresh mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray a 3-quart baking dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Heat oil in a large saute pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Add eggplant, zucchini, tomatoes, bell pepper, onion, and garlic; cook, stirring occasionally until vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle with Italian seasoning and salt; stir to combined.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 7: Add ziti and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Drain and rinse in cold water.
', 'Step 9: Mix spaghetti sauce and diced tomatoes together in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 10: Spread 1/3 of the sauce mixture in the bottom of the prepared casserole.
', 'Step 11: Layer ingredients as follows: 1/2 of the ziti, 1/2 of the vegetable mixture, 1/2 of the Parmesan substitute, 1/2 of the mozzarella slices, 1/2 of the remaining sauce, all of the remaining ziti, all of the remaining vegetables, all of the remaining Parmesan substitute, and all of the remaining sauce.
', 'Step 12: Set remaining mozzarella slices aside.
', 'Step 13: Cover loosely and bake in the preheated oven until bubbly, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove from the oven, uncover, and top with remaining mozzarella slices.
', 'Step 15: Return to the oven and bake, uncovered, until cheese is melted and slightly browned, 10 to 15 minutes longer.
']

Title: Cheesy Chicken Florentine Casserole
Ingredients: ['4 (4 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '½ cup unsalted butter', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 cups shredded Parmesan cheese', '1 ½ pints heavy cream', '1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of broccoli soup', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano, or to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil, or to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, or to taste', '1 teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place chicken breasts on a parchment-line baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Bake in the preheated oven until just light pink, 15 to 20 minutes; they will not be fully cooked.
', 'Step 4: While the chicken is cooking, melt 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons butter in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted.
', 'Step 6: Add heavy cream, condensed soup, oregano, basil, parsley, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low and cook until thickened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Arrange spinach over the bottom of a 9-inch square baking dish.
', 'Step 9: Pour about 1 1/2 cups sauce over the spinach, then arrange chicken breasts over top.
', 'Step 10: Cover with remaining sauce and sprinkle with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 11: Return to the oven and bake until bubbly and lightly browned, 20 to 25 minutes.
']

Title: Authentic Sicilian Granita al Limone
Ingredients: ['2 cups water', '1 cup white sugar', '1 cup freshly squeezed Meyer lemon juice', '5 lemon wheels', '2 tablespoons lemon zest']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour water and sugar into a saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Heat over medium, stirring until sugar melts; do not bring to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat when the sugar has completely dissolved and the water is no longer cloudy.
', 'Step 4: Add lemon juice and stir until combined.
', 'Step 5: Refrigerate until cold, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Pour into a freezer-safe dish that has a tight lid.
', 'Step 7: Cover and put into the freezer until it begins to freeze around the edges, but is still slushy in the center, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Lightly stir the crystals from the edge of the granita mixture into the center using a fork and mix thoroughly.
', 'Step 9: Replace the lid.
', 'Step 10: Close the freezer and chill until granita is nearly frozen, 30 to 40 more minutes.
', 'Step 11: Mix lightly with a fork as before, scraping the crystals loose.
', 'Step 12: Repeat freezing and stirring with the fork 3 to 4 times until crystals are separate and the granita is light, dry, and fluffy.
', 'Step 13: Serve each portion with 1/2 of a lemon wheel and fresh lemon zest on top.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '95.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '28.3 g', 'fatContent': '0.2 g', 'fiberContent': '2.9 g', 'proteinContent': '0.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '3.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '20.6 g'}

Title: Classic Italian Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['6 large eggs, separated, divided', '3 tablespoons sugar', '2 (8.8 ounce) containers mascarpone cheese', '4 tablespoons amaretto liqueur, divided', '1 ½ cups brewed espresso, cooled', '1 ½ (12 ounce) packages ladyfingers (about 30)', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine egg yolks and sugar in a bowl and beat with an electric mixer until light and creamy.
', 'Step 2: Add mascarpone cheese and 2 tablespoons amaretto.
', 'Step 3: Beat well.
', 'Step 4: Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl with clean beaters until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 5: Fold beaten egg whites into the mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 6: Pour espresso and remaining 2 tablespoons amaretto into a shallow dish.
', 'Step 7: Stir well.
', 'Step 8: Working one at a time, quickly dip each ladyfinger into the espresso mixture and line the bottom of an 8-inch glass dish.
', 'Step 9: Once the bottom of the dish is covered in an even layer of espresso-soaked ladyfingers, top with 1/2 the mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 10: Repeat with another ladyfinger layer, followed by the remaining mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 11: Chill in the refrigerator for about 4 hours.
', 'Step 12: Dust with cocoa powder before serving.
']

['Step 1: Place green bell pepper, carrot, and garlic cloves into a food processor and pulse a few times until the vegetables are very finely chopped.
', 'Step 2: n Transfer chopped vegetables into a large saucepan.

', 'Step 4: Reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered until sauce has thickened, about 30 minutes.

', 'Step 6: Sauce may be refrigerated up to 1 week.
']

Title: Sicilian Grilled Vegetable Salad
Ingredients: ['1 large eggplant, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch slices', '1 large sweet onion, peeled and halved', '1 red bell pepper, halved and seeded', '1 green bell pepper, halved and seeded', '1 small zucchini, cut into 1/2-inch slices', '8 fresh tomatoes, chopped', '¼ cup balsamic vinegar', '¼ cup olive oil', '12 fresh basil leaves', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 2: Place eggplant, onion, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, and zucchini on the grill and cook until slightly softened and grill marks have formed on each side, 15 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove vegetables from grill and cut into cubes.
', 'Step 4: Transfer to a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Add tomatoes, vinegar, olive oil, basil, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Toss thoroughly.
', 'Step 7: Refrigerate 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 8: Toss again before serving.
']

Title: Sausage Risotto
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons butter, divided', '1 (4 ounce) mild Italian sausage link, casing removed', '4 tablespoons diced shallots', '½ teaspoon salt, or more to taste', '1 cup Arborio rice', '½ cup Chardonnay wine', '4 cups chicken broth, or more as needed', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '3 sprigs fresh thyme, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a saute pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add sausage and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add shallots, 1 tablespoon butter, and 1/2 teaspoon salt; saute until shallots begin to caramelize, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove from the heat and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a heavy saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add Arborio rice and stir until it begins to brown, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add wine and continue stirring until almost absorbed, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Begin to add broth, 1/2 cup at a time.
', 'Step 9: Stir until broth is almost completely absorbed, then add another 1/2 cup and repeat.
', 'Step 10: Continue adding broth until risotto resembles a thick porridge but still has some bite to it.
', 'Step 11: This process will take 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Remove from the heat.
', 'Step 13: Stir in the sausage mixture, Parmesan cheese, and remaining 1 tablespoon butter.
', 'Step 14: Season with salt if necessary.
', 'Step 15: Garnish with thyme sprigs and serve immediately.
']

Title: Mama Kathy's Minestrone
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds ground beef', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '2 (14 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '2 cups water', '1 (15 ounce) can baby peas', '1 cup finely chopped carrots', '1 (14 ounce) can chopped spinach, drained', '1 beef bouillon cube', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup uncooked elbow macaroni', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning']

', 'Step 2: Cook until beef is evenly brown and onion is tender.

', 'Step 4: Transfer beef, onion, and garlic to a large pot.
', 'Step 5: Mix in tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, peas, carrots, spinach, bouillon cube, and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a boil.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low, and cook 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 8: Add more water or tomato sauce as needed.

', 'Step 10: Season with Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 11: Continue cooking 10 minutes, or until macaroni is tender.
']
