Title: Chicken with Chanterelle Mushrooms and Marsala Wine
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon paprika', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '2 tablespoons butter', '½ pound sliced chanterelle mushrooms', '4 tablespoons butter', 'salt and ground black pepper, or to taste', '1 cup chicken broth', '½ cup dry Marsala wine', '1 teaspoon dried tarragon, crushed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir flour and paprika together in a shallow dish.
', 'Step 2: Remove and set aside 1 tablespoon of the flour mixture for later use.
', 'Step 3: Dredge the chicken in the flour mixture to coat evenly.
', 'Step 4: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir chanterelle mushrooms in melted butter until they release their liquid and begin to brown, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Transfer mushrooms to a bowl and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Melt 4 tablespoons butter in the skillet.
', 'Step 7: Cook the chicken breasts in the melted butter until browned, about 3 minutes per side; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 8: Return the cooked mushrooms to the skillet and stir in chicken broth, reserved 1 tablespoon of flour-paprika mixture, Marsala wine, and dried tarragon.
', 'Step 9: Place a cover on the skillet, reduce heat to low, and cook until the sauce is thick, the chicken is no longer pink in the center, and the juices run clear, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 10: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of a chicken breast should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Grilled Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients: ['2 (1 pound) eggplants, sliced into 1/2-inch rounds', '7 tablespoons extra virgin-olive oil, divided', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon salt, divided', '1 shallot, halved', '2 (10 ounce) baskets cherry tomatoes', 'skewers', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, halved', '½ teaspoon crushed red chili flakes', '1 pound fresh mozzarella, cut into thin slices', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '6 sprigs fresh basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place eggplant in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Add 4 tablespoons olive oil, lemon juice, and 1/4 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 3: Stir to combine and let marinade for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Preheat an outdoor grill to medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 5: Thread shallot and tomatoes onto skewers and brush 1 tablespoon of olive oil over them.
', 'Step 6: Grill for 4 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Flip and grill 4 minutes more.
', 'Step 8: Transfer grilled tomatoes and shallot to a blender.
', 'Step 9: Add vinegar, garlic, crushed chili flakes, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil.
', 'Step 10: Pulse until blended but still chunky.
', 'Step 11: Set aside.
', 'Step 12: Grill eggplant slices for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Flip, and sprinkle the remaining 1/4 teaspoon of salt over them.
', 'Step 14: Top each with a slice of mozzarella and grill until cheese begins to melt, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Spoon tomato mixture on a serving platter.
', 'Step 16: Top with eggplant.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle grated Parmesan cheese over the top and garnish with fresh basil.
']

Title: Pasta with Spinach Pesto Sauce

Title: Mozzarella Basil Bread
Ingredients: ['2 cups warm water (100 degrees F/40 degrees C)', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon active dry yeast', '1 tablespoon salt', '4 cups bread flour, or as needed', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup milk', '1 tablespoon dried basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix warm water with sugar in a large mixing bowl until the sugar has dissolved.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle yeast over the surface of the water, and let stand until the yeast begins to form a creamy layer on the water.
', 'Step 3: Stir the yeast into the water.
', 'Step 4: Stir in salt, and 1 cup of bread flour, and beat the flour in to form a loose batter.
', 'Step 5: Stir in 1 more cup of flour, and mix in the mozzarella cheese, milk, and basil.
', 'Step 6: Mix in the remaining 2 cups of flour in 1/2-cup additions.
', 'Step 7: Turn the dough out onto a well-floured work surface, and knead until the dough is thoroughly mixed, but still sticky, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add flour into the dough as you knead, if necessary.
', 'Step 9: Form the dough into a ball, and place into an oiled bowl.
', 'Step 10: Turn the dough over in the bowl to oil the surface of the dough, and cover with a cloth.
', 'Step 11: Allow to rise until double, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 12: With your fist, press firmly on the dough to deflate the large bubbles.
', 'Step 13: Turn the dough out onto a well-floured work surface, and knead the dough just long enough to eliminate the remaining bubbles in the dough, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 14: Cut the dough into 2 equal pieces, and form each half into a round ball.
', 'Step 15: Spray a baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray, and place the balls onto the baking sheet.
', 'Step 16: With a sharp knife, slash an X into the top of each loaf.
', 'Step 17: Cover the loaves with a towel, and let rise until doubled, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 19: Bake the loaves until browned, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 20: To serve, cut each loaf into 8 wedges.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '25.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '1.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '4.8 mg', 'fatContent': '1.2 g', 'fiberContent': '0.2 g', 'proteinContent': '2.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '482.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '1 g'}

Title: Mixed Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients: ['4 cups low-fat chicken broth', '1 tablespoon porcini mushroom powder', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1 cup Arborio rice', '1 bay leaf', '⅓ cup dry white wine', '8 ounces mixed mushrooms, roughly chopped', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', 'salt and ground white pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring chicken broth to a simmer in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Whisk in mushroom powder.
', 'Step 3: Cover, lower heat, and keep at a simmer until needed for risotto.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in another large saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 5: Add shallot and cook, stirring often, until soft but not browned, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add rice and bay leaf and stir until evenly coated.
', 'Step 7: Increase heat to medium and cook until rice releases a nutty smell and looks glassy, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add wine and 1/4 cup of simmering broth.
', 'Step 9: Cook, stirring constantly, until all liquid has been absorbed.
', 'Step 10: Continue adding chicken broth in 1/2 cup increments, stirring constantly and only adding more broth when all liquid has been absorbed, until all broth has been added and rice is tender but not mushy, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Heat remaining olive oil in a large, nonstick skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 12: Add mushrooms and cook, stirring often, until they have released their liquid and it has cooked off, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Add mushrooms to the risotto and stir gently.
', 'Step 14: Stir in 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese and butter, and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 15: Cover and let stand for 1 to 2 minutes before serving.
', 'Step 16: Sprinkle with chopped parsley and extra Parmesan, if desired.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '312 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '32 g', 'cholesterolContent': '16 mg', 'fatContent': '14.9 g', 'fiberContent': '1 g', 'proteinContent': '10.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '393 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.1 g'}

Title: Cacio e Pepe (Cheese and Pepper Pasta)

', 'Step 4: Return pasta and cooking water to the pot over low heat.

', 'Step 6: Stir until cheese has melted and formed a creamy sauce, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Season with salt.
', 'Step 8: Serve with additional cheese, if desired.
']

Title: Bucatini Pasta with Shrimp and Anchovies
Ingredients: ['1 pound bucatini pasta', '1 (2 ounce) can anchovy fillets, oil reserved', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 zucchini, halved lengthwise and cut in 1/4 inch slices', '1 pint grape tomatoes', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 pound peeled and deveined medium shrimp']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, stir together the anchovies and their oil with the red pepper flakes and garlic in a large skillet over medium heat, breaking up the anchovies as you stir.
', 'Step 4: Once the garlic begins to sizzle, add the sliced zucchini, and cook until it begins to soften, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the grape tomatoes, and continue cooking until the zucchini is tender, and the skins of the tomatoes begin to pop, 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle the vegetable mixture with oregano and basil, then stir in shrimp.
', 'Step 7: Cook until the shrimp turn pink and are no longer translucent.
', 'Step 8: Pour over bucatini to serve.
']

Title: Pasta Carbonara with Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package penne pasta', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 medium yellow onion, finely chopped', '3 teaspoons minced garlic', '4 ounces thinly sliced pancetta bacon, chopped', '4 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto, chopped', '4 cups shredded, cooked rotisserie chicken', '2 ½ cups extra-firm tofu, pressed and cut into slices', '1 cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or more to taste', '3 large egg yolks, at room temperature', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil', '¼ cup chopped Italian (flat-leaf) parsley', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 10 to 11 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain.
', 'Step 4: While the pasta is cooking, heat oil in a skillet over medium heat; stir in onion and garlic.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add pancetta and prosciutto; saute until crisp and brown, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add chicken and saute until heated through, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove from the heat and set aside to cool slightly.
', 'Step 9: Whisk cream, Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, egg yolks, basil, and parsley together in a large bowl until blended.
', 'Step 10: Return chicken mixture to the stove over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 11: Add drained penne and cream mixture; toss over medium-low heat until penne is thickly coated, about 4 minutes; do not let it boil or the eggs will scramble.
', 'Step 12: Taste and season with salt and pepper if necessary.
', 'Step 13: Transfer to a large, wide serving bowl and serve immediately.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '796.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '45.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '265.7 mg', 'fatContent': '51.9 g', 'fiberContent': '2.2 g', 'proteinContent': '37.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '25.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '613.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.7 g'}

Title: Creamy Artichoke Pasta
Ingredients: ['12 ounces uncooked spaghetti', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 (6 ounce) can marinated artichoke hearts', '1 small onion', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '⅛ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ cup low-fat cottage cheese', '½ cup low-fat sour cream', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add spaghetti and cook until al dente.
', 'Step 3: Drain and keep warm.
', 'Step 4: While pasta is cooking, heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Place olive oil, butter, and liquid from artichoke hearts in skillet.
', 'Step 6: Cut artichoke hearts into bite-size pieces.
', 'Step 7: When olive oil mixture is hot, add onion and garlic.
', 'Step 8: Saute until soft and lightly browned.
', 'Step 9: Stir in artichoke hearts and saute until heated through.
', 'Step 10: Season with salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and oregano.
', 'Step 11: Remove from heat and stir in cottage cheese and sour cream.
', 'Step 12: Toss mixture with cooked pasta and top with Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Calamari in Red Wine and Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 pounds calamari, cleaned', '4 cups tomato sauce', '1 cup Chianti wine', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 teaspoons chopped garlic', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '⅓ cup grated Romano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Separate the tentacles from the long body of the calamari, if not done already.
', 'Step 2: Slice the body, or calamari tubes into rings about 1/2 to 2/3 inch thick, set aside.
', 'Step 3: In a saucepan, combine tomato sauce, red wine, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, black pepper, cayenne pepper, basil, and cheese.
', 'Step 4: Simmer on medium low for about 30 minutes to give the alcohol in the wine time to evaporate, and all the flavors time to blend.
', 'Step 5: Add the calamari to the sauce.
', 'Step 6: Continue to slowly simmer for about another 20 - 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 7: Calamari is done when it is plump and more opaque.
', 'Step 8: Do not cook on higher heat or for a longer period, as calamari is famous for becoming rubbery.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '256.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '15.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '359.5 mg', 'fatContent': '6.5 g', 'fiberContent': '2.6 g', 'proteinContent': '28.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2 g', 'sodiumContent': '1004.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.7 g'}

Title: Melenzana Ali Olio
Ingredients: ['4 medium eggplants', '½ cup coarse salt', '2 tablespoons white vinegar', '2 cups extra-virgin olive oil', '1 bulb garlic cloves, peeled and chopped', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '½ teaspoon sea salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: On the evening before you intend to make the dish, prepare the eggplant.
', 'Step 2: Cut the ends off the eggplants, and peel.
', 'Step 3: Cut the peeled eggplant into long strips about as big around as shoestring french fries.
', 'Step 4: Place the strips into a large bowl, and stir in 1/2 cup of coarse salt.
', 'Step 5: n Place a sturdy dinner plate upside down in a clean sink, making sure that the drain is not blocked.
', 'Step 6: Place a generous handful of the eggplant strips onto the center of the plate, and cover with another upside down dinner plate to create an eggplant sandwich.
', 'Step 7: Layer more eggplant and plates until all of the eggplant is sandwiched.
', 'Step 8: Cap it off with one additional plate, and press down firmly.
', 'Step 9: Set a sturdy stock pot on top, and fill with enough water to create some pressure on the eggplant layers.
', 'Step 10: Not so much pressure that you break your dishes though.
', 'Step 11: Let this pressing process stand overnight.
', 'Step 12: n The next day, fill a large bowl with ice water.
', 'Step 13: Begin dismantling your stack of plates.
', 'Step 14: One layer (handful) at a time, briefly swish the eggplant around in the ice water, then squeeze dry and place into a clean bowl.
', 'Step 15: If your hand starts to hurt, you are swishing too long.
', 'Step 16: Once all of the eggplant is rinsed and squeezed and in the bowl, mix in the vinegar.
', 'Step 17: Let rest for about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 18: n Heat a splash of the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 19: Once the oil is hot, add the garlic, red pepper flakes, oregano and sea salt.
', 'Step 20: Cook and stir just until fragrant.
', 'Step 21: You do not want to cook the garlic.
', 'Step 22: Set aside to cool.
', 'Step 23: n Your eggplants should be well rested now.
', 'Step 24: Give them one last sqeeze.
', 'Step 25: Make it a good one, or your melenzana is going to taste like pickles.
', "Step 26: ''Don't worry, this is the last time, I promise.
", 'Step 27: .
', 'Step 28: .
', "Step 29: '' (This is to be said to the poor little melenzana - they've been through so much!
", 'Step 30: )n Place the squeezed eggplants into a large bowl, and stir in the contents of the skillet and remaining olive oil until well blended.
', 'Step 31: Transfer to sterile 1 pint or 1/2 pint jars.
', 'Step 32: Make sure to fill the jars to the top, and top off with any olive oil that may be left in the bowl.
', 'Step 33: Wipe the rims with a clean dry cloth, and seal tightly with new lids.
', 'Step 34: Refrigerate for at least a month before opening.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '291.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '9.1 g', 'fatContent': '28.3 g', 'fiberContent': '4.7 g', 'proteinContent': '1.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4 g', 'sodiumContent': '2698.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.2 g'}

Title: Italian Lemon Ice
Ingredients: ['5 cups water', '⅔ cup white sugar', '2 teaspoons lemon zest', '¾ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice', '12 leaves fresh mint, or as needed', '1 lemon, cut into wedges', '1 fluid ounce raspberry-flavored liqueur (such as Chambord®)']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk water, sugar, and lemon zest together in a medium saucepan, then bring to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Continue to whisk and boil for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Let mixture cool for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Whisk in lemon juice.
', 'Step 5: Transfer mixture to an 8x8-inch pan and freeze for 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 6: Remove pan from the freezer and stir with a fork to break up the ice.
', 'Step 7: Freeze again for 3 hours.
', 'Step 8: Scrape and mix ice into shavings with a fork.
', 'Step 9: Serve in chilled glasses garnished with mint and lemon wedges.
', 'Step 10: Top with raspberry-flavored liqueur as a little something extra for adults.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '115.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '29.2 g', 'fatContent': '0.1 g', 'fiberContent': '1.1 g', 'proteinContent': '0.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '7.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '25 g'}

Title: Basic Cheese Polenta
Ingredients: ['1 cup cornmeal', '1 cup cold water', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 cups boiling water', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a mixing bowl combine cornmeal, cold water and salt.
', 'Step 2: Grease a loaf pan.
', 'Step 3: Bring the remaining 3 cups of water to a rolling boil and stir in the cornmeal mixture.
', 'Step 4: Bring the mixture back to a boil while stirring constantly.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat to a simmer and stir in the cheese.
', 'Step 6: Let the mixture simmer for 20 to 30 minutes; stirring frequently.
', 'Step 7: Allow the polenta to simmer until it becomes very thick.
', 'Step 8: Spread the mixture into the loaf pan and refrigerate at least 4 hours before serving.
']

Title: Zucchini Parmigiana
Ingredients: ['1 cup dry bread crumbs', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh basil', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '3 large zucchinis, sliced', '8 egg whites, divided', '3 cups ricotta cheese', '¼ cup fresh parsley, chopped', '3 cups tomato sauce', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a medium baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: In a shallow, medium bowl, mix bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, basil, and oregano.
', 'Step 4: Set aside 2/3 cup of the mixture.
', 'Step 5: Place 2 egg whites in a small bowl.
', 'Step 6: Dip zucchini slices in the egg whites, then coat with the bread crumb mixture.
', 'Step 7: Arrange coated slices on the prepared baking sheet, and bake 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned.
', 'Step 8: In a medium bowl, mix ricotta, parsley, and the remaining 6 egg whites.
', 'Step 9: Spread 1/2 the tomato sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Layer with 1/2 the zucchini, 1/2 the ricotta mixture, and 1/2 the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 11: Repeat layers, and top with remaining bread crumb mixture.
', 'Step 12: Bake 45 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 13: Serve warm.
']

Title: Spicy Chicken Marsala
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '¼ pound bacon, chopped', '2 shallots, minced', '8 green onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (14.5 ounce) can fire-roasted diced tomatoes with juice', '1 cup Marsala wine', '4 cubes chicken bouillon', '2 teaspoons whole fresh rosemary leaves', '½ cup half-and-half', '2 cups grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large cast-iron skillet over medium heat until very hot.
', 'Step 2: Pour in the vegetable oil, tilt skillet to coat with oil, and place chicken breast halves into the hot skillet.
', 'Step 3: Cook the chicken breasts until browned on each side, about 8 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: Increase heat under skillet to medium-high, then stir in bacon, shallots, and green onions.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir until bacon begins to crisp, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in garlic until fragrant, then add fire-roasted tomatoes, Marsala wine, chicken bouillon cubes, and rosemary.
', 'Step 7: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low; simmer for about 1 hour.
', 'Step 8: Stir half-and-half and Parmesan cheese into the sauce over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Continue to cook until cheese melts, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove skillet from heat, and allow the chicken and sauce to rest while cooking the pasta.
', 'Step 11: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 12: Stir in the spaghetti and return to a boil.
', 'Step 13: Cook until the pasta has cooked through but is still slightly firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Drain well.
', 'Step 15: Transfer cooked spaghetti to a serving platter and serve topped with chicken breasts and sauce.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '753.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '69.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '111.4 mg', 'fatContent': '25 g', 'fiberContent': '4.4 g', 'proteinContent': '48.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '1594.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.2 g'}

Title: Meatless Eggplant Lasagna
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '2 large eggs, lightly beaten', '1 tablespoon water', '2 cups panko bread crumbs', '¼ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '2 eggplants, peeled and sliced into 1/2-inch rounds', '1 (16 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '½ cup chopped fresh basil', '1 large egg, lightly beaten', '¼ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '1 ½ teaspoons minced garlic', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 (24 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '1 yellow bell pepper, diced', '1 green bell pepper, diced', '¼ teaspoon salt', '8 ounces thinly sliced mozzarella cheese', '¾ cup finely grated Fontina cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Coat 2 baking sheets and a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Stir together 2 eggs and water in a shallow dish.
', 'Step 4: Combine panko and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese in a second shallow dish.
', 'Step 5: Dip eggplant slices in egg mixture and dredge in panko mixture, pressing gently to adhere and shaking off excess.
', 'Step 6: Place on prepared baking sheets.
', 'Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven until golden, turning once and rotating baking sheets after 15 minutes, about 30 minutes total.
', 'Step 8: Combine ricotta cheese, basil, 1 egg, Parmigiano-Reggiano, garlic, red pepper, and salt in a bowl to make filling.
', 'Step 9: Spoon 1/2 cup marinara sauce into the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Layer 1/2 the eggplant slices over sauce and sprinkle with 1/8 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 11: Top with 3/4 cup marinara sauce.
', 'Step 12: Spread 1/2 the ricotta mixture on top; add 1/2 the yellow and green bell peppers and top with 1/3 the mozzarella cheese and 1/4 the Fontina cheese.
', 'Step 13: Repeat layers, ending with 1 cup marinara sauce.
', 'Step 14: Cover tightly with aluminum foil coated with cooking spray.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven for 35 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Remove aluminum foil; top with remaining mozzarella cheese and Fontina cheese.
', 'Step 17: Continue baking until sauce is bubbly and cheese melts, about 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 18: Cool 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Dead Bones (L'Ossa Morte)
Ingredients: ["1 pound confectioners' sugar", '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '2 ½ teaspoons ground cloves', '3 eggs, lightly beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Sift together the sugar, flour, baking powder, and cloves.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the sugar mixture, and pour the eggs into the well.
', 'Step 3: Work the eggs into the mixture, first with a fork, then with your hands, until you have a smooth dough.
', 'Step 4: Line a baking sheet with foil.
', 'Step 5: Roll dough into 1 inch balls and place on the prepared baking sheet, 2 inches apart.
', 'Step 6: Flatten each cookie with the bottom of a glass.
', 'Step 7: Cover with a clean dish towel and let rest overnight.
', 'Step 8: Cookies will spread.
', 'Step 9: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove cookies from pan immediately as they come out of the oven or they will stick.
', 'Step 12: Cool completely on a wire rack.
']

Title: A Farewell to Basil Fettuccine
Ingredients: ['¾ cup chopped fresh basil', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '2 tablespoons water', '2 ½ tablespoons all-purpose flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Using a food processor, process basil leaves until chopped very fine.
', 'Step 2: Add 1 1/2 cups of flour and pulse two or three times, or until combined.
', 'Step 3: Add egg, 1 teaspoon oil, and the water until dough forms a ball shape.
', 'Step 4: If dough seems dry, add a bit more water.
', 'Step 5: Wrap dough in a piece of plastic wrap which has been coated in a few drops of olive oil.
', 'Step 6: Refrigerate dough for 2 hours.
', 'Step 7: Remove dough from refrigerator, and cut into 6 equal size portions.
', 'Step 8: Run pasta though pasta machine, or roll with rolling pin to desired thickness.
', 'Step 9: Use the additional flour to coat pasta while rolling.
', 'Step 10: Allow pasta to dry for one hour prior to cooking.
', 'Step 11: Cook in a large pot of boiling water until al dente.
', 'Step 12: This should take only a 3 to 5 minutes, depending on the thickness of the pasta.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '437.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '79.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '93 mg', 'fatContent': '6 g', 'fiberContent': '3 g', 'proteinContent': '14.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '38.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.5 g'}

Title: Gluten-Free Northern Italian Autumn Minestrone
Ingredients: ['1 cup dried cranberry beans', '1 medium carrot', '1 small yellow onion', '1 stalk celery', '½ small red bell pepper', '¼ cup olive oil', '15 ounces potatoes, peeled and diced', '12 ounces diced carrots', '12 ounces zucchini, diced', '10 ounces fresh pumpkin, diced', '4 ounces diced yellow onion', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '1 tablespoon minced fresh rosemary', '1 bay leaf', '8 cups vegetable broth, divided', '1 tablespoon salt', '6 ounces gluten-free elbow pasta', '1 fresh hot pepper, minced', '6 tablespoons finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place cranberry beans into a large container and cover with several inches of cool water; let soak, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 2: Drain.
', 'Step 3: Shred carrot, yellow onion, celery, and red pepper in a food processor to create a sofrito mixture.
', 'Step 4: Heat oil in a 7-quart pressure cooker over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Add sofrito mixture and saute until softened, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add soaked beans, potatoes, diced carrots, zucchini, pumpkin, and diced onion.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir until warmed through, 3 to 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 8: Add oregano, rosemary, and bay leaf.
', 'Step 9: Stir well to coat vegetables with oil and seasonings.
', 'Step 10: Add enough broth to cover vegetables by 1 inch.
', 'Step 11: Close the pressure cooker lid and bring up to pressure, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Cook an additional 10 minutes from the first whistle.
', 'Step 13: Allow pressure to release naturally and remove lid, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Taste and adjust salt if necessary.
', 'Step 15: Add additional broth to allow for cooking the pasta.
', 'Step 16: Bring to a boil and add pasta.
', 'Step 17: Cook, stirring occasionally, until tender but still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Add more boiling broth if needed during cooking.
', 'Step 19: Ladle soup into bowls and top with minced hot pepper and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '355.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '57.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '3.3 mg', 'fatContent': '9.4 g', 'fiberContent': '11.3 g', 'proteinContent': '12.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '1438.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.5 g'}

Title: Pasta with Fennel and Onions
Ingredients: ['2 large fennel bulbs', '2 onions', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1 cup white wine', '1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta', '4 roma (plum) tomatoes, seeded and cut into 1/4-inch dice', '2 lemons, juiced', '¼ cup pine nuts', '1 cup freshly shaved Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Trim fennel bulbs, cut in half lengthwise, and remove tough cores.
', 'Step 2: Thinly slice fennel bulb halves lengthwise.
', 'Step 3: Peel onions, slice in half lengthwise, and thinly slice onions lengthwise.
', 'Step 4: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir fennel and onions until onions are translucent, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour in white wine, turn heat up to medium-high, and cook, stirring often, until the wine has nearly evaporated and fennel and onions begin to brown, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook the linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes; drain and keep warm.
', 'Step 7: Reserve 1/4 cup of pasta water.
', 'Step 8: Stir tomatoes into the fennel mixture and cook until the tomatoes soften, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Mix lemon juice and pine nuts into the vegetables.
', 'Step 10: Stir linguine into the fennel mixture and mix in reserved pasta water.
', 'Step 11: Cook pasta and vegetables over high heat, stirring until hot and thoroughly combined, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Serve in a large serving bowl topped with Parmesan cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '480.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '57.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '7.2 mg', 'fatContent': '20.2 g', 'fiberContent': '7.5 g', 'proteinContent': '13.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '235.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.1 g'}

Title: Uncle Frank's Italian "S" Cookies
Ingredients: ['4 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 cup white sugar, or more to taste', '1 cup shortening (such as Crisco®)', '¼ cup milk', '3 large eggs', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1 tablespoon almond extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Mix flour, sugar, shortening, milk, eggs, baking powder, and almond extract in a bowl by hand until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Form dough into a 1-inch thick log.
', 'Step 5: Cut small portions and roll into 3-inch long pieces, then shape into "S" shapes.
', 'Step 6: Place on the prepared cookie sheet.
', 'Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Cool on the baking sheet briefly before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
']

Title: Nonna's Artichokes
Ingredients: ['2 large whole artichokes', '1 cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs (such as Vigo®)', '½ cup minced pecorino Romano cheese', '¼ cup chopped fresh mint', '2 tablespoons minced fresh garlic', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 cups white wine', '1 cup water, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut the stems and tops off each artichoke.
', 'Step 2: Remove the tough outer leaves.
', 'Step 3: Snip the ends off the remaining leaves with scissors to remove thorns.
', 'Step 4: Remove the tough exterior of the stems and cut them in half.
', 'Step 5: Set aside.
', 'Step 6: Combine bread crumbs, pecorino Romano cheese, mint, garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Drizzle with olive oil and mix well.
', 'Step 8: Wiggle an artichoke back and forth with your thumbs to open the leaves.
', 'Step 9: Stuff the bread crumb mixture between multiple leaves and in the center.
', 'Step 10: Repeat with the second artichoke.
', 'Step 11: Place artichokes and stem pieces in a large pan that has a tight-fitting lid.
', 'Step 12: Add wine and water to the pan, making sure not to wet the artichokes.
', 'Step 13: Cover and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 14: Reduce to a simmer and cook until you can easily pull an outer leaf off an artichoke, about 1 hour.
']

Title: Rossi's Sausage Gnocchi
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pound Italian sausage links', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ cup onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1 ½ teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 (14 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '2 tablespoons water', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 (1 pound) package fresh gnocchi', 'chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, for garnish', 'grated Romano or Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add sausages and cook until browned and firm, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Cut sausages into 1/2 inch slices, return to the skillet, and continue cooking until no longer pink.
', 'Step 4: Drain sausage slices on a paper towel lined plate.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat; stir in onion and cook until the onion softens and turns translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add garlic and 1 1/2 teaspoons Italian seasoning; cook until the garlic softens, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour in crushed tomatoes, water, salt, sugar, and remaining 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 8: Bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Add gnocchi and cook for 2 to 3 minutes until pasta floats; drain.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, stir Italian sausage slices into sauce to rewarm.
', 'Step 12: Toss pasta with sauce, and sprinkle with chopped parsley and grated Romano cheese to serve.
']

Title: Classic Italian Veal Spezzatino
Ingredients: ['1 ½ tablespoons cornstarch', '1 teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper', '1 ½ pounds lean veal stew meat', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 onion, minced', '1 carrot, minced', '1 celery, minced', '1 fresh Thai chile pepper, minced', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '½ cup low-sodium vegetable broth', '¼ cup dry white wine', '4 medium Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes', '3 Roma tomatoes, cubed', '1 ½ cups frozen peas', '1 bay leaf', '2 tablespoons water, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix cornstarch, paprika, and pepper in a mixing bowl.
', 'Step 2: Pat veal chunks dry and toss them with cornstarch mixture to coat.
', 'Step 3: Heat oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Add veal pieces to the pot, one by one, and brown on all sides.
', 'Step 5: Set aside leftover cornstarch.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat slightly and add onion, carrot, celery, and red chile pepper; cook until fragrant, stirring often, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 8: Pour in broth and wine.
', 'Step 9: Deglaze pot using a wooden spoon to scrape any browned bits off the bottom.
', 'Step 10: Add potatoes, tomatoes, peas, and bay leaf.
', 'Step 11: Stir and cover.
', 'Step 12: Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until veal is fork-tender, potatoes are cooked, and liquid has thickened, about 1 hour.
', "Step 13: Add some water from time to time to keep the stew from burning, but don't let it get soupy.
", 'Step 14: Add leftover cornstarch if the stew needs thickening at the end.
']

Title: Pignoli Cookies II

', 'Step 2: Put in mixing bowl and gradually add the sugar.
', 'Step 3: In another small bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff.

Title: Lemon Panna Cotta with Blueberries
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '¼ cup fresh lemon juice', '1 (.25 ounce) envelope unflavored gelatin', '2 cups heavy whipping cream', '1 cup half-and-half', '2 teaspoons fresh lemon zest, plus more for garnish', '⅓ cup granulated sugar', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '6 leaves fresh mint']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Lightly oil or spray six 6 ounce ramekins.
', 'Step 2: Pour lemon juice in a small bowl and sprinkle with gelatin.
', 'Step 3: Let sit for 5 minutes to soften the gelatin; mix well.
', 'Step 4: Set aside.
', 'Step 5: Stir together heavy cream, half and half, and lemon zest in a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 6: Add sugar, stirring frequently, until sugar has dissolved completely.
', 'Step 7: Heat mixture slowly until it just about to boil, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 9: Whisk gelatin mixture and vanilla extract into the cream mixture until well blended and gelatin is completely dissolved.
', 'Step 10: Keep lightly whisking until the mixture comes close to room temperature, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: This will prevent the gelatin and cream from separating while the panna cotta is setting.
', 'Step 12: Divide mixture into ramekins, about 1/2 cup per portion.
', 'Step 13: Cover each ramekin with plastic wrap and refrigerate until set, about 4 hours.
', 'Step 14: Run a knife around the inside edges of the ramekin to remove panna cotta from the ramekins.
', 'Step 15: Carefully dip each ramekin into a bowl of hot water for a few seconds.
', 'Step 16: Carefully invert onto serving plates, tap, and jiggle the ramekin a bit if needed for the panna cotta to come loose.
', 'Step 17: Garnish with additional lemon zest and mint leaves, and serve with fresh blueberries.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '377.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '16.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '123.6 mg', 'fatContent': '34 g', 'fiberContent': '0.1 g', 'proteinContent': '3.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '21.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '49.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '11.6 g'}

Title: Kale, White Bean, and Farro Stew
Ingredients: ['1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '3 stalks celery, thinly sliced', '3 carrots, chopped', '1 Spanish onion, chopped', '1 leek (white and light green part only), thinly sliced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup farro', '2 cups water, or more if needed', '1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (15 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 ½ cups low-sodium vegetable broth', '1 zucchini, diced', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 bunch kale, leaves stripped from stems and coarsely chopped', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Blend contents of 1 can cannellini beans with its liquid in a blender until pureed.
', 'Step 2: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir celery, carrots, Spanish onion, and leek in hot oil until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes; add garlic and continue cooking until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes more.
', 'Step 4: Stir farro into the vegetable mixture; add water, pureed cannellini beans, the drained cannellini beans, diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, zucchini, tomato paste, thyme, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 5: Stir the mixture well and bring to a boil; reduce heat to medium-low, place a cover on the pot, and simmer until the farro is tender, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Stir kale, salt, and pepper into the stew.
', 'Step 7: Add more water to the stew if needed to keep everything covered in liquid and continue cooking until the kale is bright green and fully tender, about 30 minutes more.
']

Title: Mushroom Pesto
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 pound mixed fresh mushrooms (such as cremini, button, oyster, and portobello), quartered', '1 shallot, chopped', '1 cup toasted pine nuts', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '¼ cup vegetable broth', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon freshly squeezed lemon juice', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '½ cup Parmesan cheese, grated']

', 'Step 2: Cook and stir mushrooms and shallot in melted butter until the mushrooms are lightly browned and soft, 5 to 7 minutes.

', 'Step 4: n Transfer cooled mushroom mixture to a blender; add pine nuts, olive oil, vegetable broth, garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

', 'Step 6: Stir Parmesan cheese through the blended mixture.
']

Title: Easy Smothered Chicken Breasts
Ingredients: ['½ cup all-purpose flour', '¼ cup seasoned bread crumbs', '2 teaspoons garlic salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '4 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, pounded thin', '8 bacon strips', '1 onion, sliced', '¼ teaspoon lemon-pepper seasoning', '¼ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or more to taste', '¼ cup packed brown sugar', '½ cup shredded Colby-Monterey Jack cheese']

', 'Step 4: Remove bacon with a slotted spoon, reserving bacon drippings; drain bacon on paper towels.

", 'Step 8: Arrange chicken breasts on a baking sheet; top each breast with 2 bacon slices.

']

Title: Pasta Melanzana

Title: Tomato Harvest Marinara Sauce
Ingredients: ['25 pounds plum tomatoes, cored and halved lengthwise', '3 bay leaves', '1 ½ tablespoons honey', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1 pound yellow onions, finely chopped', '10 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '10 1-quart canning jars with rings and lids', '10 teaspoons salt, divided', '1 ¾ cups bottled lemon juice, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place tomatoes, bay leaves, honey, oregano, 1 tablespoon salt, and black pepper in a large stockpot and cover with water.
', 'Step 2: Stir to combine, cover, and bring to a low boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Remove cover and simmer 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 4: Remove bay leaves.
', 'Step 5: Taste and adjust seasoning.
', 'Step 6: n Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir onions and garlic in the hot oil until the onions are softened but not browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: n Transfer the cooked tomatoes to a food mill placed over a bowl and puree in batches, separating the tomato pulp and juice from the tomato skins and seeds.
', 'Step 9: Return the tomato pulp and juice to the stockpot, add the cooked onions and garlic, and cook, uncovered, over medium-high heat until sauce thickens and reduces by about half, about 1 to 1-1/2 hours.
', 'Step 10: Stir occasionally to prevent scorching.
', 'Step 11: n Prepare quart jars, rings, and lids by heating them in boiling water in a canning kettle for at least 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: When the sauce is ready, remove jars and lids and place on dry towel.
', 'Step 13: n To each jar, add 1 teaspoon salt and 3 tablespoons bottled lemon juice.
', 'Step 14: Ladle the hot tomato sauce into jars, leaving 1/2-inch of space at the top of each jar.
', 'Step 15: Wipe jar rims with a clean, damp cloth, place lids onto jars, and screw on rings.
', 'Step 16: n Place filled jars in the canning kettle.
', 'Step 17: Return water to a simmer, adding more water if needed to cover the jars by at least 1/2 inch.
', 'Step 18: Cover kettle and bring water to a boil.
', 'Step 19: Cook at a steady boil to process the jars until fully sealed, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Turn off heat and let jars rest 5 minutes before removing and cooling on a clean, dry towel placed on kitchen counter or table.
', 'Step 21: Check that the lids have sealed, and store in a cool, dark place for up to 1 year.
']

Title: Italian Chocolate Cookies

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Title: Cannoli III
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons shortening', '1 egg white', '¾ cup red wine', '1 ½ quarts oil for deep frying', '1 ½ pounds ricotta cheese', "½ cup sifted confectioners' sugar", '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '¾ cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips', '3 tablespoons chopped candied orange peel']

Title: Instant Pot® Fresh Corn Risotto
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter, divided', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided', '2 ears fresh corn, kernels cut from cob', '½ cup finely chopped red onion', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 ½ cups Arborio rice', '½ cup white wine', '4 cups chicken broth', '½ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '½ teaspoon chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Add 1 tablespoon butter and 1 tablespoon olive oil; stir until butter melts.

', 'Step 4: Remove corn to a bowl and set aside.

', 'Step 8: Cook until rice is slightly toasted, about 2 minutes.

', 'Step 11: Turn off Saute function.
', 'Step 12: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 13: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 6 minutes.
", 'Step 14: Allow 5 to 10 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 15: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 16: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 17: Add corn and remaining 2 tablespoons butter; stir until risotto is creamy, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 18: Stir in Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese until melted and well combined.
', 'Step 19: Garnish with parsley.
']

Title: Easy Italian Beef (Make-Ahead Freezer Meal)

Title: Chicken Scampi I

', 'Step 2: Marinate in the refrigerator for several hours (overnight is best).
', 'Step 3: Preheat broiler.

Title: Tuscan Sausage Ragu
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound bulk sweet Italian sausage', '1 pound bulk hot Italian sausage', '1 large red onion, diced', '2 ribs celery, diced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '½ cup dry red wine', '1 (28 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes, undrained', '1 (28 ounce) can tomato sauce', 'salt to taste', '1 cup heavy cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir the sweet and hot Italian sausage until browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Break the meat up into crumbles as it cooks.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the onion, celery, and garlic; cook and stir until the onion is translucent, about 8 more minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour the mixture into a slow cooker.
', 'Step 6: Pour red wine into the skillet, and stir to dissolve the brown flavor bits from the bottom of the skillet.

', 'Step 8: Add the diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, and salt to taste.

Title: Roasted Peppers in Oil (Peperoni Arrostiti Sotto Olio)
Ingredients: ['1 red bell pepper', '1 yellow bell pepper', '1 orange bell pepper', '¾ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '5 leaves fresh basil leaves, finely sliced', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 2: Reduce grill heat to medium.
', 'Step 3: Grill whole peppers until charred on all sides, turning about every 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Place charred peppers in a plastic food storage bag and tie shut.
', 'Step 5: Allow peppers to cool in bag.
', 'Step 6: Combine olive oil, garlic, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper in a 1-pint glass jar (or larger, depending on size of peppers).
', 'Step 7: Remove cooled peppers from bag and scrape off charred skins.
', 'Step 8: Cut peppers in half and remove seeds and stems.
', 'Step 9: Slice peppers into long strips and place in oil mixture.
', 'Step 10: Mix well, assuring peppers are covered in oil.
', 'Step 11: Serve, storing leftover peppers in refrigerator for up to 5 days.
']

Title: Easy Lasagna Without Ricotta
Ingredients: ['¼ cup butter', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 cups warm milk', '2 pounds lean ground beef', '2 (28 ounce) jars spaghetti sauce', '1 pinch ground nutmeg, or to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package no-boil lasagna noodles', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded Mexican cheese blend', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir flour, salt, and pepper into melted butter until flour is dissolved.
', 'Step 3: Slowly whisk milk into butter-flour mixture until a thick white sauce forms, 2 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove saucepan from heat.
', 'Step 5: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 7: Add spaghetti sauce and nutmeg to ground beef; cook until spaghetti sauce is heated through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Spread a layer of meat sauce into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Cover meat sauce layer with a layer of lasagna noodles; top with 1/3 the white sauce, 1/2 the remaining meat sauce, 1/3 the Mexican cheese blend, and 1/3 the Parmesan cheese, respectively.
', 'Step 11: Repeat 1 more layer of each ingredient; top with 1 more layer lasagna noodles, remaining white sauce, Mexican cheese blend, and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 12: Pour water around the edges of the dish.
', 'Step 13: Cover dish with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove aluminum foil and continue baking until cheeses are melted, about 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 16: Let lasagna stand 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Eggplant Meatballs
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil, or as needed', '1 large eggplant, halved lengthwise', '1 pound ground turkey', '1 carrot, shredded', '½ small onion, diced', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 large egg', '2 cloves garlic, or more to taste, minced', '1 teaspoon dried basil (such as Simply Organic®)', '1 teaspoon dried parsley (such as Simply Organic®)', '1 teaspoon dried oregano (such as Simply Organic®)', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or more to taste', '¾ cup almond flour', '2 cups marinara sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 3: Grease foil with olive oil.
', 'Step 4: Arrange eggplant halves cut-sides-down onto the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 5: Pierce skin of eggplant several times with a fork.
', 'Step 6: Roast eggplant in preheated oven until soft, 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove from oven and set aside to cool completely.
', 'Step 8: Scoop the flesh from the eggplant halves onto a cutting board; chop into small chunks and put into a large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 9: Mix ground turkey, carrot, onion, Parmesan cheese, egg, garlic, basil, parsley, oregano, sea salt, and black pepper with the eggplant chunks until ingredients are somewhat evenly mixed together.
', 'Step 10: Gently mix almond flour into the eggplant mixture; scoop with an ice cream scoop onto the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 11: Reduce oven heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and bake meatballs in oven for 15 minutes, flip the meatballs, and bake until browned and no longer pink in the center, about 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 12: While the meatballs bake, heat marinara sauce in saucepan over medium-low heat until hot; add baked meatballs to the sauce and stir to coat.
']

Title: Cherry Tomato Sauce with Penne
Ingredients: ['2 cups cherry tomatoes (such as Sun Gold)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, sliced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 cups chicken broth', '2 tablespoons fresh oregano leaves', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '14 ounces penne pasta', '½ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine cherry tomatoes, oil, garlic, and salt in a saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir until garlic is just toasted, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour chicken broth into tomato mixture; bring to a simmer and cook until tomatoes start to collapse and burst, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir oregano and red pepper flakes into tomato mixture.
', 'Step 5: Puree tomato mixture with a stick blender until sauce is smooth.
', 'Step 6: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain and return pasta to the pot.
', 'Step 8: Pour tomato sauce over penne and stir until pasta absorbs some of the sauce, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese into pasta and season with salt and pepper to taste.
']

Title: Italian Crema Ice Cream (Gelato alla Crema)
Ingredients: ['2 cups whole milk', '⅔ cup white sugar', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '5 egg yolks', '1 cup heavy cream', '⅛ teaspoon kosher salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour milk into a saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Add 2/3 cup plus 1 tablespoon sugar and egg yolks.
', 'Step 3: Whisk thoroughly.
', 'Step 4: Cook over medium heat, stirring gently with a spatula, until custard is steaming-hot and thick enough to coat the back of a spoon, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in heavy cream and salt and remove from heat.

", 'Step 8: Seal top with plastic wrap, cover with a lid, and freeze until firm, at least 4 hours.
']

Title: Linguine with Garlicky White Clam Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta', '⅓ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '2 anchovy fillets', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 ½ teaspoons dried oregano', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 (10 ounce) cans whole baby clams, drained and juice reserved', '⅓ cup white wine']

Title: Bean and Kale Ragu
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 pound kale, stems removed and leaves coarsely chopped', '1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 ½ cups water', '2 bay leaves', '¼ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '2 (15 ounce) cans canned cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh basil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 7: Stir in the cannellini beans and continue simmering until beans are heated through, about 10 minutes.

Title: Grandmom Marino's Easter Meat Pie
Ingredients: ['¼ pound thinly sliced ham', '¼ pound thinly sliced salami', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 (15 ounce) package refrigerated pie crusts', '1 egg', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and pepper to taste']

', 'Step 2: Tear the ham and salami into small pieces and place in a medium bowl.

Title: Eggplant Parmesan with Fresh Basil and Smoked Mozzarella
Ingredients: ['1 large unpeeled purple eggplant, trimmed and cut into 1/8-inch thick slices', '1 teaspoon fine sea salt, or as needed', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon whole milk', '1 cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs, or more as needed', '¾ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed', '1 (24 ounce) jar prepared marinara sauce (such as De Cecco®)', '1 bunch fresh basil, coarsely chopped', '1 (8 ounce) package smoked mozzarella cheese, very thinly sliced', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line a plate with a paper towel; place a layer of 2 or 3 slices of eggplant onto the towel.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle eggplant with sea salt.
', 'Step 3: Repeat layers of eggplant sprinkled with salt until all eggplant slices are stacked.
', 'Step 4: Place 2 paper towels onto the stack and place a plate on top of the towels.
', 'Step 5: Lay a heavy book or can of food onto the plate to squeeze out moisture.
', 'Step 6: Allow to drip for 20 minutes to 2 hours.
', 'Step 7: Rinse and pat dry.
', 'Step 8: Beat eggs with milk in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 9: Place bread crumbs into a separate bowl.
', 'Step 10: Dip eggplant slices in the egg mixture and gently press into the crumbs to coat; set aside.
', 'Step 11: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Grease an 8x8-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 13: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat; fry eggplant slices in the hot oil in small batches until golden brown, about 1 to 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 14: Drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 15: Pour about 1/4 cup of marinara sauce into the bottom of the prepared baking dish and arrange a layer of eggplant slices to cover the sauce.
', 'Step 16: Scatter basil and a few slices of smoked mozzarella cheese over eggplant; repeat layers, ending with a layer of sauce on top.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over the top.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven until heated through and the cheese has melted, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Italian Marinated Seafood Salad
Ingredients: ['½ pound sea scallops', '¼ pound medium shrimp', '½ pound fresh mussels', '¼ pound calamari rings', '½ cup pitted kalamata olives', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '⅓ cup olive oil', '1 large clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon minced fresh chives', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 lemon, sliced', '1 medium red onion, thinly sliced', '6 cups mixed salad greens', 'freshly ground pepper to taste', 'salt']

', 'Step 7: Divide salad greens onto 6 plates or salad bowls.

Title: Fat Granny's Minestrone Soup
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon celery seed', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 bay leaf', '½ cup elbow macaroni', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup butter', '1 large carrot, diced', '2 stalks celery, diced', '1 large onion, diced', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', '1 green bell pepper, diced', '1 red bell pepper, diced', '1 small zucchini, diced', '1 (28 ounce) can diced San Marzano tomatoes with juice', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (15.5 ounce) can three bean salad, drained and rinsed', '1 ½ (10 ounce) packages frozen French-cut green beans', '6 cups chicken stock']

Title: Italian Four-Layer Coconut Cream Cake
Ingredients: ['2 cups white sugar', '½ cup butter', '½ cup shortening (such as Crisco®)', '5 eggs, separated, divided', '2 cups sifted all-purpose flour', '2 cups shredded coconut', '1 cup buttermilk', '½ cup chopped walnuts', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '½ cup butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 (16 ounce) package powdered sugar', '½ cup shredded coconut, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour four 9-inch round cake pans.
', 'Step 3: Combine sugar, butter, shortening, and egg yolks in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 4: Mix in sifted flour, coconut, buttermilk, walnuts, baking soda, and vanilla extract.
', 'Step 5: Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl just until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 6: Fold into the cake batter.
', 'Step 7: Divide batter among the prepared cake pans.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 30 to 35 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Cool on a wire rack for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Run a table knife around the edges to loosen.
', 'Step 11: Invert carefully onto a serving plate or cooling rack.
', 'Step 12: Let cool, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 13: While the cakes are cooling, combine cream cheese, butter, and vanilla extract for the icing in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 14: Gradually mix in powdered sugar until combined.
', 'Step 15: Spread icing on the top of each cake and sprinkle with coconut.
', 'Step 16: Stack cakes to make four layers, inserting toothpicks or wooden skewers vertically to keep the cake together.
', 'Step 17: Spread remaining icing on the top and sides and sprinkle with more coconut.
']

Title: Zucchini Pasta Bake
Ingredients: ['8 ounces penne pasta', '¼ cup Parmesan cheese', '½ cup crushed saltine crackers', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ onion, chopped', '2 cups chopped zucchini', '1 tomato, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '1 pinch dried celery flakes', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']

', 'Step 2: Add penne pasta, cook for 10 to 12 minutes, until al dente, and drain.
', 'Step 3: Lightly grease a medium casserole dish.

', 'Step 13: Allow to sit 5 minutes before serving.

Title: Italian Sausage Baby Back Ribs
Ingredients: ['2 racks baby back ribs, trimmed', 'Spice rub:', '1 tablespoon fennel seeds', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon garlic salt', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'Glaze:', '⅓ cup brown sugar', '⅓ cup orange juice', '⅓ cup rice wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon orange zest', '2 teaspoons hot chile paste, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 3: Combine fennel seeds, black pepper, sugar, garlic salt, kosher salt, and cayenne pepper in a small bowl.
', 'Step 4: Place rib racks on the prepared baking sheet; cut several shallow slits in the membrane along the backs of the ribs with a sharp paring knife.
', 'Step 5: Rub fennel seed mixture on both sides of ribs.
', 'Step 6: Bake in the preheated oven for 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 7: Flip ribs and bake until a fork inserts easily between the bones, 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 8: Set aside to cool completely, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Combine brown sugar, orange juice, vinegar, orange zest, and hot chile paste in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 10: Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer until reduced by half, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Increase oven temperature to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) and line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 12: Cut rib racks into individual ribs; toss with glaze in a large bowl until evenly coated.
', 'Step 13: Place ribs on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 14: Reserve any additional glaze in the bowl for basting.
', 'Step 15: Bake glazed ribs for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Flip, brush with remaining glaze, and bake until browned, 5 to 10 minutes.
']

Title: Torta Sbrisolona
Ingredients: ['2 cups finely chopped almonds', '1 ½ cups cornmeal', '1 cup white sugar', '1 ⅔ cups all-purpose flour', '1 lemon, zested', '1 vanilla bean, split lengthwise and scraped', '1 pinch salt', '½ cup butter, softened', '⅔ cup lard', '3 egg yolks']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Butter a baking pan.
', 'Step 3: Combine almonds, cornmeal, sugar, flour, lemon zest, vanilla, and salt in a bowl.
', 'Step 4: Mix well using a fork.
', 'Step 5: Pile flour mixture onto a flat work surface, forming a mound.
', 'Step 6: Make a large well in the center; add butter, lard, and egg yolks.
', 'Step 7: Knead vigorously until mixture is combined but crumbly.

Title: Easy Homemade Beef and Ricotta Ravioli
Ingredients: ['½ pound ground beef', '¼ onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '3 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley', '1 egg', '30 wonton wrappers', '1 egg yolk, beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the ground beef, onion, and garlic into a skillet over medium heat, and sprinkle with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 2: Cook the beef until browned, about 10 minutes, breaking it up into crumbles as it cooks.
', 'Step 3: Drain off excess fat.
', 'Step 4: Mix the ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, parsley, egg, and ground beef mixture in a bowl until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 5: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper lightly dusted with flour.
', 'Step 6: To make the ravioli, lay out 15 wonton wrappers on a lightly floured work surface.
', 'Step 7: Spoon about 1 tablespoon of filling into the center of each wonton wrapper.
', 'Step 8: Dip your index finger into the beaten egg yolk, and smear a light coating of yolk all around the edge of the wonton wrapper.
', 'Step 9: Place an unfilled wrapper on top of the filling, and press the two wrappers lightly together.
', 'Step 10: Pick up the ravioli gently in your hand, and pinch the edges together tightly, squeezing out all the air.
', 'Step 11: Seal and crimp the edges with a fork.
', 'Step 12: Place the filled ravioli onto the parchment paper.
', 'Step 13: Use immediately or freeze.
']

Title: Creamy Tuscan Garlic Chicken
Ingredients: ['12 ounces penne pasta', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast', '3 teaspoons garlic powder, or to taste, divided', '3 teaspoons Italian seasoning, divided', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cups heavy cream', '1 cup chicken broth', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 cups fresh spinach', '1 cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and keep warm.
', 'Step 4: Season chicken breasts with 1 1/2 teaspoons garlic powder and 1 1/2 teaspoons Italian seasoning, making sure both sides are coated.
', 'Step 5: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add chicken and cook until browned and no longer pink in the center, 3 to 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 7: Remove chicken to a plate and cut into strips or chunks.
', 'Step 8: Add cream, chicken broth, Parmesan cheese, remaining garlic powder, and Italian seasoning to the skillet.
', 'Step 9: Whisk over medium heat until it begins to thicken, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add spinach and sun-dried tomatoes; simmer until spinach wilts and sauce reaches desired consistency, about 3 minutes more.
', 'Step 11: Add chicken back to the skillet and cook until heated through.
', 'Step 12: Serve over pasta.
']

Title: Frutti Di Mare
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 ½ tablespoons crushed red pepper', '1 ½ cups Chardonnay white wine', '1 cup clam juice', '6 cups marinara sauce', '8 leaves fresh basil, coarsely chopped', '1 pinch salt', '1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta', '1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined', '⅓ pound scallops', '3 whole lobster tails, shelled, cleaned, and chopped', '24 medium mussels mussels, cleaned and debearded', '24 medium (blank)s littleneck clams, scrubbed', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour olive oil into a large pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add garlic and crushed red pepper; cook until fragrant, 30 to 40 seconds.
', 'Step 3: Pour in white wine and increase heat to medium-high.
', 'Step 4: Let wine reduce by half, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add clam juice and reduce heat to medium-low.
', 'Step 6: Pour in marinara, basil, and salt.
', 'Step 7: Let simmer to let flavors marry, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Cook linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 11: Add shrimp, scallops, lobster, mussels, and clams to the sauce and cook until clams and mussels open, scallops are opaque, shrimp is pink, and lobster is red on the outside and opaque on the inside, 8 to 10 minutes.
', "Step 12: Toss linguine in sauce until it's thick enough to coat the noodles (it will still be a relatively thin sauce), about 3 minutes.
", 'Step 13: Plate noodles and load up with seafood and sauce.
', 'Step 14: Garnish with parsley, and serve immediately with Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Piadina Romagnola (Italian Flat Bread)
Ingredients: ['¾ cup milk', '½ cup margarine, at room temperature', '½ cup Greek yogurt', '3 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 egg white']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir the milk, margarine, and yogurt together in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Mix the flour, salt, baking powder, and egg white in a large bowl.
', 'Step 3: Pour the milk mixture into the flour mixture and work the mixture together with your hands until the dough separates from the sides of the bowl, adding flour or water as needed to get the right consistency, which will be neither sticky nor dry.
', 'Step 4: Cover with a damp cloth and let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface; divide into 12 pieces and roll into balls.
', 'Step 6: Roll and stretch each ball to about 1/8-inch thick and 8 inches in diameter.
', 'Step 7: Lightly oil a cast iron skillet and place over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 8: Cook the dough in the hot skillet until it begins to set, 1 to 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 9: Pierce the dough with a fork 3 to 4 times while it cooks.
', 'Step 10: Wrap the finished pieces in a towel until ready to serve.
']

Title: Rice Balls a la Tim
Ingredients: ['1 cup uncooked white rice', '2 cups water', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '½ pound lean ground beef', 'salt and pepper to taste', '½ cup tomato-based pasta sauce', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 cup dry bread crumbs', '1 ½ cups tomato-based pasta sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring the rice and water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, and cook and stir the garlic until fragrant and soft, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the ground beef.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir the meat, breaking it into crumbles as it cooks, until browned and the meat is no longer pink inside, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain off excess grease.
', 'Step 7: Place hot cooked rice, ground beef, salt and pepper, and 1/2 cup of pasta sauce in a bowl, and mix thoroughly together.
', 'Step 8: Mix in the Parmesan and mozzarella cheese until mozzarella cheese melts.
', 'Step 9: Scoop up handfuls of rice mixture, and gently form into 2 1/2-inch balls.
', 'Step 10: Place balls on a baking sheet, and refrigerate until cool and firm, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Remove the rice balls from the refrigerator, and roll each in beaten egg and then bread crumbs to thoroughly coat.
', 'Step 13: Return to baking sheet, and bake until the outside of the rice balls is crispy, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Heat 1 1/2 cups of pasta sauce in a saucepan over medium heat, and cover rice balls with heated sauce to serve.
']

Title: Baked Caprese Chicken

Title: Fast and Easy Ricotta Cheese Pizza with Mushrooms, Broccoli, and Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into bite-sized chunks', '1 (8 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (12 inch) pre-baked pizza crust', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ cup chopped fresh broccoli', '1 (3 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained']

Title: Italian Style Chili
Ingredients: ['1 pound lean ground beef', '¾ cup chopped onion', '1 (26 ounce) jar three cheese spaghetti sauce', '1 ½ cups water', '2 teaspoons sugar', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (4 ounce) can sliced mushrooms', '2 ounces sliced pepperoni', '1 tablespoon beef bouillon', '1 tablespoon chili powder', '1 (14.5 ounce) can kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, for garnish']

', 'Step 4: Pour in the spaghetti sauce, water, sugar, tomatoes, mushrooms, pepperoni, bouillon, chili powder and kidney beans.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a boil.

']

Title: Scacce Ragusane (Sicilian Stuffed Flatbread)
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup warm water, or more as needed', '1 teaspoon active dry yeast', '1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '1 ¾ cups semolina flour', '1 ¼ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 tablespoon cornmeal, or as needed', '½ cup prepared pizza sauce', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil, or to taste', '6 ounces aged provolone cheese, sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour 1/3 cup warm water into a mixing bowl and sprinkle yeast over the top.
', 'Step 2: Let stand for 10 to 15 minutes to make sure yeast is active.
', 'Step 3: Add olive oil, semolina flour, and salt to the yeast mixture.
', 'Step 4: Mix with your hand to form a relatively stiff ball of dough, adding more water if needed to bring the dough together.
', 'Step 5: Transfer dough to a work surface and knead until smooth, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Cover with the mixing bowl and let rest for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Uncover and knead the dough for another 3 or 4 minutes; divide dough into 2 portions, and shape each into smooth balls.
', 'Step 8: Use damp hands to help smooth the dough out, if needed.
', 'Step 9: Generously dust half of a kitchen towel with semolina flour and place the 2 balls of dough on top.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle more flour on top of the balls and cover with the other half of the towel.
', 'Step 11: Leave to rise until the dough has almost doubled in size, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 12: Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Line a baking sheet with foil and sprinkle with cornmeal.
', 'Step 14: Roll each ball of dough out into a very thin circle or oval shape on a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 15: Combine pizza sauce and basil in a bowl.
', 'Step 16: Spread with a thin layer of sauce and scatter pieces of provolone cheese every few inches, leaving a 1 inch border.
', 'Step 17: Fold over the opposite edges toward the middle to form a rectangle.
', 'Step 18: Press lightly to flatten slightly.
', 'Step 19: Repeat sauce and cheese step.
', 'Step 20: Fold each end toward the center to make a square shape.
', 'Step 21: Spread with a thin layer of sauce and scatter pieces of cheese on just one half.
', 'Step 22: Fold in half, overlapping the edge by about 1 inch.
', 'Step 23: Transfer to the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 24: Repeat filling and folding the second piece of dough.
', 'Step 25: Bake in the preheated oven until very well browned, 16 to 18 minutes.
', 'Step 26: Some spots may get charred, but this is fine and desirable, since scacce are traditionally cooked in very hot wood-fired ovens.
', 'Step 27: Let rest for 15 minutes before slicing and serving.
']

Title: Old Bay® Shrimp and Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients: ['½ cup olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, chopped, or to taste', '1 pound jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined', '3 tablespoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)', '1 tablespoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package angel hair pasta', '½ cup Alfredo sauce, or as needed', '1 tablespoon freshly squeezed lemon juice']

Title: Pear and Prosciutto Pizza
Ingredients: ['6 cloves garlic', '½ tablespoon olive oil', '2 ripe pears, halved and cored', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'all-purpose flour for dusting', '1 unbaked pizza crust', '1 tablespoon cornmeal for dusting', '6 ounces shredded Swiss cheese', '5 thin slices prosciutto, cut into halves', '1 (6 ounce) package fresh mozzarella, cut into small cubes', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ tablespoon olive oil']

Title: Mexican Stuffed Shells
Ingredients: ['36 jumbo pasta shells', '1 pound lean ground beef', '1 cup water', '1 (1.25 ounce) package taco seasoning mix', '1 (16 ounce) can refried beans', '1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese', '1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chiles', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '¾ cup picante sauce']

Title: Genoese Sponge
Ingredients: ['6 egg whites', '½ teaspoon cream of tartar', '¾ cup white sugar', '1 cup butter, softened', '1 cup white sugar', '6 egg yolks', '2 cups sifted cake flour', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease a 10 inch tube pan.
', 'Step 2: Beat egg whites and cream of tartar until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 3: Add 3/4 cup sugar gradually, beating until very stiff.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl, cream butter or margarine and 1 cup sugar well.
', 'Step 5: Add egg yolks, and beat until thick and fluffy.
', 'Step 6: Sift flour, baking powder, and salt over batter.
', 'Step 7: Fold in.
', 'Step 8: Gently fold in egg whites.
', 'Step 9: Pour batter into prepared pan.
', 'Step 10: Bake for 50 to 60 minutes, until an inserted wooden pick comes out clean.
', 'Step 11: Cool.
', 'Step 12: Ice with your favorite frosting.
']

Title: Italian Sausage-Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 medium head cabbage', '1 (19 ounce) package mild Italian sausage (such as Johnsonville®)', '2 cups marinara sauce', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '2 cups cooked rice', '2 teaspoons dried basil, or more to taste', '2 teaspoons dried oregano, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Put olive oil on the bottom of a medium-sized baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Remove casings from sausage.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook cabbage leaves until tender, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain.
', 'Step 7: While the cabbage is cooking, remove casings from sausage.
', 'Step 8: Cook and stir sausage in a skillet over medium-high heat, breaking it into pieces as it cooks, until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 10: At the same time, combine marinara sauce and tomato sauce in a saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 11: Cook until warm, about 3 minutes; set aside.
', 'Step 12: Mix cooked rice, sausage, and 1/2 cup sauce with basil and oregano.
', 'Step 13: Spread filling onto cabbage leaves and roll up like small burritos.
', 'Step 14: The amount of filling in each will vary depending on how big your cabbage leaves are.
', 'Step 15: Place cabbage rolls close together in the prepared dish and spoon remaining sauce over top.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until cooked through, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Garnish with more basil and oregano.
']
