Title: Orange Almond Biscotti II
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ cups all-purpose flour', '1 ¼ cups white sugar', '1 pinch salt', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '½ cup sliced almonds', '1 tablespoon orange zest', '3 egg, beaten', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '¼ teaspoon almond extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, almonds, and orange zest.
', 'Step 4: Make a well in the center and add the eggs oil, and almond extract.
', 'Step 5: Stir or mix by hand until the mixture forms a ball.
', 'Step 6: Separate dough into 2 pieces and roll each one into a log about 8 inches long.
', 'Step 7: Place logs on prepared baking sheet and flatten so they are about 3/4 inch thick.
', 'Step 8: Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Cool slightly, and remove from baking sheets.
', 'Step 10: Slice diagonally into 1/2 inch slices with a serrated knife.
', 'Step 11: Set cookies on side back onto the cookie sheet and bake for 10 to 15 more minutes, turning over after half of the time.
', 'Step 12: Finished cookies should be hard and crunchy.
']

Title: Key West Penne
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package penne pasta', '1 pound shrimp', '1 pound scallops', '1 (12 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained', '1 (8 ounce) jar sun-dried tomatoes, packed in oil', '1 pint heavy cream', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup pitted kalamata olives']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Heat a large heavy skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Combine shrimp, scallops, artichokes and sun dried tomatoes, then cook until shrimp turn pink.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat, and stir in cream and parmesan.
', 'Step 6: Toss with cooked pasta, and sprinkle olives on top.
']

Title: Chicken Cacciatore Delight
Ingredients: ['1 (3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '¼ cup peanut oil', '2 cups onions, cut into thin rings', '½ cup chopped green bell pepper', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 (14.5 ounce) can crushed tomatoes, drained', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ cup sherry']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Rinse and pat the chicken pieces dry with paper towels, then coat with flour in a bowl or a resealable plastic zipper bag.
', 'Step 2: Heat the peanut oil in a large skillet over medium heat, and brown the chicken on all sides until golden brown, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove the chicken, and set aside in a bowl.
', 'Step 4: Cook the onions, green bell pepper, and garlic in the oil left in the hot skillet until the onion slices are translucent, about 5 minutes; stir in mushrooms, and cook and stir until the mushrooms have given up their liquid and are almost tender, about 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, salt, oregano, and sherry, and mix well; stir in the chicken pieces and any juices that have collected.
', 'Step 6: Simmer until the chicken meat is tender and no longer pink in the thickest part of a thigh, and the juices run clear, 30 to 40 minutes.
']

Title: Grandma's Old Italian Spaghetti Sauce with Meatballs
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 whole garlic cloves, peeled', "2 pig's feet", '1 pound pork neck bones', '2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '1 ½ cups water', '2 (28 ounce) cans tomato puree', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '¾ teaspoon baking soda', '1 (16 ounce) loaf fresh Italian bread, torn into 2-inch pieces', '1 cup water', '6 eggs, beaten', '1 pound ground pork', '1 pound ground veal', '1 pound ground beef', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '6 hard-boiled eggs, peeled']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat in the bottom of a large saucepan, and fry the garlic cloves 5 to 8 minutes, until brown and fragrant.
', 'Step 2: Remove the garlic cloves and set aside.
', "Step 3: Place the pig's feet and pork neck bones in the saucepan and fry, turning occasionally, until the meat and bones have browned, about 15 minutes.
", 'Step 4: n Return the garlic cloves to the saucepan, and stir in the tomato paste and 1 1/2 cups of water.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a boil, and pour in the tomato puree.
', "Step 6: Reduce heat to low, and simmer for about 3 hours, stirring from the bottom often to prevent burning, until the pig's feet are tender and the mixture begins to thicken.
", 'Step 7: Stir in the sugar, pepper, and baking soda.
', 'Step 8: Continue to simmer while you prepare the meatballs.
', 'Step 9: n Soak the torn bread with 1 cup of water in a bowl.
', 'Step 10: Squeeze excess water out of the bread, and place the bread in a large bowl with the 6 beaten eggs, ground pork, ground veal, and ground beef.
', 'Step 11: Mix thoroughly and form into 24 meatballs about 2 1/2 inches in diameter.
', 'Step 12: n Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat, stir in the minced garlic and chopped fresh basil, let them cook for about 1 minute, and then add the meatballs.
', 'Step 13: Season with salt and pepper to taste, and fry them on all sides until brown, about 15 minutes, working in batches, if necessary.
', 'Step 14: n Place the browned meatballs, along with the oil, garlic, and basil from the skillet into the sauce, stirring lightly to avoid breaking them.
', 'Step 15: Add the whole hard-boiled eggs, and simmer for about 1 1/2 more hours, until the meatballs are cooked, the sauce is thick, and all the flavors have blended.
']

Title: Home-Style Chicken Piccata
Ingredients: ['½ cup all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 egg', '¼ cup butter', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 cup chicken broth', '½ lemon']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk flour, garlic powder, and paprika together in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Beat egg in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 3: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Dip chicken in egg until coated.
', 'Step 5: Dredge chicken through flour mixture until evenly coated, shaking off excess.
', 'Step 6: Fry chicken in the melted butter until browned, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 7: Add chicken broth to skillet, cover, and cook until chicken is not longer pink in the center, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Squeeze lemon over chicken.
']

Title: Mussels Marinara di Amore
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 (14.5 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '1 pinch crushed red pepper flakes', '¼ cup white wine', '1 pound mussels, cleaned and debearded', '8 ounces linguini pasta', '1 lemon - cut into wedges, for garnish']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large skillet over medium heat, warm oil and saute garlic until transparent.
', 'Step 2: Add tomatoes, oregano, basil and red pepper flakes to skillet; reduce heat to low to simmer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and reserve.
', 'Step 5: Add wine and mussels to skillet; cover and increase heat to high for 3 to 5 minutes or until mussel shells are open.
', 'Step 6: Pour over hot pasta, sprinkle with parsley and squeeze lemon wedge over all.
', 'Step 7: Garnish with remaining lemon and serve.
']

Title: Italian Polenta Casserole
Ingredients: ['1 (14 ounce) can cherry tomatoes', '¼ cup fresh basil', '2 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon red wine', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '3 cups water', '½ teaspoon salt', '¾ cup polenta', '1 cup grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 medium zucchini, thinly sliced', '1 ½ cups finely shredded Italian-style cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.
', 'Step 3: Combine cherry tomatoes, basil, garlic, red wine, and 1/8 teaspoon salt for marinara in the bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 4: Pulse a few times to puree.
', 'Step 5: Set aside.
', 'Step 6: Bring water and 1/2 teaspoon salt to a boil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Whisk in polenta slowly, whisking constantly to ensure there are no lumps.
', 'Step 8: Bring back to a boil; reduce heat to low and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove from heat and stir in Pecorino Romano cheese and butter.
', 'Step 10: Pour 1/2 of the polenta into the prepared casserole dish.
', 'Step 11: Top with 1/2 of the sliced zucchini, overlapping slices slightly.
', 'Step 12: Top zucchini with 1/2 of the marinara sauce, then sprinkle with 1/2 of the Italian-style cheese.
', 'Step 13: Repeat layers one more time.
', 'Step 14: Bake, covered, in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Uncover and continue to bake until cheese on top is slightly brown, about 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 16: Remove from the oven and let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Spicy Sausage Broccoli Rabe Parmesan
Ingredients: ['8 ounces whole wheat rotini pasta', '3 bunches broccoli rabe, trimmed', '4 (4 ounce) links hot Italian sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces', '1 tablespoon sausage drippings', '2 garlic cloves, chopped', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon olive oil, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Once the water is boiling, stir in the rotini, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 6 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 5: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan, and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer.
', 'Step 6: Cover, and bring the water to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 7: Add the broccoli rabe, recover, and steam until just tender, about 2 minutes depending on thickness.
', 'Step 8: Place the Italian sausage into a large skillet over medium heat, and cook until browned and no longer pink inside, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove sausage from pan and set aside; drain excess grease, leaving about 1 tablespoon of sausage drippings in the pan.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle in the garlic, and cook until it starts to brown, about 1 minute; stir in half the broccoli rabe.
', 'Step 11: Cook and stir until the rabe has wilted, and add the remaining rabe and the diced tomatoes.
', 'Step 12: Cook until all the rabe is tender, about 5 minutes; sprinkle with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 13: Return the sausage to the skillet, and cook just until the meat is hot; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese, crushed red pepper flakes, and a drizzle of olive oil.
', 'Step 14: Serve over hot rotini.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '573.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '55.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '69.4 mg', 'fatContent': '24.8 g', 'fiberContent': '10.1 g', 'proteinContent': '34.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '1084 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.6 g'}

Title: Chef John's Rustic Italian Corn Bread
Ingredients: ['1 cup warm water', '½ cup bread flour', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '⅛ teaspoon white sugar', '½ cup cornmeal', '2 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '2 cups bread flour, or as needed', '1 tablespoon cornmeal, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir warm water, 1/2 cup bread flour, yeast, and sugar together in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until the yeast softens and forms a creamy mixture, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Mix 1/2 cup cornmeal, olive oil, and salt into yeast mixture.
', 'Step 4: Gradually add bread flour to yeast mixture until a dough pulls together.
', 'Step 5: Knead dough on a lightly floured work surface until smooth and elastic, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Place dough in a large, lightly-oiled bowl and turn to coat.
', 'Step 7: Cover with a damp towel and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 8: Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll into a 14-inch wide rectangle.
', 'Step 9: Roll dough, starting from the long-end, into a loaf, finishing seam-side down.
', 'Step 10: Dust a baking sheet with 1 tablespoon cornmeal.
', 'Step 11: Place loaf on baking sheet, cover with a dry towel, and let rise until doubled, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 12: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Place a shallow pan of water on the lower rack of the oven.
', 'Step 14: Cut a 1/2-inch deep slash down the center of the loaf.
', 'Step 15: Bake in preheated oven until the top is golden brown and the bottom of loaf sounds hollow when tapped, 35 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Cool on a wire rack.
']

Title: Brad's Slow Cooker Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour', '3 eggs', '12 ounces Italian-seasoned bread crumbs', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '6 tablespoons butter, divided, or more to taste', '2 (24 ounce) jars marinara sauce, or more to taste', '12 slices mozzarella cheese', '1 (3 ounce) package Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons oregano', '2 tablespoons basil', '1 tablespoon garlic powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Spread flour on a shallow plate.
', 'Step 2: Beat eggs in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Pour bread crumbs into a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 4: Dredge chicken breasts in flour.
', 'Step 5: Dip in egg and roll in bread crumbs to coat.
', 'Step 6: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Fry breaded chicken breasts, 2 at a time, until golden brown, 4 to 6 minutes per side.
', 'Step 8: Transfer to a plate.
', 'Step 9: Repeat with remaining butter and chicken breasts.
', 'Step 10: Layer chicken breasts in a slow cooker, covering each layer with marinara sauce.
', 'Step 11: Cook on low until flavors combine, 2 1/2 to 3 hours.
', 'Step 12: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Place chicken breasts side-by-side in a baking dish, spooning additional sauce on top.
', 'Step 14: Place 2 slices mozzarella cheese over each piece of chicken.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese, oregano, basil, and garlic powder on top.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, about 10 minutes.
']

Title: Noni's Taralli
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups warm water, or as needed', '1 teaspoon active dry yeast', '7 cups all-purpose flour (such as King Arthur®)', '7 fluid ounces Chablis wine', '7 ounces olive oil', '1 ½ tablespoons fennel seeds, or more to taste', '1 ½ tablespoons salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dissolve yeast in warm water in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Combine flour, wine, oil, fennel seeds, and salt in a large stand mixer with a dough hook attachment.
', 'Step 3: Knead on low speed.
', 'Step 4: Add yeast mixture slowly.
', 'Step 5: Continue to mix until a smooth ball is formed and dough pulls away from the sides of the bowl, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove dough from the bowl; knead into a ball.
', 'Step 7: Wrap in plastic wrap and let rest for 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of water to boil over high heat.
', 'Step 9: Cut the dough into 2-inch cross sections; roll into 1/2-inch-diameter "tubes".
', 'Step 10: Cut tubes lengthwise into 1/4-inch cross sections.
', 'Step 11: Roll each from the center out; fold ends over one another.
', 'Step 12: Boil taralli in the hot water in groups of 10 until they rise to the top, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 13: Remove with a slotted spoon.
', 'Step 14: Continue with remaining taralli.
', 'Step 15: Let dry for 4 hours.
', 'Step 16: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 17: Place dried taralli onto baking sheets.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven, flipping as needed, until golden brown, 20 to 30 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '25.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '3.4 g', 'fatContent': '1 g', 'fiberContent': '0.1 g', 'proteinContent': '0.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '52.6 mg'}

Title: Italian Eggplant Tomato Bake
Ingredients: ['½ cup all-purpose flour', '½ cup dry bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons water', '1 small eggplant, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds', '1 tablespoon peanut oil', '1 (14 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 cup ricotta cheese', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tomato, thinly sliced', '1 (8 ounce) package angel hair pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a plastic bag, combine the flour, bread crumbs and Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 3: Shake to mix.
', 'Step 4: In a shallow bowl, whisk together the eggs and water.
', 'Step 5: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: There should be enough oil to thinly coat the bottom of the skillet.
', 'Step 7: Dip the eggplant slices in egg, then place in the bag and shake to coat.
', 'Step 8: Fry the slices in the skillet until golden brown on each side.
', 'Step 9: Remove, and drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 10: Spread a thin layer of spaghetti sauce in the bottom of a 9 inch square baking dish.
', 'Step 11: Cover with the eggplant slices, then top with more sauce.
', 'Step 12: Mix together the ricotta cheese and Parmesan cheese; spread over the eggplant.
', 'Step 13: Spread sauce over the cheese, and top with tomato slices.
', 'Step 14: Cover with more sauce, and spread remaining cheese over the top.
', 'Step 15: Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until cheese is melted and sauce is bubbling.
', 'Step 16: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 17: Add the pasta, and cook for about 3 minutes, or until tender.
', 'Step 18: Drain.
', 'Step 19: Serve the eggplant tomato bake over pasta.
']

Title: Schiacciata alla Fiorentina or Italian Easter Cake

Title: Pepperoni Stromboli
Ingredients: ['2 (1 pound) loaves frozen bread dough, thawed', '½ cup spaghetti sauce', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '4 ounces sliced pepperoni sausage', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Punch dough down.
', 'Step 3: On a lightly floured surface, roll each loaf into 20x8 inch rectangle.
', 'Step 4: Place one rectangle on a greased baking sheet.
', 'Step 5: Spread spaghetti sauce in an 18x4 inch strip down the center.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle with oregano, pepperoni and mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 7: Fold long sides of dough up toward filling; set aside.
', 'Step 8: Cut the remaining rectangle into three strips.
', 'Step 9: Loosely braid strips; pinch ends to seal.
', 'Step 10: Place bread on top of the cheese; pinch braid to dough to seal.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 12: Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes, or until golden brown.
']

Title: Lentil and Buckwheat Soup
Ingredients: ['1 cup brown lentils', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion, grated', '1 small carrot, grated', '2 bay leaves', '4 ½ cups low-sodium vegetable broth, divided', '¾ cup raw buckwheat groats', '1 (9 ounce) package fresh baby spinach', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak lentils in a bowl of cold water for 1 hour.
', 'Step 2: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Heat oil in a Dutch oven or heavy-bottomed stew pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Add grated onion and carrot and saute until soft, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add lentils and bay leaves and stir until coated with oil.
', 'Step 6: Pour in 3 cups vegetable broth, stir, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 7: Leave at a slow boil for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to a simmer and add buckwheat.
', 'Step 9: Simmer until lentils are soft but not mushy and buckwheat is cooked through, about 25 minutes, adding remaining broth if needed.
', 'Step 10: Remove from the heat and fold in fresh spinach until wilted.
', 'Step 11: Remove bay leaves.
', 'Step 12: Serve hot with a 1/2 tablespoon olive oil drizzled on top of each portion.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '224.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '28.9 g', 'fatContent': '10 g', 'fiberContent': '6.1 g', 'proteinContent': '7.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '191.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.4 g'}

Title: Insalata Caprese I
Ingredients: ['4 ripe tomatoes, cut into wedges', '14 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, diced', '1 red onion, sliced', '⅓ cup extra virgin olive oil', '⅓ cup balsamic vinegar', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, combine the tomatoes, cheese, onion, oil, vinegar, basil, and salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 2: Toss and chill for 1 hour.
', 'Step 3: Serve on large platter.
']

Title: Vegan Italian Pasta Salad with Vegetables and Olives
Ingredients: ['1 (12 ounce) package fusilli pasta', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided, or more if needed', '½ cup Kalamata olives, pitted', '¼ cup Italian parsley', '1 teaspoon capers in brine, drained', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 clove garlic, minced, divided', '⅛ teaspoon red wine vinegar', '1 small eggplant, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '1 large zucchini, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '1 large red bell pepper, cut into 1-inch cubes', '1 small onion, cut into 1-inch cubes', '10 cherry tomatoes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook fusilli in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and drizzle with 1 to 2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil.
', 'Step 4: Mix to coat and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Combine pitted olives, parsley, capers, red pepper flakes, 1/2 of the garlic, vinegar, and 1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil in a mini food processor.
', 'Step 6: Blend to create a rough, runny paste.
', 'Step 7: Set dressing aside.
', 'Step 8: Heat 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil in a nonstick skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Saute eggplant until tender and browned, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove with a slotted spoon and place on paper towels to drain.
', 'Step 11: Add remaining extra-virgin olive oil and saute zucchini until browned, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Remove with a slotted spoon and place on paper towels to soak any excess oil.
', 'Step 13: Cook bell pepper, onion, and remaining 1/2 of the garlic in the same skillet until softened, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Add cherry tomatoes and heat until they begin to blister.
', 'Step 15: Return eggplant and zucchini to the skillet and mix to combine.
', 'Step 16: Remove from heat and transfer vegetables to a large bowl.
', 'Step 17: Cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 18: Mix pasta and dressing with the vegetables; toss to coat.
', 'Step 19: Add more olive oil if necessary.
', 'Step 20: Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '405.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '61.9 g', 'fatContent': '13.8 g', 'fiberContent': '7 g', 'proteinContent': '11.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2 g', 'sodiumContent': '255.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '7 g'}

Title: Pizza Sauce I
Ingredients: ['2 ripe tomatoes', '1 clove garlic', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions: ['Step 1: In a food processor, combine the tomatoes, garlic, basil, cinnamon, salt, pepper, sugar, oregano, oil and parsley.\n', 'Step 2: Blend without liquifying - should remain a little chunky.\n']

Title: Baked Fennel with Parmesan
Ingredients: ['2 fennel bulbs', '1 tablespoon butter', '¾ cup half-and-half cream', '¾ cup creme fraiche', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Cut the base off of the fennel bulbs, and cut a cone shape into the base to remove the core.
', 'Step 3: You can see the core because it is whiter than the surrounding green.
', 'Step 4: This is optional, but helps the fennel cook faster.
', 'Step 5: Slice the fennel vertically (upright) into 1/4 inch thick slices.
', 'Step 6: Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add the fennel, and fry for about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the half-and-half and creme fraiche until well blended.
', 'Step 9: Transfer to a shallow baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over the top.
', 'Step 11: Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the top is golden brown and the fennel is tender enough to pierce with a fork.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '300.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '12.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '91 mg', 'fatContent': '26.9 g', 'fiberContent': '3.6 g', 'proteinContent': '6.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '16.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '210.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.8 g'}

Title: Granita di Caffe con Panna (Italian Coffee Granita)
Ingredients: ['1 cup water', '⅓ cup white sugar', '1 cup strong espresso coffee', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup whipped cream, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring water and sugar to a boil in a small saucepan; simmer until a candy thermometer reads 250 degrees F (120 degrees C), about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Remove saucepan from heat; add coffee and vanilla extract.
', 'Step 3: Pour into a metal bowl and mix well.
', 'Step 4: Cool granita mixture to room temperature, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Freeze for 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Stir the granita vigorously to break up ice crystals.
', 'Step 7: Repeat freezing and breaking up process 4 to 5 more times, 2 to 2 1/2 hours total.
', 'Step 8: Drop spoonfuls of whipped cream into 4 short glasses.
', 'Step 9: Divide granita mixture evenly among the glasses.
', 'Step 10: Top with remaining whipped cream.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '106.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '18.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '11.4 mg', 'fatContent': '3.3 g', 'proteinContent': '0.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '22.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '18 g'}

Title: Eggplant Parmigiana Caponata
Ingredients: ['1 cup olive oil, divided', '1 eggplant, sliced into 1/2 inch rounds', '2 red bell peppers, chopped', '8 slices mozzarella cheese', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (16 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, with juice', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '¼ cup balsamic vinegar', '¼ cup red wine vinegar', '½ cup brown sugar', '8 tablespoons tomato paste', '8 anchovy fillets, chopped', '3 tablespoons capers, chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Heat 1/2 cup olive oil in a large heavy skillet.
', 'Step 3: Saute eggplant until each piece becomes saturated with oil.
', 'Step 4: Use eggplant to line the bottom of a 3 quart casserole dish.
', 'Step 5: Saute the red peppers until tender, and layer over eggplant in casserole dish.
', 'Step 6: Top with mozzarella.
', 'Step 7: Heat remaining olive oil, and cook onions and garlic until lightly browned and caramelized.
', 'Step 8: Stir in stewed tomatoes, basil, and oregano and simmer 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add balsamic vinegar, red wine vinegar, brown sugar, and tomato paste.
', 'Step 10: Simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Add anchovy fillets, if using, and capers.
', 'Step 12: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 13: Pour over the mozzarella cheese in the casserole dish.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese on top of sauce.
', 'Step 15: Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until cheese is melted.
']

Title: Neapolitan-Style Pizza Dough with Garlic and Italian Seasonings
Ingredients: ['3 cups unbleached all-purpose flour (such as King Arthur®), or as needed', '1 ¼ teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon fast-rising dry yeast', '1 ½ cups ice water, or as needed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon granulated garlic', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, mix the flour, salt, and yeast until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 2: Mix in ice water, scraping the bowl as you mix, until all the flour and water have been incorporated into a soft dough.
', 'Step 3: Mix in 2 tablespoons of olive oil.
', 'Step 4: Turn the dough out onto a floured work surface, and knead until the dough is firm but slightly sticky, mixing in more flour if needed.
', 'Step 5: Knead the granulated garlic and Italian seasoning into the dough.
', 'Step 6: (The kneading step can be done in a bread machine set on the Dough setting.
', 'Step 7: )n Form the dough into a round, and place into an oiled bowl.
', 'Step 8: Brush the top with 1/2 teaspoon of olive oil, cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and allow the dough to rise until double, 1 to 2 hours.
', 'Step 9: Punch down the dough, and cut in half.
', 'Step 10: Form each half into a 12-inch pizza crust, and place on pizza pans.
', 'Step 11: n Move a rack to the bottom position in oven, and preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: n Bake the pizza crusts on the bottom rack just until firm, 3 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Allow the crusts to cool for about 10 minutes before topping with sauce, cheese, or other desired ingredients and returning to oven to bake.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '139.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '24.7 g', 'fatContent': '2.8 g', 'fiberContent': '1.2 g', 'proteinContent': '3.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '244.1 mg'}

Title: Pasta Sauce a la Pauly
Ingredients: ['1 cup butter', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '¼ pound ground veal', '¼ pound ground beef', '¼ pound ground pork', '2 (19 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes', '1 ½ (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '1 onion, chopped', '½ pound sliced fresh mushrooms', '½ cup red wine', '½ green bell pepper, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 ½ teaspoons white sugar', '½ teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '½ teaspoon bitters (such as Angostura®)', '1 pinch cayenne pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter with the olive oil in a pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir veal, beef, and pork in the butter mixture until completely browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: n Stir stewed tomatoes, tomato paste, onion, mushrooms, red wine, bell pepper, garlic, sugar, Worcestershire sauce, bitters, and cayenne pepper into the meat mixture; bring to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook at a simmer until the tomatoes break down into a sauce, at least 3 hours.
']

Title: Jet Swirl Pizza Appetizers

Title: Turkey Polish Sausage and Peppers
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 medium yellow bell peppers, seeded and diced', '2 medium red bell peppers, seeded and diced', '1 pound fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 medium zucchini, cubed', '3 tablespoons minced garlic', '1 tablespoon steak seasoning', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 (16 ounce) package turkey kielbasa, sliced', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, or to taste', 'grated Parmesan cheese for topping']

', 'Step 6: Just before serving, add a splash of balsamic vinegar, and sprinkle liberally with Parmesan cheese.

Title: Stephan's Broiled Salmon Pesto
Ingredients: ['2 pounds salmon fillets', '2 lemons', '1 ½ cups pesto', '½ cup white wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Lightly oil a baking pan large enough to accommodate the fish.
', 'Step 2: Place salmon in pan skin side down.
', 'Step 3: Run finger over flesh to make sure all bones have been removed.
', 'Step 4: Use pliers to pull out any that remain.
', 'Step 5: Squeeze juice of one lemon and white wine over fish.
', 'Step 6: Marinate 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Preheat broiler.
', 'Step 8: Coat the top side of the fish with thick layer of pesto.
', 'Step 9: It should be between an 1/8th to a 1/4 of an inch thick, and cover the surface of the fish.
', 'Step 10: Place fish under the broiler about nine inches from heat source.
', 'Step 11: Broil for 8 to 10 minutes per inch of thickness, or until fish flakes and flesh is opaque.
', 'Step 12: Pesto should have formed a heavily browned crust.
', 'Step 13: Remove from the oven, and set aside for a few minutes.
', 'Step 14: Squeeze half of second lemon over fish.
', 'Step 15: Slice remaining lemon half into thin slices.
', 'Step 16: Place lemon slices on individual servings, or arrange on the whole flank if serving at the table.
']

Title: Homemade Semolina Pasta Dough
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups semolina flour', '1 pinch salt', '1 cup water, or as needed, at room temperature']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix flour and salt in a large bowl or on a marble work surface.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the center.
', 'Step 3: Pour water into the well a little at a time, mixing it with the flour.
', 'Step 4: Add as much water as needed to make a sticky but compact dough.
', 'Step 5: Knead dough with your hands by flattening the ball, stretching it, and folding the top towards the center.
', 'Step 6: Turn 45 degrees and repeat until dough is elastic and smooth, but not too soft, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 8: Place in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 9: Let rest at room temperature for about 30 minutes before using.
', 'Step 10: Roll out the dough with a pasta machine or with a rolling pin and cut into your favorite shapes.
']

Title: Creamy Pesto Sauce

Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add the basil leaves and cook until tender and bright green, 2 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain basil, reserving 2 tablespoons of the basil water.
', 'Step 4: n Blend basil, 2 tablespoons basil water, Parmesan cheese, cream cheese, olive oil, butter, and garlic in a blender until smooth and creamy.
']

Title: Christmas Eve Manicotti
Ingredients: ['4 eggs', '¼ teaspoon salt', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '2 ¼ cups milk', '¼ cup melted butter', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or more as needed', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach - thawed, drained, and squeezed dry', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '3 tablespoons chopped green onion', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '2 cups prepared marinara sauce, or as needed', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk 4 eggs and 1/4 teaspoon salt together in a bowl; gradually whisk flour into eggs, alternating with milk, to make a smooth batter.
', 'Step 2: Whisk melted butter into batter; refrigerate at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 3: Pour vegetable oil into a small bowl.
', 'Step 4: Heat a small skillet over medium heat; brush skillet with vegetable oil using a pastry brush.
', 'Step 5: Ladle in enough batter to lightly cover the bottom of the skillet, about 1/4 cup; swirl skillet to cover bottom completely.
', 'Step 6: Cook crepe until it turns lightly golden brown on the bottom; flip and cook until other side has small brown spots.
', 'Step 7: Repeat with remaining batter, brushing the skillet with oil as needed to prevent crepes from sticking; set cooked crepes aside between layers of waxed paper.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Lightly mix spinach, ricotta cheese, cream cheese, Parmesan cheese, parsley, green onion, onion powder, oregano, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 2 eggs in a bowl until filling is thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 10: Spread 1 cup marinara sauce into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 11: Place a crepe onto a work surface and spoon about 3 tablespoons filling, or more as needed, in a line down the center of each crepe.
', 'Step 12: Roll crepe over filling and set into sauce in pan; repeat with remaining crepes and filling, laying filled crepes into pan.
', 'Step 13: Spread remaining marinara sauce over filled crepes.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbling and mozzarella cheese is melted and slightly browned, 20 to 30 minutes.
']

Title: Tortellini alla Fini
Ingredients: ['2 (8 ounce) packages fresh cheese tortellini', '6 tablespoons butter', '1 pint heavy cream', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 cups freshly shredded Parmesan cheese', '2 cups diced cooked ham', '2 cups cooked peas']

['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil; stir in tortellini and return to a boil.

', 'Step 6: Slowly mix in Parmesan cheese, stirring constantly, and allow to thicken.
', 'Step 7: Mix in ham and peas.
', 'Step 8: Drain cooked tortellini and return to the pot.
', 'Step 9: Pour sauce over tortellini and toss to combine.
']

Title: Escarole Siciliano

Title: Very Easy Risotto
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '⅔ cup sliced green onion', '1 ⅓ cups uncooked long-grain rice', '4 cups water', '1 teaspoon chicken bouillon granules', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook green onions in butter briefly, then add the rice.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir for a few minutes to toast rice.
', 'Step 4: Stir in water, and season with chicken bouillon and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low.
', 'Step 6: Cover, and simmer for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove from heat, cover, and let stand for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the Parmesan cheese.

Title: Italian Turkey Zoodles
Ingredients: ['3 zucchini', '1 tablespoon salt, or more as needed', '1 pound ground turkey', '½ teaspoon garlic salt', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (3 ounce) can tomato paste', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup small-curd cottage cheese', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']

['Step 1: Make zucchini noodles using a spiralizer or julienne peeler.
', 'Step 2: Place noodles in a colander and cover liberally with 1 tablespoon salt.
', 'Step 3: Let sit until noodles release some moisture, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Rinse noodles and pat dry.
', 'Step 5: Place ground turkey, garlic salt, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, and red pepper flakes in a large oven-safe skillet over medium heat.

', 'Step 9: Add olive oil and minced garlic; cook until garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute.

', 'Step 11: Stir diced tomatoes, tomato paste, balsamic vinegar, parsley, basil, Italian seasoning, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and black pepper into the skillet.
', 'Step 12: Bring to a boil; cook until sauce thickens, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir in noodles.
', 'Step 14: Cover with cottage cheese.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle mozzarella cheese evenly on top.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, about 15 minutes.

', 'Step 18: Remove from oven and let sit for 5 to 10 minutes before serving.

Title: Lemony Almond-Ricotta Cookies
Ingredients: ['1 cup white sugar', '½ cup unsalted butter, softened', '1 cup ricotta cheese, at room temperature', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon almond extract', '½ teaspoon lemon zest', '1 large egg, room temperature', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ cup powdered sugar', '2 tablespoons lemon juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Beat sugar and butter in a large bowl with an electric mixer on low speed until blended.
', 'Step 4: Increase speed to high and beat until light and fluffy, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Beat in ricotta cheese, lemon juice, almond extract, lemon zest, and egg on medium speed until well combined.
', 'Step 6: Reduce speed to low.
', 'Step 7: Add flour, baking powder, and salt; beat slowly until a dough forms.
', 'Step 8: Drop dough about 2 inches apart onto the prepared baking sheet using a cookie scoop.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are very lightly golden but still soft, 12 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove from oven, transfer to a wire rack, and cool completely before icing, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Stir powdered sugar and lemon juice together in a small bowl to make a smooth icing.
', 'Step 12: Drizzle icing onto the cookies.
', 'Step 13: Set cookies aside to allow icing to dry completely.
']

Title: Panettone II

Title: Pizza Rustica (A Sicilian Sausage and Prosciutto Pie)
Ingredients: ['2 pounds ricotta cheese', '2 pounds bulk Italian sausage', '5 large eggs, beaten', '1 pound shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon finely chopped parsley', '¼ pound prosciutto, chopped', 'freshly cracked black pepper to taste', '2 pounds prepared pizza dough', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place a piece of cheesecloth into a strainer, and place the ricotta cheese into the cheesecloth.
', 'Step 2: Set a bowl underneath the strainer to catch drips, and refrigerate 8 hours, or overnight, to allow moisture to drip from ricotta.
', 'Step 3: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Place sausage into a large skillet over medium heat, and cook and stir until browned and crumbly, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain excess grease, and allow sausage to cool.
', 'Step 6: Place the drained ricotta cheese into a large bowl, and stir in 5 beaten eggs and mozzarella cheese until well mixed.
', 'Step 7: Mix in the cooked sausage, Parmesan cheese, parsley, prosciutto, and black pepper until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 8: Divide the pizza dough into fourths, and roll out 2 of the pieces into 12-inch circles.
', 'Step 9: Fit the circles into 2 10-inch pie plates, leaving 1 inch of dough hanging over the edge.
', 'Step 10: Divide the filling between the 2 pies.
', 'Step 11: Roll out 2 top crusts, place onto the pies, and fold the edges of the bottom crusts over the edges of the top crusts to seal.
', 'Step 12: Crimp and flute the edges of the pie crusts.
', 'Step 13: Beat 1 egg with water in a small bowl, and brush the egg wash over the tops and edges of both pies.
', 'Step 14: Cut several slits into the top crusts to vent steam.
', 'Step 15: Bake pies in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, then lower oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Continue to bake until the crust is browned and the filling is hot, 45 to 50 more minutes.
', 'Step 17: Serve at room temperature.
']

Title: Garlic Lover's Pizza Crust for the Bread Machine
Ingredients: ['6 fluid ounces lukewarm water', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 cups bread flour', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the ingredients into the pan of a bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer.
', 'Step 2: Close the lid, select the Dough cycle, and press Start.
', 'Step 3: n When the machine signals the end of the cycle, remove the dough and knead into a tight ball on a lightly floured surface.

', 'Step 5: n Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Stretch the dough out to fit your desired pizza pan.
', 'Step 7: Let rise for about 20 minutes for a thicker crust.
', 'Step 8: n Top with sauce, cheese and desired pizza toppings.
', 'Step 9: Bake for 10 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the crust is lightly browned on the bottom when you lift up to take a peek.
']

Title: Marinara with White Wine
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil from anchovies', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '½ cup chopped onion', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '½ cup white wine', '1 ½ pounds grape tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, with juice', '6 anchovy fillets', '½ teaspoon salt', 'black pepper to taste', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon chopped parsley', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 small bay leaf']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the anchovy oil in a saucepan over medium heat, stir in garlic, onions, and green pepper; cook for a few minutes until the onion softens and turns translucent.
', 'Step 2: Pour in the wine, and simmer until reduced by half.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, place the grape tomatoes, stewed tomatoes, and anchovies into the bowl of a blender; puree until smooth.
', 'Step 4: n Season with salt, pepper, basil, parsley, oregano, and bay leaf.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Season to taste with salt and pepper before serving.
']

Title: Chef John's Basil Ricotta Gnocchi
Ingredients: ['1 cup packed fresh basil leaves', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '1 (12 ounce) container whole-milk ricotta cheese, drained well', '1 ¼ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 ½ ounces freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '10 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter for browning']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Briefly blanch basil leaves in simmering water, about 20 seconds.
', 'Step 2: Transfer immediately to a bowl of cold water to stop the cooking.
', 'Step 3: Drain on towels.
', 'Step 4: Place basil in bowl of a blender.
', 'Step 5: Add eggs.
', 'Step 6: Blend until basil is blended in and mixture achieves an even green color with flecks of basil.
', 'Step 7: Place ricotta in a mixing bowl.
', 'Step 8: Add basil/egg mixture, salt, cayenne, Parmesan cheese, and flour.
', 'Step 9: Thoroughly mix together using a spatula; whisk mixture to ensure ingredient are evenly blended.
', 'Step 10: Cover and refrigerate until chilled and firm, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 11: Scoop out a small portion of dough using a teaspoon.
', 'Step 12: Using a second spoon, shape into a rounded oval.
', 'Step 13: Repeat until you have enough gnocchi for a batch, about 6 or so.
', 'Step 14: Bring a large pot of salted water to a simmer.
', 'Step 15: Drop shaped gnocchi in batches into pot as you form them.
', 'Step 16: After a minute or so they will rise to the surface.
', 'Step 17: Continue simmering until they spring back to the touch when you remove one from the water to test it, 2 to 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 18: Transfer to a plate with a slotted spoon to cool.
', 'Step 19: Repeat with the remaining dough.
', 'Step 20: Optional step: Melt butter in a skillet until bubbling.
', 'Step 21: Add cooked gnocchi and brown on each side.
', 'Step 22: Serve with a dusting of grated Parmesan cheese and a drizzle of the butter from the pan.
']

Title: Meat and Veggie Stromboli
Ingredients: ['1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 egg yolks', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '5 slices pepperoni', '5 slices Virginia baked ham', '5 slices provolone cheese', '2 teaspoons vegetable oil, or as needed', '¼ cup chopped green bell pepper', '¼ cup chopped onion', '¼ cup sliced fresh mushrooms', '2 egg whites', '1 teaspoon grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ teaspoon Italian seasoning']

', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until dough is golden brown, 30 to 40 minutes.
']

Title: Four-Cheese Chicken Carbonara
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package thick-cut bacon', '1 (16 ounce) package penne pasta', '⅓ cup olive oil', '¼ cup butter', '3 tablespoons minced garlic', '3 teaspoons ground black pepper, divided', '3 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, sliced', '2 cups heavy whipping cream', '1 cup grated Parmesan-Romano cheese blend', '1 cup shredded Colby Jack cheese blend', '3 eggs, beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain bacon slices on paper towels.
', 'Step 3: Chop into small pieces when cool enough to handle.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Add penne and olive oil and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: While pasta is cooking, melt butter in a large, deep skillet over low heat.
', 'Step 7: Add chopped bacon, garlic, and 1 teaspoon pepper; saute until fragrant, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Increase heat to medium, add chicken, and cook until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add whipping cream, Parmesan-Romano cheese, and remaining 2 teaspoons pepper to the skillet.
', 'Step 10: Stir and cook until heated through, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Add Colby Jack cheese and stir until melted.

Title: Healthier Italian Spaghetti Sauce with Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 pound lean ground beef', '1 cup fresh whole-wheat breadcrumbs', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 egg, beaten', '¾ cup chopped onion', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '¼ cup olive oil', '2 (28 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 bay leaf', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 basil leaves, torn, plus additional for sprinkling on top']

Title: Pasticiotti
Ingredients: ['4 cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 cup white sugar', '1 cup margarine', '2 eggs', '½ cup milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '6 tablespoons cornstarch', '¾ cup white sugar', '4 egg yolks, divided', '1 quart milk, room temperature', '1 tablespoon butter or margarine', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', "2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, stir together the flour, baking powder, salt and 1 cup of sugar.
', 'Step 2: Cut in margarine by pinching between your fingers, or using a pastry blender, until the mixture has lumps no larger than small peas.
', 'Step 3: Make a well in the center, and pour in the eggs, 1/2 cup milk and 2 teaspoons vanilla.
', 'Step 4: Stir until the mixture comes together, then knead for about 5 turns on a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 5: Roll out the dough to about 1/4 inch thickness.
', 'Step 6: Grease two 12 cup muffin tins or tart pans.
', 'Step 7: Cut out 20 circles using a 3 inch cookie cutter or drinking glass.
', 'Step 8: Line the muffin cups with the dough.
', 'Step 9: Set aside the remaining dough to cut out tops for the cups.
', 'Step 10: In the top of a double boiler, or in a metal bowl set atop a saucepan of simmering water, whisk together the cornstarch and 3/4 cup sugar.
', 'Step 11: Gradually whisk in 3 of the egg yolks, and 1quart milk.
', 'Step 12: Heat, stirring constantly, until thick and bubbling.
', 'Step 13: Remove from the heat, and stir in the butter and 1 teaspoon of vanilla until the butter is melted.
', 'Step 14: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 15: Fill the pastry shells half way with the vanilla cream.
', 'Step 16: Roll out remaining dough, and cut into circles for lids.
', 'Step 17: Place over the top of the pastry shells, and seal the edges by pressing with the tines of a fork.
', 'Step 18: Whisk the remaining egg yolk with a fork, and brush the tops of the pastry cups.
', 'Step 19: Bake for 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown.
', 'Step 20: Let cool in the tins before carefully loosening the edges to remove.
', "Step 21: Dust with confectioners' sugar before serving.
"]

Title: Amazing Mussels
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons minced garlic', '4 shallots, chopped', '4 cups beef broth', '1 jalapeno pepper, minced', '1 red chili pepper, minced', '4 fresh tomatoes, coarsely chopped', '20 fresh basil leaves, torn', '2 cups white wine', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '½ cup light cream', '5 pounds fresh mussels, scrubbed and debearded']

['Step 1: Melt butter in a large stockpot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add garlic and shallots, and cook, stirring constantly, until lightly browned.

Title: Baked Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['nonstick cooking spray', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt, divided', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '6 (4 ounce) skinless, bone-in chicken thighs', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or more as needed', '2 small onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '½ cup red wine, or more as needed', '1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes with juice', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', 'aluminum foil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Coat a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Mix together flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, pepper, and garlic powder in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 4: Dredge chicken in the flour mixture, shaking off any excess.
', 'Step 5: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Add chicken and cook until nicely browned, 4 to 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 7: Transfer chicken to the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Add onions and garlic to the skillet and saute until onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add mushrooms and more oil, if necessary, and cook until mushrooms have softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Pour 1/2 cup wine into the pan, scrape the browned bits of food off the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon, and cook until liquid has evaporated, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Stir in stewed tomatoes with juice, tomato sauce, and remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 12: Simmer for 1 to 2 minutes, adding extra wine if sauce seems too thick.
', 'Step 13: Pour mixture over chicken in the baking dish and cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 15: An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Mama Palomba's Spaghetti Sauce

Title: Instant Pot® Asparagus Risotto
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 each shallots, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pound asparagus spears, trimmed and cut into 1-inch pieces', '½ cup dry white wine', '1 ½ cups Arborio rice', '3 ½ cups chicken broth', '½ cup heavy cream', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon dried thyme', '½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons lemon juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Add butter and melt.
', 'Step 3: Stir in shallots and garlic; cook for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove shallots and garlic with a slotted spoon and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Add asparagus and saute in butter for 2 minutes; remove and set aside on a plate.
', 'Step 6: Return shallots and garlic to the Instant Pot® and pour in wine.
', 'Step 7: Stir well, scraping the bottom of the pot with a wooden or plastic spoon, for 30 seconds.
', 'Step 8: Stir in rice and saute in the wine mixture for 2 1/2 minutes, stirring constantly and scraping the bottom of the pot to loosen any brown bits.
', 'Step 9: Stir in chicken broth, cream, salt, pepper, and thyme.
', 'Step 10: Cancel Saute function.
', 'Step 11: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 12: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 6 minutes.
", 'Step 13: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 14: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 15: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 16: Gradually stir in Parmesan cheese and lemon juice, stirring until cheese is melted.
', 'Step 17: Stir in reserved asparagus pieces.
', 'Step 18: Allow risotto to thicken in the pot, uncovered, for 3 to 4 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Florentine Caramelized Onion Soup
Ingredients: ['¼ cup extra virgin olive oil', '4 pounds onions', '2 teaspoons white sugar', 'salt to taste', '1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry white wine', '1 quart chicken broth', '1 small cinnamon stick', '4 cups cubed, stale French or Italian bread']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large heavy pot, heat oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cut onions in half lengthwise, then slice thinly.
', 'Step 3: Place sliced onions in pot and toss to coat with oil.
', 'Step 4: Cover, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook, stirring occasionally, until onions are softened and beginning to color, 30 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Increase heat to medium and cook, stirring occasionally, uncovered, until onions are amber in color, 45 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle onions with sugar and a little bit of salt; cook, stirring, until sugar melts and onions are caramel colored, 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour in wine and broth, and place cinnamon stick in pot.
', 'Step 8: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, cover and simmer 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Stir the bread into the soup and cook, uncovered, stirring occasionally until the bread disintegrates, 30 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove the cinnamon stick.
', 'Step 11: Whisk the soup to incorporate the bread.
', 'Step 12: Adjust seasoning.
', 'Step 13: Serve hot.
']

Title: Cacio e Pepe Lasagna

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease four 8-ounce ramekins with 1 tablespoon olive oil.

', 'Step 4: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain.

', 'Step 7: Divide mixture among the ramekins.
', 'Step 8: Top with 2 tablespoons Pecorino Romano cheese, drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil, and sprinkle with remaining 1/2 teaspoon black pepper.

Title: Balsamic Chicken and Fresh Mozzarella
Ingredients: ['10 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 (16 fl oz) bottle balsamic vinaigrette salad dressing', '2 tomatoes, sliced', '2 pounds fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced', '1 bunch fresh basil leaves', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 2: Pour the dressing over it, cover or seal, and marinate in the refrigerator for 12 to 24 hours.
', 'Step 3: Coat a large skillet with cooking spray or oil, and set over low heat.

', 'Step 5: Fry chicken breast halves over low heat for about 30 minutes, or until juices run clear.
', 'Step 6: Arrange chicken on a serving platter.
', 'Step 7: Place a generous slice of fresh mozzarella on top of each piece.

', 'Step 10: Serve!
']

Title: Blackened Steak Bites with Blue Cheese Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds beef top sirloin, trimmed and cut into bite-size pieces', "2 tablespoons blackened seasoning (such as Chef Paul Prudhomme's® Blackened Steak Magic®), or more to taste", '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese', '3 tablespoons evaporated milk', '8 ounces blue cheese crumbles', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon ground white pepper', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper']

['Step 1: Season sirloin with blackened seasoning to coat on all sides.
', 'Step 2: Heat oil in a cast-iron skillet on an outdoor grill until the oil is smoking.
', 'Step 3: Cook steak bites in hot oil in small batches, reheating oil between batches, until slightly crusty, 1 to 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: Stir cream cheese and evaporated milk together in a saucepan over low heat to melt the cream cheese.
', 'Step 5: Whisk blue cheese crumbles, garlic powder, white pepper, and cayenne pepper into the cream cheese mixture; simmer, stirring frequently, until the blue cheese melts into a smooth sauce, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Serve blue cheese sauce with the beef bites.

Title: Ravioli Dolci (Sweet Ravioli)
Ingredients: ['1 cup butter, softened', '⅔ cup white sugar', '1 egg, beaten', '1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon almond extract', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon baking soda', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '½ cup cherry preserves', "½ cup confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth.
', 'Step 2: Beat in the egg, then stir in the vanilla and almond extracts and lemon zest.
', 'Step 3: Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture until a smooth dough forms.
', 'Step 4: Divide dough into halves.
', 'Step 5: Roll each portion out between two sheets of waxed paper into a 12 inch square.
', 'Step 6: Refrigerate for at least one hour.
', 'Step 7: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Grease cookie sheets.
', 'Step 9: Remove one piece of the dough from the refrigerator, remove the top layer of waxed paper, and cut into 1 1/2 inch squares.
', 'Step 10: Place about 1/4 teaspoon of the cherry preserves into the center of the first sheet of squares.
', 'Step 11: Set aside.
', 'Step 12: Remove the remaining piece of dough from the refrigerator, remove top layer of waxed paper, and cut into 1 1/2 inch squares also.
', 'Step 13: Poke holes for venting in these squares using a fork.
', 'Step 14: Place each vented square over one of the filled squares, and gently seal the edges by pressing with the tines of a fork.
', 'Step 15: Place cookies 2 inches apart onto prepared cookie sheets.
', 'Step 16: Bake for 9 to 11 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are lightly browned.
', 'Step 17: Allow cookies to cool for 5 minutes on the baking sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely.
', "Step 18: Dust cookies with confectioners' sugar while they are still warm.
"]

Title: Panna Cotta with Berry Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons plain gelatin', '¼ cup cold water', '3 cups cream', "½ cup confectioners' sugar, sifted", '1 (1 1/2-inch-long) vanilla bean, split lengthwise', '1 (10 ounce) bag frozen mixed berries, thawed', '2 tablespoons superfine sugar', '2 tablespoons brandy']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, soften gelatin in cold water; set aside.
', "Step 2: Place cream, confectioners' sugar, and vanilla bean in a saucepan.
", 'Step 3: Stir over medium heat until mixture comes to a simmer.
', 'Step 4: Simmer gently for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from heat and discard the vanilla bean.
', 'Step 6: Add gelatin and water to the hot cream mixture.
', 'Step 7: Stir until gelatin dissolves.
', 'Step 8: Pour into 6 lightly oiled 1/2-cup dariole molds (or other small cylindrical molds) and refrigerate overnight or at least 8 hours.
', 'Step 9: To make the berry sauce, combine berries and sugar in a bowl.
', 'Step 10: Crush berries slightly with the back of a spoon, and mix in the brandy.
', 'Step 11: Let stand for an hour until it has a syrupy consistency.
', 'Step 12: Unmold panna cottas and serve with berry sauce.
']

Title: Pomodoro Pasta Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '2 stalks celery, with leaves, chopped', '2 carrots, peeled and chopped', '1 small sweet onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic', '½ (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '2 cups water', '2 cups red wine', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir the diced tomatoes, celery, carrots, sweet onion, garlic, tomato paste, water, red wine, sage, basil, parsley, oregano, salt, and pepper together in a large pot and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to low and cook the sauce at a simmer until the carrots are tender, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 3: n Pour the sauce into a blender, filling the pitcher no more than halfway.
', 'Step 4: Hold the lid of the blender in place with a towel and carefully start the blender using a few quick pulses to get the sauce moving before leaving it on to puree.
', 'Step 5: Puree in batches until smooth and pour into a clean container.
', 'Step 6: Alternately, you can use a stick blender and puree the sauce in the pot.
']

Title: Italian Easter Pizza
Ingredients: ['5 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '½ cup vegetable oil', '1 cup milk', '3 eggs', '3 pounds mild Italian sausage', '3 (16 ounce) containers ricotta cheese', '5 eggs', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '9 hard-cooked eggs, sliced', '1 egg, beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Make the dough first.
', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, stir together the flour, salt, sugar and baking powder.
', 'Step 3: Combine the oil, milk and 3 eggs, pour into the dry ingredients and stir until the dough holds together well.
', 'Step 4: If you have a stand mixer, use the dough hook attachment to mix until smooth.
', 'Step 5: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Divide the dough in half.
', 'Step 7: Roll out one half of the dough to fit a 14x18 inch baking sheet with sides that come up at least 1/2 inch.
', 'Step 8: If the dough is too stiff to roll out to that size, let it rest for a few minutes and come back to it.
', 'Step 9: Fit the dough into the baking sheet.
', 'Step 10: Set aside.
', 'Step 11: Place the sausage into a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 12: Cook, stirring to crumble, until no longer pink.
', 'Step 13: Drain off the grease and set aside to cool.
', 'Step 14: Mix together the ricotta cheese, 5 eggs, salt, pepper and hard-cooked eggs in a large bowl.
', 'Step 15: When the sausage is cool, stir it into the cheese and eggs.
', 'Step 16: Spread this mixture evenly over the crust in the pan.
', 'Step 17: Roll out the remaining dough and place on top.
', 'Step 18: Roll the edges and pinch together to seal.
', 'Step 19: Brush the top crust with the beaten egg.
', 'Step 20: Bake in the preheated oven until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 21: Cool for at least 10 minutes before cutting into servings.
', 'Step 22: This can be served warm or cold.
']

Title: Fig and Goat Cheese Pizza
Ingredients: ['1 cup lukewarm water', '1 (.25 ounce) envelope active dry yeast', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '8 dried figs', '1 medium red onion, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', '4 ounces goat cheese', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour the water into a large bowl, and sprinkle yeast over the top.
', 'Step 2: Let stand for a few minutes to dissolve.
', 'Step 3: Mix in the oil, salt, and flour to make a dough.
', 'Step 4: When the dough is too stiff to stir, turn out onto a floured surface, and knead for about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Place into an oiled bowl, and cover with a clean towel.
', 'Step 6: Set aside to rise for about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Place the figs into a small bowl, and pour boiling water over them.
', 'Step 8: Let stand for about 10 minutes, then drain and chop.
', 'Step 9: Set aside.
', 'Step 10: Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Add the onions; cook and stir until they are wilted and soft.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to low, and season with salt.
', 'Step 13: Continue to cook and stir until the onions are a dark brown, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Stir in the thyme, fennel seed and figs, and remove from the heat.
', 'Step 15: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Punch down the pizza dough, and stretch into a circle about 1/4 inch thick.
', 'Step 17: Place on a lightly greased pizza pan or baking sheet.
', 'Step 18: Brush the surface lightly with remaining olive oil.
', 'Step 19: Spread the onion and fig mixture over the crust.
', 'Step 20: It will be sparse, but there is plenty of flavor.
', 'Step 21: Dot with pieces of goat cheese.
', 'Step 22: Bake for 15 to 18 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the crust has turned golden brown at the edges.
']

Title: Family Sicilian Sauce and Meatballs
Ingredients: ['3 slices white bread, torn into pieces', '¼ cup milk or water', '1 ½ pounds ground beef', '2 eggs', '½ cup grated Romano cheese', '1 pinch dried parsley', '¾ teaspoon salt, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '4 onion, chopped', '6 cloves garlic, chopped', '12 (3.5 ounce) links sweet Italian sausage', '1 ½ pounds cubed beef brisket', '½ pound pork neck bones', '4 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '3 (28 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes', '½ cup red wine', '4 bay leaves', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried basil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 (16 ounce) packages dry pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To make the meatballs, combine bread and milk or water in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 2: Mix in ground beef, eggs, Romano cheese, parsley, and salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 3: Form golf ball-sized meatballs; place into freezer to firm up.
', 'Step 4: To make sauce, heat olive oil in a large pot on medium heat; stir in onion.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add garlic and 1 sausage link; cook about 3 minutes more.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, in a large skillet over medium heat, brown beef chunks and pork neck bones; set aside.
', 'Step 8: When onions and garlic are done, turn heat down to low.
', 'Step 9: Add tomato paste and cook for a few minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir in the browned beef and pork, crushed tomatoes, wine, bay leaves, cinnamon, parsley, basil, and salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Bring sauce to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and cook for 3 to 4 hours.
', 'Step 12: Once you add the meatballs, let sauce simmer for 1 hour.

Title: Baked Chicken Tortellini Alfredo
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package frozen cheese tortellini', '¼ cup butter', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '1 cup heavy cream', '1 cup chicken broth', '1 ½ cups Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '¼ cup dry white wine', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ pound grilled chicken, cubed', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley']

Title: Tuscan White Beans in Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups dry cannellini beans', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed', '1 sprig fresh sage', '1 ½ cups tomato sauce', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place beans in a large pot.
', 'Step 2: Cover with water and stir in baking soda.
', 'Step 3: Soak for 8 to 12 hours.
', 'Step 4: Rinse beans and return to the pot.
', 'Step 5: Cover with water and bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat and simmer until beans are tender yet firm to the bite, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain beans, reserving the water, and set aside.
', 'Step 8: Heat the same pot over medium heat and add olive oil.
', 'Step 9: Saute garlic and sage in the hot oil until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add drained beans.
', 'Step 11: Stir and let the beans absorb the aroma of the garlic and sage.
', 'Step 12: Add tomato sauce.
', 'Step 13: Gently stir and simmer until the beans are soft but not mushy, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Use reserved cooking water to keep the sauce from burning, but the sauce should be thick.
', 'Step 15: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 16: Serve warm.

Title: Vegetable Stuffed Cannelloni
Ingredients: ['8 cannelloni noodles', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '5 shallots, chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup dry sherry', '2 cups heavy whipping cream', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 onion, chopped', '1 cup fresh sliced mushrooms', '1 zucchini, chopped', '1 small eggplant, diced', '2 roasted red bell peppers, diced', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '¾ cup ricotta cheese', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large pot of salted water, parboil cannelloni.
', 'Step 2: (Parboiling is partially cooking the noodles in boiling water; they will finish cooking when baked.
', 'Step 3: ) Meanwhile, cook 2 cloves garlic and 2 shallots in 1 tablespoon olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat for 30 seconds.
', 'Step 4: Pour in sherry, raise heat to high, and reduce liquid by half.
', 'Step 5: Stir in cream, and reduce until there is about 1 1/2 cups liquid.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 7: Set cream sauce aside.
', 'Step 8: In a large skillet, heat one tablespoon olive oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Cook onion, 3 shallots, 3 cloves garlic, mushrooms, zucchini, and eggplant in olive oil until all vegetables are tender.
', 'Step 10: Transfer to a large bowl.
', 'Step 11: Stir in red peppers, basil, oregano, ricotta, and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 12: Season to taste with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 13: Set filling aside.
', 'Step 14: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 15: Lightly grease one 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 16: Stuff vegetable/cheese filling into cannelloni.
', 'Step 17: Place in prepared baking dish, and cover with cream sauce.
', 'Step 18: Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes.
']

Title: Unholy Cannoli
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups ricotta cheese', '1 teaspoon melted butter', '⅓ cup all-purpose flour, packed, or more as needed', '¼ cup white sugar', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg', '⅛ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 tablespoon melted butter', '2 tablespoons Marsala wine', '1 large egg white', '½ cup mascarpone cheese', '1 orange, zested', '1 lemon, zested', '⅓ cup chopped dark chocolate', '1 teaspoon honey', '¼ cup chopped pistachio nuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Transfer ricotta cheese to fine-mesh strainer set over a bowl and let drain, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 2: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 3: Line a baking sheet with a silicone mat (such as Silpat™) and brush with 1 teaspoon melted butter.
', 'Step 4: For the shells, place flour, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, 1 tablespoon melted butter, Marsala wine, and egg white in a bowl.
', 'Step 5: Mix with a whisk until very smooth, relatively thin, and spreadable.
', 'Step 6: Spoon about 2 tablespoons of batter per shell onto the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 7: Swirl batter gently with the back of the spoon from the center outwards to create a fairly thin flat circle about 6 inches in diameter.
', 'Step 8: You should be able to fit 2 per pan.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are browned and centers have golden brown spots, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 10: While shells are baking, make a few molds by twisting pieces of aluminum foil into 7-inch long cylinders about 2 inches thick.
', 'Step 11: While shells are still hot, quickly roll each around a foil mold to form a tube, seam-side down.
', 'Step 12: Press each tube gently with a spatula for a few seconds until cool enough to hold its shape.
', 'Step 13: Repeat with remaining batter, baking and shaping in batches; let shells cool completely.
', 'Step 14: For the filling, mix drained ricotta cheese, mascarpone cheese, orange zest, lemon zest, dark chocolate, and honey together with a spatula.
', 'Step 15: Transfer into a plastic pastry or zip-top bag and cut off one corner.
', 'Step 16: Pipe the filling into one end of a shell until it comes out slight from the opening, and then turn and fill the other end.
', 'Step 17: Garnish both ends of exposed cheese filling with chopped pistachios.
', 'Step 18: Serve within the next hour or two while cannoli remain crispy.
']

Title: Black Olive and Rosemary Focaccia
Ingredients: ['1 cup warm water (100 to 110 degrees)', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 (.25 ounce) envelope rapid rise yeast', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ cup minced fresh rosemary', '2 ¾ cups bread flour or all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ cup pitted black olives', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 large roma (plum) tomatoes, sliced', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', '2 tablespoons minced fresh rosemary', 'Salt and pepper', '½ cup grated Parmesan or Romano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir together the water, sugar, and yeast until dissolved, allow to stand for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir in 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/4 cup rosemary, flour, and salt until a dough forms.
', 'Step 3: Turn onto a lightly floured surface, and knead until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Gently knead in the black olives during the last few minutes of kneading.
', 'Step 5: Place into a lightly oiled bowl, cover with a towel, and let rise in a warm place until almost doubled in bulk, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Grease a baking sheet, or sprinkle liberally with corn meal.
', 'Step 8: Deflate dough, and press into prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Brush dough with 1 tablespoon olive oil.
', 'Step 10: Toss sliced tomatoes, and garlic with remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil.
', 'Step 11: Season with 2 tablespoons minced rosemary, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 12: Arrange the tomato slices over the dough in an even layer.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle with grated cheese.
', 'Step 14: Bake in preheated oven until puffed and golden brown; 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Cut into squares and serve immediately.
']

Title: Spinach and Beef Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '½ onion, chopped', '½ pound lean ground beef', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '1 (45 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '2 cups fat-free ricotta cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese', '½ cup dried parsley', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon black pepper', '10 lasagna noodles, or more as needed', '½ cup shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese, or to taste']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

', 'Step 4: Stir spaghetti sauce and spinach into ground beef mixture; simmer until heated through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir ricotta cheese, 8 ounces mozzarella cheese, parsley, Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl.

', 'Step 13: Cool for 10 minutes before serving.
']
