Title: Chicken Fettuccine Alfredo
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package whole wheat fettuccine pasta', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 white onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon ground thyme', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 cups milk', '1 ½ cups shredded cooked chicken', '1 ½ cups frozen peas']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook fettuccine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, heat oil in a separate pot over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir onion in the oil until soft and translucent, 5 to 7 minutes, adding 1/4 cup water if it starts to burn.
', 'Step 5: Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds.
', 'Step 6: Add butter and let melt, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 7: Cook flour in the hot butter for about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in basil, thyme, red pepper flakes, salt, and black pepper.
', 'Step 9: Pour in milk and turn heat up to medium, continually stirring.
', 'Step 10: Cook until sauce is thickened, 3 to 5 minutes; reduce heat to low, making sure it does not boil.
', 'Step 11: Taste and adjust seasonings as needed.
', 'Step 12: Stir in chicken and peas and heat through, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Drain water from cooked pasta and transfer pasta into the sauce; stir to combine.
']

Title: Italian Chocolate and Ricotta Cake
Ingredients: ['10 ½ ounces ricotta cheese', '½ cup white sugar', '3 eggs', '2 ⅓ cups all-purpose flour', '3 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '7 ounces bittersweet chocolate, chopped', '7 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour a 9-inch round cake pan.
', 'Step 3: Whisk ricotta cheese and sugar together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Whisk in eggs one at a time until well combined.
', 'Step 5: Combine flour and baking powder in a bowl; sift into ricotta mixture.
', 'Step 6: Mix until batter is well combined and no dry spots remain.
', 'Step 7: Add chopped chocolate, melted butter, and vanilla extract; stir until batter is smooth.
', 'Step 8: Spoon batter into prepared cake pan (batter will be very thick).
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Cool completely in the pan before serving.
']

Title: Air Fryer Frittata
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '2 teaspoons butter', '⅓ cup diced bell pepper', '⅓ cup chopped onion', '½ cup breakfast sausage crumbles', '½ cup shredded Colby Jack cheese', '6 eggs', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ teaspoon hot pepper sauce', '¼ cup salsa, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat a 5.
', "Step 2: 8-quart or larger air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 3: Spray cooking spray on the bottom and sides of a small metal container, designed to be an inner pot, about 6 inches round and 4 inches high.
', 'Step 4: Add butter for flavor, insert inner pot into the air fryer, and melt butter for 45 seconds.
', 'Step 5: Add bell pepper and onion and fry for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Carefully remove the inner pot and stir in sausage crumbles.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle with Colby Jack cheese and set aside.
', 'Step 8: Crack eggs into a bowl and stir until yolks and whites are well combined.
', 'Step 9: Season with salt, pepper, and hot sauce; stir to combine.
', 'Step 10: Pour egg mixture over the other ingredients in the inner pot and lightly mix everything together.
', 'Step 11: Return inner pot to the basket of the air fryer and cook until the top of the frittata is lightly brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Continue air frying in 30-second intervals until frittata has set.
', 'Step 13: Serve warm or at room temperature with salsa.
']

Title: Baked Ziti with Spinach and Meat
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package ziti pasta', '1 pound lean ground beef', '1 medium onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced, divided', '2 (26 ounce) jars spaghetti sauce', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '12 ounces baby spinach', '1 (16 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', 'salt to taste', '6 ounces provolone cheese, sliced', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 tablespoons shredded Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add ziti and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, heat a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir ground beef, onion, and 1/2 of the garlic in the hot skillet until beef is until browned and onion is wilted, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add spaghetti sauce and simmer for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: While the meat sauce is simmering, heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Add remaining garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 10: Add spinach and cook, tossing occasionally, until wilted, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove from the heat.
', 'Step 12: Mix ricotta cheese, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, and wilted spinach in a bowl.
', 'Step 13: Season with salt.
', 'Step 14: Place 1/2 of the ziti in the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish and layer with 1/2 of the meat sauce.
', 'Step 15: Spread provolone cheese on top to form a flat surface.
', 'Step 16: Spread spinach mixture over top, then cover with remaining ziti and meat sauce.
', 'Step 17: Top with 2 tablespoons Parmesan and sprinkle mozzarella over top.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Remove from the oven and let firm up for at least 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Italian Spinach-Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons butter, divided', '2 cups sliced mushrooms', '1 cup chopped spinach', '4 tablespoons diced shallots', '½ teaspoon salt, or more to taste', '1 cup Arborio rice', '½ cup Chardonnay wine', '4 cups chicken broth, or more as needed', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a saute pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add mushrooms and cook for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add 1 tablespoon butter, spinach, shallots, and 1/2 teaspoon salt; saute until spinach wilts and shallots begin to caramelize, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove from the heat and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a heavy saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add rice; cook and stir until rice begins to brown, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add wine and continue stirring until liquid is almost absorbed, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Begin to add broth, 1/2 cup at a time.
', 'Step 9: Stir until broth is almost completely absorbed, then add another 1/2 cup and repeat.
', 'Step 10: Continue adding broth until risotto resembles a thick porridge but still has some bite to it.
', 'Step 11: This process will take 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Remove from the heat and add Parmesan cheese, spinach-mushroom mixture, remaining 1 tablespoon butter.
', 'Step 13: Season with salt if needed.
', 'Step 14: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Chef John's Calabrian Chicken
Ingredients: ['2 Cornish game hens', '1 cup white wine vinegar', '½ cup vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons fresh rosemary leaves', '2 tablespoons fresh orange juice', '4 cloves garlic, peeled', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon Calabrian hot chili sauce, or more to taste', '2 teaspoons grated orange zest', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 anchovy fillet']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Lay a game hen breast side-down on a work surface; use kitchen shears or a sharp knife to cut the backbone out of the game hen, cutting through each side of the bone from top to bottom.
', 'Step 2: Remove the backbone.
', 'Step 3: Use a sharp knife to slice through the cartilage of the breastbone.
', 'Step 4: Flip game hen breast side-up, flatten bird lightly with your hands, and twist the wing tips underneath the wings.
', 'Step 5: Repeat for remaining game hen.
', 'Step 6: Place white wine vinegar, vegetable oil, rosemary, orange juice, garlic, egg, Calabrian chili sauce, orange zest, kosher salt, and anchovy fillet into a blender.
', 'Step 7: Pulse several times to combine; blend until marinade is smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 8: Place game hens into a resealable heavy plastic bag and pour in marinade.
', 'Step 9: Squeeze out air, seal bag, and refrigerate at least 4 hours but preferably 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 10: Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 11: Remove game hens from marinade, reserving marinade.
', 'Step 12: Dry birds on paper towels.
', 'Step 13: Season breast sides with salt.
', 'Step 14: Place game hens with breast sides down onto the preheated grill and cook until skin shows browned grill marks, about 5 minutes; rotate hens 45 degrees and grill 5 more minutes to make crosshatch grill marks.
', 'Step 15: Flip game hens onto their backs, brush with reserved marinade, and grill with the lid on for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Brush hens with more marinade.
', 'Step 17: Repeat, cooking 5 minutes, then brushing with more marinade, until game hens are deep golden brown and an instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part of a thigh reads 160 degrees F, about 35 more minutes.
', 'Step 18: Flip hens breast sides down, brush once more with marinade, and cook with lid closed until marinade has glazed onto chicken, about 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 19: Transfer hens to a serving platter, let rest for about 5 minutes, and serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '697.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '13.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '396.7 mg', 'fatContent': '45.8 g', 'fiberContent': '0.8 g', 'proteinContent': '56.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '13 g', 'sodiumContent': '1778.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.9 g'}

Title: Chicken Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 pound ground chicken', '1 small onion, diced', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 pinch kosher salt to taste', '1 pinch ground black pepper to taste', '1 (14 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir chicken and onion together in the hot oil until the chicken is completely browned and the onions tender, 7 to 10 minutes.

', 'Step 4: Blend the tomatoes in a blender until smooth; pour over the chicken mixture and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 5: Cook mixture at a simmer until hot and the sauce has thickened slightly, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over the mixture; stir.
']

Title: Veal Scallopini in a Sweet Red Pepper Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds veal cutlets', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons milk', '1 cup seasoned dry bread crumbs', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', 'vegetable oil for frying, or as needed - divided', '2 red bell peppers, sliced', '1 onion, chopped', '1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon white sugar']

['Step 1: Pound veal cutlets a few times with a meat mallet to tenderize, if desired.
', 'Step 2: Beat egg with milk in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 3: Stir bread crumbs, parsley, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper in a separate bowl until well combined.
', 'Step 4: Heat 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or enough to cover the bottom of a skillet, over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Dip each cutlet in egg mixture and then in crumb mixture to coat.
', 'Step 6: Fry the cutlets in the hot oil until browned, about 3 minutes on each side.
', 'Step 7: Drain cutlets on paper towels.
', 'Step 8: Heat 2 more tablespoons vegetable oil in the same skillet; cook and stir red bell peppers and onion in the hot oil until soft, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Pour stewed tomatoes into vegetables and stir in water and sugar, dissolving sugar into the sauce.
', 'Step 10: Bring to a boil, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 12: Place veal cutlets into the sauce, cover, and simmer until veal is very tender, about 30 more minutes.
']

Title: Easy Meat Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 ¼ pounds ground beef', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', '2 (15 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '2 (15 ounce) cans fire-roasted diced tomatoes', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 splash red wine']

['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat; saute onion in hot oil until softened, about 5 minutes.

Title: Baked Ziti Primavera
Ingredients: ['2 (16 ounce) packages ziti', '1 (16 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 (6 ounce) package baby spinach leaves', '1 pound ready-peeled baby carrots', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 small zucchini, diced', '1 (6 ounce) package portobello mushroom caps, diced', '1 (8 ounce) package button mushrooms, diced', '1 ½ tablespoons minced garlic', '1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes, drained', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded Italian cheese blend', '3 (16 ounce) jars spaghetti sauce', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 3: Once the water is boiling, stir in the ziti, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 6: Rinse with cold water to stop the cooking process.
', 'Step 7: Transfer to a large roasting pan.
', 'Step 8: Whisk together 1 jar of spaghetti sauce and the ricotta cheese in a large bowl.
', 'Step 9: Add to the pasta and stir.
', 'Step 10: Place the spinach in the bowl of a food processor; blend until finely chopped; remove and set aside.
', 'Step 11: Then place the carrots in the food processor and process until finely chopped.
', 'Step 12: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 13: Cook the chopped carrots in the hot oil until they begin to soften, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Stir in the zucchini, portobello mushrooms, button mushrooms, and garlic; cook and stir until the zucchini is soft, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove from heat and stir in the chopped spinach, tomatoes, and 2 tablespoons Italian seasoning; drain.
', 'Step 16: Add to the ziti and mix.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle about 1/2 the bag of the Italian cheese blend over the pasta and stir through.
', 'Step 18: Pour in the 3 remaining jars of spaghetti sauce; stir until the pasta and vegetables are evenly coated.
', 'Step 19: Season with 2 tablespoons Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper; mix.
', 'Step 20: Cover the pan with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 21: Bake in the preheated oven until completely heated through, 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 22: Remove the foil and sprinkle the remaining cheese over the dish.
', 'Step 23: Return dish to oven and bake until the cheese melts and begins to brown, about 10 minutes more.
']

Title: Spicy Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '⅔ cup diced red bell pepper', '⅔ cup diced orange bell pepper', '⅔ cup diced yellow bell pepper', '⅔ cup diced green bell pepper', '1 small yellow onion, diced', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 ½ cups water', '1 dash crushed red pepper flakes', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese', '4 eggs', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano, crushed', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook lasagna pasta in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente.
', 'Step 3: Drain, rinse with cold water, and place on wax paper to cool.
', 'Step 4: Cook bell peppers and onion in olive oil in a large sauce pan until onions are translucent.
', 'Step 5: Stir in diced tomatoes, tomato paste, water, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 6: More red pepper flakes can be added if spicier sauce is preferred.
', 'Step 7: Simmer for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: In a medium bowl, combine Parmesan cheese, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, eggs, black pepper, and oregano.
', 'Step 10: Place a small amount of sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 11: Reserve 1/2 cup of the sauce.
', 'Step 12: Place three lasagna noodles lengthwise in pan.
', 'Step 13: Layer some of the cheese mixture and the vegetable sauce on top of noodles.
', 'Step 14: Repeat layering with remaining ingredients, ending with noodles.
', 'Step 15: Spread reserved sauce over top of noodles.
', 'Step 16: Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.
', 'Step 17: Cover dish with foil, and bake for 40 minutes or until bubbly.
', 'Step 18: Remove foil during last 10 minutes of baking.
']

Title: Homemade Orecchiette Pasta
Ingredients: ["2 ½ cups durum wheat semolina flour (such as Bob's Red Mill®)", '1 pinch salt', '1 cup water, or as needed, at room temperature']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix semolina flour and salt in a large bowl or on a marble work surface.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the center.
', 'Step 3: Pour water into the well a little at a time, mixing it with the flour.
', 'Step 4: Add as much water as needed to make a sticky but compact dough.
', 'Step 5: Knead dough with your hands by flattening the ball, stretching it, and folding the top towards the center.
', 'Step 6: Turn 45 degrees and repeat until dough is elastic and smooth, but not too soft, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 8: Place in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 9: Let rest at room temperature for about 30 minutes before using.
', 'Step 10: Work with one portion of dough at a time, keeping the remaining dough covered to keep it from drying out.
', 'Step 11: Dust a work surface with semolina flour; roll out the dough to make a rope, about 1/3 inch thick.
', 'Step 12: Cut off little 1/3-inch thick pieces.
', 'Step 13: Pick up knife with a rounded tip.
', 'Step 14: Carefully hold one side of the dough with your index finger.
', 'Step 15: Hold the knife in your other hand.
', 'Step 16: Gently drag the small piece of dough towards you.
', 'Step 17: Lift up the knife by the end in such a way that you get a thicker edge.
', "Step 18: You'll obtain a small disk of dough, thinner in the centre.
", 'Step 19: Press the disk gently against your thumb and it will curve.
', 'Step 20: Proceed the same way with the rest of the dough.
', 'Step 21: Transfer orecchiette onto a floured surface and sprinkle with more semolina flour.
', 'Step 22: Do not overlap orecchiette or they will stick together.
', 'Step 23: Let dry for about 30 minutes before cooking.
']
Nutrition Label: {'sodiumContent': '40.5 mg'}

Title: Chicken Romano
Ingredients: ['¾ cup grated Romano cheese', '¼ cup bread crumbs', '1 tablespoon granulated garlic', '2 teaspoons ground cayenne pepper', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '6 thin chicken cutlets', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 green bell pepper, diced', '6 sun-dried tomatoes', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 ounces shaved Romano cheese']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine 3/4 cup Romano cheese, bread crumbs, granulated garlic, cayenne pepper, and thyme in a shallow bowl.

', 'Step 4: Arrange chicken in a baking dish.
', 'Step 5: Bake chicken in the preheated oven until slightly golden, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 6: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Add bell pepper, sun-dried tomatoes, and minced garlic to the skillet.
', 'Step 9: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 10: Cook and stir until bell pepper and tomatoes soften, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Transfer baked chicken to a plate; top with bell pepper and tomato mixture.
', 'Step 12: Garnish with shaved Romano cheese.
']

Title: Double Crust Stuffed Pizza
Ingredients: ['1 ½ teaspoons white sugar', '1 cup warm water (100 degrees F/40 degrees C)', '1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 (8 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 tablespoon packed brown sugar', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '½ teaspoon salt', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '½ pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 (4 ounce) package sliced pepperoni', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '½ green bell pepper, chopped', '½ red bell pepper, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine the white sugar and the warm water in a large bowl or in the work bowl of a stand mixer.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle the yeast over the warm sugar water, and let stand for 5 minutes until the yeast softens and begins to form a creamy foam.
', 'Step 3: Stir 1 tablespoon olive oil into the yeast mixture.
', 'Step 4: Stir 1/2 teaspoon salt into the flour.
', 'Step 5: Mix half of the flour mixture into the yeast water, and stir until no dry spots remain.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the remaining flour, a 1/2 cup at a time, mixing well after each addition.
', 'Step 7: When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 8 minutes (or mix with dough hook in stand mixer).
', 'Step 8: Lightly oil a large bowl, place the dough in the bowl and turn to coat with oil.
', 'Step 9: Cover with a light cloth, and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 10: Combine the crushed tomatoes, brown sugar, garlic powder, 1 teaspoon olive oil, and salt in small saucepan.
', 'Step 11: Cover pan, and cook over low heat until tomatoes start to break down, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Preheat an oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Deflate the dough and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 14: Cut the dough into 2 equal pieces.
', 'Step 15: Roll one piece into a 12 inch thin circle.
', 'Step 16: Roll the other half into a thicker, 9 inch circle.
', 'Step 17: Place the 12 inch dough round into an ungreased 9 inch springform pan.
', 'Step 18: Sprinkle dough with 1 cup of cheese.
', 'Step 19: Shape sausage into a 9 inch patty and place in pan on top of the cheese.
', 'Step 20: Layer pepperoni, mushrooms, green pepper, red pepper, and remaining cheese on top of sausage patty.
', 'Step 21: Top with the 9 inch dough round and pinch edges to seal.
', 'Step 22: Cut several 1/2 inch vent holes in the top crust.
', 'Step 23: Spread sauce evenly on the top crust, leaving a 1/2 inch border at the edges.
', 'Step 24: Bake pizza in the preheated oven until the crust is set, the cheese is melted, and the sausage is cooked through, 40 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Let hot pizza rest for 15 minutes before cutting into wedges and serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '409.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '32.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '53.1 mg', 'fatContent': '21.1 g', 'fiberContent': '2.1 g', 'proteinContent': '22.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '8.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '1063.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.1 g'}

Title: Brasato al Barolo - Braised Chuck Roast in Red Wine
Ingredients: ['1 (2 pound) beef chuck roast', '1 onion, cut into 8 pieces, layers separated', '2 large carrots, cut into 1-inch pieces', '2 ribs celery, cut into 1-inch pieces', '10 whole black peppercorns', '5 whole cloves', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 sprig rosemary', '2 bay leaves', '1 (750 milliliter) bottle Barolo (dry Italian) red wine', '3 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place chuck roast, onion, carrots, celery, peppercorns, cloves, garlic, cinnamon stick, rosemary, and bay leaves together in a stockpot.
', 'Step 2: Pour wine over meat and vegetable mixture to cover entirely.
', 'Step 3: Cover stockpot and marinate for 6 hours in the refrigerator.
', 'Step 4: Turn meat in marinade to make sure it is completely covered; return to refrigerator to finish marinating, about 6 hours more.
', 'Step 5: Transfer chuck roast from marinade to a plate to rest; pat dry thoroughly with paper towels.
', 'Step 6: Pour marinade through a strainer and into a bowl to separate vegetable mixture from wine, reserving both vegetable mixture and wine.
', 'Step 7: Heat olive oil in the stockpot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 8: Brown chuck roast on all sides, 4 to 6 minutes per side.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 10: Add strained vegetable mixture to stockpot; cook with the chuck roast until fragrant, adding more oil as necessary to prevent burning, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Pour reserved wine back into stockpot; add salt.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer without removing cover for 2 hours.
', 'Step 13: Remove cover, stir, and cook until meat easily shreds with a fork, 10 minutes to 1 hour longer.
', 'Step 14: Transfer meat from cooking liquid to serving platter; tent with foil to keep warm.
', 'Step 15: Return cooking liquid to a boil over medium-high heat; simmer until reduced to sauce consistency, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Discard cinnamon stick, rosemary, and bay leaves.
', 'Step 17: Season with salt; puree mixture with a handheld immersion blender until smooth.
', 'Step 18: Pour sauce over meat to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '517.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '14.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '82.6 mg', 'fatContent': '28.8 g', 'fiberContent': '3 g', 'proteinContent': '22.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '568 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.7 g'}

Title: Gnocchi with Cherry Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 large red onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '½ minced red chile pepper', '2 pints cherry tomatoes, quartered', '1 ½ cups canned crushed tomatoes', '1 cup chopped fresh basil', '⅔ cup kalamata olives, sliced', '1 (16 ounce) package fresh gnocchi', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the onion, garlic, and chile pepper; cook until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Increase heat to medium-high, and stir in the cherry tomatoes.
', 'Step 4: Cook until the tomatoes have lost their form and are beginning to make a sauce, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the crushed tomatoes, bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to medium-low and cook for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: While the sauce is simmering, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 7: Add the fresh gnocchi, and cook until the gnocchi float to the surface, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Gently strain out the gnocchi and place into a serving dish.
', 'Step 9: Stir the basil and olives into the simmering sauce, and cook for one minute.
', 'Step 10: Pour the sauce over the drained gnocchi and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '358 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '40.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '25.7 mg', 'fatContent': '19.5 g', 'fiberContent': '5.5 g', 'proteinContent': '8.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7 g', 'sodiumContent': '665.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '2 g'}

Title: Easy Caponata
Ingredients: ['2 stalks stalk celery, chopped into 1/4-inch pieces', '½ cup olive oil', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '1 medium eggplant, chopped into bite-size pieces', '2 red bell peppers, thinly sliced', '2 zucchini, cubed', '1 ¾ cups tomato puree (passata)', '½ cup white vinegar', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '10 black olives, pitted', '2 tablespoons raisins', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', '1 teaspoon capers', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '10 leaves basil, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add celery and cook uncovered until softened, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 3: Drain in a colander and immediately immerse in ice water for several minutes to stop the cooking process.
', 'Step 4: Drain.
', 'Step 5: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium heat; add onion and celery and cook until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add eggplant, red bell peppers, and zucchini and cook until slightly softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in tomato puree, vinegar, and sugar.
', 'Step 8: Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add olives, raisins, pine nuts, and capers.
', 'Step 10: Season with salt and pepper and cook until flavors are well combined, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove skillet from heat; stir in chopped basil.
', 'Step 12: Cool and serve at room temperature.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '289.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '25.2 g', 'fatContent': '20.9 g', 'fiberContent': '7.1 g', 'proteinContent': '4.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '424 mg', 'sugarContent': '14 g'}

Title: Quick and Easy Sicilian Meatloaf
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds lean ground beef', '½ cup dry bread crumbs', '1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix', '¼ cup barbecue sauce', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', 'ground black pepper to taste', '8 thin slices deli ham, or as needed', '1 cup shredded Swiss cheese, or as needed', '¼ cup ketchup', '1 teaspoon mustard', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 dash soy sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lay a 24-inch long sheet of parchment paper down on a work surface.
', 'Step 3: Mix together the ground beef, bread crumbs, onion soup mix, barbecue sauce, garlic, egg, flour, and black pepper in a bowl until well combined.
', 'Step 4: Place the meat mixture down on the piece of parchment paper, and pat it into a rectangle shape about 10x16 inches.
', 'Step 5: Lay deli ham slices down on the meat, keeping a 1-inch margin around all sides of the rectangle.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle Swiss cheese over the ham.
', 'Step 7: Carefully lift up the short edge of the meat square with the parchment paper, and gently nudge and roll up the meat.
', 'Step 8: Seal the edges and ends well.
', 'Step 9: Place the meat roll into a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 11: While the roll is cooking, mix together ketchup, mustard, brown sugar, and soy sauce, stirring until sugar has dissolved.
', 'Step 12: Remove the roll from the oven, and spread the ketchup mixture over the roll.
', 'Step 13: Return to the oven for 15 more minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '427.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '20.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '135.7 mg', 'fatContent': '22.4 g', 'fiberContent': '1.1 g', 'proteinContent': '34.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '1064.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.3 g'}

Title: Shiitake and Baby Bella Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ shallot, minced', '4 ounces shiitake mushrooms, stems removed, caps sliced', '3 ounces cremini mushrooms (baby bellas), sliced', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 ¾ cups Arborio rice', '1 ¼ cups dry white wine', '3 sprigs fresh thyme, chopped', '1 pinch celery salt', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 quart hot vegetable stock', '2 tablespoons butter', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup chopped flat-leaf parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in shallot and cook for 30 seconds, then add shiitake and cremini mushrooms, and cook until they begin to brown.
', 'Step 3: Stir in 2 tablespoons butter and Arborio until rice is well coated in oil; reduce heat to medium, and cook until the shallot and mushrooms have turned golden brown.
', 'Step 4: Pour in white wine, and simmer until evaporated, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 5: Season with thyme, celery salt, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to medium-low; pour in 1/3 of the hot vegetable stock, and cook until evaporated, stirring constantly, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour in another third of the vegetable stock, and continue to stir until evaporated.
', 'Step 8: Repeat once more with the remaining third of stock.
', 'Step 9: Stir constantly until the rice is tender and creamy.
', 'Step 10: Add hot water if needed to continue cooking until the rice has softened.
', 'Step 11: Stir in butter, Parmesan cheese, and chopped parsley before serving.
']

Title: Sweet Sausage Marsala
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package farfalle (bow tie) pasta', '1 pound mild Italian sausage links', '⅓ cup water', '1 clove garlic, minced', '½ large onion, sliced', '1 medium green bell pepper, sliced', '1 medium red bell pepper, sliced', '1 tablespoon Marsala wine', '1 (14.5 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes, undrained', '1 pinch dried oregano', '1 pinch black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Place whole sausages and 1/3 cup water in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Cover, and cook 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain and thinly slice.
', 'Step 6: Return sausage to skillet.
', 'Step 7: Stir in garlic, onions, peppers, and Marsala wine.
', 'Step 8: Cook over medium-high heat, stirring frequently, until sausage is cooked through.
', 'Step 9: Stir in diced tomatoes, black pepper, and oregano.
', 'Step 10: Cook about 2 minutes more, then remove from heat.
', 'Step 11: Serve over cooked pasta.
']

Title: Italian Anise Bread
Ingredients: ['12 ⅜ cups all-purpose flour', '2 cups white sugar', '5 tablespoons anise seed', '½ cup warm water', '2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast', '2 cups warm milk', '8 eggs, at room temperature', '½ cup butter, melted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine flour, sugar, and anise seed together in a very large bowl; create a well in the center.
', 'Step 2: Mix warm water and yeast together in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Let stand until the yeast softens and begins to form a creamy foam, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Beat warm milk, eggs, and butter together in a bowl; stir into yeast mixture.
', 'Step 5: Add milk mixture to the well in the flour mixture.
', 'Step 6: Knead flour-milk mixture using your hands until dough and your hands are no longer sticky.
', 'Step 7: Cover dough with a clean cotton cloth and let rise, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 8: Grease and flour 6 loaf pans.
', 'Step 9: Punch dough down and divide into 6 portions.
', 'Step 10: Mold each portion into a round shape and place each in a prepared pan.
', 'Step 11: Cover pans and let rise for 1 hour more.
', 'Step 12: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until bread is cooked through, 45 to 50 minutes.
']

Title: Pumpkin Zeppole
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon fine salt', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '⅛ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '8 ounces fresh ricotta cheese, well drained', '½ cup pumpkin puree', '2 tablespoons pumpkin puree', '¼ cup white sugar', '2 large eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Canola oil, for frying']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg together in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Whisk ricotta, 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons pumpkin puree, sugar, eggs, and vanilla together in a separate mixing bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Pour mixture into dry ingredients.
', 'Step 4: Mix together until mixture becomes a loose batter.
', 'Step 5: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Use one spoon to scoop out a heaping tablespoon of dough and a second spoon to carefully push dough into hot oil.
', 'Step 7: Fry in batches for about 1 minute.
', "Step 8: If zeppole don't turn over by themselves after 1 minute, gently turn each with a strainer to brown on the other side, about 1 more minute.
", 'Step 9: Remove with a strainer and drain on cooling rack.
']

Title: Smoked Salmon Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients: ['¼ onion, chopped', '¼ cup butter', '½ pound smoked salmon, chopped', '1 pint heavy whipping cream', '1 tomato, diced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Saute onion in the butter in a pan until clear.
', 'Step 2: Add the salmon and saute at medium to low heat for approximately 2 more minutes.
', 'Step 3: Very gradually, start to add the cream.
', 'Step 4: Stir constantly until thickened.
', 'Step 5: Sauce should be very thick once you have added all the cream.
', 'Step 6: Top with tomato and parsley; season with pepper.
']

Title: Roast Pumpkin and Feta Risotto
Ingredients: ['3 ¼ cups peeled, cubed pumpkin', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 cups vegetable broth', '½ teaspoon chopped fresh garlic', '1 onion, diced', '1 cup baby spinach leaves', '6 ounces feta cheese, cubed', 'salt and pepper', '2 cups Arborio rice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Brush a baking dish with olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Place pumpkin in a steamer over 1 inch of boiling water, and cover.
', 'Step 4: Cook until tender but still firm.
', 'Step 5: Transfer pumpkin to baking dish, and brush with oil.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Bake in preheated oven until golden brown.
', 'Step 8: Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a saucepan.
', 'Step 9: Cook onion and garlic until tender.
', 'Step 10: Stir in rice, and cook for 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Slowly add vegetable broth 1/2 cup at a time, stirring frequently and allowing all the liquid to be absorbed before adding more broth.
', 'Step 12: Continue cooking until the rice is tender to the tooth, and then season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 13: When the pumpkin is almost done, place feta on a baking sheet, and bake in preheated oven until the cheese is hot, and is beginning to melt along the edges.
', 'Step 14: Mash 1/2 of the pumpkin, and stir into the risotto with the spinach.
', 'Step 15: Ladle risotto into bowls, and top with remaining pumpkin cubes and heated feta.
']

Title: Italian Meat Loaf
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '1 ½ cups dry bread crumbs', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 large eggs', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 pinch Italian seasoning, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 2: Combine beef, bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, eggs, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, and Italian seasoning in a large bowl.
', 'Step 3: Season with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 4: Transfer mixture to a 9x5-inch loaf pan.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
']

Title: Bread Machine Calzone
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups water', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '1 ½ tablespoons white sugar', '3 cups bread flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon powdered milk', '¾ cup sliced Italian sausage', '¾ cup pizza sauce', '1 ¼ cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 tablespoons butter, melted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To Make Dough: Place water, yeast, sugar, flour, salt and powdered milk in the pan of the bread machine, in the order suggested by the manufacturer.
', 'Step 2: Select Dough cycle.
', 'Step 3: After cycle is completed, roll out dough on a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, brown sausage for about 8 to 10 minutes in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Drain excess fat and reserve.
', 'Step 6: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Shape dough into a 16 inch by 10 inch rectangle.
', 'Step 8: Transfer to a lightly greased cookie sheet, and spoon pizza sauce lengthwise down the center of the dough, followed by the browned sausage and the cheese.
', 'Step 9: Make diagonal cuts 1 1/2 inches apart down each long side of the dough rectangle, cutting to within 1/2 inch of the filling.
', 'Step 10: Criss-cross cut strips of dough over the filling and seal edges with water.
', 'Step 11: Brush top of calzone with melted butter.
', 'Step 12: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 35 to 45 minutes, or until golden brown.
', 'Step 13: Remove from oven and cool for 5 minutes, then slice and serve.
']

Title: Italian Butter
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon crushed red pepper flakes', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried rosemary', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil']

Title: World's Best Marinara
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 sweet onion, diced', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (8 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, chopped', '1 red bell pepper, diced', '1 cup fresh flat-leaf parsley, torn', '2 tablespoons oregano', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '½ teaspoon dried sage', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon salt', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 (28 ounce) can tomato sauce']

', 'Step 6: Return to saucepan with the remaining sauce; stir to combine.
']

Title: Oven-Baked Beef Tagliata
Ingredients: ['3 large cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh oregano', '1 tablespoon sea salt, divided', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper, divided', '2 (1 1/2) pounds sirloin steaks, about 1 1/2-inches thick', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '6 cups loosely packed arugula', '2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '¼ lemon, sliced', '2 ounces Parmesan cheese, shaved']

['Step 1: Place a cast-iron skillet in the oven and preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine garlic, rosemary, oregano, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper in a small bowl.
', 'Step 3: Rub spice mixture all over the steaks.
', 'Step 4: Remove the skillet from the oven and add 1 tablespoon oil.
', 'Step 5: Add steak and return to the preheated oven.
', 'Step 6: Cook until steaks is browned on both sides, turning after 10 minutes, about 20 minutes total.
', 'Step 7: Transfer steak to a cutting board and let rest for 10 minutes; then slice.
', 'Step 8: Spread arugula on a platter and top with steak slices.
', 'Step 9: Drizzle with 2 teaspoons olive oil and lemon juice and top with Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Eggplant Salad
Ingredients: ['6 medium eggplants', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ cup balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons sugar', 'dried oregano', 'basil', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Pierce eggplants several times with a fork, and place on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Bake in the preheated oven for 1 1/2 hours, or until completely softened.
', 'Step 4: Cool completely.
', 'Step 5: Remove skin and chop fine.
', 'Step 6: Transfer to a large mixing bowl, and set aside.
', 'Step 7: In a skillet, cook garlic in 1 tablespoon of oil over medium heat until lightly browned.
', 'Step 8: Transfer to a small bowl.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the remaining 2 tablespoons oil, the vinegar, sugar, oregano, and basil until well blended and sugar is dissolved.
', 'Step 10: Pour over the eggplant, and toss to coat.
', 'Step 11: Season to taste with salt and pepper, and toss again.

Title: Ricotta Easter Cake
Ingredients: ['¾ cup wheat berries', '2 cups whole milk, or as needed to cover', "¾ cup confectioners' sugar", '1 orange, zested', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', "¾ cup confectioners' sugar", '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '½ cup unsalted butter at room temperature', '3 large eggs, beaten', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon anisette liqueur', '4 8x8-inch disposable aluminum cake pans', '3 pounds ricotta cheese at room temperature', '12 large eggs at room temperature', '1 (12 ounce) jar pineapple preserves', "1 ½ cups confectioners' sugar", '1 cup heavy whipping cream at room temperature', '1 cup chopped dried mixed fruit', '¾ cup white sugar', '¼ cup anisette liqueur, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', "2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar for dusting, or to taste"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place wheat berries into a bowl, cover with water, and soak for 3 days, changing water 2 or 3 times per day.
', 'Step 2: Drain and place wheat berries into a saucepan; pour in milk to cover.
', "Step 3: Stir 3/4 cup confectioners' sugar, orange zest, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, and a pinch of salt into wheat and milk.
", 'Step 4: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer until wheat berries are tender, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 5: Refrigerate.
', "Step 6: Sift flour, 3/4 cup confectioners' sugar, baking powder, and 1 pinch of salt together in a bowl; cut butter into flour mixture, using a pastry cutter, until butter forms small lumps.
", 'Step 7: Make a well in flour mixture and pour 3 beaten eggs into the well; add 1 tablespoon vanilla extract and 1 tablespoon anisette liqueur to eggs.
', 'Step 8: Stir together to make a smooth dough.
', 'Step 9: Refrigerate at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 10: Move a rack into low position in oven and preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Generously grease and flour the 8x8-inch cake pans.
', 'Step 12: Divide dough into fourths; roll each piece out onto a floured work surface to make a thin 12x12-inch dough square.
', 'Step 13: Fit dough into a prepared cake pan.
', 'Step 14: Repeat with remaining dough to make 4 crusts.
', 'Step 15: Beat ricotta cheese with 12 eggs in a large bowl until mixture is smooth and creamy.
', "Step 16: Add 1 cup of soaked wheat berries, pineapple preserves, 1 1/2 cup confectioners' sugar, heavy cream, dried mixed fruit, white sugar, 1/4 cup anisette liqueur, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, and 1 pinch of salt.
", 'Step 17: Stir to combine thoroughly and divide ricotta filling into each crust.
', 'Step 18: Bake cakes on the bottom rack of the preheated oven for 15 minutes; reduce heat to 225 degrees F (105 degrees C) and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Turn off heat and let cakes cool in the oven with the door open, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Let cakes cool to room temperature, then chill at least 2 hours (up to overnight).
', "Step 21: Sprinkle each cake with about 1 1/2 teaspoon confectioners' sugar, or to taste, before slicing.
"]

Title: Kim's Garlic Breadsticks

Title: World's Fastest Meatballs
Ingredients: ['6 cups prepared tomato sauce', '½ cup dry bread crumbs', '¼ cup milk', '1 large egg', '2 teaspoons Italian herb seasoning', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 pound ground beef', '1 pound ground veal', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground white pepper', '⅓ cup finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']

['Step 1: Pour tomato sauce into a large stockpot and bring to a simmer over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to low to keep sauce warm while preparing meatballs.

", 'Step 4: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and brush lightly with oil.
', 'Step 5: Whisk bread crumbs, milk, egg, Italian herb seasoning, olive oil, garlic powder, and red pepper flakes in a small bowl to form a thick slurry.

', 'Step 8: Season with salt, black pepper, and white pepper; sprinkle with Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
', 'Step 9: Pour in slurry and mix until combined.

', 'Step 12: Bake meatballs under the preheated broiler until browned, about 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Turn meatballs and broil until browned on both sides and no longer pink in the center, 3 to 4 additional minutes.
', 'Step 14: Transfer meatballs to the stockpot with the simmering tomato sauce.
', 'Step 15: Increase heat to medium and cook for 5 to 10 minutes, or longer if desired.
']

Ingredients: ['1 butternut squash, halved and seeded', '1 tablespoon olive oil, divided, or as needed', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 onion, chopped', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '7 cups milk, divided', '½ cup cornstarch', '2 cups grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '1 tablespoon honey', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '4 fresh sage leaves, shredded, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '¼ teaspoon minced fresh ginger', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 3: Place squash, cut-side up, on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 4: Cover squash with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven until squash is tender, 45 minutes to 1 hour 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Heat 1 1/2 teaspoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir mushrooms and garlic in the hot oil until mushrooms are tender, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove skillet from heat.
', 'Step 8: Heat remaining 1 1/2 teaspoons olive oil in a separate skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onion in the hot oil until softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add spinach to onion; cook until spinach is heated through, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove skillet from heat.
', 'Step 11: Heat 6 cups milk in a 5-quart saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until milk is simmering, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Whisk remaining 1 cup milk and cornstarch together in a bowl until smooth; stir into simmering milk.
', 'Step 13: Bring milk mixture to just under a boil, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon and scraping bottom of pot to prevent scorching, until milk mixture has thickened into a sauce, about 5 minutes; remove pot from heat.
', 'Step 14: Whisk 1 1/2 cups Parmesan cheese, honey, nutmeg, sage, salt, and pepper into sauce until smooth.
', 'Step 15: Cover pot with a lid and keep warm over low heat.
', 'Step 16: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 17: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Drain.
', 'Step 19: Reduce oven temperature to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 20: Scrape flesh from butternut squash into a bowl; stir with a fork until evenly mashed.
', 'Step 21: Stir ginger, salt, and pepper into mashed butternut squash.
', 'Step 22: Spoon about 1 cup white sauce into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish; arrange a layer of noodles atop white sauce.
', 'Step 23: Layer 1/2 butternut squash mixture, 1/5 remaining white sauce, noodles, spinach mixture, 1/5 white sauce, noodles, 1/2 the mozzarella cheese, mushroom mixture, 1/5 white sauce, noodles, remaining 1/2 butternut squash mixture, 1/5 the white sauce, remaining noodles, remaining 1/5 white sauce, remaining mozzarella cheese, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, respectively.
', 'Step 24: Cover dish with aluminum foil and place dish on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 25: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 26: Remove cover and bake until bubbling and cheese is browned, about 15 more minutes.
', 'Step 27: Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '399.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '53.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '35.2 mg', 'fatContent': '11.9 g', 'fiberContent': '4.1 g', 'proteinContent': '21.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '403.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '12.4 g'}

Title: Homemade Pear and Gorgonzola Ravioli
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter', '2 ripe pears - peeled, cored, and cubed', '3 sprigs fresh thyme', '7 ounces Gorgonzola cheese, crumbled', '1 pound fresh pasta dough']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add pears and thyme; cook, stirring often, until pears have softened, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Crumble Gorgonzola cheese over pears; cook and stir until melted, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove skillet from heat and cool filling completely.
', 'Step 5: Cut pasta dough into 3 equal pieces.
', 'Step 6: Flatten the first piece of dough on a floured work surface; roll with a rolling pin 5 or 6 times.
', 'Step 7: Turn the dough 45 degrees and roll again, 5 to 6 times.
', 'Step 8: Keep rolling and turning in the same direction until dough has a consistent thickness of about 1/16-inch.
', 'Step 9: Repeat with remaining 2 pieces of pasta dough.
', 'Step 10: Gently transfer 1 pasta sheet to a floured surface and cut in half to form 2 evenly sized rectangles.
', 'Step 11: Drop about 1 teaspoon filling onto 1 rectangle, spacing the filling about 1-inch apart.
', 'Step 12: Brush the spaces around the filling with water.
', 'Step 13: Lay the second rectangle on top of the first.
', 'Step 14: Gently squeeze out the air around the filling and press firmly with your hands to seal the edges and all dough around the filling.
', 'Step 15: Cut square ravioli shapes using a ravioli cutter.
', 'Step 16: Transfer the ravioli to a floured plate or board.
', 'Step 17: Repeat with the remaining dough and filling.
', 'Step 18: Let the ravioli stand for about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Bring a saucepan of lightly salted water to the boil; gently add ravioli, working in batches.
', 'Step 20: Cook until ravioli float to the top, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Remove using a slotted spoon and transfer to a warm bowl.
']

Ingredients: ['1 cup pitted black olives', '1 cup pitted green olives', '1 cup pitted kalamata olives', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '3 tablespoons olive oil']

', 'Step 2: Pulse to chop, then add balsamic vinegar and olive oil.

', 'Step 4: Refrigerate for at least one hour, or overnight if possible, before serving.
']

Title: Sicilian Style Steak
Ingredients: ['1 cup Italian seasoned dry bread crumbs', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon seasoned salt', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '½ cup olive oil', '2 (16 ounce) t-bone steaks']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a broiler pan.
', 'Step 3: Stir the bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, seasoned salt, and garlic powder together in a shallow dish such as a pie plate.
', 'Step 4: Pour the olive oil into a separate shallow dish.
', 'Step 5: Dip the t-bone steaks in the olive oil on both sides; allow excess to drip off.
', 'Step 6: Press the steaks into the bread crumb mixture, and place onto the prepared broiler pan.
', 'Step 7: Bake on the middle rack in the preheated oven until the steaks have cooked to your desired degree of doneness, about 15 minutes for medium.
', 'Step 8: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 140 degrees F (60 degrees C) for medium.
']

Title: Panettone I
Ingredients: ['1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '¼ cup white sugar', '2 eggs', '½ cup nonfat plain yogurt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon grated lemon zest', '¼ teaspoon salt', '4 cups unbleached all-purpose flour', '¼ cup dried currants', '¼ cup raisins', "1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar", '1 tablespoon butter, melted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium bowl, combine yeast, water and sugar.
', 'Step 2: Cover and let stand 10 minutes, or until foamy.
', 'Step 3: Add eggs, yogurt, vanilla, lemon zest, and salt.
', 'Step 4: Mix well.
', 'Step 5: Stir in flour 1/2 cup at a time until dough forms into a manageable ball.
', 'Step 6: Turn out onto a lightly floured surface and knead for 5 to 10 minutes, adding flour as necessary, until dough is soft and pliable, but not sticky.
', 'Step 7: (May need up to 5 cups flour.
', 'Step 8: ) Place dough in a large, lightly pan-sprayed bowl, cover, and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and spray a round 8-inch cake pan with non-stick spray.
', "Step 10: In a small bowl, toss dried fruit with confectioners' sugar.
", 'Step 11: Punch down dough in bowl, transfer to floured surface, and knead in the fruit.
', 'Step 12: Form dough into a ball, place in prepared cake pan, cover loosely with dish towel, and let rise 30 minutes.
', 'Step 13: (Loaf will rise above the pan sides.
', 'Step 14: ) Brush with melted butter, if desired.
', 'Step 15: Bake for 45 minutes, or until loaf is golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
', 'Step 16: Makes 10 wedges.
']

Title: Sopranos Style Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['1 pound mascarpone cheese', '1 cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons amaretto liqueur, or more to taste', '1 cup heavy whipping cream', '1 cup cold espresso', '24 ladyfingers, lightly toasted', '2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk mascarpone cheese, sugar, and amaretto liqueur together in a bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 2: Beat cream in a glass or metal bowl until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 3: Lift your beater or whisk straight up: whipped cream will form soft mounds rather than a sharp peak.
', 'Step 4: Fold whipped cream into mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 5: Pour espresso into a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Dip ladyfingers into espresso and arrange 12 dipped ladyfingers in an 8-inch square pan.
', 'Step 7: Spread 1/2 the mascarpone mixture over ladyfingers.
', 'Step 8: Grate 1 chocolate square over mascarpone layer.
', 'Step 9: Repeat a second layer with remaining dipped ladyfingers, mascarpone mixture, and chocolate, respectively.
', 'Step 10: Refrigerate tiramisu until set, at least 2 hours.
']

Title: Brodetto (Fish Stew) Ancona-Style
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 carrot, chopped', '2 celery ribs, chopped', '2 bay leaves', '1 cup chopped fresh parsley', 'red pepper flakes to taste', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, mashed', '1 ½ pounds red snapper fillets, cut into 2 inch pieces', '½ cup white vinegar', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 cups fish stock', '1 pound clams in shell, scrubbed', '½ pound medium shrimp, with shells', '6 (3/4 inch thick) slices Italian bread, toasted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan, Dutch oven, or preferably a clay pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add the onion, garlic, carrot, celery, bay leaves, parsley, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the mashed tomatoes and cook for 15 minutes over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Add the fish.
', 'Step 6: Pour in the vinegar or wine.
', 'Step 7: Cook until the liquid has almost evaporated, about 10 minutes; pour in the fish stock.
', 'Step 8: Cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Gently mix in the clams.
', "Step 10: Cook until clams have opened (discard any that don't open) about 2 minutes, and then stir in the shrimp.
", 'Step 11: Cook until the shrimp are pink, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Place a slice of toasted bread in the bottom of each bowl.
', 'Step 13: Ladle brodetto over the bread and serve immediately.
']

Title: Roasted Tomato, Avocado, and Fresh Mozzarella Crostini
Ingredients: ['2 vine-ripened tomatoes, cut into 1/4-inch slices', '¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil, divided', 'sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons butter', '8 diagonally sliced pieces baguette', '1 clove garlic, halved', '8 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, cut into 8 thin slices', '1 large avocado - halved, pitted, and thinly sliced', '½ small lemon', '¼ cup roughly chopped fresh dill', '1 pinch flaked salt']

', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

']

Title: Chocolate Italian Cream Cake
Ingredients: ['½ cup butter', '½ cup shortening', '2 cups white sugar', '5 eggs', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '¼ cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 cup buttermilk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup shredded coconut', '1 cup chopped pecans', '1 cup cream cheese', '½ cup butter', '¼ cup unsweetened cocoa powder', "4 cups sifted confectioners' sugar", '1 cup chopped pecans', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour three 8-inch round cake pans.

', 'Step 4: Cream 1/2 cup of the butter, shortening and sugar together.
', 'Step 5: Add egg yolks, one at a time, beating after each addition.
', 'Step 6: Stir in 1 teaspoon of the vanilla.
', 'Step 7: Sift soda, flour and 1/4 cup cocoa together.
', 'Step 8: Add alternately with buttermilk to the creamed mixture, beginning and ending with dry ingredients.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the coconut and 1 cup of the chopped pecans.
', 'Step 10: Beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form and fold into the batter.
', 'Step 11: Pour batter into the prepared cake pans.
', 'Step 12: Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Let cakes cool completely before frosting between layers and on sides.
', 'Step 14: To Make Frosting: Cream the cream cheese and butter together.

", 'Step 16: Add 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1 cup pecans.
']

Title: Romano Cheese Easter Bread
Ingredients: ['1 cup warm milk (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '6 eggs, room temperature', '1 ½ cups grated Romano cheese', '4 tablespoons butter, softened']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In the bowl of a stand mixer, dissolve yeast in warm milk.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until creamy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Lightly grease a large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 4: Stir flour and eggs into yeast mixture; beat on medium-low speed for about 10 minutes, scraping sides of bowl occasionally.
', 'Step 5: Add cheese and softened butter; beat a few minutes more, until fully incorporated.
', 'Step 6: Dough will be very sticky.
', 'Step 7: Scoop dough into greased mixing bowl.
', 'Step 8: Cover bowl with plastic wrap and let rise for 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Deflate dough and gently fold it over itself; cover and let rise again for 1 hour.
', 'Step 10: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Grease two 9x5-inch loaf pans or a tube pan.
', 'Step 12: Transfer dough to a lightly floured surface and knead slightly.

', 'Step 14: Transfer dough to prepared pan(s).
', 'Step 15: Let rise for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Bake in preheated oven until loaves are golden brown and sound hollow when their bottoms are tapped, about 60 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Remove from pans and place on a wire rack to cool completely.
']

Title: Ricotta Meatless Meatballs with Sauce
Ingredients: ['⅔ cup whole-milk ricotta cheese', '2 large eggs, beaten', '4 cups homemade dry bread crumbs', '1 cup grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '⅓ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (14 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes', '¼ cup red wine', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper']

', 'Step 15: Serve immediately.

Title: Vermicelli Salad

Title: Emily's Famous Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['5 eggs, separated', '¾ cup white sugar, divided', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', "¾ cup confectioners' sugar for dusting", '1 cup white sugar', '1 cup boiling water', '½ cup strong brewed coffee', '¼ cup rum', '1 (8 ounce) container mascarpone cheese', "2 cups confectioners' sugar", '¼ cup dark rum', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups heavy cream', '2 (1 ounce) squares semisweet chocolate, grated', "⅛ cup confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line baking sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl, whip egg yolks and 1/4 cup of sugar with an electric mixer until thick and pale.
', 'Step 4: In a separate bowl, whip egg whites (with clean beaters) to soft peaks.
', 'Step 5: Gradually sprinkle in the remaining 1/2 cup sugar while whipping to medium stiff peaks.
', 'Step 6: Fold the egg yolk mixture into the egg whites.
', 'Step 7: Gently fold in the flour and 1 teaspoon vanilla.
', 'Step 8: The batter should be thick and pale yellow.
', 'Step 9: Trace two 9 inch circles onto the parchment paper using a cake pan as a guide.
', 'Step 10: Spread or pipe batter to completely fill inside the lines of the circles.
', 'Step 11: Batter should be about 1/2 inch tall.
', 'Step 12: Load the remaining batter into a pastry bag fitted with a half inch tip or hole.
', 'Step 13: Draw parallel lines onto another piece of parchment that are 3 inches apart.
', 'Step 14: Pipe the batter back and forth just between the lines in a compressed S motion, until you run out of batter.
', 'Step 15: This is the part that wraps around the outside of the cake.
', 'Step 16: (It helps to have it in one piece, but you can pipe individual fingers using the guidelines drawn on the paper, if you prefer.
', 'Step 17: ) There may be extra.
', 'Step 18: Bake in preheated oven 10 to 15 minutes, until firm but not browned.
', "Step 19: Remove from the oven and dust generously with confectioners' sugar.
", 'Step 20: Set aside to cool.
', 'Step 21: To make the syrup, stir together 1 cup sugar, boiling water, coffee and 1/4 cup rum until sugar is dissolved.
', 'Step 22: Set aside.
', "Step 23: To make the filling, combine mascarpone, 2 cups confectioners' sugar, dark rum and 1 teaspoon vanilla in a large bowl.
", 'Step 24: Whisk together until completely smooth, scraping the bottom of the bowl to remove any lumps.
', 'Step 25: Gradually whisk in the heavy cream.
', 'Step 26: Whip with an electric mixer until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 27: Stop whipping when the mixture shows the first sign of graininess.
', 'Step 28: To assemble, line the sides of a 9-inch springform pan with parchment or waxed paper.
', 'Step 29: Place one of the ladyfinger rounds in the bottom of the pan.
', 'Step 30: Brush generously, but do not soak completely, with syrup.
', 'Step 31: Place the 3-inch high ladyfinger strips around the inside edge of the pan, so that the sides are completely covered.
', 'Step 32: Brush generously with syrup.
', 'Step 33: Spread half of the filling mixture over the first ladyfinger round in the pan.
', 'Step 34: Place the remaining ladyfinger round on top of the filling.
', 'Step 35: Soak the second ladyfinger round with syrup until it cannot take any more.
', 'Step 36: Spread the remaining filling over that and smooth the top.
', 'Step 37: Sprinkle with grated chocolate.
', 'Step 38: Refrigerate at least 4 hours.
', 'Step 39: To serve, remove the sides of the pan and carefully remove the parchment or waxed paper from the outside of the cake.
', "Step 40: Dust with confectioners' sugar just before serving.
"]
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '558.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '70.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '155.2 mg', 'fatContent': '27 g', 'fiberContent': '0.6 g', 'proteinContent': '6.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '15.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '55.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '60.3 g'}

Title: Hearty Meatball Sandwich
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds lean ground beef', '⅓ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs', '½ small onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '1 tablespoon cracked black pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ cup marinara sauce', '3 hoagie rolls, split lengthwise']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a medium bowl, mix together the ground beef, bread crumbs, onion, salt and pepper, garlic powder, and half of the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 3: Form the mixture into a log, and place it into an 8x8 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 4: Bake for 50 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the center is no longer pink.
', 'Step 5: Let stand for 5 minutes, then slice into 1/2 inch slices.
', 'Step 6: Place a few slices onto each hoagie roll, cover with marinara sauce, and sprinkle remaining mozzarella cheese over.
', 'Step 7: Wrap each sandwich with aluminum foil, and return to the oven for 15 minutes, until bread is lightly toasted and cheese is melted.
', 'Step 8: Let stand 15 minutes before eating.
', 'Step 9: Each sandwich serves 2.
']

Title: Delicious Spaghetti Bread
Ingredients: ['½ pound ground beef', '1 (8 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 (28 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (13.8 ounce) can refrigerated pizza dough (such as Pillsbury®)', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 clove garlic, minced', '3 tablespoons olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 4: Transfer ground beef to a mixing bowl.
', 'Step 5: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain.
', 'Step 8: Transfer spaghetti to bowl with ground beef and mix in spaghetti sauce and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 9: Unroll pizza dough onto a baking sheet.
', 'Step 10: Starting with a long edge, cut the 2 outer thirds of the crust into 1-inch horizontal strips, leaving the center third uncut.
', 'Step 11: Spoon spaghetti mixture onto the center third from top to bottom.
', 'Step 12: Spread mozzarella cheese over the spaghetti mixture.
', 'Step 13: Braid the dough strips over the filling by pulling a dough strip across the filling and pulling another strip from the opposite side over the first strip.
', 'Step 14: Pinch strips together and continue to braid until the filling is covered with braided dough.
', 'Step 15: Mix garlic into olive oil in a small bowl.
', 'Step 16: Brush olive oil mixture over the top of the bread.
', 'Step 17: Bake in the preheated oven until the filling is hot and the crust is golden brown, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Serve cut in slices.
']

Title: Sicilian Brasciole a la Lena
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '⅛ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 cup bread crumbs', '⅛ cup grated Romano cheese', '⅛ cup raisins', '⅛ cup pine nuts, toasted', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ½ pounds round steak', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 (32 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce']

', 'Step 2: Saute onion until translucent, 10 minutes.

Title: Chicken and Bowtie Pasta with Asiago Cream Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package farfalle (bow tie) pasta', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed', '2 ¼ cups heavy cream, divided', '¼ cube chicken bouillon, crumbled', '¾ cup grated Asiago cheese', '½ tablespoon cornstarch', '2 tablespoons butter', '¼ cup chopped prosciutto', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh garlic', '¼ cup sliced mushrooms', '½ tablespoon parsley flakes']

', 'Step 2: Cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente.

']

Title: Marinated Mushrooms for Antipasto
Ingredients: ['1 pound small mushrooms, stemmed', '4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '½ red onion, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh oregano', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh thyme', '2 cloves garlic cloves, pressed', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']

']

Title: Chocolate Mousse Cake IV
Ingredients: ['1 (18.25 ounce) package chocolate cake mix', '1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk', '2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, melted', '½ cup cold water', '1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix', '1 cup heavy cream, whipped']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Prepare and bake cake mix according to package directions for two 9-inch layers.
', 'Step 3: Cool and remove from pans.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl, mix together sweetened condensed milk and melted chocolate.
', 'Step 5: Gradually stir in the water, then instant pudding until smooth.
', 'Step 6: Chill for at least 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove the chocolate mixture from the refrigerator, and stir to loosen.
', 'Step 8: Fold in whipped cream and return to the refrigerator for at least another hour.

Title: Spaghetti alla Nerano (Spaghetti with Fried Zucchini)
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds zucchini, sliced', '½ cup olive oil, or more as needed', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, or more to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '½ cup grated aged provolone cheese', '¾ cup chopped fresh basil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place zucchini slices on a plate and let dry for 1 hour.
', 'Step 2: Heat 1/2 cup oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Add zucchini slices in batches and deep fry until brown, 10 to 15 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 4: Drain on paper towels and allow to cool.
', 'Step 5: Mash 1/3 of the zucchini.
', 'Step 6: Place 3 tablespoons olive oil and garlic cloves in a large saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 7: Watch carefully and simmer until garlic cloves are a light golden brown and oil is infused with garlic flavor, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in mashed zucchini.
', 'Step 9: Add zucchini slices.
', 'Step 10: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Drain spaghetti, reserving some cooking water.
', 'Step 13: Add spaghetti and provolone cheese to the saucepan.
', 'Step 14: Toss and add hot pasta water until sauce becomes creamy.
', 'Step 15: Mix in basil, season with salt and pepper, and serve.
']
