Title: Fusilli with Rapini (Broccoli Rabe), Garlic, and Tomato Wine Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 bunch broccoli rabe, trimmed and cut into 1-inch pieces', '½ cup uncooked fusilli pasta', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, roughly chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 sprig fresh rosemary', '½ teaspoon dried Italian herb mix, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '¼ cup white wine', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '2 green onions, sliced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a saucepan with enough water to cover the broccoli rabe, sprinkle in some salt, and bring the salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the broccoli rabe, and cook until bright green and just starting to become tender, about 2 minutes; drain the rabe, and cool in a bowl of ice water to stop the cooking process.
', 'Step 3: Drain well, and pat dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 4: Fill a pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 5: Once the water is boiling, stir in the fusilli, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 8: While the pasta is cooking, heat the olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat, and cook and stir the 2 roughly-chopped garlic cloves until they start to turn translucent, about 2 minutes; sprinkle with salt and black pepper, and stir in rosemary sprig, dried Italian herb mix, and crushed red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the blanched rabe, white wine, and tomatoes; remove rosemary sprig, and bring the mixture to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Mix in the cooked fusilli pasta, green onions, and 1 minced clove of garlic; simmer for 1 more minute, and serve topped with a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '353.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '26.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '1.8 mg', 'fatContent': '21.3 g', 'fiberContent': '6 g', 'proteinContent': '9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '390.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.6 g'}

Title: North Italian Meat Sauce (Ragu Bolognese)
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons butter, divided', '4 ounces pancetta, diced', '1 cup diced onion', '1 cup chopped carrot', '½ cup chopped celery', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ pound lean ground beef', '12 ounces lean ground pork', '½ cup white wine', '2 cups beef stock', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '½ pound chicken liver', '1 cup heavy whipping cream', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large skillet, melt 2 tablespoons butter over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add pancetta, onion, carrot, and celery and cook, stirring often, for 10 minutes or until lightly browned.
', 'Step 3: Transfer to a heavy large saucepan.
', 'Step 4: In same skillet, heat olive oil.
', 'Step 5: Cook ground beef and pork over medium heat, stirring to break up any lumps, until browned.
', 'Step 6: Pour in the wine, increase the heat and boil briskly, stirring constantly, until almost all of the liquid has evaporated.
', 'Step 7: Transfer ground meat mixture to the saucepan with the pancetta and vegetables.
', 'Step 8: Set skillet aside.
', 'Step 9: Stir the beef stock and tomato paste into the saucepan.
', 'Step 10: Bring sauce to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat and simmer, partially covered, for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, melt remaining 2 tablespoons of butter over medium-high heat in the original skillet.
', 'Step 12: Add chicken livers and saute for 3 to 4 minutes, or until firm and lightly browned.
', 'Step 13: Remove livers from skillet and dice.
', 'Step 14: Set aside and add to sauce 10 minutes before it is done.
', 'Step 15: A few minutes before serving, stir in the cream and let it heat through.
', 'Step 16: Season sauce with nutmeg, salt, and pepper to taste.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '135.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '1.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '58.5 mg', 'fatContent': '11.5 g', 'fiberContent': '0.4 g', 'proteinContent': '5.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '167.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.9 g'}

Title: Italian Buttercream
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups white sugar', '⅔ cup corn syrup', '⅔ cup water', '5 egg whites', '1 ⅓ cups unsalted butter, chilled and cubed', '2 ⅔ cups shortening', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a saucepan, combine the sugar, corn syrup and water.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring just enough to dissolve the sugar.
', 'Step 3: Heat to between 223 and 234 degrees F (106 to 112 degrees C), or until a small amount of syrup dripped from a spoon forms a soft thread.
', 'Step 4: It should take 1 or 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: n When the sugar mixture has reached the thread stage, remove it from the heat and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Whip the egg whites in a large bowl with an electric mixer.
', 'Step 7: When the whites can hold a stiff peak, pour in the sugar syrup in a thin stream while continuing to whip at medium speed.
', 'Step 8: Be careful not to pour too quickly, or it will all end up at the bottom of the bowl.
', 'Step 9: When the syrup is incorporated, continue to mix for 10 more minutes to allow it to cool.
', 'Step 10: The egg whites will be fluffy and glossy.
', 'Step 11: n Add pieces of cold butter one at a time to the egg whites and continue to whip at medium or low speed.
', 'Step 12: Then do the same with the shortening.
', 'Step 13: The buttercream will break down and look curdled, but keep mixing and it will come back together in about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 14: When it comes back around, mix in the vanilla.
', 'Step 15: Store at room temperature for up to 2 days, or in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.
', 'Step 16: n To use after it has been refrigerated, allow it to come to room temperature, then beat with a mixer before using.
', 'Step 17: If cold, heat over a double boiler until you have liquid visible just around the edges.
', 'Step 18: Beat with a mixer until smooth and fluffy before using.
']

Title: Zuppa di Pesce e Frutti di Mare (Mediterranean Seafood Soup)
Ingredients: ['¾ pound cod', '½ pound prawns', '1 onion, quartered', '1 carrot, chopped', '1 stalk celery, chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', 'water to cover', '6 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '½ small onion, sliced', '1 red chile pepper, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '½ cup dry white wine', '½ pound tomatoes, chopped', '½ pound clams in shell, cleaned', '½ pound mussels, cleaned and debearded', '4 slices bread, or more to taste', '1 clove garlic, halved', '1 bunch fresh parsley, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut cod into pieces, reserving any scraps.
', 'Step 2: Peel and devein prawns, reserving any scraps.
', 'Step 3: Place cod and prawn scraps, quartered onion, carrot, celery, salt, and pepper in a large saucepan; cover with water.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer until fish stock is fragrant, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Strain and reserve fish stock.
', 'Step 6: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir sliced onion, red chile pepper, and minced garlic until softened, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour in wine; cook for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add tomatoes; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Add cod, prawns, clams, and mussels; pour in 1 cup fish stock.
', 'Step 10: Simmer until fish is cooked through and clams and mussels have opened, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Toast bread in a toaster.
', 'Step 12: Rub garlic halves on to 1 side of toasted bread.
', 'Step 13: Place a piece of toasted bread in the bottom of each serving bowl.
', 'Step 14: Ladle soup over toasted bread and top with parsley.
']

Title: Easy Polenta with Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 cups milk', '2 cups chicken stock', '1 cup yellow cornmeal', '1 cup Parmesan cheese', '2 cups spaghetti sauce, or your favorite recipe']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9 inch square baking dish.

Title: Riso al Forno (Italian Baked Rice)
Ingredients: ['¾ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '½ cup dry bread crumbs', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 yellow onion, sliced', '1 (23 ounce) jar tomato puree (passata)', '1 cup low-sodium vegetable broth', '1 cup frozen peas', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 ¼ cups uncooked short-grain white rice', 'water as needed', '1 cup cubed provolone cheese']

['Step 1: Mix Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese and bread crumbs together in a bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 2: Heat olive oil in a Dutch oven over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Add onion and saute until tender and translucent, about 8 minutes.

', 'Step 5: Stir, bring to a simmer, and cook for 5 minutes.

', 'Step 9: Remove the Dutch oven from the stove and gently stir in provolone cheese.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle reserved bread crumb mixture on top.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and browned on top, about 15 minutes.
']

Title: Layered Eggplant Hamburger Casserole
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds lean ground beef', '2 onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '2 ¼ cups water', '1 (14.5 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes', '⅓ cup dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 eggplant', '1 onion, sliced', '½ cup dry bread crumbs', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a large skillet over medium heat, saute the ground beef, onion and garlic for 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain excess fat.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the tomato paste, water, tomatoes, parsley, thyme, oregano and basil.
', 'Step 5: Set aside.
', 'Step 6: Slice eggplant into 1/4-inch rounds.
', 'Step 7: Place a layer of eggplant into the bottom of a lightly greased 9x12-inch glass baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Then place a layer of the ground beef mixture over the eggplant, followed by a layer of sliced onion.
', 'Step 9: Top this with 1/2 the breadcrumbs and cheese.
', 'Step 10: Then repeat the layers: eggplant, ground beef mixture, sliced onion and remaining breadcrumbs and cheese.
', 'Step 11: Cover and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour, remove foil and bake for 20 more minutes.
']

Title: Roman-Style Gnocchi
Ingredients: ['3 cups milk', '1 teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste', '1 ¼ cups semolina flour', '1 ¾ ounces freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '2 large egg yolks', '3 tablespoons cold unsalted butter, cut into small cubes', '3 tablespoons melted butter', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or more to cover']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line a rimmed sheet pan with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 2: Place milk and salt in a saucepan.
', 'Step 3: Bring almost to a simmer over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: As soon as bubbles start to break the surface of the milk, gradually whisk in the semolina.
', 'Step 5: Whisk until semolina becomes thick, about 20 seconds.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to medium-low; continue stirring with a wooden spoon until very thick, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 8: Add butter, grated cheese, and egg yolks.
', 'Step 9: Stir quickly to prevent the yolks from cooking.
', 'Step 10: Transfer mixture to prepared pan and spread out evenly.
', 'Step 11: Cover with another piece of plastic wrap.
', 'Step 12: Refrigerate until firm enough to cut, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Brush a round, shallow baking dish with butter.
', 'Step 15: Using a round 2 3/4-inch cookie cutter, cut out circles of the semolina dough.
', 'Step 16: Arrange in a circular overlapping pattern in the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 17: With your damp hands, form the scraps of dough into a small ball.
', 'Step 18: Flatten and place between 2 pieces of plastic wrap to flatten to the same thickness of the other dough.
', 'Step 19: Cut out a few more rounds and arrange in center of circle.
', 'Step 20: Drizzle melted butter over gnocchi and brush it over them evenly.
', 'Step 21: Sprinkle with a pinch of cayenne pepper and a generous dusting of grated cheese.
', 'Step 22: Bake in preheated oven until golden brown, about 25 minutes.
']

Title: Meatball Cookies
Ingredients: ['3 cups all-purpose flour', '⅔ cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '1 ½ teaspoons baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup chopped walnuts', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '3 eggs', '½ cup butter', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', "4 cups confectioners' sugar", '¼ cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '½ cup milk']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).

', 'Step 16: ).
', 'Step 17: Decorate with sprinkles while glaze is still wet.
']

Title: Gnocchi alla Sorrentina
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '½ pound potato gnocchi', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '14 ounces Italian plum tomatoes, halved', '¼ cup dry white wine', '¼ cup torn fresh basil leaves', '7 ounces small fresh mozzarella balls (ciliegine)', '4 tablespoons finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '4 sprigs fresh basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly oil an oven-safe baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook gnocchi in the boiling water until they float to the top, 2 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 6: While gnocchi is cooking, heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add onion and cook until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 9: Cut an "x" into the skin of each tomato with a sharp knife and add to the skillet; stir well.
', 'Step 10: Pour in white wine and simmer until tomatoes are tender, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Using a spoon, gently crush tomatoes to release juice and pulp.
', 'Step 12: Add basil and continue to gently crush tomatoes to create a sauce.
', 'Step 13: Remove and discard tomato skins as they loosen from the pulp.
', 'Step 14: Cook for 1 more minute over low heat.
', 'Step 15: Add drained gnocchi to the sauce and mix until covered with the sauce.
', 'Step 16: Remove skillet from heat and add mozzarella balls, folding everything together gently but quickly, so cheese is coated with sauce but not cooked or melted.
', 'Step 17: Transfer to the prepared baking dish and sprinkle with Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese has melted, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Garnished with fresh basil sprigs.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '303.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '18.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '53.6 mg', 'fatContent': '18.5 g', 'fiberContent': '2.1 g', 'proteinContent': '13.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '195.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.5 g'}

Title: Tuscan Smoked Turkey-Bean Soup
Ingredients: ['1 pound dry white beans', '2 smoked turkey legs', '½ onion, diced', '2 bay leaves', '2 stalks celery, diced', '4 large carrots, sliced', '1 (14.5 ounce) can petite diced tomatoes, undrained', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the beans into a large bowl, fill the bowl with water, and cover the bowl with a cloth.
', 'Step 2: Allow to soak overnight.
', 'Step 3: Drain and rinse the beans.
', 'Step 4: Place the soaked beans, turkey legs, onion, and bay leaves into a large soup pot, cover with water, then bring to a boil over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer for 3 hours.
', 'Step 6: Remove bay leaves, and discard.
', 'Step 7: Remove the turkey legs from the broth, separate the meat from the bones and tendons, and return the meat to the broth.
', 'Step 8: Stir in celery, carrots, diced tomatoes, Italian seasoning, and salt and pepper; simmer until the celery and carrots are tender, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Serve in bowls and sprinkle each serving with about 1 teaspoon of Parmesan cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '454.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '53.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '65.6 mg', 'fatContent': '8.8 g', 'fiberContent': '14 g', 'proteinContent': '40.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '938.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.6 g'}

Title: Eggplant Parmesan With Easy Homemade Sauce
Ingredients: ['½ cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 eggplant - trimmed, peeled, and sliced 1/2-inch thick', '½ cup olive oil', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 ½ (6 ounce) cans water', '¼ teaspoon dried basil', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon dried parsley', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon brown sugar', 'sea salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (8 ounce) package fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease an 8x14-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Mix seasoned bread crumbs, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, and red pepper flakes in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 4: Brush eggplant slices with olive oil and press into bread crumb mixture to coat.
', 'Step 5: Lay slices onto a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven until browned and tender, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove eggplant and reduce oven temperature to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Whisk tomato paste and water in a saucepan, place over medium heat, and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 8: Stir in basil, oregano, parsley, garlic, brown sugar, sea salt, and black pepper.
', 'Step 9: Place eggplant slices into prepared baking dish, overlapping the slices.
', 'Step 10: Spoon tomato sauce over eggplant and top with mozzarella cheese and 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 12: If desired, broil for 1 to 2 more minutes to give the cheese topping a golden color.
', 'Step 13: Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '388.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '14.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '41.4 mg', 'fatContent': '30.6 g', 'fiberContent': '1.6 g', 'proteinContent': '14.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '680.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.5 g'}

Title: Chocolate Gelato
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ cups whole milk', '⅝ cup white sugar, divided', '⅓ cup heavy cream', '⅓ cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '⅔ cup chopped dark chocolate', '4 egg yolks']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat milk, 1/2 the sugar, and cream in a heavy saucepan until simmering and sugar is dissolved, about 5 minutes, being careful not to scorch the milk.
', 'Step 2: Remove milk from heat and whisk in cocoa powder and dark chocolate.
', 'Step 3: Allow to cool slightly.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, beat egg yolks and remaining sugar in a large bowl using a whisk or electric beater until thick and pale yellow.
', 'Step 5: Add about 1 cup of the slightly cooled chocolate mixture in a slow stream to avoid cooking eggs, whisking constantly until well combined.
', 'Step 6: Add the rest of the chocolate mixture and return to the saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 7: Stir constantly until thickened enough to coat the back of a spoon, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 8: Strain custard through a sieve into a bowl and cover with plastic wrap touching to mixture to prevent a skin from forming.
', 'Step 9: Refrigerate 8 hours to overnight.
', "Step 10: Pour cold custard into an ice cream maker and freeze according to manufacturer's instructions, about 20 minutes.
", 'Step 11: Transfer to an airtight container and freeze until hardened, about 1 hour.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '237.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '30.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '122.9 mg', 'fatContent': '12.3 g', 'fiberContent': '1.3 g', 'proteinContent': '5.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '39.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '18.8 g'}

Title: Sweet Chicken Marsala
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 slice onion, minced', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '2 cups Marsala wine', '1 ½ cups chicken stock', '5 tablespoons brown sugar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon molasses', '1 tablespoon corn syrup', '3 tablespoons cornstarch', '1 tablespoon cold water', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded flat', '2 tablespoons chopped green onion, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir mushrooms, onion, and garlic into the melted butter, increase heat to medium-high, and cook and stir the mixture until the mushrooms are golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir Marsala wine, chicken stock, brown sugar, lemon juice, molasses, and corn syrup into the mushroom mixture; bring to a boil and cook, stirring frequently, until the liquid reduces by about half, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Whisk cornstarch into cold water in a small bowl.
', 'Step 5: Stream the cornstarch slurry into the Marsala sauce, stirring continually; cook and stir until the sauce thickens, another 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Heat olive oil with 1 tablespoon butter in a large skillet over medium heat; cook chicken until golden brown until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 3 to 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 7: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Arrange each chicken breast into the center of a plate.
', 'Step 9: Drizzle Marsala sauce over each chicken breast; garnish with green onion to serve.
']

Title: Spaghetti Sauce with Cauliflower
Ingredients: ['¼ cup olive oil', '6 large cloves garlic, chopped', '1 sweet onion (such as Vidalia®), chopped', '3 cups chopped cauliflower', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '3 (28 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes']
Cooking Instructions: ['Step 1: Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a large saucepan or soup pot, and cook the garlic, onion, and cauliflower, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower is browned and tender, about 30 minutes.\n', 'Step 2: Pour in the basil, black pepper, and crushed tomatoes, and simmer until the sauce is thickened and the flavors have blended, about 30 more minutes.\n']

Title: Garlic Cheese Flatbread
Ingredients: ['1 (.25 ounce) envelope active dry yeast', '1 cup lukewarm water', '2 cups bread flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '⅓ cup butter or margarine, softened', '2 tablespoons garlic powder', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '⅓ cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a cup or small bowl, sprinkle yeast over the surface of the lukewarm water.
', 'Step 2: Let stand for 5 to 10 minutes to dissolve.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, stir together the flour, salt and sugar.
', 'Step 4: Pour in the yeast mixture along with the olive oil.
', 'Step 5: Beat with a sturdy spoon until dough is stiff enough to pull away from the sides of the bowl.
', 'Step 6: Cover, and set aside until doubled in size, about 35 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove the dough from the bowl and knead briefly on a floured surface.
', 'Step 8: Roll the dough out to 1/4 to 1/2 inch thickness or to the size of your baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Place on a greased baking sheet and spread butter over the top.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle with garlic powder, Parmesan cheese and mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 11: Let rest while you preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown and cheese is bubbly.
', 'Step 13: Serve warm.
']

Title: Hoagie Dip
Ingredients: ['½ pound cooked ham, thinly sliced', '½ pound Genoa salami, thinly sliced', '1 pound processed American cheese, sliced', '2 cups mayonnaise', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1 onion, chopped', '½ head iceberg lettuce, shredded', '2 tomatoes, diced', '12 hoagie rolls, torn into pieces for dipping']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Tear the ham, salami and American cheese into small pieces.
', 'Step 2: Place in a large bowl.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl, blend the mayonnaise and oregano.
', 'Step 4: Mix the mayonnaise mixture into the ham mixture 1/2 cup at a time, until meats and cheese are well coated.
', 'Step 5: Mix in the onion.
', 'Step 6: Before serving, mix in the lettuce and tomatoes.
', 'Step 7: Serve with the hoagie roll pieces for dipping.
']

Title: Italian Marinated Chicken
Ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (16 ounce) bottle Italian-style salad dressing', '⅓ cup vegetable oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To Marinate: Place chicken in a nonporous glass dish or bowl.
', 'Step 2: Poke several holes in breasts with a fork; season with salt and pepper to taste and cover with salad dressing.
', 'Step 3: Toss to coat, cover dish and refrigerate to marinate for 2 hours.
', 'Step 4: Heat oil in a medium skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Remove chicken from marinade (discarding of any remaining marinade) and saute in skillet for 4 to 5 minutes on each side, or until cooked through and juices run clear.
']

Title: Mama Chiarello's Stuffed Eggplant
Ingredients: ['1 large eggplant', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '½ teaspoon grey sea salt', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '½ pound ground beef', '1 onion, diced small', '1 red bell pepper, diced small', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '½ cup chopped fresh basil leaves', '1 ¼ cups grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '½ cup Progresso® plain Panko crispy bread crumbs', '1 whole egg', '2 small tomatoes, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Cut the eggplant in half and scoop out the center, leaving enough meat inside the skin so that it holds its shape when baked.
', 'Step 2: Chop eggplant that has been scooped out of the inside; place in saucepan, cover with water and boil until very soft, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, in a medium saute pan, heat 1 tablespoon of the olive oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Salt and pepper the beef.
', 'Step 5: Add the seasoned ground beef to the pan, and saute until all of its liquid is evaporated and the beef begins to brown slightly.
', 'Step 6: Let cool briefly, and chop the cooked beef so that there are no large chunks of meat.
', 'Step 7: In another medium saute pan over medium heat, add the remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil, and saute the onion, pepper and garlic together in the oil.
', 'Step 8: In a bowl, mix together the cooked eggplant, vegetables, beef, herbs, 1 cup of the cheese, 1/4 cup of the bread crumbs and the egg.
', 'Step 9: Fill the scooped-out eggplant halves with this mixture, dividing it evenly between the two halves.
', 'Step 10: Top with chopped tomatoes, the remaining 1/4 cup cheese, remaining 1/4 cup bread crumbs, and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Place on an oiled oven tray or baking dish, and bake for 50 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Let cool briefly; slice widthwise and serve.
']

Title: Spaghetti Aglio, Olio, e Peperoncini
Ingredients: ['½ (12 ounce) package thick spaghetti', '6 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided, or to taste', '1 hot chile pepper, seeded and minced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '¼ cup chopped fresh Italian parsley']

', 'Step 2: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.

', 'Step 4: Heat 4 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet.

']

Title: Baked Fettuccine Lasagna
Ingredients: ['12 ounces dry fettuccine pasta', '1 pound lean ground beef', '1 cup chopped onion', '1 cup red bell pepper, chopped', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 (29 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (4 ounce) can sliced mushrooms', '3 tablespoons chopped black olives', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup', '¼ cup beef broth', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: In a large skillet, brown beef over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Drain fat from pan, and transfer meat to a bowl.
', 'Step 5: In the same skillet, cook onion and bell pepper in butter until tender.
', 'Step 6: Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, olives, and beef, and season with oregano.
', 'Step 7: Simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Arrange half of the cooked fettuccine in the prepared dish, top with half of the beef and vegetable mixture, and sprinkle with 1/2 cup of Cheddar cheese and 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 11: Repeat layers.
', 'Step 12: Mix together soup and beef broth until smooth, and pour over casserole.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 14: Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until heated through.
']

Title: Italian Cioppino
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 cup chopped onion', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans chicken broth', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes', '¾ cup white wine', '½ cup water', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '2 bay leaves', '1 ¼ pounds cod fillets, cut into chunks', '1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 pound bay scallops', '10 small clams in shell, scrubbed', '10 mussels, cleaned and debearded']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter in a large braising pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook onions and garlic in melted butter, stirring occasionally with a wooden spoon, until onions are softened, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir chicken broth, diced tomatoes, wine, water, basil, thyme, oregano, red pepper flakes, and bay leaves with the onion and garlic.
', 'Step 4: Place a cover on the braising pan and cook mixture at a simmer until the tomatoes are softened and the broth flavorful, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Fold cod, shrimp, scallops, clams, and mussels into the broth mixture; bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, return cover to pan, and continue to simmer until the clams open, 5 to 7 minutes.
']

Title: The Best Pizza Crust
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast', '2 cups bread flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon nonfat dry milk powder', '1 tablespoon margarine', '⅓ cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine flour, salt, sugar, dry milk, butter or margarine, yeast, and warm water.
', 'Step 2: Gather into a ball.
', 'Step 3: Turn out an a lightly floured surface, and knead until the dough is smooth.
', 'Step 4: Place in a well oiled bowl, and turn to coat the surface.
', 'Step 5: Cover with a damp cloth, and place in a warm spot for 2 hours.
', 'Step 6: n Punch down the dough.
', 'Step 7: Roll out to fit a 14 inch pizza pan.
', 'Step 8: Allow to rise until doubled in size.
', 'Step 9: n Bake at 375 degrees F ( 190 degrees C) until crust is a very light brown color.
', 'Step 10: Remove from oven.
', 'Step 11: n Place desired toppings on the pizza.
', 'Step 12: Bake for 20 minutes, or until toppings are done.
']

Title: Sicilian Fig Cookies
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon salt', '2 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '½ cup white sugar', '1 cup unsalted butter', '2 eggs', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup milk', '2 cups chopped dried figs', '1 cup raisins', '1 large orange', '2 cups toasted walnuts, chopped', '1 cup honey', '½ cup dark rum', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To make Pastry: Combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt in a large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 2: Add the butter, eggs, vanilla and milk.
', 'Step 3: Stir into a smooth dough.
', 'Step 4: Remove dough from bowl and shape into a circle.
', 'Step 5: Cut into 4 equal pieces, wrap in plastic and chill.
', 'Step 6: To make the Filling: Use the zest and juice of the orange and place in large bowl.
', 'Step 7: Mix in figs, raisins and nuts.
', 'Step 8: Process in food processor until evenly chopped.
', 'Step 9: Stir in honey, rum and cinnamon, and set aside.
', 'Step 10: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Grease cookie sheets.
', 'Step 12: Remove dough from refrigerator.
', 'Step 13: Roll one piece of dough at a time into an 8-inch wide strip about 1/4-inch thick.
', 'Step 14: Cut lengthwise in half, forming two long strips, each about 4 inches wide.
', 'Step 15: Lay strips on work surface.
', 'Step 16: Brush top inch of each with cold water.
', 'Step 17: About 1/3 of the way up from the bottom of the dough, place 1/4 of the filling in a 1-inch wide strip, running from end to end.
', 'Step 18: Fold the moistened edge of the dough over the filling and press to seal edges.
', 'Step 19: Cut each strip into 1-inch rectangles and place on cookie sheets.
', 'Step 20: Repeat with remaining sections of dough.
', 'Step 21: Bake 13 to 16 minutes, or until tops are golden.
', 'Step 22: Let cool on cookie sheets for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Transfer to wire racks.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '107.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '14.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '12 mg', 'fatContent': '5 g', 'fiberContent': '1.2 g', 'proteinContent': '1.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '28.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.8 g'}

Title: Creamy Italian Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients: ['4 (4 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, cubed', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup', '1 ½ (.7 ounce) packages dry Italian-style salad dressing mix', '½ cup dry sherry']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Rinse chicken, and pat dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 2: Place chicken breasts into a slow cooker, and drizzle melted butter all over the chicken breasts, lifting them up to allow butter to flow underneath the chicken.
', 'Step 3: Cover the cooker, set to High, and cook until tender, 4 to 5 hours.
', 'Step 4: With a metal spatula, chop up the chicken into bite-size pieces in the slow cooker.
', 'Step 5: Place the cream cheese, cream of chicken soup, Italian salad dressing mix, and sherry into a saucepan over medium heat, and bring to a boil, stirring constantly until the cream cheese has melted and the sauce is well combined.
', 'Step 6: Pour the sauce over the chicken in the slow cooker; cover, and cook on High until the flavors have blended and the sauce is bubbling, about 30 more minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '384.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '14.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '113.3 mg', 'fatContent': '22.4 g', 'proteinContent': '26.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '11.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '2045.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.3 g'}

Title: Best Darn Minestrone Soup Around
Ingredients: ['8 tablespoons butter', '1 ½ cups chopped onions', '4 (14 ounce) cans chicken broth', '4 (15 ounce) cans mixed vegetables, with liquid', '2 (16 ounce) cans kidney beans, with liquid', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes, with liquid', '1 (16 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '4 ¼ teaspoons garlic powder', '4 teaspoons dried parsley', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 cup uncooked elbow macaroni', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 cup canned garbanzo beans, drained', '4 cups heavy cream', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese for topping']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large stock pot over medium heat, stir and cook onions in butter until soft.
', 'Step 2: Add broth, mixed vegetables, kidney beans, tomatoes, spinach, and tomato paste; simmer gently for 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 3: Using a slotted spoon, remove about half of the vegetables to a blender or food processor, reserving liquid in stock pot.
', 'Step 4: Puree the vegetables until smooth and return them to stock pot.
', 'Step 5: Stir in garlic powder, parsley, salt, pepper, basil, macaroni, 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese, garbanzo beans, and heavy cream; cook for 1/2 hour, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 6: Pour into bowls and sprinkle with additional Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Homemade Cavatelli Pasta
Ingredients: ["2 ¼ cups durum wheat semolina flour (such as Bob's Red Mill®)", '1 pinch salt', '1 cup water, or as needed, at room temperature']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix semolina flour and salt in a large bowl or on a marble work surface.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the center.
', 'Step 3: Pour water into the well a little at a time, mixing it with the flour.
', 'Step 4: Add as much water as needed to make a sticky but compact dough.
', 'Step 5: Knead dough with your hands by flattening the ball, stretching it, and folding the top towards the center.
', 'Step 6: Turn 45 degrees and repeat until dough is elastic and smooth, but not too soft, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 8: Place in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 9: Let rest at room temperature for about 30 minutes before using.
', 'Step 10: If you are using the cavatelli within a few hours or the following day, wrap in plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator.
', 'Step 11: Work with one portion of the dough at a time, keeping the remaining dough covered to keep it from drying out.
', 'Step 12: Dust a work surface with semolina flour; roll out the dough to make a rope, about 1/3 inch thick.
', 'Step 13: Cut off little 1/3-inch-thick pieces.
', 'Step 14: Press and gently drag the small piece of dough towards you with your index and middle finger.
', 'Step 15: The two sides will curl inwards, leaving hollow spaces.
', 'Step 16: Proceed the same way with the rest of the dough.
', 'Step 17: Transfer cavatelli to a floured surface and sprinkle with more semolina flour.
', 'Step 18: Do not overlap cavatelli or they will stick together.
', 'Step 19: Let dry for about 30 minutes before cooking.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '338.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '68.4 g', 'fatContent': '1 g', 'fiberContent': '3.7 g', 'proteinContent': '11.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '41.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.7 g'}

Title: Ricotta Fettuccine Alfredo with Broccoli
Ingredients: ['8 ounces fettuccini pasta', '2 cups fresh broccoli florets', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 cups skim milk', '⅔ cup part-skim ricotta cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Place broccoli in a steamer over 1 inch of boiling water, and cover.
', 'Step 4: Cook until tender but still firm, about 2 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain.
', 'Step 6: Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add flour and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 8: Gradually add milk, stirring with a whisk until blended.
', 'Step 9: Cook 15 minutes or until thick, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 10: Stir in ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Cook 5 minutes or until cheese melts.
', 'Step 12: Stir in steamed broccoli and cooked pasta.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle with parsley.
']

Title: Italian Braised Pork Shoulder
Ingredients: ['1 (2 pound) boneless pork shoulder roast', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 carrots, chopped', '1 red onion, diced', '1 shallot, chopped', '2 large cloves garlic, chopped', '1 ½ cups red wine', '1 ½ cups beef broth', '1 cup tomato puree', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh Italian flat-leaf parsley, with stems', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Rinse and dry pork roast.
', 'Step 3: Season all sides with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Heat olive oil in a cast iron skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Add roast to the hot skillet; turn and sear until browned and crisp, about 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Transfer roast to a large lidded baking dish, leaving pan drippings in the skillet.
', 'Step 7: Add carrots, onion, shallot, and garlic to the hot skillet and reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 8: Saute in the pan drippings until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes; do not overcook.
', 'Step 9: Pour red wine, beef broth, and tomato puree over the roast in the baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Add sauteed vegetables, parsley, and thyme.
', 'Step 11: Cover and bake in the preheated oven until meat pulls apart easily, 2 to 3 hours.
']

Title: Alfredo Chicken
Ingredients: ['6 ounces spiral pasta', '2 pounds chicken meat, cut into strips', '1 (.7 ounce) package Italian dressing mix', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 (16 ounce) jar prepared Alfredo sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook pasta at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle chicken with Italian dressing mix and garlic powder.
', 'Step 3: Pan-fry chicken in a nonstick skillet over medium heat, cooking in batches if necessary, until the juices run clear and chicken meat is no longer pink in the middle, about 10 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 4: Turn chicken pieces over after about 5 minutes of cooking.
', 'Step 5: Transfer chicken to a serving bowl and toss with cooked pasta.
', 'Step 6: Pour Alfredo sauce over chicken and pasta, mix thoroughly, and serve.
']

Title: Saltimbocca di Pollo alla Romana (Prosciutto-Stuffed Chicken Breast Roulades)
Ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, pounded to an even thickness', '4 slices prosciutto', '4 fresh sage leaves', '1 tablespoon butter', '3 fluid ounces dry white wine, or more as needed', '1 pinch salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place chicken breasts on a sheet of parchment paper.
', 'Step 2: Lay 1 slice prosciutto and 1 sage leaf on each chicken breast.
', 'Step 3: Roll chicken from the short end and secure with wooden skewers.
', 'Step 4: Heat butter in a skillet over medium-high heat; add rolled chicken and cook until well browned, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 5: Add wine, salt, and pepper; cook until chicken is no longer pink in the center, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Let rest for 5 minutes.
']

Title: Italian Cookies II
Ingredients: ['½ cup butter, softened', '1 cup white sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '8 ounces ricotta cheese', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '¼ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons butter, softened', "2 cups confectioners' sugar", '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 ½ tablespoons milk']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease cookie sheets.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl, cream together 1/2 cup butter and white sugar until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and ricotta cheese.
', 'Step 5: Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; gradually stir into the cheese mixture.
', 'Step 6: Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets.
', 'Step 7: Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are golden.
', 'Step 8: Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
', "Step 9: In a medium bowl, cream together the remaining butter and confectioners' sugar.
", 'Step 10: Beat in vanilla and milk gradually until a spreadable consistency is reached.
', 'Step 11: Frost cooled cookies.
']

Title: Chicken Meatballs and Spaghetti
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (8 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '3 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '2 ¼ cups water', '1 tablespoon dried basil', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 pounds ground chicken', '1 cup dry bread crumbs', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'cooking spray', '1 (16 ounce) package whole-wheat spaghetti']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir together the crushed tomatoes, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, water, and basil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 3: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 15 minutes while preparing meatballs.
', 'Step 4: Mix together the ground chicken, bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, eggs, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 5: Roll into 1 inch balls.
', 'Step 6: Heat a large skillet over medium heat, and coat with cooking spray.
', 'Step 7: Brown the meatballs on all sides.
', 'Step 8: Add meatballs to the simmering pasta sauce and cook until internal temperature of meatballs reaches a minimum of 160 degrees F (72 degrees C), about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water, and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 10: Once the water is boiling, stir in the spaghetti, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Cook until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Drain.
', 'Step 13: Serve the meatballs and sauce over the cooked spaghetti.
']

Title: Tofu and Rice Stuffed Peppers
Ingredients: ['1 cup uncooked brown rice', '2 cups water', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 (12 ounce) package extra-firm tofu, drained and diced', '1 ¾ cups marinara sauce, divided', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '2 red bell peppers, halved and seeded', '2 orange bell peppers, halved and seeded', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '8 slices tomato']

', 'Step 2: Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer 45 minutes, or until tender.
', 'Step 3: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, and stir in garlic and tofu.
', 'Step 4: Cook about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Mix in 1/4 cup marinara sauce, season with salt and pepper, and continue to cook and stir until tofu is evenly brown.
', 'Step 6: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Using a wooden spoon or spatula, press an equal amount of rice into each pepper half.
', 'Step 8: Layer rice with remaining marinara sauce, and 1/2 the cheese.
', 'Step 9: Press equal amounts of tofu into the pepper halves.
', 'Step 10: Place 1 tomato slice on each pepper, and top peppers with remaining mozzarella.
', 'Step 11: Arrange stuffed peppers in a baking dish.

', 'Step 13: Serve 1/2 of each color pepper to each person.
']

Title: Italian Sausage Soup with Cannellini Beans
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 pounds mild Italian sausage links, casings removed', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons garlic, minced', '1 (32 ounce) carton beef stock', '2 cups water', '4 cubes beef bouillon', '1 (16 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (15.5 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (15.5 ounce) can dark red kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (15.5 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (14.5 ounce) can cut green beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (14.5 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes, undrained', '1 (14.5 ounce) can sliced carrots, drained', '½ (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 (1.25 ounce) package beefy onion soup mix', '1 ½ cups shredded cabbage', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 cup shell pasta', '¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add Italian sausage, onion, and garlic; cook and stir until sausage is browned and crumbly and onion is translucent, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour beef stock into the pan and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 4: Add water and bouillon cubes.
', 'Step 5: Add tomato sauce, cannellini beans, kidney beans, garbanzo beans, green beans, diced tomatoes with juice, carrots, tomato paste, soup mix, cabbage, garlic powder, Italian seasoning, pepper, and salt.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 40 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Add shells and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 9 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain.
', 'Step 10: After soup has cooked for 40 minutes, add cooked shells.
', 'Step 11: Simmer for another 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Ladle into bowls and top with shredded Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Pasta with Italian Sausage and Pumpkin Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '½ onion, diced', '4 cloves garlic, diced', '1 (16 ounce) package campanelle pasta', '1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree', '1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth', '½ cup half-and-half', '½ cup sour cream', '½ teaspoon grated nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon Italian seasoning, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook and stir Italian sausage in a large skillet over medium-high heat until the meat is browned, breaking it into crumbles as it cooks, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain excess grease.
', 'Step 3: Stir onion and garlic into sausage and cook until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Stir in campanelle and return to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Cook pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but still firm to the bite, about 10 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 7: Stir pumpkin puree, chicken broth, half-and-half, sour cream, nutmeg, cinnamon, salt, and black pepper into the sausage mixture and cook, stirring often, until sauce is creamy and thick, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Transfer cooked campanelle pasta to a large pot and pour sausage and pumpkin mixture over pasta.
', 'Step 9: Place over medium-high heat and gently stir until pasta mixture is heated through, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Serve topped with Parmesan cheese and Italian seasoning.
']

Title: Easy Oven-Baked Real Polenta (Not Instant)
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '3 cups water', '1 cup polenta', 'salt to taste', '1 cup mashed butternut squash', '½ cup sour cream', '½ cup grated Cheddar cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 2-quart casserole dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Pour water into the prepared dish; stir in polenta and salt.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until polenta is thickened, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in squash, sour cream, and Cheddar cheese.
', 'Step 6: Continue baking until cheese is melted, about 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 7: Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Hearty Minestrone Soup (Instant Pot®)
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 pound beef stew meat', '1 large onion, diced', '2 stalks celery, diced', '⅓ pound green beans, trimmed and cut into 1/2-inch pieces', '1 large carrot, diced', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 pinch ground black pepper to taste', '6 cups chicken bone broth (such as Kettle and Fire)', '1 (28 ounce) can no-salt-added diced tomatoes', '1 (14 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '1 cup gluten-free ditalini pasta', '1 pinch kosher salt to taste', '⅓ cup finely grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) on Saute mode.
', 'Step 2: Add beef and onion; cook until beef is no longer pink on the outside, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add celery, green beans, carrot, garlic, oregano, dried basil, and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Stir to combine.
', 'Step 5: Pour broth, diced tomatoes, and crushed tomatoes into the pot with the beef.
', 'Step 6: Stir well.
', 'Step 7: Select Soup setting; close and lock the lid.
', "Step 8: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 35 minutes.
", 'Step 9: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 10: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 11: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 12: Stir in kidney beans and pasta.
', 'Step 13: Turn on Slow Cook mode and cook until pasta and vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Season with salt.
', 'Step 15: Ladle soup into bowls and top with Parmesan cheese and fresh basil.
']

Title: Kelli's Fried Green Zucchini
Ingredients: ['½ cup seasoned bread crumbs', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '2 eggs', '5 tablespoons olive oil', '1 zucchini, cut into 1/4-inch slices', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 cup prepared spaghetti sauce, heated']

['Step 1: Mix together the seasoned bread crumbs, grated Parmesan cheese, and garlic salt in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 2: Beat the eggs in a second shallow bowl.
', 'Step 3: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat until the oil is rippling, but not smoking.
', 'Step 4: Dip the zucchini slices into the beaten egg, then into the crumbs, and place in the skillet in a single layer.
', 'Step 5: Fry the zucchini slices until golden brown, about 3 minutes, then flip them over and fry until the slices are cooked through and golden brown on the other side.

Title: A 20-Minute Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 egg', '½ cup seasoned bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 ¾ cups pasta sauce (such as Barilla Napoletana®)', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley']

['Step 1: Press chicken breasts with the palm of your hand to flatten to an even thickness.
', 'Step 2: Beat egg into a shallow bowl; place bread crumbs into a separate shallow bowl.

', 'Step 4: Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat and fry coated chicken breasts until golden brown, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 5: Pour pasta sauce over chicken, cover, and bring sauce to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle chicken with mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, and parsley.
', 'Step 8: Cover and simmer until cheeses melt, about 5 more minutes.
']

Title: Ribollita (Reboiled Italian Cabbage Soup)
Ingredients: ['2 cups dry cannellini beans', '4 cups water', '3 (32 ounce) cartons chicken broth', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '4 sage leaves', '2 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ cup olive oil', '2 onions, diced', '3 carrots, peeled and sliced', '3 large stalks celery, chopped', '2 potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks', '1 ½ cups cabbage, coarsely chopped', '1 bunch Swiss chard, trimmed and chopped', '1 bunch kale, trimmed and chopped', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '12 (1/2-inch-thick) slices French bread, lightly toasted', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 ½ cups grated Parmesan cheese for topping', '½ cup olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Sort and rinse the beans before placing them in a large pot with the water.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil over medium-high heat and cook 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Turn off heat, cover, and let stand 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 4: Drain.
', 'Step 5: Place the beans, chicken broth, garlic, sage leaves, bay leaves, and salt in a large pot.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low and simmer until beans are tender, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 8: Cool.
', 'Step 9: Remove 1 cup of beans.
', 'Step 10: Discard the bay leaves and sage leaves.
', 'Step 11: Blend the remaining bean mixture with a hand mixer until smooth.
', 'Step 12: Set aside.
', 'Step 13: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 14: Add the onions; cook and stir until transparent, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Combine the carrots, celery, potatoes, cabbage, Swiss chard, and kale with the onions.
', 'Step 16: Stir in the tomatoes.
', 'Step 17: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 18: Cover, and cook until greens have wilted, stirring at least once, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Stir in the pureed bean mixture, and cook 40 minute until the mixture thickens.
', 'Step 20: Stir in the reserved beans.
', 'Step 21: Adjust seasonings to taste.
', 'Step 22: Add the toasted bread slices; cook until bread is soaked, about 10 minutes longer.
', 'Step 23: Cool, and refrigerate overnight.
', 'Step 24: Reheat the soup over low heat until heated through, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Serve each serving garnished with 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese and a drizzle of olive oil.
']

Title: Pasta Fredda

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook the bow-tie pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain and cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 3: Combine tomatoes, bocconcini, olives, olive oil, basil, and oregano in a large bowl; toss to evenly coat.
', 'Step 4: Add pasta to tomato mixture and toss.
']

Title: Blackened Chicken Alfredo Pizza
Ingredients: ['1 cup warm water', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '6 slices bacon', '6 tablespoons butter', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 ½ cups heavy cream', '2 egg yolks', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup freshly grated Romano cheese', '⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon paprika', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground cumin', '¼ teaspoon crumbled dried thyme', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon ground white pepper', '⅛ teaspoon onion powder', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, or more if desired', '½ cup baby spinach leaves', '3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 roma (plum) tomato, diced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix water, sugar, yeast, and 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil for several seconds on low speed in the work bowl of a large stand mixer fitted with a dough hook.
', 'Step 2: Stop the mixer and add the flour and salt.
', 'Step 3: Start the mixer on low speed and mix until the flour mixture is incorporated with the yeast mixture; turn speed to medium-low and machine-knead the dough until springy and smooth, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Sprinkle dough with flour occasionally if it sticks to the sides of the bowl.
', 'Step 5: Form dough into a ball and place into an oiled bowl; turn the dough over in the bowl several times to oil the surface of the dough.
', 'Step 6: Cover the dough with a towel, set into a warm place, and allow to rise until double, 30 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 7: Cook the bacon in a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned, about 10 minutes; drain on a paper towel-lined plate and allow to cool; chop and set aside.
', 'Step 8: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 9: Cook the garlic in the melted butter until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 10: Stir the cream into the butter mixture.
', 'Step 11: Add the egg yolks and whisk with the butter mixture until smooth.
', 'Step 12: Stir 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese, the Romano cheese, and nutmeg into the mixture; season to taste with salt.
', 'Step 13: Bring the sauce just barely to a simmer over low heat; cook and stir at a simmer until cheeses have melted and sauce has thickened, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove from heat and set aside.
', 'Step 15: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Mix the paprika, cayenne pepper, cumin, thyme, 1/8 teaspoon of salt, white pepper, and onion powder together in a bowl.
', 'Step 17: Rub one side of each chicken breast thoroughly with the spice mixture.
', 'Step 18: Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a skillet over high heat.
', 'Step 19: Sear the chicken breasts, seasoned sides first, in the hot oil until the spices turn almost black, about 1 minute per side; transfer to a baking sheet.
', 'Step 20: Bake the chicken breasts in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center and an instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part of a breast reads at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), 5 to 10 minutes; set aside.
', 'Step 21: Punch down pizza dough and roll out onto a floured work surface.
', 'Step 22: Shape pizza crust on a large pizza stone or heavy baking sheet.
', 'Step 23: Poke several holes in the crust with a fork to help it release steam.
', 'Step 24: Bake the crust in the oven until top is very lightly cooked, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Remove from oven and spread a layer of Alfredo sauce over the crust.
', 'Step 26: Spread the mozzarella cheese in an even layer over the sauce.
', 'Step 27: Slice the blackened chicken breasts and arrange over the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 28: Sprinkle pizza with spinach leaves and chopped bacon.
', 'Step 29: Top with 3 tablespoons of Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 30: Return pizza to oven and bake until the mozzarella cheese is melted and browned, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 31: Sprinkle pizza with chopped Roma tomatoes to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '635.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '40.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '181.3 mg', 'fatContent': '41.7 g', 'fiberContent': '1.7 g', 'proteinContent': '24.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '22.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '878.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.2 g'}

Title: Pasta Rustica
Ingredients: ['1 pound rotini or fusili pasta', '6 slices bacon', '½ cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 medium onions, chopped', '1 red bell pepper, chopped', '¼ cup chopped parsley', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '¼ teaspoon Salt', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '1 (28 ounce) can plum tomatoes, undrained, coarsely chopped', '½ cup Lindsay® Black Ripe Pitted Olives or Lindsay® Green Ripe Select Olives sliced, drained', '2 tablespoons capers, drained', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

Title: Almost Tuscan Sausage and Kale Soup
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 pinch ground black pepper, or to taste', '1 pound bulk hot Italian sausage, removed from casings and crumbled', '½ teaspoon chopped fresh basil', '¼ teaspoon smoked paprika', '6 cups low-sodium chicken broth', '4 cups chopped kale', '1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 cup peeled and chopped yellow potatoes, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:

', 'Step 3: Stir sausage mixture into onion mixture; cook and stir until sausage is browned and fully cooked, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add chicken broth, kale, cannellini beans, and potatoes to sausage-onion mixture; lower heat to medium low.
', 'Step 5: Cover stockpot and simmer until potatoes are tender, 15 to 20 minutes.
']

Title: Pastiera di Pasqua (Italian Easter Tart with Ricotta)
Ingredients: ['1 ⅓ cups cooked wheat grains', '¾ cup whole milk', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '2 medium lemons, zested, divided', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 ¾ cups white sugar', '2 large eggs', '2 large egg yolks', '1 tablespoon orange flower water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ cup chopped candied orange peel', '2 sheets frozen puff pastry, thawed', '1 large egg, beaten', '1 tablespoon powdered sugar, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring wheat grains, milk, butter, and 1/2 of the lemon zest to a simmer in a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Simmer until creamy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Grease a 11-inch tart pan.
', 'Step 5: Combine ricotta cheese, sugar, eggs, egg yolks, orange flower water, vanilla extract, and cinnamon in a bowl; beat with an electric mixer until well combined.
', 'Step 6: Mix in remaining lemon zest and candied orange peel.
', 'Step 7: Fold in wheat mixture and mix filling until well combined.
', 'Step 8: Roll out 1 sheet puff pastry on a lightly floured surface so it will fit into the tart pan.
', 'Step 9: Place pastry in the pan and spoon filling on top.
', 'Step 10: Roll out the second puff pastry sheet and cut into 3/4-inch thick strips.
', 'Step 11: Layer a lattice pattern on top of the filling and brush with beaten egg.
', 'Step 12: Bake tart in the preheated oven until filling is set and lattice is lightly browned, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 13: Remove from the oven and allow to cool inside the tart pan, at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 14: Carefully unmold tart, transfer onto a cake platter.
', 'Step 15: Dust with powdered sugar before serving.
']

Title: Cannoli Cheesecake
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '2 ¼ cups graham cracker crumbs', '½ cup salted butter, melted', '3 tablespoons white sugar', '1 ¼ teaspoons ground cinnamon, divided', '2 cups whole-milk ricotta cheese', '1 ½ cups mascarpone cheese', '1 cup white sugar', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon lemon zest', '4 large eggs, at room temperature', '½ cup cold heavy whipping cream', '¼ cup powdered sugar', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup miniature chocolate chips']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a 9-inch springform pan with parchment paper and lightly grease paper and sides of the pan with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Stir graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, 3 tablespoons sugar, and 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon together in a medium bowl until well combined.
', 'Step 4: Pour graham cracker crumb mixture into the prepared pan and press firmly into the bottom and sides to create a crust.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven until lightly toasted and firm, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove pan from the oven and set aside to cool completely at room temperature, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Wrap the outsides of the pan tightly with aluminum foil; set aside.
', 'Step 8: Reduce oven temperature to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Beat ricotta, mascarpone, 1 cup sugar, and flour together in a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment on low speed until smooth, scraping down the sides with a spatula as needed.
', 'Step 10: Add 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, lemon zest, and remaining 1 teaspoon cinnamon and continue beating on low speed until combined, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 11: Add eggs, one at a time, beating on low speed until well combined.
', 'Step 12: Pour batter into the prepared crust.
', 'Step 13: Place the springform pan in a large baking dish and carefully fill baking dish halfway with water.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are set and center jiggles slightly, 1 hour 45 minutes to 2 hours.
', 'Step 15: Turn the oven off and crack the oven door open slightly to allow cheesecake to cool slowly, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 16: Remove the baking pan from the oven and remove the springform pan from the baking pan; remove aluminum foil.
', 'Step 17: Transfer cheesecake to a refrigerator and chill, uncovered, until completely firm, at least 4 hours, or up to 8 hours.
', 'Step 18: When cheesecake is completely chilled, remove from the refrigerator and carefully remove springform pan.
', 'Step 19: Beat cream, powdered sugar, and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract together in a stand mixer fitted with a whisk attachment on medium-low speed until well combined, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 20: Increase speed to high and continue beating until stiff peaks develop, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 21: Spread whipped cream mixture on top of cheesecake using a spatula; sprinkle chocolate chips evenly on top of whipped cream.
', 'Step 22: Slice cheesecake into 12 slices; serve immediately.
']

Title: Easy Four Cheese Lasagna
Ingredients: ['16 ounces uncooked lasagna noodles', '1 (26 ounce) can spaghetti sauce', '1 pound cottage cheese', '8 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese', '8 ounces shredded Cheddar cheese', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 4: In a blender or with an electric mixer, blend tomato sauce and cottage cheese together until smooth.
', 'Step 5: Spoon a little of the sauce mixture in the bottom of a 9x13 baking dish.
', 'Step 6: Place a layer of cooked noodles over the sauce, and sprinkle a portion of the mozzarella, the cheddar and the parmesan over the noodles.
', 'Step 7: Repeat layering of sauce, noodles and cheese; finish with a cheese layer.
', 'Step 8: Bake in preheated oven 30 to 45 minutes, until cheese is bubbly and golden.
']

Title: Summer Squash Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '2 tablespoons garlic, minced', '1 (8 ounce) package uncooked rigatoni pasta', '6 slices bacon', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 small zucchini, sliced', '1 small yellow squash, sliced', '1 cup Alfredo sauce', '¼ cup milk', '6 sun-dried tomatoes, softened and chopped', '3 tablespoons Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup sliced almonds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Place the chicken in the prepared baking dish, and coat with the garlic.
', 'Step 4: Bake 25 minutes, or until chicken juices run clear.
', 'Step 5: Cool and chop.
', 'Step 6: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 7: Place the rigatoni in the pot, cook 10 minutes, until al dente, and drain.
', 'Step 8: Place bacon in a skillet.
', 'Step 9: Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown.
', 'Step 10: Drain, crumble, and set aside.
', 'Step 11: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and saute the zucchini and yellow squash until tender and lightly browned.
', 'Step 12: In a small bowl, mix the Alfredo sauce and milk.
', 'Step 13: Serve chicken over the cooked pasta.
', 'Step 14: Pour Alfredo sauce over the chicken.
', 'Step 15: Top with zucchini and squash.
', 'Step 16: Sprinkle with sun-dried tomatoes, bacon, Parmesan cheese, and almonds.
']

Title: Sweet Italian Green Beans
Ingredients: ['4 slices bacon', '3 green onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 (15 ounce) cans green beans, drained', '1 (14.5 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes', '1 pinch dried basil', '1 pinch dried oregano', '¼ cup brown sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crisp.
', 'Step 2: Remove from the pan to drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 3: Reserve the grease in the skillet and add the onions; cook and stir over medium heat until softened.
', 'Step 4: Add garlic and cook for about 30 seconds more.
', 'Step 5: Remove from the heat.
', 'Step 6: In a saucepan, combine the green beans, tomatoes, basil, oregano and brown sugar.
', 'Step 7: Crumble in the bacon and add the onion and garlic from the skillet.
', 'Step 8: Warm over medium heat until heated through, 5 to 10 minutes.
']

Title: Summer Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '½ cup chopped onion', '½ cup chopped green bell pepper', '¼ cup finely chopped carrots', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '5 medium zucchini, sliced lengthwise into 1/4-inch thick strips.', '1 cup cottage cheese', '1 egg, beaten', '¾ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a medium baking dish.
', 'Step 3: In a skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef until evenly brown.
', 'Step 4: Drain juices.
', 'Step 5: Mix the onion, green bell pepper, carrots, garlic, and tomato sauce into the skillet.
', 'Step 6: Season with oregano, basil, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer 10 minutes, until vegetables are tender.
', 'Step 8: In the bottom of the prepared baking dish, layer 1/2 the zucchini strips.
', 'Step 9: In a bowl, beat together the cottage cheese and egg, and spread over the zucchini.
', 'Step 10: Scoop 1/2 the beef mixture over the cottage cheese and egg mixture, and sprinkle with 1/2 the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 11: Layer with remaining zucchini, beef mixture, and mozzarella.
', 'Step 12: Top with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 13: Bake 45 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 14: Allow to sit 10 minutes before slicing to serve.
']

Title: Chef John's Baby Porchetta
Ingredients: ['½ teaspoon whole fennel seeds', '3 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 tablespoon finely sliced sage leaves', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons chopped rosemary', '1 teaspoon kosher salt, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 lemon, zested', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 (1 1/2 pound) boneless pork tenderloin', '8 strips bacon']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Crush fennel seeds in mortar with a pestle for 1 minute.
', 'Step 2: Add garlic, sage, pepper, rosemary, salt, red pepper flakes, and lemon zest; pound into a thick paste, 2 or 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add olive oil and pound until rub is evenly incorporated.
', 'Step 4: Cut a slit 3/4 of the way through the center of the tenderloin, leaving 1 inch on each end uncut.
', 'Step 5: Spread 1 tablespoon of the rub inside the slit; close up roast.
', 'Step 6: Spread the remaining rub evenly over the roast.
', 'Step 7: Wrap bacon strips around the roast, trying to keep seams on the bottom.
', 'Step 8: Wrap roast in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Line a rimmed baking sheet with aluminum foil; place roast in the center.
', 'Step 11: Roast in the preheated oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center registers 134 degrees F (57 degrees C), about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Let roast rest for 10 minutes and internal temperature rise to 140 to 145 degrees F (60 to 63 degrees C).
']

Title: Italian Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients: ['6 russet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks', '1 cup vegetable broth', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1 teaspoon minced garlic']

', 'Step 4: Return the drained potatoes to the pot.
', 'Step 5: Pour the vegetable broth, thyme, rosemary, oregano, basil, onion powder, parsley, sage, and garlic over the potatoes; mash with a potato masher.

Title: Pasta e Fagioli I
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup chopped onion', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes', '3 cups low-sodium chicken broth', '1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon dried basil leaves', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ pound seashell pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in 4-quart Dutch oven over medium heat until hot.
', 'Step 2: Add onion and garlic and cook for 5 minutes or until onion is tender.
', 'Step 3: Add undrained tomatoes, undrained cannellini beans, chicken broth, parsley, basil and pepper to Dutch oven and bring to a boil over high heat, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 4: Let boil for approximately 1 minute and then let simmer for 10 minutes, covered.
', 'Step 5: Add pasta to Dutch oven and simmer approximately 10 to 12 minutes or until pasta is tender.
', 'Step 6: Serve immediately and enjoy.
']
