Title: Lasagne Verdi al Forno
Ingredients: ['5 ounces spinach - rinsed, stemmed, and dried', '2 eggs', '⅝ cup semolina flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 slices bacon, diced', '1 carrot, diced', '1 stalk celery, diced', '1 onion, diced', '3 ½ ounces lean ground pork', '3 ½ ounces lean ground beef', '3 ½ ounces minced ham', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 cup beef stock', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 ½ ounces chicken livers, trimmed and chopped', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 cups warm milk', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 ⅔ cups grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pint ricotta cheese', '3 tablespoons butter']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: For the pasta dough: Steam the spinach in a steamer or over boiling water until bright green, 2 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Squeeze to remove excess moisture and process in a food processor to make a paste.
', 'Step 3: Combine spinach with eggs, semolina, and salt and process until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Stir in enough of the flour to make a smooth dough.
', 'Step 5: Knead briefly, cover and set aside.
', 'Step 6: For the ragu: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Saute bacon, carrot, celery and onion until onion is translucent.
', 'Step 8: Stir in ground pork, ground beef and minced ham, and cook until browned.
', 'Step 9: Stir in tomato paste, oregano and beef stock.
', 'Step 10: (Reserve the chicken livers for later.
', 'Step 11: ) Season with salt and pepper, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 20 minutes.
', 'Step 12: For the bechamel: While the ragu is simmering, combine 2 tablespoons butter and 2 tablespoons flour in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 13: Whisk to make a roux.
', 'Step 14: Remove from heat, let rest one minute, then whisk in warm milk.
', 'Step 15: Return to heat, simmer 10 minutes, stirring constantly, until thickened.
', 'Step 16: Season with salt and nutmeg.
', 'Step 17: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 18: To cook pasta: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 19: On a floured surface, divide pasta dough into three portions.
', 'Step 20: Roll each portion out to a thin sheet.
', 'Step 21: Have ready an ice water bath.
', 'Step 22: Cook each sheet 3 minutes in the boiling water; remove from the boiling water and dip in the ice water; drain and dry on a clean, dry cloth.
', 'Step 23: To finish the ragu: Stir the chicken livers into the simmering sauce.
', 'Step 24: Cook 1 minute, remove from heat and set aside.
', 'Step 25: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 26: Grease a 9x13 baking dish.
', 'Step 27: To assemble lasagna: Place one pasta sheet in bottom of prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 28: Spread one-third of the ragu, one-quarter of the bechamel, one-third of the ricotta, and one-quarter of the parmesan over the pasta.
', 'Step 29: Repeat layers twice.
', 'Step 30: Top with remaining bechamel and parmesan and dot with butter.
', 'Step 31: Bake in preheated oven 30 minutes, until top is golden brown.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '551.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '31.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '186.6 mg', 'fatContent': '33 g', 'fiberContent': '2 g', 'proteinContent': '31.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '17.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '1044.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.5 g'}

Title: Fettucine Carbonara
Ingredients: ['1 pound dry fettuccini noodles', '8 slices bacon', '4 eggs', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 ¼ cups heavy cream', '1 pinch ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add fettuccini and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Fry bacon in skillet over medium heat until crispy, remove and drain on paper towel.
', 'Step 4: Chop with knife into bits.
', 'Step 5: Beat the eggs, cheese and cream in a bowl, then add the bacon.
', 'Step 6: Pour over the pasta in the pan and toss gently using tongs.
', 'Step 7: Return the pan to a very low heat and cook for 1 to 2 minutes, or until slightly thickened.
', "Step 8: Don't overheat or the eggs will scramble.
", 'Step 9: Season well with black pepper and serve.
']

', 'Step 7: Serve over the cooked pasta.

Title: Meaty Baked Ziti
Ingredients: ['1 pound bulk mild Italian sausage', '1 pound ground beef', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes with juice', '½ cup diced white onion', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 (16 ounce) package ziti pasta', '1 (15 ounce) container whole-milk ricotta cheese', '4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 large egg, beaten', '2 tablespoons chopped flat-leaf (Italian) parsley, or to taste', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '12 slices provolone cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir sausage and ground beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add tomato sauce, whole tomatoes with juice, onion, garlic, Italian seasoning, basil, sugar, and red pepper flakes; bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 4: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 30 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 5: Turn off the heat.
', 'Step 6: Transfer 3 cups sauce to a bowl and leave remaining sauce in the pot; allow to cool while you prepare ziti.
', 'Step 7: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Add ziti and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain ziti and rinse under cool water to stop it from cooking.
', 'Step 11: Combine ricotta, 2 cups mozzarella, Parmesan, egg, 2 tablespoon parsley, and pepper in a bowl; stir together with a few turns but do not mix completely.
', 'Step 12: Pour drained ziti into the bowl and toss until slightly combined with large lumps.
', 'Step 13: Add the reserved 3 cups meat sauce and toss to combine.
', 'Step 14: Place 1/2 of the pasta mixture into a 9x13-inch casserole dish.
', 'Step 15: Spoon 1/2 of the remaining sauce over top, layer with 6 slices of provolone and 1 cup mozzarella.
', 'Step 16: Repeat layers: pasta mixture, remaining sauce, 6 slices provolone, and 1 cup mozzarella.
', 'Step 17: Cover with foil.
', 'Step 18: Place on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven until bubbling, 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Remove foil and bake until cheese is fully melted and slightly browned, 5 to 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 20: Remove from the oven and sprinkle with parsley.
', 'Step 21: Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Shrimp Orzo Pesto
Ingredients: ['8 ounces orzo pasta', '1 tablespoon pesto, divided', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '2 cups frozen cooked shrimp, thawed', '½ cup diced red bell pepper', '1 teaspoon capers', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or to taste']

', 'Step 3: Drain and transfer to a bowl; mix 2 teaspoons pesto and 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil into orzo.
', 'Step 4: Heat remaining 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil in a skillet; cook and stir shrimp, red bell pepper, and capers in hot oil until shrimp is heated through, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir remaining 1 teaspoon pesto, oregano, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper into shrimp mixture; cook and stir until combined, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Mix orzo into shrimp mixture; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and drizzle with olive oil.
']

Title: D's Taco Pizza
Ingredients: ['½ pound ground beef', '½ cup chopped onion', '1 clove garlic', '½ (1 ounce) packet taco seasoning mix', '⅓ cup water', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with garlic and onion', '1 cup salsa', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro', '1 cup refried beans', '1 12-inch prepared pizza crust', '1 ½ cups Mexican-style shredded four-cheese blend', '2 cups shredded lettuce', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained', '¼ cup chopped green onion', '½ cup Mexican-style shredded four-cheese blend', '1 cup sour cream, or as desired', '1 cup salsa, or as desired']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook and stir the ground beef, onion, and garlic together in a large skillet over medium-high heat until the beef is completely browned; drain fat from the skillet.
', 'Step 2: Stir the taco seasoning mix and water into the beef mixture; bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook at a simmer, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Place the prepared pizza curst on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 5: Blend the diced tomatoes with garlic and onion, salsa, and cilantro in a blender until smooth.
', 'Step 6: Spread the refried beans in an even layer on the prepared pizza crust, leaving a border of about 1/2-inch uncovered around the outside.
', 'Step 7: Spread about 1 cup of the diced tomato mixture over the refried beans in an even layer; reserve the remaining sauce.
', 'Step 8: Scatter the ground beef mixture over the layer of sauce.
', 'Step 9: Cover the beef with 1 1/2 cups Mexican-style shredded cheese blend.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese is bubbly and the edges of the crust are golden brown, 15 to 20 minutes; set aside to cool 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Top the pizza with shredded lettuce, chopped tomatoes, black olives, green onions, and 1/2 cup Mexican-style shredded cheese blend.
', 'Step 12: Serve with the reserved sauce, sour cream, and 1 cup salsa.
']

Title: Tuna Zucchini Elbow Pasta
Ingredients: ['olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '6 large zucchini, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon dried Italian herb seasoning', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 (28 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '1 ½ cups water', '2 (7 ounce) pouches tuna', '1 (16 ounce) package elbow macaroni', '1 teaspoon grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']

', 'Step 3: Mix in marinara sauce and water and bring sauce to a boil.

', 'Step 5: Simmer until zucchini are almost tender, 7 to 10 more minutes.

Title: Robert's Homemade Italian Sausage
Ingredients: ['¼ cup dry red wine, chilled', '1 tablespoon raw sugar', '¼ teaspoon sea salt', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 teaspoons black pepper', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 ½ teaspoons fennel seed', '½ teaspoon anise seed', '½ teaspoon dried parsley flakes', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon dried minced onion', '⅛ teaspoon coriander seed, coarsely cracked', '⅛ teaspoon ground mace', '2 pounds extra-lean ground turkey breast', '1 pound lean ground pork']

['Step 1: Pour the chilled red wine into a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Whisk in the sugar and salt until dissolved.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle in the garlic powder, oregano, black pepper, paprika, fennel seed, anise seed, parsley flakes, red pepper flakes, cayenne pepper, minced onion, coriander seed, and mace.

', 'Step 8: Cover with another layer of plastic, and freeze until solid.
', 'Step 9: Once solid, place patties into a resealable plastic bag to store.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Chicken Marsala
Ingredients: ['¼ cup all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '¼ cup oil', '2 cups sliced fresh mushrooms', '½ cup dry Marsala wine', '¼ cup butter']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine flour, salt, and pepper in a shallow dish.

', 'Step 10: Remove chicken from the pot and place on a serving platter.
', 'Step 11: Add butter to the pot.
', 'Step 12: Turn off heat and stir butter into sauce until fully blended.
', 'Step 13: Pour sauce over chicken breasts and serve immediately.

Title: Penne Pasta with Cannellini Beans and Escarole
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package dry penne pasta', '1 head escarole, chopped', '1 (15.5 ounce) can cannellini beans, with liquid', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with garlic and onion, drained', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']

Title: Spaghetti Bolognese
Ingredients: ['2 pounds lean ground beef', '1 large white onion, diced', '1 large portobello mushroom, diced, or more to taste', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans petite diced tomatoes', '3 (10 ounce) cans condensed tomato soup', '½ cup Worcestershire sauce', '1 ½ tablespoons garlic and herb seasoning blend (such as Mrs. Dash®)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '¼ cup chili powder', '3 tablespoons Cajun seasoning', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 ½ tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook the ground beef in a large pot over high heat, stirring quickly and constantly until completely browned 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir the onion into the beef; cook and stir until the onion begins to turn translucent, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 3: Drain excess grease from meat mixture.
', 'Step 4: Add the mushroom to the mixture; allow to cook until it begins to soften, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour the diced tomatoes and tomato soup into the pot, stir, reduce heat to medium, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
', 'Step 6: Add the Worcestershire sauce, garlic and herb seasoning blend, lemon juice, garlic, chili powder, Cajun seasoning, basil, vanilla extract, black pepper, and salt to the mixture, stirring each into the mixture before adding the next.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low and allow the mixture to simmer for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 9: Add the spaghetti and olive oil to the pot and cook the pasta at a boil until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain.
', 'Step 11: Top with the Bolognese sauce to serve.
']

Title: Italian Chicken Pesto with Spaghetti Squash
Ingredients: ['1 spaghetti squash, halved lengthwise', '6 links Italian chicken sausage, casings removed', '1 head broccoli, cut into bite-size pieces', '1 green bell pepper, cut into bite-size pieces', '1 pinch chopped fresh basil, or to taste', '1 pinch chopped fresh rosemary, or to taste', '1 pinch Italian seasoning (such as Mrs. Dash®), or to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '⅓ (7 ounce) container pesto, or to taste', '10 sun-dried tomatoes']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle squash with Italian seasoning and place upside-down on a rimmed baking tray.

', 'Step 5: Remove from the oven and let cool for 10 minutes; strands of squash should easily pull away when scraped with a fork.
', 'Step 6: Heat a large skillet or wok over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir sausage, uncovered, in the hot skillet until mostly browned and crumbly, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in broccoli and bell pepper.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat to low and add squash strands.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle basil, rosemary, and Italian seasoning, on top and drizzle with olive oil.

', 'Step 12: Let simmer over low heat for 2 to 5 minutes.

Title: Baked Rigatoni with Italian Sausage and Fennel
Ingredients: ['1 pound hot Italian sausage links', '1 (16 ounce) package rigatoni pasta', '1 (24 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '1 bulb fennel, trimmed and thinly sliced', '1 roasted red bell pepper, chopped', '½ yellow onion, chopped', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil leaves', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup grated Asiago cheese']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

', 'Step 5: Remove from the skillet, cool slightly and slice into rounds.

', 'Step 11: Garnish with a few fennel leaves left from the bulb.
', 'Step 12: Cover with aluminum foil.

Title: Italian Rice Pie II
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '¼ cup butter', '½ cup white sugar', '3 eggs', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup water', '½ cup uncooked white rice', '1 quart milk', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon grated lemon zest', '6 eggs']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir the flour and baking powder together in a bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 2: In a second large bowl, cream the butter and 1/2 cup sugar until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 3: Beat in 3 eggs, one at a time, and stir in the vanilla.
', 'Step 4: Gradually beat in the flour mixture to make a soft dough.
', 'Step 5: Divide the dough in half and shape into two balls.
', 'Step 6: Working on a lightly floured surface, roll out each ball to fit two 10 inch pie plates.
', 'Step 7: Line the pie plates with the crust, and refrigerate until needed.
', 'Step 8: Bring the water to a boil in a saucepan, and stir in the rice.
', 'Step 9: Reduce the heat to medium-low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir in the milk.
', 'Step 11: Continue cooking, stirring frequently, until the mixture thickens.
', 'Step 12: Set aside to cool.
', 'Step 13: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Meanwhile, beat the ricotta cheese, 1 1/2 cups sugar, lemon juice, lemon zest, and 6 eggs together in a mixing bowl until smooth and frothy.
', 'Step 15: Stir in the cooled rice mixture until evenly blended.
', 'Step 16: Pour into the pie shells.
', 'Step 17: Bake pies in preheated oven until the filling is set and tops are golden brown, about 90 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Cool on racks.
']

Title: Italian Creme Layer Cake
Ingredients: ['1 cup buttermilk', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '2 cups white sugar', '½ cup butter', '½ cup vegetable oil', '½ cup shortening', '4 egg yolks', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 egg whites', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 (3.5 ounce) package flaked coconut', '1 cup chopped pecans', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '½ cup margarine, softened', "4 cups confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup chopped pecans']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease three 9 inch, round cake pans.
', 'Step 3: Combine soda and buttermilk, and let stand a few minutes.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl, cream sugar, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup oil and shortening.
', 'Step 5: Add egg yolks one at a time, beating well after each addition.
', 'Step 6: Mix buttermilk mixture alternately with flour into creamed mixture.
', 'Step 7: Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla.
', 'Step 8: In a large glass or metal mixing bowl, beat egg whites until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 9: Fold 1/3 of the whites into the batter, then quickly fold in remaining whites until no streaks remain.
', 'Step 10: Gently stir in 1 cup pecans and coconut.
', 'Step 11: Pour batter into prepared pans.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
', 'Step 13: Allow to cool.
', "Step 14: To make the Cream Cheese Frosting: Beat together cream cheese, 1/2 cup butter or margarine, 1 teaspoon vanilla, and confectioners' sugar.
", 'Step 15: Stir in 1 cup chopped pecans.
', 'Step 16: Frost and fill cooled cake with cream cheese frosting.
']

Title: Easy Smoked Salmon Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package linguine pasta', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 shallot, minced', '1 ounce smoked salmon, cut into small pieces', '1 tablespoon reduced-fat cream cheese', '3 tablespoons milk']

', 'Step 5: Stir the salmon, cream cheese, and milk into the shallot mixture.
', 'Step 6: Mix the reserved water from the pasta into the mixture.
', 'Step 7: Transfer to a large bowl and toss with the pasta to serve.
']

Title: Easy Focaccia
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups bread flour', '1 ½ cups unbleached all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 (.25 ounce) package instant yeast', '1 ⅓ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir together both flours and salt in a large, stoneware bowl.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the center of the flour mixture; sprinkle sugar and yeast into the well.
', 'Step 3: Carefully pour the water into the well.
', 'Step 4: Let stand until the yeast begins to act, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour 2 tablespoons oil into the well.
', 'Step 6: Stir the center of the mixture with a wooden spoon, gradually widening the are you are stirring to incorporate all the flour.
', 'Step 7: Turn dough out onto a floured surface, and knead just until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Keep the dough soft.
', 'Step 9: Pour 1/2 teaspoon oil into a clean bowl.
', 'Step 10: Place the dough in the bowl, turning once to oil the top.
', 'Step 11: Cover and let rise until doubled, 30 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Grease a baking sheet with 1 teaspoon oil.
', 'Step 13: Punch the dough down and transfer to the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 14: Gently press dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch.
', 'Step 15: Pour the remaining 1 1/2 teaspoons oil over the top of the dough.
', 'Step 16: Use the handle end of a wooden spoon to dimple the dough at 1 1/2 inch intervals.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle with rosemary and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 18: Place in a cold oven on the center shelf.
', 'Step 19: Place a flat pan of hot water on the shelf below the bread.
', 'Step 20: Let rise until doubled in size, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Turn the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 22: Bake the focaccia until browned on top, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Remove from the pan, and cool on a wire rack.
', 'Step 24: Serve warm.
']

Title: Brownie Biscotti
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup butter, softened', '⅔ cup white sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '⅓ cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '½ cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips', '¼ cup chopped walnuts', '1 egg yolk, beaten', '1 tablespoon water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease baking sheets, or line with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
', 'Step 5: Combine the flour, cocoa and baking powder; stir into the creamed mixture until well blended.
', 'Step 6: Dough will be stiff, so mix in the last bit by hand.
', 'Step 7: Mix in the chocolate chips and walnuts.
', 'Step 8: Divide dough into two equal parts.
', 'Step 9: Shape into 9x2x1 inch loaves.
', 'Step 10: Place onto baking sheet 4 inches apart.
', 'Step 11: Brush with mixture of water and yolk.
', 'Step 12: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until firm.
', 'Step 13: Cool on baking sheet for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Using a serrated knife, slice the loaves diagonally into 1 inch slices.
', 'Step 15: Return the slices to the baking sheet, placing them on their sides.
', 'Step 16: Bake for 10 to 15 minutes on each side, or until dry.
', 'Step 17: Cool completely and store in an airtight container.
']

Title: Shrimp Parmigiana
Ingredients: ['2 cups canola oil', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon ground thyme', '1 teaspoon dried marjoram', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 cup Italian-style bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon water', '1 ½ pounds shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 (32 ounce) jar roasted red pepper and garlic tomato sauce', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']

Title: Beefy Lasagna Roll-Ups
Ingredients: ['6 lasagna noodles', '1 pound extra-lean ground beef', '1 small onion, finely diced', '1 (28 ounce) jar pasta sauce', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried parsley', '½ teaspoon dried chives', '⅛ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '2 cups shredded yellow and white marbled Cheddar cheese, divided', '1 (8 ounce) package light cream cheese, softened']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain and pat noodles dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 5: Brown ground beef and onion in a large skillet over medium heat, breaking the meat into crumbles as it cooks, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Pour pasta sauce into beef mixture and stir garlic powder, basil, parsley, chives, oregano, and nutmeg into beef and sauce.
', 'Step 7: Spread half of the beef sauce into a 2-quart casserole dish and sprinkle with 1 cup Cheddar cheese.
', 'Step 8: Lay a lasagna noodle out onto a lightly floured work surface and spread with 2 tablespoons cream cheese.
', 'Step 9: Spread 2 tablespoons ground beef sauce onto noodle; roll noodle and place with seam side down atop cheese in casserole dish.
', 'Step 10: Repeat with remaining noodles.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle remaining beef sauce and 1 cup Cheddar cheese over noodle rolls.

Title: Chef John's Whole Wheat Ciabatta
Ingredients: ['1 cup warm water', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '½ cup whole wheat flour', '¼ cup rye flour', '¼ teaspoon active dry yeast', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 cup whole wheat flour', '½ cup water at room temperature', '2 tablespoons shelled sunflower seeds', '1 tablespoon polenta', '1 tablespoon ground flax seeds', '1 ¾ teaspoons salt', '1 ½ teaspoons honey', '1 teaspoon all-purpose flour, or as needed', '½ teaspoon cornmeal, or as needed', 'water as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir 1 cup warm water, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup whole wheat flour, 1/4 cup rye flour, and yeast together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let sit until the sponge bubbles and doubles in volume, 5 to 6 hours.
', 'Step 3: Stir 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup whole wheat flour, 1/2 water, sunflower seeds, polenta, flax seeds, salt, and honey into sponge with a wooden spoon until a very sticky dough ball forms, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Scrape down the the sides of the bowl, cover bowl with plastic wrap, and let dough rise until doubled in volume, 10 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 5: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 6: Dust parchment paper with 1/2 teaspoon all-purpose flour and cornmeal.
', 'Step 7: Scrape dough out of bowl onto a lightly floured work surface, press down to remove air, and form into a smooth oval loaf.
', 'Step 8: Place dough on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Dust top of loaf lightly with flour, cover with plastic wrap, and let rise until doubled in size, about 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 10: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Place a baking dish filled with water on the bottom rack of the oven.
', 'Step 12: Remove plastic wrap from risen dough and mist the top of the dough with water.
', 'Step 13: Bake loaf in the preheated oven, misting the top of the loaf with water every 8 to 10 minutes, until loaf is golden and sounds hollow when tapped, 30 to 35 minutes total.
', 'Step 14: Transfer bread to a cooling rack and let cool completely before slicing.
']

Title: Easy Italian Sausage Spaghetti

Title: Cinnamon Sugar Biscotti
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '.666 cup white sugar', '6 tablespoons butter', '1 egg', '1 egg yolk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg, beaten', '3 tablespoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line baking sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Sift together the flour, 1 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, baking powder and salt, set aside.
', 'Step 4: In a medium bowl, cream together the 2/3 cup sugar and butter.
', 'Step 5: Beat in 1 egg, egg yolk and vanilla.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the dry ingredients.
', 'Step 7: On a lightly floured surface, divide dough into two pieces.
', 'Step 8: Roll each piece into a log about 9 inches long and 1 1/2 inches wide.
', 'Step 9: Place logs on the prepared baking sheet and flatten slightly.
', 'Step 10: Brush with the beaten egg.
', 'Step 11: Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden and firm to the touch.
', 'Step 12: Cool for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 13: On a cutting board, slice each log crosswise at a diagonal into 1/2 inch slices, using a serrated knife.
', 'Step 14: Place back on the baking sheet, cut side down, and sprinkle with a mixture of the remaining cinnamon and sugar.
', 'Step 15: Return to the oven for an additional 15 to 20 minutes, until toasted.
', 'Step 16: Cool on wire racks, and store in an airtight container.
']

"]

Title: Italian Baked Chicken Thighs
Ingredients: ['½ tablespoon butter', '½ cup onion, chopped', '4 ounces Neufchatel cheese, softened', '2 tablespoons chicken broth', '2 tablespoons creamy basil and ricotta pesto (such as Barilla®)', '1 tablespoon dry Italian salad dressing mix (such as Good Seasons®)', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon black pepper', '¼ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '3 cups fresh spinach', '1 cup tomatoes, diced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken thighs', '1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '3 slices mozzarella cheese']

', 'Step 5: Stir in spinach and sauteed onions.

Title: Homemade Pesto
Ingredients: ['4 cups packed fresh basil leaves', '¼ cup Italian parsley', '2 cloves garlic, peeled and lightly crushed', '1 cup pine nuts', '1 ½ cups shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or more as needed', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place basil, Italian parsley, and garlic into a food processor, pulse several times to combine, and process until basil is finely chopped, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 2: Add pine nuts to basil mixture; process until finely chopped, 30 more seconds.
', 'Step 3: Process Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese into mixture until finely ground.
', 'Step 4: n Mix lemon juice into mixture with the machine running; slowly drizzle olive oil into pesto in the running machine until incorporated and pesto is thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 5: Turn off machine and season pesto to taste with salt and black pepper.

Title: Spinach, Feta, and Pine Nut Ravioli Filling
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 (10 ounce) bag fresh spinach', '1 cup feta cheese', '½ cup pine nuts', '2 fresh pasta sheets', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook the spinach until fully wilted, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Let cool, then squeeze the spinach to remove as much liquid as you can.
', 'Step 4: Combine the cooked spinach, feta, and pine nuts in a blender or food processor and pulse until it is the consistency of a fine paste.
', 'Step 5: Beat the egg and water together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 6: To assemble the ravioli, brush the egg over a sheet of pasta.
', 'Step 7: Drop the filling mixture on the dough by teaspoonfuls about one inch apart.
', 'Step 8: Cover the filling with the top sheet of pasta, pressing out the air from around each portion of filling.
', 'Step 9: Press firmly around the filling in whatever shape you wish (circles, squares) and then cut them apart.
', 'Step 10: Press the tines of a fork around the edges of the pasta to seal each raviolo.
', 'Step 11: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 12: Once the water is boiling, add the ravioli, stir gently, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 13: Cook uncovered until the ravioli float to the top and the filling is hot, about 3 to 5 minutes.
']

Title: Manicotti with Cheese
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package manicotti pasta', '2 cups whole milk ricotta cheese', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 ½ (32 ounce) jars spaghetti sauce']

Title: Instant Pot® Risotto
Ingredients: ['1 cube chicken bouillon (such as Knorr®)', '2 cups hot water', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '¼ cup finely diced onion', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 cup Arborio rice', '¼ cup white wine', '2 tablespoons butter', '¼ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dissolve the chicken bouillon cube in the hot water and set aside.
', 'Step 2: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 3: Add olive oil to the pot.
', 'Step 4: Add onion and cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 5: Add garlic and rice and stir until each grain of rice is coated with the oil mixture.
', 'Step 6: Cook until rice is slightly toasted, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour in white wine and simmer for about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 8: Stir in chicken broth.
', 'Step 9: Turn off Saute function.
', 'Step 10: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 11: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 6 minutes.
", 'Step 12: Allow 5 to 10 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 13: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 14: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 15: Add butter; stir until risotto is creamy, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 16: Stir in Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese until melted and well combined.
', 'Step 17: Serve sprinkled with parsley.
']

Title: Torta di Mele (Italian Apple Cake)
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons unseasoned bread crumbs, or as needed', '½ cup unsalted butter, melted', '½ cup white sugar', '1 vanilla bean, split and scraped', '2 eggs', '1 ⅛ cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon milk, or as needed', '2 pounds Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and sliced thin', '¼ cup unsalted butter, cubed', '¼ cup white sugar']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a pie plate and dust with bread crumbs Combine melted butter, 1/2 cup sugar, and vanilla bean seeds in a bowl.

', 'Step 7: Dot with cubed butter and sprinkle with 1/4 cup sugar.

', 'Step 5: Stir in onion, garlic, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 6: Cook, stirring occasionally, until the onion is soft and translucent.
', 'Step 7: Increase heat to medium high, pour in white wine; cook about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to low, stir in chicken, artichoke hearts, and spinach.
', 'Step 9: Cover, and cook to warm through.
', 'Step 10: Meanwhile, bring a pot of salted water to boil.
', 'Step 11: Add orzo pasta and cook until al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Drain, and stir into chicken mixture.
', 'Step 13: Stir pine nuts and balsamic vinegar into pasta.
']

', 'Step 2: Add fettuccine, and cook for 11 to 13 minutes or until al dente; drain.

Title: Sausage, Pepper, and Onion Sandwiches
Ingredients: ['5 pounds Italian sausage links', '2 (28 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (29 ounce) can tomato sauce', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '4 large green bell peppers, thickly sliced', '3 large onions, thickly sliced', '25 (6 inch) Italian-style hoagie buns']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut the sausages apart into individual links if necessary, place the sausage links into a large skillet over medium heat, and brown them on all sides.

', 'Step 3: Pour the whole tomatoes, crushed tomatoes, and tomato sauce into a large saucepan with a lid; stir in the grated Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, Italian seasoning, sugar, and onion powder.
', 'Step 4: Bring the mixture to a boil; add the cooked sausages, pan drippings, green peppers, and onions.

Title: Grandma's Italian Eggplant Parmigiana
Ingredients: ['2 medium Italian eggplants, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices', '2 cups all-purpose flour, sifted', '3 tablespoons sea salt, or to taste', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '5 eggs, room temperature', '3 tablespoons water, room temperature', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed', '2 cups freshly grated Pecorino-Romano cheese, divided', '40 ounces Italian-style tomato sauce', '2 cups freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '30 ounces freshly grated mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Lay eggplant slices on top of paper towels and sprinkle with sea salt to draw out moisture.
', 'Step 2: Cover with additional paper towels.
', 'Step 3: Let sit, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 4: Place flour into a 1-gallon plastic zip-top bag.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle salt and pepper into the flour and shake the bag to mix.
', 'Step 6: Place 6 eggplant slices into the bag, seal, and shake to coat.
', 'Step 7: Beat eggs and water together using a fork in a small bowl.
', 'Step 8: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Heat 2 inches of oil over medium-high heat in a 10-inch cast iron skillet.
', 'Step 10: Line baking sheets with paper towels to drain eggplants after frying.
', 'Step 11: Shake excess flour from eggplant slices and place into egg mixture, turning to ensure both sides are coated.
', 'Step 12: Allow excess egg mixture to drip off before placing slices into the hot oil.
', 'Step 13: Fry until slightly golden, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 14: Transfer to the paper towel-lined baking sheets.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle with 1 tablespoon Pecorino Romano cheese.
', 'Step 16: Repeat process until all eggplant slices are fried.
', 'Step 17: Let cool slightly, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 19: Pour a small amount of tomato sauce into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking pan to cover.
', 'Step 20: Place 1/3 of the eggplant slices over sauce, slightly overlapping them.
', 'Step 21: Sprinkle 1/3 of the remaining Pecorino-Romano cheese and Parmesan cheese evenly over the slices.
', 'Step 22: Cover with a light layer of sauce.
', 'Step 23: Sprinkle 1/3 of the mozzarella cheese over sauce.
', 'Step 24: Repeat for a total of 3 layers.
', 'Step 25: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 26: Remove from the oven and let cool for 10 minutes to set.
']

Title: Dreamy Chicken Francese
Ingredients: ['3 (5 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken breasts', '2 tablespoons tapioca starch', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon salt', '2 large eggs', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons salted butter, divided', '3 cloves garlic', '1 cup whipping cream', '¾ cup chicken broth', '¼ cup Pinot Grigio wine', '½ medium lemon, juiced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Use a sharp knife to cut each chicken breast horizontally into 3 thin pieces.
', 'Step 3: Combine tapioca starch, flour, and salt in a shallow dish and mix well.
', 'Step 4: Place eggs in another shallow dish, and beat well.
', 'Step 5: Heat olive oil and 1 tablespoon butter in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Dip chicken first in flour mixture, then into the eggs, coating completely.
', 'Step 7: Cook chicken, in batches if necessary, until golden and no longer pink in the center, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 8: Remove chicken to a rimmed baking sheet lined with a drip tray.
', 'Step 9: Place chicken in the preheated oven to keep warm.
', 'Step 10: Meanwhile, reduce heat to medium-low, and melt remaining 1 tablespoon butter in the skillet.
', 'Step 11: Saute garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 12: Stir in cream, broth, wine, lemon juice, parsley, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 13: Cook, stirring constantly, until sauce has reduced.
', "Step 14: Sauce can break if the heat is too high and it's not stirred regularly.
", 'Step 15: Serve chicken topped with sauce.
']

Title: Mediterranean Black Olive Bread
Ingredients: ['3 cups bread flour', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ cup chopped black olives', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ¼ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '1 tablespoon cornmeal']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, mix together flour, yeast, sugar, salt, black olives, olive oil, and water.
', 'Step 2: Turn out dough onto a floured board.
', 'Step 3: Knead until smooth and elastic, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Set aside, and let rise about 45 minutes, until it doubles in size.
', 'Step 5: Punch down.
', 'Step 6: Knead well again, for about 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Let rise for about 30 minutes, until it doubles in size.
', 'Step 8: Round the dough on kneading board.
', 'Step 9: Place upside down in a bowl lined with a lint-free, well floured towel.
', 'Step 10: Let rise until double in size.
', 'Step 11: While the bread is rising for the third time, put a pan of water in the bottom of the oven.
', 'Step 12: Preheat oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Gently turn loaf out onto a sheet pan that has been lightly oiled and dusted with cornmeal.
', 'Step 14: Bake loaf at 500 degrees F (260 degrees C) for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Reduce heat to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Bake for 30 more minutes, or until done.
']

Title: Pasta with Pesto and Scallops
Ingredients: ['16 ounces dry fettuccine pasta', '¼ cup pesto', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '½ onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 green bell pepper, thinly sliced', '½ cup fresh sliced mushrooms', '2 tablespoons dry white wine', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 pound scallops', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']

', 'Step 2: Drain.

', 'Step 6: Stir in dry white wine, lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste, and bring to a boil.

Title: Mascarpone Pasta with Chicken, Bacon and Spinach
Ingredients: ['6 slices bacon', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup minced onion', '3 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cubed', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons drained and chopped sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil', '2 tablespoons prepared pesto sauce', '½ pound fresh spinach', '1 (8 ounce) container mascarpone cheese', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, or more to taste', '1 lemon, juiced', '½ cup milk', '¼ teaspoon white pepper', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (16 ounce) package farfalle (bow tie) pasta', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain the bacon slices on paper towels.
', 'Step 3: Crumble bacon when cooled.
', 'Step 4: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir crumbled bacon and onion in the hot oil until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir chicken into mixture and season with garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink inside and lightly browned outside, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir sun-dried tomatoes and pesto in a large skillet over medium heat until pesto gives off a little oil, about 2 minutes; stir in spinach and cook until wilted, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 8: Mix mascarpone cheese, 2 cloves of garlic, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, milk, and white pepper in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Cook until smooth and bubbling, stirring constantly, about 5 minutes; stir in 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese until cheese has melted, 2 to 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 10: Pour sauce over chicken and bacon mixture.
', 'Step 11: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Cook bow-tie pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 13: Gently fold pasta into chicken mixture and transfer to a serving bowl.
', 'Step 14: Top with spinach mixture and sprinkle with 1 more tablespoon Parmesan cheese, or to taste.
']

', 'Step 2: Cook, stirring constantly, until toasted and fragrant, about 2 minutes.

Title: Fresh Pasta
Ingredients: ['6 cups all-purpose flour', '6 eggs']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heap the flour, and make a well in it.
', 'Step 2: Break the eggs into the well.
', 'Step 3: Beat eggs with a fork.
', 'Step 4: Stir into the flour from the bottom of the well with the fork until the dough in the center is smooth or shiny.
', 'Step 5: With your hands, gradually incorporate the flour from the outside of the well toward the center, kneading gently until the mass of dough comes together.
', 'Step 6: Knead the dough until it is smooth and resilient.
', 'Step 7: You may need to add more flour, or you may not be able to incorporate all of the flour, depending on the humidity and the size of the eggs.
', 'Step 8: If the dough is sticky or extremely pliable, knead more flour into it.
', 'Step 9: Divide the dough into three portions, cover with plastic wrap or an overturned bowl, and allow to rest for at least 30 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Roll the dough out very thin on a lightly floured surface, one portion at a time.
', "Step 11: If you have a pasta machine, follow the manufacturer's instructions for rolling out the dough into sheets about 1 millimeter thick.
", 'Step 12: Use as desired.
']

Title: Italian Party Bread

Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.

', 'Step 13: Let cool slightly and serve warm or at room temperature.

Title: Sweet and Sour Meatballs in Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds ground beef', '2 eggs', '1 ½ cups bread crumbs', '¼ cup finely chopped onion', '¾ cup milk', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 cups ketchup', '2 (8 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '2 cups water', '⅔ cup brown sugar', '⅔ cup white sugar', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon chili powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Mix the ground beef, eggs, bread crumbs, onion, milk, salt, and black pepper together in a large mixing bowl until evenly combined.
', 'Step 3: Form the mixture into 12 large meatballs.
', 'Step 4: Arrange the meatballs into a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 5: Stir the ketchup, tomato sauce, water, brown sugar, white sugar, Worcestershire sauce, Italian seasoning, and chili powder together in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until well combined and hot, about 5 minutes.

Title: Tuscan Chard and Cannellini Bean Soup
Ingredients: ['2 slices smoked bacon, finely chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '¼ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '⅛ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '6 cups chicken broth, or more as needed', '1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed - or more to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped sun-dried tomatoes', '2 ounces Parmesan cheese rind', '1 bunch red or white Swiss chard', '¼ cup uncooked small pasta, such as orzo or pastina', '5 large fresh sage leaves, minced', '5 leaves fresh basil, coarsely chopped', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, divided']

['Step 1: In a large saucepan over medium heat, cook the bacon, onion, garlic, nutmeg, and red pepper flakes until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Pour in chicken broth and cannellini beans, and bring the mixture to a boil; stir in sun-dried tomatoes and the piece of Parmesan cheese rind.

', 'Step 5: Cut the chard leaves into 1-inch wide ribbons.

', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to a simmer, and gently simmer until the pasta is tender, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir the chard leaves, sage, and basil into the soup, and simmer just until wilted, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Ladle soup into bowls and top with Parmesan cheese and a drizzle of olive oil, if desired.
']

Title: Vegetable Stovetop Frittata

Title: Classic Veal Marsala

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.

Title: Bistecca alla Fiorentina (Tuscan Porterhouse)
Ingredients: ['4 sprigs fresh rosemary, chopped', '1 (2 1/2 pound) choice or prime porterhouse steak', '3 tablespoons Tuscan olive oil', 'Moist, grey sea salt and freshly cracked pepper to taste', '6 lemon wedges']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Press chopped rosemary onto both sides of porterhouse steak; set onto a plate and allow to marinate at room temperature for 1 hour.
', 'Step 2: Start an outdoor grill using hardwood charcoal, such as hickory.
', 'Step 3: When coals are white and glowing, arrange for high heat.
', 'Step 4: Gently brush or rub olive oil onto steak, then season to taste with sea salt and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Place steak onto grill, and cook until a dark, golden brown (not burnt) crust forms, 5 to 10 minutes depending on thickness of meat.
', 'Step 6: Turn over, and continue cooking until golden on the other side, 5 to 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 7: When finished, place steak onto a platter, and allow to rest for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: To serve, remove the two pieces of meat from the bone, and replace the bone onto the serving platter.
', 'Step 9: Trim any unwanted fat from the round (tenderloin) steak, slice into 6 equal pieces at an angle to the grain, and fan out on one side of the bone.
', 'Step 10: Slice the rectangular (loin) steak into 1/4-inch slices at an angle to the grain.
', 'Step 11: Fan out on the other side of the bone.
', 'Step 12: Finish by garnishing the platter with lemon wedges and a sprinkle of additional sea salt.
']

Title: Anisette Toast
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '¼ teaspoon baking soda', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup softened butter', '1 cup white sugar', '3 eggs', '4 teaspoons anise extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 3: Grease 2 baking sheets.
', 'Step 4: Beat the butter and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until fluffy.
', 'Step 5: Beat in one egg until completely incorporated, then another.
', 'Step 6: Beat in the last egg along with the anise extract.
', 'Step 7: Mix in the flour until just incorporated.
', 'Step 8: Divide the dough onto the prepared baking sheets.
', 'Step 9: Form each portion into a 12-inch long log, 1/2-inch thick.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until golden and firm to the touch, 20 to 25 minutes.

', 'Step 13: Return to the oven, and bake 5 to 10 minutes until the bottoms turn golden brown.

', 'Step 15: Cool completely on a wire rack before serving.
']

Title: Insalata di Riso (Italian Rice Salad)
Ingredients: ['3 cups water', '1 ½ cups long-grain rice', '1 large carrot, diced', '½ cup frozen peas', 'salt to taste', '¾ cup cubed prosciutto cotto (cooked ham)', '¾ cup diced Swiss cheese', '½ cup button mushrooms in oil, drained', '⅓ cup canned corn, drained', '⅓ cup sliced green olives', '⅓ cup sliced black olives', '⅓ cup diced pickle', '⅓ cup sliced marinated artichoke hearts, drained', '1 ½ tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon thyme', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1 (3 ounce) can tuna, drained', '4 hard-boiled eggs, quartered']

', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender but still firm to the bite, about 14 minutes.

', 'Step 6: Fold tuna into the salad.
', 'Step 7: Divide salad among 4 serving plates; garnish with hard-boiled eggs.
', 'Step 8: Chill before serving, at least 30 minutes.
']

Title: Splendicious Slow Cooker Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '3 (14.5 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes', '1 cup red wine', '1 cup sliced green olives', '4 teaspoons sea salt', '2 tablespoons dried basil', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '½ teaspoon Hungarian paprika', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup finely chopped sweet onion, divided', '1 clove garlic, crushed and chopped', '⅔ cup chopped fresh parsley', '⅔ cup sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 teaspoon brown sugar', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 (4 ounce) links Italian sausage links, casings removed', '2 cloves garlic, crushed and chopped', '1 teaspoon ground white pepper', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 cup red wine, or more if needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix together the crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, 1 cup of red wine, green olives, 4 teaspoons of sea salt, basil, oregano, paprika, and cayenne pepper in a slow cooker.
', 'Step 2: Set the cooker to Low.
', 'Step 3: While the cooker is warming up, place 3 tablespoons of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, and cook 3/4 cup of sweet onion until the onion just begins to soften, about 2 minutes; stir in 1 clove of garlic.
', 'Step 4: Cook the mixture for 3 more minutes before mixing in parsley and mushrooms.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat, and simmer the mixture for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the brown sugar, and mix to dissolve.
', 'Step 7: While the parsley and mushrooms are simmering, heat 3 more tablespoons of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, and stir in the remaining onion and the sausage.
', 'Step 8: Brown the sausage, breaking the meat up into crumbles as it cooks, about 10 minutes; season the mixture with white pepper and cumin.
', 'Step 9: Pour 1 cup of red into the skillet, and scrape the pan with a wooden spoon to dissolve any brown flavor bits into the wine.
', 'Step 10: Simmer for about 10 minutes; pour the sausage mixture into the skillet with the parsley and mushrooms.
', 'Step 11: Bring to a simmer over medium-low heat just until all the ingredients have had time to introduce themselves to each other, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Pour the sausage mixture into the slow cooker.
', 'Step 13: Cook on Low for 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 14: Add more red wine or water if needed to prevent the sauce from getting too thick and burning on the bottom.
']

Title: Secret Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['½ pound ground beef', '½ pound Italian sausage', '4 carrots, quartered', '1 large onion, quartered', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (30 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (30 ounce) can tomato sauce', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'salt to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir beef and Italian sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 10 minutes; drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 3: n Chop carrots and onion in the food processor.
', 'Step 4: n Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir carrots, onion, and garlic in the hot oil until onion is transparent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir ground beef-sausage mixture, crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, oregano, brown sugar, basil, black pepper, and cinnamon into onion mixture; simmer, stirring occasionally, until flavors have blended, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt.
']

Title: Spaghetti alla Gricia
Ingredients: ['1 pound thick spaghetti', '8 ounces guanciale (smoked pork jowl), thinly sliced', 'black pepper to taste', '3 ounces finely grated Pecorino Romano cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 3: While pasta cooks, immediately heat a nonstick pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Add guanciale and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add 1 ladle of pasta cooking water, stir, and cover pan.
', 'Step 6: As pasta cooks, add another ladle of cooking water to the pan with the guanciale to create a sauce.
', 'Step 7: At about 10 minutes of pasta cooking time, reserve a cup of cooking water and drain pasta.
', 'Step 8: Add spaghetti to the pan with the guanciale; toss, adding reserved cooking water if necessary.
', 'Step 9: Turn off heat.
', 'Step 10: Add 1/3 the Pecorino Romano cheese to the pasta and toss until creamy.
', 'Step 11: Divide pasta between 4 plates.
', 'Step 12: Top each with remaining Pecorino Romano cheese and black pepper.
', 'Step 13: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Grilled Italian Pork Chops
Ingredients: ['4 (3/4 inch thick) pork chops', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '4 slices ham', '4 slices tomato', '4 slices mozzarella cheese', 'chopped fresh oregano to taste', 'paprika to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat, and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle pork chops with salt and black pepper, and grill until the chops are browned, show good grill marks, and are no longer pink in the middle, 5 to 8 minutes per side.
', 'Step 3: An instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the center of a chop should read at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Place ham, tomato, and mozzarella cheese slices on each pork chop, and sprinkle with oregano and paprika; cook until the cheese has melted, about 2 more minutes.
', 'Step 5: Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Pasta Lasagna
Ingredients: ['½ pound penne pasta', '½ pound lean ground beef', '1 (26 ounce) jar pasta sauce', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '8 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg, beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 2 1/2 quart baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 5: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook beef until brown; drain.
', 'Step 6: Stir in pasta sauce; remove from heat.
', 'Step 7: In a bowl, combine ricotta, 1 cup mozzarella, Parmesan and beaten egg.
', 'Step 8: Stir until well combined.
', 'Step 9: In the prepared dish layer half the pasta, half the sauce and half the cheese mixture.
', 'Step 10: Repeat.
', 'Step 11: Top with remaining mozzarella.
', 'Step 12: Bake in preheated oven 34 to 40 minutes, until hot and bubbly.
']

Title: Tapenade
Ingredients: ['1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 ¾ cups whole, pitted kalamata olives', '1 (2 ounce) can anchovy fillets, rinsed', '2 tablespoons capers', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '4 tablespoons olive oil']

']

Title: Blueberry Ricotta Squares
Ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour', '¾ cup white sugar', '1 ¼ teaspoons baking powder', '⅓ cup milk', '¼ cup shortening', '1 egg', '½ teaspoon lemon extract', '1 ½ cups blueberries', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 ¼ cups ricotta cheese', '⅓ cup white sugar', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9 inch square baking dish.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, stir together the flour, 3/4 cup of sugar, and baking powder.
', 'Step 4: Add the milk, shortening, 1 egg, and lemon extract, and use an electric mixer to mix on low speed for 1 minute, then on medium speed for 1 minute.
', 'Step 5: Pour the batter into the prepared pan, and spread evenly.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle blueberries over the batter.
', 'Step 7: In a medium bowl, stir together 2 beaten eggs, ricotta cheese, 1/3 cup of sugar, and vanilla extract.
', 'Step 8: Spoon this mixture over the blueberries, and spread evenly.
', 'Step 9: Bake for 55 to 60 minutes in the preheated oven, until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
', 'Step 10: Cool completely before cutting into squares and serving.
']

Title: Italian Limoncello
Ingredients: ['1 (1.75 liter) bottle 190 proof grain alcohol (such as Everclear®)', '20 lemons, zested, or more to taste', '1-gallon jug', '7 cups water', '7 cups white sugar', 'coffee filters', '6 clean wine bottles with corks']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine alcohol and lemon zest in a 1-gallon jug with a tight-fitting lid.
', 'Step 2: Place in a cool, dark place to rest for 1 month.
', 'Step 3: Swirl contents of the jug every few days.
', 'Step 4: Combine water and sugar in a saucepan over medium heat; stir until sugar is fully dissolved.
', 'Step 5: Set simple syrup aside to cool completely, 15 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: While simple syrup is cooling, place a sieve over a large bowl and line with coffee filters.
', 'Step 7: Strain alcohol mixture through coffee filters to remove all sediment.
', 'Step 8: Replace the filters as needed until all the mixture has been filtered.
', 'Step 9: Filter one more time to ensure all sediment has been removed.
', 'Step 10: Discard coffee filters and zest.
', 'Step 11: Add enough simple syrup to the alcohol mixture to reach the desired alcohol-by-volume percentage; refer to an alcohol content calculator.
', 'Step 12: Divide limoncello among 6 wine bottles.
', 'Step 13: Seal with corks.
', 'Step 14: Allow to rest in a cool, dark place for 1 month, swirling every few days.
', 'Step 15: Strain one more time to remove any leftover sediment if desired.
', 'Step 16: Place 1 bottle of limoncello in the freezer and serve icy-cold.
', 'Step 17: Store remaining bottles at room temperature.
']

Title: Scarlett's Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cubed', '1 small onion, diced', '½ green bell pepper, diced', '2 cups sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 (28 ounce) can Italian-style crushed tomatoes', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 (8 ounce) package egg noodles', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat, and cook and stir the chicken, onion, green pepper, mushrooms, and garlic until the chicken is no longer pink inside, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the crushed tomatoes, parsley, salt, pepper, Italian seasoning, and basil, bring the mixture to a boil, and reduce heat.

', 'Step 4: While the chicken mixture is simmering, fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 5: Once the water is boiling, stir in the egg noodles, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Cook the noodles uncovered, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but still firm to the bite, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 8: Serve the chicken cacciatore over the hot cooked noodles.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese before serving.
']

Title: Italian Fig Cookies I
Ingredients: ['2 cups shortening', '3 cups white sugar', '6 eggs', '8 cups all-purpose flour', '7 teaspoons baking powder', '2 tablespoons vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', '2 cups whole milk', '4 pounds dried figs', '1 pound raisins', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '½ cup white sugar', '1 whole orange, with peel', '1 small apple', '1 ½ cups chopped pecans', '1 cup water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To Make Dough: Cream sugar and shortening.
', 'Step 2: Add eggs, vanilla, and salt.
', 'Step 3: Blend in flour and baking powder by hand.
', 'Step 4: Knead dough until smooth and workable.
', 'Step 5: Add milk to reach workable consistency.
', "Step 6: (This takes a while and you will get a workout, but you'll know when it's right.
", 'Step 7: ) To Make Filling: Cut up figs, orange, and apple into small pieces.
', 'Step 8: (It is easier to grind this way).
', 'Step 9: Grind figs, raisins, orange, and apple.
', 'Step 10: If the mixture is too dry or thick, mix in up to 1 cup of water, if desired.
', 'Step 11: (I do not use the water, the juice from the apple and orange are enough).
', 'Step 12: The spices and chopped nuts are added to the ground fig mixture.
', 'Step 13: After the fig mixture is ground, I sprinkle them in over the mixture and mix (knead) it in by hand.
', 'Step 14: STICKY!
', 'Step 15: But good.
', 'Step 16: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 17: Roll out some dough.
', 'Step 18: (should be kind of thin).
', 'Step 19: Put fig mixture in a line.
', 'Step 20: Wrap dough over mixture, sealing figs inside dough.
', 'Step 21: Trim to desired length, using a diagonal cut.
', 'Step 22: Make small diagonal slits in the sides of the cookies.
', 'Step 23: Bake on ungreased cookie sheet for 10-15 minutes.
', 'Step 24: (Dough makes good cookies without the filling also).
', 'Step 25: Wonderful with coffee.
']

Title: Creamy Pesto Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into strips', '4 large cloves garlic, sliced', '3 ½ tablespoons sherry', '¼ cup pine nuts', '½ cup chopped fresh basil', '1 (8 ounce) container reduced fat sour cream', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', 'ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 5: Reduce the heat to low, and mix in the basil, sour cream, Parmesan cheese, and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Continue cooking until heated through.
']

Title: Zucchini Lasagna With Beef and Sausage
Ingredients: ['½ pound ground beef', '½ pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1 tablespoon red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (12 ounce) can tomato paste', '2 eggs', '2 cups ricotta cheese', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 large zucchini, trimmed', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook and stir ground beef, Italian sausage, onion, and garlic in a large skillet over medium heat until the meat is crumbly and no longer pink, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain grease and stir basil, oregano, brown sugar, red pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon salt, black pepper, tomatoes, and tomato paste into the meat.
', 'Step 3: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer meat sauce for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir occasionally.
', 'Step 5: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 7: Mix eggs, ricotta cheese, 1 cup Parmesan cheese, parsley, and 1 teaspoon salt in a bowl until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 8: Pare several slices of skin lengthwise from zucchini, alternating with strips of remaining skin.
', 'Step 9: Cut zucchini into long strips to resemble lasagna noodles.
', 'Step 10: Discard seedy middle strips.
', 'Step 11: Place 1/3 of the zucchini strips into bottom of the prepared baking dish, filling in any gaps with scrap pieces of zucchini.
', 'Step 12: Spread half the ricotta mixture over zucchini; spread 1 cup of mozzarella cheese over ricotta mixture; spread 1/3 of the meat sauce over mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 13: Repeat layers once more, layering 1/3 of zucchini strips, remaining half of the ricotta mixture, 1 more cup of mozzarella cheese, and 1/3 of the meat sauce.
', 'Step 14: Make a third layer of remaining zucchini strips, remaining meat sauce, and 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese sprinkled on top.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until lasagna is bubbling and top is browned, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 16: If top is browning too quickly, cover dish with aluminum foil during last 15 minutes of baking time.
', 'Step 17: Spread 1 cup mozzarella cheese on top of the casserole and bake until mozzarella cheese topping is melted, 5 to 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 18: Let casserole stand 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Piadina (Italian Flatbread)
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 pinch salt', '½ cup water', '7 tablespoons lard']

['Step 1: Mix flour and salt together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Mix in water a little at a time.
', 'Step 3: Rub in lard until dough comes together in a ball.
', 'Step 4: Transfer dough to a lightly floured work surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Divide the dough into 6 pieces; roll out each piece to 1/16-inch thickness.
', 'Step 6: Heat a dry, heavy skillet or flat griddle over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Cook each piece until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side.
']

Title: Asparagus Lasagna
Ingredients: ['5 wide lasagna noodles', '2 tablespoons margarine', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 ½ cups milk', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '1 (15 ounce) can asparagus, drained', '1 cup julienned fully cooked ham', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook lasagna noodles in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente.
', 'Step 3: Drain, and cut noodles in half crosswise.
', 'Step 4: Melt margarine in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Saute garlic just until fragrant.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the flour until no lumps remain.
', 'Step 7: Gradually mix in milk, and season with thyme.
', 'Step 8: Simmer sauce gently until thick.
', 'Step 9: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 10: Grease a 9x9 inch glass baking dish.
', 'Step 11: Layer noodles, sauce, asparagus, ham, and mozzarella cheese in three layers, each starting with noodles, and ending with shredded cheese on the top.
', 'Step 12: Cover the dish, and cook in the microwave on HIGH for 9 to 10 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
', 'Step 13: Time may vary depending on the oven used.
', 'Step 14: Let stand for 5 to 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Calamari Marinara
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 yellow onion, sliced thin', '1 serrano chile pepper, sliced thin', '3 garlic cloves, crushed or minced', '1 anchovy fillet', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon kosher salt, plus more as needed', '½ cup dry white wine', '1 cup clam juice', '6 cups crushed or pureed Italian plum tomatoes', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '2 pounds frozen calamari (tubes and tentacles), thawed, sliced into 1/2-inch pieces', '¼ cup freshly chopped Italian parsley', '1 tablespoon Freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '1 (16 ounce) package dry pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Drizzle olive oil into saucepan (not over heat).
', 'Step 2: Add onions, Serrano pepper, garlic, anchovy filet, red pepper flakes, and salt.
', 'Step 3: Place pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: When onions start to sizzle after a minute or so, stir and cook until onions and garlic just start to turn golden, 3 or 4 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in wine.
', 'Step 6: Cook until wine is reduced by about half, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add clam juice, tomatoes, and oregano.
', 'Step 8: Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 9: When sauce begins to bubble, reduce heat to medium-low.
', 'Step 10: Simmer gently for about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Transfer calamari to sauce pot; stir gently.
', 'Step 12: Simmer until calamari are tender, 35 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 14: Stir in parsley.
', 'Step 15: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 16: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Drain.
', 'Step 18: Stir some sauce into the hot, drained pasta.
', 'Step 19: Serve in warm bowls topped with more marinara sauce and grated cheese.
']

Title: Italian Roast Beef I
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups water', '3 cubes beef bouillon', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon crushed garlic', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '2 tablespoons dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried red pepper flakes', '4 pounds rump roast', '½ cup vegetable oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour water into a large kettle, and add bouillon cubes.
', 'Step 2: Mix together the salt, garlic, Italian seasoning, black pepper, oregano, basil, and red pepper flakes on a large plate.
', 'Step 3: Rub roast with 1/2 cup vegetable oil.
', 'Step 4: Roll roast in seasoning mixture until well coated.
', 'Step 5: Place the roast in the kettle along with any left over seasoning mixture and oil.
', 'Step 6: Bring water to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer approximately 3 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 7: Meat should be tender and well done.

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (170 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine dry ingredients in a medium sized mixing bowl.

Title: Zeppoli

', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup warm water.

Title: Vegetarian Four Cheese Lasagna
Ingredients: ['2 cups peeled and diced pumpkin', '1 eggplant, sliced into 1/2 inch rounds', '5 tomatoes', '1 pint ricotta cheese', '9 ounces crumbled feta cheese', '⅔ cup pesto', '2 eggs, beaten', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', 'fresh pasta sheets', '1 ⅓ cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place pumpkin on a baking sheet and roast in oven until browned and tender, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, grill eggplant on a charcoal grill or fry in a skillet, turning once, until charred and tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Halve tomatoes and place on baking sheet in oven for last 15 minutes of pumpkin time; cook until tender and wrinkly.
', 'Step 5: In a medium bowl, stir together ricotta, feta, pesto, eggs, salt and pepper until well mixed.
', 'Step 6: Fold roasted pumpkin into ricotta mixture.
', 'Step 7: Spoon half of the tomato sauce into a 9x13 baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Lay two pasta sheets over the sauce.
', 'Step 9: Arrange a single layer of eggplant slices over pasta and top with half the ricotta mixture.
', 'Step 10: Cover with two more pasta sheets.
', 'Step 11: Arrange the roasted tomatoes evenly over the sheets and spoon the remaining half the ricotta mixture over the tomatoes.
', 'Step 12: Sprinkle with half the mozzarella.
', 'Step 13: Top with remaining two sheets of pasta.
', 'Step 14: Pour remaining tomato sauce over all and sprinkle with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan.
', 'Step 15: Bake in preheated oven 30 to 40 minutes, until golden and bubbly.
']

Title: Focaccia di Recco
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '½ cup cold water', '2 tablespoons cold water', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '¾ teaspoon fine salt', '1 quarter-sheet baking pan', '1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon cornmeal', '12 tablespoons crescenza-stracchino cheese, divided', '4 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '¼ teaspoon coarse sea salt, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place flour into work bowl of a large stand mixer; add both amounts of water, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and 3/4 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 2: Mix dough using stand mixer fitted with dough hook on low speed until it forms a ball on the dough hook, 5 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Dough should be soft and elastic but not sticky.
', 'Step 4: Turn dough out onto a work surface and form a ball.
', 'Step 5: Cover with plastic wrap and let stand on counter at room temperature for 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Lightly grease the quarter-sheet baking pan with 1 teaspoon olive oil; sprinkle with cornmeal.
', 'Step 7: Dust a work surface lightly with flour.
', 'Step 8: Move oven rack to center position.
', 'Step 9: Preheat oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Unwrap dough and cut into quarters.
', 'Step 11: Pat each quarter out on the floured work surface to a roughly rectangular shape.
', 'Step 12: Roll 1 piece of dough out to about 3/8 inch thick, retaining rough rectangle shape, until dough is about 6x8 inches.
', 'Step 13: Pick up dough with well-floured hands and gently stretch it, rotating as you go, until dough is almost large enough to fit over the prepared sheet pan.
', 'Step 14: Pull and stretch dough so it overlaps the edge of the pan by about 1/2 inch and fasten dough edges to sheet pan edges; dough will be thin and membrane-like.
', 'Step 15: Drop about 6 tablespoons of crescenza-stracchino cheese onto the stretched dough, spreading the dollops out evenly.
', 'Step 16: Roll out another piece of dough as before, stretching to fit over the first dough sheet and cheese.
', 'Step 17: Stretch, pull, and seal dough as before so the cheese is enclosed between the 2 sheets of dough.
', 'Step 18: Roll a rolling pin over the edges of the dough to simultaneously seal the flatbread edges and cut the overlapping edges off.
', 'Step 19: Roll the overlapping dough edges away from the pan so flatbread falls into the prepared pan.
', 'Step 20: Press flatbread edges flat and roll slightly if desired to be sure the edges are fully sealed.
', 'Step 21: Discard rolled-off dough edges.
', 'Step 22: Pinch a small bit of the top dough between your thumb and forefinger and gently tear a small hole in the dough; repeat 2 or 3 more times to make a few tears in the top layer.
', 'Step 23: Drizzle flatbread lightly with 2 teaspoons olive oil; sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon coarse sea salt.
', 'Step 24: Bake in the preheated oven until flatbread has many browned, blistered spots on top, bread has inflated, and the top is crusty, 6 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Repeat steps to make a second flatbread using second half of dough as before.
', 'Step 26: Drizzle 2nd flatbread with remaining 2 teaspoons olive oil and 1/4 teaspoon coarse sea salt.
', 'Step 27: Bake second bread as before.
', 'Step 28: Cut in breads into quarters and serve warm.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '186.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '24.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '7.5 mg', 'fatContent': '23.6 g', 'fiberContent': '0.9 g', 'proteinContent': '4.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '326.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.1 g'}
