Title: Cannoli alla Siciliana (Sicilian Cannoli)
Ingredients: ["2 pounds sheep's milk ricotta cheese", "1 ½ cups confectioners' sugar", '¼ cup mixed peel', '1 ½ ounces dark chocolate, finely chopped', '1 ¼ cups all-purpose flour', '3 tablespoons dry Marsala wine, or more to taste', '1 tablespoon butter, softened', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '2 teaspoons vinegar, or more to taste', 'corn oil for frying', '3 tablespoons chopped pistachio nuts', "2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar, or to taste"]
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: Beat ricotta cheese and 1 1/2 cup confectioners' sugar together in a bowl until smooth.
", 'Step 2: Stir in mixed peel and chocolate.
', 'Step 3: Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours.
', 'Step 4: Mix flour, Marsala wine, butter, sugar, and vinegar together in a bowl to make cannoli dough.
', 'Step 5: Wrap in plastic wrap; let rest for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Knead dough on a lightly floured work surface until smooth.
', 'Step 7: Roll to 1/8-inch thickness.
', 'Step 8: Cut into twenty 4-inch squares.
', 'Step 9: Wrap each square around a metal tubular mold, overlapping ends and dabbing with warm water to seal.
', 'Step 10: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 11: Lower some cannoli molds into the hot oil; cook until shells are golden and crisp, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 13: Repeat with remaining cannoli molds.
', 'Step 14: Cool briefly; twist molds carefully to remove shells.
', 'Step 15: Let shells cool completely, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Fill cooled cannoli shells with ricotta filling using a spoon or piping bag.
', 'Step 17: Arrange cannoli on a serving platter.
', "Step 18: Garnish with pistachios; sprinkle 2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar on top.
"]

Title: Traditional Spaghetti all'Amatriciana
Ingredients: ['1 pound spaghetti', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided, or more if needed', '1 onion, finely chopped', '7 ounces pancetta bacon, diced', '2 cups passata (crushed tomatoes)', '1 tablespoon water, or more as needed', '½ teaspoon white sugar', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 2: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat and cook onion until golden brown, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add pancetta and cook, stirring occasionally, until crisp, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour in passata, water, and sugar; cook until sauce has thickened, 10 to 15 minutes Drain spaghetti and toss with sauce, remaining olive oil, Parmesan cheese, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper.
']

Title: Chef John's Italian Wedding Soup
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '1 thick slice meaty beef shank with bone', '⅓ cup coarsely chopped onion', '⅓ cup coarsely chopped carrot', '⅓ cup coarsely chopped celery', '2 quarts water', '1 bay leaf', '3 cloves garlic, peeled', '¼ teaspoon whole black peppercorns', '10 ounces boneless beef short ribs', '½ beaten egg', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons heavy whipping cream', '½ cup soft bread crumbs', '¼ cup shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '⅓ teaspoon salt, or to taste', '⅛ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 quart chicken broth', '1 teaspoon tomato paste', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 bunch kale, stems removed and leaves coarsely chopped', '⅓ cup pastina (tiny star-shaped pasta) or other tiny pasta', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 teaspoons vegetable oil in a large, heavy pot over high heat; brown beef shank slice in hot oil until seared and browned on both sides, about 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 2: Add onion, carrot, celery, water, bay leaf, 3 cloves peeled garlic, and black peppercorns; bring mixture to a simmer.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat to low and simmer until meat falls off the bone and stock turns brown in color, 4 to 5 hours.
', 'Step 4: Add more water if beef stock level gets below about 5 cups.
', 'Step 5: Place beef short ribs into freezer until firm and very cold, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Cut meat into cubes and return to freezer until almost frozen, about 30 more minutes.
', 'Step 7: Whisk egg with parsley, 2 cloves garlic, and cream in a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Stir in bread crumbs and 1/4 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
', 'Step 9: Place partially-frozen beef cubes into food processor and pulse with with 1/3 teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon black pepper until beef is coarsely ground, 5 to 10 pulses.
', 'Step 10: Pulse in bread crumb mixture until mixture is finely ground, about 5 more pulses.
', 'Step 11: Transfer meat to a bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate.
', 'Step 12: Strain beef stock into a large soup pot, discarding beef and vegetables.
', 'Step 13: Mix chicken broth into beef stock and whisk in tomato paste.
', 'Step 14: Bring broth mixture to a simmer and season with salt and black pepper to taste.
', 'Step 15: Stir kale into broth; simmer kale until tender, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Scoop 2-teaspoon portions of the meat mixture and roll into meatballs.
', 'Step 17: Pour pastina into the simmering soup, cook for 5 minutes, and gently add meatballs.
', 'Step 18: Simmer until meatballs are cooked through and tender, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Serve in bowls garnished with a pinch of black pepper or a sprinkle of shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '214.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '16.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '47 mg', 'fatContent': '10.2 g', 'fiberContent': '2 g', 'proteinContent': '14.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4 g', 'sodiumContent': '712.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.5 g'}

Title: Absolutely Delicious Stuffed Calamari
Ingredients: ['12 calamari tubes', '2 green onions, finely chopped', '8 cloves garlic, minced, divided', '½ pound chopped cooked shrimp meat', '½ pound cooked crabmeat, diced', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '¾ cup butter', '12 ounces cream cheese, cut into cubes', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '3 cups milk', '10 ounces freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '¾ cup freshly grated Romano cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package linguine pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Rinse the calamari tubes and pat dry.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, stir together the onions, 6 cloves garlic, shrimp, crabmeat and lemon juice.
', "Step 4: Spoon some of this mixture into each squid tube and seal the ends by 'sewing' with a toothpick.
", 'Step 5: Arrange in a single layer in the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 6: Set aside.
', 'Step 7: Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Stir in cream cheese and 2 cloves garlic.
', 'Step 9: Cook and stir until cream cheese has melted.
', 'Step 10: Gradually whisk in the milk.
', 'Step 11: Cook until heated through and then remove from the heat and stir in the Parmesan cheese and pepper.
', 'Step 12: Pour over all of the calamari tubes in the baking dish.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle about 2 tablespoons of Romano cheese on top of each one.
', 'Step 14: Bake uncovered until the cheese is browned and sauce is bubbly.
', 'Step 15: While the calamari is baking, Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 16: Add linguine pasta, and cook until al dente, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Drain.
', 'Step 18: Serve the stuffed calamari and sauce over a bed of linguine.
']

Title: Italian Spinach and Ricotta Pie
Ingredients: ['1 pound fresh spinach, or more to taste', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 (12 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 (8 ounce) package phyllo dough', '5 tablespoons melted butter', '6 egg yolks']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place spinach in a skillet over medium heat and cook until wilted, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain, squeeze dry, and chop finely.
', 'Step 3: Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a skillet over medium heat and add onion.
', 'Step 4: Cook until onion starts to soften, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add spinach and cook and stir for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat and transfer to a bowl to cool slightly, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, 2 whole eggs, nutmeg, salt, and pepper into the cooled spinach mixture.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Grease a 9-inch tart pan or pie dish.
', 'Step 10: Unwrap the phyllo dough.
', 'Step 11: Keep covered with a damp cloth to prevent phyllo sheets from drying out.
', 'Step 12: Lay 1 sheet of phyllo over the buttered dish flush with the edge so that excess phyllo hangs over on only one side of the dish.
', 'Step 13: Brush lightly with melted butter.
', 'Step 14: Top with another sheet of phyllo at a slight angle to the first one.
', 'Step 15: Continue in this manner, with up to 12 sheets, brushing each sheet with butter and working clockwise to lay each at a slight angle to the previous sheet.
', 'Step 16: Spoon cheese and spinach mixture evenly into the phyllo-lined dish.
', 'Step 17: Using the back of a spoon, make six indentations in the filling, then carefully place 1 egg yolk in each.
', 'Step 18: Season each yolk with salt and pepper and drizzle with a bit of melted butter.
', 'Step 19: Take the extra phyllo dough hanging over the edges of the dish and fold it over to the centre to cover the filling, 1 sheet of phyllo at a time, brushing each one with butter.
', 'Step 20: Brush the top of the whole pie with butter.
', 'Step 21: Bake in the preheated oven until the phyllo pastry is a dark golden brown, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 22: Remove and let cool slightly before slicing.
', 'Step 23: Serve warm.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '450.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '27.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '326.7 mg', 'fatContent': '28.6 g', 'fiberContent': '2.7 g', 'proteinContent': '21.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '15.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '654.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.5 g'}

Title: Nanny's Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '2 (8 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1 pinch crushed red pepper flakes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large skillet combine the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, tomato sauce, garlic, sugar, vinegar, oregano and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 2: Stir all together and simmer over low heat for at least 30 minutes (for the best flavor).
', 'Step 3: Stir frequently to prevent burning.
']

Title: Italian Fresh Purple Grape Cake
Ingredients: ['2 eggs', '⅔ cup white sugar', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil', '⅓ cup milk', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '¾ teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '2 tablespoons grated lemon zest', '2 tablespoons grated orange zest', '10 ounces small purple grapes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Generously butter and flour the 9 inch springform cake pan, tapping out any excess flour.
', 'Step 3: Set aside.
', 'Step 4: In the bowl of an electric mixer fitted with a whisk, beat the eggs and sugar until thick and lemon-colored, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add the butter, oil, milk and vanilla extract, and mix until blended.
', 'Step 6: Sift the flour, baking powder and salt into a large bowl.
', 'Step 7: Add the lemon zest and orange zest, and toss to coat the zest with flour.
', 'Step 8: Spoon the flour mixture into the bowl of batter and stir with a wooden spoon until thoroughly blended.
', 'Step 9: Scrape down the sides of the bowl and mix once more.
', 'Step 10: Set aside for 10 minutes to allow the flour to absorb the liquids.
', 'Step 11: Stir in about 3/4 of the grapes into the batter.
', 'Step 12: Spoon the batter into the prepared cake pan and smooth out the top with a spatula.
', 'Step 13: Place the pan in the center of the oven at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Bake for 15 minutes, then sprinkle the top of the cake with the remaining grapes.
', 'Step 15: Bake for about 40 minutes more, until the top is a deep golden brown and the cake feels quite firm when pressed with a fingertip.
', 'Step 16: Remove from oven and cool on a wire rack.
', 'Step 17: After 10 minutes, run a knife along the sides of the pan.
', 'Step 18: Release and remove the side of the springform pan, leaving the cake on the pan base.
', 'Step 19: Serve at room temperature, cut into thin wedges.
']

Title: Slow Cooker Osso Buco
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', 'salt and pepper to taste', '6 (1 inch) thick slices veal shank, sliced for osso buco', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 onions, roughly chopped', '2 large carrots, chopped', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '1 ¼ cups chicken stock', '1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh oregano', '1 bay leaf']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Season the flour with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 2: Toss the veal shank slices with the flour until evenly coated.
', 'Step 3: Melt the butter and olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook the shank slices in the hot butter until golden brown on all sides, about 10 minutes per side.
', 'Step 5: Combine the onions, carrots, celery, and garlic in a large slow cooker.

Title: Classic Carbonara with Pancetta
Ingredients: ['4 eggs, lightly beaten', '2 cups heavy cream', '1 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (16 ounce) package penne pasta', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '½ pound sliced pancetta, chopped', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ cup pine nuts, toasted', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '¾ cup chopped Italian flat leaf parsley', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese']

', 'Step 14: Serve immediately.

Title: Italian Easter Cookies (Biscotti)
Ingredients: ['6 cups all-purpose flour', '6 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup shortening (such as butter-flavored Crisco®)', '1 cup white sugar', '4 whole eggs', '2 teaspoons anise extract', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup milk', "1 cup confectioners' sugar", '2 teaspoons anise extract', '2 tablespoons milk, or as needed', '¼ cup sprinkles, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Cream together shortening and white sugar in a bowl until creamy.
', 'Step 3: Add 1 egg at a time, mixing well after each.
', 'Step 4: Add 2 teaspoons anise extract and vanilla extract.
', 'Step 5: Slowly add milk and mix until all ingredients are blended.
', 'Step 6: Slowly add flour mixture, and mix until thick but creamy.
', 'Step 7: Place dough in the refrigerator for 30 minutes to overnight.
', 'Step 8: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Coat a work surface and hands with flour.
', 'Step 10: Take a quarter-sized piece of dough and roll into a long narrow sausage shape.
', 'Step 11: Form into desired shapes, such as "s" shapes, twists, candy canes, letters, etc.
', 'Step 12: Cookies will puff up when baked, so be sure each cookie is only about the width of a pinky finger.
', 'Step 13: Place cookies on a baking sheet about 1 1/2 inches apart.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until light golden in color and golden brown on the bottom, 12 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Let cool completely, about 1 hour.
', "Step 16: Place confectioners' sugar in a bowl and add 2 teaspoons anise extract.
", 'Step 17: Mix in milk 1 tablespoon at a time until icing is smooth and creamy and not too drippy.
', 'Step 18: Coat cooled cookies with icing and top with sprinkles.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '90.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '13.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '10.6 mg', 'fatContent': '3.4 g', 'fiberContent': '0.3 g', 'proteinContent': '1.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '78.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.2 g'}

Title: Shrimp and Asparagus Fettuccine
Ingredients: ['1 bunch fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1 inch pieces', '¾ cup olive oil, or more if needed', '6 cloves garlic, pressed', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 pound dry fettuccine pasta', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 pound uncooked shrimp - peeled, deveined, and tails removed', '2 tablespoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), or to taste', '1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese, or more if desired']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Separate the asparagus tips from the rest of the cut pieces, and set the tips aside.
', 'Step 2: Heat 3/4 cup of olive oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir the garlic in the hot oil until it begins to turn brown, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the cut pieces of asparagus (not the tips), and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir the asparagus until tender but still bright green, about 10 minutes, then add the asparagus tips.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir for 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 7: While the asparagus is cooking, fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 8: Once the water is boiling, stir in the fettuccine, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain well in a colander set in the sink, return to the pot, and drizzle 2 teaspoons of olive oil over the pasta.
', 'Step 11: Remove the asparagus from the skillet with a slotted spoon, leaving oil in skillet, and set the asparagus aside.
', 'Step 12: Pat the shrimp dry with paper towels, and place in the hot skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle the shrimp with the seafood seasoning, and cook and stir the shrimp until they are pink and no longer translucent.
', 'Step 14: Return the asparagus to the skillet, and cook the shrimp and asparagus until thoroughly heated, 2 to 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 15: Stir the shrimp and asparagus into the cooked fettuccine, and toss with shredded Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 16: The olive oil serves as the sauce, so add more as needed to generously coat the pasta, shrimp and asparagus.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '517 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '47.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '93.5 mg', 'fatContent': '26.2 g', 'fiberContent': '4.1 g', 'proteinContent': '22.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '680.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.9 g'}

Title: Hunter Style Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '6 cloves garlic, sliced', '2 (28 ounce) cans whole peeled plum tomatoes with juice', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '¾ cup red wine', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 carrot, chopped', '1 stalk celery, chopped', '2 green bell peppers, cut into chunks', '2 onions, cut into chunks', '1 pound fresh mushrooms, sliced', '2 eggs', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '¼ cup olive oil', '5 pounds skinless, boneless chicken pieces', '1 ½ pounds dry linguine pasta', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon freshly shredded Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 teaspoons of olive oil in a large pot over low heat, and cook and stir the garlic until tender but not browned, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Pour in the tomatoes with their juice, and mash with a potato masher to leave the tomatoes in chunks.
', 'Step 3: Stir in tomato paste, red wine, sugar, oregano, basil, salt, and black pepper, and mix until the tomato paste is smoothly combined into the sauce.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a simmer, and cook, stirring often, while you prepare the vegetables.
', 'Step 5: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, and cook and stir the carrot and celery until tender, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir into the sauce.
', 'Step 7: In the same skillet, cook and stir the green peppers and onions until the onions are translucent, 5 to 8 more minutes; mix them to the sauce.
', 'Step 8: Heat 1 more tablespoon of olive oil in the skillet, and cook and stir the mushrooms until they give up their liquid, about 10 minutes; stir the mushrooms into the sauce.
', 'Step 9: Allow sauce to simmer while you cook the chicken.
', 'Step 10: Beat the eggs in a bowl.
', 'Step 11: Place the flour in a separate shallow bowl.
', 'Step 12: Heat 1/4 cup of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 13: Dip chicken pieces in egg, then dredge in flour.
', 'Step 14: Tap off any excess flour, and brown the chicken pieces in the hot oil until browned on both sides, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Set the chicken pieces aside.
', 'Step 16: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 17: Spoon about 1 cup of the tomato sauce into the bottom of a large Dutch oven.
', 'Step 18: Place the chicken pieces into the Dutch oven, and pour remaining sauce and vegetables over the chicken; cover.
', 'Step 19: Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is tender and no longer pink inside, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 20: If sauce begins to boil harder than a simmer, reduce oven heat to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 21: About 15 minutes before serving time, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 22: Stir in the linguine pasta, bring back to a boil, and cook, stirring often, until the linguine is tender but still slightly firm, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Drain the pasta well.
', 'Step 24: Turn the linguine out onto a large platter, and top with the chicken and sauce.
', 'Step 25: Sprinkle with parsley and Parmesan cheese to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '655 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '72.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '114.2 mg', 'fatContent': '21.3 g', 'fiberContent': '6.8 g', 'proteinContent': '40.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '597.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.2 g'}

Title: Gordo's Best of the Best Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '½ pound bulk spicy pork sausage', '½ pound ground beef', '½ cup minced onion', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (32 ounce) jar tomato basil pasta sauce', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 cup dried parsley, divided', '¼ cup Italian seasoning', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons sea salt', '½ teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper', 'cooking spray', '3 cups ricotta cheese', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese (such as Cabot® Seriously Sharp)', '3 eggs, whisked', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook lasagna in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and rinse in cold water.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir sausage, beef, onion, and garlic in a large, deep skillet over medium heat until browned.
', 'Step 5: Stir tomato basil sauce, tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, 3/4 cup parsley, Italian seasoning, sugar, sea salt, and pepper into sausage mixture.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a simmer; reduce heat to low and cook, stirring occasionally, until flavors blend, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 9: Stir ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, Cheddar cheese, eggs, and remaining 1/4 cup parsley together in a large bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 10: Spread 1 cup tomato sauce in the bottom of the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 11: Cover sauce with a layer of lasagna noodles and spread the ricotta mixture over the noodles.
', 'Step 12: Spread a layer of tomato sauce over the ricotta and a layer of noodles over the tomato sauce.
', 'Step 13: Repeat the layering procedure 1 more time.
', 'Step 14: Spread remaining sauce over the final layer of noodles and top with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 15: Cover baking dish with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 16: Bake lasagna in the preheated oven until hot throughout and bubbling, 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Remove the aluminum foil and bake until cheese is golden, about 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 18: Cool for 10 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '448.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '45.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '97.3 mg', 'fatContent': '19.4 g', 'fiberContent': '5.3 g', 'proteinContent': '23.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '8.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '1230.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '12 g'}

Title: Johnsonville® Italian Sausage Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package Johnsonville® Italian Ground Sausage', '12 lasagna noodles, cooked and drained', '1 medium onion, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '4 cups marinara sauce', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 (15 ounce) containers ricotta cheese', '1 egg, beaten', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '2 cups fresh spinach, chopped', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']

', 'Step 2: Add marinara sauce and oregano; simmer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: In a bowl, combine ricotta cheese, egg, 1/4 cup Parmesan and spinach.
', 'Step 4: In a greased 13-in.
', 'Step 5: x 9-in.
', 'Step 6: x 2-in.
', 'Step 7: baking dish, spread 1 cup meat sauce.
', 'Step 8: Arrange 3 noodles over sauce.
', 'Step 9: Spread one-fourth of the ricotta cheese mixture over the noodles, top with 1 cup of meat sauce.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle with 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 11: Repeat process 3 times.
', 'Step 12: Top with remaining Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 13: Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 40 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Let stand for 10 minutes before cutting.
', 'Step 15: Serve.
']

Title: Grandma's Gnocchi
Ingredients: ['6 russet potatoes', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pinch salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Drop in potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain, cool slightly, and peel.
', 'Step 4: Season with salt, then mash potatoes with fork, masher, or in ricer.
', 'Step 5: Place in large bowl, and stir in egg and olive oil.
', 'Step 6: Knead in enough flour to make a soft dough.
', 'Step 7: On a floured surface, roll dough into a long rope.
', 'Step 8: Cut the rope into 1/2-inch pieces.
', 'Step 9: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Drop in gnocchi, and cook until they float to the top, about 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Serve with pasta sauce.
']

Title: Biga
Ingredients: ['¾ teaspoon active dry yeast', '½ cup warm water', '3 ½ cups unbleached bread flour', '1 ¼ cups cold water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the warm water in a small bowl, and sprinkle the yeast over the top.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until yeast has dissolved and is foamy, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Measure flour into a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Make a well in the center, and pour in the yeast mixture and cold water.
', 'Step 5: Use a sturdy spoon to mix it together until sticky and difficult to stir, but nevertheless thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 6: Cover and allow to ferment for 24 hours in the refrigerator before using.
', 'Step 7: Store in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
', 'Step 8: To use, rinse a measuring cup in cool water, scoop out the amount of starter needed, and bring to room temperature.
']

Title: Chicken Parmesan with Zucchini Pasta
Ingredients: ['4 zucchini, cut into spirals using a spiral slicer', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 cup marinara sauce', 'cooking spray', '4 slices mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 2: Place zucchini spirals in a colander and sprinkle 1 teaspoon salt and Italian seasoning over zucchini; toss to coat.
', 'Step 3: Set colander over a bowl to allow water from zucchini to drain.
', 'Step 4: Wrap chicken in plastic wrap and place on a work surface; pound into 1/4- to 1/2-inch thickness.
', 'Step 5: Remove plastic wrap and season chicken with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Heat marinara sauce in a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 7: Coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray and place over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 8: Cook chicken in the hot skillet until browned and no longer pink in the center, 4 to 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 9: Transfer chicken to the prepared baking sheet.
', "Step 10: Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 11: Place zucchini in the same nonstick skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir until tender yet firm to the bite, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Spoon marinara sauce over each chicken breast and top with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 13: Broil chicken in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Transfer zucchini to each serving plate and add chicken.
', 'Step 15: Spoon warm marinara over each piece of chicken and top with Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Chicken Breasts Lombardy
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '4 tablespoons butter, divided, or more as needed', '6 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '¾ cup Marsala wine', '1 cup low-sodium chicken broth', '¼ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 stalks green onions, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large, nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add mushrooms and cook, stirring constantly, just until tender, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove from the heat and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Cut each chicken breast in half lengthwise.
', 'Step 5: Place between 2 sheets of heavy-duty plastic wrap and flatten with a meat mallet or rolling pin to a thickness of 1/8 inch.
', 'Step 6: Dredge chicken pieces in flour.
', 'Step 7: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 9: Melt 1 to 2 tablespoons butter in the same skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 10: Add chicken in batches, adding more butter as needed, and cook until golden, 3 to 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 11: Transfer chicken to the prepared baking dish, overlapping to fit if necessary.
', 'Step 12: Reserve pan drippings in the skillet.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle mushrooms evenly over the chicken.
', 'Step 14: Add wine and broth to the skillet; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 15: Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered and stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Stir in salt and pepper.
', 'Step 17: Pour sauce over the chicken.
', 'Step 18: Combine mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses with green onions; sprinkle over the chicken.
', 'Step 19: Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear and cheese melts, 12 to 14 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '364.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '14.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '105.9 mg', 'fatContent': '14.3 g', 'fiberContent': '0.8 g', 'proteinContent': '35.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '395.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.5 g'}

Title: Lobster Risotto
Ingredients: ['¼ cup olive oil, divided', '2 onions, chopped', '6 cups chicken broth', '1 shallot, chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 ½ cups Arborio rice', '½ cup white wine', '1 tablespoon honey', '3 tablespoons butter', '1 cup light cream', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '¼ cup sherry', '2 cups cooked lobster meat', '½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onions until light brown and tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Bring chicken broth to a boil in a pot; reduce heat to low and keep at a simmer.
', 'Step 3: Heat remaining 2 tablespoons oil in a large, flat-bottom pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir shallot and garlic in the hot oil until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add Arborio rice to shallot mixture; cook and stir until rice begins to brown, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add wine and cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 7: Stir 1 cup chicken broth into rice mixture; cook, stirring constantly, until broth is absorbed.
', 'Step 8: Repeat adding broth, 1 cup at a time, until all the broth is used, stirring constantly until broth is absorbed each time, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Mix honey into onions and cook 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 10: Stir butter into rice mixture until melted.
', 'Step 11: Add cream and stir until rice mixture thickens, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Add paprika and cayenne pepper; stir well.
', 'Step 13: Add sherry and mix well.
', 'Step 14: Stir lobster meat into rice mixture and cook until heated through, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Mix Parmesan cheese into rice mixture until melted.
', 'Step 16: Add onion mixture and mix well; season with salt and pepper.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '565.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '59.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '87.3 mg', 'fatContent': '25.4 g', 'fiberContent': '1.8 g', 'proteinContent': '19.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '11 g', 'sodiumContent': '1392.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.2 g'}

Title: Chris's Incredible Italian Turkey Meatloaf
Ingredients: ['1 pound mild Italian turkey sausage, casings removed', '1 pound ground turkey', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 ½ cups rolled oats', '½ cup chopped onion', '½ cup milk', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon Italian-style seasoning', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 cups spaghetti sauce', '5 dashes hot pepper sauce', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '½ teaspoon liquid smoke flavoring']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, combine the ground turkey, sausage, eggs, oats, onion and milk.
', 'Step 3: Season with 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, Italian seasoning, garlic powder and salt.
', 'Step 4: Mix well and form into a loaf.
', 'Step 5: Place into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 6: In a separate small bowl, mix together the spaghetti sauce, hot sauce, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce and liquid smoke.
', 'Step 7: Smooth over the entire meatloaf.
', 'Step 8: Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes.
']

Title: Sicilian Christmas Pizza (Sfincione)
Ingredients: ['2 cups warm water (100 to 110 degrees F (40 to 45 degrees C))', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '4 ⅔ cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 large yellow onions, diced', 'salt to taste', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '9 oil-packed anchovy fillets, drained and 1 tablespoon oil reserved', '1 ½ cups marinara sauce', '¼ cup water', '¾ cup fine plain dry bread crumbs', '1 cup grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '6 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '3 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese', '3 ounces shredded aged provolone cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour warm water into the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle yeast on top and let bloom.
', 'Step 3: Add salt, sugar, olive oil, and flour.
', 'Step 4: Knead, scraping down sides as necessary, until dough is very elastic and sticky, 6 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 90 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Heat olive oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add onions and salt.
', 'Step 8: Saute, stirring occasionally, until onions soften, sweeten, and turn translucent, 6 or 7 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add red pepper flakes, black pepper, tomato paste, oregano, and anchovies; mix until anchovies dissolve.
', 'Step 10: Add marinara sauce, rinse out the container with water, and add the water.
', 'Step 11: Stir and let simmer on medium-low heat until flavors come together, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Combine bread crumbs and Pecorino Romano cheese in a bowl; toss together with a fork.
', 'Step 14: Add the reserved anchovy oil and 2 tablespoons olive oil.
', 'Step 15: Mix until bread crumbs are well moistened.
', 'Step 16: Generously coat a rimmed 13x18-inch sheet pan with up to 3 tablespoons olive oil.
', 'Step 17: Oil your hands and turn dough out onto pan.
', 'Step 18: Pull, stretch, and press it to the sides of the pan, pausing to let dough rest whenever it shrinks back too quickly.
', 'Step 19: Spoon sauce over the dough and spread up to about 1/2 inch from the edges.
', 'Step 20: Add mozzarella and provolone cheeses.
', 'Step 21: Sprinkle bread crumb mixture evenly on top; do not press down.
', 'Step 22: Drizzle remaining olive oil on top.
', 'Step 23: Bake in the preheated oven until pizza is well browned is bottom is cooked, about 35 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Bake for as as long as you can without the crumbs on top burning so that the crust cooks as much as possible.
', 'Step 25: Slide pizza onto a cooling rack to prevent the bottom from getting soggy.
', 'Step 26: Transfer to a cutting board once cooled.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '443.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '50.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '22.9 mg', 'fatContent': '20.1 g', 'fiberContent': '3.2 g', 'proteinContent': '14.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '780.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.1 g'}

Title: Nonna's Tuscan Salad Dressing
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '⅓ cup red wine vinegar', '½ cup water', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small clove garlic, minced', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon dried basil', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the mayonnaise, vinegar, water, lemon juice, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, garlic, oregano, basil, and black pepper into a blender.
', 'Step 2: Blend for 2 minutes, then pour into a salad dressing container, and refrigerate at least 1 hour.
', 'Step 3: Shake well before using.
']

Title: Butterscotch Budino
Ingredients: ['½ cup packed dark brown sugar', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ cup water', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 ½ cups heavy cream', '¾ cup milk', '1 large egg', '2 large egg yolks', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '1 teaspoon cornstarch', '1 tablespoon white rum']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine brown sugar, salt, and water in a deep, heavy-bottomed saucepan and place over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil; cook until the caramel is very dark, and bubbles appear, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Immediately turn off heat.
', 'Step 4: Carefully whisk in 2 tablespoons butter; pour in heavy cream and continue to stir.
', 'Step 5: Be careful, as the mixture may boil up in the pan.
', 'Step 6: Stir over medium-low heat until sugar dissolves.
', 'Step 7: Whisk in milk.
', 'Step 8: Whisk whole egg, egg yolks, and 2 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon cornstarch together in a mixing bowl.
', 'Step 9: Slowly whisk in 1 cup of the hot cream mixture to temper the egg mixture.
', 'Step 10: Whisk the egg mixture into the saucepan and increase heat to medium-high.
', 'Step 11: Bring to a simmer, and cook, whisking, until the mixture thickens, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Remove from heat and pour into a fine-mesh strainer set over a bowl to remove any lumps.
', 'Step 13: Whisk in rum.

Title: Italian Sausage - Tuscan Style

Title: Pasta With Shrimp, Oysters, and Crabmeat
Ingredients: ['½ cup butter', '½ cup olive oil', '3 tablespoons minced garlic', '1 ¼ cups chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 pinch crushed red pepper', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package bow tie pasta', '2 (10 ounce) containers shucked small oysters, drained', '¼ cup butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ¼ pounds peeled and deveined small shrimp', '1 pound fresh lump crabmeat', 'salt and pepper to taste', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt 1/2 cup butter and 1/2 cup olive oil together in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the garlic, and cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the 1 1/4 cups of parsley, and cook for 1 minute more.
', 'Step 4: Season with lemon juice, crushed red pepper, salt, and pepper; set aside.
', 'Step 5: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, bring a few cups of water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the oysters and turn off the heat.
', 'Step 9: Allow the oysters to stand for 3 minutes, then drain and set aside.
', 'Step 10: Melt 1/4 cup butter and 1 tablespoon olive oil together in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 11: Stir in the shrimp, and cook until they turn pink and begin to firm.
', 'Step 12: Add the crab meat and drained oysters; continue cooking until the shrimp have turned opaque in the center, and the crab is hot.
', 'Step 13: Toss the seafood with the drained pasta, and season to taste with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 14: Pour in the sauce, and toss gently to coat.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle with remaining 1/4 cup of chopped parsley before serving.
']

Title: Vegan Spaghetti and (Beyond) Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, drained, juice reserved', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 ¼ teaspoons salt, divided', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, divided', '1 pound meatless ground beef substitute (such as Beyond Meat® Beyond Beef Plant-Based Ground)', '1 tablespoon vegan bread crumbs', '1 ½ teaspoons dried parsley flakes', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon onion powder', '1 (12 ounce) package spaghetti']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dice tomatoes and return them to the can with their juice.
', 'Step 2: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Add onion and garlic to the hot oil and saute, stirring frequently, for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in diced tomatoes and their juice, tomato sauce, oregano, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper until well blended.
', 'Step 5: Bring sauce to a simmer and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 6: Let simmer while preparing meatballs.
', 'Step 7: Combine beef substitute with bread crumbs, parsley, remaining 3/4 teaspoon salt, remaining 1/4 teaspoon pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder in a bowl; mix until ingredients are well combined.
', 'Step 8: Roll the mixture into twelve 1 1/2-inch balls.
', 'Step 9: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, heat remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil in a deep skillet or Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 12: Add meatballs to the pan and saute, turning occasionally, until all sides are browned and a bit crisp, about 10 minutes total.
', 'Step 13: Reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 14: Pour simmering tomato sauce over the meatballs and mix.
', 'Step 15: Simmer sauce with meatballs for an additional 10 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Serve meatballs and sauce over spaghetti.
']

Title: Meaty Spaghetti Sauce

Title: Chef John's Panzanella
Ingredients: ['2 cups 1/2-inch stale bread cubes, or more to taste', '¼ cup olive oil, or to taste', '¼ cup finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or to taste', '1 pint cherry tomatoes, halved', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, or more to taste', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or more to taste', '½ teaspoon minced garlic, or to taste', '1 pinch white sugar', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 leaves fresh basil, thinly sliced, or more to taste']

['Step 1: Pour bread into a large skillet and drizzle with 1/4 cup olive oil, working in batches if necessary.

', 'Step 4: Cool completely.
', 'Step 5: Combine tomatoes, red wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, sugar, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl until well-mixed.
', 'Step 6: Cover bowl with plastic wrap and let sit at room temperature until flavors combine, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Toss basil into tomato mixture; add bread cubes and stir.

', 'Step 9: Season with salt and black pepper.
']

Title: Premium Pizza Crust
Ingredients: ['1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '1 ½ cups water', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon sea salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: OVERNIGHT COLD RISE METHOD: In a large bowl, dissolve yeast in water.
', 'Step 2: Stir in 2 cups of flour and salt; mix well.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the remaining flour, 1/2 cup at a time, beating well after each addition.
', 'Step 4: When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and supple, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Place dough in bowl dusted with flour cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight.
', 'Step 6: n SPONGE RISE METHOD: In a large bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup water.
', 'Step 7: Stir in 1/2 cup of flour; mix well.
', 'Step 8: Cover bowl with plastic wrap and let rise until foamy, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Blend in remaining water, flour and salt; beat well.
', 'Step 10: When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and supple, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Place dough in bowl dusted with flour and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 12: Let rise until doubled, about 2 to 3 hours.
', 'Step 13: n Deflate the dough and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 14: Divide the dough into two equal pieces.
', 'Step 15: Roll dough out to half of its final size.
', 'Step 16: Let rest for 10 to 15 minutes (while you prepare desired pizza toppings).
', 'Step 17: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 18: n Stretch out dough over your floured knuckles and spin/toss 2 to 3 times until desired size is achieved.
', "Step 19: Place dough on a baker's peel sprinkled with cornmeal or a lightly greased pizza pan.
", 'Step 20: Spread with desired toppings and bake on a pizza stone in preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes, or until golden brown.
', 'Step 21: Let baked pizza cool for 5 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Fennel Risotto
Ingredients: ['4 bulbs fennel', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 medium onion, chopped', '2 cups uncooked Arborio rice', '7 cups vegetable broth', '1 cup heavy cream', '6 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut the base off of the fennel bulbs, and cut a cone shape into the base to remove the core.
', 'Step 2: Slice the fennel vertically (lengthwise) into 1/4 inch thick slices.
', 'Step 3: Melt butter in a heavy-bottomed stock pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook onions and fennel in butter for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the rice; cook for another 2 minutes, stirring constantly, until lightly toasted.
', 'Step 6: Stir in 1 cup vegetable broth; continue stirring until liquid is almost completely absorbed.
', 'Step 7: Repeat this process with remaining broth, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 8: Incorporating the broth should take 15 to 20 minutes in all.
', 'Step 9: Stir in cream, 3 tablespoons Parmesan and parsley, and cook until rice is done and risotto is thick and creamy.
', 'Step 10: Season to taste with black pepper.
', 'Step 11: Divide risotto among 6 bowls, and sprinkle with remaining cheese.
']

Title: Baked Veal Milanese

Title: Fried Stuffed Squash Blossoms
Ingredients: ['12 fresh zucchini blossoms', '¾ cup soft goat cheese at room temperature', '1 egg yolk', '¼ cup shredded Gruyere cheese', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper, or to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 cup self-rising flour', '½ cup cornstarch', '¼ cup ice-cold water, or as needed', 'vegetable oil for frying', '1 teaspoon all-purpose flour, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Prepare a large bowl of ice-cold water.
', 'Step 3: Drop squash blossoms into the boiling water until slightly wilted, 30 to 45 seconds; transfer immediately into the cold water to chill.
', 'Step 4: Remove to paper towels to drain.
', 'Step 5: Mix goat cheese, egg yolk, Gruyere cheese, black pepper, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl; stir until smooth.
', 'Step 6: Spoon filling into a heavy, resealable 1-quart plastic bag, squeeze out the air, and seal the bag.
', 'Step 7: Cut a small corner off the bag.
', 'Step 8: Gently insert the cut corner of the bag all the way to the bottom of the open end of a blossom and pipe about 1 tablespoon of filling inside.
', 'Step 9: Pick up petals and drape them up over the filling, covering filling completely.
', 'Step 10: Fold any excess petals over the top of the filled blossom to keep them out of the way.
', 'Step 11: Refrigerate filled squash blossoms until cheese is set and firm, at least 30 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Combine self-rising flour and cornstarch in a mixing bowl; whisk in ice-cold water, a little at a time, until batter is smooth and has the thickness of pancake batter.
', 'Step 13: Pour vegetable oil to a depth of 1 inch into a heavy skillet (such as a cast iron pan) and place over medium heat.
', 'Step 14: Heat oil until a thermometer placed into the oil, not touching the bottom, reads 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 15: A drop of batter carefully dripped into the oil should sizzle immediately.
', 'Step 16: Remove squash blossoms from refrigerator and dust lightly with all-purpose flour on all sides.
', 'Step 17: Shake off excess flour and dip blossoms in batter.
', 'Step 18: Let excess batter drip off.
', 'Step 19: Gently lay coated squash blossoms in the hot oil on their sides; cook about 6 at a time until pale golden brown, 1 minute on the first side and 30 seconds to 1 minute on the remaining sides.
', 'Step 20: Let cool slightly before serving.
']

Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups milk', '1 (.25 ounce) envelope unflavored gelatin', '1 ½ cups whipping cream', '¼ cup white sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 quart fresh strawberries, quartered', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '¼ cup white sugar', '¼ cup water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour the milk into a bowl; sprinkle the gelatin over the milk.
', 'Step 2: Allow mixture to sit until the gelatin softens, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Combine the cream and 1/4 cup sugar in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the gelatin mixture; cook and stir until gelatin dissolves completely, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add the vanilla extract.
', 'Step 6: Pour the mixture evenly into ramekins; cover and chill at least 4 hours.
', 'Step 7: To make the strawberry sauce, combine the strawberries, 2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/4 cup sugar, and water in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: While the mixture cooks, crush the strawberries with a potato masher.
', 'Step 9: Simmer the sauce until the sugar has dissolved and the sauce has thickened, about 10 minutes; cool.
', 'Step 10: Remove chilled ramekins from the refrigerator shortly before serving.
', 'Step 11: Dip the bottoms of the cups in warm water to help loosen the custard.
', 'Step 12: Run a thin-bladed knife around the inner edge of each ramekin to loosen the dessert; turn onto a dessert plate to unmold.
', 'Step 13: Spoon strawberry sauce over panna cotta to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '345.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '29.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '86.4 mg', 'fatContent': '23.5 g', 'fiberContent': '2 g', 'proteinContent': '4.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '14.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '51.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '24.9 g'}

Title: Sugo Rosso (Red Sauce)
Ingredients: ['2 large tomatoes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '½ teaspoon salt', '4 large basil leaves, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a pot of water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook the tomatoes in boiling water until the skin begins to split, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 3: Immediately remove the tomatoes and plunge into ice water for several minutes to stop the cooking process.
', 'Step 4: Remove the tomatoes from the ice water; remove and discard the tomato skins.
', 'Step 5: Cut the tomatoes into chunks.
', 'Step 6: Blend the tomatoes in a food processor until smooth.
', 'Step 7: n Heat the oil in a saucepan over medium heat; warm the crushed garlic in the oil until fragrant, being careful not to brown, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add the blended tomatoes and salt; bring the mixture to a simmer and cook until the sauce thickens, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove the sauce from the heat and stir the basil through the sauce.
', 'Step 10: Allow the sauce to sit for a few minutes to allow the flavor from the basil to blend into the sauce.
']

Title: Easy Chicken Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package refrigerated cheese tortellini', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cubed', '3 tablespoons butter', '½ pound sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste', '2 cups heavy whipping cream', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add tortellini.
', 'Step 3: Cook, stirring occasionally, until tortellini float to the top and the filling is hot, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain.
', 'Step 5: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir chicken breast in hot oil until no longer pink in the center, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 7: Melt butter in another skillet over medium heat; cook and stir mushrooms and garlic powder until mushrooms begin to soften, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir heavy cream into mushrooms and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until slightly thickened, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add Parmesan cheese, parsley, and salt.
', 'Step 11: Continue to cook until cheese is melted, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 12: Stir tortellini and chicken into mushroom-cream sauce.
', 'Step 13: Simmer until heated through, about 2 minutes.
']

Title: Italian Tomato Cucumber Salad
Ingredients: ['4 tomatoes on the vine, cored and chopped', '½ red onion, thinly sliced', '½ seedless English cucumber, chopped', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or more if needed', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']

Title: Easy Weeknight Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients: ['8 ounces uncooked spaghetti', '⅓ cup Progresso® Italian style panko crispy bread crumbs', '⅓ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '4 each boneless skinless chicken breasts, flattened slightly', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 (18 ounce) can Progresso™ Recipe Starters™ fire roasted tomato cooking sauce', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook and drain spaghetti as directed on package.
', 'Step 2: In large resealable food-storage plastic bag, mix bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
', 'Step 3: Shake each chicken breast in bread crumb mixture; set aside.
', 'Step 4: In 10-inch skillet, heat 2 tablespoons vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Add chicken breasts; cook 6 to 10 minutes, turning once, until browned.
', 'Step 6: Pour cooking sauce around chicken; sprinkle chicken with remaining bread crumb mixture and mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 7: Heat to boiling.
', 'Step 8: Cover; reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 9: Cook 5 to 8 minutes or until juice of chicken is clear when center of thickest part is cut (at least 165°F) and cheese is melted.
', 'Step 10: Serve with spaghetti.
']

Title: Michael's Foccacia Bread
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon honey', '2 cups warm water', '1 tablespoon active dry yeast', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '½ cup diced onion', '5 cups all-purpose flour, or as needed', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons fresh chopped rosemary', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon kosher salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dissolve honey in the warm water in a large bowl, then sprinkle yeast over the top.
', 'Step 2: Let stand for 5 minutes until the yeast softens and begins to foam.
', 'Step 3: Stir in 1 tablespoon of salt, 1 tablespoon olive oil, onions, and 5 cups of flour until the dough comes together.
', 'Step 4: Knead on a well floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Lightly oil a large bowl, place the dough in the bowl and turn to coat with oil.
', 'Step 6: Cover with a damp cloth and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Preheat oven to 415 degrees F (215 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Place dough onto oiled baking sheet, and flatten to cover the whole sheet evenly.
', 'Step 9: Use the tips of your fingers to make indentations all over the dough spaced about 1 inch apart.
', 'Step 10: Drizzle the focaccia with 3 tablespoons olive oil, then sprinkle rosemary, Parmesan cheese, and remaining 1 tablespoon of kosher salt over the top.
', 'Step 11: Let rise for 10 minutes Bake in preheated oven 20 minutes until golden brown.
']

Title: Italian Wedding Cake Martini
Ingredients: ['2 fluid ounces vanilla vodka', '1 fluid ounce cranberry juice', '1 fluid ounce pineapple juice', '½ fluid ounce amaretto (almond flavored liqueur)', '½ fluid ounce white creme de cacao']

', 'Step 3: Strain into a chilled martini glass to serve.
']

Title: Easy Pepperoni Bread
Ingredients: ['1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '½ tablespoon dried basil leaves', '½ tablespoon dried minced onion flakes', '½ tablespoon dried oregano', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced pepperoni sausage', '1 (6 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 egg, lightly beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Allow frozen bread dough to thaw approximately 8 hours, or overnight, in the refrigerator.
', 'Step 2: Place dough in a large, lightly greased bowl.
', 'Step 3: Place bowl in a warm location, and allow dough to rise until doubled (2 to 3 hours).
', 'Step 4: Punch down dough.
', 'Step 5: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: On a lightly greased, large baking sheet, roll dough into an approximately 12x18 inch rectangle.
', 'Step 7: Brush dough lightly with olive oil.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle with basil, onion flakes and oregano.
', 'Step 9: Layer with pepperoni to within a half inch of the edges.
', 'Step 10: Top with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 11: Beginning with the longest edge, roll dough into a thin cylinder and seal seam.
', 'Step 12: Glaze with egg.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven 35 minutes, or until golden brown.
', 'Step 14: Cut into bite sized pieces to serve.
']

Title: Italian-Style Swiss Chard
Ingredients: ['1 bunch Swiss chard', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, coarsely chopped', '⅛ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', 'salt to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Wash the Swiss chard and cut into 1 inch strips.
', 'Step 2: Separate the thick and tough stalk sections from the upper leafy strips.
', 'Step 3: Bring the water and 1 tablespoon of salt to a boil in a large saucepan.
', 'Step 4: Cook the stalk sections in the salted boiling water for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the leafy strips and cook until the leaves are wilted and the stalks are fork tender, about 6 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 7: Heat the olive oil, garlic, and red pepper flakes in a large skillet over medium heat until aromatic, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add the drained Swiss chard, cook and stir for 2 minutes; season with salt to taste.
']

Title: Salsa di Noci
Ingredients: ['3 cups water, or as needed', '1 ½ cups walnuts', '2 cloves garlic, peeled', '1 pinch sea salt', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh marjoram', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh oregano', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '¾ cup heavy cream', '1 cup finely grated Pecorino Romano cheese', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'sea salt to taste', '1 (16 ounce) box dry fettuccine pasta', '½ bunch fresh chives, finely chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring water to a boil in a small saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Add walnuts and cook until they have softened slightly, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 4: n Combine garlic and 1 pinch sea salt in the bowl of a mortar and pestle.
', 'Step 5: Grind to create a thick paste.
', 'Step 6: Add walnuts, marjoram, thyme, and oregano.
', 'Step 7: Grind until combined and slightly creamy, but still coarse.
', 'Step 8: n Transfer the walnut mixture to a large bowl.
', 'Step 9: Slowly whisk in olive oil to form a thick emulsion.
', 'Step 10: Add heavy cream and Pecorino Romano cheese, whisk until combined.
', 'Step 11: Season with black pepper and sea salt to taste.
', 'Step 12: n Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 13: Stir in the fettuccine, return to a boil, and cook pasta over medium heat until cooked through but still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Drain.
', 'Step 15: n Toss walnut sauce with pasta.
', 'Step 16: Garnish with fresh chives.
']

Title: Spaghetti Tacos
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package angel hair pasta', '1 (28 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 (5.8 ounce) package crisp taco shells', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Once the water is boiling, stir in the angel hair pasta, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 5: Return the pasta to the pot, and pour the sauce over the pasta; mix thoroughly until reheated.
', 'Step 6: Place the taco shells into a microwave oven in a stack, and fan the stack out to a circular shape so the edges of the taco shells overlap slightly.
', 'Step 7: Cook on High until warmed and crisp, 30 to 45 seconds.
', 'Step 8: Fill the warm taco shells with the pasta mixture.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle pasta filling of each shell with about 1 teaspoon of Parmesan cheese to serve.
']

Title: Pasta Con Sarde (Pasta with Sardines)
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '¾ cup olive oil, divided', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (4 ounce) cans sardines packed in olive oil, drained', '1 cup seasoned bread crumbs', '⅓ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 pinch additional Parmesan cheese for serving']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add the spaghetti, and cook until al dente, or 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain, and rinse under cold water.
', 'Step 4: Toss with 1/4 cup olive oil, cover and keep warm.
', 'Step 5: Place another 1/4 cup olive oil in a skillet, and heat over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the garlic, and cook just until golden, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add the sardines, and cook 1 minute more.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the bread crumbs and 1/3 cup Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 9: If necessary to give the mixture a crumbly texture, stir in the remaining 1/4 cup of olive oil.
', 'Step 10: Stir in the parsley and pepper, and remove from the heat.
', 'Step 11: If desired, serve with additional Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Gingerbread Biscotti
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup vegetable oil', '1 cup white sugar', '3 eggs', '¼ cup molasses', '2 ¼ cups all-purpose flour', '1 cup whole wheat flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 ½ tablespoons ground ginger', '¾ tablespoon ground cinnamon', '½ tablespoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a cookie sheet.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, mix together oil, sugar, eggs, and molasses.
', 'Step 4: In another bowl, combine flours, baking powder, ginger, cinnamon, cloves, and nutmeg; mix into egg mixture to form a stiff dough.
', 'Step 5: Divide dough in half, and shape each half into a roll the length of the cookie.
', 'Step 6: Place rolls on cookie sheet, and pat down to flatten the dough to 1/2 inch thickness.
', 'Step 7: Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove from oven, and set aside to cool.
', 'Step 9: When cool enough to touch, cut into 1/2 inch thick diagonal slices.
', 'Step 10: Place sliced biscotti on cookie sheet, and bake an additional 5 to 7 minutes on each side, or until toasted and crispy.
']

Title: Andrea's Pasta Fagioli
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, quartered then halved', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (29 ounce) can tomato sauce', '5 ½ cups water', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '1 ½ teaspoons dried basil', '1 ½ teaspoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans', '1 (15 ounce) can navy beans', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pound ditalini pasta']

']

Title: Vegan Cacio e Pepe
Ingredients: ['½ cup raw cashews', '1 (8 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 teaspoon miso paste', '½ teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper, divided', '3 tablespoons nutritional yeast', '1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:

', 'Step 2: Set aside for at least 10 minutes.

', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, drain the cashews and blend until creamy.
', 'Step 6: Add nutritional yeast, miso, and 1/4 teaspoon coarse ground black pepper to the cashew cream.
', 'Step 7: Add a bit of pasta water to thin it out as needed.
', 'Step 8: Drain the spaghetti, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
', 'Step 9: Mix the spaghetti and sauce together, adding reserved pasta water if needed.

Title: Best Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '½ onion, finely chopped', '4 garlic cloves, minced', '1 (14 ounce) can Italian crushed tomatoes with basil', '½ cup chicken broth', '2 tablespoons red wine', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 pinch crushed red pepper flakes', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch white sugar', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh basil leaves', '1 pound rigatoni', '4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 eggs', '3 tablespoons milk', '1 cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', 'canola oil for frying', '¾ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Pour in olive oil and allow to get hot.
', 'Step 3: Add onion and garlic and stir for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add crushed tomatoes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in chicken broth, red wine, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon oregano, 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning, red pepper flakes, salt, pepper, and sugar.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, until sauce thickens, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in chopped basil at the last minute.
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil while sauce is cooking.
', 'Step 9: Cook rigatoni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, about 13 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain.
', 'Step 11: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 13: Place chicken breasts in a resealable plastic bag and flatten with a meat mallet to 1/4-inch thickness.
', 'Step 14: Prepare a breading station with 3 large mixing bowls: Combine flour, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper in the first bowl.
', 'Step 15: Stir together eggs and milk in the second bowl.
', 'Step 16: Combine bread crumbs, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, 1 teaspoon oregano, 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, and 1/4 teaspoon salt in the third bowl.
', 'Step 17: Dredge each piece of chicken in flour mixture and shake off excess.
', 'Step 18: Dip into egg mixture and coat with bread crumbs.
', 'Step 19: Repeat steps for remaining chicken and set on a plate.
', 'Step 20: Heat about 1 inch canola oil in a large cast iron skillet over medium-high heat until hot but not smoking.
', 'Step 21: Add breaded chicken in batches; cook until golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 22: Transfer chicken to the baking sheet.
', 'Step 23: Sprinkle the top with mozzarella cheese and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 24: Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165 degrees F (74 degrees C) and the cheeses have melted, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 25: Serve with marinara sauce and rigatoni.
']

Title: Homemade Chicken Cacciatore, Sicilian-Style
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 large green bell pepper, sliced thin', '1 teaspoon crushed garlic', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes, drained and juice reserved', '1 cup Burgundy wine', '1 ½ tablespoons Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon garlic salt', '1 whole chicken, cut into pieces', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt the butter in a large stockpot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook the onion, bell pepper, and garlic in the melted butter until they begin to soften, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add the tomatoes, wine, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper, and garlic salt; cook and stir until the mixture just begins to boil.
', 'Step 4: Reduce the heat to medium low; add the chicken and cook until the meat is tender enough to fall off the bone, about 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 5: Remove the bones and skin from the chicken, returning the meat to the pot.
', 'Step 6: Heat 3/4 cup of the reserved liquid from the tomatoes in the microwave until just warmed.
', 'Step 7: Stir the flour into the tomato liquid until thick.
', 'Step 8: Add to the stockpot and stir continually until the mixture begins to thicken.
', 'Step 9: Remove from heat and allow to sit for about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: While the chicken mixture rests, bring a large pot of lightly-salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Stir the spaghetti into the water and return to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Cook until the pasta is slightly tender but still firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Drain.
', 'Step 14: Ladle the chicken mixture over the drained spaghetti to serve.
']

Title: Italian Spinach Sausage Pie
Ingredients: ['1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '6 eggs', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry', '5 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '¾ cup ricotta cheese', '½ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon garlic powder', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 double crust ready-to-use pie crust', '1 tablespoon water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and stir in sausage.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir until sausage is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain excess grease.
', 'Step 5: Separate one egg and set yolk aside; beat egg white and remaining eggs in a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Fold spinach, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, salt, garlic powder, pepper, and sausage into eggs.
', 'Step 7: Line a 10-inch pie plate with bottom pastry; pour filling into crust.
', 'Step 8: Roll out remaining pastry to fit top of pie; place over filling.
', 'Step 9: Trim, seal, and flute edges; cut slits in pastry.
', 'Step 10: Beat water and remaining egg yolk in a small bowl; brush the mixture over top of pie.
', 'Step 11: Bake in preheated oven until crust is golden and filling is bubbly, 50 to 60 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Let stand 10 minutes before cutting.
']

Title: Easy Carbonara Sauce
Ingredients: ['6 ounces bacon, diced', '1 large onion, diced', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1 (12 ounce) jar Alfredo sauce', '½ cup water', '3 roma (plum) tomatoes - halved, seeded, and chopped']

['Step 1: Cook bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain all but about 2 tablespoons bacon drippings from skillet.

", 'Step 2: Spread a thin layer of butter on each slice of bread.

Title: Nipples of Venus (Capezzoli di Venere)
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup white sugar', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter, room temperature', '6 ounces dark chocolate, chopped', '14 ounces whole chestnuts', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup brandy', '8 ounces white chocolate, chopped', "⅓ cup confectioners' sugar", '2 teaspoons milk, or as needed', 'paper candy cups', '1 drop red food coloring, or more as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cream sugar and butter together with a spatula until light and creamy.
', 'Step 2: Set aside.
', 'Step 3: Heat an inch of water in a pot set over low heat.
', 'Step 4: Melt dark chocolate in a heat-proof bowl placed over the pot.
', 'Step 5: Stir with a small spatula.
', 'Step 6: Place chestnuts in a food processor; pulse on and off until very finely ground.
', 'Step 7: Add chestnuts to the sugar-butter mixture and stir until combined.
', 'Step 8: Add salt, cayenne pepper, vanilla extract, and brandy.
', 'Step 9: Stir well.
', 'Step 10: Pour in the melted chocolate and mix again until filling is well blended.
', 'Step 11: Scoop filling onto a silicone-lined baking sheet and smooth out if necessary.
', 'Step 12: Cover the balls in plastic wrap and refrigerate while you prepare the white chocolate coating.
', 'Step 13: Reserve about 20% of the white chocolate to stir in later.
', 'Step 14: Melt the rest in a heat-proof bowl over a pot of simmering water until an instant-read thermometer inserted in to the chocolate reads 105 degree F (41 degrees C).
', 'Step 15: Add the reserved white chocolate and stir until melted.
', 'Step 16: Place 1 chocolate truffle on a fork and hold it up above the white chocolate coating.
', 'Step 17: Spoon on the white chocolate until ball is well coated.
', 'Step 18: Use another fork to push the truffle onto a lined baking sheet.
', 'Step 19: Repeat with the remaining truffles and coating.
', 'Step 20: Place the bowl of coating back over hot water if it chocolate starts to harden.
', "Step 21: Mix confectioners' sugar with enough milk to make a very thick paste that will hold together well.
", 'Step 22: Dye it pink with red food coloring.
', 'Step 23: Transfer into a piping bag and pipe a small dot on top of each truffle.
', 'Step 24: Serve truffles in paper candy cups.
']

Title: Italian Rib Eye

', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.

Title: Easy Chicken Parm
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '1 (16 ounce) package skinless, boneless chicken breasts (such as Perdue®)', '4 slices Fresh Mozzarella Cheese BC', '2 cups tomato sauce, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray a baking pan with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Place chicken on the prepared pan.
', 'Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, flipping chicken after 12 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from the oven, add desired amount of sauce, and top each breast with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 6: Bake until cheese is melted and chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 12 more minutes.
', 'Step 7: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Cinnamon Hazelnut Biscotti
Ingredients: ['¾ cup butter', '1 cup white sugar', '2 large eggs eggs', '1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¾ teaspoon baking powder', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 cup hazelnuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F(175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a cookie sheet or line with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl, cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 4: Beat in eggs and vanilla.
', 'Step 5: Sift together the flour, cinnamon, baking powder, and salt; mix into the egg mixture.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the hazelnuts.
', 'Step 7: Shape dough into two equal logs approximately 12 inches long.
', 'Step 8: Place logs on baking sheet, and flatten out to about 1/2 inch thickness.
', 'Step 9: Bake for about 30 minutes in preheated oven, or until edges are golden and the center is firm.
', 'Step 10: Remove from oven to cool on the pans.
', 'Step 11: When loaves are cool enough to handle, use a serrated knife to slice the loaves diagonally into 1/2 inch thick slices.
', 'Step 12: Return the slices to the baking sheet.
', 'Step 13: Bake for an additional 10 minutes, turning over once.
', 'Step 14: Cool completely, and store in an airtight container at room temperature.
']

Title: Panzanella Salad
Ingredients: ['6 cups day old Italian bread, torn into bite-size pieces', '⅓ cup olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '¼ cup olive oil', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '4 medium ripe tomatoes, cut into wedges', '¾ cup sliced red onion', '10 basil leaves, shredded', '½ cup pitted and halved green olives', '1 cup fresh mozzarella, cut into bite-size pieces']

', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, toss bread with 1/3 cup olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic.
', 'Step 3: Lay bread on a baking sheet, and toast in the preheated oven until golden, about 5 to 10 minutes; allow to cool slightly.
', 'Step 4: While the bread is in the oven, whisk together 1/4 cup of olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
', 'Step 5: Gently toss together the bread, tomatoes, onion, basil, olives, and mozzarella cheese.
