Title: Caprese Chicken
Ingredients: ['4 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 cup Italian salad dressing', '1 tablespoon Italian herb seasoning', '1 tablespoon chicken seasoning (such as Grill Mates® Montreal Chicken Seasoning)', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '4 (1/2 inch thick) slices fresh mozzarella cheese', '4 (1/2 inch thick) slices tomato', '4 large fresh basil leaves', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place chicken breasts, Italian salad dressing, Italian herb seasoning, and chicken seasoning into a resealable plastic bag, knead bag several times to coat chicken with marinade, and squeeze air from the bag.
', 'Step 2: Seal and refrigerate 4 to 6 hours.
', 'Step 3: Preheat oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Pour canola oil into a large cast-iron or ovenproof skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Heat the oil until a small droplet of water pops in the oil.
', 'Step 6: Remove chicken breasts from marinade and discard used marinade.
', 'Step 7: Place chicken breasts into hot oil, fry for 2 minutes, and flip chicken.
', 'Step 8: Place skillet into the preheated oven and bake until chicken is no longer pink inside and the juices run clear, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Top each chicken breast with a slice of mozzarella cheese and a tomato slice.
', 'Step 10: Return to oven and bake until cheese has melted, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Transfer chicken breasts to a serving platter and top each with a basil leaf and a drizzle of balsamic vinegar.
']

Title: Italian Chicken with Garlic and Lemon
Ingredients: ['15 chicken thighs', '8 large potatoes, peeled and quartered', '1 cup vegetable oil, or as needed', '½ cup wine vinegar', '5 lemons, juiced', '10 cloves crushed garlic', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '1 onion, minced', 'salt and pepper to taste']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Arrange the chicken pieces in a 10x15-inch enameled roasting pan.

Title: Baked Pasta with Sausage and Baby Portobello Mushroom White Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 pound penne pasta', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 pound baby portobello mushrooms, sliced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 ½ cups heavy cream', '¼ teaspoon salt, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon cracked black pepper', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded whole milk mozzarella']
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: Preheat the oven's broiler and set the oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source.
", 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly-salted water to a boil; cook the penne uncovered, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and return to the pot.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon of the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir the sausage in the hot oil until crumbly and no longer pink, about 7 minutes: remove from the skillet, leaving the fat in the pan, and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Pour the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil into the skillet and add the mushrooms and garlic.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir until the mushrooms have browned and begun to release their liquid, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 8: Return the sausage to the skillet and pour in the heavy cream.
', 'Step 9: Season with salt and pepper and return to a simmer, cooking until the sauce begins to thicken, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 10: Pour the sauce over the pasta and stir.
', 'Step 11: Stir in 1/2 cup mozzarella and Parmesan.
', 'Step 12: Pour into a 9x13-inch baking dish and sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 13: Broil in the preheated oven until the mozzarella cheese is bubbly and golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes.
']

Title: Decorated Focaccia Bread
Ingredients: ['4 ½ cups unbleached all-purpose flour, divided', '1 tablespoon active dry yeast', '2 teaspoons dried Italian herbs', '1 ¼ teaspoons kosher salt', '1 cup warm water (110 degrees F (43 degrees C))', '1 cup warm milk (110 degrees F (43 degrees C))', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', '5 each cherry tomatoes, halved', '4 spears pickled asparagus, drained', '3 each jarred roasted red peppers, drained and sliced', '3 each mini bell peppers, sliced', '3 each Kalamata olives, pitted and halved', '2 sprigs fresh dill', '1 sprig fresh sage', '1 sprig fresh parsley', '1 sprig fresh basil', '1 tablespoon pine nuts', '1 tablespoon pepitas', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or as desired', '1 pinch flaked sea salt to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine 2 cups flour, yeast, dried Italian herbs, and salt in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment.
', 'Step 2: Add warm water, warm milk, and 1/4 cup oil; beat until well combined, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Mix in remaining flour, 1/2 cup at a time, switching to a wooden spoon when needed, until a soft and sticky dough is formed.
', 'Step 4: Scrape down the sides of the bowl, drizzle the sides with 1 tablespoon oil, and cover loosely with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 5: Let rise at room temperature until doubled in size, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Oil an 11x17-inch baking sheet.
', 'Step 7: Turn the dough out onto the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 8: Gently spread and flatten dough to fit the entire sheet.
', 'Step 9: Press your fingers into the dough to make light dimples over the entire surface.
', 'Step 10: Let rest, uncovered, at room temperature for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Place an oven rack in the lower third of the oven and preheat to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Decorate dough by gently pressing down cherry tomatoes, asparagus, red peppers, bell peppers, olives, dill, sage, parsley, basil, pine nuts, and pepitas.
', 'Step 13: Brush a thin layer of olive oil over the top and sprinkle with salt.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Reduce temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and continue to bake until golden and bread springs back when gently pressed, about 20 more minutes.
', 'Step 16: Let cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then carefully slip out onto a cooling rack.
', 'Step 17: Cool and serve at room temperature.
']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Season ground beef with garlic powder.
', 'Step 3: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir ground beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 6: Pour spaghetti sauce, tomato sauce, and oregano into a large saucepan.
', 'Step 7: Set aside.
', 'Step 8: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 9: Saute garlic and onions until softened and translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Place cooked onion-garlic mixture and cooked ground beef into the sauce mixture.
', 'Step 11: Cover and let simmer for 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Combine mozzarella and provolone cheeses in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 13: Mix ricotta cheese, eggs, milk, and 1/2 teaspoon oregano together in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 14: Layer a 9x13-inch baking pan with just enough sauce to cover the bottom of the pan.
', 'Step 15: Lay three lasagna noodles in the pan over the sauce.
', 'Step 16: Cover with more sauce, then with ricotta mixture then sprinkle with mozzarella/provolone mixture; repeat layering.
', 'Step 17: Finish with a layer of noodles and remaining sauce.
', 'Step 18: Sprinkle top with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 19: Bake, covered, in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Uncover and continue to bake until cheese is melted and top is golden, about 15 minutes more.
']

Title: Easy Butternut Squash Ravioli
Ingredients: ['1 cup mashed, cooked butternut squash', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '½ cup mascarpone cheese', '1 egg yolk', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (16 ounce) package round wonton wrappers', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 clove garlic, unpeeled', 'chopped fresh sage to taste', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place cooked squash into a mixing bowl.
', 'Step 2: Add salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 3: Stir in mascarpone cheese, egg yolk, and 1/3 cup Parmesan cheese, mixing until the filling is smoothly combined.
', 'Step 4: Place a wonton wrapper onto a working surface.
', 'Step 5: Wet the tip of a finger in water, and run it all along the outer edge of the wonton skin to moisten.
', 'Step 6: Place about 1 teaspoon of filling in the center of the wonton.
', 'Step 7: Fold the wonton in half to make a half-moon shape, and press the edges to seal.
', 'Step 8: Repeat with the remaining wonton wrappers.
', 'Step 9: Place a deep skillet over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 10: Stir in butter and unpeeled clove of garlic.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, bring a saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Drop the filled raviolis into the boiling water, a few at a time, and cook until they float to the top, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Drain the raviolis, and transfer them to the skillet.
', 'Step 14: Turn the heat under the skillet up to medium-high, and cook just until the raviolis are infused with garlic flavor, about 2 or 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle with chopped sage, more black pepper, and extra Parmesan cheese to taste.
']

Title: Fresh Tomato Shrimp Pasta
Ingredients: ['8 ounces dry fettuccine pasta', '3 cloves garlic', '½ sweet onion, cut into wedges', '3 tablespoons fresh oregano leaves', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 medium tomatoes, chopped', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 cup spinach leaves', '1 pound cooked shrimp - peeled and deveined', '8 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, diced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add the pasta, and cook for 8 minutes, or until tender.
', 'Step 3: Drain.
', 'Step 4: In the container of a food processor, combine the garlic, onion and oregano.
', 'Step 5: Pulse until finely chopped.
', 'Step 6: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add the onion mixture; cook and stir until fragrant and almost golden.
', 'Step 8: Mix in the tomatoes, basil, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Simmer for about 5 minutes while the pasta is cooking, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 10: Mix in spinach until it wilts, then just before the pasta is done, stir in the shrimp.
', 'Step 11: Cook until heated through.
', 'Step 12: Toss with pasta in a large serving bowl, and mix in mozzarella cheese.
']

Title: Authentic Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['½ cup white sugar', '3 eggs, separated', '2 tablespoons brandy', '2 cups brewed espresso, cooled, divided', '2 (8 ounce) packages mascarpone cheese', '1 pinch white sugar', '30 ladyfingers (such as Savoiardi®)', '3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Beat 1/2 cup sugar, egg yolks, brandy, and 1 tablespoon espresso together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add mascarpone cheese to sugar-egg mixture and beat until well blended, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Beat egg whites and a pinch sugar in a bowl using an electric mixer until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 4: Gently fold egg whites into mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 5: Pour remaining espresso into a shallow dish.
', 'Step 6: Dip 1 side of each ladyfinger into the espresso and arrange on a serving platter in 2 horizontal rows of 6 with 2 1/2 ladyfingers in opposite direction on both ends to form a rectangular shape.
', 'Step 7: Spread 1/2 of the mascarpone mixture onto the ladyfinger layer and dust with 1/2 of the cocoa powder.
', 'Step 8: Repeat with remaining ladyfingers dipped in espresso, mascarpone mixture, and cocoa powder.
', 'Step 9: Refrigerate tiramisu until ladyfingers have softened from the espresso and mascarpone mixture, 2 to 3 hours.
']

Title: Italian Beef Sandwiches
Ingredients: ['4 pounds boneless rump roast', '6 cloves garlic, slivered', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon coarsely ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon crushed red pepper', '1 tablespoon dried oregano']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Make slits in roast with a sharp knife, and insert garlic slivers.
', 'Step 3: Place roast in a pan not much larger than the roast.
', 'Step 4: Pour water into pan, and season roast with salt, black pepper, red pepper, and oregano.
', 'Step 5: Cover, and bake in preheated oven for 2 hours, basting occasionally.
', 'Step 6: Remove from oven, and let cool in roasting pan.
', 'Step 7: Meat should be very rare.
', 'Step 8: Wrap tightly and refrigerate overnight.
', 'Step 9: The next day, Remove roast from pan, and slice as thinly as possible.
', 'Step 10: Add a little water to roasting pan, and heat on stovetop, but do not boil.
', 'Step 11: Stir to blend seasonings.
', 'Step 12: When au jus is hot, add sliced beef just long enough to heat through.
', 'Step 13: Serve on crusty Italian bread with au jus available for dipping.
']

Title: Easy and Delicious Homemade Ricotta Cheese
Ingredients: ['8 ½ cups whole milk', '⅓ cup lemon juice', '1 teaspoon salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour milk into a saucepan set over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Heat milk until it registers 194 degrees F (90 degrees C) on an instant-read thermometer, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 4: Stir lemon juice and salt slowly into warmed milk.
', 'Step 5: Let stand until milk curdles, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Line a fine-mesh strainer with cheesecloth and place it over a large bowl.
', 'Step 7: Pour milk mixture carefully into the lined strainer.
', 'Step 8: Let stand until most of the liquid has drained off the ricotta, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Discard drained liquid.
']

Title: Italian Chicken Sausage and Peppers
Ingredients: ['1 red bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces', '1 yellow bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces', '1 orange bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces', '1 green bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces', '1 large sweet onion, cut into thin wedges', '2 cups grape tomatoes', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '¼ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ teaspoon salt, divided', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, divided', '1 (8 ounce) baguette, thinly sliced', '1 (12 ounce) package cooked Italian chicken sausage, sliced diagonally into thirds', '1 tablespoon snipped fresh oregano']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Arrange 2 racks in middle and upper thirds of oven and preheat to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line two 10x15-inch baking pans with foil.
', 'Step 3: Toss bell peppers, onion, and tomatoes together in a large bowl with 1 tablespoon oil, balsamic vinegar, Italian seasoning, 1/8 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon black pepper.
', 'Step 4: Transfer to one of the prepared pans.
', 'Step 5: Roast in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, drizzle bread slices with remaining olive oil and sprinkle with remaining salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 7: Arrange on the other prepared pan.
', 'Step 8: Remove the vegetables from the oven; push to one side of the pan.
', 'Step 9: Add sausage to the exposed portion of the pan.
', 'Step 10: Roast until vegetables are tender and sausage is heated through, 10 to 15 minutes more, adding the pan with bread in the last 5 minutes of roasting time.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle vegetables and sausage with oregano and serve with bread.
']

Title: That's-a Meatloaf
Ingredients: ['2 pounds ground beef', '2 eggs', '½ cup tomato sauce', '¾ cup fresh crumbled bread', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '6 slices ham', '6 medium slices mozzarella cheese']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, combine the beef, eggs, tomato sauce, bread crumbs, cheese, garlic, parsley and oregano.
', 'Step 3: Mix well and form into an 8x10 inch rectangle.

', 'Step 5: Roll up jelly-roll style so that you end up with a rolled loaf about 5x8 inches.

', 'Step 7: Drain excess fat.
']

Title: Italian Love Cake

Title: New York Italian Pizza Dough
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '2 teaspoons salt', '4 ½ cups bread flour', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '¼ cup bread flour, or more if needed', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour the warm water into the pan of a bread machine, sprinkle in the salt, and add the flour to the pan so the flour sits on top of the water.
', 'Step 2: Make a hole in the top of the flour, and spoon the yeast into the hole.
', 'Step 3: Let the mixture sit for 20 minutes to moisten the flour.
', 'Step 4: Set the bread machine to the knead setting, and knead the dough for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Turn the dough out onto a floured surface, and knead in 1/4 cup more flour or as needed, adding the flour about 2 tablespoons at a time, to make a wet, sticky, but elastic dough.
', "Step 6: The dough should be u0022as soft as a baby's bottom.
", 'Step 7: u0022 Form the dough into a round shape.
', 'Step 8: n Wipe the inside of a large bowl with olive oil, and place the round ball of dough into the bowl.
', 'Step 9: Turn the dough over a couple of times so the dough picks up a thin coating of oil.
', 'Step 10: Cover with a cloth, and refrigerate the dough for 10 hours or overnight.
', 'Step 11: n The next day, allow the dough to come to room temperature before rolling out on a floured surface and adding toppings as desired.
', 'Step 12: Roll the dough out thin with a thicker edge before adding toppings.
', 'Step 13: n Place a pizza stone into oven, dust it with a little flour, and preheat oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Bake the pizza on the stone in the preheated oven until the bottom of the crust is browned, 6 to 8 minutes.
']

Title: Melanzana alla Parmigiana (Perfect Eggplant Parmigiana)
Ingredients: ['½ cup extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed', '6 eggplants, trimmed and cut into 1/2-inch thick slices', 'salt to taste', '1 ⅓ cups crushed tomatoes in puree', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or more to taste', '2 cloves garlic', '1 bunch fresh basil, divided', '18 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, drained and sliced', 'dried oregano, to taste', '4 ounces grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat about 1 inch extra-virgin olive oil in a deep skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Pat eggplant slices dry with a paper towel and fry eggplant in batches in the hot oil until golden, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 3: Transfer eggplant to a paper towel-lined plate using a slotted spoon; season with salt.
', 'Step 4: Combine tomato puree (passata), 1 tablespoon olive oil, garlic, salt, and 4 basil leaves in a saucepan; simmer over medium heat for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove garlic from sauce.
', 'Step 6: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Lightly grease a baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Place a layer of fried eggplant in the baking dish and cover with a layer of tomato sauce.
', 'Step 9: Top with a layer of mozzarella cheese, oregano, Parmesan cheese, and chopped basil leaves, in that order.
', 'Step 10: Continue layering in the same order with remaining ingredients, ending with a layer of mozzarella cheese and a drizzle of olive oil.
', 'Step 11: Bake in the preheated oven until heated through and cheeses are melted, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Let stand a few minutes before slicing.
']

Title: Chef John's Antipasto Pasta Salad
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package fusilli pasta', '1 clove garlic, finely crushed', '1 anchovy fillet', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '½ cup red wine vinegar, or more to taste', '1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon dried thyme', '1 cup extra-virgin olive oil', '⅓ cup julienned red onion', '⅓ cup julienned jalapeno pepper', '⅓ cup julienned pickled pepperoncini peppers', '½ cup julienned fire-roasted red pepper', '1 cup quartered baby artichoke hearts', '½ cup sliced black olives', '½ cup sliced green olives', '¼ pound salami, julienned', '¼ pound pepperoni, julienned', '3 ounces deli-style ham, julienned', '¼ pound provolone cheese, julienned', '¼ cup freshly chopped Italian parsley', '1 pint cherry tomatoes, quartered']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of well salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook fusilli in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain thoroughly in a colander, but do not rinse; stir to release heat.
', 'Step 4: Allow to cool in the colander for 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: While pasta cools, add garlic and anchovy to a large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 6: Use a whisk or fork to crush the anchovy and garlic into a paste.
', 'Step 7: Add Dijon mustard, mayonnaise, vinegar, salt, pepper, oregano, and thyme and whisk to combine.
', 'Step 8: Slowly drizzle in olive oil, whisking constantly, until dressing is smooth, thick, and coats the back of a spoon.
', 'Step 9: Pour cooled pasta into the bowl of dressing and toss with a large spoon until well coated.
', 'Step 10: Stir red onion, jalapeno, pepperoncini, red pepper, artichokes, black olives, green olives into the salad.
', 'Step 11: Add salami, pepperoni, and ham; mix thoroughly.
', 'Step 12: Add Provolone cheese.
', 'Step 13: Mix with a spoon thoroughly to combine.
', 'Step 14: Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate until well chilled, 3 to 12 hours.
', 'Step 15: Remove from the refrigerator, add chopped parsley and tomatoes, and mix thoroughly.
', 'Step 16: Taste for seasoning and adjust if needed.
']

Title: Italian Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['6 egg yolks', '1 cup white sugar, divided', '1 pound mascarpone cheese', '6 egg whites, stiffly beaten', '¼ cup heavy cream', '3 tablespoons kirschwasser', '1 ¼ cups strong brewed coffee, cold', '25 ladyfingers', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium bowl beat together the egg yolks and 1/3 cup of sugar.

', 'Step 6: Place ladyfingers in a single layer in a 9 x 13 inch glass baking dish.
', 'Step 7: Spread a layer of cheese mixture over the ladyfingers; repeat layers, ending with cheese mixture.
', 'Step 8: Cover and refrigerate for several hours.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle with cocoa just before serving.
']

Title: Authentic Italian Rice Pudding
Ingredients: ['6 cups whole milk', '¾ cup Arborio rice', '¾ cup white sugar, divided', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '2 egg yolks', '1 cup heavy whipping cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix milk, rice, 1/2 of the sugar, vanilla extract, and salt together in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Blend remaining sugar with whole eggs and yolks in a bowl to make a creamy custard.
', 'Step 4: Reduce heat of the milk mixture.
', 'Step 5: Let simmer, uncovered, until thickened, 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Fold in the custard.
', 'Step 7: Heat until thickened again, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 8: Beat cream in a chilled glass or metal bowl with an electric mixer until soft peaks form.
', 'Step 9: Remove the milk and custard mixture from heat.
', 'Step 10: Let cool, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Fold in the whipped cream.
', 'Step 12: Pour pudding into a serving dish, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, at least 2 hours.
']

Title: Sausage-Stuffed Eggplant
Ingredients: ['1 (1 1/2 pound) eggplant, halved lengthwise', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ pound bulk Italian sausage', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon dried Italian seasoning', '⅛ teaspoon black pepper', '2 tablespoons dry bread crumbs', '2 cups spaghetti sauce, divided', '1 cup mozzarella cheese, divided', '1 egg, beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Brush cut sides of eggplant with olive oil and place, cut-side up onto a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Roast in preheated oven for 30 minutes, then remove and allow to cool slightly.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, brown the Italian sausage in a skillet over medium-high heat; drain off the grease.
', 'Step 5: Place into a mixing bowl, and season with garlic powder, Italian seasoning, and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Stir in bread crumbs, 1/2 cup of spaghetti sauce, 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese, and the beaten egg; mix well.
', 'Step 7: Once the roasted eggplant has cooled enough to handle, scoop out the flesh to within 1/2-inch of the skin to create a shell.
', 'Step 8: Roughly chop the eggplant meat, and fold into the sausage mixture.
', 'Step 9: Divide evenly among the two eggplant shells, and sprinkle with remaining mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 10: Bake in preheated oven until the filling has set, and the cheese is bubbly and golden-brown, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 11: While the eggplant is baking, warm the remaining spaghetti sauce in a saucepan over medium-low heat to serve with the eggplant.
']

Title: Easy Lasagna III
Ingredients: ['10 ounces lasagna noodles', '1 ½ pounds lean ground beef', '3 cups cottage cheese', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '2 (6.5 ounce) cans tomato sauce']

', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add lasagna noodles and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.

', 'Step 5: Using a fork, mix cottage cheese, eggs, garlic powder, parsley, salt and pepper.

Title: Ricotta Cookies III
Ingredients: ['1 cup butter', '2 cups white sugar', '2 eggs', '16 ounces ricotta cheese', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '4 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '½ cup milk', '½ teaspoon butter', '½ teaspoon shortening', "4 cups confectioners' sugar", '1 tablespoon lemon extract', '½ cup colored candy sprinkles']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease cookie sheets.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, cream together the 1 cup of butter and sugar.
', 'Step 4: Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the ricotta cheese and vanilla.
', 'Step 5: Combine the flour, baking powder and baking soda, stir into the ricotta mixture.
', 'Step 6: Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet.
', 'Step 7: Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 8: Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
', 'Step 9: To make the frosting warm the milk, 1/2 teaspoon of butter and shortening, in a small saucepan.
', 'Step 10: Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally until solids are melted.
', "Step 11: Remove from heat and gradually stir in the confectioners' sugar and lemon extract.
", 'Step 12: Dip each cookie into the icing then dip in colored sugar or sprinkles.

Title: Italian Sausage and Mushroom Lasagna with Bechamel Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 serving cooking spray', '½ pound bulk mild Italian sausage', '3 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 cups low-fat milk', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 egg', '1 (15 ounce) container part-skim ricotta cheese', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '2 (24 ounce) jars marinara sauce, divided', '1 (9 ounce) package no-boil lasagna noodles, divided', '1 cup chopped cremini mushrooms, divided', '1 (16 ounce) package shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese, divided', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Place the sausage in a skillet over medium heat and cook until browned and crumbly, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain the sausage and set aside.
', 'Step 5: To make bechamel sauce, melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat and whisk in the flour.
', 'Step 6: Allow the flour and butter to cook until light and foamy, about 2 minutes, whisking constantly; whisk in milk, a little at a time.
', 'Step 7: Whisk in the salt and nutmeg and bring the sauce to a bare simmer, whisking constantly until thickened, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove sauce from the heat and set aside.
', 'Step 9: In a bowl, beat the egg and stir in the ricotta cheese and parsley until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 10: To assemble lasagna, pour about 1 1/2 cup of marinara sauce into the bottom of the prepared baking dish and top the sauce with 4 lasagna noodles, overlapping if necessary.
', 'Step 11: On the noodles, layer 1/3 of the ricotta mixture, followed by 1/3 of the cooked sausage, 1/3 cup of mushrooms, 1/4 of the bechamel sauce, 1 cup of the mozzarella cheese, 1/8 cup of the Parmesan cheese and 1 more cup of marinara sauce.
', 'Step 12: Repeat the layers twice more, ending with a final layer of noodles topped with a layer of marinara sauce, bechamel sauce, the remaining mozzarella cheese, and remaining Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 13: Cover the dish with foil.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and the noodles are tender, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 15: Remove foil and bake until the top cheese layer is browned, about 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 16: Allow the lasagna to stand for 10 minutes before cutting.
']

Title: Meat and Spinach Ravioli Filling
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '1 ½ cups fresh spinach', '5 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 ¼ tablespoons dried parsley', '¼ cup bread crumbs', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 large egg', '½ teaspoon garlic salt', '1 pinch black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and stir in the ground beef.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir until the beef is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink.
', 'Step 3: Drain and discard any excess grease.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the spinach and cook until wilted, about 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from heat and allow to cool for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Transfer the beef mixture to a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Add the Parmesan, parsley, bread crumbs, olive oil, egg, garlic salt, and pepper and mix well.
', 'Step 8: Run the filling through a grinder until smooth (or puree in a food processor until smooth).
', 'Step 9: The filling can be kept in the refrigerator for up to four days or in the freezer for up to three months.
']

Title: Traditional Italian Limoncello
Ingredients: ['10 lemons', '1 quart 95% alcohol (190 proof)', '6 cups water', '4 cups white sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Zest lemons, making sure to get the outermost part of the skin and avoid the white pith.
', 'Step 2: Place lemon zest in a glass bowl and cover with alcohol.
', 'Step 3: Cover and let infuse at room temperature until yellowish in color, about 7 days.
', 'Step 4: Bring water and sugar to the boil in a saucepan, stirring until sugar dissolves.
', 'Step 5: Remove syrup from heat and let cool, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Pour alcohol into the syrup through a fine-mesh strainer; discard lemon zest.
', 'Step 7: Stir well.
', 'Step 8: Pour limoncello into thick, freezer-safe glass bottles.
', 'Step 9: Store in the freezer for at least 2 weeks before serving.
']

Title: Italian Lasagna
Ingredients: ['9 thick slices bacon, diced', '1 onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon fennel seed', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 ½ teaspoons Italian seasoning', '2 (28 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '2 pounds Italian sausage', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '2 pints part-skim ricotta cheese', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '⅓ cup milk', '8 slices provolone cheese', '6 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Brown bacon and onion in a large pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in fennel seed, 1 teaspoon oregano, Italian seasoning, and tomato sauce.
', 'Step 3: Cover, and simmer on low for 4 to 6 hours, or until thick.
', 'Step 4: Brown sausage links in a large skillet.
', 'Step 5: Drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 6: Cut into 1 inch pieces.
', 'Step 7: Mix together ricotta cheese, egg, milk, parsley, and 1 teaspoon oregano in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 8: Layer 1 cup of sauce on the bottom of a 9 x 13 inch pan.
', 'Step 9: Layer with 1/3 uncooked lasagna noodles, 1/2 ricotta cheese mixture, 1/2 sausage pieces, 1/3 mozzarella, and 1/2 provolone cheese.
', 'Step 10: Top with 1/3 sauce.
', 'Step 11: Repeat layers.
', 'Step 12: Top with remaining 1/3 noodles.
', 'Step 13: Spread remaining sauce over the top, and sprinkle with remaining 1/3 mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 14: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 1/2 hours.
']

Title: Chef John's Chicken Under a Brick
Ingredients: ['1 (3 1/2) pound whole chicken, wings removed', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch herbes de Provence, or to taste', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed', '2 heavy clay bricks, wrapped tightly in aluminum foil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Use kitchen shears to cut down both sides of the backbone.
', 'Step 3: Remove backbone and discard.
', 'Step 4: Cut through breastbone from the inside until chicken folds out like a book and lays flat.
', 'Step 5: Season chicken all over with salt and black pepper, and sprinkle herbes de Provence on the inside.
', 'Step 6: Let chicken sit for 20 to 30 minutes at room temperature; pat dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 7: Brush skin-side of chicken with oil and season again with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 8: Heat an oven-proof cast iron skillet over high heat until very hot, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Place chicken, skin-side down, in hot skillet and place bricks evenly on top to weigh down chicken.
', 'Step 10: Roast chicken in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove bricks, turn chicken over, and continue roasting until juices run clear and meat is no longer pink at the bone, 5 to 15 minutes more.
', 'Step 12: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh, near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', "Step 13: Preheat the oven's broiler and broil the chicken until skin is crispy and golden, 1 to 3 minutes.
"]

Title: Zavioli with Spinach and Ricotta
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ cups ricotta cheese', '1 cup chopped spinach', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup basil leaves, torn', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or more to taste', '½ clove garlic', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', '1 extra large zucchini', '9 toothpicks, soaked in water', '¼ cup pasta sauce', '2 tablespoons grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Mix ricotta cheese, spinach, egg, and pepper together in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Grind basil, oil, and garlic together into a chunky paste using a mortar and pestle.
', 'Step 4: Add pine nuts to the pesto; grind to the size of small peddles.
', 'Step 5: Slice zucchini lengthwise into strips using a mandoline.
', 'Step 6: Arrange 2 zucchini strips in the shape of a cross.
', 'Step 7: Spoon some of the ricotta cheese mixture in the middle of the cross.
', 'Step 8: Top with a dollop of pesto.
', 'Step 9: Fold ends into the center to create a parcel, starting from the bottom end and moving clockwise.
', 'Step 10: Secure with a toothpick.
', 'Step 11: Repeat with remaining zucchini strips, ricotta cheese mixture, and pesto.
', 'Step 12: Spread some of the pasta sauce in the bottom of a shallow baking dish.
', 'Step 13: Arrange zucchini parcels on top, spacing them 1/2 inch apart.
', 'Step 14: Spoon a bit of pasta sauce on top of each parcel.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle Parmiggiano-Reggiano cheese on top.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until sauce and zucchini begin to brown, about 20 minutes.
']

Title: Sicilian Homemade Ricotta Cheese
Ingredients: ['1 gallon whole milk', '1 quart buttermilk', '1 pint heavy cream', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '18-inch squares cheesecloth']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line a large colander or sieve with 4 layers of cheesecloth.
', 'Step 2: Set aside.
', 'Step 3: n Heat milk, buttermilk, heavy cream, and salt in a large, heavy, nonreactive saucepan over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally for the first 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Continue heating, without stirring, until the temperature reaches 190 degrees F. Remove from heat and let stand for 1 hour.
', 'Step 5: The mixture will be separated into white curds and clear whey.
', 'Step 6: n Using a slotted spoon, ladle approximately 1/4 of the curds into the cheesecloth-lined colander.
', 'Step 7: Gather up the corners of the top cheesecloth and secure closed with a zip tie.
', 'Step 8: Repeat with the rest of the curds, cheesecloth, and zip ties.
', 'Step 9: Use the last zip tie to thread all of the cheeses together.
', 'Step 10: Suspend the cheeses over a large wooden spoon over a large bowl, and let drain for 2 hours.
', 'Step 11: n Place the four cheeses, still in cloth, in a bowl in the refrigerator overnight.
', 'Step 12: In the morning, cut zip ties, and transfer cheese to an airtight container.
']

Title: Pasta Fazul

Title: Savoiardi I
Ingredients: ['4 eggs', '⅔ cup white sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '¾ cup all-purpose flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line three jelly roll pans with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Prepare a pastry bag with a size 6 tip (1/2 inch).
', 'Step 4: Separate the eggs.
', 'Step 5: Whisk the egg yolks with 1/2 of the sugar and all of the vanilla.
', 'Step 6: Beat until very light colored.
', 'Step 7: This will take about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: In a clean bowl, beat the egg whites until they hold soft peaks.
', 'Step 9: While beating, slowly add the salt and the remaining sugar until combined.
', 'Step 10: Gently fold the beaten egg whites into the egg yolk mixture.
', 'Step 11: Sift the flour over the egg mixture and gently fold it in.
', 'Step 12: Fill the pastry with half of the batter and pipe 3 1/2 inch fingers, 1 1/2 inches apart, in rows on the parchment paper.
', 'Step 13: Continue with the second half of the batter in the same manner.
', 'Step 14: Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for about 15 minutes until firm to the touch and golden.
', 'Step 15: Remove the paper and fingers from the baking sheet and place on racks to cool.
', 'Step 16: After cooling, remove fingers from the paper and use, or store between layers of wax paper in a airtight container.
', 'Step 17: These freeze well.
']

Title: Chef John's Chicken Riggies
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 ounces hot Italian ground sausage meat', '1 cup sliced mushrooms', '1 onion, sliced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken thighs, roughly chopped', '½ cup Marsala wine', '1 (28 ounce) can whole Italian plum tomatoes (such as San Marzano), crushed', '1 cup chicken broth', '½ cup heavy whipping cream', '½ cup water, or as needed', '1 ½ cups chopped hot and sweet peppers', '½ cup pitted and chopped kalamata olives', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '¼ cup chopped Italian flat leaf parsley', '1 pound rigatoni', '½ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano or Romano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir sausage, mushrooms, onions, salt, and black pepper in hot oil until vegetables are softened and sausage is browned, 6 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir chopped chicken to sausage mixture; cook and stir over medium-high heat until browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Pour in wine and cook, stirring to remove any browned bits off the bottom of the pan, until most of the wine is evaporated, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add tomatoes, chicken broth, and cream; simmer for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: If needed, add water to create a thick sauce.
', 'Step 7: Stir peppers, olives, and garlic into sauce.
', 'Step 8: Continue to simmer until thickened, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Season with salt and pepper to taste and stir in parsley.
', 'Step 10: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Cook rigatoni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until nearly cooked, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Drain.
', 'Step 13: Combine sauce and cooked pasta, stir in cheese, cover and set aside until pasta has absorbed the sauce, 1 to 2 minutes.
']

Title: Chef John's Sunday Pasta Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 (1 inch thick) slice beef shank', '2 pounds pork spareribs', '2 bone-in chicken thighs', '1 onion, diced', '1 pinch salt', '6 cloves garlic', '3 (28 ounce) cans crushed Italian (plum) tomatoes (such as San Marzano)', '2 cups water, divided', '¼ cup tomato paste', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped flat-leaf (Italian) parsley', '2 teaspoons salt, or to taste', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: n Drizzle 1 tablespoon olive oil in the bottom of a large roasting pan.
', 'Step 3: Place beef, pork, and chicken in pan and turn to coat with olive oil.
', 'Step 4: n Roast in the preheated oven until meat is well browned, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 5: n Heat remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir onion with a pinch of salt in hot oil until onion is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 8: n Pour crushed tomatoes, 1 1/2 cups water, and tomato paste into onion mixture.
', 'Step 9: Add roasted beef, pork, and chicken to tomato sauce mixture.
', 'Step 10: n Pour remaining 1/2 cup water into the roasting pan, and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off of the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 11: Pour roasting pan water mixture into tomato mixture.
', 'Step 12: Stir Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, Italian parsley, 2 teaspoons salt, ground black pepper, and red pepper flakes into tomato sauce; bring to a simmer, reduce heat to low, and simmer gently until sauce reduces and meat is tender, about 4 hours.
', 'Step 13: Transfer meat to a dish.
', 'Step 14: Adjust sauce seasonings to taste.
']

Title: Basic Marinara for the Instant Pot®
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup diced onion', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '¼ cup dry red wine', '1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '¾ teaspoon sea salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '1 bay leaf']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function to heat the pot.
', 'Step 2: Add olive oil and onion; cook until onion is translucent, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Pour in red wine and simmer until reduced by half.
', 'Step 5: Pour diced tomatoes and whole tomatoes into the pot.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 7: Stir in basil, oregano, parsley, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes, and bay leaf.
', 'Step 8: Press Keep Warm.
', 'Step 9: Close and lock the lid.
', 'Step 10: Seal the vent.
', 'Step 11: Select Manual function and set timer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for the pressure to build.
', "Step 13: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 14: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 15: Discard bay leaf.
', 'Step 16: Use an immersion blender to puree the sauce.
']

Title: Exquisite Yeastless Focaccia
Ingredients: ['1 cup water', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '1 ½ teaspoons crushed dried basil', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x13 inch baking pan.
', 'Step 3: Pour water into the bowl of an electric mixer fitted with a dough hook.
', 'Step 4: Sift together flour, baking powder, and salt, and add to the water.
', 'Step 5: Mix on medium speed until dough forms a ball.
', 'Step 6: (Or, stir together water, flour, baking powder, and salt in large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 7: Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until it forms a ball.
', 'Step 8: ) Plop dough into greased baking pan.
', 'Step 9: Using oiled fingers, spread dough to 1/2-inch thickness.
', 'Step 10: Dough will be sticky and elastic.
', 'Step 11: It does not have to be perfectly even, but make sure there are no holes.
', 'Step 12: Rub the top and sides of dough with olive oil.
', 'Step 13: Season with cayenne, garlic salt, and basil.
', 'Step 14: Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove from oven; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and return to oven.
', 'Step 16: Bake until just golden, or about 5 minutes.
']

Title: Potato and Vegetable Frittata
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil', '½ cup chopped onion', '1 clove garlic, minced', '½ cup diced green bell pepper', '1 zucchini, halved lengthwise and cut in 1/4 inch slices', '2 cups cooked and diced potatoes', '1 cup chopped fresh tomato', '2 tablespoons black olives', '4 eggs', 'salt and pepper to taste', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '½ small tomato, sliced', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the broiler on your oven.
', 'Step 2: In a frying pan with an ovenproof handle heat the oil and saute onion, garlic and green bell pepper over a low heat.
', 'Step 3: Saute until vegetables are just tender but not browned.
', 'Step 4: Add the zucchini and continue cooking, stirring occasionally, until crisp-tender.
', 'Step 5: Add the potatoes, stir well to combine, and continue cooking, stirring frequently, until the potatoes are heated through and starting to stick to the pan.
', 'Step 6: Then add the tomatoes and black olives, stirring well to combine with the other ingredients, and cook just until the tomatoes have begun giving up their juice.
', 'Step 7: Beat the eggs with the salt, pepper, oregano, and cayenne.
', 'Step 8: When all the vegetables are cooked, pour the eggs over them Arrange the tomato slices over the top of the eggs, and sprinkle the mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses over the tomato slices.
', "Step 9: Cook gently over low heat until the eggs are almost set (they'll be firm around the edges and a bit runny in the middle).
", 'Step 10: Slip the pan under the broiler for a minute or two, until the eggs are fully set and the cheese has melted and begun to brown.
', 'Step 11: Cut into wedges and serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '454.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '44.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '394.1 mg', 'fatContent': '20.6 g', 'fiberContent': '6.7 g', 'proteinContent': '26 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '517.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.5 g'}

Title: Baked Spaghetti Squash Lasagna Style
Ingredients: ['1 spaghetti squash, halved lengthwise and seeded', '1 onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '2 (14 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 cube vegetable bouillon', 'black pepper to taste', '1 (15 ounce) can black olives, chopped', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray a baking sheet with a thin layer of cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Place squash halves cut side down on the baking sheet.
', 'Step 4: Bake squash 35 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a knife can be easily inserted.
', 'Step 5: Remove from oven, and cool.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, spray a non-stick saucepan with cooking spray.
', 'Step 7: Over medium heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden brown.
', 'Step 8: Stir in tomatoes, basil, bouillon cube, and black pepper.
', 'Step 9: Cook for about 15 minutes, or until you have a medium thick sauce.
', 'Step 10: Remove squash strands with a fork, reserving the shells.
', 'Step 11: Layer each half with a spoonful of the sauce, a layer of spaghetti squash strands, olives, and mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 12: Repeat layers until shells are full, or until all of the ingredients are used.
', 'Step 13: Top with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 14: Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until Parmesan cheese melts.
']

Title: Pantry Puttanesca
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '3 anchovy fillets, chopped, or more to taste', '2 (15 ounce) cans diced tomatoes, drained.', '1 (8 ounce) package spaghetti', '½ cup chopped pitted kalamata olives', '¼ cup capers, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with water.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 3: n As the water heats, pour the olive oil into a cold skillet and stir in the garlic.
', 'Step 4: Turn heat to medium-low and cook and stir until the garlic is fragrant and begins to turn a golden color, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the red pepper flakes, oregano, and anchovies.
', 'Step 6: Cook until anchovies begin to break down, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: n Pour tomatoes into skillet, turn heat to medium-high, and bring sauce to a simmer.
', 'Step 8: Use the back of a spoon to break down tomatoes as they cook.
', 'Step 9: Simmer until sauce is reduced and combined, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: n Meanwhile, cook the pasta in the boiling water.
', 'Step 11: Drain when still very firm to the bite, about 9 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water.
', 'Step 13: n Stir the olives and capers into the sauce; add pasta and toss to combine.
', 'Step 14: n Toss pasta in sauce until pasta is cooked through and well coated with sauce, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 15: If sauce becomes too thick, stir in some of the reserved pasta water to thin.
']

Title: American-Italian Pasta Salad
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package fusilli pasta', '1 cup mayonnaise', '1 cup sour cream', '2 tablespoons milk', '1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix', '1 cup frozen petite peas, thawed', '2 (2 ounce) cans sliced black olives', '1 cup cubed Genoa salami', '¾ cup chopped green onions', '¾ cup chopped celery', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook pasta until al dente, rinse under cold water, and drain.
', 'Step 2: In a medium bowl, combine mayonnaise, sour cream, milk and Italian dressing mix.
', 'Step 3: Whisk together until smooth, set aside.
', 'Step 4: In a large salad bowl combine cooked and cooled pasta, peas, olives, salami, green onions, celery and parsley.
', 'Step 5: Mix in dressing last, reserving 1/2 cup.
', 'Step 6: Let sit overnight in fridge.
', 'Step 7: Stir before serving.
', 'Step 8: Add extra dressing if pasta appears dry.
']

Title: Skillet Lasagna
Ingredients: ['½ pound ground beef', '½ (28 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '½ onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '2 cups dried mafalda noodles', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 4: Add spaghetti sauce, tomatoes, onion, garlic, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Cook over low heat until sauce is hot, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 7: Cook mafalda noodles at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Drain.
', 'Step 9: Add cooked and drained noodles to the sauce and stir until completely coated.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top.
', "Step 11: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 12: Place skillet under the hot broil and cook until cheese is golden and bubbly, 3 to 5 minutes.
']

Title: Chef John's Porchetta
Ingredients: ['1 (2 1/2 pound) boneless pork shoulder blade roast', 'olive oil', '1 tablespoon kosher salt, divided', '1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh sage leaves', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary', '1 orange, zested', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons fennel seeds, lightly crushed', 'olive oil', '½ anchovy fillet', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste', '¼ cup white wine vinegar', '¼ cup chopped Italian parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place pork roast on a work surface.
', 'Step 2: Use a sharp knife to make a lengthwise cut about 1 inch from the edge of the meat, slicing down but not cutting through.
', 'Step 3: Open the meat flat along the cut.
', 'Step 4: Keeping the knife parallel to the cutting board, continue to slice the roast open so you can unroll it into a large, flat piece.
', 'Step 5: (You can also ask your butcher to butterfly the roast for you.
', 'Step 6: ) When the meat is unrolled, make small slashes through any connective tissue or extra-thick parts so the roast is as even in thickness as possible.
', 'Step 7: Drizzle cut surface with 2 teaspoons olive oil.
', 'Step 8: Rub oil into meat and generously season with 2 teaspoons kosher salt, black pepper, sage, rosemary, orange zest, garlic, and crushed fennel seeds.
', 'Step 9: Press seasonings in firmly with your hand, roll up the pork roast, and tie the roast in several places with kitchen twine.
', 'Step 10: Place the pork roast on a rack, set the rack on a plate, and sprinkle meat with remaining 1 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 11: Refrigerate the roast uncovered overnight to dry-age.
', 'Step 12: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Lightly oil a baking dish and place roast into dish.
', 'Step 14: Rub meat with 2 teaspoons olive oil.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until outside is seared, 15 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Reduce oven heat to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C) and continue to roast until an instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the center of the roast reads 145 degrees F (65 degrees C), about 1 hour more.
', 'Step 17: Loosely cover roast with foil and let rest for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Slice thinly to serve.
', 'Step 19: Mash anchovy fillet in a small bowl and add red pepper flakes, white wine vinegar, and Italian parsley.
', 'Step 20: Stir to combine.
', 'Step 21: Serve drizzled on pork.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '265.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '2.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '71.4 mg', 'fatContent': '19.1 g', 'fiberContent': '1 g', 'proteinContent': '19.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '1032.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.1 g'}

Title: Savory Green Beans
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds fresh green beans, rinsed and trimmed', '3 ounces coarsely chopped pancetta', '1 shallot, thinly sliced', 'salt and black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add the green beans and boil 3 to 4 minutes until just tender.
', 'Step 3: Drain beans and immediately plunge into ice water.
', 'Step 4: Allow to sit in ice water until cold, then drain well, and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Cook pancetta in a large skillet over medium-high heat until crispy, then set aside.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to medium, stir shallots into the pancetta fat, and cook gently until the shallots have turned dark golden brown, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Place pancetta and green beans in skillet; toss and cook until warmed through, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Season to taste with salt and pepper before serving.
']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.

Title: Bruschetta III
Ingredients: ['1 French baguette', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 roma (plum) tomatoes, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 pinch ground white pepper', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced mozzarella cheese', '1 (6 ounce) package sliced provolone cheese']

Title: Creamy Chicken Tortellini Soup
Ingredients: ['½ pound chicken breast, cut into bite-sized pieces', '1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth', '1 (9 ounce) package refrigerated cheese tortellini', '2 (10.5 ounce) cans cream of chicken soup', '2 cups half-and-half', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '½ teaspoon thyme', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper']

Title: K-Dub's Alfredo Ravioli Bake

Title: Pasta all'Amatriciana
Ingredients: ['4 ounces guanciale', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 ounces rigatoni pasta', '3 tablespoons dry white wine', '1 ½ cups fresh tomato sauce', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'kosher salt to taste', '1 ½ ounces finely grated Pecorino Romano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut guanciale into 1-inch by 1/8-inch strips.
', 'Step 2: Heat olive oil over medium heat in a saucepan.
', 'Step 3: Add guanciale and cook until well browned and fully rendered, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Turn off the heat and use a slotted spoon to transfer it to a bowl.
', 'Step 5: Leave all fat in the pan.
', 'Step 6: Start pasta: Bring a large pot of generously salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 7: Cook rigatoni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until not quite done, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: You want it undercooked by at least 1 to 1 1/2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: At the same time, add wine to the guanciale fat in the saucepan.
', 'Step 10: Place over medium-high heat and cook for about 1 minute.
', 'Step 11: Stir in tomato sauce and pepper; bring to a simmer.
', "Step 12: Transfer the almost fully-cooked pasta into the sauce using a slotted spoon; it's okay if some water gets in the sauce.
", 'Step 13: Add guanciale and stir to combine.
', 'Step 14: Season with salt.
', 'Step 15: Cook and stir until pasta absorbs the sauce and finishes cooking, and the sauce thickens up, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 16: If the sauce gets too thick, add a splash of the pasta water.
', 'Step 17: Turn off the heat and add some of the Pecorino cheese.
', 'Step 18: Stir until melted, then repeat until all cheese has been added.
', 'Step 19: Ladle into 2 bowls and serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '759.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '52 g', 'cholesterolContent': '66.1 mg', 'fatContent': '50.9 g', 'fiberContent': '4.5 g', 'proteinContent': '20.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '18.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '1254.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.6 g'}

Title: Chicken and Spinach Ravioli
Ingredients: ['4 eggs, beaten', '¾ cup water', '3 ¾ cups sifted all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '½ pound ground chicken', '¾ cup chopped fresh spinach', '2 tablespoons finely chopped onion', '3 tablespoons melted butter', '3 tablespoons freshly grated Asiago cheese', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 pinch ground black pepper to taste', '1 (16 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '¼ cup freshly grated Asiago cheese for topping']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a bowl, mix the eggs, water, 2 cups flour, and salt.
', 'Step 2: Gradually mix in the remaining flour until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Divide dough into 2 parts.
', 'Step 4: Cover, and set aside in the refrigerator 20 minutes.
', 'Step 5: In a skillet over medium heat, cook the ground chicken until evenly brown; drain.
', 'Step 6: In a food processor, mix the chicken, spinach, and onion.
', 'Step 7: Transfer to a bowl, and mix with butter, 3 tablespoons Asiago cheese, salt, garlic powder, nutmeg, and pepper.
', 'Step 8: On a lightly floured surface, roll out each part of the dough to 1/8 inch thickness.
', 'Step 9: Cut into 2 inch squares.
', 'Step 10: Place about 1 teaspoon of the chicken mixture in the center of 1/2 the squares, and top with remaining squares.
', 'Step 11: Seal the edges of the squares with a moistened fork to form the ravioli.
', 'Step 12: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil, and cook the ravioli in small batches for about 8 minutes, or until al dente.
', 'Step 13: Drain, and rinse under cold water.
', 'Step 14: Place the marinara sauce in a saucepan, and cook until heated through.
', 'Step 15: Serve ravioli topped with marinara sauce and remaining Asiago cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '621.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '102.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '147.8 mg', 'fatContent': '15.3 g', 'fiberContent': '7.4 g', 'proteinContent': '19.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '1345.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '16.7 g'}

Title: Italian Leafy Green Salad
Ingredients: ['2 cups romaine lettuce - torn, washed and dried', '1 cup torn escarole', '1 cup torn radicchio', '1 cup torn red leaf lettuce', '¼ cup chopped green onions', '½ red bell pepper, sliced into rings', '½ green bell pepper, sliced in rings', '12 cherry tomatoes', '¼ cup grapeseed oil', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '¼ cup balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, combine the romaine, escarole, radicchio, red-leaf, scallions, red pepper, green pepper and cherry tomatoes.
', 'Step 2: Whisk together the grapeseed oil, basil, vinegar, lemon juice and salt and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Pour over salad, toss and serve immediately.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '109.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '6.5 g', 'fatContent': '9.4 g', 'fiberContent': '1.7 g', 'proteinContent': '1.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '14.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.7 g'}

Title: Chicken Penne Italiano
Ingredients: ['8 ounces dry penne pasta', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 (15 ounce) can chicken broth', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon garlic, minced', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into cubes', '1 onion, sliced', '½ green bell pepper, seeded and thinly sliced', '½ red bell pepper, seeded and thinly sliced', '1 (16 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '¼ cup medium-dry white wine', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add the penne pasta and cook until al dente, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain, and reserve pasta.
', 'Step 4: Whisk the cornstarch and chicken broth together in a bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 5: Set aside until needed.
', 'Step 6: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Add the garlic and chicken; stir and cook until the chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the onion, and green and red peppers; cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the tomatoes, and simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Pour in the chicken broth mixture and wine, if desired, and season with oregano and basil.
', 'Step 11: Stir in the cooked pasta, and simmer over medium heat until thoroughly heated through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Serve garnished with Parmesan cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '527.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '56.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '80.9 mg', 'fatContent': '15 g', 'fiberContent': '4.8 g', 'proteinContent': '39.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '926.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.7 g'}

Title: Creamy Garlic and Onion Spaghetti
Ingredients: ['6 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '3 white onions, halved and thinly sliced', '8 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 (12 ounce) package spaghetti', '½ cup dry Chardonnay', '¾ cup heavy whipping cream', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', 'cracked black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter with olive oil in a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir onions, garlic, sugar, and salt into the hot butter and oil.
', 'Step 3: Cover pan and cook until onions are soft and translucent, stirring occasionally, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain and keep warm.
', 'Step 7: Pour Chardonnay into onion mixture and bring to a boil; reduce heat to low and simmer until evaporated, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir heavy cream into mixture and simmer until slightly thickened, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Transfer spaghetti to a serving bowl and pour onion sauce over pasta; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and black pepper.
', 'Step 10: Toss to coat.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '514.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '56.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '72.8 mg', 'fatContent': '26.2 g', 'fiberContent': '3.9 g', 'proteinContent': '10.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '15 g', 'sodiumContent': '322.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.3 g'}

Title: Caprese Salad with Grilled Flank Steak
Ingredients: ['2 medium tomatoes, diced', '1 (4 ounce) ball fresh mozzarella, cut into 1-inch cubes', '¼ cup coarsely chopped fresh basil', '2 cloves garlic, minced, divided', '41 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 pound flank steak', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (6.5 ounce) bag butter lettuce mix', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, 1 clove minced garlic, and 1 tablespoon olive oil in a bowl; toss to coat.
', 'Step 2: Cover bowl and refrigerate.
', 'Step 3: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 4: Place steak in a large resealable bag; add 1 clove minced garlic, 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Seal the bag and distribute the oil mixture over the steak.
', 'Step 6: When the grill is preheated, cook steak to your desired degree of doneness, about 5 minutes per side for medium.
', 'Step 7: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 140 degrees F (60 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Let stand for 5 minutes before thinly slicing across the grain.
', 'Step 9: Divide lettuce onto 4 serving plates.
', 'Step 10: Drizzle 1 1/2 teaspoons each balsamic vinegar and olive oil onto each lettuce portion.
', 'Step 11: Divide steak and tomato mixture evenly between the salads.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '321.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '5.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '49.5 mg', 'fatContent': '24 g', 'fiberContent': '1.3 g', 'proteinContent': '20.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '114.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.8 g'}

Title: Easy Italian Pasta Salad
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package bow-tie pasta', '2 large tomatoes, chopped', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '1 yellow bell pepper, chopped', '1 cucumber, chopped', '2 (6 ounce) cans sliced black olives', '5 stalks celery, chopped', '1 (8 ounce) bottle Italian-style salad dressing, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook the bow-tie pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 3: Rinse pasta in cold water until cool; drain.
', 'Step 4: Toss drained pasta, tomatoes, green bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, cucumber, black olives, and celery together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Pour Italian-style dressing over the pasta mixture; toss to coat.
', 'Step 6: Chill salad 20 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Ground Sausage Spaghetti
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 pound ground sausage', '½ onion, chopped', '½ green bell pepper, chopped', '2 tablespoons margarine', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato sauce', '½ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir sausage in a large skillet over medium-high heat until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 6: Stir onion, bell pepper, and margarine into sausage.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook until onion is soft, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir tomatoes, tomato sauce, and Italian seasoning into sausage mixture; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Stir in Parmesan cheese and pour over cooked spaghetti.
', 'Step 10: Top with mozzarella.
']
