Title: Lasagna Roll Ups II
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '¼ white onion, chopped', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 (26 ounce) jar chunky tomato sauce (such as Ragu®)', '3 tablespoons white sugar', '18 lasagna noodles', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 egg, beaten', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (12 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese, or as needed', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook and stir ground beef, onion, garlic powder, and oregano in a large skillet over medium heat until onion is tender and beef is browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add tomato sauce and sugar; simmer until sauce is heated through, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook lasagna in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain.
', 'Step 6: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Grease a 9x13-inch casserole dish.
', 'Step 8: Mix ricotta cheese, egg, parsley, and 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese together in a bowl.
', 'Step 9: Place a lasagna noodle on a work surface.
', 'Step 10: Spoon one layer of ricotta cheese mixture, one layer meat sauce, and one layer mozzarella cheese atop the lasagna noodle; top with another lasagna noodle.
', 'Step 11: Roll up the stuffed lasagna noodles in the jelly-roll style; place in the prepared casserole dish.
', 'Step 12: Repeat with remaining lasagna noodles, ricotta cheese mixture, meat sauce, and mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 13: Spread a spoonful of meat sauce atop each lasagna roll; top with remaining mozzarella cheese and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and bubbling, 30 to 35 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '524.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '47.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '98.3 mg', 'fatContent': '22 g', 'fiberContent': '2.9 g', 'proteinContent': '34.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '11.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '898.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.9 g'}

Title: Eggplant Parmesan - Gluten-Free
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups gluten-free bread crumbs (such as Hodgson Mill®)', '1 eggplant, peeled into long strips 1/4-inch thick', '2 eggs, beaten', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (16 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce, divided', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '1 pinch dried basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Pour bread crumbs in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 4: Dip eggplant into eggs; coat with gluten-free bread crumbs.
', 'Step 5: Place in a single layer on prepared baking sheet; lightly sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 6: Bake in the preheated oven for 6 minutes; remove from oven.
', 'Step 7: Flip eggplant with a spatula; brush with olive oil.
', 'Step 8: Bake until golden brown, about 6 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove from oven; reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Spread enough spaghetti sauce into a 7x11-inch baking pan to cover the bottom; layer on some of the eggplant slices.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over eggplant; top with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 12: Repeat layering sauce, eggplant, mozzarella cheese, and Parmesan cheese in this order; top with basil.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is bubbly and lightly golden, about 25 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '292.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '24 g', 'cholesterolContent': '64.3 mg', 'fatContent': '15.7 g', 'fiberContent': '4.4 g', 'proteinContent': '13.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '578.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '7 g'}

Title: Broccoli Risotto with Cream and Lemon
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons butter', '½ large sweet onion, finely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 ½ cups Arborio rice', '½ cup dry white wine (such as Sauvignon Blanc)', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '5 cups hot chicken broth', '1 cup heavy cream', '3 cups cooked broccoli florets', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '1 ½ tablespoons grated Asiago cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the olive oil and butter in a large, heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add the onion and garlic; cook and stir until the onion begins to turn golden brown at the edges, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour in the rice, and stir until the rice is coated in oil and has started to toast, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Reduce the heat to medium and stir in the white wine and lemon juice.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir until the wine has mostly evaporated, then stir in one third of the chicken broth; continue stirring until incorporated.
', 'Step 6: Repeat this process twice more, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 7: Stirring in the broth should take 15 to 20 minutes in all.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the cream, and cook 5 minutes before stirring in the broccoli, chives, Parmesan cheese, and Asiago cheese.
', 'Step 9: Cook and stir until the risotto is hot; season to taste with salt and pepper before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '482.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '52.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '71.8 mg', 'fatContent': '25.9 g', 'fiberContent': '2.1 g', 'proteinContent': '7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '13.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '106.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.7 g'}

Title: Party Italian Wedding Soup
Ingredients: ['1 (48 fluid ounce) can chicken broth', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '2 onions, chopped', '2 cups chopped carrot', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '1 pound ground beef', '1 cup dry bread crumbs', '1 egg', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into chunks', '3 ounces dry pasta', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large pot over medium heat, combine the chicken broth, spinach, onions, carrots and celery.
', 'Step 2: Mix well and allow to simmer.
', 'Step 3: In a separate large bowl, combine the ground beef, bread crumbs and egg and mix well.
', 'Step 4: Form mixture into 1/2 inch diameter meatballs and carefully drop them into the soup.
', 'Step 5: Put chunks of chicken breast into the soup and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 6: Allow the soup to simmer for 1 hour.
', 'Step 7: Add the pasta 30 minutes before serving and season with salt and pepper to taste.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '260.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '17 g', 'cholesterolContent': '81 mg', 'fatContent': '12.2 g', 'fiberContent': '2.3 g', 'proteinContent': '19.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '732.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.6 g'}

Title: Italian BBQ Pork Chops
Ingredients: ['¾ cup balsamic vinegar', '½ cup ketchup', '¼ cup brown sugar', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '4 (6 ounce) pork loin chops', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir the balsamic vinegar, ketchup, brown sugar, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, Dijon mustard, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon black pepper together in a saucepan over medium-low heat; cook the sauce at a simmer for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Remove from heat and allow to sit for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 4: Season both sides of the pork chops with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 5: Brush the chops with the sauce from the saucepan.
', 'Step 6: Cook the pork chops on the preheated grill until the pork is no longer pink in the center, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 7: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Remove from the grill and allow to rest for 3 minutes before serving with the remaining sauce on the side.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '269.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '30 g', 'cholesterolContent': '54.3 mg', 'fatContent': '6.6 g', 'fiberContent': '0.2 g', 'proteinContent': '22.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '807.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '27.2 g'}

Title: Crab Alfredo
Ingredients: ['8 ounces dried fettucine', '3 tablespoons butter', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 cups half-and-half', '1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '8 ounces crabmeat, flaked']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Keep warm and covered.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, melt the butter in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Add the minced garlic and cook until garlic releases its aroma, about 2 minutes, being careful not to let the garlic brown.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the flour, salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat, and cook, stirring constantly for about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add the half-and-half and stir over medium heat until slightly thickened, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add the cream cheese and Parmesan cheese to the sauce and stir until cheeses melt and mixture is smooth.
', 'Step 10: Mix in the crabmeat and continue cooking until crabmeat is heated through, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Divide the fettucine between 2 plates or bowls and top with the crab sauce.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '648.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '52.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '140.6 mg', 'fatContent': '37.2 g', 'fiberContent': '2.2 g', 'proteinContent': '27.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '22.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '516 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.3 g'}

Title: Bolognese Tagliatelle
Ingredients: ['4 ounces pancetta bacon, finely diced', '3 carrots, finely diced', '3 stalks celery, finely diced', '2 onions, finely diced', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 pound 85% lean ground beef', '1 pound ground pork', '½ cup dry white wine', '1 (28 ounce) can San Marzano whole peeled tomatoes, drained', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '1 cup beef stock', '¼ cup heavy cream', '1 (16 ounce) box tagliatelle pasta', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook pancetta in a pan over medium heat until it has released its fat and is crisp, 7 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add carrots, celery, and onions and cook until the vegetables soften and the onions are translucent, 7 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Set aside.
', 'Step 4: Heat olive oil in a 4-quart pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Break ground beef and pork into small chunks and add them to the pot; cook, stirring lightly, until browned, 7 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir the pancetta-vegetable mixture into the ground meat.
', 'Step 7: Add wine.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to medium-low and stir, breaking up the meat until finely ground, wine has evaporated, and the pot is almost dry, 13 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add tomatoes, nutmeg, salt, and red pepper.
', 'Step 10: Use the back of a spoon to break up the tomatoes and continue to break down the meat mixture into very small bits, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Pour beef stock and heavy cream into the pot and reduce heat to the lowest setting.
', 'Step 12: Leave to simmer, partially covered, stirring occasionally, for at least 2 hours.
', 'Step 13: Meanwhile, fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 14: Cook tagliatelle at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Reserve 1 cup of pasta water and drain well.
', 'Step 16: Stir pasta into the Bolognese sauce and mix well, adding a little reserved pasta water if needed to develop a satiny coating.
', 'Step 17: Top with grated Parmesan cheese.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '607.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '54.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '94.6 mg', 'fatContent': '26.9 g', 'fiberContent': '4.9 g', 'proteinContent': '34.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '543.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.8 g'}

Title: Grilled Salmon Steaks Italian-Style
Ingredients: ['2 salmon steaks', '1 tablespoon dried Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon crumbled dried thyme', '1 teaspoon crushed dried rosemary', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil grate.
', 'Step 2: Season one side of each steak with the Italian seasoning, thyme, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Lay the steaks with the seasoned-side down on the prepared grill.
', 'Step 4: Cook on grill until the flesh flakes, turning once, 7 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle each steak with lime juice to serve.
']

Title: Easy, Cheesy Tortellini Bake
Ingredients: ['2 (9 ounce) packages cheese tortellini', '1 (24 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '1 (16 ounce) jar Alfredo sauce', '1 (10 ounce) box frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry', '1 tablespoon dried Italian seasoning', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded Mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon dried Italian seasoning']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook according to package directions; drain.
', 'Step 3: Adjust oven rack to the highest position and turn oven on to Broil.
', 'Step 4: Generously butter or grease an 8x8 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 5: Bring marinara and Alfredo sauces along with spinach and 1 tablespoon of Italian seasoning to a simmer over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir cooked tortellini into sauce, then pour into prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle with Mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, and remaining 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 9: Broil for a minute or two until cheese has melted and turned golden brown.
']

Title: Daddy's Sausage and Peppers
Ingredients: ['8 (4 ounce) links Italian sausage', '1 tablespoon garlic flavored olive oil', '3 green bell pepper, seeded and cut into strips', '2 red bell peppers, seeded and cut into strips', '1 yellow bell pepper, seeded and cut into strips', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes, drained', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', '6 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 large onion, cut into wedges', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 tablespoons garlic flavored olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Slice each sausage link into 5 pieces.
', 'Step 2: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Add the sausage, and cook until browned, turning as needed.
', 'Step 4: Drain excess grease, then add the green, red and yellow peppers, tomatoes, and Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 5: Drizzle the remaining olive oil over all, and reduce the heat to medium-low.
', 'Step 6: Cover, and let simmer for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove the lid, and stir.
', 'Step 8: Add the garlic and onion to the pan.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 10: Cover, and simmer for 15 more minutes.
', 'Step 11: Stir, then top with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 12: Cover and cook for 5 minutes to melt the cheese.
', 'Step 13: Remove from the heat and enjoy.

Title: Chef John's Pork al Latte
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 slices bacon, coarsely chopped', '1 ½ pounds pork shoulder, cut into 2-inch chunks', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 small yellow onion, diced', '4 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 ¼ cups chicken broth', '½ cup creme fraiche', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh sage leaves', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', '¼ cup olive oil', '15 whole fresh sage leaves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour 1 tablespoon olive oil into a skillet, place over medium heat, and cook bacon, stirring often, until crisp and bacon fat has rendered into the skillet, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Season pork cubes generously with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 3: Remove bacon from pan and set aside, reserving fat in pan.
', 'Step 4: Turn heat to medium-high and brown pork pieces in bacon drippings until well browned on both sides, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 5: Transfer meat to a bowl, leaving pan drippings in skillet.
', 'Step 6: Turn heat to medium and stir in chopped onion and a pinch of salt.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir onion until translucent and slightly browned, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir garlic into onion and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 9: Pour chicken broth and creme fraiche into onion mixture; whisk until smooth.
', 'Step 10: Scrape up and dissolve any browned bits of food on the bottom of the skillet.
', 'Step 11: Bring mixture to a simmer.
', 'Step 12: Return bacon to sauce and stir in 2 tablespoons chopped sage.
', 'Step 13: Place pork pieces into simmering sauce along with any accumulated juices from the meat.
', 'Step 14: Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until meat is almost tender, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 15: Raise heat to medium and cook uncovered until pan sauce reduces and thickens and meat is very tender, about 20 more minutes.
', 'Step 16: Stir red pepper flakes into sauce; adjust seasonings to taste.
', 'Step 17: Heat 1/4 cup olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat; drop whole sage leaves into the hot oil and cook, lightly tossing leaves in the oil, until crisp, 10 to 15 seconds.
', 'Step 18: Drain sage leaves on paper towels and crumble over pork.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '513.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '4.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '114.4 mg', 'fatContent': '46.2 g', 'fiberContent': '0.4 g', 'proteinContent': '20.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '15.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '568.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.2 g'}

Title: Italian Bread Baked on a Pizza Stone
Ingredients: ['3 cups unbleached flour', '1 tablespoon light brown sugar', '1 ⅓ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water', '2 tablespoons cornmeal']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place flour, brown sugar, warm water, salt, olive oil and yeast in the pan of the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer.
', 'Step 2: Select dough cycle; press Start.
', 'Step 3: Place pizza stone in oven and preheat to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Oven must be preheated at least 30 minutes before baking.
', 'Step 5: Deflate the dough and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 6: Form dough into two loaves.
', 'Step 7: Place the loaves seam side down on a cutting board generously sprinkled with cornmeal.
', 'Step 8: Cover the loaves with a damp cloth and let rise until doubled in volume, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 9: In a small bowl, beat together egg and 1 tablespoon water.
', 'Step 10: Brush the risen loaves with egg mixture.
', 'Step 11: Make a single long, quick cut down the center of the loaves with a sharp knife.
', 'Step 12: Gently shake the cutting board to make sure that the loaves are not sticking.
', 'Step 13: If they stick, use a spatula or pastry knife to loosen.
', 'Step 14: Slide the loaves onto the pizza stone with one quick but careful motion.
', 'Step 15: Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until loaves sound hollow when tapped on the bottom.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '93 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '16.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '9.3 mg', 'fatContent': '1.6 g', 'fiberContent': '0.6 g', 'proteinContent': '3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '179 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.7 g'}

Title: Balsamic Cream Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons butter', '¼ onion, minced', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 teaspoons chicken bouillon granules', '1 cup heavy cream', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil and butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the onion, and cook until it has caramelized to a dark, golden brown, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the balsamic vinegar, and cook for 1 minute before stirring in the chicken bouillon and cream.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a simmer, then remove from the heat and stir in the Parmesan cheese until melted.
']

Title: Cube Steak Parmesan
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons water', '⅓ cup crushed saltine crackers', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '4 (4 ounce) beef cube steaks', '1 ¼ cups canned tomato sauce', '2 ¼ teaspoons white sugar', '½ teaspoon dried oregano, divided', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '4 slices mozzarella cheese', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a shallow dish, stir together the flour, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 3: In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs and water with a fork.
', 'Step 4: In a third bowl, or shallow dish, mix together the cracker crumbs, 1/3 cup of Parmesan cheese and basil.
', 'Step 5: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Dredge the cube steaks in the seasoned flour, dip into the egg mixture, and coat with the cracker crumb mixture.
', 'Step 7: Place them in the skillet, and fry just until browned on each side.
', 'Step 8: Arrange steaks in a single layer in a greased casserole dish.
', 'Step 9: Bake for 25 minutes in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 10: Meanwhile, in a medium bowl, stir together the tomato sauce, sugar, 1/4 teaspoon of oregano, and garlic powder.
', 'Step 11: Spoon over steaks when the 25 minutes are up.
', 'Step 12: Top each steak with mozzarella cheese and remaining Parmesan cheese; sprinkle remaining oregano over the top.
', 'Step 13: Bake for 5 more minutes, or until the cheese is melted, and the sauce is hot.
']

Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package uncooked pasta shells', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '½ tablespoon finely minced onion', '1 orange bell pepper, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes', '1 cup heavy cream', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']

Title: Italian Cream Cake II
Ingredients: ['½ cup margarine, softened', '½ cup shortening', '2 cups white sugar', '5 egg yolks', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 cup buttermilk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 ⅓ cups flaked coconut', '1 cup chopped pecans', '5 egg whites', '8 ounces cream cheese', '½ cup margarine, softened', "4 cups confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ cup chopped pecans']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour three 8 inch round cake pans.

', 'Step 6: Beat in egg yolks.
', 'Step 7: Stir together flour and baking soda, and add alternately with buttermilk into the creamed mixture; mix well after each addition.
', 'Step 8: Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla, coconut, and 1 cup pecans.
', 'Step 9: Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites.
', 'Step 10: Spoon into prepared pans.
', 'Step 11: Bake for 25 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Cool in pans for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove to wire rack to cool completely.
', "Step 14: Combine cream cheese, 1/2 cup margarine, confectioners' sugar, and 1 teaspoon vanilla in mixer bowl.
", 'Step 15: Beat till smooth.
', 'Step 16: Add coconut if desired.
', 'Step 17: Frost the cooled cake.
', 'Step 18: The remaining 1/2 cup pecans can be stirred into frosting or sprinkled onto the cake after it is frosted.
']

Title: Cheesy Vegetable Lasagna
Ingredients: ['12 lasagna noodles', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 heads fresh broccoli, chopped', '2 carrots, thinly sliced', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 green bell peppers, chopped', '2 small zucchini, sliced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '3 cups milk', '¾ cup Parmesan cheese, divided', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon pepper', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed', '1 (8 ounce) container small curd cottage cheese', '24 ounces ricotta cheese', '2 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided']

', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x13-inch casserole dish.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Add lasagna noodles and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 5: Heat oil in a large cast iron skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: When oil is hot add broccoli, carrots, onions, bell peppers, zucchini and garlic.

', 'Step 10: Cook 5 minutes, or until thick, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 11: Stir in 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, salt and pepper; cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 12: Remove from heat; stir in spinach.
', 'Step 13: Reserve 1/2 cup spinach mixture.
', 'Step 14: In a small bowl, combine cottage and ricotta cheeses; stir well.
', 'Step 15: Spread about 1/2 cup of spinach mixture in the bottom of the prepared pan.
', 'Step 16: Layer noodles, ricotta mixture, vegetables, spinach mixture, and 2 cups mozzarella cheese, ending with noodles.
', 'Step 17: Top with reserved spinach mixture, 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese and 1/4 cup parmesan cheese.

', 'Step 19: Cool for approximately 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Giant Bacon-Wrapped Meatballs
Ingredients: ['3 pounds ground beef', '3 eggs', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '½ cup dry bread crumbs', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 pound sliced bacon, cut in half crosswise']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Mix ground beef, eggs, Parmesan cheese, parsley, bread crumbs, garlic, onion powder, salt, black pepper, oregano, and basil in a large bowl until thoroughly combined.

', 'Step 7: Place wrapped meatballs onto the prepared baking sheet with seam sides down.

', 'Step 10: Pour off excess grease.

Title: Chicken, Feta Cheese, and Sun-Dried Tomato Wraps

Title: Italian Cookies with Anise
Ingredients: ['½ cup unsalted butter, softened', '½ cup white sugar', '3 large eggs, at room temperature', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon anise extract', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '2 tablespoons milk', "2 cups confectioners' sugar", '½ teaspoon anise extract', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract']

Title: Tuscan Bean, Chicken, and Italian Sausage Soup

Title: Italian Sausage Tortellini Soup
Ingredients: ['1 (3.5 ounce) link sweet Italian sausage, casings removed', '1 cup chopped onions', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '5 cups beef stock', '⅓ cup water', '½ cup red wine', '4 tomatoes - peeled, seeded and chopped', '1 cup chopped carrots', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 cup tomato sauce', '1 zucchini, chopped', '8 ounces cheese tortellini', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese for topping']

', 'Step 3: Next add the beef stock, water, wine, tomatoes, carrots, basil, oregano and tomato sauce.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes, skimming any fat that may surface.
', 'Step 5: Add the zucchini, tortellini, green bell pepper and parsley to taste.

', 'Step 7: Pour into individual bowls and garnish with the cheese.

Title: Italian Wedding Cake
Ingredients: ['½ cup buttermilk', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ cup shortening', '½ cup margarine', '2 cups white sugar', '5 egg yolks', '¼ teaspoon almond extract', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '5 egg whites', '½ cup drained crushed pineapple', '½ cup flaked coconut', '1 cup chopped pecans', '¾ cup butter, softened', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', "4 cups confectioners' sugar", '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 cup chopped pecans']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour three 8 inch pans.
', 'Step 3: Combine the buttermilk, baking soda and salt.
', 'Step 4: Set aside.
', 'Step 5: In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 6: Beat in the egg yolks one at a time, then stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and almond extract.
', 'Step 7: Beat in the buttermilk mixture alternately with the flour, mixing just until incorporated.
', 'Step 8: In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites until they form stiff peaks.
', 'Step 9: Gently fold the egg whites into the batter.
', 'Step 10: Stir in pineapple, coconut and 1 cup pecans.
', 'Step 11: Pour batter evenly into prepared pans.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven for 35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
', 'Step 13: Allow cake layers to cool 10 minutes in pans, then turn out onto wire racks to cool completely.
', "Step 14: To make the frosting: Cream together the butter, cream cheese and confectioners' sugar until blended.
", 'Step 15: Stir in 2 teaspoons vanilla and 1 cup pecans.
', 'Step 16: If frosting is too stiff to spread, stir in milk a teaspoon at a time until it reaches desired consistency.
']

Title: Chef John's Almond Biscotti
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon fine salt', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter, room temperature', '1 cup white sugar', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 large eggs', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '¾ teaspoon almond extract', '½ cup whole roasted almonds', '½ cup chopped roasted almonds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt together in a mixing bowl.
', 'Step 2: Place butter, 1 cup plus 1 tablespoon sugar, olive oil in a separate mixing bowl.
', 'Step 3: Mix together thoroughly until mixture has a creamy texture.
', 'Step 4: Add 1 egg; mix into butter/sugar mixture.
', 'Step 5: Whisk in 2nd egg, vanilla extract, and almond extract; whisk until smooth.
', 'Step 6: Add flour mixture.
', 'Step 7: Mix until flour is incorporated.
', 'Step 8: Add whole almonds and chopped almonds; mix in evenly.
', 'Step 9: Cover bowl with plastic wrap; refrigerate 30 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Line a rimmed baking sheet with a silicone mat.
', 'Step 12: Divide dough in half.
', 'Step 13: Place each half on a length of plastic wrap and shape into a log.
', 'Step 14: Wrap with the plastic wrap and press into a shape about 3 or 4 inches wide and about 1/2 inch high.
', 'Step 15: Transfer both pieces to prepared baking sheet leaving about 3 or 4 inches of space between them to allow for spreading.
', 'Step 16: Bake in center of preheated oven until turning golden and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Let cool 15 minutes before slicing.
', 'Step 18: Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 19: Cut each piece at a slight angle into 1/2- to 1 -inch thick slices with a serrated knife.
', 'Step 20: Transfer pieces back to baking sheet in a single layer.
', 'Step 21: Bake 12 minutes; remove from oven and flip pieces over.
', 'Step 22: Return pan to oven and bake until biscotti are golden brown and crunchy, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Transfer biscotti to a cooling rack; let cool to room temperature.
']

Title: Chef John's Ham and Cheese Calzones
Ingredients: ['24 ounces prepared pizza dough', '8 slices prosciutto', '2 cups ricotta cheese, drained', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper to taste', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 ½ cups finely diced smoked ham', '4 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced, drained on paper towels', '1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon cornmeal', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon water', '1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '2 cups marinara sauce for dipping, heated']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Divide dough into 4 equal portions; shape each into a ball.
', 'Step 4: On a lightly floured surface, flatten each dough ball into a flat circle and roll out into an 8- or 9-inch circle.
', 'Step 5: Place 2 prosciutto slices on one half of each circle of dough, leaving a 1-inch empty border.
', 'Step 6: Spoon ricotta cheese on prosciutto.
', 'Step 7: Season with a pinch of salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 8: Top with chopped ham, mozzarella slices, and a drizzle of olive oil.
', 'Step 9: Moisten edge of dough with a bit of water using your fingertip.
', 'Step 10: Fold the empty half of the dough over the filling and lightly seal edges.
', 'Step 11: Crimp the edges up to completely seal the calzone.
', 'Step 12: Sprinkle lined baking sheet with cornmeal.
', 'Step 13: Transfer calzones to baking sheet.
', 'Step 14: Cut several small slits in the top of the crust with the tip of a knife to allow for venting.
', 'Step 15: Beat egg with water to make egg wash.
', 'Step 16: Brush the calzones with egg wash.
', 'Step 17: Dust with grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
', 'Step 18: Remove excess cornmeal and grated cheese from around calzones to avoid smoke from the hot oven.
', 'Step 19: Bake in preheated oven until browned, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Let cool 15 minutes before serving.
', 'Step 21: Serve with heated marinara sauce for dipping.
']

Title: How To Make Focaccia
Ingredients: ['1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '1 cup warm water (105 degrees F/41 degrees C)', '6 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '¾ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup semolina flour', '2 teaspoons minced fresh rosemary', '2 ¾ cups bread flour, divided', '1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '2 teaspoons minced fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon coarse sea salt, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk yeast with warm water in a mixing bowl; whisk in 2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, semolina flour, and 2 teaspoons rosemary until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 2: Mix in 2 1/2 cups bread flour, using a wooden spoon, until dough is too stiff and sticky to mix.
', 'Step 3: Turn dough out onto a floured work surface.
', 'Step 4: Knead, dusting with remaining 1/4 cup bread flour as needed, until dough is soft, smooth, and slightly elastic, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drizzle dough with 1 tablespoon olive oil, spreading oil over the dough.
', 'Step 6: Knead briefly, about 2 minutes, to incorporate olive oil.
', 'Step 7: Repeat with 1 more tablespoon oil.
', 'Step 8: Knead 2 or 3 more minutes to incorporate olive oil.
', 'Step 9: Drizzle dough with 1 more tablespoon oil and knead in as before.
', 'Step 10: If dough seems too sticky, knead in a little more flour.
', 'Step 11: Knead until dough is soft, smooth, and elastic, 1 to 2 more minutes (7 to 8 minutes total kneading time).
', 'Step 12: Drizzle 1 more tablespoon olive oil into a large bowl, place dough into bowl, and turn dough in bowl several times to coat with oil.
', 'Step 13: Cover bowl with aluminum foil and let rise in a warm place until doubled, 1 to 2 hours.
', 'Step 14: Coat a sheet pan lightly with 1 teaspoon olive oil.
', 'Step 15: Turn dough into pan and press gently into a rough rectangular shape using your fingers, pressing out air bubbles.
', 'Step 16: Cover sheet pan loosely with plastic wrap and let rest 15 to 20 minutes to relax the gluten.
', 'Step 17: Drizzle 1 tablespoon more olive oil onto the dough, spread oil onto dough, and poke 3 or 4 oil-covered fingers deeply into the dough to make dimples all over the surface.
', 'Step 18: Poke holes all the way down to the bottom of the pan.
', 'Step 19: Fill in any spaces with holes until entire surface is covered with dimples.
', 'Step 20: Let rise until nearly doubled, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Preheat oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C).
', 'Step 22: Sprinkle 2 teaspoons minced rosemary over top of dough.
', 'Step 23: Drizzle 1 more tablespoon olive oil onto the surface of the dough and brush on very lightly to avoid moving the rosemary.
', 'Step 24: Sprinkle with sea salt.
', 'Step 25: Bake in the preheated oven until focaccia loaf is lightly golden brown, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 26: Brush 1 last tablespoon olive oil onto the loaf.
', 'Step 27: Transfer to a rack and let cool before cutting.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '193.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '0.5 g', 'fatContent': '21.1 g', 'fiberContent': '0.3 g', 'proteinContent': '0.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3 g', 'sodiumContent': '585.9 mg'}

Title: Basic Microwave Risotto
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 onion, chopped', '1 ½ cups vegetable broth', '1 cup uncooked Arborio rice', '¾ cup white wine', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a 3 quart, microwave safe casserole dish combine butter, garlic and onion.
', 'Step 2: Place dish in microwave and cook on high for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Place vegetable broth in a microwave safe dish.
', 'Step 4: Heat on microwave until the broth is hot but not boiling (approximately 2 minutes).
', 'Step 5: Stir the rice and broth into the casserole dish with the onion, butter and garlic mixture.
', 'Step 6: Cover the dish tightly and cook on high for 6 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir wine into the rice.
', 'Step 8: Cook on high for 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 9: Most of the liquid should boil off.
', 'Step 10: Stir the cheese into the rice and serve.
']

Title: Slow-Cooker Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (15 ounce) container POLLY-O Original Ricotta Cheese', '1 (7 ounce) package KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Mozzarella Cheese, divided', '¼ cup KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese, divided', '1 large egg', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 pound ground beef', '1 (24 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 cup water', '6 lasagna noodles, uncooked']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix ricotta cheese, 1 1/2 cups mozzarella cheese, 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese, egg, and parsley in a medium bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 2: Brown meat in large skillet; drain.
', 'Step 3: Stir in spaghetti sauce and water.
', 'Step 4: Spoon 1 cup meat sauce into a slow cooker; top with layers of half each of the noodles (broken to fit) and cheese mixture.
', 'Step 5: Cover with 2 cups meat sauce.
', 'Step 6: Top with remaining noodles (broken to fit), cheese mixture, and meat sauce.
', 'Step 7: Cover with lid.
', 'Step 8: Cook on LOW until liquid is absorbed, 4 to 6 hours.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan; let stand, covered, until melted, about 10 minutes.
']

Title: Chicken Manicotti Alfredo
Ingredients: ['3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '½ cup distilled white vinegar', '1 cup olive oil', '1 clove crushed garlic', '1 (12 ounce) package manicotti pasta', '6 tablespoons butter', '2 cups heavy whipping cream', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 ½ cups grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 pint part-skim ricotta cheese', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh marjoram', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large resealable plastic bag, marinate chicken with vinegar, olive oil, and garlic for at least 30 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Saute in a little olive oil until done.
', 'Step 3: Set aside.
', 'Step 4: Cook pasta in a large pot of boiling water until al dente.
', 'Step 5: Drain, and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, melt butter or margarine in a small saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: Add heavy cream, salt, nutmeg, and ground black pepper, and stir until sauce thickens.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 9: Add grated Parmesan cheese, and stir until the cheese melts.
', 'Step 10: Set Alfredo sauce aside.
', 'Step 11: In a large bowl, mix together ricotta cheese, egg, oregano, marjoram, and basil.
', 'Step 12: Mix in cooked chicken.
', 'Step 13: Stuff cooked manicotti shells with chicken and ricotta mixture.
', 'Step 14: Cover the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish with half of the Alfredo sauce.
', 'Step 15: Place stuffed shells on top of sauce.
', 'Step 16: Pour remaining sauce over shells.
', 'Step 17: Top with one cup shredded mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 18: Cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 19: Bake at 350 degree F (175 degree C) oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Chef John's Beef Braciole
Ingredients: ['2 (8 ounce) beef top sirloin steaks', '½ cup bread crumbs', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons chopped raisins', '⅓ cup freshly shredded Parmesan cheese', '1 pinch salt, or to taste', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper, or to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 cup water', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 bay leaf', '1 ½ cups tomato sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place steaks between 2 pieces of heavy plastic; pound meat about 1/4-inch thick using a meat pounder.
', 'Step 2: If a piece of meat breaks off, use it to patch a thinner area.
', 'Step 3: Place bread crumbs into a mixing bowl and stir in garlic, 2 tablespoons olive oil, raisins, Parmesan cheese, salt, black pepper, oregano, and egg until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 4: Season steak with salt and pepper; place half the bread crumb stuffing onto the bottom 2/3 of a steak, leaving the top third of the steak without stuffing.
', 'Step 5: Lightly press the stuffing onto the meat and roll the steak up into a tight roll, starting from the stuffed end.
', 'Step 6: Tie 3 to 4 pieces of kitchen string around the roll to hold it together.
', 'Step 7: Trim ends of string.
', 'Step 8: Repeat with remaining steak and stuffing.
', 'Step 9: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 10: Pan-fry the steak rolls in the hot oil until well browned on all sides, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 11: Pour in water and dissolve pan juices and browned bits of food in the water.
', 'Step 12: Season steak rolls with salt and pepper; add red pepper flakes and bay leaf to the water.
', 'Step 13: Spread tomato sauce onto rolls.
', 'Step 14: Pan liquid should cover the rolls about halfway up.
', 'Step 15: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes; turn rolls over and cook covered about 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 16: An instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the center of the stuffing should read at least 145 degrees F (65 degrees C).
', 'Step 17: Remove from pan, transfer to a platter, and let them rest for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Raise heat to medium, bring sauce to a boil, and cook, stirring often, until sauce has reduced by half, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Slice the rolls crosswise.
', 'Step 20: Serve arranged on a little sauce and drizzle more sauce on top.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '405.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '22.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '111.8 mg', 'fatContent': '23.7 g', 'fiberContent': '2.4 g', 'proteinContent': '26.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '795.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.2 g'}

Title: Italian Pizza Dough
Ingredients: ['1 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast', '½ teaspoon white sugar', '½ cup lukewarm water', '2 cups sifted all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 egg, beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir yeast and sugar into lukewarm water, using a fork.
', 'Step 2: Let stand in a warm place until a creamy layer forms on top of the water, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: n Mix flour and salt in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Mix olive oil into flour and stir for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour yeast mixture and beaten egg into flour mixture and stir to make a stiff dough.
', 'Step 6: Turn dough out onto a floured work surface and knead until springy and smooth, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Place dough into a floured bowl and cover with a piece of plastic wrap wiped with a thin film of olive oil.
', 'Step 8: n Let dough rise until doubled, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Punch down and roll out to desired shape.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '207.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '32.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '31 mg', 'fatContent': '5.8 g', 'fiberContent': '1.3 g', 'proteinContent': '5.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1 g', 'sodiumContent': '207.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.5 g'}

Title: Aunt Anne's Sesame Cookies
Ingredients: ['1 cup butter', '¾ cup sugar', '1 egg, room temperature', '2 teaspoons anise extract', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon baking powder', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '½ cup milk, or as needed', '1 cup sesame seeds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Beat in the egg and anise extract until well blended.
', 'Step 4: Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt; stir into the butter mixture until well incorporated.
', 'Step 5: If you are using a stand mixer, let the dough mix for another minute to add lightness to the dough.
', 'Step 6: The dough will be soft, but will hand roll easily.
', 'Step 7: Pinch off pieces of dough slightly smaller than a walnut, and roll them into small logs.
', 'Step 8: Dip in milk, then roll in sesame seeds.
', 'Step 9: Place cookies one inch apart on a cookie sheet.
', 'Step 10: Cookies will not spread very much.
', 'Step 11: Bake for 17 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until bottom and sides of cookies are lightly toasted.
', 'Step 12: Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.
', 'Step 13: Store in an airtight container at room temperature.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '72.1 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '7.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '11.4 mg', 'fatContent': '4.4 g', 'fiberContent': '0.4 g', 'proteinContent': '1.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '30.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.6 g'}

Title: Easter Bread Ring
Ingredients: ['5 eggs', '¼ cup white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '.666 cup milk', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 eggs, room temperature', '½ cup mixed candied fruit', '⅓ cup chopped blanched almonds', '½ teaspoon anise seed', '2 tablespoons melted shortening', "1 cup confectioners' sugar", '1 tablespoon whole milk', '⅛ teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons multicolored sprinkles (jimmies)']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Color the 5 eggs with egg dye.
', 'Step 2: In a large mixing bowl, blend the white sugar, salt, and yeast well with 1 cup of the flour.
', 'Step 3: In a saucepan, combine 2/3 cup milk and butter, heating slowly until liquid is warm and butter is melted.
', 'Step 4: Pour the milk into the dry ingredients and beat 125 strokes with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 5: Add eggs and 1/2 cup flour or enough to make a thick batter.
', 'Step 6: Beat vigorously for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in enough flour to make a ball of dough that draws away from the sides of the bowl.
', 'Step 8: Turn out onto a floured board and knead for about 10 minutes, working in additional flour to overcome stickiness.
', 'Step 9: Place the dough in a greased bowl, turning to grease the top.
', 'Step 10: Cover tightly with plastic wrap and put in a warm, draft-free place until doubled in bulk, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 11: Meanwhile, combine the fruit, nuts, and anise seed.
', 'Step 12: Punch down the dough and return it to a lightly floured board.
', 'Step 13: Knead in the fruit mixture, keeping the syrupy pieces dusted with flour until they are worked into the dough.
', 'Step 14: Divide the dough in half.
', 'Step 15: Carefully roll each piece into a 24-inch rope--the fruit and nuts will make this slightly difficult.
', 'Step 16: Loosely twist the two ropes together and form a ring on a greased baking sheet.
', 'Step 17: Pinch the ends together well.
', 'Step 18: Brush the dough with melted shortening.
', 'Step 19: Push aside the twist to make a place for each egg.
', 'Step 20: Push eggs down carefully as far as possible.
', 'Step 21: Cover the bread with wax paper and let rise in a warm, draft-free place until doubled in bulk, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 22: Bake the bread in a preheated 350 degree F (175 degrees C) oven for about 35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in a twist comes out clean.
', 'Step 23: Place on a wire rack to cool.
', 'Step 24: Once the bread is cool, drizzle the icing on top between the eggs, and decorate with colored sprinkles.
', "Step 25: To make icing: mix together confectioners' sugar, 1 tablespoon whole milk, and vanilla.
"]
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '654.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '100.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '251 mg', 'fatContent': '20.8 g', 'fiberContent': '3.3 g', 'proteinContent': '17.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '564.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '34.9 g'}

Title: Cheesy Polenta Casserole
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '¼ teaspoon minced garlic', '2 green onions, chopped', '1 (14 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '¼ cup shredded fontina cheese', '¾ cup shredded provolone or mozzarella cheese', '1 (16 ounce) tube ready-made polenta, cut into 1/4-inch slices', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly oil a 8x8-inch casserole dish with cooking spray and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Stir in green pepper, garlic, and green onions; cook until the pepper softens, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour in marinara sauce and simmer 5 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 6: Mix together fontina and provolone in a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Spread a thin layer of sauce over the bottom of the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Arrange 1/3 of the polenta slices in the dish, top with 1/3 the fontina and provolone mixture.
', 'Step 9: Spread a thin layer of sauce over cheese.
', 'Step 10: Repeat layers twice.
', 'Step 11: Top casserole with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 12: Bake in preheated oven until cheese is bubbly and golden brown, about 25 minutes.
']

Title: Italian White Bean Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 clove garlic, sliced', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '2 zucchinis, sliced', '1 (15.5 ounce) can white beans, drained', '1 roma tomato, chopped', '5 fresh basil leaves', 'ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 2: Cook the garlic in the skillet until browned.
', 'Step 3: Add the chicken and cook until slightly browned, about 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: Stir the zucchini and white beans into the skillet; cover and cook about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Scatter the tomato over the dish; cover again and cook another 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add the basil leaves and cook 1 minute more.
', 'Step 7: Season with black pepper to serve.
']

Title: Lemon Panna Cotta
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice', '1 (.25 ounce) package powdered gelatin (such as Knox®)', '3 cups heavy cream', '½ cup white sugar', '2 ½ tablespoons fresh lemon zest, divided', '1 tablespoon orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place lemon juice in a small bowl and sprinkle the unflavored gelatin over it.
', 'Step 2: Let stand for about 15 minutes until gelatin softens.
', 'Step 3: Combine heavy cream, sugar, and 2 tablespoons lemon zest in a saucepan over medium-low heat; bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 4: Whisk in gelatin mixture until dissolved.
', 'Step 5: Remove from heat and stir in orange liqueur.
', 'Step 6: Strain the cream mixture into a medium bowl and divide evenly among small glass bowls or ramekins.
', 'Step 7: Place uncovered panna cottas into the refrigerator until set, at least 4 hours.
', 'Step 8: If time permits, cover the bowls with plastic wrap and chill overnight.
', 'Step 9: Garnish with remaining lemon zest before serving.
']

Title: Chicken Scarpariello
Ingredients: ['1 ¼ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons butter', '2 tablespoons shallots, minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup water', '½ cup white wine', '1 cube chicken bouillon', '½ teaspoon dried rosemary, crushed', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut chicken breasts into 1 x 3 inch strips, and dredge in flour.
', 'Step 2: In 10 inch skillet, heat oil and butter.
', 'Step 3: Add chicken.
', 'Step 4: Cook, turning occasionally, until lightly browned on all sides (3 to 4 minutes).
', 'Step 5: Using tongs, remove chicken from skillet.
', 'Step 6: Set aside and keep warm.
', 'Step 7: To same skillet, add shallots and garlic.
', 'Step 8: Saute until softened (1 minute).
', 'Step 9: Add water, wine, broth mix, and seasonings.
', 'Step 10: Mix well.
', 'Step 11: Cook, stirring frequently, until liquid is reduced by 1/2 (3 to 4 minutes).
', 'Step 12: Return chicken to skillet, and cook until sauce is thick and chicken is heated through (2 to 3 minutes).
']

Title: Crunchy Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '2 eggplants, peeled and sliced crosswise 1/4-inch thick', '2 teaspoons salt, or as needed', '4 eggs, beaten', '1 ½ cups panko bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons dried Italian herb seasoning', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '4 cups prepared pasta sauce', '2 cups shredded Italian cheese blend', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray an 11x13-inch baking dish and 2 baking sheets with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Place eggplant slices on racks over the sink or paper towels and sprinkle both sides of slices lightly with salt.
', 'Step 4: Let eggplant drain for 30 minutes, rinse, and pat dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 5: Place eggplant slices on prepared baking sheets.
', 'Step 6: Bake in the preheated oven until eggplant is soft, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour beaten eggs into a shallow bowl; combine panko bread crumbs with Italian seasoning in a separate shallow bowl.
', 'Step 8: Dip eggplant into beaten egg and press into panko crumbs to coat.
', 'Step 9: Place breaded eggplant back on the baking sheets and spray the slices with cooking spray.
', "Step 10: Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 11: Broil eggplant slices until tops are golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes; remove slices, turn, and spray other sides with cooking spray.
', 'Step 12: Broil until golden brown 2 to 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove eggplant and turn oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook and stir onion and garlic until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Stir in prepared pasta sauce and remove from heat.
', 'Step 16: Spread 1/3 of the pasta sauce into bottom of the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 17: Top with half the eggplant slices, half the Italian cheese blend, and half the Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 18: Spread another 1/3 of the sauce over the layers; layer the remaining eggplant, remaining pasta sauce, Italian cheese blend, and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 19: Bake casserole in the 350 degree oven until cheese is melted and bubbly, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Let stand about 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Zucchini Risotto
Ingredients: ['7 cups vegetable or chicken stock', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 medium onion, chopped', '2 cups Arborio rice, uncooked', '½ medium zucchini, thinly sliced with a vegetable peeler', '10 sun-dried tomatoes, softened and chopped', '1 teaspoon dried thyme, crushed', '6 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan (or mozzarella) cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil leaves, or to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring vegetable or chicken stock to a boil in a medium stock pot, then reduce heat to a low simmer.
', 'Step 2: Melt butter in a large, heavy bottomed stock pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Stir in onions and cook for 2 minutes, or until softened.
', 'Step 4: Add the rice and cook for another 2 minutes, stirring constantly, until lightly toasted.
', 'Step 5: Gradually ladle in simmering vegetable stock, stirring continuously.
', 'Step 6: Risotto will become "creamy" and slightly sticky, yet still firm in the center, or al dente.
', 'Step 7: When almost finished, stir in the zucchini, sun-dried tomatoes, and thyme, adding stock as needed and stirring continuously.
', 'Step 8: Stir in basil and 3 tablespoons cheese just before serving.
', 'Step 9: Divide risotto among 6 bowls, sprinkle with remaining cheese, and season with pepper to taste.
']

Title: Easiest Focaccia Recipe
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '⅓ cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ teaspoon salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, dissolve sugar and yeast in warm water.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until creamy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, combine the yeast mixture with flour; stir well to combine.
', 'Step 4: Stir in additional water, 1 tablespoon at a time, until all of the flour is absorbed.
', 'Step 5: When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and knead briefly for about 1 minute.
', 'Step 6: Lightly oil a large bowl, place the dough in the bowl and turn to coat with oil.
', 'Step 7: Cover with a damp cloth and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Deflate the dough and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface; knead briefly.
', 'Step 10: Pat or roll the dough into a sheet and place on a lightly greased baking sheet.
', 'Step 11: Brush the dough with oil and sprinkle with salt.
', 'Step 12: Bake focaccia in preheated oven for 10 to 20 minutes, depending on desired crispness.
', "Step 13: If you like it moist and fluffy, then you'll have to wait just about 10 minutes.
", 'Step 14: If you like it crunchier and darker in the outside, you may have to wait 20 minutes.
']

Title: Roasted Garlic Scalloped Potatoes
Ingredients: ['1 (19 ounce) can creamy potato with roasted garlic soup', '½ cup heavy cream', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '6 large potatoes, peeled and sliced', '2 ½ cups shredded Cheddar cheese, divided']

', 'Step 4: Layer potatoes with cheese, ending with potatoes and reserving 1/2 cup cheese.
', 'Step 5: Pour soup mixture over potatoes and sprinkle with remaining cheese.

Title: Scaloppine al Marsala
Ingredients: ['1 ⅓ pounds veal medallions', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or as needed', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '½ cup Marsala wine', '½ cup water', '1 tablespoon cornstarch']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place veal between 2 sheets of heavy plastic on a solid, level surface; pound to 1/4-inch thickness with the smooth side of a meat mallet.
', 'Step 2: Pat dry with a paper towel and dust with flour on both sides.
', 'Step 3: Melt butter with olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat until it starts to foam.
', 'Step 4: Add veal; cook until browned, 3 to 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt.
', 'Step 6: Transfer veal to a plate.
', 'Step 7: Cover with aluminum foil to keep warm.
', 'Step 8: Pour Marsala wine into the same skillet.
', 'Step 9: Stir to scrape up browned bits from the bottom of the skillet, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir water and cornstarch together in a small bowl until cornstarch dissolves.
', 'Step 11: Stir into the Marsala wine in the skillet.
', 'Step 12: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 13: Cook until sauce thickens, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Return veal to the skillet; cook until heated through, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 15: Remove from heat and serve topped with sauce.
']

Title: Best Ziti Ever with Sausage
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package ziti pasta', '1 pound mild Italian sausage, casings removed', '2 (24 ounce) jars Classico® Tomato and Basil Sauce', '1 ½ teaspoons dried basil, divided', '12 ounces ricotta cheese', '1 ½ teaspoons Italian seasoning, divided', '1 dash salt and pepper', '1 pound mozzarella cheese, shredded']

Title: Risotto with Chicken and Asparagus
Ingredients: ['2 cups chicken stock', '1 tablespoon olive oil or butter', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '2 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed', '2 teaspoons olive oil or butter', '½ large onion, minced', '1 cup Carnaroli or Arborio rice', '½ cup white wine', '8 ounces asparagus, finely chopped', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring chicken stock to a boil in a small saucepan, then keep warm over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the garlic and cook 30 seconds until fragrant.
', 'Step 4: Add the cubed chicken, and continue cooking until firm and lightly browned; set aside.
', 'Step 5: Heat remaining 2 teaspoons olive oil in the saucepan and cook onions until they soften and turn translucent, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the rice, and continue cooking until the rice turns opaque, and the onion begins to brown.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the wine and asparagus; cook, stirring constantly, until the wine evaporates.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to medium, and stir in 1/3 of the hot chicken stock.
', 'Step 9: Cook, stirring constantly, until all of the liquid has been absorbed, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir in another 1/3 of the chicken stock and continue cooking and stirring until absorbed, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Season the risotto with oregano and basil.
', 'Step 12: Pour in the remaining stock, and stir until absorbed again, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Season to taste with salt and pepper, then stir in the Parmesan cheese and chicken cubes.
']

Title: Best Instant Pot® Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['1 pound skinless, boneless chicken thighs', '2 small skinless, boneless chicken breasts, halved lengthwise', '1 tablespoon sea salt', '1 tablespoon fresh ground black pepper', '¼ tablespoon cornstarch', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '3 stalks celery, chopped', '1 small onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 green bell pepper, diced', '1 red bell pepper, diced', '2 large jarred roasted red bell peppers, chopped', '¾ cup dry Cabernet Sauvignon', '3 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 ½ teaspoons red pepper flakes, or to taste', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '2 teaspoons onion powder', '2 teaspoons chicken bouillon granules', '2 teaspoons Italian seasoning']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Dredge chicken thighs and breasts with salt, pepper, and flour.
', 'Step 2: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 3: Heat 1/2 the olive oil.
', 'Step 4: Add chicken and cook until browned on both sides, flipping halfway using tongs, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Transfer chicken to a plate.
', 'Step 6: Heat remaining olive oil in the pot.
', 'Step 7: Saute celery and onion until translucent, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add garlic; stir in mushrooms, green bell pepper, diced red bell pepper, and roasted red pepper.
', 'Step 9: Saute until fragrant, about 1 minute more.
', 'Step 10: Return chicken to pot.
', 'Step 11: Add Cabernet Sauvignon, tomato paste, red pepper flakes, garlic powder, onion powder, bouillon, and Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 12: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 13: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 11 minutes.
", 'Step 14: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 15: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 16: Unlock and remove lid.
']

Title: Osso Buco
Ingredients: ['¼ cup all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 pounds veal shank', '3 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup chopped onion', '1 cup thinly sliced carrots', '½ cup chopped celery', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 cup water', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '3 sprigs fresh parsley', '1 bay leaf']

['Step 1: In a shallow dish, stir together flour, salt, and black pepper.
', 'Step 2: Dredge meat in seasoned flour.
', 'Step 3: In a large skillet, melt butter with oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Brown meat.
', 'Step 5: Remove meat from pan, and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Add onion, carrots, celery, and garlic to drippings in pan.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir for about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in tomato sauce, water, basil, thyme, parsley, and bay leaf.
', 'Step 9: Return meat to pan.
', 'Step 10: Bring to a boil, and reduce heat to simmer.
', 'Step 11: Cover, and cook for 2 1/2 hours.
']

Title: Spicy Italian Salad
Ingredients: ['½ cup canola oil', '⅓ cup tarragon vinegar', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', '½ teaspoon dry mustard', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (8 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and quartered', '5 cups romaine lettuce - rinsed, dried, and chopped', '1 red bell pepper, cut into strips', '1 carrot, grated', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '¼ cup black olives', '¼ cup pitted green olives', '½ cucumber, sliced', '2 tablespoons grated Romano cheese', 'ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 2: Cover, and shake until well blended.
', 'Step 3: Place artichoke hearts into the mixture, cover, and marinate in the refrigerator 4 hours, or overnight.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl, toss together lettuce, red bell pepper, carrot, red onion, black olives, green olives, cucumber, and Romano cheese.
', 'Step 5: Season with pepper.
', 'Step 6: Pour in the artichoke and marinade mixture, and toss to coat.
']

Title: Mom's Spaghetti Bolognese
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 slices bacon, diced', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 stalk celery, finely chopped', '1 carrot, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pound lean ground beef', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 (28 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 teaspoons white sugar', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook the spaghetti in the boiling water until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 3: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook the bacon in the oil until crisp, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir the onion, celery, carrot, and oregano into the bacon; continue cooking until the vegetables begin to soften, another 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Crumble the ground beef into the vegetable mixture; cook and stir until the beef is completely cooked and no longer pink, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Pour the balsamic vinegar over the ground beef mixture; allow to simmer until the liquid evaporates, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, and sugar into the ground beef mixture; bring the mixture to a boil, season with salt and black pepper, and remove from heat.
', 'Step 10: Stir the fresh basil into the mixture.
', 'Step 11: Ladle the sauce over the cooked spaghetti.
', 'Step 12: Top with Parmesan cheese to serve.
']

', 'Step 2: Stir the penne into the water and return to a boil.

', 'Step 4: Transfer the drained pasta to a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Place the basil, red pepper, and Parmesan cheese in the bowl of a food processor; stream the olive oil into the mixture as it blends until smooth.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Drizzle the sauce over the cooked pasta and toss to coat.
']

Title: Best Vodka Sauce

Title: Lentil Rice and Veggie Bake
Ingredients: ['½ cup uncooked long grain white rice', '2 ½ cups water', '1 cup red lentils', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 fresh tomato, chopped', '⅓ cup chopped celery', '⅓ cup chopped carrots', '⅓ cup chopped zucchini', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt and pepper to taste']

', 'Step 2: Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer 20 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Place lentils in a pot with the remaining 1 1/2 cups water, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook 15 minutes, or until tender.
', 'Step 5: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and stir in the onion and garlic.
', 'Step 7: Mix in tomato, celery, carrots, zucchini, and 1/2 the tomato sauce.

', 'Step 9: Cook until vegetables are tender.
', 'Step 10: In a casserole dish, mix the rice, lentils, and vegetables.
', 'Step 11: Top with remaining tomato sauce, and sprinkle with remaining basil, oregano, and cumin.
', 'Step 12: Bake 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly.
']

Title: Lobster Ravioli in Tomato Cream Sauce with Shrimp
Ingredients: ['½ pound unpeeled large shrimp', '1 yellow onion, quartered', '2 stalks celery with leaves, cut into pieces', '1 lemon, halved', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '2 tablespoons whole black peppercorns', '½ cup chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', '3 cups water', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '1 shallot, minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons lemon zest', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 cup white wine', '1 cup canned petite diced tomatoes', '½ cup heavy cream', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '16 lobster ravioli', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', '1 teaspoon lemon zest']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Peel and devein the shrimp, reserving the shells and heads.
', 'Step 2: Chop the shrimp into bite-size pieces.
', 'Step 3: To make the shrimp stock, combine the shrimp shells and heads, onion, and celery in a large pot.
', 'Step 4: Squeeze the lemon juice into the pot, then add the lemon halves as well.
', 'Step 5: Add the dried basil, oregano, thyme, peppercorns, 1/2 cup parsley, and 3 cups of water.
', 'Step 6: Cover the pot and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 1 hour, skimming away any foam or impurities that have risen to the surface.
', 'Step 8: Strain the shrimp stock and set aside.
', 'Step 9: Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 10: Cook the shrimp pieces until pink and almost cooked through, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove and set aside.
', 'Step 12: Add the shallots to the pan; cook and stir until the shallots have softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir in the garlic, lemon zest, salt, and ground pepper.
', 'Step 14: Cook for thirty seconds, then add the white wine.
', 'Step 15: Bring to a boil and cook until the white wine is reduced by half, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Add the shrimp stock to the pan, bring it to a boil, and simmer until the sauce is reduce by half, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Meanwhile, fill a large pot with heavily salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 18: Once the water is boiling, stir in ravioli, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 19: Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the ravioli float to the top and the filling is hot, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Drain well, reserving a little pasta-cooking water to thin the sauce, if necessary.
', 'Step 21: Stir the diced tomatoes and cream into the shrimp sauce and heat through.
', 'Step 22: Return the shrimp to the pan, taste the sauce, and season to taste with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 23: Fold the ravioli into the sauce.
', 'Step 24: Place four ravioli onto each of four warmed pasta bowls or plates and top with sauce.
', 'Step 25: Garnish the pasta with chopped parsley and lemon zest.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '606.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '68.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '174.3 mg', 'fatContent': '20 g', 'fiberContent': '7.8 g', 'proteinContent': '28.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '11.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '910.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.7 g'}

Title: Skillet Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound Italian sausage roll', '8 lasagna noodles, broken into pieces', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '2 cups torn fresh spinach', '½ cup ricotta cheese', '4 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir sausage, breaking into smaller pieces, in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Mix noodles into sausage.
', 'Step 4: Pour crushed tomatoes and tomato sauce over sausage-noodle mixture; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cover skillet, reduce heat, and simmer until noodles are cooked and sauce is thickened, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add spinach, ricotta cheese, and mozzarella cheese; cover skillet and remove from heat.
', 'Step 7: Let lasagna stand for 5 minutes; top with Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Turkey Avocado Panini
Ingredients: ['½ ripe avocado', '¼ cup mayonnaise', '2 ciabatta rolls', '1 tablespoon olive oil, divided', '2 slices provolone cheese', '1 cup whole fresh spinach leaves, divided', '¼ pound thinly sliced mesquite smoked turkey breast', '2 roasted red peppers, sliced into strips']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mash the avocado and the mayonnaise together in a bowl until thoroughly mixed.
', 'Step 2: Preheat a panini sandwich press.
', 'Step 3: To make the sandwiches, split the ciabatta rolls in half the flat way, and brush the bottom of each roll with olive oil.
', 'Step 4: Place the bottoms of the rolls onto the panini press, olive oil side down.
', 'Step 5: Place a provolone cheese slice, half the spinach leaves, half the sliced turkey breast, and a sliced roasted red pepper on each sandwich.
', 'Step 6: Spread half of the avocado mixture on the cut surface of each top, and place the top of the roll on the sandwich.
', 'Step 7: Brush the top of the roll with olive oil.
', 'Step 8: Close the panini press and cook until the bun is toasted and crisp, with golden brown grill marks, and the cheese has melted, about 5 to 8 minutes.
']

Title: Pizza Without the Red Sauce

Title: Italian Baked Eggplant with Parmesan (Parmigiana di Melanzane)
Ingredients: ['3 pounds large eggplants, sliced lengthwise into 1/4-inch slices', '2 tablespoons coarse salt, or as needed', '5 cups vegetable oil for frying', '2 tablespoons flour for dredging', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '½ onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, halved', '3 (15 ounce) cans tomato puree', '8 leaves fresh basil leaves, halved', 'salt to taste', '1 ½ (16 ounce) packages fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced', '2 ½ cups freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place a single layer of eggplant slices in a colander sitting on a plate and sprinkle with coarse salt.
', 'Step 2: Cover with a second layer and sprinkle with salt.
', 'Step 3: Repeat with remaining eggplant.
', 'Step 4: Place a plate on top and add a weight to put pressure on the eggplant slices.
', 'Step 5: Let stand at room temperature for about 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Rinse eggplant slices under running cold water to wash off all the salt.
', 'Step 7: Pat dry on all sides with paper towels.
', 'Step 8: Heat oil in a deep skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 9: Dredge eggplant slices in flour on both sides and add to the hot oil, working in batches.
', 'Step 10: Deep fry eggplant until golden, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 11: Drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 12: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat; cook garlic and onion until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Add tomato puree, 4 basil leaves, and salt.
', 'Step 14: Cook, stirring often, until sauce starts to thicken, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove sauce from heat.
', 'Step 16: Discard garlic and stir in remaining 4 leaves basil.
', 'Step 17: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 18: Spread a layer of tomato sauce over the bottom of a baking dish.
', 'Step 19: Cover with a single layer of eggplant slices.
', 'Step 20: Top with more sauce, mozzarella slices, and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 21: Continue making layers, a total of 3 to 5, finishing with tomato sauce and grated Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 22: Bake in the preheated oven until heated through and bubbling, 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Remove from oven and let stand for 20 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '591.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '30.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '76.5 mg', 'fatContent': '38.5 g', 'fiberContent': '9.1 g', 'proteinContent': '35.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '15.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '3313.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '13.5 g'}

Title: Italian Chicken and Chickpeas
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '2 tablespoons dried rosemary', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons white sugar', '1 bay leaf', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Season the chicken with the rosemary on both sides; cook the chicken in the hot oil until browned evenly, 3 to 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 3: Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Pour 1 tablespoon olive oil into the skillet.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir the garlic in the hot oil until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 6: Add the tomato sauce, Italian seasoning, cayenne pepper, sugar, bay leaf, and red pepper flakes to the skillet; stir.
', 'Step 7: Return the chicken to the skillet; cover and reduce heat to medium-low.
', 'Step 8: Simmer until the chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 10 to 12 minutes.

']

', 'Step 2: Add garlic, and cook for a few minutes, stirring constantly.

Title: Roasted Garlic Potato Soup
Ingredients: ['6 potatoes, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 onion, chopped', '6 cloves garlic, peeled', '3 cups chicken broth', '1 cup water', '1 cup whole milk', 'salt to taste']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place potatoes in a shallow roasting pan and drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil.
