Title: Jenn's Out Of This World Spaghetti and Meatballs
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '¾ cup chopped onion', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (16 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes', '3 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '1 cup water', '½ cup sugar', '¼ cup chopped fresh oregano, divided', '1 dried bay leaf', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 pound ground round', '½ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (16 ounce) package uncooked spaghetti']

['Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat, and cook the onion until lightly brown.
', 'Step 2: Mix in 2 cloves garlic, and cook 1 minute.
', 'Step 3: Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, water, sugar, 1/2 the oregano, and bay leaf.
', 'Step 4: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer while preparing meatballs.

', 'Step 7: Season with salt and pepper.

', 'Step 9: Cook 40 minutes in the sauce, or until internal temperature of meatballs reaches a minimum of 160 degrees F (72 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil, and stir in the spaghetti.

Title: Rhode Island-Style Pizza Strips aka Bakery Pizza
Ingredients: ['2 pounds prepared pizza dough', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '½ cup minced pepperoni', '¼ cup olive oil', '3 tablespoons grated Romano cheese', '3 tablespoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '¾ teaspoon minced garlic', '¾ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '¼ cup olive oil, divided']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease 2 baking sheets or line with parchment paper.

', 'Step 4: Mix crushed tomatoes, pepperoni, 1/4 cup olive oil, Romano cheese, sugar, salt, garlic, oregano, and black pepper in a bowl, stirring to dissolve sugar and salt.
', 'Step 5: Spread half the sauce evenly over each crust, spreading it all the way to the edges.

Title: Bracciole (Flank Steak Rolls)
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup chopped fresh parsley', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 hard-boiled egg, chopped', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or more if needed', '2 pounds flank steak, pounded until thin', '5 toothpicks, or as needed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 pinch white sugar', '1 tomato, chopped, or more as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onion in the hot oil until tender, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Season with 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon pepper.
', 'Step 3: Mix parsley, garlic, Parmesan cheese, egg, 1 pinch salt, and 1 pinch pepper in a bowl; drizzle in about 1 tablespoon olive oil, while continually stirring, until a sticky consistency is reached.
', 'Step 4: Spread parsley filling in a thin layer atop flank steak; roll steak in a jelly-roll style and fasten ending piece to steak with toothpicks to contain filling.
', 'Step 5: Pour remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil into skillet with onions over medium heat; cook steak roll in the onion mixture, turning steak until browned on all sides, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Add tomato sauce, sugar, and chopped tomato to the steak mixture; simmer over very low heat until steak is cooked through and sauce has slightly reduced, 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
']

Title: My Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients: ['½ cup all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '6 chicken breast tenderloins', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon half-and-half', '1 cup seasoned bread crumbs', '½ cup panko bread crumbs', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon minced fresh flat-leaf parsley', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 quarts water', '1 tablespoon salt', '6 ounces angel hair pasta', '1 ½ cups prepared marinara sauce, divided', '3 ounces shredded Italian cheese blend']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Combine flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, garlic powder, black pepper, and cayenne pepper in a resealable plastic bag.
', 'Step 4: Place chicken tenderloins into flour mixture, seal the bag, and shake to coat.
', 'Step 5: Beat egg and half-and-half thoroughly in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 6: Mix seasoned break crumbs, panko crumbs, Parmesan cheese, and parsley in another bowl.
', 'Step 7: Dip floured chicken tenderloins into beaten egg, let excess egg drip off, then press chicken into crumb mixture to coat.
', 'Step 8: Let chicken stand for 10 minutes to set coating.
', 'Step 9: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook chicken tenderloins until the juices run clear, chicken is no longer pink inside, and coating is golden brown, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 10: Bring water and 1 tablespoon salt to a boil in a large pot; stir angel hair pasta into boiling water.
', 'Step 11: Cook pasta, stirring occasionally, until cooked through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Drain.
', 'Step 13: Pour 3/4 cup marinara sauce into prepared baking dish; top sauce with cooked angel hair pasta.
', 'Step 14: Pour remaining 3/4 cup sauce over pasta and arrange chicken tenderloins over sauce.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle Italian cheese blend over chicken.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese topping is melted and bubbling, about 10 minutes.
']

Title: Oxtail Ragu
Ingredients: ['3 ½ pounds beef oxtail, cut into 2-inch sections', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper', '1 large yellow onion, diced', '6 cloves garlic, roughly chopped', '¼ cup sherry vinegar', '4 cups tomato sauce or puree, or more if desired', '2 cups chicken broth, or enough to cover the oxtails', '1 sprig fresh rosemary', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 sprigs fresh oregano', '1 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste', '¼ teaspoon red chili flakes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly oil a baking pan large enough to hold the oxtails in a single layer.
', 'Step 3: Place chopped onions and garlic in prepared pan.
', 'Step 4: Rub oxtail sections with olive oil; season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
', 'Step 5: Arrange on top of onions.
', 'Step 6: Roast in preheated oven for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Turn oxtails and continue roasting until well browned, another 20 to 35 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove pan from oven.
', 'Step 9: Pour in wine vinegar, tomato sauce, chicken stock or water, rosemary, thyme, oregano, salt, and red chili flakes to the baking pan; stir.
', 'Step 10: Pour the entire mixture into a large pot.
', 'Step 11: Place over medium-high heat until sauce begins to simmer.
', 'Step 12: Cover; reduce heat, and simmer over low heat until meat easily separates from the bone and is very tender, about 4 to 5 hours.
', 'Step 13: Skim off fat before serving.
']

Title: Old-Fashioned Italian Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients: ['6 eggs', '3 zucchinis, shredded', '1 zucchini, diced', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 cups vegetable oil for frying']

', 'Step 2: Stir in the shredded and diced zucchini, then season with salt, pepper, Parmesan cheese, and basil.

Title: Chef John's Pasta con le Sarde
Ingredients: ['¾ cup dry bread crumbs', '6 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '1 pinch saffron', '¼ cup white wine', '½ pound bucatini pasta', '1 cup diced yellow onion', '1 cup diced fennel bulb', 'salt to taste', '¼ cup golden raisins', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 anchovy fillet', '2 (4 ounce) cans sardines packed in oil, drained and crumbled', '¼ cup toasted pine nuts', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '3 tablespoons chopped fennel fronds, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook and stir bread crumbs with 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat until bread crumbs are crispy and toasted, 2 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Transfer breadcrumbs to a bowl to cool.
', 'Step 3: Grind saffron threads with a mortar and pestle; pour white wine into mortar and stir to combine.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook bucatini in boiling water, stirring occasionally until almost cooked through but firm to the bite, 10 to 11 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain, reserving 1/2 cup of the pasta water.
', 'Step 7: Heat remaining olive oil in large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Cook and stir onion and fennel with a pinch of salt in hot oil until onion is soft, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir raisins, garlic, and anchovy fillet into onion mixture; cook and stir until heated through, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 10: Pour saffron-wine into skillet; cook until wine is almost evaporated, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Pour 1 ladleful reserved pasta water into skillet and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 12: Stir pine nuts and red pepper flakes into sauce; simmer until flavors combine and sauce is reduced, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir bucatini and sardines into wine mixture; increase heat to high, and cook, stirring frequently and adding more reserved pasta water as necessary, until sauce and pasta are heated through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 15: Ladle into bowls and top with fennel fronds and toasted bread crumbs.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '708.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '72.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '81.4 mg', 'fatContent': '33.3 g', 'fiberContent': '4.6 g', 'proteinContent': '27.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '531.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.9 g'}

Title: Slow Cooker Turkey Meatballs in Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['¼ cup minced onion', '1 tablespoon Italian-style salad dressing', '1 ½ pounds ground turkey', '1 ¼ cups Italian-seasoned bread crumbs', '5 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans Italian-style diced tomatoes', '1 (26 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '2 teaspoons dried basil']

', 'Step 2: Remove from heat and let cool slightly, about 5 minutes.

', 'Step 4: Combine diced tomatoes and marinara in a second bowl; set aside.

', 'Step 6: Pour 1/2 of the tomato mixture over the meatballs.

', 'Step 8: Cover and cook until no longer pink in the centers, about 4 hours on High, or 8 hours on Low.

Title: True Italian Porcini Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients: ['1 ounce dried porcini mushrooms', '1 cup hot water', '1 (32 ounce) carton beef stock', '¼ cup olive oil, divided', '3 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 cup white wine, divided', '¼ cup butter, divided', '1 shallot, chopped', '1 ¾ cups Arborio rice', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place porcini mushrooms in a bowl and cover with hot water.
', 'Step 2: Let soak until soft, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 3: Drain, reserving soaking liquid.
', 'Step 4: Squeeze mushrooms to remove excess water and roughly chop.
', 'Step 5: Bring beef stock to a boil in a saucepan.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low and cover to keep warm.
', 'Step 7: Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Add garlic cloves; cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add mushrooms; cook and stir until soft, 5 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Season with rosemary, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Discard garlic cloves; pour in 1/2 cup wine.
', 'Step 12: Increase heat to medium-high and simmer until wine reduces, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil with 2 tablespoons butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 14: Cook and stir shallot until soft, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Cook and stir Arborio rice until toasted and fragrant, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Pour in remaining 1/2 cup wine.
', 'Step 17: Simmer until wine is absorbed, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Ladle 1/3 of the warm stock into the saucepan; cook and stir until absorbed.
', 'Step 19: Ladle in remaining stock and reserved soaking liquid in small amounts and cook, stirring constantly, until risotto is tender and creamy, 15 to 18 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Remove risotto from the heat; stir in remaining 2 tablespoons butter and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 21: Let stand for 3 to 5 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Tacos in Pasta Shells

Title: Baked Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients: ['1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 cup unsalted butter', '¼ cup white wine', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '½ cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs']

', 'Step 2: Cover pan and cook until shrimp are pink, 2 to 3 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 3: Combine butter, white wine, lemon juice, parsley, cayenne pepper, and garlic in a 2-quart casserole dish.
', 'Step 4: Place casserole dish in oven and preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: When butter is melted, lightly toss shrimp in butter mixture until coated.

Title: Homemade Farfalle Pasta
Ingredients: ["2 ½ cups durum wheat semolina flour (such as Bob's Red Mill®)", '1 pinch salt', '1 cup water, or as needed, at room temperature']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix flour and salt in a large bowl or on a marble work surface.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the center.
', 'Step 3: Pour water into the well a little at a time, mixing it with the flour.
', 'Step 4: Add as much water as needed to make a sticky but compact dough.
', 'Step 5: Knead dough with your hands by flattening the ball, stretching it, and folding the top towards the center.
', 'Step 6: Turn 45 degrees and repeat until dough is elastic and smooth, but not too soft, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 8: Place in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 9: Let rest at room temperature for about 30 minutes before using.
', 'Step 10: Cut off 1/3 of the dough.
', 'Step 11: Wrap the remaining dough in plastic wrap to keep it from drying out.
', 'Step 12: Flatten dough with your hands and pass through the largest setting of your pasta machine.
', 'Step 13: Fold in half, rub with more flour, and pass through the pasta machine again.
', 'Step 14: Keep passing though the machine until you reach an even rectangular sheet of smooth, not sticky, consistency.
', 'Step 15: Pass the dough through the middle setting of your machine and then through the second-to-last to make a long and thin sheet.
', 'Step 16: Trim the sheet into an even rectangle and rub with more flour.
', 'Step 17: Trim off the short edge of the rectangle with a decorative ravioli wheel cutter.
', 'Step 18: Trim the rectangle into strips, about 3/4 inch wide, with a flat ravioli wheel cutter.
', 'Step 19: Section the strips into 1 1/3-inch large pieces with the decorative cutter.
', 'Step 20: Push the sides of each piece towards the centre to form a bow tie and secure with a little dab of water.
', 'Step 21: Proceed the same way with the rest of the dough.
', 'Step 22: Transfer the farfalle to a floured surface and sprinkle with more semolina flour.
', 'Step 23: Do not overlap or they will stick.
', 'Step 24: Let dry for about 30 minutes before cooking.
']
Nutrition Label: {'sodiumContent': '40.5 mg'}

Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients: ['2 large zucchini, thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (16 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a large pot boil the zucchini until tender; drain.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, in a medium frying pan heat the olive oil over medium heat and saute the onion and garlic until the onion is tender.
', 'Step 4: Combine the zucchini, onion and garlic in a 9x12 inch casserole dish, and mix well.
', 'Step 5: Pour the spaghetti sauce over the mixture and stir well.
', 'Step 6: Top with mozzarella cheese (use more or less depending on your preference).
', 'Step 7: Bake in preheated oven for about 20 minutes, or until heated through and cheese is bubbly.
']

Title: Eggplant Parmesan Casserole
Ingredients: ['2 large eggplants', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pinch salt, or as needed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, sliced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '3 cups prepared marinara sauce', '½ cup water, plus more as needed', '¾ cup ricotta cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup shredded pepperjack cheese', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '¾ cup dry bread crumbs', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Cut 5 crosswise slices from center area of each eggplant, about 1/2-inch thick, to total 10 slices.
', 'Step 3: Peel and dice remaining pieces of eggplant.
', 'Step 4: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat until oil is very hot.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle eggplant slices lightly with a pinch of salt and cook in hot skillet in batches until slightly softened, about 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Set eggplant slices aside on paper towels.
', 'Step 7: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in skillet and cook garlic for about 10 seconds; add diced eggplant and season with a pinch of salt and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 8: Saute until eggplant is softened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Pour in marinara sauce and water.
', 'Step 10: Turn heat to medium-low and cook until eggplant is tender, about 15 minutes; stir occasionally.
', 'Step 11: If sauce gets too thick, add a little more water.
', 'Step 12: Combine ricotta cheese, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, pepperjack cheese, a pinch of salt, and a pinch black pepper in a bowl until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 13: Spread about 2 tablespoons cheese mixture over each eggplant slice.
', 'Step 14: Fold eggplant slices in half to enclose the cheese mixture.
', 'Step 15: Spread about half the sauce into an 8x8-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 16: Lay folded eggplant slices in a single layer into the dish.
', 'Step 17: Spread remaining sauce over eggplant slices.
', 'Step 18: Combine bread crumbs, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, and 2 tablespoons olive oil in a bowl; mix thoroughly.
', 'Step 19: Spread crumb mixture over eggplant casserole.
', 'Step 20: Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is bubbling and crumbs are browned, 35 to 40 minutes.
']

Title: Lasagna Cupcakes
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '⅓ pound ground beef', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '24 wonton wrappers', '1 ¾ cups grated Parmesan cheese', '1 ¾ cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '¾ cup ricotta cheese', '1 cup pasta sauce (such as Muir Glen®)', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Prepare muffin cups with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Drain and discard grease from the beef.
', 'Step 6: Cut wonton wrappers into 2 1/4-inch circles with a biscuit cutter.
', 'Step 7: Press one wonton into the bottom of each muffin cup.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle even amounts of Parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, and ricotta cheese into each muffin cup; top each portion with even amounts of ground beef and pasta sauce.
', 'Step 9: Divide 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese, half the ricotta cheese, 1/2 the ground beef mixture, and 1/2 cup pasta sauce, between the muffin cups and layer, respectively, atop the wonton wrapper; repeat layering with remaining wonton wrappers, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese, remaining ricotta cheese, remaining ground beef, and remaining pasta sauce.
', "Step 10: Top the 'cupcakes' with remaining Parmesan cheese and mozzarella cheese.
", "Step 11: Bake in preheated oven until edges of 'cupcakes' are browned, 18 to 20 minutes; let cook in tins for 5 minutes before running a knife around the edges of the cupcakes to loosen the edges to remove.
", 'Step 12: Garnish with fresh basil to serve.
']

Title: Cassata Cake
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups cake flour', '½ teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '5 eggs', '½ cup cold water', '1 ¼ cups white sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon cream of tartar', '2 pounds whole milk ricotta cheese', "2 ¼ cups confectioners' sugar", '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 (1 ounce) squares semi-sweet chocolate', '½ cup candied lemon peel', '⅓ cup white sugar', '¼ cup water', '2 tablespoons light rum', '6 (1 ounce) squares bittersweet chocolate, chopped', '⅓ cup heavy whipping cream', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter, cubed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and line with parchment paper 2 nine inch round layer pans.
', 'Step 3: Sift the flour, baking powder, and salt together.
', 'Step 4: Separate the eggs and set the egg whites aside.
', 'Step 5: Beat the egg yolks together on medium-high speed until very thick, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Gradually add the cold water.
', 'Step 7: Add 1- 1/4 cups of the white sugar, slowly, and beat well for about 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add 1 teaspoon of the vanilla.
', 'Step 9: Sift the flour mixture over the egg yolk mixture and fold in.
', 'Step 10: Beat the egg whites and cream of tartar together until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 11: Fold this into the yolk mixture.
', 'Step 12: Divide batter between the pans.
', 'Step 13: Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Cool on rack for 10 minutes and then invert and cool completely.
', 'Step 15: Cut each cake layer in half.
', 'Step 16: Place one of the 4 halves on a cake board or plate and sprinkle with a little of the Rum Syrup.
', 'Step 17: Spread about 1-1/2 cups of the Filling over this layer.
', 'Step 18: Add a second layer of cake and repeat this procedure.
', 'Step 19: Top the cake with the last layer of cake.
', 'Step 20: Chill at least 4 hours.
', 'Step 21: Spread Chocolate Glaze over top of cake.
', "Step 22: To Make Ricotta Cheese Filling: Beat the ricotta cheese well and add the confectioner's sugar and cinnamon.
", 'Step 23: Add 1-1/2 teaspoons of the vanilla and grate 2 ounces of the chocolate in using the coarse side of a grater.
', 'Step 24: Stir in the candied lemon peel and mix.
', 'Step 25: Chill until ready to use.
', 'Step 26: To Make The Rum Syrup: Place 1/3 cup of the sugar and the water in a small saucepan.
', 'Step 27: Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring to dissolve sugar.
', 'Step 28: Boil 1 minute and then remove from heat and add the rum.
', 'Step 29: Cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 30: To Make The Chocolate Glaze: Melt 6 ounces of the chocolate and the cream in the microwave, whisk smooth.
', 'Step 31: Add the butter and whisk until dissolved.
', 'Step 32: Cool mixture until spreadable.
', 'Step 33: Spread over the top of the cake.
']

Title: Pasta e Fagioli a la Chez Ivano
Ingredients: ['3 pounds lean ground beef', '½ cup olive oil', '4 cups chopped onion', '2 cups chopped celery', '2 (4.5 ounce) jars bottled minced garlic', '1 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper', '8 (14 ounce) cans beef broth', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '2 ½ teaspoons dried thyme', '2 ½ teaspoons dried basil', '2 ½ teaspoons dried oregano', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '2 cups ditalini pasta', '2 (15 ounce) cans kidney beans, drained and rinsed']

Title: Cream of Chicken and Gnocchi Soup
Ingredients: ['½ cup margarine', '¾ cup finely chopped onion', '¾ cup finely chopped celery', '½ cup finely grated carrot', '1 ½ teaspoons minced garlic', '⅓ cup all-purpose flour', '4 cups chicken broth', '¾ cup half-and-half', '¾ cup milk', '1 (16 ounce) package potato gnocchi', '1 ½ cups chopped cooked chicken', '¾ cup shredded fresh spinach', '½ teaspoon dried rosemary', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg']

', 'Step 5: Cook soup over low heat until gnocchi become tender, 8 to 10 minutes.
']

Title: Italian-Style Bruschetta

Title: Creamy Ricotta Pasta Sauce
Ingredients: ['8 ounces orecchiette pasta', '½ cup ricotta cheese', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon kosher salt, or more to taste', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 lemon, zested', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '¼ cup pesto, or to taste']

Title: Pepperoni Casserole
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package uncooked rotini pasta', '1 pound ground Italian sausage', '1 (16 ounce) jar pasta sauce', '2 (12 ounce) containers cottage cheese', '1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives', '12 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 (3 ounce) packages sliced pepperoni']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a medium casserole dish.

', 'Step 4: Place pasta in the pot, cook for 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente, and drain.

Title: Easy Spinach Lasagna with White Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach', '29 ounces Alfredo-style pasta sauce', '½ cup skim milk', '1 (8 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '1 pint part-skim ricotta cheese', '1 egg', '8 ounces shredded carrots', '8 ounces fresh mushrooms, sliced', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Coat a 10x15 inch lasagna pan with cooking spray.

Title: Mom's Best Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['4 (14.5 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes', '2 (15 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '4 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '3 cups water', '4 cups fresh sliced mushrooms', '2 onions, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '4 teaspoons white sugar', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '2 pinches baking soda', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix together whole tomatoes, tomato sauce, tomato paste, water, mushrooms, onions, garlic, sugar, salt and pepper, basil, and 1 pinch of baking soda in a large saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil, stirring.
', 'Step 3: Reduce to a simmer, and cook for 4 hours minimum.
', 'Step 4: n Stir in another pinch of baking soda; the sauce will foam.
', 'Step 5: Simmer, stirring occasionally, until thick and almost brown.
', 'Step 6: Make sure to scrape the sides of the pan in to the sauce.
', 'Step 7: n After the sauce is fork consistency, stir in Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 8: Watch that the cheese does not burn.
', 'Step 9: Taste sauce.
', 'Step 10: If it is too tangy or acidic, add another pinch of baking soda and simmer another 1/2 hour.
', 'Step 11: n Cool, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
', 'Step 12: The next day, reheat and serve.
']

Title: Tuscan Onion Soup (Carabaccia)
Ingredients: ['4 pounds red onions', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '3 leaves sage', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'ground cinnamon', '¼ cup finely ground almonds', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar, or to taste', '5 cups beef broth, or more as needed', '3 thick slices Italian bread, halved', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste, divided', '3 leaves sage, or to taste, sliced into thin strips', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Trim ends off onions; halve and peel.
', 'Step 2: Cut onions into thin slices lengthwise along the grain.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a very large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Add onions and kosher salt.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir until starting to turn translucent, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to medium and continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until very soft and sweet, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 7: Add sage leaves, pepper, cinnamon, and almonds to the onions.
', 'Step 8: Cook and stir until fragrant, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Transfer mixture to a soup pot.
', 'Step 10: Pour in red wine vinegar and broth.
', 'Step 11: Bring to a simmer over high heat.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until flavors blend, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Line a small baking sheet with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 15: Place Italian bread on the baking sheet.
', 'Step 16: Drizzle some olive oil over the bread; sprinkle sliced sage and some Parmesan cheese on top.
', 'Step 17: Toast in the preheated oven until browned, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Ladle soup into serving bowls and top each with a piece of toast.
', 'Step 19: Drizzle remaining olive oil over the toast and sprinkle remaining Parmesan cheese on top.
', 'Step 20: Dunk toast into the soup and let soak for a few minutes before serving.
']

Title: Homemade Italian Sausage
Ingredients: ['3 pounds pork shoulder', '4 cloves garlic', '1 ounce kosher salt, divided', '2 tablespoons whole fennel seeds, toasted', '1 teaspoon anise seed', '2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried marjoram', '½ teaspoon ground coriander', '½ teaspoon ground mustard', '¼ teaspoon ground allspice berries', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '2 tablespoons cold water', 'sausage casing, soaked in water until soft']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut pork shoulder into cubes.
', 'Step 2: Place in a bowl and refrigerate while preparing the other ingredients.
', 'Step 3: Grind garlic with a pinch of salt in a mortar to make a paste.
', 'Step 4: Add fennel, anise, and black pepper.
', 'Step 5: Bruise spices lightly with a pestle to release the flavors.
', 'Step 6: Add red pepper flakes, cayenne pepper, oregano, marjoram, coriander, mustard, allspice, sugar, and a splash of water.
', 'Step 7: Stir to combine.
', 'Step 8: Add the spice paste to the pork cubes.
', 'Step 9: Mix thoroughly by hand.
', 'Step 10: Add the remaining salt.
', 'Step 11: Cover and refrigerate until flavors meld, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 12: Process the cold pork through a meat grinder on the slowest speed.
', 'Step 13: Push a casing onto the stuffing tube of your meat grinder.
', 'Step 14: Feed the sausage meat through the filling tray.
', 'Step 15: Run the meat through the casing on the slowest speed until all the casing is used up.
', 'Step 16: Tie casing at the end into a knot.
', 'Step 17: Pinch and twist the meat to create links if desired.
', 'Step 18: Place sausage onto a wire rack set over a sheet pan.
', 'Step 19: Refrigerate uncovered for 24 hours.
', 'Step 20: Preheat a charcoal grill for medium heat.
', 'Step 21: Separate the links and grill them until browned, about 5 minutes per side.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '194.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '4.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '74.4 mg', 'fatContent': '10.4 g', 'fiberContent': '1.3 g', 'proteinContent': '20.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '3.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '1464.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.7 g'}

Title: Peposa Dell'Impruneta (Tuscan Black Pepper Beef)
Ingredients: ['6 beef short ribs (8 to 10 oz. each)', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '8 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '2 tablespoons whole black peppercorns, freshly crushed', '1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper', '3 sage leaves', '3 small sprigs fresh rosemary', '2 bay leaves', '2 cups red wine, preferably Chianti', 'salt to taste, to adjust sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place meat in a large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle all sides generously with 1 tablespoon kosher salt.
', 'Step 3: Place chopped garlic and a pinch of salt in a mortar and mash with pestle until pastelike.
', 'Step 4: Add tomato paste; mash until blended.
', 'Step 5: Transfer mixture into bowl with beef and rub onto all sides of meat.
', 'Step 6: Add crushed peppercorns and ground pepper.
', 'Step 7: Distribute evenly over all sides of beef.
', 'Step 8: Transfer to a deep skillet or Dutch oven bone side down.
', 'Step 9: Tuck sage leaves, rosemary, and dry bay leaves between pieces of meat.
', 'Step 10: Carefully add wine along the side of the pan to avoid washing over the top of the meat.
', 'Step 11: Place pan over high heat and bring to a simmer; reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 12: Cover tightly.
', 'Step 13: Cook until meat is fork tender, turning pieces every 30 minutes or so, about 3 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 14: Transfer pieces of meat to a warm bowl.
', 'Step 15: Increase heat to high and bring braising liquid to a boil.
', 'Step 16: Simmer until liquid is reduced by about half or until slightly thickened, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Remove bones from meat.
', 'Step 18: When sauce is thickened, transfer meat back to skillet.
', 'Step 19: Reduce heat to medium-low and spoon sauce over meat.
', 'Step 20: Cook until until heated through, about 5 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '654.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '5.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '116.2 mg', 'fatContent': '52.1 g', 'fiberContent': '1 g', 'proteinContent': '27.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '22.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '1074.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.4 g'}

Title: Bomba Calabrese (Spicy Calabrian Pepper Spread)
Ingredients: ['4 large button mushrooms, quartered', '½ yellow onion, chopped', '1 small eggplant - trimmed, peeled, cut into chunks', '¾ cup olive oil, or more as needed, divided', '1 pinch kosher salt, plus more as needed', '2 pounds hot cherry peppers', '1 pound red bell peppers', '3 habanero peppers', '1 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste', '½ teaspoon crushed fennel seeds', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ cup white wine vinegar, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place mushrooms, onion, and eggplant into bowl of a food processor.
', 'Step 2: Pulse on and off until very finely chopped but not liquefied, 8 to 10 pulses.
', 'Step 3: Drizzle 2 tablespoons olive oil into a skillet.
', 'Step 4: Transfer mushroom mixture to skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Add a large pinch of salt.
', 'Step 6: Cook until mixture is soft, stirring, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Cut off tops of cherry peppers; discard stems but save the ring of pepper around it.
', 'Step 8: (Do wear protective gloves for this.
', 'Step 9: ) Cut the peppers in half and remove the seed pods.
', 'Step 10: Shake out the rest of the seeds.
', 'Step 11: Prep the bell peppers and habanero peppers the same way.
', 'Step 12: Place all peppers in bowl of food processor.
', 'Step 13: Pulse on and off until peppers are very finely chopped, but not liquefied.
', 'Step 14: Transfer peppers to eggplant-onion-mushroom mixture in skillet.
', 'Step 15: Add remaining olive oil.
', 'Step 16: Cook and stir over medium-high heat, reducing heat as needed if mixture looks like it may brown.
', 'Step 17: Add fennel seeds, oregano, and a pinch of salt.
', 'Step 18: Cook until peppers are sweet and tender, 20 to 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 19: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 20: Stir in white wine vinegar and (optionally) another tablespoon of olive oil.
', 'Step 21: Transfer mixture to a mixing bowl and cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 22: Taste for seasonings, adding more salt, a splash of vinegar, and/or olive oil, if needed.
', 'Step 23: Transfer to jars.
', 'Step 24: Store in refrigerator.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '57.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '2.7 g', 'fatContent': '5.2 g', 'fiberContent': '0.8 g', 'proteinContent': '0.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '74 mg', 'sugarContent': '1 g'}

Title: Roasted Garlic without Foil
Ingredients: ['1 medium head garlic', '2 tablespoons olive oil']

['Step 1: Method 1: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (125 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Slice 1/4 inch off top of garlic bulb.
', 'Step 3: Place in a small baking dish and drizzle with olive oil.
', 'Step 4: Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes, until outside is lightly browned and garlic cloves are soft.
', 'Step 5: When cool enough to touch, squeeze each clove to extract softened garlic.
', 'Step 6: Method 2: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (125 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Peel each garlic clove.
', 'Step 8: Place in a single layer in a small baking dish and drizzle with olive oil.
', 'Step 9: Bake for 15 minutes, until garlic is soft.
']

Title: Zuppa Di Pesce Fra Di Avolo
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 pounds sea scallops', '2 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 pound calamari rings', '24 mussels, cleaned and debearded', '24 littleneck clams, scrubbed and rinsed', '3 (14.5 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes', '1 cup water', '2 (6.5 ounce) cans chopped clams', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 small yellow onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons red pepper flakes', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 (16 ounce) packages linguine pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 3 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir sea scallops, shrimp, and calamari rings in the hot oil until scallops and calamari are opaque and shrimp are pink, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Bring a separate pot of water to a boil and add mussels and littleneck clams to the boiling water; cook until shells have opened, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove shellfish and rinse with hot water.
', 'Step 4: Pour crushed tomatoes, water, 2 cans chopped clams, 1/4 cup olive oil, onion, red pepper flakes, garlic, oregano, parsley, and salt into a large pot and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Stir cooked scallops, shrimp, calamari, mussels in shells, and littleneck clams in shells into tomato mixture.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low and simmer for 1 hour.
', 'Step 7: About 10 minutes before serving, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook the linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 10 minutes; drain and rinse pasta in hot water to prevent sticking.
', 'Step 8: Serve seafood and sauce over pasta.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '775.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '80.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '329.5 mg', 'fatContent': '17.2 g', 'fiberContent': '6.8 g', 'proteinContent': '72 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '957.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.5 g'}

Title: Italian Confetti Pasta Salad
Ingredients: ['1 cup mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 ½ tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '2 cups colored rotini pasta', '1 cup chopped tomatoes', '½ cup chopped yellow bell pepper', '½ cup sliced black olives']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook pasta according to package directions.
', 'Step 2: Rinse in cold water, and drain.
', 'Step 3: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, vinegar, salt, black pepper, and garlic until well blended.
', 'Step 4: Mix in basil.
', 'Step 5: Add pasta, tomatoes, bell peppers, and olives; fold gently until mixed.
', 'Step 6: Chill several hours.
', 'Step 7: Stir gently before serving.
']

Ingredients: ['3 large cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '5 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon fresh rosemary, chopped', '1 pinch salt and black pepper']

Title: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients: ['½ cup dried porcini mushrooms', '½ (10 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup', '¼ cup boiling water', '4 cups chicken stock', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 ¾ cups Arborio rice', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'fresh thyme, chopped', 'chopped fresh basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place dried mushrooms into a small bowl, and cover with hot water; soak 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Remove with a slotted spoon, and gently squeeze dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 3: Chop mushrooms, and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Scoop cream of mushroom soup into a bowl, and gradually stir in boiling water until mixture is smooth but not runny.
', 'Step 5: In a saucepan over medium heat, bring the stock to a gentle simmer.
', 'Step 6: Heat butter and olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Stir in onion, garlic, and chopped mushrooms; cook about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Gradually stir in rice; cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly to coat rice with oil.
', 'Step 9: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 10: Stir in thyme and basil to taste.
', 'Step 11: Pour in the mushroom soup mixture, stirring until absorbed.
', 'Step 12: Gradually add 1/3 stock, stirring until liquid is absorbed.
', 'Step 13: Continue to stir in stock gradually, 1 cup at a time, allowing the liquid to be absorbed before adding another cup.
', 'Step 14: It should take about 20 minutes for all the stock to be absorbed and the rice becomes al dente (tender but firm to the bite).
']

Title: Lasagna Alfredo Roll Ups
Ingredients: ['8 lasagna noodles', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach', '2 tablespoons thinly sliced green onion', '1 pint part-skim ricotta cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 egg', '21 ounces Alfredo-style pasta sauce', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add lasagna and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente.
', 'Step 3: Rinse in cold water and drain well.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, in a large sauce pan over medium heat add oil and cook broccoli or spinach and green onions until tender, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 5: Remove pan from heat and stir in ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, salt and egg.
', 'Step 6: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Place noodles in a single layer on a sheet of waxed paper.
', 'Step 8: Evenly spread some of the cheese mixture on each noodle.
', 'Step 9: Roll up each noodle from the short end, jelly-roll style.
', 'Step 10: In a 8x12 inch baking dish, spoon about 3/4 of the Alfredo sauce on the bottom and spread evenly.
', 'Step 11: Arrange the rolled noodles, seam side down, in the dish.
', 'Step 12: Top with mozzarella cheese and remaining sauce.
', 'Step 13: Cover loosely with foil and bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly and the cheese is melted.
', 'Step 14: Serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '484.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '26.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '88.2 mg', 'fatContent': '33.9 g', 'fiberContent': '1.9 g', 'proteinContent': '21 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '14.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '1108 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.9 g'}

Title: Italian Style Sausage
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon Italian-style seasoning', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '⅛ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '¾ teaspoon crushed anise seeds', '½ teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon dried minced onion', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 pounds ground pork']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, combine the ground black pepper, parsley, Italian-style seasoning, garlic powder, crushed red pepper flakes, anise, paprika, minced onion flakes and salt; mix well.
', 'Step 2: Place pork in a separate large bowl and add the spice mix to it.
', 'Step 3: Mix this thoroughly with your hands.
', 'Step 4: In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the seasoned pork for 10 minutes, or until well browned and crumbly.
']

Title: Fantastic Focaccia Bread
Ingredients: ['½ teaspoon honey', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '.666 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, dissolve honey and yeast in warm water.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until creamy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add 1 cup flour, salt, and 3 tablespoons olive oil to the yeast mixture.
', 'Step 4: Stir until combined and then work in the last cup of flour.
', 'Step 5: Knead the dough until smooth, elastic, and soft, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add only enough flour to keep the dough from being sticky.
', 'Step 7: Lightly oil a large bowl, place the dough in the bowl and turn to coat with oil.
', 'Step 8: Cover with a damp cloth and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: Deflate the dough and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 10: Roll out the dough into a rectangle, about 1/2 inch thick.
', 'Step 11: Place in greased 9x13 inch pan or baking sheet.
', 'Step 12: Cover and let rise until doubled in volume, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Meanwhile, preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Poke dimples in the bread and drizzle 1 tablespoon of the olive oil on top.
', 'Step 15: Bake at 400 degrees for 15 minutes.
']

Title: Amaretti
Ingredients: ['3 cups blanched slivered almonds', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '3 egg whites', '1 teaspoon almond extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line baking sheets with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: In a food processor, grind the almonds into a fine meal.
', 'Step 4: Add the sugar and continue to process for another 15 seconds.
', 'Step 5: Finally, add egg whites and almond extract, continue to process until a smooth dough forms around the blade.
', 'Step 6: Using a teaspoon, place well rounded spoonfuls of dough onto prepared baking sheets.
', 'Step 7: Cookies should be at least 1 1/2 inches apart.
', 'Step 8: Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Cookies should be golden.
', 'Step 10: Allow cookies to cool completely on the paper before removing.
', 'Step 11: Store in a dry place.
']

Title: Gluten-Free Italian Meatballs
Ingredients: ['½ cup milk', '1 egg', '1 cup gluten-free Italian bread crumbs', '1 ½ pounds ground beef', '¼ onion, minced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 sprig fresh parsley, chopped', 'cooking spray', '1 (28 ounce) jar tomato sauce, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Beat milk and egg together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Mix bread crumbs in until a paste forms.
', 'Step 3: Add ground beef, onion, garlic, and parsley, and mix with your hands until just combined.
', 'Step 4: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Coat a baking sheet with cooking spray.
', 'Step 6: Measure meatballs using an ice cream scoop.
', 'Step 7: Roll balls with dampened hands and place on the prepared baking sheet Bake in the preheated oven until meatballs are no longer pink in the center and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: While meatballs bake, heat tomato sauce in saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Add baked meatballs to the sauce and simmer, uncovered, for 30 minutes.
']

Title: Italian Biscotti
Ingredients: ['12 ounces butter', '1 ¾ cups white sugar', '6 eggs', '1 teaspoon anise extract', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '6 cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '8 ounces chopped almonds']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 165 degrees C ).
', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar together.
', 'Step 3: Add eggs one at a time; beat until fluffy.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the anise and vanilla extracts.
', 'Step 5: Sift together the flour, baking powder, and salt; Add them to the egg mixture along with the chopped almonds.
', 'Step 6: Stir with a spoon and as the dough comes together, Knead by hand.
', 'Step 7: Divide the dough into 4 parts.
', 'Step 8: Roll each piece into a log about 15 inches long.
', 'Step 9: Place logs onto cookie sheets, 2 to a sheet, the long way.
', 'Step 10: Flatten the logs out until they are about 3 inches wide with a slight hump going down the middle.
', 'Step 11: Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, loaves should be firm.
', 'Step 12: Cut the loaves into diagonal slices 1/2 inch wide, place the slices onto the cookie sheets and return to the oven.
', 'Step 13: Toast on one side, then turn them over to do the other side.
', 'Step 14: This will take about 7 to 10 minutes.
']

Title: Best Ziti Ever
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package ziti pasta', '1 pound mild Italian sausage, casings removed', '2 (24 ounce) jars marinara sauce', '1 ½ teaspoons dried basil, divided', '12 ounces ricotta cheese', '1 ½ teaspoons Italian seasoning, divided', '1 dash salt and pepper', '1 pound mozzarella cheese, shredded']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 4: Place sausage in a large, deep skillet.
', 'Step 5: Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown.
', 'Step 6: Drain, crumble and set aside.
', 'Step 7: In a large saucepan, heat marinara with 1 teaspoon basil until bubbling.
', 'Step 8: In a medium bowl, mix together ricotta, 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Spread bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish with sauce.
', 'Step 10: Layer 1/2 of the ziti, 1/2, the sausage, 1/2 of the ricotta, and 1/2 the mozzarella.
', 'Step 11: Spoon half of the sauce over top.
', 'Step 12: Repeat layers.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle top with remaining 1/2 teaspoons basil and Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 14: Bake in preheated oven for 40 to 45 minutes.
']

Title: Bob's Slow Cooker Braciole
Ingredients: ['2 (26 ounce) jars marinara sauce', '2 eggs, beaten', '½ cup dry bread crumbs', '1 (1 1/2-pound) flank steak, pounded to 1/4 inch', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', 'ground black pepper', '5 slices bacon', '1 cup shredded Italian cheese blend', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour the marinara sauce into the slow cooker and set on High to warm.
', 'Step 2: Combine the eggs and the breadcrumbs in a small bowl.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle both sides of the meat with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Pat the breadcrumb mixture over one side of the flank steak, leaving about a one inch border around edges.
', 'Step 5: Top breadcrumbs with the bacon slices; sprinkle with shredded cheese.
', 'Step 6: Starting from one long side, tightly roll flank steak into a log.
', 'Step 7: Use string or toothpicks to secure the log in 4 or 5 places.
', 'Step 8: Heat oil in a heavy skillet.
', 'Step 9: Sear the stuffed flank steak in the hot oil until well browned on all sides, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Transfer the meat to the warm sauce in the slow cooker.
', 'Step 11: Spoon sauce over meat to cover.
', 'Step 12: Turn slow cooker to Low; cook meat until very tender, 6 to 8 hours.
', 'Step 13: Remove string/toothpicks before slicing.
', 'Step 14: Serve with marinara.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '613.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '41.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '132.7 mg', 'fatContent': '36.9 g', 'fiberContent': '6.8 g', 'proteinContent': '28 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '13.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '1795.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '22.1 g'}

Title: Veal Chop with Portabello Mushrooms
Ingredients: ['5 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 tablespoon butter', '2 veal chops', '1 portobello mushroom, sliced', '1 ½ cups chicken broth', '1 ½ teaspoons fresh rosemary, chopped', '½ cup red wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 4 tablespoons olive oil with butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook chops until browned, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 3: Once browned, stir in mushrooms and cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Add chicken broth and rosemary; cover, and simmer 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in red wine, increase heat, and cook, uncovered, until sauce is reduced by half.
', 'Step 6: Veal chops may be removed at any time to prevent over-cooking, then returned to the pan for the final minute.
', 'Step 7: Drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil, and serve.
']

Title: Brooklyn Girl's Penne Arrabiata
Ingredients: ['½ cup olive oil, divided', '6 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes with garlic and olive oil', '½ cup tomato sauce', '1 bunch fresh basil, chopped', '1 (12 ounce) package dried penne pasta', '2 eggs', '2 cups bread crumbs', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 pound thin chicken breast cutlets']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1/4 cup of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add the garlic, and saute for a few minutes.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle in the red pepper flakes, and saute for another minute.
', 'Step 4: Pour in the diced tomatoes and tomato sauce, and add the basil.
', 'Step 5: Simmer for about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 7: Add penne pasta, and cook for 8 minutes, or until tender.
', 'Step 8: Drain.
', 'Step 9: In a small bowl, whisk eggs with a fork.
', 'Step 10: Place bread crumbs in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 11: Stir the garlic powder, salt and pepper into the bread crumbs.
', 'Step 12: Dip chicken cutlets into the egg, then press into the bread crumbs until completely coated.
', 'Step 13: Heat remaining olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 14: Fry chicken for about 5 minutes per side, or until the coating is a nice dark brown color.
', 'Step 15: Remove chicken, and cut into slices.
', 'Step 16: Toss the chicken slices into the sauce, and simmer for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Stir in the cooked penne, simmer for a few more minutes to soak up the flavor, then serve.
']

Title: Shrimp Florentine with Zoodles
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '2 zucchini, cut into noodle-shape strands', '½ large yellow onion, minced', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 (6 ounce) bag baby spinach', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon butter and olive oil together in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir zucchini noodles (zoodles), onion, chopped garlic, and 1/2 teaspoon salt until zoodles are tender and onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.

', 'Step 4: Add spinach, lemon juice, red pepper flakes, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and pepper; cook and stir until spinach begins to wilt, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add zoodle mixture; cook and stir until heated through, 2 to 3 minutes.
']

Title: Rolled Flank Steak
Ingredients: ['1 (2 pound) beef flank steak', '¼ cup soy sauce', '½ cup olive oil', '2 teaspoons steak seasoning', '8 ounces thinly sliced provolone cheese', '4 slices thick cut bacon', '½ cup fresh spinach leaves', '½ cup sliced crimini mushrooms', '½ red bell pepper, seeded and cut into strips']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place the flank steak on a cutting board with the short end closest to you.
', 'Step 2: Starting from one of the long sides, cut through the meat horizontally to within 1/2 inch of the opposite edge.
', 'Step 3: (You can also ask your butcher to butterfly the flank steak for you instead of cutting it yourself.
', 'Step 4: ) Mix the soy sauce, olive oil, and steak seasoning together in a gallon-sized resealable plastic bag.
', 'Step 5: Marinate flank steak in the refrigerator 4 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 6: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 7: Grease a glass baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Lay out the flank steak flat in front of you with the grain of the meat running from left to right.
', 'Step 9: Layer the provolone across the steak, leaving a 1-inch border.
', 'Step 10: Arrange the bacon, spinach, red pepper, and mushrooms across the cheese covered steak in stripes running in the same direction as the grain of the meat.
', 'Step 11: Roll the flank steak up and away from you, so that when the roll is cut into the pinwheel shape, each of the filling ingredients can be seen.
', 'Step 12: Roll firmly, but be careful not to squeeze the fillings out the ends.
', 'Step 13: Once rolled, tie every 2 inches with kitchen twine.
', 'Step 14: Place in prepared baking dish, and bake in preheated oven for one hour, or until the internal temperature reaches 145 degrees F (65 degrees C).
', 'Step 15: Remove from the oven and let rest for 5 to 10 minutes before cutting into 1 inch slices.
', 'Step 16: Be sure to remove the twine before serving!
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '472.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '66.7 mg', 'fatContent': '36.9 g', 'fiberContent': '0.5 g', 'proteinContent': '31.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '12.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '1421.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.8 g'}

Title: Ricotta Cookies II
Ingredients: ['½ pound butter', '1 ¾ cups white sugar', '2 eggs', '15 ounces ricotta cheese', '2 tablespoons vanilla extract', '4 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '5 tablespoons milk', "1 ½ cups confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon almond extract', '¼ cup colored candy sprinkles']

', 'Step 4: Roll dough into teaspoon-sized balls, and arrange on an ungreased cookie sheet.
', 'Step 5: Bake 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned.
', "Step 6: In a medium bowl, beat milk, confectioners' sugar, and almond extract until smooth.
", 'Step 7: Spoon over warm cookies, and sprinkle with colored candy sprinkles.
']

Title: Italian Almond Cookies II

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease cookie sheets.
', "Step 3: In a large bowl, use your hands to mix together the almond paste, flour, egg whites, white sugar and confectioners' sugar until well blended.

Title: Stuffed Eggplant
Ingredients: ['1 eggplant, halved lengthwise', 'salt and pepper to taste', '½ cup olive oil, divided', '1 pound sweet Italian sausage, casings removed', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '½ cup white wine', '2 cups Italian seasoned bread crumbs', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Scoop out the flesh of the eggplant, chop, and reserve.

', 'Step 4: Heat 1/4 cup olive oil in a large, deep skillet over medium high heat.
', 'Step 5: Saute sausage and garlic until sausage is evenly brown.

', 'Step 8: Pour in wine, and cook 5 minutes.

', 'Step 10: If mixture is dry, stir in more olive oil.

', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and set aside.

', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

Title: Bob's Stuffed Banana Peppers
Ingredients: ['8 banana peppers', '2 tablespoons butter', '½ cup chopped onion', '½ cup chopped celery', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 ½ teaspoons salt, divided', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper, divided', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pound hot Italian sausage', '1 pound mild Italian sausage', '1 ½ cups bread crumbs']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut off tops of peppers, and remove ribs and seeds.
', 'Step 2: Chop edible portions of tops; set aside.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Add peppers, reduce heat, and simmer until tender but still firm, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Heat butter in a medium skillet.
', 'Step 7: Saute reserved chopped pepper, onion and celery until tender, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce and garlic.
', 'Step 9: Season with basil, oregano, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
', 'Step 10: Simmer uncovered for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Meanwhile, in a large mixing bowl, combine egg, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, Worcestershire sauce and Parmesan.
', 'Step 13: Mix in hot sausage, mild sausage, bread crumbs and 1 cup of the tomato sauce mixture.
', 'Step 14: Using a piping bag or sausage stuffer, fill each pepper with the meat mixture.
', 'Step 15: Place in a 3 quart casserole dish, and pour remaining tomato sauce mixture over peppers.
', 'Step 16: Bake uncovered in preheated oven for 1 hour.
']

Title: Puttanesca I

', 'Step 2: Cook pasta in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Heat oil in a skillet over low heat; cook garlic in oil until golden.
', 'Step 4: Add sieved tomatoes, and cook 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in anchovies, tomato paste, capers, olives, and red pepper flakes.

', 'Step 7: Toss pasta with sauce, and serve.

Title: Risotto alla Milanese
Ingredients: ['1 ¾ cups uncooked Arborio rice', '½ cup unsalted butter, divided', '1 ½ quarts beef stock', '3 tablespoons beef marrow', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon saffron powder', '¾ cup dry white wine', 'salt to taste', '1 ½ cups grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt half of the butter in a medium saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Simmer the onion and beef marrow in the butter for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: When the onion is soft, remove the onion and marrow from the pan using a slotted spoon, and set aside.
', 'Step 4: (I like to leave the onions in.
', 'Step 5: ) Saute the rice in the pan over medium heat for 5 to 7 minutes, or until lightly toasted.
', 'Step 6: Stir constantly so the rice will not stick and burn.
', 'Step 7: Stir in one ladle of beef stock, and keep stirring until it is mostly absorbed, ladling and stirring in more of the broth as well as the white wine in the same manner, until the rice is almost al dente.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the saffron, remaining butter, and 3/4 cup of Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 9: Turn off the heat, cover and let sit for 4 or 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Serve as a bed for ossibuchi or by itself with as much of the remaining Parmesan cheese sprinkled over as you like.
']

Title: Spaghetti Italian
Ingredients: ['½ pound Italian sausage', '4 (6.5 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '2 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (8 ounce) package spaghetti']

', 'Step 2: In a large saucepan over medium heat, combine tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, bay leaves, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, basil, oregano, salt, pepper and Italian sausage; mix well.
', 'Step 3: Simmer over medium-low heat for at least one hour; it is best if simmered all day.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 6: Mix sauce with hot pasta; serve.
']

Title: Eggplant Parmesan I
Ingredients: ['1 eggplant, cut into 3/4 inch slices', '1 ½ tablespoons salt', '8 tablespoons olive oil', '8 ounces ricotta cheese', '6 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg, beaten', '½ cup chopped fresh basil', '4 cups pasta sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Sprinkle both sides of the eggplant slices with salt.
', 'Step 2: Place slices in a colander, and place a dish underneath the colander to capture liquid that will sweat out of the eggplant.
', 'Step 3: Allow to sit for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: In a medium bowl, mix the ricotta, mozzarella cheese and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 6: Mix in egg and basil.
', 'Step 7: Rinse the eggplant in cold water until all salt is removed.
', 'Step 8: In a large skillet, heat 4 tablespoons olive oil over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Place one layer of eggplant in the pan, brown each side.
', 'Step 10: Repeat with remaining eggplant slices, using additional oil if necessary.
', 'Step 11: In a 9x13 inch baking dish, evenly spread 1 1/2 cups of spaghetti sauce.
', 'Step 12: Arrange a single layer of eggplant slices on top of the sauce.
', 'Step 13: Top the eggplant with 1/2 of the cheese mixture.
', 'Step 14: Repeat layering process until all the eggplant and cheese mixture is used.
', 'Step 15: Pour remaining sauce on top of layers, and sprinkle with remaining Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 16: Bake 30 to 45 minutes in the preheated oven, until sauce is bubbly.
']

Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package uncooked farfalle (bow tie) pasta', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon hot chile paste (such as sambal oelek)', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch pieces', '6 tablespoons prepared basil pesto', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup chopped cilantro']

', 'Step 2: Place farfalle pasta in the pot, cook for 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente, and drain.
', 'Step 3: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Mix in the chile paste and chicken.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir chicken 10 minutes, or until evenly browned and juices run clear.

Title: Restaurant-Style Zuppa Toscana
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package smoked sausage', '2 potatoes, cut into 1/4-inch slices', '¾ cup chopped onion', '6 slices bacon', '1 ½ teaspoons minced garlic', '2 cups kale - washed, dried, and shredded', '2 tablespoons chicken soup base', '1 quart water', '⅓ cup heavy whipping cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place sausage links onto a sheet pan and bake for 25 minutes, or until done.
', 'Step 3: Cut links in half lengthwise, then cut at an angle into 1/2-inch slices.
', 'Step 4: Place onions and bacon slices in a large saucepan and cook over medium heat until onions are almost clear.
', 'Step 5: Remove bacon and crumble.
', 'Step 6: Set aside.
', 'Step 7: Add garlic to the onions and cook an additional 1 minute.
', 'Step 8: Add chicken soup base, water, and potatoes, simmer 15 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add crumbled bacon, sausage, kale, and cream.
', 'Step 10: Simmer 4 minutes and serve.
']

Title: Lemony Pork Piccata
Ingredients: ['4 pork chops', '½ cup all-purpose flour', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 tablespoons sliced shallots', '⅓ cup dry white wine', '¼ cup chicken stock', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1 tablespoon capers']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Pound pork chops between 2 sheets waxed paper or plastic wrap until very thin, about 1/8 inch.
', 'Step 3: Mix flour, salt, and pepper together in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 4: Dredge both sides of each pork chop through flour mixture, shaking off any excess flour.
', 'Step 5: Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat until butter starts to sizzle.
', 'Step 6: Add shallots and pork chops in 1 layer, working in batches if needed.
', 'Step 7: Cook pork chops until golden brown and almost cooked through, 3 to 4 minutes per side.
', 'Step 8: Transfer pork chops to a baking dish and lightly tent with aluminum foil, reserving the shallots and browned bits of food in the skillet.
', 'Step 9: Bake pork chops in the preheated oven until cooked through, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 10: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Pour wine and chicken stock into the skillet and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off of the bottom with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat and simmer until sauce is reduced by half, 2 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir lemon juice into sauce.
', 'Step 14: Drizzle sauce over pork chops and top with parsley, lemon zest, and capers.
']

Title: Amanda's Stuffed Peppers
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '½ cup bread crumbs', '½ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '¾ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '6 white mushrooms, chopped', '½ small onion, finely chopped', '4 bell peppers, tops cut off and seeded', '1 (26 ounce) can spaghetti sauce']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a 9x13 inch baking dish with aluminum foil.

Title: Homemade Chicken Parmigiana
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '⅓ cup minced onion', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice', '½ teaspoon sugar', '¼ cup heavy cream', 'salt and pepper to taste', '⅓ cup fine dry bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 egg, beaten', '2 tablespoons milk', '3 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '¾ cup shredded Mozzarella cheese', '1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in garlic and onion, and cook until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour in diced tomatoes and sugar.
', 'Step 4: Increase heat to medium-high, and bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to medium-low, and continue simmering for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 5: Once the sauce has simmered, stir in the cream and season to taste with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Simmer for an additional 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Lower heat and keep sauce warm Stir together bread crumbs, 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese, and dried oregano; set aside.
', 'Step 8: In a small bowl, whisk together egg and 2 tablespoons milk until blended.
', 'Step 9: Dip chicken breasts into the egg, then press into breadcrumb mixture to coat both sides, shaking off excess.
', 'Step 10: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Add chicken breasts and cook on both sides until they reach an internal temperature of 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), and the bread crumb crust is golden brown, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: To serve, spoon sauce over chicken and top with Mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses.
', 'Step 13: Let stand a few minutes until the cheese has melted from the heat of the sauce.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '609.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '18.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '209.1 mg', 'fatContent': '37.6 g', 'fiberContent': '2.1 g', 'proteinContent': '46.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '14.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '690.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.6 g'}

Title: Italian White Bean and Sausage Stew
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups dry cannellini beans', '4 (6 ounce) Italian sausage links with garlic and fennel', '1 cup chopped yellow onion', '⅓ cup dry white wine', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 bay leaf', '6 cups water, or to taste', '1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste', '4 cups chopped kale', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste', '6 tablespoons grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or to taste', '6 pinches red pepper flakes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Soak beans in cold water, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 2: Drain beans and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Make a cut down the center of each sausage and peel off the casing.
', 'Step 4: Transfer sausage into a dry soup pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Brown sausage, while breaking it up into small pieces with a wooden spoon, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir until juices start to caramelize and stick to the bottom of the pan, creating a fond, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add onion and stir to coat in the rendered sausage fat.
', 'Step 8: Cook until onion starts to turn translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add white wine to deglaze the pot.
', 'Step 10: Add black pepper, red pepper flakes, bay leaf, and water.
', 'Step 11: Add drained beans, increase heat to high, and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Once boiling, reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Add salt and continue to simmer until beans are tender, about 30 more minutes.
', 'Step 14: Taste beans to be certain they are perfectly cooked.
', 'Step 15: Smash about 1/4 of the beans with a potato masher to give the stew a creamy texture if desired.
', 'Step 16: Stir in chopped kale, increase heat to medium, and cook until tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Taste and adjust salt.
', 'Step 18: Ladle hot soup into bowls, drizzle with olive oil, and sprinkle with Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese and a pinch of red pepper flakes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '668.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '42.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '75 mg', 'fatContent': '38.6 g', 'fiberContent': '1.9 g', 'proteinContent': '36.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '13.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '1989.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.5 g'}

Title: Italian Style Meatloaf I
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds ground beef', '2 eggs, beaten', '¾ cup dry bread crumbs', '¼ cup ketchup', '1 teaspoon Italian-style seasoning', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes, drained', '1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, mix together ground beef, eggs, bread crumbs and ketchup.
', 'Step 3: Season with Italian-style seasoning, oregano, basil, garlic salt, diced tomatoes and cheese.
', 'Step 4: Press into a 9x5 inch loaf pan, and cover loosely with foil.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven approximately 1 hour, or until internal temperature reaches 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
']

Title: Penne with Shrimp
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package penne pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ cup chopped red onion', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '¼ cup white wine', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes', '1 pound shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Stir in onion and garlic, and cook until onion is tender.
', 'Step 5: Mix in wine and tomatoes, and continue cooking 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 6: Mix shrimp into the skillet, and cook 5 minutes, or until opaque.
', 'Step 7: Toss with pasta and top with Parmesan cheese to serve.
']
