Title: Real Italian Pizza Dough
Ingredients: ['4 cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed', '2 teaspoons salt', '3 ¾ teaspoons fresh, compressed yeast', '1 ¼ cups water, at room temperature', '2 ½ tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to the lowest setting possible.
', 'Step 2: Combine 4 cups flour and salt in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook attachment; turn mixer on low speed.
', 'Step 3: Crumble yeast into small pieces and add to the flour.
', 'Step 4: Slowly pour in water.
', 'Step 5: Scrape the sides to make sure all flour is incorporated and mix until dough begins to pull away from the sides and form a ball.
', 'Step 6: Drizzle in oil and mix until fully incorporated.
', 'Step 7: Knead on low speed for 5 or 6 minutes, adding 1 to 2 tablespoons extra flour if needed.
', 'Step 8: Remove dough from the bowl and use your hands to form a ball.
', 'Step 9: Return dough to the bowl and score the top with an "x".
', 'Step 10: Cover with a damp cloth.
', 'Step 11: Turn oven off and place dough in the oven to rise for at least 1 hour, or up to 8 hours.
', 'Step 12: Remove dough from the oven and reattach the bowl to the stand mixer.
', 'Step 13: Uncover and punch down dough.
', 'Step 14: Knead on low speed for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Meanwhile, place a pizza stone or tray on the bottom oven rack and preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Cut dough into 4 equal pieces and roll each one into ball.
', 'Step 17: Dust with flour if needed.
', 'Step 18: Place balls on a sheet pan and cover with a damp cloth.
', 'Step 19: Roll out each ball into a 9-inch circle and top with desired toppings (no more than 1 cup sauce per pizza).
', 'Step 20: Place pizza on the pizza stone in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 21: Immediately lower the temperature to 410 degrees F (210 degrees C) and bake for 10 to 12 minutes; actual length of time will depend on your toppings.
', 'Step 22: Repeat to make remaining pizzas.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '532.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '95.5 g', 'fatContent': '9.7 g', 'fiberContent': '3.5 g', 'proteinContent': '13.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '1167.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.4 g'}

Title: Manicotti Alla Romana
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup chopped onion', '6 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 pound ground beef', 'salt to taste', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '1 (12 ounce) package manicotti shells', '2 cups ricotta cheese', '2 eggs, beaten', '3 cups spaghetti sauce, divided', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons chicken bouillon granules', '2 cups half-and-half', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Saute onions until translucent.
', 'Step 3: Saute garlic for 1 minute and stir in ground beef.
', 'Step 4: Cook until well browned and crumbled.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt and set aside to cool.
', 'Step 6: Cook spinach according to package directions.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Add manicotti shells and parboil for half of the time recommended on the package.
', 'Step 9: Drain and cover with cool water to stop the cooking process and prevent the shells from cracking.
', 'Step 10: To the ground beef mixture add the cooked spinach and ricotta cheese.
', 'Step 11: When the mixture is cool, add the beaten eggs.
', 'Step 12: Spread 1/4 cup spaghetti sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 13: Gently drain the manicotti shells and carefully stuff each one with the meat and cheese mixture; place shells in prepared dish.
', 'Step 14: Lightly cover the dish with plastic wrap or a clean, damp towel to prevent shells from cracking.
', 'Step 15: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Prepare the white sauce by melting the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 17: Stir in flour and chicken bouillon.
', 'Step 18: Increase heat to medium-high and cook, stirring constantly, until it begins to bubble.
', 'Step 19: Stir in half and half and bring to a boil, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 20: Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 21: Remove from heat and stir in parsley.
', 'Step 22: Pour or ladle the sauce evenly over the stuffed shells.
', 'Step 23: Stir the basil into the remaining spaghetti sauce.
', 'Step 24: Carefully pour or ladle spaghetti sauce over the white sauce, trying to layer the sauces without mixing.
', 'Step 25: Cover and bake for 40 minutes.
', 'Step 26: Remove from oven, uncover and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 27: Bake, uncovered, for 10 minutes more.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '611.7 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '58.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '134.2 mg', 'fatContent': '30.3 g', 'fiberContent': '6 g', 'proteinContent': '27.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '13.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '991.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '12.7 g'}

Title: Dip For The Stars
Ingredients: ['1 cup unsalted butter', '¾ pound feta cheese, crumbled', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 shallot, minced', '3 tablespoons dry vermouth', 'ground white pepper, to taste', '½ cup pine nuts, toasted', '1 cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes', '¾ cup pesto sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a food processor, combine the butter, feta cheese, cream cheese, garlic, shallot, vermouth, and white pepper.
', 'Step 2: Process until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Oil a medium bowl, or gelatin mold, and line with plastic wrap for easy removal.
', 'Step 4: Layer the dip into the mold as follows: Sun-dried tomatoes, pine nuts, pesto, cheese mixture.
', 'Step 5: Repeat.
', 'Step 6: Pat down into the mold, and refrigerate for at least one hour.
', 'Step 7: Turn the dip out onto a serving plate, and remove plastic wrap.
', 'Step 8: Serve with crackers.
']

Title: Mozzarella-Stuffed Pesto Turkey Meatballs
Ingredients: ['3 pounds ground turkey', '1 cup finely chopped onion', '4 garlic cloves, minced', '1 egg', '1 cup Italian-style bread crumbs', '½ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '½ cup chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', '¼ cup prepared pesto', '¼ cup milk', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 teaspoons fresh ground black pepper', '1 pound fresh mozzarella, cut into small cubes', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 (24 ounce) jars marinara sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place the ground turkey, onion, garlic, egg, bread crumbs, Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, parsley, pesto, milk, salt, and black pepper in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Mix until evenly blended, then form into 1 3/4-inch meatballs.
', 'Step 4: Make a hole in the meatball with your finger and place a cheese cube in the hole.
', 'Step 5: Seal the meatball around the cheese and place on a nonstick baking sheet.
', 'Step 6: Drizzle the olive oil over the meatballs.
', 'Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven until the meatballs are no longer pink in the center, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Heat the marinara sauce in a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 9: Bring to a simmer, and place the baked meatballs in the marinara sauce for about 2 minutes.
']

Title: Ham and Cheese Stromboli
Ingredients: ['2 (16 ounce) packages refrigerated pizza crust dough', '1 (28 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '¼ pound cooked ham, sliced', '¼ pound Capacola sausage, sliced', '¼ pound salami, sliced', '¼ pound pepperoni sausage, sliced', 'garlic powder to taste', '¼ pound mozzarella cheese, shredded', '1 onion, sliced', '6 mushrooms, sliced', '1 green bell pepper, sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Let dough rise according to package instructions, then punch down, and divide into 4 pieces.
', 'Step 3: On a floured surface, roll each piece of dough into a long oval shape.
', 'Step 4: Spread each with sauce, then layer with ham, capacola, salami, and pepperoni.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle with garlic powder, then top with mozzarella, onion, mushrooms and bell pepper.
', 'Step 6: Bring the long sides together over the center, and pinch together to seal.
', 'Step 7: Turn over, so that the seam is on the bottom, and place on an ungreased baking sheet.
', 'Step 8: With a sharp knife, cut 3 diagonal slices to allow the steam to escape.
', 'Step 9: Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 30 minutes, or until golden brown.
']

Title: Italian Sausage Tortellini Bake
Ingredients: ['1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 onion, chopped', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '1 (24 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '1 (14 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 (9 ounce) package frozen cheese-filled tortellini', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Crumble sausage into the saucepan; add onion and green bell pepper.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir the sausage mixture until the sausage is completely browned, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain grease.
', 'Step 5: Pour marinara sauce and diced tomatoes over the sausage mixture; season with garlic powder and stir.
', 'Step 6: Bring the mixture to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook at a simmer until the diced tomatoes break down into the sauce, 30 to 45 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Cook the frozen tortellini at a boil until they float to the top and the filling is hot, 6 to 7 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 10: Gently fold the cooked tortellini into the simmering sauce; cook together another 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Pour tortellini and sauce into a 13x9-inch baking dish; top with mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 12: Bake in preheated oven until cheese is golden brown, 20 to 30 minutes.
']

Title: Garlic Wine Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 skinless, boneless chicken breast half - pounded thin', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', 'ground black pepper to taste', '½ tablespoon chopped garlic', '4 mushrooms, chopped', '½ lemon', '1 ½ cups Chablis or other dry white wine', '2 tablespoons butter, room temperature', '2 ounces cooked angel hair pasta']

', 'Step 2: Dredge chicken breast in flour and place it in the hot skillet.
', 'Step 3: Add pepper to taste.
', 'Step 4: Cook until golden brown on one side, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Turn chicken over (presentation side up) and add the garlic, mushrooms, juice from 1/2 lemon and wine.
', 'Step 6: Stir all together.
', 'Step 7: Turn heat up as high as possible and let liquids reduce until about 1/4 cup liquid remains in skillet.
', 'Step 8: Remove chicken from skillet and add the room temperature butter.
', 'Step 9: Swirl it around in the skillet sauce until it is incorporated and the sauce is slightly thickened.
', 'Step 10: Pour sauce over chicken and serve with pasta.
']

Title: Chicken Marsala II
Ingredients: ['¼ cup butter, divided', '2 cups sliced fresh mushrooms', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken meat - cut into 12 pieces', '2 slices bacon, diced', '¼ cup cold water', '1 teaspoon cornstarch', '½ cup dry Marsala wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a medium skillet.
', 'Step 2: Saute mushrooms until soft, remove from skillet and place in a small, covered bowl.
', 'Step 3: Mix flour, garlic powder, salt and pepper in a shallow dish or bowl.
', 'Step 4: Dredge chicken in flour mixture.
', 'Step 5: Place bacon in same skillet and cook over low heat until cooked but not crisp.
', 'Step 6: Add 2 tablespoons butter to skillet and saute coated chicken over medium heat for 2 minutes each side, adding remaining butter as needed to prevent burning.
', 'Step 7: Place chicken on a dish, cover and keep warm.
', 'Step 8: In a medium bowl, slowly add water to cornstarch and mix together, then mix in wine.
', 'Step 9: Pour liquid mixture into skillet, together with reserved mushrooms.
', 'Step 10: Heat until mixture begins to boil and thickens, then pour over warm chicken and serve.
']

Title: Bolognese Stuffed Bell Peppers

', 'Step 9: Drizzle with remaining olive oil and top with remaining Parmesan cheese.

Title: Slow Cooker Pasta Fagioli Soup
Ingredients: ['2 pounds ground beef', '1 (32 ounce) carton beef stock', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans Italian-style diced tomatoes', '1 (28 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 (15 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained', '1 (15 ounce) can white kidney beans, drained', '4 cups beef broth', '½ cup chopped onion', '2 medium carrots, diced', '3 stalks celery, diced', '5 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)', '1 cup ditalini pasta']

', 'Step 2: Cook and stir ground beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 4: Transfer beef into a slow cooker.
', 'Step 5: Add beef stock, diced tomatoes, spaghetti sauce, red and white kidney beans, beef broth, onion, carrots, celery, parsley, oregano, pepper, salt, and hot sauce to the slow cooker.
', 'Step 6: Cover and cook on Low for 7 to 8 hours or on High for 4 to 6 hours, adding pasta in during the last 15 minutes.
']

Title: Make-Ahead Freezer Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients: ['1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 large egg, beaten', '⅓ cup bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '¾ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '¾ cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Pound chicken breasts to 1/2-inch thickness or less.
', 'Step 4: Place beaten egg in a bowl.
', 'Step 5: Combine bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, Italian seasoning, and garlic powder in another bowl.
', 'Step 6: Dip each chicken breast in egg, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat evenly.
', 'Step 7: Place on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Turn and continue to cook until chicken is no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, about 10 minutes more.
', 'Step 10: Let cool, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Freeze in a 1-gallon resealable bag with smaller bags of tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 12: To serve: Thaw in the refrigerator overnight.
', 'Step 13: Reheat chicken at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) until heated through and crispy, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Top chicken with tomato sauce, sprinkle with mozzarella cheese, and bake until cheese is melted, an additional 3 minutes.
']

Title: Homemade Italian Red Sauce
Ingredients: ['½ cup olive oil', '1 large onion, minced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '4 cups water', '2 (32 ounce) cans crushed diced tomatoes', '1 (16 ounce) can tomato paste', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon white sugar', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Saute onion and garlic in hot oil until onion is translucent, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: n Reduce heat to medium-low.
', 'Step 4: Add water, crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, baking soda, and sugar; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Stir mixture, bring to a simmer, and cook until the sauce is thickened, about 2 hours.
']

Title: Vegan Lasagna I
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ cups chopped onion', '3 tablespoons minced garlic', '4 (14.5 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes', '⅓ cup tomato paste', '½ cup chopped fresh basil', '½ cup chopped parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '2 pounds firm tofu', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil', '¼ cup chopped parsley', '½ teaspoon salt', 'ground black pepper to taste', '3 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Make the sauce: In a large, heavy saucepan, over medium heat, heat the olive oil.
', 'Step 2: Place the onions in the saucepan and saute them until they are soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add the garlic; cook 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 4: Place the tomatoes, tomato paste, basil and parsley in the saucepan.
', 'Step 5: Stir well, turn the heat to low and let the sauce simmer covered for 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Add the salt and pepper.
', 'Step 7: While the sauce is cooking bring a large kettle of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Boil the lasagna noodles for 9 minutes, then drain and rinse well.
', 'Step 9: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Place the tofu blocks in a large bowl.
', 'Step 11: Add the garlic, basil and parsley.
', 'Step 12: Add the salt and pepper, and mash all the ingredients together by squeezing pieces of tofu through your fingers.
', 'Step 13: Mix well.
', 'Step 14: Assemble the lasagna: Spread 1 cup of the tomato sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch casserole pan.
', 'Step 15: Arrange a single layer of lasagna noodles, sprinkle one-third of the tofu mixture over the noodles.
', 'Step 16: Distribute the spinach evenly over the tofu.
', 'Step 17: Next ladle 1 1/2 cups tomato sauce over the tofu, and top it with another layer of the noodles.
', 'Step 18: Then sprinkle another 1/3 of the tofu mixture over the noodles, top the tofu with 1 1/2 cups tomato sauce, and place a final layer of noodles over the tomato sauce.
', 'Step 19: Finally, top the noodles with the final 1/3 of the tofu, and spread the remaining tomato sauce over everything.
', 'Step 20: Cover the pan with foil and bake the lasagna for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Serve hot and enjoy.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '511.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '69.9 g', 'fatContent': '15.8 g', 'fiberContent': '11 g', 'proteinContent': '32.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '1074.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '12.4 g'}

Title: Pumpkin Cannoli
Ingredients: ["1 cup confectioners' sugar", '¾ cup canned pumpkin', '4 ounces mascarpone cheese', '½ cup ricotta cheese', '¼ cup instant vanilla pudding mix', '1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice', '½ cup heavy whipping cream', '12 large cannoli shells', '1 tablespoon sprinkles, or as desired', "1 teaspoon confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: Stir 1 cup confectioners' sugar, pumpkin, mascarpone cheese, ricotta cheese, pudding mix, and pumpkin pie spice together in a bowl until smooth.
", 'Step 2: Beat cream in a chilled bowl with an electric mixer until stiff peaks form; fold into pumpkin mixture.
', 'Step 3: Spoon pumpkin mixture into a resealable plastic bag and snip a 3/4-inch hole in 1 corner.
', 'Step 4: Pipe pumpkin mixture into each cannoli shell.
', "Step 5: Garnish the ends with sprinkles and confectioners' sugar.
"]

Title: Stephanie's Freezer Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['4 onions, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '½ cup vegetable oil', '16 cups chopped tomatoes', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '2 tablespoons dried basil', '¼ cup chopped parsley', '¼ cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons salt', '¾ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste']

['Step 1: In a slow cooker saute together the onion, garlic, green pepper, and vegetable oil.
', 'Step 2: Cook until onion is transparent.
', 'Step 3: n Add the chopped tomatoes, oregano, basil, parsley, sugar, salt, and ground black pepper.
', 'Step 4: Cook for 2 to 3 hours on low heat.
', 'Step 5: Stir frequently.
', 'Step 6: n Let sauce cool.
', 'Step 7: Pour sauce into quart size freezer containers.
', 'Step 8: Store in freezer.
', 'Step 9: n When ready to use sauce, stir in can of tomato paste.
']

Title: Italian Potato Salad
Ingredients: ['5 large potatoes, peeled and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '⅔ cup extra virgin olive oil', '½ cup white wine vinegar', '⅓ cup chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain, cool and chop.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl, mix together the garlic, olive oil, vinegar and parsley.
', 'Step 5: Add potatoes and toss to evenly coat.
', 'Step 6: Cover and refrigerate overnight.
']

Title: Double Chocolate Biscotti
Ingredients: ['½ cup butter, softened', '⅔ cup white sugar', '¼ cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 eggs', '1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '4 (1 ounce) squares white chocolate, chopped', '¾ cup semisweet chocolate chips']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar with an electric mixer until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 2: Gradually beat in cocoa and baking powder.
', 'Step 3: Beat for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Beat in the eggs one at a time.
', 'Step 5: Stir in flour by hand.
', 'Step 6: Mix in white chocolate and chocolate chips.
', 'Step 7: Cover dough, and chill for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Divide dough into two parts, and roll each part into a 9 inch long log.
', 'Step 10: Place logs on lightly greased cookie sheet, about 4 inches apart.
', 'Step 11: Flatten slightly.
', 'Step 12: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
', 'Step 13: Cool on cookie sheet for 5 minutes, then carefully transfer to a wire rack to cool for one hour.
', 'Step 14: Cut each loaf into 1/2 inch wide diagonal slices.
', 'Step 15: Place slices on an ungreased cookie sheet, and bake at 325 degrees F ( 165 degrees C) for 9 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Turn cookies over, and bake for 7 to 9 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Cool completely, then store in an airtight container.
']

Title: Tuscan Fish Stew
Ingredients: ['3 cups cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 cup clam juice', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '¼ cup sliced green onions', '4 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 anchovy fillet', '2 pinches red pepper flakes', '12 ounces halibut, cut into 2-inch pieces', '1 pound shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '½ tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '½ tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '1 pinch minced fresh rosemary']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Puree cherry tomatoes and clam juice in a blender until smooth.
', 'Step 2: Press mixture through a fine-mesh strainer into a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Combine 3 tablespoons olive oil, green onions, garlic, anchovy, and 1 pinch red pepper flakes in a cold plan.
', 'Step 4: Place over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir until garlic and onions just start to soften, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the tomato mixture.
', 'Step 7: Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to medium and simmer stew until color deepens, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add halibut and shrimp to the stew.
', 'Step 10: Season with salt.
', 'Step 11: Increase heat to high.
', 'Step 12: Cover pan and cook until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir in parsley, basil, oregano, and rosemary.
', 'Step 14: Pour stew into a warm bowl.
', 'Step 15: Drizzle in remaining olive oil and sprinkle 1 pinch red pepper flakes on top.
', 'Step 16: Serve with crusty bread.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '672 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '14.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '405 mg', 'fatContent': '34.1 g', 'fiberContent': '3.3 g', 'proteinContent': '76.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5 g', 'sodiumContent': '922.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.5 g'}

Title: Festival-Style Grilled Italian Sausage Sandwiches
Ingredients: ['4 (4 ounce) links hot Italian sausage', '1 red bell pepper, halved and seeded', '1 small onion, peeled and cut in half crosswise', '2 teaspoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 (6 inch) sandwich rolls, split and toasted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Lightly oil grate, and set 4 inches from the heat.
', 'Step 3: Pierce the sausages in a few places with a fork, and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Slice off the bottoms of the onion halves so they will sit flat on the grill.
', 'Step 5: Brush the bell pepper and onion halves with 2 teaspoons of olive oil.
', 'Step 6: Place the sausages, onions, and peppers on the preheated grill.
', 'Step 7: Cook and turn the sausages until well browned and juices run clear.
', 'Step 8: Cook vegetables until tender and peppers are slightly charred.
', 'Step 9: Remove vegetables and sausages from the grill.
', 'Step 10: Place the peppers in a paper bag, close, and cool slightly.
', 'Step 11: Remove and discard the charred skin from the peppers; slice peppers into strips.
', 'Step 12: Slice the onion halves.
', 'Step 13: Place salt and pepper to taste, and 1 tablespoon olive oil in a bowl.
', 'Step 14: Add the peppers and onions, and toss until evenly coated.
', 'Step 15: To serve, place sausages in sandwich rolls, and top with the pepper and onion mixture.
']

Title: Fideo (Mexican Spaghetti)
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 (12 ounce) package spaghetti noodles, broken in half', '5 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '½ tablespoon ground cumin', '2 ½ teaspoons chili powder', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 ½ cups water', '1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook chicken breasts in the oil until nicely browned on the outside.
', 'Step 3: Remove from the skillet and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Add remaining oil to the skillet, and add the broken spaghetti.
', 'Step 5: Cook, stirring constantly until spaghetti is browned.
', 'Step 6: Drain off any excess oil, and add tomatoes and onion.
', 'Step 7: Dice the chicken breasts, and return them to the skillet.
', 'Step 8: Season with cumin, chili powder, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Pour in water, cover, and simmer over medium-low heat until pasta is tender, and water has been absorbed, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Check towards the end, and add more water if necessary.
', 'Step 11: Spoon the chicken mixture into bowls to serve, and garnish with shredded cheese.
']

Title: Baked Spaghetti I
Ingredients: ['12 ounces spaghetti', '1 cup chopped onions', '1 cup chopped green bell peppers', '1 pound lean ground beef', '1 (16 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (4.5 ounce) can mushrooms, drained', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 cups shredded mild Cheddar cheese', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup', '¼ cup water', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add spaghetti, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente.
', 'Step 3: Drain, and set aside.
', 'Step 4: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, saute the onions, green peppers and ground beef.
', 'Step 5: Once beef is brown and onions and peppers softened, add the tomatoes, mushrooms and oregano.
', 'Step 6: Simmer uncovered for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 9: Place half of the cooked spaghetti into the prepared dish.
', 'Step 10: Top with half of the meat mixture.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle with 1 cup of the mild Cheddar cheese.
', 'Step 12: Repeat.
', 'Step 13: In a medium bowl, mix together cream of mushroom soup and water until smooth; pour over casserole.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 15: Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Chicken with Artichokes and Sundried Tomatoes
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ onion, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into 1-inch pieces', '½ cup chicken broth', '1 (15 ounce) can quartered artichoke hearts, undrained', '1 (6 ounce) jar sun-dried tomatoes, drained and cut into quarters', '1 (4 ounce) can sliced olives, drained', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 (12 ounce) package angel hair pasta', '1 (8 ounce) package crumbled feta cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir onion and garlic in hot oil for 1 minute.
', 'Step 2: Add chicken; cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir chicken broth, artichoke hearts with juice, sun-dried tomatoes, olives, salt, oregano, basil, and black pepper into chicken mixture; cover skillet and simmer until chicken is cooked through, about 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook angel hair in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain and transfer pasta to a platter; spoon chicken mixture over pasta.
', 'Step 7: Sprinkle with feta cheese.
']

Title: Salt and Garlic Bagel Chips
Ingredients: ['3 day old bagels', '⅓ cup olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a baking sheet with olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Slice bagels into 1/8 inch thick rounds using a serrated knife.
', 'Step 4: Arrange them in a single layer on the greased baking sheet.
', 'Step 5: In a small bowl, stir together the olive oil, garlic, Italian seasoning, and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 6: Use a spoon or pastry brush to apply the flavored olive oil to the bagel chips.
', 'Step 7: If you start to run out of the mixture, you can add a little bit more oil without sacrificing any flavor.
', 'Step 8: Season the chips lightly with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the chips are lightly browned.
', 'Step 10: Remove from the oven and cool.
', 'Step 11: The chips will become crispier as they cool.
']

Title: Penne with Sausage and Broccoli Rabe
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) box penne pasta', '1 pound hot Italian sausage links, cut into 1-inch pieces', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon crushed red pepper flakes', '1 pound broccoli rabe, cut into 1 1/2-inch lengths', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup pasta boiling water', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Once the water is boiling, stir in the penne, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain well in a colander set in the sink, reserving 1/2 cup of the water.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir the sausage pieces, garlic, and red pepper flakes in the hot pan until the sausage is no longer pink on the outside, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the broccoli rabe and 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 8: Pour in the reserved 1/2 cup of pasta boiling water.
', 'Step 9: Cover, and cook until the sausage is no longer pink in the center and the broccoli rabe is tender, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir the cooked pasta, broccoli rabe, and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese together until evenly mixed.
', 'Step 11: Season to taste with salt and pepper to serve.
']

Title: Chef John's Penne with Vodka Sauce
Ingredients: ['4 ounces pancetta bacon, diced', '1 small sprig fresh rosemary', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ cup vodka', '½ cup heavy whipping cream', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '3 cups prepared marinara sauce', '¾ cup water', '1 (14.5 ounce) package multigrain penne pasta (such as Barilla®)', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook and stir bacon and rosemary sprig with olive oil in a large, deep skillet over medium heat until bacon renders its fat but is not crisp, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Pour vodka into the skillet, standing back to avoid any flare-ups.
', 'Step 3: Raise heat to high and continue to cook until the vodka reduces to about 2 tablespoons.
', 'Step 4: Pour heavy cream into skillet, stir briefly, and add black pepper; bring sauce to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat to medium; cook and stir until sauce has slightly reduced, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Mix marinara sauce and water into cream mixture and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 7: Lower heat and simmer sauce 20 to 25 minutes to blend flavors.
', 'Step 8: Fill a large pot with salted water and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Stir in penne and return to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Cook pasta, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but still chewy, about 10 minutes; drain and return to pot.
', 'Step 11: Pour sauce over penne and stir to combine.
', 'Step 12: Turn off heat, cover pot with a lid, and let stand 5 minutes for pasta to absorb sauce.
', 'Step 13: Serve sprinkled with Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Fettuccine Alfredo V
Ingredients: ['10 ounces fettuccini pasta', '½ cup butter', '5 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 cup heavy cream', '1 egg yolk', '2 cups freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons dried parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add fettucine pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: In a large skillet melt the butter and add the chopped garlic.
', 'Step 4: Cook on low for about 5 minutes, stirring often, making sure not to burn the garlic.
', 'Step 5: Pour about a 1/4 cup of the heavy cream into a small bowl.
', 'Step 6: Add the egg yolk and beat together; put aside.
', 'Step 7: Pour the remaining cream into the frying pan.
', 'Step 8: Increase the heat to medium-high.
', 'Step 9: As the cream starts to boil, mix rapidly using a whisk.
', 'Step 10: Slowly add the cream/egg mixture.
', 'Step 11: You do not want the egg to curdle.
', 'Step 12: Continue whisking until well blended.
', 'Step 13: Add 1 cup of the Parmesan cheese and continue to mix the cream.
', 'Step 14: Pour in the remaining Parmesan and the parsley, mix until smooth.
', 'Step 15: Immediately remove from stove.
', 'Step 16: Serve over cooked pasta.
']

Title: Wedding Gift Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['½ cup butter', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 pound ground beef', '1 pound mild sausage', '4 teaspoons Italian seasoning', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons dried rosemary', '1 ½ teaspoons dried oregano', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '76 fluid ounces water', '1 (29 ounce) can tomato puree', '3 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat butter and olive oil together with onion and garlic in a large pot over medium heat; cook and stir ground beef and sausage in the onion mixture until browned and crumbly, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir Italian seasoning, salt, rosemary, oregano, and black pepper into ground beef-sausage mixture; simmer for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour water, tomato puree, and tomato paste into ground beef-sausage mixture; simmer, stirring occasionally, over low heat until flavors have combined, at least 2 hours.
']

Title: Spaghetti Pie I

', 'Step 5: Spread cottage cheese over crust.

']

Title: Johnsonville® Italian Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 egg, lightly beaten', '⅓ cup dry bread crumbs', '¼ cup KRAFT 100% Grated Parmesan Cheese', '¼ cup milk', '¼ cup finely chopped onion', '1 (19 ounce) package Johnsonville® Ground Mild Italian Sausage or Links, casings removed*']

Title: Italian Shrimp and Scallop Risotto
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, peeled', '½ pound shelled sea scallops', '½ pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '½ cup dry white wine', '½ lemon, juiced', '1 bunch fresh parsley, finely chopped', '1 quart fish stock, or more as needed', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1 (12 ounce) package Arborio rice', '½ cup dry white wine', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 3 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over a medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add garlic; cook and stir until starting to sizzle, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in scallops and cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Add shrimp and season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 5: Cook over high heat until shrimp are pink, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Pour 1/2 cup white wine into the skillet and let the alcohol evaporate.
', 'Step 7: Scrape the bottom of the skillet to deglaze; cook until the liquid is reduced, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat, add lemon juice, and sprinkle with 1/2 of the parsley.
', 'Step 9: Discard garlic.
', 'Step 10: Cover the skillet to keep shellfish warm.
', 'Step 11: Pour fish stock into a saucepan over medium heat and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 12: Melt butter in a skillet over low heat.
', 'Step 13: Add 1 tablespoon olive oil and shallot.
', 'Step 14: Cook until shallot is soft and translucent, but not brown, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Increase heat and add rice; cook until rice has absorbed the oil and butter and has a nutty aroma, stirring often, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Make sure not to burn the shallot and reduce heat if skillet gets too hot.
', 'Step 17: Pour 1/2 cup white wine into the skillet and stir until alcohol has evaporated.
', 'Step 18: Add 1 ladleful of fish stock, stir, and cook until rice has absorbed the stock.
', 'Step 19: Add another ladleful and repeat the process until the rice is tender, 15 to 18 minutes in total.
', 'Step 20: Add shellfish with their juices to the risotto pan 3 minutes before the end of cooking.
', 'Step 21: Stir and finish cooking all together, adding stock if needed.
', 'Step 22: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 23: Stir in remaining parsley and 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil.
', 'Step 24: Let risotto stand for 2 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '702.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '75.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '125 mg', 'fatContent': '25.4 g', 'fiberContent': '2.3 g', 'proteinContent': '31 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '1059.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.4 g'}

Title: Italian Baked Cannelloni
Ingredients: ['½ cup olive oil, or as needed', '1 pound lean ground beef', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '¼ teaspoon dried sage', '¼ teaspoon dried rosemary', 'salt to taste', '½ cup white wine', '4 tablespoons butter', '4 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 cups milk', '2 egg yolks, lightly beaten', '12 ounces mozzarella cheese, cubed', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '½ cup white wine', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes', 'salt and pepper to taste', '12 cannelloni pasta shells']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large skillet over medium heat, warm oil and saute ground beef with the onion, sage and rosemary; cook until meat is evenly browned and crumbly.
', 'Step 2: Drain fat.
', 'Step 3: Add salt and 1/2 cup white wine; cook until wine is evaporated.
', 'Step 4: Set mixture aside.
', 'Step 5: To make the Bechamel sauce: Melt 4 tablespoons butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add flour and stir until well incorporated.
', 'Step 7: Stir in milk and bring to a slow boil until mixture thickens.
', 'Step 8: Remove sauce from the heat.
', 'Step 9: In a steady stream, pour the bechamel in to the beaten egg yolks, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 10: Stir the sauce into the meat mixture.
', 'Step 11: Stir in the cubed mozzarella.
', 'Step 12: In a medium saucepan over medium-low heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter and saute onion until soft and translucent.
', 'Step 13: Add 1/2 cup white wine and let it cook down to evaporate; add stewed tomatoes and salt.
', 'Step 14: Mix well; simmer for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 16: Add pasta, a few at a time, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; using a slotted spoon, remove immediately to a pot filled with cold water.
', 'Step 17: Lift pasta out with slotted spoon and arrange on a flat surface.
', 'Step 18: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 19: Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 20: Spoon a line of filling into each shell, starting from one end and using your finger to push the filling inside of each shell.
', 'Step 21: Place cannelloni in prepared baking dish and cover with tomato sauce mixture.
', 'Step 22: Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or until heated through; when finished baking, allow to stand for 5 minutes and serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '889.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '47.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '198.4 mg', 'fatContent': '58.1 g', 'fiberContent': '3.2 g', 'proteinContent': '37.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '23.5 g', 'sodiumContent': '826.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '12.1 g'}

Title: Make-Ahead Manicotti
Ingredients: ['1 pint ricotta cheese', '2 eggs', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 ½ tablespoons white sugar', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '12 manicotti shells', '1 (32 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce']

['Step 1: In a medium bowl, mix together ricotta cheese and eggs until blended.
', 'Step 2: Stir in spinach, mozzarella cheese, 1/4 cup of the Parmesan cheese, sugar, salt and pepper.

', 'Step 5: Arrange stuffed pasta shells in a single layer over the sauce.
', 'Step 6: Pour the remainder of the sauce over the shells, cover dish, and chill in the refrigerator for 8 hours, or overnight.
', 'Step 7: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Bake covered for 40 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle with remaining Parmesan cheese, and bake for another 15 minutes.
']

Title: Pork Agrodolce
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '⅓ cup aged balsamic vinegar', '¼ cup distilled white vinegar', '3 tablespoons honey', '1 anchovy fillet, or more to taste, mashed', '¼ cup finely chopped green onions', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon minced fresh rosemary', '1 tablespoon kosher salt, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '3 ½ pounds boneless pork shoulder']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (160 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Brush a baking dish with olive oil.

Title: Greens and Beans
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon salt', '2 heads escarole, cut into 2-inch pieces', '¼ cup olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, pressed', '1 teaspoon salt, or more to taste', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese, or to taste']

Title: Meatball Sub Casserole

Title: Authentic Taralli
Ingredients: ['4 cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon fine sea salt, divided', '¾ cup olive oil', '¾ cup dry white wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, oil, and wine in a stand mixer.
', 'Step 2: Mix ingredients using the paddle attachment until a ball forms.
', 'Step 3: Switch to the dough hook and knead dough for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 5: Bring a large pot of water to boil over high heat and add the remaining salt.
', 'Step 6: Spread a large, clean cloth out on a counter or table.
', 'Step 7: Pinch off a walnut-sized piece of dough once kneading has finished.
', 'Step 8: Roll dough piece into a snake about 2 1/2 inches long.
', 'Step 9: Form a tear drop shape, lightly pressing the two ends together to seal them into a ring.
', 'Step 10: Repeat with remaining dough.
', 'Step 11: Turn down the boiling water to a low boil.
', 'Step 12: Drop taralli into the water a few at a time.
', 'Step 13: Do not stir; they will sink at first, then begin to float.
', 'Step 14: Remove floating taralli with a slotted spoon.
', 'Step 15: Place them on the clean cloth and continue until all the taralli have boiled and are drained on the cloth.
', 'Step 16: Place them on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 17: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven until taralli are golden and firm on the outside, but still soft on the inside, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Cool completely and rest for at least 1 hour before serving.
', 'Step 20: Wrap with a clean cloth or place in a paper bag; store at room temperature for up to 1 week.
']

Title: Rustic Sausage Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 (12 ounce) package rotini pasta', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 red bell peppers, chopped', '1 small zucchini, chopped', '1 small yellow squash, chopped', '1 cup mushrooms, sliced', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (14.4 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 cup tomato sauce', '¼ teaspoon dried thyme', '¼ teaspoon dried basil', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook until al dente, 8 to 10 minutes; drain.

', 'Step 4: Remove sausage using a slotted spoon, leaving drippings in the pan.

', 'Step 6: Return the sausage to the pan.

', 'Step 8: Season with salt and pepper.

', 'Step 10: Add the tomatoes, tomato sauce, thyme, basil, and oregano; cook until heated through, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Combine the drained pasta with the sausage mixture in a large bowl.
', 'Step 12: Top with Parmesan cheese to serve.
']

Title: Sfogliatelle Ricce
Ingredients: ['12 ⅓ ounces bread flour', '5 ⅓ ounces semolina flour', '⅓ ounce kosher salt', '6 ½ fluid ounces water, or more if needed', '⅔ fluid ounce honey', '1 ⅔ cups whole-milk ricotta cheese', '1 cup water', '½ cup white sugar', '⅔ cup semolina flour', '2 large egg yolks', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 tablespoons finely chopped candied orange peel', '½ cup unsalted butter, room temperature', '½ cup lard, room temperature', "¼ cup confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix bread flour, 5 1/3 ounces semolina flour, and kosher salt together in a large bowl; add water and honey and mix.
', 'Step 2: The dough will be very dry, like pasta.
', 'Step 3: If there is still dry flour after a few minutes of mixing, add up to 2 teaspoons more water to ensure all the flour is moistened.
', 'Step 4: Turn dough onto a counter.
', 'Step 5: Knead a few minutes until the dough is smooth, firm, and not tacky.
', 'Step 6: While firm, the dough must also be workable.
', 'Step 7: Divide the dough into four pieces and flatten.
', 'Step 8: Cover dough with plastic wrap when not working with it.
', "Step 9: Run each piece through a pasta machine on its widest setting a dozen or so times, folding in half and rotating the sheet 45 degrees each time (see Cook's Note).
", 'Step 10: Dust with flour very sparingly, only if needed to prevent tearing.
', 'Step 11: Repeat with all four pieces.
', 'Step 12: Wrap dough in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 2 hours.
', 'Step 13: Blend ricotta cheese in a food processor until smooth.
', 'Step 14: Boil 1 cup of water and stir in the sugar.
', 'Step 15: Sift in the semolina, whisking to avoid clumping.
', 'Step 16: It will immediately thicken up.
', 'Step 17: Reduce heat to low, fold in the ricotta, and cook for another 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 18: Remove pan from heat and return filling to food processor.
', 'Step 19: While processor is running, add egg yolks, one at a time, until fully combined.
', 'Step 20: Add vanilla, cinnamon, and candied orange peel and pulse to mix.
', 'Step 21: Transfer filling to a bowl.
', 'Step 22: Cool to room temperature, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate.
', 'Step 23: Divide each dough piece into four pieces.
', 'Step 24: Cover dough with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 25: Place clean kitchen towels over a work surface.
', 'Step 26: Lay each sheet of dough on the towels while you roll out the remaining sheets.
', 'Step 27: Run each piece through the pasta machine on progressively smaller settings until dough is as thin as possible.
', 'Step 28: After running it through the pasta machine, stretch each sheet as wide as you can without tearing.
', 'Step 29: Dough sheets should stretch to three times their original width and be so thin you can see through it.
', 'Step 30: Place a sheet of parchment paper on a work surface.
', 'Step 31: Melt butter and lard.
', 'Step 32: Place the first sheet of pastry on the parchment.
', 'Step 33: Brush the dough with the butter-lard mixture.
', 'Step 34: Lay the second sheet above the first, overlapping a half-inch or so.
', 'Step 35: Roll the sheets up into a tight cylinder, leaving about an inch to overlap the next sheet.
', 'Step 36: Lay the third dough sheet on the parchment, overlapping the second sheet, and brush with the butter mixture.
', 'Step 37: Continue rolling up the log of dough, repeating until all the dough pieces are brushed with the butter mixture and rolled up.
', 'Step 38: Wrap dough log in the parchment sheet and wrap entirely with plastic wrap; refrigerate for 2 hours.
', 'Step 39: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 40: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 41: Place filling mixture in a pastry bag or a 1 gallon zipper bag with the corner snipped off.
', 'Step 42: Cut cylinder of dough into half-inch slices; you should have 16 to 20 pieces.
', 'Step 43: Holding the dough in both hands, use your thumbs to flatten the dough piece from the center outwards.
', 'Step 44: Form flattened slice into a cone shape.
', 'Step 45: Pipe filling into center, close partially, and repeat with remaining dough and filling.
', 'Step 46: Bake in preheated oven until dough turns golden brown and starts to "peel" back from the pastries, 20 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 47: You can baste the pastries a couple of times with the leftover butter and lard mixture during baking, if you like.
', "Step 48: Dust with confectioners' sugar before serving.
"]
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '270.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '33.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '46.9 mg', 'fatContent': '13.2 g', 'fiberContent': '0.9 g', 'proteinContent': '4.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '239.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.4 g'}

Title: Baked Ziti Casserole
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package ziti', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 ½ cups tomato sauce', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '2 cups tomato sauce, divided', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook ziti in boiling water until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 13 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 3: Rinse ziti with cold water until cool; drain.
', 'Step 4: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Mix ziti, ricotta cheese, 1 1/2 cups tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, egg, salt, and pepper in a large bowl.
', 'Step 6: Spread 1/2 cup tomato sauce into the bottom of a 2 1/2-quart shallow baking dish.
', 'Step 7: Pour ziti mixture into the dish.
', 'Step 8: Top with remaining 1 1/2 cup tomato sauce and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 9: Bake in preheated oven until sauce and cheese layer is bubbly and lightly browned, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Let cool 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Pesto Chicken

Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Spread about 2 tablespoons of pesto per chicken breast over the top of each breast, and wrap each breast in prosciutto slices to cover the entire breast.
', 'Step 4: Place the wrapped chicken breasts into the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 5: Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is no longer pink, the juices run clear, and the prosciutto is lightly crisped, about 25 minutes.

Title: Slow Cooker Italian Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '4 (4 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '¼ cup water', '1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix', '1 clove garlic, pressed', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup', '1 (4.5 ounce) can chopped canned mushrooms', '1 (8 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Spray the crock of a slow cooker with non-stick cooking spray.
', 'Step 2: Place chicken breasts in crock.
', 'Step 3: Combine Italian dressing mix, and water in a small bowl.
', 'Step 4: Pour over chicken; sprinkle with garlic, cover, and cook on Low 4 hours.
', 'Step 5: After 4 hours, whisk softened cream cheese and cream of chicken soup together in a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Pour over chicken; stir in mushrooms.
', 'Step 7: Cover and cook on Low for 1 additional hour.
', 'Step 8: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 9: Once the water is boiling, stir in the spaghetti, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 12: To serve, spoon chicken and sauce over hot cooked pasta and sprinkle with parsley.
']

Title: Proper Pesto
Ingredients: ['4 cloves garlic, peeled', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '1 large bunch fresh basil', '3 tablespoons pine nuts', '2 ounces finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '½ cup mild extra-virgin olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Crush garlic and pinch of kosher salt in a mortar with the pestle until garlic is mashed and paste-like, 1 or 2 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add basil in 3 or 4 additions, crushing and pounding down the leaves until they form a fairly fine paste, about 8 minutes or more depending on size of leaves and thickness of stems.
', 'Step 3: Add and pound in pine nuts.
', 'Step 4: n Transfer a handful of grated cheese to mortar and pound into the sauce.
', 'Step 5: Add another handful of cheese and incorporate into the mixture.
', 'Step 6: Continue adding cheese a handful at a time until completely incorporated, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: n Drizzle in olive oil 1 tablespoon at a time, pounding it into the sauce.
', 'Step 8: When all the olive oil has been added and emulsified into the mixture, transfer pesto to a bowl and drizzle surface with olive oil.
']

Title: Chef John's Italian Sausage Chili
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ¼ pounds hot Italian sausage, casings removed', '1 ¼ pounds mild Italian sausage, casings removed', '1 onion, chopped', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons ancho chile powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon chipotle chile powder', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '2 ½ cups water, or as needed', '1 cup tomato puree', '2 (15 ounce) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 red bell pepper, diced', '1 green bell pepper, diced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir hot Italian sausage, mild Italian sausage, onion, and a pinch of salt together in the pot, breaking up sausage with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 3: Cook until sausage is browned and crumbly, and most of the liquid is evaporated, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir ancho chile powder, paprika, cumin, ground black pepper, chipotle chile powder, and oregano into sausage mixture; saute until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Pour water and tomato puree into sausage mixture, bring to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook on a steady simmer until sausage is tender, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add water as necessary and skim any fat that floats to the top.
', 'Step 7: Stir cannellini beans, red bell pepper, and green bell pepper into sausage mixture.
', 'Step 8: Simmer until vegetables are tender, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Season with salt to taste.
']

Title: Lace Cookies (Florentine Cookies)
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups whole raw almonds', '½ cup unsalted butter', '¾ cup light brown sugar', '¼ cup honey', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 cup semisweet chocolate chips, melted']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with a silicone liner (such as Silpat®).
', 'Step 3: Place almonds into the bowl of a food processor; alternate pulsing and running at full speed every few seconds until finely chopped and crumblike.
', "Step 4: Be careful not to go too far; you don't want them too fine and pasty.
", 'Step 5: Combine butter, brown sugar, and honey in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Stir a few times and cook until melted and dissolved.
', 'Step 7: Bring to a boil, then carefully remove from the heat.
', 'Step 8: Add vanilla extract, salt, and flour, and whisk until smooth.
', 'Step 9: Add chopped almonds and mix with a spatula until everything is combined.
', 'Step 10: Drop eight uniformly sized, rounded spoonfuls of batter (each about 2 teaspoons, or 15 grams) onto the prepared sheet.
', 'Step 11: Fine-tune the cookie shapes and make sure they are evenly spaced.
', 'Step 12: Place in the center of the preheated oven and bake until golden brown and a bit darker around the outsides, 10 to 12 minutes, rotating the pan halfway through.
', 'Step 13: Remove from the oven and slide the silicone liner off the baking sheet and directly onto the countertop.
', 'Step 14: Allow to sit until cool and crisp, 3 to 5 minutes, then gently peel cookies off the liner.
', 'Step 15: Repeat to bake remaining batches.
', 'Step 16: Spread melted chocolate over the flat side of one cookie.
', 'Step 17: Place a second cookie, flat-side down, on top to make a sandwich and press very gently to seal.
', 'Step 18: Repeat to form remaining cookies.
', 'Step 19: Let sit until chocolate has firmed up, about 30 minutes.
']

Title: The Farmer's Frittata (Italian-Style Omelet)
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups cubed zucchini', '2 ½ cups cubed yellow summer squash', '2 tablespoons kosher salt', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 slice thick-cut bacon, cut crosswise into 1/4-inch strips', '8 large eggs', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons sliced green onions, or to taste', '⅓ cup diced red onion', '1 cup diced sweet peppers', '2 ounces grated sharp Cheddar cheese', '4 ounces goat cheese, crumbled']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine zucchini and summer squash in a bowl and sprinkle 2 tablespoons kosher salt over top; toss until everything is evenly coated.
', 'Step 2: Let sit for 15 minutes, tossing occasionally.
', 'Step 3: Thoroughly rinse squash with cold water to remove all salt; transfer to a colander and let drain for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a 10-inch, oven-proof skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Add bacon and cook until browned and almost crisp, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: While the bacon is cooking, mix eggs, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, black pepper, cayenne, and green onions together with a fork in a large bowl.
', 'Step 7: Raise the heat on the bacon to medium-high; toss in peppers and red onion plus a pinch of salt.
', 'Step 8: Cook and stir until the peppers just start to soften and the onions turn translucent, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add drained squash and carefully stir together; cook until squash is just barely tender, about 5 minutes.
', "Step 10: Meanwhile, set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
", 'Step 11: Toss Cheddar cheese into the skillet and pour egg mixture over top.
', 'Step 12: Stir with a spatula (like you were making scrambled eggs) until it starts to thicken up, 30 to 45 seconds.
', 'Step 13: Shake the pan gently to settle the contents and turn off the heat.
', 'Step 14: Push the edges down a bit with the spatula and sprinkle goat cheese over top.
', 'Step 15: Drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil.
', 'Step 16: Place under the preheated broiler until the surface is lightly browned and frittata is firm to the touch, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Sprinkle with more green onions and let cool for 5 minutes before transferring it onto a serving plate.
']

Title: Sicilian Ricotta Cheesecake
Ingredients: ['2 pounds ricotta cheese', '⅔ cup white sugar', '⅓ cup all-purpose flour', '6 eggs', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons orange zest', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '⅛ teaspoon salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Set rack in the middle of the oven.
', 'Step 3: Butter and flour a 9 1/2 inch springform pan, and tap out excess flour.
', 'Step 4: Place the ricotta in a large mixing bowl, and stir it as smooth as possible with a rubber spatula.
', 'Step 5: Stir the sugar and flour together thoroughly into the ricotta.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the eggs 1 at a time.
', 'Step 7: Blend in the vanilla, cinnamon, orange zest, and salt.
', 'Step 8: Pour batter into the prepared pan.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the center of the oven for about 1 1/4 to 1 1/2 hours, until a light golden color.
', 'Step 10: Make sure the center is fairly firm, and the point of a sharp knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
', 'Step 11: Cool on a wire rack.
', 'Step 12: It will sink slightly as it cools.
', 'Step 13: Cover, and chill till serving time.
']

Title: Kim's Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 pound ground beef', '1 cup chopped onion', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (8 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '1 (14 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (14 ounce) can Italian-style crushed tomatoes', '2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 teaspoons brown sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon fennel seeds', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '12 lasagna noodles', '1 egg', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '½ teaspoon salt', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 (16 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Brown sausage and ground beef with onion and garlic in a large Dutch oven or heavy pot over medium heat, cooking and stirring until meat is cooked through, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 3: Stir tomato sauce, crushed tomatoes, Italian-style crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, 2 tablespoons parsley, brown sugar, salt, Italian seasoning, black pepper, fennel seeds, and 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese into meat mixture.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer sauce for at least 1 hour (up to 6 for best flavor).
', 'Step 5: Stir occasionally.
', 'Step 6: Place lasagna noodles into a deep bowl and cover with very hot tap water; let soak for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Beat egg in a bowl and stir ricotta cheese, 2 tablespoons parsley, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and nutmeg into egg until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Cover bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish with 1 cup sauce.
', 'Step 10: Layer 4 soaked lasagna noodles, 1/3 of the ricotta cheese mixture, 1/3 of the shredded mozzarella cheese, and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese in the dish.
', 'Step 11: Repeat layers twice more, ending with mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses.
', 'Step 12: Cover dish with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 13: Bake until lasagna noodles are tender and casserole is bubbling, about 50 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove foil and bake until cheese topping is lightly browned, 15 to 20 more minutes.
', 'Step 15: Let stand 15 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Pasta Primavera with Italian Turkey Sausage
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package uncooked farfalle pasta', '1 pound hot Italian turkey sausage, cut into 1/2 inch slices', '½ cup olive oil, divided', '4 cloves garlic, diced', '½ onion, diced', '2 small zucchini, chopped', '2 small yellow squash, chopped', '6 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '20 leaves fresh basil', '2 teaspoons chicken bouillon granules', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

', 'Step 2: Place farfalle in pot and cook 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente; drain.

', 'Step 6: Mix in zucchini, squash, tomatoes, bell pepper and basil.
', 'Step 7: Dissolve bouillon in the mixture.
', 'Step 8: Season with red pepper.
', 'Step 9: Stir in remaining oil.
', 'Step 10: Continue cooking 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Mix pasta, sausage and cheese into skillet.
', 'Step 12: Continue cooking 5 minutes, or until heated through.
']

Title: Grandma Maul's Italian Beef
Ingredients: ['1 (4 pound) boneless beef chuck roast', '½ cup all-purpose flour', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon anise seed', '1 tablespoon sesame seed', '1 large green bell pepper, julienned']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Rinse and pat dry the roast.
', 'Step 2: Coat the roast evenly with the flour; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Add the garlic to the hot oil; sear the beef in the oil until all sides are slightly browned.
', 'Step 5: Transfer the roast to a slow cooker.
', 'Step 6: Pour the water over the roast.
', 'Step 7: Cook on Low for 5 hours.
', 'Step 8: Add the anise seed and sesame seed to the slow cooker and cook another 4 hours.
', 'Step 9: Add the green bell pepper and continue cooking until the meat is tender and easily pulled apart, about 1 hour more.
']

Title: Pizza Chicken
Ingredients: ['½ cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '½ cup pizza sauce, divided', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '4 slices pepperoni, or to taste - divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper in a shallow bowl; place flour into a second bowl.
', 'Step 3: Whisk egg and lemon juice together in a third bowl.
', 'Step 4: Dip each chicken breast in egg mixture and dredge in flour; dip again in egg mixture and dredge chicken in crumb mixture until coated.
', 'Step 5: Place coated chicken breasts into a baking dish.
', 'Step 6: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is heated through and crumbs are golden, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Spoon 2 tablespoons pizza sauce onto each chicken breast, sprinkle each with half the mozzarella cheese, and top each with half the pepperoni slices.
', 'Step 8: Bake until chicken is no longer pink inside and the juices run clear, about 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 9: An instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part of a breast should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
']

Title: Italian Bread Bowls
Ingredients: ['2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast', '2 ½ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '7 cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon cornmeal', '1 egg white', '1 tablespoon water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until creamy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add salt, oil and 4 cups flour to the yeast mixture; beat well.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the remaining flour, 1/2 cup at a time, beating well with an electric mixer at medium speed after each addition.
', 'Step 5: When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 6 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Lightly oil a large bowl, place the dough in the bowl and turn to coat with oil.
', 'Step 7: Cover with a damp cloth and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Punch dough down, and divide into 8 equal portions.
', 'Step 9: Shape each portion into a 4 inch round loaf.
', 'Step 10: Place loaves on lightly greased baking sheets sprinkled with cornmeal.
', 'Step 11: Cover and let rise in a warm place, free from drafts, until doubled in bulk, about 35 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: In a small bowl, beat together egg white and 1 tablespoon water; lightly brush the loaves with half of this egg wash.
', 'Step 14: Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Brush with remaining egg mixture, and bake 10 to 15 more minutes or until golden.
', 'Step 16: Cool on wire racks.
', 'Step 17: To make bowls: Cut a 1/2 inch thick slice from top of each loaf; scoop out centers, leaving 3/4-inch-thick shells.
', 'Step 18: Fill bread bowls with hot soup and serve immediately.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '439.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '85 g', 'fatContent': '4.6 g', 'fiberContent': '3.4 g', 'proteinContent': '12.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '593.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.3 g'}

Title: Fresh Strawberry Granita
Ingredients: ['2 pounds ripe strawberries, hulled and halved', '⅓ cup white sugar, or to taste', '1 cup water', '½ teaspoon lemon juice', '¼ teaspoon balsamic vinegar', '1 tiny pinch salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Rinse strawberries with cold water; let drain.
', 'Step 2: Transfer berries to a blender and add sugar, water, lemon juice, balsamic vinegar, and salt.
', 'Step 3: Pulse several times to get the mixture moving, then blend until smooth, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Pour into a large baking dish.
', 'Step 5: Puree should only be about 3/8 inch deep in the dish.
', 'Step 6: Place dish uncovered in the freezer until mixture barely begins to freeze around the edges, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Mixture will still be slushy in the center.
', 'Step 8: Lightly stir the crystals from the edge of the granita mixture into the center, using a fork, and mix thoroughly.
', 'Step 9: Close freezer and chill until granita is nearly frozen, 30 to 40 more minutes.
', 'Step 10: Mix lightly with a fork as before, scraping the crystals loose.
', 'Step 11: Repeat freezing and stirring with the fork 3 to 4 times until the granita is light, crystals are separate, and granita looks dry and fluffy.
', 'Step 12: Portion granita into small serving bowls to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '68.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '17.1 g', 'fatContent': '0.3 g', 'fiberContent': '2.3 g', 'proteinContent': '0.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '26.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '13.9 g'}

Title: Sfingi
Ingredients: ['1 pound ricotta cheese', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 ½ tablespoons baking powder', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '2 quarts vegetable oil for frying', '¼ cup honey', "¼ cup confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In large bowl, combine ricotta, eggs, sugar and vanilla.
', 'Step 2: Mix together baking powder and 1/2 cup flour.
', 'Step 3: Fold into ricotta mixture.
', 'Step 4: Add enough of remaining flour to make a thick batter.
', 'Step 5: Let rest 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: Heat oil in large heavy saucepan over high heat until a small amount of batter dropped in oil sizzles and starts to color.
', 'Step 7: Drop batter by teaspoons into hot oil and deep fry until golden.
', 'Step 8: Remove with slotted spoon and drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 9: Stack sfingi on serving platter in a pyramid.
', "Step 10: Drizzle stack with honey and dust with confectioner's sugar.
"]

Title: Chicken Tetrazzini IV
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package spaghetti, broken into pieces', '¼ cup butter', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '¾ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup chicken broth', '1 cup heavy cream', '2 tablespoons sherry', '1 (4.5 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained', '2 cups chopped cooked chicken', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Add spaghetti, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, in a large saucepan, melt butter over low heat.
', 'Step 6: Stir in flour, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Cook, stirring, until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Remove from heat, and gradually stir in chicken broth and cream.
', 'Step 9: Return to heat, and bring to a low boil for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 10: Add sherry, then stir in cooked spaghetti, mushrooms, and chicken.
', 'Step 11: Pour mixture into the prepared baking dish, and top with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 12: Bake 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly and lightly browned.
']

Title: Homemade Pasta without a Pasta Machine
Ingredients: ['2 ½ cups Italian-style tipo 00 flour, plus additional for dusting', '3 large eggs', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon water, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place flour on a marble or wooden work surface.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the center and crack in the eggs; add the salt.
', 'Step 3: Gently beat eggs with a fork, incorporating the surrounding flour, until batter is runny.
', 'Step 4: Bring remaining flour into the batter using a bench scraper until dough forms a ball.
', 'Step 5: Mix in water, 1 tablespoon at a time, if dough feels too stiff.
', 'Step 6: Knead dough with your hands by flattening the ball, stretching it and folding the top towards the center.
', 'Step 7: Turn 45 degrees and repeat until dough is soft and smooth, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 9: Place in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 10: Refrigerate until firm, 30 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 11: Dust work surface with flour.
', 'Step 12: Divide dough into 3 equal portions.
', 'Step 13: Flatten 1 piece a little and roll out 5 to 6 times with a rolling pin.
', 'Step 14: Turn dough 45 degrees and roll 5 to 6 times.
', 'Step 15: Continue rolling and turning until dough is 1/16-inch thick.
', 'Step 16: Cut dough into a sheet.
', 'Step 17: Dust generously with flour and roll into a cylinder.
', 'Step 18: Slice cylinder into 1/4-inch thick strips.
', 'Step 19: Unroll strips and toss generously in flour.
', 'Step 20: Let tagliatelle air-dry, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Bring a large pan of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 22: Drop in tagliatelle and cook until tender yet still firm to the bite, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 23: Drain.
']

Title: Chicken Marsala with Portobello Mushrooms
Ingredients: ['8 tablespoons butter, divided', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '4 portobello mushroom caps, sliced', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', '1 (14.5 ounce) can beef broth', '½ cup dry Marsala wine', '1 tablespoon browning sauce', 'kosher salt, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded to 1/2 inch thickness', '1 pinch kosher salt and pepper to taste', '¾ cup all-purpose flour, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Melt 4 tablespoons butter and heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir the mushroom slices in the skillet until tender.
', 'Step 4: Remove pan from heat and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Melt 1 tablespoon butter and heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the garlic and cook until tender, then gradually whisk in 1 tablespoon flour.
', 'Step 7: Cook, stirring constantly, for 1 minute.
', 'Step 8: Increase heat to high, and whisk in the beef broth, Marsala, and browning sauce.

', "Step 11: Mix in the cooked mushrooms; you'll use the skillet to cook the chicken.
", 'Step 12: Cover saucepan and remove from heat.
', 'Step 13: Season chicken with salt and pepper, and dredge chicken breasts in the flour.
', 'Step 14: Over medium heat, melt remaining 3 tablespoons butter in the skillet used to cook the mushrooms.
', 'Step 15: Cook the chicken 2 minutes per side, until browned.
', 'Step 16: Arrange the chicken in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish, and cover with the sauce and mushroom mixture.
', 'Step 17: Cover baking dish, and bake 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until chicken juices run clear.
']

Title: Deliciously Easy Garlic Herb Focaccia
Ingredients: ['1 cup very warm water', '3 tablespoons very warm water', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '3 cups bread flour', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons active dry yeast', '6 cloves garlic, crushed, or more to taste', '⅓ cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon herbes de Provence, or more to taste', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']

', 'Step 14: Remove from the oven and transfer from the baking sheet to a rack.
', 'Step 15: Let cool, 5 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Cut into squares with a pizza cutter.
']

Ingredients: ['1 head red leaf lettuce, rinsed and torn', '2 medium fresh tomatoes, chopped', '1 medium red onion, chopped', '6 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '1 pinch dried oregano', '½ pound sliced Capacola sausage', '½ pound thinly sliced Genoa salami', '¼ pound thinly sliced prosciutto', '½ pound sliced provolone cheese', '4 submarine rolls, split', '1 cup dill pickle slices']

Title: Italian Chickpea Bread
Ingredients: ['1 cup chickpea flour', '1 cup water', 'cooking spray', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 ½ teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 ½ teaspoons chopped dried rosemary', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch salt to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk chickpea flour and water together in a bowl until smooth; let sit at room temperature, 2 to 6 hours.
', 'Step 2: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 3: Spray the inside of an 8-inch metal pie pan.
', 'Step 4: Skim foam from the top of chickpea-water mixture.
', 'Step 5: Add oil, Italian seasoning, and rosemary and stir until combined.
', 'Step 6: Pour mixture into the prepared pan; sprinkle black pepper and salt over the top.
', 'Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven until edges begin to brown, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove bread from pan and cut into wedges.
']
