Title: Scrumptious Shrimp Scampi Linguine
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '½ cup chopped red bell pepper', '½ cup chopped yellow bell pepper', '6 cloves garlic, sliced', '48 large shrimp - peeled, deveined, and tails removed', '½ cup dry white wine (such as Chardonnay)', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '¼ cup clam juice', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons heavy cream', '1 ½ teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon sea salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Once the water is boiling, stir in the linguine, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Reserve 1 cup of the linguine cooking water, and drain pasta well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 5: Melt 2 tablespoons of butter and 1 1/2 tablespoon of olive oil together in a large skillet over medium heat, and cook and stir the red and yellow bell pepper and garlic until the peppers have softened, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the shrimp, and cook and stir until the shrimp are opaque and pink, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove the shrimp to a bowl and set aside, leaving the peppers and garlic in the skillet.
', 'Step 8: Stir the wine, lemon juice, and clam juice into the skillet, and bring to a boil over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Mix in 2 more tablespoons of butter and 1 1/2 tablespoons of olive oil, and return the shrimp to the skillet.
', 'Step 10: Stir in reserved pasta cooking water, cream, red pepper flakes, parsley, and sea salt.
', 'Step 11: Add the cooked linguine, and toss lightly with the shrimp and sauce in the skillet.
', 'Step 12: Simmer the mixture over medium-low heat for 5 minutes to let the pasta absorb some of the sauce, and serve hot.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '573.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '58 g', 'cholesterolContent': '283.2 mg', 'fatContent': '19.6 g', 'fiberContent': '3.1 g', 'proteinContent': '38.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '672.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.6 g'}

Title: Chocolate Puddino
Ingredients: ['8 ounces dark chocolate chips', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '6 large eggs', '⅓ cup white sugar', '1 cup whole milk', '1 ¼ cups heavy cream', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '¼ cup heavy cream, or to taste', '⅛ teaspoon vanilla extract, or to taste', '2 tablespoons shaved dark chocolate, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine chocolate chips, salt, and cayenne in a heat-proof measuring cup; set aside.
', 'Step 2: Separate eggs by cracking one egg into your hand over a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Open your fingers slightly and gently jiggle your hand until the egg white falls into the bowl below.
', 'Step 4: Transfer the yolk to a skillet.
', 'Step 5: Repeat with remaining eggs.
', 'Step 6: Reserve egg whites for another use.
', 'Step 7: Add sugar, milk, and cream to egg yolks.
', 'Step 8: Whisk thoroughly, breaking egg yolks first, until well combined.
', 'Step 9: Place skillet on the stove over medium or medium-low heat.
', 'Step 10: Cook, stirring constantly with a silicone spoon, until very hot and thick enough to coat the back of the spoon, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 11: An instant-read thermometer should read at least 175 degrees F (79 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Remove from the heat.
', 'Step 13: Set a fine sieve over the bowl of reserved chocolate.
', 'Step 14: Strain the custard sauce into the chocolate and let sit for 2 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Whisk until chocolate has melted and custard sauce is smooth and shiny, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Add vanilla and butter; stir until butter has melted, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 17: Pour warm custard sauce into 6 serving glasses.
', 'Step 18: Tilt each glass and rotate it around so the warm chocolate coats another 1/2 inch of the glass.
', 'Step 19: Cover with plastic and place in the refrigerator until completely chilled, at least 3 to 4 hours.
', 'Step 20: Combine cream and vanilla extract for topping in a metal bowl and whisk until thickened; make sure no peaks form.
', 'Step 21: Spoon cream into the glasses, then tilt and twirl to coat the sides a bit.
', 'Step 22: Garnish with shaved chocolate and serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '561.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '42.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '276.9 mg', 'fatContent': '41.7 g', 'fiberContent': '2.8 g', 'proteinContent': '9.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '24.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '137.8 mg', 'sugarContent': '28.1 g'}

Title: Fabulous Cilantro Pesto
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package farfalle pasta', '1 bunch fresh cilantro', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '½ cup walnuts or pecans', 'salt to taste', '½ cup olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add the pasta, and return water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain well.
', 'Step 4: In an electric food processor or blender, blend cilantro, garlic, vinegar, Parmesan cheese, cayenne pepper, nuts, and salt.
', 'Step 5: Add 1/4 cup of the olive oil, and blend the pesto.
', 'Step 6: Add more olive oil until the pesto reaches your desired consistency.
', 'Step 7: Pour pesto in a small saucepan and warm over low heat, stirring constantly, until pesto begins to simmer.
', 'Step 8: Pour over cooked pasta and toss.
']

Title: Easy Vegetarian Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '9 lasagna noodles', '1 bunch fresh spinach', '1 (8 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 pinch dried basil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 cup pasta sauce', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray a 1 1/2-quart casserole dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook lasagna in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain.
', 'Step 6: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer.
', 'Step 7: Bring water to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Add spinach, cover, and steam until tender, 2 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain spinach.
', 'Step 10: Mix spinach, ricotta cheese, 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese, egg, nutmeg, basil, salt, and black pepper in a bowl until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 11: Spread 1/4 cup pasta sauce on the bottom of the prepared casserole dish; top with 3 lasagna noodles, 1/2 of the ricotta mixture, and 1/4 cup pasta sauce.
', 'Step 12: Repeat layers of 3 more noodles, 1/2 cup ricotta mixture, and 1/4 cup pasta sauce.
', 'Step 13: End with remaining 3 lasagna noodles and 1/4 cup pasta sauce.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese and Parmesan cheese on top.
', 'Step 15: Cover casserole with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Uncover casserole and continue baking until lasagna is bubbling and lightly browned, about 25 more minutes.
', 'Step 18: Let lasagna stand 5 minutes before serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '305 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '36.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '54.8 mg', 'fatContent': '10 g', 'fiberContent': '3.6 g', 'proteinContent': '18.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '442.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.6 g'}

Title: Grandma Maggio's Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 whole head garlic, peeled and chopped', '2 cups sliced fresh mushrooms', '½ cup chopped fresh basil leaves, or to taste', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '¾ cup Merlot wine', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '¼ cup white sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-low heat, and cook and stir the onion and garlic until translucent but not browned, 6 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the mushrooms and basil, and cook and stir until the basil is wilted and the mushrooms are cooked through and have given up their juices, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Pour in the whole peeled tomatoes, and bring the mixture to a boil, stirring and chopping the tomatoes into pieces with a spoon.
', 'Step 4: Pour in the tomato sauce and stir, crushing any large pieces of tomato left, and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 5: Let the sauce simmer until slightly thickened and bubbling, stirring occasionally, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Stir the tomato paste into the sauce, and fill the empty tomato paste can with Merlot wine, stirring to dissolve any remaining tomato paste in the can.
', 'Step 7: Pour the Merlot wine into the sauce, and stir well to combine.
', 'Step 8: Bring the sauce back to a simmer, and stir in the salt, pepper, dried oregano, and sugar.
', 'Step 9: Let the sauce simmer until the seasonings are blended and the sauce is heated through, about 3 more minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '114.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '18 g', 'fatContent': '3.1 g', 'fiberContent': '2.8 g', 'proteinContent': '3.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '934.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '11.6 g'}

Title: Jim's Birthday Pasta Salad
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package dry penne pasta', '1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained', '1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained', '1 pint cherry tomatoes', '1 lemon, zested', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil leaves', '½ cup Italian salad dressing, or as needed', 'salt and pepper to taste']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Place penne pasta in pot, and cook for 10 to 12 minutes, until al dente; drain and cool.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, gently toss the cooked penne, garbanzo beans, artichoke hearts, cherry tomatoes, lemon zest, basil leaves, and Italian salad dressing.
', 'Step 4: Season to taste with salt and pepper.
']

Title: Pesto Polenta Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (18 ounce) package polenta, cut into 1/4 inch thick slices', '½ (24 ounce) jar bottled marinara sauce', '¼ cup pesto', '¼ cup pine nuts', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']

', 'Step 2: Oil an 11x7x2 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Arrange a single layer of polenta in the bottom of the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 4: Spread a thin layer of pesto over the polenta.
', 'Step 5: Spoon half of the sauce over the polenta.
', 'Step 6: Top with another layer of polenta and sauce.
', 'Step 7: Bake, uncovered, for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Turn on the broiler.

Title: Cabbage Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound lean ground beef', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '½ cup grated carrots', '4 ounces mushroom pieces', '1 pound canned tomatoes', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon thyme', '¼ teaspoon nutmeg', '1 head cabbage', '24 ounces low-fat cottage cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon parsley', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon oregano', 'cooking spray', '2 cups grated part-skim mozzarella cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir ground beef, onion, and garlic in the hot skillet until meat is browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 4: Add carrots and mushrooms.
', 'Step 5: Add tomatoes and break up using a fork.
', 'Step 6: Add basil, sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, thyme, and nutmeg.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat and simmer meat sauce for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Immerse cabbage in the boiling water and carefully break off leaves.
', 'Step 10: Cook until leaves are limp, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Drain.
', 'Step 12: Combine cottage cheese, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, parsley, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, and oregano in a bowl and set aside.
', 'Step 13: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Coat a 9x13-inch baking pan with cooking spray and place a layer of cooked cabbage leaves flat in the bottom.
', 'Step 15: Reserve 1/4 cup of meat sauce.
', 'Step 16: Layer 1/2 the remaining sauce on top of the cabbage leaves in the baking pan.
', 'Step 17: Layer 1/2 the cottage cheese mixture followed by 1/2 the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 18: Add a second layer of cabbage leaves, followed by remaining 1/2 of meat sauce, remaining cottage cheese mixture, and mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 19: Sprinkle reserved 1/4 cup meat sauce on top and finish with 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 20: Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Remove from the oven and let sit 15 minutes before slicing.
']

Title: My Best Chicken Piccata
Ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - trimmed and cut in half crosswise', '½ cup butter', '¾ cup dry white wine', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 teaspoon capers', '1 lemon, sliced', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix flour, salt, and black pepper in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Dredge the chicken breast pieces in the seasoned flour to coat; tap off excess flour.
', 'Step 3: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat until hot but not starting to brown.
', 'Step 4: Pan-fry coated chicken breast pieces in the hot butter until golden brown, the juices run clear, and the chicken is no longer pink inside, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Turn the chicken pieces often.
', 'Step 6: Remove chicken from skillet and keep warm.
', 'Step 7: Pour white wine into the skillet and scrape pan to dissolve any browned bits of food on the bottom.
', 'Step 8: Mix in lemon juice, reduce heat to low, and simmer until sauce is slightly thickened, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir often.
', 'Step 10: Stir capers into sauce and place chicken back into skillet, turning to coat with sauce.
', 'Step 11: To serve, transfer chicken to a serving platter, top with sauce, and garnish with lemon slices and fresh parsley.
']

Title: Ali's Amazing Bruschetta

Title: Instant Pot® Pasta with Italian Sausage
Ingredients: ['1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup sliced onion', '1 cup sliced bell peppers, any color', '1 (12 ounce) package Italian-style chicken sausage links, or more to taste, casings removed', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (26 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '3 cups water', '3 cups chopped fresh spinach, or more to taste', '10 ounces penne pasta', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 cup shredded Italian cheese blend']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function.
', 'Step 2: Add oil and allow to heat.
', 'Step 3: Add onion and peppers to hot oil; cook until they begin to get tender, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add sausages and cook, breaking them up with a wooden spoon, until lightly browned, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add garlic and saute for 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add marinara sauce, water, spinach, pasta, basil, and Italian seasoning; mix to combine.
', 'Step 7: Cancel Saute function.
', 'Step 8: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 9: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 5 minutes.
", 'Step 10: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', "Step 11: Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 5 minutes.
", "Step 12: Then release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 13: Unlock and remove the lid.
', 'Step 14: Stir in 1/2 cup shredded Italian cheese until combined.
', 'Step 15: Serve with remaining cheese sprinkled on top.
']

Title: Jan's Jalapeno Popper Pizza
Ingredients: ['8 slices bacon, cut into 1-inch pieces', '¾ cup chopped onion', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 (8 ounce) package reduced-fat cream cheese, cut into cubes', '¼ cup sour cream', '1 prepared 16-inch pizza dough pastry', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, or more to taste', '½ cup shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese', '4 jalapeno peppers, sliced into thin rings', '1 tablespoon dried parsley flakes']

Title: Italian Anisette Cookies

Title: Hearty Italian Meatball Soup

Title: Sicilian Easter Pie
Ingredients: ['½ cup butter, chilled', '⅓ cup superfine sugar', '1 egg yolk', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '3 tablespoons ice water, or as needed', '1 cup uncooked white rice', '2 cups water', '¼ cup raisins', '1 ⅓ cups milk', '1 ½ tablespoons grated orange zest', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 cup ricotta cheese', '3 egg yolks', '⅓ cup white sugar', '⅛ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons orange flower water', '4 egg whites']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a saucepan, bring 2 cups water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add rice and stir.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Place raisins in a small saucepan and cover with boiling water.
', 'Step 6: Cook over low heat or 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Remove from heat, drain and set aside.
', 'Step 8: To Make Dough: In a medium bowl or in a food processor, combine flour and 1/3 cup superfine sugar.
', 'Step 9: Cut in butter or pulse in processor until mixture looks like cornmeal.
', 'Step 10: Mix in 1 egg yolk.
', 'Step 11: Stir in ice water, 1 tablespoon at a time, until mixture holds together when you squeeze it.
', 'Step 12: Wrap with plastic wrap and let rest in refrigerator for at least 2 hours.
', 'Step 13: In a medium saucepan, combine cooked rice, milk, orange zest and 1 tablespoon of sugar.
', 'Step 14: Cook over low heat, stirring frequently, until mixture is creamy and thick.
', 'Step 15: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 16: Whisk 3 egg yolks with 1/3 cup sugar in a large bowl.
', 'Step 17: Gradually add hot rice mixture, about a cup at a time, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 18: Stir in ricotta cheese, cooked raisins and cinnamon.
', 'Step 19: Add vanilla and orange flower water.
', 'Step 20: Let mixture cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 21: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 22: Roll out 3/4 of the pastry dough into an 11-inch circle and line the bottom and sides of a 9-inch springform pan.
', 'Step 23: Cover lightly with plastic wrap and refrigerate.
', 'Step 24: Roll out remaining dough into a 10-inch circle and cut into lattice strips.
', 'Step 25: In a large glass or metal mixing bowl, beat egg whites until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 26: Fold 1/3 of the whites into the batter to lighten it, then quickly fold in remaining whites until no streaks remain.
', 'Step 27: Pour filling into dough-lined pan.
', 'Step 28: Criss-cross the lattice strips over the filling.
', 'Step 29: Seal the lattice strips to the bottom pastry edge.
', 'Step 30: Bake in preheated oven for an hour, or until pastry is golden brown.
', 'Step 31: Cool at room temperature for about 4 hours, then keep refrigerated.
']

Title: Eggplant Rollatini
Ingredients: ['1 eggplant, peeled and cut lengthwise into 1/4 inch slices', '1 egg, beaten', '1 cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup ricotta cheese', '10 slices prosciutto', '1 (14 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 pound angel hair pasta']

['Step 1: Dip the eggplant slices in egg, then coat with bread crumbs.
', 'Step 2: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Fry the eggplant on each side until golden brown.
', 'Step 4: Remove to a paper towel lined plate to drain.
', 'Step 5: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Spread a thin layer of ricotta cheese onto each slice of eggplant.
', 'Step 7: Place a slice of prosciutto onto each one.
', 'Step 8: Roll up tightly, and place seam side down in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 9: Pour spaghetti sauce over the rolls, and top with shredded mozzarella cheese.

', 'Step 11: While the eggplant rolls are baking, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 12: Add the angel hair pasta, and cook for 2 to 3 minutes, until tender.
', 'Step 13: Drain.
', 'Step 14: Serve eggplant rolls and sauce over pasta.

Title: Amazing Italian Lemon Butter Chicken
Ingredients: ['¼ cup white wine', '5 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '5 tablespoons heavy cream', '1 cup butter, chilled', 'salt and pepper to taste', '½ pound dry farfalle (bow tie) pasta', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded to 1/4 inch thickness', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 ounces bacon', '6 ounces mushrooms, sliced', '6 ounces artichoke hearts, drained and halved', '2 teaspoons capers, drained', 'chopped fresh parsley for garnish']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To make the sauce, pour the wine and lemon juice into a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook at a low boil until the liquid is reduced by 1/3.
', 'Step 3: Stir in cream, and simmer until it thickens.
', 'Step 4: Gradually add the butter 1 tablespoon at a time to the sauce, stirring until completely incorporated.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat, and keep warm.
', 'Step 7: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to boil.
', 'Step 8: Add pasta, and cook until al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain, and set aside.
', 'Step 10: To make the chicken, heat oil and 2 tablespoons butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: In a bowl, stir together flour, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 12: Lightly coat chicken with flour mixture.
', 'Step 13: Without crowding, carefully place chicken in hot oil.
', 'Step 14: (If necessary, cook in batches.
', 'Step 15: ) Fry until cooked through and golden brown on both sides.
', 'Step 16: Remove the chicken to paper towels.
', 'Step 17: Stir the bacon, mushrooms, artichokes, and capers into the oil; cook until the mushrooms are soft.
', 'Step 18: Cut the chicken breasts into bite-size strips, and return them to the skillet.
', 'Step 19: Stir half of the lemon butter sauce into the chicken mixture.
', 'Step 20: To serve, place pasta in a large bowl.
', 'Step 21: Stir the chicken mixture into the pasta.
', 'Step 22: Taste, and adjust seasonings.
', 'Step 23: Stir in additional lemon butter sauce as desired.
', 'Step 24: Toss well, and garnish with parsley.
']

Title: Classic Lasagna
Ingredients: ['9 lasagna noodles', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pound ground beef', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 (16 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried thyme', '¼ teaspoon dried basil', '4 (15 ounce) cans tomato sauce', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '3 eggs, beaten', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pound shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add the lasagna noodles and olive oil; cook until al dente, 8 to 10 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 4: Cook the ground beef and sausage in a large pot over medium heat; drain.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the mushrooms, garlic salt, oregano, thyme, basil, and tomato sauce.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper; simmer 30 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, mix together the ricotta cheese, eggs, and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Ladle enough of the meat sauce into a 9x13 inch baking dish to cover the bottom in a thin layer.
', 'Step 9: Form a layer atop the sauce with 3 of the lasagna noodles.
', 'Step 10: Spread about 1/4 of the ricotta cheese mixture over the noodles.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle about 1/3 of the mozzarella cheese over the ricotta cheese mixture and then ladle about 1/3 of the meat sauce over the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 12: Repeat layering twice more, topping with the remaining 1/4 pound of mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 13: Bake in preheated oven 90 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Allow to sit 10 to 15 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Grammy's Overnight Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds ground beef', '1 (30 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '¾ cup water', '1 teaspoon salt', '12 lasagna noodles', '1 (16 ounce) package cottage cheese', '12 ounces grated mozzarella cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

', 'Step 2: Stir in the marinara sauce, water, and salt.

', 'Step 4: Remove sauce from heat.
', 'Step 5: Arrange 6 noodles in a 9x13-inch baking dish, breaking if necessary to fit.
', 'Step 6: Spoon 1/2 of the sauce over noodles.

Title: Chef John's Spaghetti alla Carbonara
Ingredients: ['4 ounces guanciale, cut into 1/4-inch cubes', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '2 eggs', '3 tablespoons grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '3 tablespoons grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '6 ounces spaghetti', '1 cup reserved pasta water', '3 tablespoons grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '3 tablespoons grated Pecorino Romano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook guanciale with olive oil and 1 teaspoon ground black pepper in a Dutch oven over medium-low heat until almost crisp, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 3: Whisk eggs, 3 tablespoons Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, 3 tablespoons Pecorino Romano cheese, and 1 teaspoon ground black pepper in a bowl.
', 'Step 4: Set aside.
', 'Step 5: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain, reserving 1 cup of the pasta water.
', 'Step 8: Pour reserved pasta water and drained spaghetti into the bacon-pepper mixture; stir to combine.
', 'Step 9: Slowly pour egg mixture into the pasta mixture; cook, stirring constantly until the egg mixture forms a thick sauce, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 11: Stir remaining 3 tablespoons Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese and 3 tablespoons Pecorino Romano cheese into the pasta mixture and serve.
']

Title: Tortellini Minestrone Soup
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds Italian sausage', '1 cup chopped onion', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '6 cups low-sodium chicken broth', '1 (16 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, cut into pieces', '2 cups thinly sliced carrots', '1 cup thinly sliced celery', '1 cup ketchup', '¾ cup dry red wine', '1 (9 ounce) package refrigerated cheese tortellini', '2 cups thinly sliced zucchini', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']

['Step 1: Heat a Dutch oven or large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir sausage in the Dutch oven until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 3: Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until onion is tender, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir chicken broth, tomatoes, carrots, celery, ketchup, and red wine into sausage mixture; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until carrots and celery are tender, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add tortellini and zucchini to the soup and cover; simmer until zucchini are tender, 25 to 30 more minutes.
', 'Step 7: Ladle soup into serving bowls and top with Parmesan cheese.

Title: Easy Stuffed Zucchini
Ingredients: ['½ pound ground beef', '1 large zucchini, ends trimmed', '½ cup bread crumbs', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (16 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '½ (6 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat until the meat is browned, breaking the beef up into crumbles as it cooks, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain off excess fat, and transfer the beef into a mixing bowl.
', 'Step 4: Slice the zucchini in half the long way, and use a spoon to scoop out the flesh, leaving a 1/2-inch thick shell all around the zucchini.
', 'Step 5: Chop the scooped-out zucchini flesh, and add to mixing bowl.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the bread crumbs, garlic, spaghetti sauce, black olives, and Parmesan cheese; mix the stuffing well.
', 'Step 7: Lightly stuff both halves of the zucchini with the meat mixture.
', 'Step 8: Place the zucchini halves into a baking dish, and cover tightly with foil.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, remove from oven, and remove the foil.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle 1/2 cup of shredded mozzarella cheese over each zucchini half.
', "Step 11: Move an oven rack to within 6 inches of the oven broiler's heat source, turn on the broiler, and broil the zucchini until the mozzarella cheese is browned and bubbling, about 5 minutes.
"]

Title: Camp David Spaghetti with Italian Sausage
Ingredients: ['2 Italian sausage links, casings removed', '1 pound lean ground beef', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 yellow onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 (14.5 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '¼ cup chopped fresh oregano', '1 bay leaf', '1 (16 ounce) package uncooked spaghetti', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Slice the sausages lengthwise, leaving them attached along one side.
', 'Step 2: Spread them out flat in a large skillet.
', 'Step 3: Cook over medium heat for 15 minutes, turning once, until the sausages are browned and cooked through.
', 'Step 4: Remove from skillet and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Place the ground beef, olive oil, onion, and garlic in the skillet, and cook and stir over medium heat for about 10 minutes, until the onion is translucent and the beef is browned and crumbly.
', 'Step 6: Drain all but 2 tablespoons of fat.
', 'Step 7: Stir in the tomatoes, tomato sauce, salt, pepper, basil, oregano, and bay leaf.
', 'Step 8: Simmer uncovered over low heat for 1 hour, stirring occasionally, until the flavors have blended.
', 'Step 9: Remove the bay leaf.
', 'Step 10: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil, drop in the pasta, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until tender.
', 'Step 12: Drain the pasta, and mix it into the sauce.
', 'Step 13: Place servings of hot pasta with sauce on oven-safe plates, place a cooked, opened sausage over each serving, and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 14: Place plates in the preheated oven for 5 to 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted and begun to brown.
']

Title: Gina's Italian Butter Cookies
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ cups cake flour', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 ¼ teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup unsalted butter, softened', '1 cup white sugar', '½ cup vegetable shortening', '4 ounces almond paste', '2 large eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '¼ teaspoon almond extract']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine cake flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, and salt in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 3: Combine butter, sugar, and shortening in a large bowl; cream with an electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 4: Mix in almond paste until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 5: Add eggs, vanilla extract, lemon juice, and almond extract.
', 'Step 6: Reduce the mixing speed to low and slowly add dry ingredients.
', 'Step 7: Scrape down the bowl once all dry ingredients are added, then mix on medium speed until evenly combined, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 8: Fit a large pastry bag with an 864 or 4S tip and fill bag with batter.
', 'Step 9: Pipe evenly sized cookies onto an ungreased cookie sheet 1 1/2 to 2 inches apart, giving cookies space to puff slightly during baking.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven, in batches if necessary, until bottom edges are slightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
']

Title: Beefy Baked Ravioli
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '½ (25 ounce) package frozen cheese ravioli', '1 (14 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes, drained', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese']

Title: Chicken and Spinach Alfredo Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '3 cups heavy cream', '2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ cup butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ large onion, diced', '4 cloves garlic, sliced', '5 mushrooms, diced', '1 roasted chicken, shredded', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 cup ricotta cheese', '1 bunch fresh spinach, rinsed', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.

', 'Step 4: Drain, and rinse with cold water.

', 'Step 6: Simmer, stirring frequently, until well blended.
', 'Step 7: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.

', 'Step 10: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Lightly coat the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish with enough of the cream sauce mixture to coat.

', 'Step 14: Place the remaining noodles on top, and spread with remaining sauce.

Title: Flounder Mediterranean
Ingredients: ['5 roma (plum) tomatoes', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '½ Spanish onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 pinch Italian seasoning', '24 kalamata olives, pitted and chopped', '¼ cup white wine', '¼ cup capers', '1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice', '6 leaves fresh basil, chopped', '3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pound flounder fillets', '6 leaves fresh basil, torn']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a saucepan of water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Plunge tomatoes into the boiling water and immediately remove to a medium bowl of ice water; drain.
', 'Step 4: Remove and discard skins from tomatoes.
', 'Step 5: Chop tomatoes and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; saute onion until tender, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Stir in tomatoes, garlic and Italian seasoning; cook until tomatoes are tender, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Mix in olives, wine, capers, lemon juice, and 1/2 the basil.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat, blend in Parmesan cheese, and cook until the mixture is reduced to a thick sauce, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Place flounder in a shallow baking dish.
', 'Step 11: Pour sauce over the fillets and top with remaining basil leaves.
', 'Step 12: Bake 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until fish is easily flaked with a fork.
']

Title: Chicken Carbonara
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 (4 ounce) package pancetta bacon, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 ½ cups whipping cream', '1 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '8 large egg yolks', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil', '¼ cup chopped fresh Italian parsley', '4 cups shredded cooked chicken', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large, heavy frying pan over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Add pancetta and garlic; saute until brown and crisp, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove from the heat and cool slightly.
', 'Step 7: Whisk cream, Parmesan, egg yolks, basil, and parsley together in a large bowl until well blended.
', 'Step 8: Stir chicken into the pancetta mixture until combined.
', 'Step 9: Add cooked spaghetti and cream mixture.
', 'Step 10: Toss over medium-low heat until chicken is heated through and sauce forms a thick coating over the spaghetti, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Do not boil or the eggs will scramble.
', 'Step 12: Season with salt and pepper and transfer to a large, wide serving bowl.
']

Title: Chicago-Inspired Italian Beef Sandwich
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds boneless beef chuck, cut into 2-inch pieces', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '6 cloves garlic, sliced', '2 tablespoons white vinegar', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 ½ teaspoons salt, or to taste', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 bay leaf', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste', '3 cups chicken broth, or as needed', '4 ciabatta rolls, sliced in half', '1 cup chopped giardiniera (pickled Italian vegetables)', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Season beef with a pinch of salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 2: Heat vegetable oil in a heavy pot over high heat.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir beef in hot oil until browned, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir garlic, vinegar, oregano, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, thyme, rosemary, 1 teaspoon black pepper, bay leaf, and red pepper flakes into beef.
', 'Step 5: Pour enough chicken broth into beef mixture to cover the meat by 1 inch and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 6: Cover pot with a lid, reduce heat to low, and simmer until meat is fork-tender, 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 7: Transfer meat with a strainer or slotted spoon to a separate pot; pour about 1/4 cup of meat broth into pot.
', 'Step 8: Use a wooden spoon to gently break meat into smaller chunks.
', 'Step 9: Cover pot with a lid or aluminum foil and keep warm.
', 'Step 10: Skim excess grease from top of broth remaining in the first pot; season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 11: Cover pot with a lid or aluminum foil and keep broth warm.
', 'Step 12: Lay halves of a roll out on a work surface and spoon 2 to 3 tablespoons meat broth over each half.
', 'Step 13: Top bottom half of roll with a generous portion of meat and a spoonful of pickled vegetables.
', 'Step 14: Place tops on sandwich.
', 'Step 15: Repeat with remaining buns, broth, meat, and pickled vegetables to make 3 more sandwiches.
', 'Step 16: Spoon hot meat broth into ramekins and top each ramekin with 1/2 teaspoon parsley.
', 'Step 17: Serve sandwiches with hot broth for dipping.
']

Title: Risotto with Truffle and Parmesan
Ingredients: ['1 quart chicken broth', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ onion, minced', '1 ¼ cups Arborio rice', '½ cup white wine', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons white truffle oil', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon milk, or as needed', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, or to taste']

['Step 1: Heat chicken broth in a stockpot over medium-low heat until warmed.

']

Title: How to Make Cheese Sticks
Ingredients: ['½ (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry', '2 teaspoons olive oil (preferably drained from a tin of anchovies)', '1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '¼ cup shredded sharp white Cheddar cheese', '5 tablespoons freshly shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone baking mat.
', 'Step 3: Place a sheet of frozen puff pastry dough onto a floured work surface and allow dough to thaw just until it can be unfolded.
', 'Step 4: Unfold dough into a flat sheet; brush top of puff pastry dough with olive oil.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle white Cheddar cheese and 1/4 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese onto the dough, covering the surface.
', 'Step 7: Top with a piece of plastic wrap; press cheese and seasonings firmly into the dough with your fingers or by laying a sheet pan onto the dough over the plastic and pressing it down.
', 'Step 8: Remove plastic and use a pizza cutter or sharp knife to cut the dough down the seam lines into thirds; cut each third lengthwise into thirds for a total of 9 breadsticks.
', 'Step 9: Pick up a dough strip, place it seasoned side down on the work surface, and twist from both ends 8 or 9 times to make a rolled tube of dough with the seasoned side out.
', 'Step 10: Place breadsticks onto prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle remaining 1 tablespoon Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese over the sticks.
', 'Step 12: Roll the sticks lightly to even up their shapes and pick up and press any dropped cheese onto the surfaces.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes; flip and continue baking until breadsticks are browned and crisp, 10 to 20 more minutes.
', 'Step 14: If you pick up a stick by one end and it droops, bake for several more minutes.
', 'Step 15: Cool on a wire rack before serving.
']

Title: Italian Stuffed Chicken Breast
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups shredded Italian cheese blend', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs', '4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts', '1 egg, well beaten', '1 cup spaghetti sauce', '¼ cup shredded Italian cheese blend, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine 1 1/2 cup Italian cheese blend, garlic, basil, and oregano in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Combine Parmesan cheese and bread crumbs in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 4: Cut one side of each chicken breast through the middle horizontally to within one-half inch of the other side.
', 'Step 5: Open the two sides and spread them out like an open book.
', 'Step 6: Lightly pound chicken to flatten.
', 'Step 7: Fill each chicken breast with Italian cheese blend mixture and close like a book over the filling.
', 'Step 8: Coat the outside of each chicken breast with egg; press bread crumb mixture over egg layer to coat each chicken breast.
', 'Step 9: Arrange chicken breasts in a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 45 minutes.

', 'Step 12: Pour spaghetti sauce over cooked chicken; top with 1/4 cup Italian cheese blend.
', 'Step 13: Bake until sauce is bubbling and cheese is melted, about 5 more minutes.
']

Title: Ricotta Cheese Cookies

Title: World's Best (Now Vegetarian!) Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ cup minced onion', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '8 ounces plant-based hot Italian-style sausage (such as Beyond Meat®), chopped', '6 ounces cooked and crumbled ground meat substitute (such as BOCA)', '1 (15 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '¼ cup water', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, divided', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '¾ teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon salt, divided', '½ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ teaspoon fennel seeds', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '12 lasagna noodles', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '12 ounces mozzarella cheese, sliced', '6 ounces grated Parmesan cheese', 'cooking spray']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a Dutch oven over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onion and garlic; cook, stirring, until tender, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in plant-based sausage, meat substitute crumbles, crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, tomato paste, water, 1 tablespoon parsley, sugar, basil, 1/2 teaspoon salt, Italian seasoning, fennel seeds, and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer, covered, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 5: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Add lasagna noodles; cook 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain and rinse noodles with cold water.
', 'Step 8: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Meanwhile, stir together egg, ricotta, remaining 2 tablespoons parsley, and 1/2 teaspoon salt in a bowl.
', 'Step 10: To assemble lasagna, spread 1/3 of the sauce in a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 11: Arrange 6 noodles lengthwise over sauce.
', 'Step 12: Spread with 1/2 of the ricotta mixture.
', 'Step 13: Top with 1/3 of the mozzarella slices.
', 'Step 14: Spoon 1/3 of the sauce over mozzarella and sprinkle with 1/4 cup Parmesan.
', 'Step 15: Repeat layers and top with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan.
', 'Step 16: Bake, covered with cooking spray-coated foil, for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Remove foil and bake until hot and bubbly, about 25 minutes more.
', 'Step 18: Cool for 15 minutes before slicing into 12 equal servings.
']

Title: Pepperoni Bread
Ingredients: ['1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed', '1 egg, beaten', '4 ounces sliced pepperoni sausage', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 ½ teaspoons Italian seasoning']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Roll frozen bread dough out into a rectangle.
', 'Step 4: Brush dough with beaten egg.
', 'Step 5: Arrange pepperoni, mozzarella cheese and parmesan cheese over the dough.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle on the Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 7: Roll up dough like a jelly roll and pinch seam to seal; place, seam side down, on prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 8: Bake in preheated oven for 40 minutes, or until golden.
']

Title: Gorgonzola Cream Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 cup heavy whipping cream', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '6 ounces dry miniature ravioli', '3 ounces crumbled Gorgonzola cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped Italian flat leaf parsley', '2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '½ apple, diced', '¼ cup chopped toasted walnuts', '1 teaspoon chopped Italian flat leaf parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place a heavy skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Pour cream into skillet, bring to a simmer, and cook cream until it reduces by half, about 8 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 3: Season with salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 4: Bring a pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Pour dried ravioli into boiling water and cook, stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender, 16 to 18 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain pasta, reserving a cup of pasta water.
', 'Step 7: Gently fold cooked ravioli into cream sauce and turn heat to low.
', 'Step 8: Mix in Gorgonzola cheese, stirring gently until melted.
', 'Step 9: If sauce is too thick, thin it with a little pasta cooking water.
', 'Step 10: Stir in 2 tablespoons parsley and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 11: Transfer to a serving bowl and sprinkle with diced apple, walnuts, and 1 teaspoon parsley.
']

Title: Linda's Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound lean ground beef', '1 onion, chopped', '2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '1 (14.5 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '2 cups water', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '2 teaspoons salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '12 ounces cottage cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg', '9 lasagna noodles', '1 pound shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large pot over medium heat, cook beef until brown.
', 'Step 2: Drain off all fat.
', 'Step 3: Add onion and cook until translucent.
', 'Step 4: Add tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, water, oregano, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and sugar.
', 'Step 5: Stir until combined and cook over medium heat until boiling.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low and simmer for 1 hour.
', 'Step 7: While sauce is simmering, blend cottage cheese, Parmesan cheese, and egg until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Set aside.
', 'Step 9: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 11: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Spread 1 cup of sauce in the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 13: Cover sauce with 3 noodles.
', 'Step 14: Cover noodles with 1/3 of the remaining sauce.
', 'Step 15: Top with 1/2 of the mozzarella.
', 'Step 16: Place another layer of noodles and one of sauce over the mozzarella; top that with the cottage cheese mixture.
', 'Step 17: Top with remaining 3 noodles and remaining sauce.
', 'Step 18: Bake in preheated oven 30 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Sprinkle remaining mozzarella on top and bake 15 minutes more, until golden and bubbly.
']

Title: Pesto Pasta Caprese Salad
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups rotini pasta', '3 tablespoons pesto, or to taste', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '¼ teaspoon salt, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon granulated garlic', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ cup halved grape tomatoes', '½ cup small (pearlini) fresh mozzarella balls', '2 leaves fresh basil leaves, finely shredded']

']

Title: Gnocchi with Tomato Sauce and Mozzarella
Ingredients: ['1 ½ tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '½ onion, finely chopped', '1 ½ (14.5 ounce) cans passata (crushed tomatoes)', 'salt to taste', '1 (18 ounce) package potato gnocchi', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (4 ounce) ball fresh mozzarella, cubed', '4 fresh basil leaves']

Title: Italian Cookies I
Ingredients: ['½ cup butter, softened', '½ cup white sugar', '3 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '3 teaspoons baking powder']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease cookie sheets.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Mix in the egg and vanilla.
', 'Step 5: Combine the flour and baking powder; stir into the creamed mixture until blended.
', 'Step 6: Divide dough into walnut sized portions.
', 'Step 7: Roll each piece into a rope and then shape into a loop.

Title: Chef John's Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['½ cup brewed espresso', '3 tablespoons Marsala wine, divided', '2 eggs, separated', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '¾ cup mascarpone cheese', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', '10 ladyfinger cookies, broken in half, or more as needed', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '½ ounce dark chocolate, grated']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir espresso and 2 tablespoons Marsala wine together in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 2: Whisk egg yolks, 2 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon sugar, and 1 tablespoon Marsala wine together in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, until thick, pale yellow, and creamy, 5 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Whisk egg yolk mixture, mascarpone cheese, vanilla extract, and salt together in a bowl until completely smooth.
', 'Step 4: Beat egg whites in a glass or metal bowl until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 5: Lift your beater or whisk straight up: the egg whites will form sharp peaks.
', 'Step 6: Gently stir and fold 1/2 the egg whites into egg yolk mixture; fold in remaining 1/2 egg whites.
', 'Step 7: Place 1 heaping spoonful mascarpone mixture into a single-serving cup or glass.
', 'Step 8: Dip 2 ladyfinger cookie halves briefly in espresso mixture and turn 3 to 4 times to coat.
', 'Step 9: Place cookie halves in the bottom of the glass on top of mascarpone.
', 'Step 10: Fill the glass halfway with mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 11: Dip 5 ladyfinger halves in the espresso mixture and place vertically along the inside of the glass, dipping and placing more ladyfinger halves as necessary to fit the glass.
', 'Step 12: Place 2 dipped ladyfinger halves horizontally on top of the mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 13: Fill glass to the top with mascarpone mixture.
', 'Step 14: Repeat for the second serving glass.
', 'Step 15: Wrap both glasses in plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 8 hours or overnight.
', 'Step 16: Remove plastic wrap and dust tops with cocoa powder and grated chocolate.
']

Title: Pesto Chicken Florentine
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into strips', '2 cups fresh spinach leaves', '1 (4.5 ounce) package dry Alfredo sauce mix', '2 tablespoons pesto', '1 (8 ounce) package dry penne pasta', '1 tablespoon grated Romano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add garlic, saute for 1 minute; then add chicken and cook for 7 to 8 minutes on each side.
', 'Step 3: When chicken is close to being cooked through (no longer pink inside), add spinach and saute all together for 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Meanwhile, prepare Alfredo sauce according to package directions.
', 'Step 5: When finished, stir in 2 tablespoons pesto; set aside.
', 'Step 6: In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente.
', 'Step 7: Rinse under cold water and drain.
', 'Step 8: Add chicken/spinach mixture to pasta, then stir in pesto/Alfredo sauce.
', 'Step 9: Mix well, top with cheese and serve.
']

Title: Eggless Pasta
Ingredients: ['2 cups semolina flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ cup warm water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, mix flour and salt.
', 'Step 2: Add warm water and stir to make a stiff dough.
', 'Step 3: Increase water if dough seems too dry.
', 'Step 4: Pat the dough into a ball and turn out onto a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 5: Knead for 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Cover.
', 'Step 7: Let dough rest for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Roll out dough using rolling pin or pasta machine.
', 'Step 9: Work with a 1/4 of the dough at one time.
', 'Step 10: Keep the rest covered, to prevent from drying out.
', 'Step 11: Roll by hand to 1/16 of an inch thick.
', 'Step 12: By machine, stop at the third to last setting.
', 'Step 13: Cut pasta into desired shapes.
', 'Step 14: Cook fresh noodles in boiling salted water for 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Drain.
']

Title: Baked Polenta with Fresh Tomatoes and Parmesan
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ cups water', '1 cup milk', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 cup quick-cooking polenta', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 fresh basil leaves, chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon butter, chilled and cut into pieces', '2 tomatoes, sliced', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 fresh basil leaves, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease an 8x8 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Place the water, milk, and butter in a saucepan and bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Add the polenta and stir with a wooden spoon until thickened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove from heat and stir in 1 cup Parmesan cheese and 2 chopped basil leaves; season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 6: Transfer the polenta to the prepared baking dish and arrange the remaining chilled pieces of butter over the top.
', 'Step 7: Bake the polenta in the preheated oven until bubbly and beginning to brown, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove from the oven.
', 'Step 9: Decoratively arrange the slices of tomato over the top of the polenta, spread the remaining basil leaves over the tomatoes, and sprinkle with 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese.

Title: Chicken Breast Cutlets with Artichokes and Capers
Ingredients: ['1 cup whole wheat or white flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon white pepper, or to taste', '⅛ teaspoon black pepper, or to taste', '2 pounds chicken breast tenderloins or strips', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 cups chicken broth', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 (12 ounce) jar quartered marinated artichoke hearts, with liquid', '¼ cup capers', '2 tablespoons butter', '¼ cup chopped flat-leaf parsley']

['Step 1: Combine flour, salt, and white and black peppers.
', 'Step 2: Dredge chicken in seasoned flour and shake off excess.
', 'Step 3: Heat canola oil and olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Add chicken breasts and cook until golden brown on both sides, and no longer pink on the inside; set aside.
', 'Step 5: Pour in chicken broth and lemon juice.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a simmer, scraping the bottom of the pan to dissolve the caramelized bits.
', 'Step 7: Add artichoke hearts and capers, return to a simmer, and cook until reduced by half.
', 'Step 8: Whisk butter into sauce until melted.
', 'Step 9: Place cooked chicken back into pan, and simmer in the sauce for a few minutes to reheat.
', 'Step 10: Serve on a platter sprinkled with chopped fresh parsley.

Title: Fresh Tomato Marinara Sauce
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '½ onion, chopped', '8 large tomatoes, peeled and cut into big chunks', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 bay leaf', '½ cup red wine', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1 teaspoon dried marjoram', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon fennel seed', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a stockpot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir onion in hot oil until softened, about 5 minutes; add tomatoes, garlic, and bay leaf.
', 'Step 3: Bring the liquid from the tomatoes to a boil, reduce to medium-low, and simmer mixture until tomatoes are softened, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir red wine, honey, basil, oregano, marjoram, salt, black pepper, fennel seed, and crushed red pepper into the tomato mixture; bring again to a simmer and cook until herbs have flavored the sauce, about 30 minutes more.
', 'Step 5: Stir balsamic vinegar into the sauce.
']

Title: Italian Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['¼ cup olive oil, divided', '1 onion, diced', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '8 chicken thighs', '½ cup dry white wine', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes', '2 teaspoons tomato paste', '¼ teaspoon white sugar, or more to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '½ cup chicken broth, or more as needed', '½ cup black olives, pitted', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon torn basil leaves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook onion, stirring often, until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Transfer to a pot.
', 'Step 3: Combine flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Toss chicken thighs in the flour mixture until evenly coated.
', 'Step 5: Heat remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil in the skillet over medium heat, add chicken thighs, and brown on one side, without turning, for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Turn and cook until browned on the other side, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 7: Transfer browned chicken thighs to the pot.
', 'Step 8: Pour white wine into the skillet; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Stir to loosen all the browned bits of chicken and flavors in the skillet pour into the pot.
', 'Step 10: Add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, and sugar; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: Add as much chicken stock as needed to cover the chicken.
', 'Step 12: Cover pot and simmer over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir in olives, parsley, and basil.
', 'Step 14: Stir to heat through.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '520 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '21 g', 'cholesterolContent': '116.7 mg', 'fatContent': '28.9 g', 'fiberContent': '3.6 g', 'proteinContent': '35.3 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '1083.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '8.5 g'}

Title: Loaded Chicken Carbonara
Ingredients: ['6 slices bacon, chopped', '1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 cloves garlic', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ cup white wine', '1 ½ cups grated Parmesan cheese', '3 large eggs', '1 gallon water', '1 pound spaghetti', '2 cups frozen peas']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Remove bacon from skillet with a slotted spoon and drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
', 'Step 3: Drain fat from skillet, reserving 2 tablespoons of the bacon drippings.
', 'Step 4: Season chicken with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Heat 1 tablespoon bacon drippings in the skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Cook chicken breast halves in the bacon drippings until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 7: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: Transfer to cutting board and tent with foil.
', 'Step 9: Rest chicken for 5 minutes before slicing; set aside.
', 'Step 10: Heat remaining tablespoon bacon drippings in skillet over medium heat until shimmering.
', 'Step 11: Cook and stir garlic and ground black pepper in skillet until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 12: Pour wine into skillet; cook at a simmer until thickened, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 14: Whisk Parmesan cheese and eggs together in a bowl.
', 'Step 15: Slowly stream wine mixture into the Parmesan mixture while whisking continually.
', 'Step 16: Bring a large pot of generously salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 17: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Remove 1/2 cup of the water from the pot for later use.
', 'Step 19: Put the peas in a large colander.
', 'Step 20: Drain the pasta in the colander with the peas.
', 'Step 21: Return drained pasta and peas to the pot.

Title: Torta Rustica
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ cups all-purpose flour', '¾ cup cornmeal', '½ teaspoon salt', '¾ cup butter, diced', '2 eggs', '4 tablespoons cold water', '1 ½ cups ricotta cheese', '4 ounces feta cheese', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg', '¼ cup chopped parsley', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh oregano', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ pound ham slices', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '½ (16 ounce) jar roasted red peppers, drained and patted dry', '1 egg']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix flour, cornmeal, and salt in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Cut in butter with pastry blender until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
', 'Step 3: Beat 2 eggs with 3 tablespoons cold water; stir into flour mixture until dough holds together.
', 'Step 4: Add another tablespoon water if needed.
', 'Step 5: Shape 2/3 of the dough into flattened round; repeat with remaining 1/3.
', 'Step 6: Wrap.
', 'Step 7: Refrigerate at least 30 minutes, or until firm enough to roll.
', 'Step 8: In another bowl, combine ricotta cheese, crumbled feta, Parmesan cheese, 1 egg, parsley, basil, and oregano until well blended.
', 'Step 9: Have an 8 or 9 inch springform pan ready.
', 'Step 10: On a lightly floured surface, roll out the larger portion of dough into a 15 inch diameter circle.
', 'Step 11: Carefully place in ungreased pan; press lightly against bottom and sides.
', 'Step 12: Trim overhanging dough to 1 inch from pan rim.
', 'Step 13: Scatter half of the mozzarella over the bottom of the crust.
', 'Step 14: Next arrange half the ham slices in an even layer.
', 'Step 15: Spread with ricotta cheese mixture, then sprinkle with spinach.
', 'Step 16: Cover with the remaining ham slices.
', 'Step 17: Press down gently to pack layers.
', 'Step 18: Add red peppers in a single layer, and top with the remaining mozzarella.
', 'Step 19: Press down again.
', 'Step 20: Roll out remaining dough to 8 or 9 inch circle.
', 'Step 21: Place over filling to cover.
', 'Step 22: Moisten edges, and seal crusts together.
', 'Step 23: Crimp or flute edges.
', 'Step 24: Crust should not extend above pan rim.
', 'Step 25: Beat remaining egg, and brush over the crust.
', 'Step 26: Cut several small vents in top crust for steam to escape.
', 'Step 27: Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 1 hour, or until crust is deep golden brown and pulls away from sides.
', 'Step 28: Cool in pan on wire rack 45 minutes.
', 'Step 29: Remove pan sides; cool completely.
', 'Step 30: Cut into 12 wedges.
', 'Step 31: Serve at room temperature.
']

Title: Northern Italian Beef Stew
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 pounds lean top round, trimmed and cut into 1-inch cubes', '2 large sweet onions, diced', '2 cups large chunks of celery', '4 large carrots, peeled and cut into large rounds', '1 pound crimini mushrooms, sliced', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '2 cups dry red wine', '4 large tomatoes, chopped', '1 ½ pounds red potatoes (such as Red Bliss), cut into 1-inch chunks', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried marjoram', '½ teaspoon dried sage', '1 quart beef stock', '2 cups tomato sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook beef in batches in hot oil until browned completely, about 5 minutes per batch.
', 'Step 3: Remove browned beef cubes to a plate lined with paper towels, keeping skillet over heat and retaining the beef drippings.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir onion, celery, and carrots in the retained beef drippings until just softened, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir mushrooms and garlic into the onion mixture.
', 'Step 6: Pour red wine into the pan; bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 7: Continue cooking the mixture until the wine evaporates, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir tomatoes into the mixture.
', 'Step 9: Return beef to skillet with potatoes, basil, thyme, marjoram, and sage.
', 'Step 10: Pour beef stock and tomato sauce over the mixture.
', 'Step 11: Bring the liquid to a simmer.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to low and simmer until the beef is very tender and the sauce is thick, 4 to 6 hours.
']

Title: Butternut Squash Risotto
Ingredients: ['2 cups cubed butternut squash', '2 tablespoons butter', '½ onion, minced', '1 cup Arborio rice', '⅓ cup dry white wine', '5 cups hot chicken stock', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place squash cubes into a steamer basket in a saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Add water, cover, and bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Allow to steam until the squash is tender (10 to 15 minutes), then drain, and mash in a bowl with a fork.
', 'Step 4: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Add onion; cook and stir for 2 minutes until the onion begins to soften, then stir in the rice.
', 'Step 6: Continue cooking and stirring until the rice is glossy from the butter, and the onion begins to brown on the edges, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 7: Pour in the white wine; cook, stirring constantly, until it has evaporated.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the mashed squash and 1/3 of the hot chicken stock; reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 9: Cook and stir until the chicken stock has been absorbed by the rice, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add half of the remaining chicken stock, and continue stirring until it has been absorbed.
', 'Step 11: Finally, pour in the remaining stock, and continue stirring until the risotto is creamy.
', 'Step 12: Finish by stirring in the Parmesan cheese, and seasoning to taste with salt and pepper.
']

Title: Mike's Homemade Pizza
Ingredients: ['1 (.25 ounce) envelope active dry yeast', '1 cup lukewarm water', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons shortening', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '½ cup chopped onion', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '6 fluid ounces water', '½ teaspoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '¼ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon dried marjoram', '¼ teaspoon ground cumin', '¼ teaspoon chili powder', '⅛ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until creamy, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, combine flour, salt and shortening.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the yeast mixture.
', 'Step 5: When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface, and knead until smooth and elastic, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Lightly oil a large bowl, place the dough in the bowl, and turn to coat with oil.
', 'Step 7: Cover with a damp cloth, and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Heat oil in a small saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 9: Saute onion until tender.
', 'Step 10: Stir in tomato paste and water.
', 'Step 11: Season with sugar, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, basil, oregano, marjoram, cumin, chili powder and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 12: Simmer 15 to 20 minutes.

Title: Chicken Piccata with Capers
Ingredients: ['4 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '½ cup white wine', '¼ cup fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons capers', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley']

Title: Deep Dish Lasagna
Ingredients: ['12 uncooked lasagna noodles', '1 pound sweet Italian sausage', '⅔ cup chopped onions', '½ tablespoon minced garlic', '⅔ cup chopped fresh parsley, divided', '3 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '2 cups water', '1 ½ teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 ½ teaspoons dried oregano', '1 ½ teaspoons dried basil leaves', '1 pound part-skim ricotta cheese', '1 (10 ounce) package chopped spinach, thawed and squeeze dried', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '3 eggs', '2 teaspoons garlic salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.

', 'Step 4: Add lasagna noodles and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 5: In skillet over medium heat, brown the sausage with the onions, garlic and 1/2 the parsley; drain excess fat.
', 'Step 6: Add tomato paste, tomato sauce, water, Italian seasoning, oregano, and basil; mix well.

', 'Step 10: Begin layering with 4 noodles, 1/2 cheese mix, 1/3 remaining sauce, and 1 cup mozzarella.

', 'Step 15: Let cool 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Italian Lemon Cream Cake
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '1 (16.25 ounce) package white cake mix', '¾ cup milk', '1 tablespoon milk', '2 eggs', '3 ½ tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 ounces cream cheese, softened', "⅔ cup confectioners' sugar, divided, plus more for dusting", '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest', '2 cups heavy whipping cream']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray the bottom of a 10-inch springform pan with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Measure 1 cup cake mix; set aside for crumb topping.
', 'Step 4: Place the remaining cake mix in a large bowl; add 3/4 cup plus 1 tablespoon milk, eggs, and oil.

', 'Step 10: Cool cake to room temperature in the pan.

", "Step 12: Beat cream and remaining 1/3 cup confectioners' sugar together in a separate bowl using an electric mixer until stiff peaks form.
", 'Step 13: Fold cream cheese mixture into whipped cream.
', 'Step 14: Remove cake from springform pan.
', 'Step 15: Cut cake horizontally into 2 layers using a serrated knife; remove top layer.
', 'Step 16: Spread filling onto the bottom cake layer; place top cake over filling.
', 'Step 17: Refrigerate cake for at least 4 hours.
', "Step 18: Dust cake with more confectioners' sugar before serving.
"]

Title: Easy Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients: ['¼ cup whole wheat flour', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon active dry yeast', '1 ¼ teaspoons salt', '¼ teaspoon white sugar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 ½ cups warm water (100 degrees F or 38 degrees C)', 'all-purpose flour, for dusting']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, yeast, salt, sugar, olive oil, and warm water with a spatula until formed into a sticky ball of dough that pulls away from sides of a large bowl, about 3-4 minutes.
', 'Step 2: n Cover the bowl with a light cloth or plastic wrap and let rise in a warm place (80 to 95 degrees F (27 to 35 degrees C)) for 18 hours, until doubled in size.
', 'Step 3: n Preheat the oven to 550 degrees F (280 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Sprinkle a baking sheet with cornmeal.
', 'Step 5: n Turn the dough onto a lightly floured surface and sprinkle with more flour.
', 'Step 6: Form the dough into a rectangle, and cut it into four equal parts.
', 'Step 7: Shape each piece into a ball, stretching and tucking the dough to create a smooth surface, adding more flour if needed.
', 'Step 8: Cover the dough balls with a towel and let rest for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 9: n To shape the dough, sprinkle the surface with flour and lightly pat flat.
', 'Step 10: Use a rolling pin to form a thin disk about 9 inches in diameter.
', 'Step 11: n Transfer the formed crust to the prepared baking sheet and top as desired.
', 'Step 12: Bake on the bottom rack for 4 minutes, move to the middle rack and bake for 5-6 minutes more minutes, until the bottom is crispy and the top is lightly browned.
', 'Step 13: Move to cooling rack to cool slightly before serving.
']

Title: How to Make Farinata
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups garbanzo flour', '2 cups lukewarm water', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '½ teaspoon minced fresh rosemary', '5 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine garbanzo flour and water in a bowl; whisk until batter is smooth.
', 'Step 2: Cover bowl with plastic wrap or a plate and let stand at room temperature for 2 hours.
', 'Step 3: Skim as much foam as possible from top of batter.
', 'Step 4: Whisk salt, rosemary, and 3 tablespoons olive oil into batter.
', 'Step 5: Preheat oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Place a 10-inch cast-iron skillet over high heat and heat until smoking hot.
', 'Step 7: Pour 2 tablespoons olive oil in skillet and swirl to coat bottom of skillet with oil.
', 'Step 8: Continue to heat until oil shimmers and a wisp of smoke rises from oil.
', 'Step 9: Quickly pour batter into hot oil; carefully transfer skillet to preheated oven.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until cake is browned and crusty, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Transfer immediately to a plate, cut into wedges, and serve hot.
', 'Step 12: Garnish with freshly ground black pepper.
']

Title: Spinach and Sun-Dried Tomato Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 cup vegetable broth', '12 dehydrated sun-dried tomatoes', '1 (8 ounce) package uncooked penne pasta', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 bunch fresh spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

', 'Step 7: Place the pine nuts in a skillet over medium heat.

Title: Three-Cheese Broccoli Manicotti
Ingredients: ['2 large heads broccoli', '1 (8 ounce) package manicotti shells', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 cup ricotta cheese', '4 ounces grated provolone cheese', '1 ½ cups grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, divided, or more to taste', '2 large eggs, beaten', '2 teaspoons kosher salt, or to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg', '3 ½ cups prepared marinara sauce', '2 ½ cups water', '6 ounces cooked, crumbled, hot Italian sausage', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped Italian parsley, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a pot of generously salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Meanwhile, separate broccoli stems and florets.
', 'Step 3: Cut florets in half and cut each stem into several pieces lengthwise.
', 'Step 4: Place stems in the boiling water and cook for 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Then add florets and cook until just barely tender, about 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 6: Use a slotted spoon to transfer broccoli to a bowl of cold water, leaving the water boiling on the stove.
', 'Step 7: Let broccoli sit until cool, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Transfer to a colander and let sit until very well drained.
', 'Step 9: Leave the bowl of cold water for the pasta.
', 'Step 10: Meanwhile, add manicotti to the boiling water and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender but slightly undercooked, 6 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Use a slotted spoon to gently transfer manicotti into the bowl of cold water.
', 'Step 12: Chop cooled, drained broccoli into small pieces.
', 'Step 13: Transfer 3 cups chopped broccoli to a mixing bowl and reserve any extra for another use.
', 'Step 14: Add garlic, ricotta, provolone, 1 ¼ cups Parmigiano-Reggiano, eggs, salt, cayenne, pepper, and nutmeg to the broccoli.
', 'Step 15: Mix with a spoon until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 16: Cover and refrigerate until needed.
', 'Step 17: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 18: Bring tomato sauce and water to a simmer over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 19: Ladle ½ inch hot sauce into a 9x13-inch baking dish or lasagna pan.
', 'Step 20: Sprinkle in cooked Italian sausage.
', 'Step 21: Transfer broccoli filling into a pastry bag.
', 'Step 22: Cut off the tip slightly smaller than the opening of the manicotti.
', 'Step 23: Gently pipe stuffing into 12 manicotti, being careful not to overstuff.
', 'Step 24: Place stuffed manicotti in the sauce in the baking dish, angling as necessary to fit.
', 'Step 25: Ladle in just enough sauce to barely cover the manicotti.
', 'Step 26: Sprinkle ¼ cup Parmigiano-Reggiano over top.
', 'Step 27: Bake in the center of the preheated oven until hot and bubbly, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 28: Garnish with parsley and let sit for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 29: Serve two manicotti per bowl, garnished with more Parmigiano-Reggiano.
']
