Title: Asparagus Carbonara
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package spaghetti', '4 slices center-cut bacon, chopped into 1/2-inch slices', '1 ½ cups thin asparagus, cut into 1 1/2-inch lengths', '1 large clove garlic, minced', '½ cup finely grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '3 egg yolks, at room temperature', '½ cup plain fat-free Greek yogurt', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons fat free half-and-half', '¼ cup freshly chopped parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, heat a large skillet over medium-low heat and cook bacon until browned, stirring occasionally, 5 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Transfer bacon to a paper-towel lined plate using a slotted spoon.
', 'Step 5: Remove all but 1 tablespoon bacon fat from the skillet.
', 'Step 6: Add asparagus to the skillet and cook in the bacon fat until asparagus begins to brown, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 8: Transfer asparagus and garlic to the plate with the bacon.
', 'Step 9: Reserve 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese for garnish.
', 'Step 10: Whisk together remaining Parmesan cheese, egg yolks, Greek yogurt, salt, and pepper in a small bowl.
', 'Step 11: Drain spaghetti, setting aside about 3/4 cup of the cooking water, and return spaghetti to the pot.
', 'Step 12: Stir in egg yolk mixture and toss for 1 minute until evenly coated.
', 'Step 13: Return the pot back to low heat and cook, adjusting consistency with reserved cooking water if necessary, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Turn off heat, pour in half-and-half, and stir well.
', 'Step 15: Mix in bacon and asparagus.
', 'Step 16: Garnish with reserved Parmesan cheese and chopped parsley.
', 'Step 17: Serve immediately.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '371.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '47.2 g', 'cholesterolContent': '172.7 mg', 'fatContent': '11 g', 'fiberContent': '3 g', 'proteinContent': '20.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '433.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.1 g'}

Title: Strawberry Goat Cheese Bruschetta
Ingredients: ['½ cup balsamic vinegar', '12 slices Italian bread', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pound strawberries, washed and diced', '2 teaspoons fresh thyme leaves, plus more for serving', '1 cup goat cheese, room temperature', 'salt and freshly ground pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat vinegar in a small skillet over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 2: Simmer until reduced by about half, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 4: Prepare a grill for high heat.
', 'Step 5: Place bread slices on a foil-lined baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.
', 'Step 6: Combine strawberries and thyme in a small bowl and set aside.
', 'Step 7: Grill bread on the preheated grill until browned, about 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 8: Spread goat cheese on toasted bread.
', 'Step 9: Add black pepper, salt, and reduced vinegar to the strawberry mixture.
', 'Step 10: Spoon over the goat cheese topped bruschetta.
', 'Step 11: Garnish with additional thyme.
']

Title: Chicken and Broccoli Pasta
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch pieces', '1 tablespoon chopped onion', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes', '2 cups fresh broccoli florets', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 pinch dried oregano', '18 ounces dry penne pasta', '¼ cup fresh basil leaves, cut into thin strips', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large skillet over medium heat, warm oil and add chicken; cook until slightly brown.
', 'Step 2: Add onion and garlic to cook for about 5 minutes or until garlic is golden and onions are translucent.
', 'Step 3: Add tomatoes, broccoli, salt, pepper and oregano; stir well and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cover and turn down heat to simmer for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until tender; drain and add back into pot.
', 'Step 7: Pour chicken sauce into pot and mix well.
', 'Step 8: Add basil and toss well; top with Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 9: Serve.
']

Title: Italian Herb Bread I
Ingredients: ['2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast', '2 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '¼ cup olive oil', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '½ cup grated Romano cheese', '6 cups bread flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix yeast, warm water, and white sugar together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Set aside for five minutes, or until mixture becomes foamy.
', 'Step 3: Stir olive oil, salt, herbs, garlic powder, onion powder, cheese, and 3 cups flour into the yeast mixture.
', 'Step 4: Gradually mix in the next three cups of flour.
', 'Step 5: Dough will be stiff.
', 'Step 6: Knead dough for 5 to 10 minutes, or until it is smooth and rubbery.
', 'Step 7: Place in an oiled bowl, and turn to cover the surface of the dough with oil.
', 'Step 8: Cover with a damp linen dish towel.
', 'Step 9: Allow to rise for one hour, or until the dough has doubled in size.
', 'Step 10: Punch dough down to release all the air.
', 'Step 11: Shape into two loaves.
', 'Step 12: Place loaves on a greased cookie sheet, or into two greased 9 x 5 inch loaf pans.
', 'Step 13: Allow to rise until doubled in size, about a 30 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 35 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Remove loaves from pan(s), and let cool on wire racks for at least 15 minutes before slicing.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '37 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '1.7 g', 'cholesterolContent': '2.6 mg', 'fatContent': '3 g', 'fiberContent': '0.3 g', 'proteinContent': '1.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.7 g', 'sodiumContent': '320.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.1 g'}

Title: Pepperoni Pizza Casserole
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '1 (8 ounce) package uncooked egg noodles', '1 (16 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce, or as needed', '1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained', '1 (2.5 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced pepperoni, coarsely chopped', '20 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Cook the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat until no longer pink, breaking the meat apart into crumbles as it cooks, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a rolling boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook the egg noodles in the boiling water until cooked through yet slightly firm, about 5 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 5: Mix the noodles with the cooked ground beef, spaghetti sauce, black olives, mushrooms, pepperoni, and 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese in a large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 6: Spoon the mixture into a 9x13-inch baking dish and top with remaining cheese.
', 'Step 7: Cover the dish with foil.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven until the casserole is bubbling, 30 to 45 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '586.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '30.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '133.8 mg', 'fatContent': '33.9 g', 'fiberContent': '2.8 g', 'proteinContent': '38.2 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '14.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '1276.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.5 g'}

Title: Special Italian Easter Pizza
Ingredients: ['½ pound bulk Italian sausage', 'olive oil', '1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed', '½ pound sliced mozzarella cheese', '½ pound sliced cooked ham', '½ pound sliced provolone cheese', '½ pound sliced salami', '½ pound sliced pepperoni', '1 (16 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '8 eggs, beaten', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cook and stir Italian sausage in a skillet over medium heat, breaking the sausage into crumbles as it cooks, until well browned, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain excess grease; set sausage aside.
', 'Step 3: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 4: Oil the bottom and sides of a 10-inch springform pan with olive oil.
', 'Step 5: Cut 1/3 of the dough off the loaf and set aside under a cloth.
', 'Step 6: Form the remaining 2/3 dough into a ball and roll into a 14-inch circle on a floured work surface.
', 'Step 7: Line the springform pan with rolled dough, allowing dough to hang over the edge by 2 inches all around.
', 'Step 8: Layer half the cooked Italian sausage, half the mozzarella cheese, half the ham, half the provolone cheese, half the salami, and half the pepperoni into the pie crust.
', 'Step 9: Spoon and spread half the ricotta cheese over the layers of meat and cheeses.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle half the Parmesan cheese over the ricotta.
', 'Step 11: Pour half the 8 beaten eggs over the layers; continue layering the remaining meats, sliced cheeses, ricotta cheese, and then Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 12: Pour remaining beaten eggs over the last layer of Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 13: Roll out remaining piece of bread dough to a circle about 12 inches in diameter; lay the piece over the pie to form the top crust.
', 'Step 14: Roll and pinch the bottom crust overhang over the top crust to seal in the filling.
', 'Step 15: Beat 1 egg with water in a small bowl; brush the top of the pie with egg wash.
', 'Step 16: Bake pie in the preheated oven until the crust is golden brown and the filling is set, 50 to 60 minutes.
', 'Step 17: A toothpick inserted into the middle of the crust should come out without raw egg.
', 'Step 18: Allow pie to cool in the pan for at least 25 minutes before releasing the spring and removing pie from the pan.
', 'Step 19: Transfer to a serving platter and cut into wedges for serving.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '707.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '28.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '283.5 mg', 'fatContent': '44.6 g', 'fiberContent': '2.1 g', 'proteinContent': '45.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '18.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '2090.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.9 g'}

Title: Old Italian Meat Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 pounds lean ground beef', '1 pound ground pork', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 onions, chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '3 cups red wine', '2 pounds fresh mushrooms, sliced', '¼ teaspoon dried rosemary', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '¼ teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', '3 (29 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large skillet, brown beef and pork over medium heat until no longer pink; set aside.
', 'Step 2: n In a large skillet, warm olive oil over medium heat and saute onions and garlic until tender; add about 1/2 cup of wine; mix well.
', 'Step 3: n Add mushrooms, rosemary, oregano and thyme to skillet and add another 1/2 cup wine; saute until tender.
', 'Step 4: n Add browned meat, tomato sauce and tomato paste to mixture; simmer for 1 hour and add the remaining 2 cups of wine.
', 'Step 5: n Simmer sauce on low for 2 to 3 hours, stirring occasionally; serve.
']

Title: Slow Cooker Vegetarian Minestrone
Ingredients: ['6 cups vegetable broth', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, drained', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 ribs celery, diced', '2 large carrots, diced', '1 cup green beans', '1 small zucchini', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley', '1 ½ teaspoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon salt', '¾ teaspoon dried thyme', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '½ cup elbow macaroni', '4 cups chopped fresh spinach', '¼ cup finely grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine vegetable broth, tomatoes, kidney beans, onion, celery, carrots, green beans, zucchini, garlic, parsley, oregano, salt, thyme, and black pepper in a 6-quart slow cooker.
', 'Step 2: Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 5: Stir spinach and macaroni into minestrone; cook another 15 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Top with Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Penne Pasta with Spinach and Bacon
Ingredients: ['1 (12 ounce) package penne pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '6 slices bacon, chopped', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 bunch fresh spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces']

', 'Step 2: Add the penne pasta, and cook until tender, 8 to 10 minutes.

']

Title: Pasta Sauce with Italian Sausage
Ingredients: ['1 pound Italian sausage links', '½ pound lean ground beef', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 (16 ounce) can canned tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can canned tomato sauce', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 bay leaf']

', 'Step 2: In a large skillet, brown sausage over medium heat for about 10 minutes; remove and set aside.
', 'Step 3: n In a large skillet, heat ground beef, olive oil, garlic and onion over medium heat until meat is nicely browned; drain.
', 'Step 4: n Pour in tomatoes and tomato sauce; mix in salt, ground black pepper, basil, oregano, bay leaf and cooked sausage.
', 'Step 5: Simmer uncovered for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 6: n Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.

', 'Step 8: n Mix cooked sauce with hot pasta and remove bay leaf from sauce before serving.
']

Title: Italian Sausage Spaghetti
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 (6 ounce) sweet Italian sausage links', '¼ cup white wine', '1 (32 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '1 ½ cups water', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '½ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped flat-leaf (Italian) parsley, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Transfer sausage links into the hot pot.
', 'Step 3: Cover with a lid and cook until beautifully browned and just barely cooked through, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: You can increase the heat a little if you like, but make sure the oil does not smoke.
', 'Step 5: Turn off the heat and remove sausages to a plate to cool completely.
', 'Step 6: While the sausages are cooling, add wine to the same pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 7: As it comes up to a simmer, stir the caramelized bits on the bottom of a pan with a spoon or spatula.
', 'Step 8: Simmer until it reduces by about half, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add marinara sauce.
', 'Step 10: Pour water into the jar of pasta sauce, seal, and shake to rinse out the jar.
', 'Step 11: Pour that liquid into the pot and return to a simmer.
', 'Step 12: Reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 13: Slice each fully cooled sausage into 4 pieces.
', 'Step 14: Transfer sausage and any accumulated juices into the simmering sauce.
', 'Step 15: Stir and increase heat to just between low and medium-low.
', 'Step 16: Cook at a gentle, steady simmer, stirring occasionally, for 1 hour.
', 'Step 17: Taste and adjust seasonings.
', 'Step 18: Skim about 1/2 of the fat from the surface, and continue to cook until reduced and thick, about 30 minutes longer.
', 'Step 19: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of generously salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 20: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until almost tender yet firm to the bite, 10 to 11 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Drain spaghetti and transfer it directly into the pot of hot sauce.
', 'Step 22: Mix until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 23: Cover with the lid and let sit for 1 minute so the pasta can absorb some of the sauce.
', 'Step 24: Evenly divide pasta onto 4 plates and top each serving with 4 pieces sausage.
', 'Step 25: Sprinkle with Parmigiano-Reggiano and parsley.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '1335.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '123.3 g', 'cholesterolContent': '119.2 mg', 'fatContent': '64.7 g', 'fiberContent': '9.7 g', 'proteinContent': '58 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '21.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '3324.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '24.6 g'}

', 'Step 2: In a medium bowl, mix marinated artichoke hearts, Romano cheese, red onion and mayonnaise.
', 'Step 3: Top French baguette slices with equal amounts of the artichoke heart mixture.
', 'Step 4: Arrange slices in a single layer on a large baking sheet.

']

Title: Italian Rice Pie I
Ingredients: ['9 eggs', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '2 pounds ricotta cheese', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups heavy whipping cream', '1 cup cooked white rice', '1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained']

', 'Step 2: Add sugar, mixing well.
', 'Step 3: Stir in cheese and vanilla until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 4: Add heavy cream and stir.
', 'Step 5: Fold in cooked rice and crushed pineapple.
', 'Step 6: Pour into a 9 x 13 inch buttered pan.

', 'Step 8: Check by inserting clean knife into center.
', 'Step 9: If the pie is done, knife will come out clean.
', 'Step 10: Top should be golden brown.
', 'Step 11: Refrigerate until thoroughly cooled.

Title: Slow Cooker Zuppa Toscana
Ingredients: ['1 pound bulk pork sausage', '1 large yellow onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '4 large russet potatoes, chopped', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '1 (32 ounce) container chicken broth', '2 cups water, or as needed', '1 cup heavy whipping cream', '1 bunch kale, stems removed and discarded, leaves torn into bite-size pieces', '¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add onion and garlic; saute until onion is translucent, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 5: Place potatoes in a slow cooker (such as Crock Pot®).
', 'Step 6: Add the cooked sausage and onion mixture.
', 'Step 7: Season with salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 8: Pour chicken broth on top.
', 'Step 9: Add up to 2 cups water to cover potatoes fully.
', 'Step 10: Stir soup gently.
', 'Step 11: Cover and cook on Low until potatoes are fork-tender, 5 to 6 hours.
', 'Step 12: Pour heavy cream into the soup.
', 'Step 13: Stir in kale to combine.
', 'Step 14: Cover and cook on High until flavors are incorporated, about 30 minutes more.
', 'Step 15: Garnish with Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Chef John's No-Knead Ciabatta
Ingredients: ['3 ½ cups white bread flour', '½ cup whole wheat bread flour', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '¼ teaspoon active dry yeast', '2 cups water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 tablespoons cornmeal']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place white and wheat flour in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Add salt, yeast, and water.
', 'Step 3: Mix until a wet sticky dough comes together, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Scrape down sides of bowl.
', 'Step 5: Cover with foil.
', 'Step 6: Allow dough to rise for 18 hours at room temperature.
', 'Step 7: It should not be too warm.
', 'Step 8: Punch dough down with a spatula and fold it over a few times.
', 'Step 9: Lightly grease a heavy-rimmed baking sheet with olive oil.
', 'Step 10: Sprinkle generously with cornmeal.
', 'Step 11: Lightly spray a work surface with water.
', 'Step 12: Place a long sheet of plastic wrap on the damp surface to hold it in place.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle plastic wrap with flour.
', 'Step 14: Scrape the dough onto the floured surface.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle flour on top of the dough.
', 'Step 16: Gently stretch and pull dough into a long, flat rectangular shape, 12 to 15 inches long.
', 'Step 17: Bring plastic sheet to edge of prepared pan and flip the dough into the prepared pan.
', 'Step 18: Reshape the dough, if necessary.
', 'Step 19: Dust with flour.
', 'Step 20: Cover with a light dry towel.
', 'Step 21: Let rise about 2 hours.
', 'Step 22: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 23: Bake dough in preheated oven until loaf is nicely browned, 35 to 45 minutes.
']

Title: Italian Chicken Skillet
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cubed', '2 cloves garlic, chopped, or to taste', '½ cup red cooking wine', '1 (28 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes', '8 ounces small seashell pasta', '5 ounces fresh spinach, chopped', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']

', 'Step 6: Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese evenly over the skillet, and simmer until the cheese has melted and the pasta is bubbling, about 5 minutes.
']

Title: Italian Turkey Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds ground lean turkey', '¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '⅔ cup dry Italian bread crumbs', '⅓ cup chopped fresh parsley', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon dry mustard', '¼ cup tomato sauce', '¼ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon crushed red pepper', '3 each garlic cloves, minced', '2 teaspoons Melt® Organic Buttery Spread, softened']

Title: Pizzelles III
Ingredients: ['3 eggs', '¾ cup white sugar', '½ cup butter, melted', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, beat eggs and sugar until thick.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the melted butter and vanilla.
', 'Step 3: Sift together the flour and baking powder, and blend into the batter until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Heat the pizzelle iron, and brush with oil.
', 'Step 5: Drop about one tablespoon of batter onto each circle on the iron.
', 'Step 6: You may need to experiment with the amount of batter and baking time depending on the iron.
', 'Step 7: Bake for 20 to 45 seconds, or until steam is no longer coming out of the iron.
', 'Step 8: Carefully remove cookies from the iron.
', 'Step 9: Cool completely before storing in an airtight container.
', 'Step 10: For chocolate pizzelles, add 1/4 cup cocoa sifted together with flour and baking powder, 1/4 cup more sugar and 1/4 teaspoon more baking powder.
', 'Step 11: I find that for the chocolate mixture, the iron must be well oiled to start and then brush on more as needed.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '102 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '13.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '33.4 mg', 'fatContent': '4.5 g', 'fiberContent': '0.2 g', 'proteinContent': '1.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '76.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.4 g'}

Title: Chef John's Shrimp Fra Diavolo
Ingredients: ['1 pound extra large shrimp (16-20), peeled and deveined, tail left on', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or more as needed', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 pinch Aleppo pepper flakes, or to taste', '½ yellow onion, sliced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 cup white wine', '1 ½ cups canned crushed tomatoes (such as San Marzano)', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', '2 tablespoons thinly sliced fresh basil leaves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine shrimp, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt, and Aleppo pepper flakes in a bowl; toss to coat shrimp completely in oil and spices.
', 'Step 2: Heat a large skillet over high heat until very hot.
', 'Step 3: Cook shrimp in a single layer until browned on one side, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Turn shrimp and cook until browned on the other side, about 1 minute more.
', 'Step 5: Transfer shrimp to a bowl.
', 'Step 6: Heat the same skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir onion with a pinch of salt in hot skillet until onions are slightly golden and just becoming translucent; 2 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Add garlic and oregano to onion; cook and stir until fragrant, 15 to 30 seconds.
', 'Step 9: Pour white wine into onions and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off of the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon; add crushed tomatoes and lower heat to medium-low.
', 'Step 10: Cook and stir until tomato mixture thickens and flavors blend, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Return shrimp to skillet along with any accumulated juices in the bowl.
', 'Step 12: Cook until shrimp are reheated, 2 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Stir parsley and basil into sauce and season with salt, red pepper flakes, and Aleppo pepper flakes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '247.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '12.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '172.6 mg', 'fatContent': '8.2 g', 'fiberContent': '2.7 g', 'proteinContent': '20.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '1.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '906.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '2 g'}

Title: Baked Orange Roughy Italian-Style
Ingredients: ['¼ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons grated Romano cheese', '¼ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 pound orange roughy fillets', '¼ cup butter, melted', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Coat a medium baking dish with non-stick cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: In a shallow bowl, mix bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, Romano cheese, garlic powder, and salt.
', 'Step 4: Brush both sides of orange roughy fillets with butter, and dredge in the bread crumb mixture.
', 'Step 5: Arrange fillets in a single layer in the prepared baking dish, and sprinkle with parsley.
', 'Step 6: Bake in preheated oven 10 to 15 minutes, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '241.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '5.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '104.7 mg', 'fatContent': '14.4 g', 'fiberContent': '0.3 g', 'proteinContent': '21.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '8.4 g', 'sodiumContent': '645 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.4 g'}

Title: Stracciatella Soup
Ingredients: ['6 cups chicken broth', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons semolina flour', '3 large eggs', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '½ ounce grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '½ ounce grated pecorino Romano cheese', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pinch red pepper flakes']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring broth to a simmer in a pot over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Taste broth and adjust salt and pepper as needed.
', 'Step 3: Whisk eggs, parsley, semolina flour, grated Parmigiano Reggiano and pecorino Romano cheeses, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, and nutmeg together in a bowl until well blended.
', 'Step 4: While stirring the simmering broth, slowly pour egg mixture into the broth.
', 'Step 5: Bring mixture back up to a simmer.
', 'Step 6: The liquid will be slightly cloudy initially and clear as broth heats.
', 'Step 7: Serve in bowls; garnish with a drizzle of olive oil and a pinch of red pepper flakes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '313.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '12.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '307.6 mg', 'fatContent': '20.1 g', 'fiberContent': '0.8 g', 'proteinContent': '19 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '3258.5 mg', 'sugarContent': '4.1 g'}

Title: Lighter Chicken Fettuccine Alfredo
Ingredients: ['2 large boneless skinless chicken breasts', '2 cups low-sodium chicken broth', '4 cloves garlic, minced', 'ground black pepper to taste', '2 cups heavy cream', '2 egg yolks', 'salt to taste', '1 pound fettuccine', '1 sprig chopped fresh parsley', '2 cups freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine chicken breasts and chicken broth in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Bring to a boil, cover, and reduce heat to low; simmer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Turn breasts, cover, and simmer another 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove from heat and let sit with the cover on for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove chicken breasts from the broth and set aside to cool, reserving the broth in the saucepan.
', 'Step 6: Once the chicken is cool enough to handle, cut into bite-size slices.
', 'Step 7: Return the chicken broth to medium heat and cook until reduced to 1 cup.
', 'Step 8: Stir garlic, black pepper, and heavy cream into the reduced broth; bring to a simmer and remove from heat.
', 'Step 9: Whisk egg yolks in a bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 10: Beat 1 tablespoon of the warm cream mixture into the eggs until thoroughly incorporated; repeat until about 1/2 cup of the warm cream mixture is used.
', 'Step 11: Whisk the warm cream and egg mixture back into the saucepan with the remaining cream mixture.
', 'Step 12: Cook over medium-low heat, whisking constantly, until the mixture almost comes to a simmer and thickens, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
', 'Step 14: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 15: Cook fettuccine in boiling water, stirring occasionally, until nearly cooked through, about 7 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Drain.
', 'Step 17: Stir parsley, 1 cup of Parmigiano-Reggiano, and cream mixture into the pasta.
', 'Step 18: Remove from heat, cover, and let sit for a few minutes until thick.
', 'Step 19: Fold chicken and 1 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano into the pasta mixture to serve.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '758.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '59.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '239.4 mg', 'fatContent': '41.8 g', 'fiberContent': '2.8 g', 'proteinContent': '37.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '24.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '505.2 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.9 g'}

Title: Easy Meatballs
Ingredients: ['2 eggs', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh basil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '2 pounds ground beef', '½ cup panko bread crumbs']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Mix eggs, Italian seasoning, basil, salt, pepper, and garlic powder together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 3: Add beef and panko bread crumbs and mix thoroughly.
', 'Step 4: Shape mixture into about forty 1 1/2-inch balls, a little smaller than golf balls, using a teaspoon.
', 'Step 5: Place on ungreased, rimmed baking sheets.
', 'Step 6: Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the centers, turning halfway through cooking time, 10 to 15 minutes total.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '245.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '5.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '117.5 mg', 'fatContent': '15.3 g', 'fiberContent': '0.6 g', 'proteinContent': '21.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '5.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '406.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.2 g'}

Title: Mom's Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour for coating', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 (4 pound) chicken, cut into pieces', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ cup white wine', '2 cups fresh mushrooms, quartered', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine the flour, salt and pepper in a plastic bag.
', 'Step 2: Shake the chicken pieces in flour until coated.
', 'Step 3: Heat the oil in a large skillet (one that has a cover/lid).
', 'Step 4: Fry the chicken pieces until they are browned on both sides.
', 'Step 5: Remove from skillet.
', 'Step 6: Add the onion, garlic and bell pepper to the skillet and saute until the onion is slightly browned.
', 'Step 7: Return the chicken to the skillet and add the tomatoes, oregano and wine.
', 'Step 8: Cover and simmer for 30 minutes over medium low heat.
', 'Step 9: Add the mushrooms and salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 10: Simmer for 10 more minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '670.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '28.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '170.3 mg', 'fatContent': '38.1 g', 'fiberContent': '2 g', 'proteinContent': '46.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.3 g', 'sodiumContent': '422.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '2.8 g'}

Title: Easy Homemade Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '1 egg', '½ cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '4 tablespoons garlic powder', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 (28 ounce) jar marinara sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine beef and egg in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Add bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, and Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 3: Mix together, but do not overmix, as it will get tough.
', 'Step 4: Shape into 1- to 2-inch balls.
', 'Step 5: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Cook meatballs in the hot skillet until browned and no longer pink in the centers, 3 to 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, heat marinara sauce in a pot over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 8: Add cooked meatballs to sauce and let simmer for added flavor, about 15 minutes.
']

Title: Tasty Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['1 pound extra-lean ground beef', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons salt', '3 teaspoons pepper', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '4 teaspoons dried thyme', '2 teaspoons dried basil leaves', '2 teaspoons dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried marjoram', '1 teaspoon crushed bay leaf']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place ground beef in a non-stick wok, or large deep skillet.
', 'Step 2: Cook over medium heat until evenly brown.
', 'Step 3: Drain excess fat.
', 'Step 4: Add onion, and cook until soft and translucent.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Stir in garlic, tomato paste, tomato sauce and diced tomatoes.
', 'Step 7: Season with thyme, basil, rosemary, marjoram and bay leaf.
', 'Step 8: Cover, and simmer on low heat for 30 minutes.
']

Title: Bucatini Cacio e Pepe (Roman Sheep Herder's Pasta)
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon salt', '1 pound bucatini (dry)', '2 cups finely grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '1 ½ tablespoons freshly ground black pepper, or more to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and add salt.
', 'Step 2: Cook bucatini in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Place grated Pecorino Romano cheese into a large glass bowl and mix with a fork to make sure the cheese contains no lumps.
', 'Step 4: Once the bucatini are al dente, lift them out with a spaghetti fork or tongs and put them directly into the bowl with the cheese.
', 'Step 5: Do not allow the water to drain too much.
', 'Step 6: Add one ladle of pasta water to the bowl.
', 'Step 7: Stir the bucatini around until a cream has formed.
', 'Step 8: Add more pasta water, little by little, until a thick cream has formed.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle freshly ground pepper over the pasta.
', 'Step 10: Toss and serve immediately.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '438.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '59 g', 'cholesterolContent': '41.3 mg', 'fatContent': '11.9 g', 'fiberContent': '2.2 g', 'proteinContent': '22.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7 g', 'sodiumContent': '869.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.3 g'}

Title: Classic Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['6 egg yolks', '1 ¼ cups white sugar', '1 ¼ cups mascarpone cheese', '1 ¾ cups heavy whipping cream', '2 (12 ounce) packages ladyfingers', '⅓ cup coffee flavored liqueur', '1 teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder, for dusting', '1 (1 ounce) square semisweet chocolate']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine egg yolks and sugar in the top of a double boiler, over boiling water.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to low, and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat and whip yolks until thick and lemon colored.
', 'Step 4: Add mascarpone to whipped yolks.
', 'Step 5: Beat until combined.
', 'Step 6: In a separate bowl, whip cream to stiff peaks.
', 'Step 7: Gently fold into yolk mixture and set aside.
', 'Step 8: Split the lady fingers in half, and line the bottom and sides of a large glass bowl.
', 'Step 9: Brush with coffee liqueur.
', 'Step 10: Spoon half of the cream filling over the lady fingers.
', 'Step 11: Repeat ladyfingers, coffee liqueur and filling layers.
', 'Step 12: Garnish with cocoa and chocolate curls.
', 'Step 13: Refrigerate several hours or overnight.
', 'Step 14: To make the chocolate curls, use a vegetable peeler and run it down the edge of the chocolate bar.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '568.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '59.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '302.9 mg', 'fatContent': '31.8 g', 'fiberContent': '0.8 g', 'proteinContent': '9.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '17 g', 'sodiumContent': '112.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '24.7 g'}

Title: Ricotta Gnocchi
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '2 eggs', '½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 cup all-purpose flour, or as needed', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1 (15.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 dash crushed red pepper flakes', '6 basil leaves, finely shredded', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '8 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, cut into small chunks']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Stir together the ricotta cheese, eggs, Parmesan Cheese, salt, pepper, and garlic powder in a large bowl until evenly combined.
', 'Step 2: Mix in 1 cup of flour.
', 'Step 3: Add additional flour if needed to form a soft dough.
', 'Step 4: Divide the dough into 3 or 4 pieces, and roll into 1/2-inch-thick ropes on a floured surface.
', 'Step 5: Cut each rope into 1-inch pieces, and place on a lightly floured baking sheet.
', 'Step 6: Place in the refrigerator until ready to use.
', 'Step 7: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Stir in garlic, and cook until softened and fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 9: Pour in diced tomatoes and red pepper flakes; bring to a simmer over medium-high heat, and cook for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir in shredded basil and season to taste with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 11: While sauce is simmering, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 12: Boil the gnocchi until they float to the surface, 1 to 2 minutes, then drain.
', 'Step 13: To assemble the dish, stir the cubed mozzarella cheese into the sauce and allow the heat of the sauce to soften, but not melt the cheese.
', 'Step 14: Place gnocchi into a serving bowl, and spoon sauce overtop.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '442 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '27.1 g', 'cholesterolContent': '131.1 mg', 'fatContent': '26 g', 'fiberContent': '1.7 g', 'proteinContent': '22.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '11.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '905.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '3.8 g'}

Title: Broccoli Garlic Angel Hair Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds broccoli', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¼ cup butter', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '3 cups chicken stock', 'salt to taste', '1 pound angel hair pasta', '½ cup freshly shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, plus a little more for garnish', '1 pinch red pepper flakes for garnish, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Hold a sharp knife at a 45-degree angle and cut the florets from the broccoli stems into a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Chop remaining stems into small pieces and transfer stems to a separate bowl.
', 'Step 3: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil with butter in a skillet over medium heat and cook garlic in the hot oil-butter mixture, stirring often, until garlic is soft but not browned.
', 'Step 4: Sprinkle in 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes and salt.
', 'Step 5: Pour chicken stock into skillet and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 6: Stir broccoli stems into the stock mixture and simmer until tender, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add a little water or stock if mixture starts to dry out.
', 'Step 8: Stir broccoli florets into skillet and cook broccoli sauce until florets are bright green and slightly tender, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and stir in angel hair pasta.
', 'Step 10: Cook, stirring occasionally, until pasta strands are almost tender, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Drain and transfer to a large pot.
', 'Step 12: Pour broccoli sauce over pasta, stir with a wooden spoon, and mix in 1/2 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
', 'Step 13: Cover pot with a lid and let stand until pasta absorbs excess liquid and finishes cooking, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Serve in bowls and sprinkle each serving with a dusting of Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese and a pinch of red pepper flakes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '598.9 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '76.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '38.3 mg', 'fatContent': '25.3 g', 'fiberContent': '8.8 g', 'proteinContent': '21.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '1053.1 mg', 'sugarContent': '5.5 g'}

Title: Baked Ziti IV
Ingredients: ['1 pound dry ziti pasta', '1 ½ tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, sliced', '1 teaspoon minced fresh rosemary', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '½ pound ground beef', '½ pound ground pork sausage', '1 ½ (26 ounce) jars spaghetti sauce', 'salt to taste', '1 (6 ounce) package provolone cheese, sliced', '¾ cup sour cream', '¾ cup cottage cheese', '1 (6 ounce) package mozzarella cheese, shredded', '2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook pasta in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, heat olive oil in large, heavy skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook onion in oil until tender.
', 'Step 5: Stir in rosemary and garlic.
', 'Step 6: Transfer to a small bowl.
', 'Step 7: Place ground beef and sausage in the skillet.
', 'Step 8: Cook over medium-high heat until evenly brown.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the onion mixture and the spaghetti sauce.
', 'Step 10: Season with salt.
', 'Step 11: Reduce heat to low, and simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 14: In the prepared dish, layer 1/2 of the cooked pasta, provolone cheese, sour cream, cottage cheese, and a little less than 1/2 of the meat mixture.
', 'Step 15: Then layer the rest of the pasta, mozzarella cheese, remaining meat mixture, and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 16: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 to 30 minutes, or until heated through and cheeses are melted.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '488.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '43.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '54.9 mg', 'fatContent': '24.5 g', 'fiberContent': '3.8 g', 'proteinContent': '22.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '801.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '9.9 g'}

Title: Bread Machine Thin Crust Pizza Dough
Ingredients: ['¾ cup warm water - 100 to 110 degrees F (40 to 45 degrees C)', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon active dry yeast', '2 teaspoons olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Pour the warm water into the pan of the bread machine, and add the flour on top of the water.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle with salt and sugar, and top with the yeast.
', 'Step 3: Set the machine on the dough setting, and push the start button.
', 'Step 4: When the machine signals that the dough is finished, transfer to a well-floured work surface.
', 'Step 5: n Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: n Roll or stretch the dough out into thin crust about 14 inches across.
', 'Step 7: Leave dough thick at the edge.
', 'Step 8: Place the dough onto a 14-inch pizza baking sheet, and brush the dough with the olive oil.
', 'Step 9: n Bake in preheated oven for 5 minutes before removing to top with desired ingredients for final baking.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '126.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '24.2 g', 'fatContent': '1.5 g', 'fiberContent': '0.9 g', 'proteinContent': '3.4 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '146.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.2 g'}

Title: Pesto Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients: ['2 slices Italian bread', '1 tablespoon softened butter, divided', '1 tablespoon prepared pesto sauce, divided', '1 slice provolone cheese', '2 slices tomato', '1 slice American cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Spread one side of a slice of bread with butter, and place it, buttered side down, into a nonstick skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Spread the top of the bread slice in the skillet with half the pesto sauce, and place a slice of provolone cheese, the tomato slices, and the slice of American cheese onto the pesto.
', 'Step 3: Spread remaining pesto sauce on one side of the second slice of bread, and place the bread slice, pesto side down, onto the sandwich.
', 'Step 4: Butter the top side of the sandwich.
', 'Step 5: Gently fry the sandwich, flipping once, until both sides of the bread are golden brown and the cheese has melted, about 5 minutes per side.
']

Title: Rigatoni alla Genovese
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '6 ounces pancetta or salt pork, diced', '2 ½ pounds beef chuck', '2 teaspoons kosher salt', '½ cup diced celery', '½ cup diced carrot', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 bay leaf', '⅔ cup white wine', '4 pounds yellow onions, sliced', '2 pounds red onions, sliced', 'salt to taste', '2 (16 ounce) boxes uncooked rigatoni', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh marjoram leaves', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook pancetta until most of fat is rendered out, about 6 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove cooked pancetta with a slotted spoon and save.
', 'Step 4: Raise heat to high and transfer meat to the pot.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt.
', 'Step 6: Cook and stir until liquid releases from beef and begins to evaporate, and meat browns, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to medium-high.
', 'Step 8: Add celery, carrots, reserved cooked pancetta, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Cook and stir about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Add a heaping tablespoon of tomato paste, bay leaf, and white wine.
', 'Step 11: Cook and stir, scraping up the brownings from the bottom of the pan, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Add sliced onions.
', 'Step 13: Reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 14: Cover pot and cook 30 minutes without stirring.
', 'Step 15: After 30 minutes, stir onions and meat until well mixed.
', 'Step 16: Cover again, and cook another 30 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Stir.
', 'Step 18: Reduce heat to low and cook uncovered 8 to 10 hours, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 19: Skim off fat as mixture cooks.
', 'Step 20: If sauce seems to reduce too much, add water or broth as needed to maintain a sauce-like consistency.
', 'Step 21: Cook until beef and onions seem to melt into each other.
', 'Step 22: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 23: Cook rigatoni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until just barely al dente, 10 to 12 minutes.
', 'Step 24: Drain.
', 'Step 25: Add rigatoni to the sauce and cook until heated through.
', 'Step 26: Serve topped with a pinch of marjoram and freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
']

', 'Step 2: Add the olive oil and the salt.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the flour until well blended.

', 'Step 5: n Pat dough into pan or on to a pizza stone using fingers dipped in olive oil.

Title: Mama D's Italian Bread
Ingredients: ['3 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon active dry yeast', '1 tablespoon salt', '7 cups all-purpose flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Add the sugar and yeast to the warm water and let proof.
', 'Step 2: Stir in 4 cups of flour and beat until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Cover and let rest for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Beat in the salt and then add enough remaining flour to make a stiff dough.
', "Step 5: Knead until as soft and smooth as a bambino's behind.
", 'Step 6: Turn in a greased bowl, cover, and let rise until doubled in size.
', 'Step 7: (I put it in the oven with the light on—perfect rising temperature.
', 'Step 8: ) Once doubled, punch down and divide into three.
', 'Step 9: Place back in the bowl, cover, and let rise.
', 'Step 10: Once doubled again, punch down and form into three fat "footballs".
', 'Step 11: Grease heavy cookie sheets and sprinkle with corn meal.
', 'Step 12: Place the bread on the sheets, cover with a towel, and let rise.
', 'Step 13: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Mist loaves with water and place in the preheated oven.
', 'Step 15: Bake until loaves are golden brown and sound hollow when tapped on the bottom, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Mist loaves with water and turn occasionally while they bake.
']

Title: Rigatoni al Segreto (Rigatoni with Secret Sauce)
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup diced onion', '1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste', '2 cloves garlic, crushed (or more to taste)', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '1 (28 ounce) can San Marzano (Italian) tomatoes, blended smooth', '½ cup water (to rinse out can of tomatoes)', '1 (8 ounce) package uncooked rigatoni pasta', '½ cup fresh basil leaves, thinly sliced', '4 tablespoons cold butter, cubed', '1 cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, plus more for serving']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onions, salt.
', 'Step 3: Cook until no longer white and starting to turn translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in garlic; cook about 1 minute.
', 'Step 5: Add chili flakes and blended tomato sauce.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a simmer; adjust heat to medium to medium-low.
', 'Step 7: Simmer gently, stirring occasionally, for 45 to 60 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 9: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Cook rigatoni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes (5 minutes from doneness).
', 'Step 11: Add about 2/3 of the basil to the sauce.
', 'Step 12: Stir in butter.
', 'Step 13: When butter melts, add cheese in 3 increments.
', 'Step 14: Drain pasta; transfer to sauce.
', 'Step 15: Stir until rigatoni are evenly coated with sauce.
', 'Step 16: Serve sprinkled with the remaining basil and a dusting of grated cheese.
']

Title: Air Fryer Arancini
Ingredients: ['3 eggs, divided', '2 ½ cups cooked rice', '⅔ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '⅓ cup butter, melted', '1/2 teaspoon Highlands Italian cheese sprinkle (optional)', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, cubed', '1 cup panko bread crumbs', '½ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper', 'nonstick cooking spray']

['Step 1: Beat 2 eggs lightly in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Stir in rice, Parmesan cheese, butter, cheese sprinkle, 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper; mix to combine.
', 'Step 3: Cover and refrigerate mixture for 20 minutes.
', "Step 4: Preheat an air fryer to 370 degrees F (187 degrees C) according to manual's instructions.
", 'Step 5: Roll mixture into 1 1/2-inch balls.
', 'Step 6: Press a mozzarella cube into the center of each ball and reshape.
', 'Step 7: Combine panko breadcrumbs, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper in a shallow dish.
', 'Step 8: Beat remaining egg lightly in a second bowl.
', 'Step 9: Dip each rice ball first into egg, then roll in panko mixture.
', 'Step 10: Place rice balls in air fryer basket and spray with cooking spray.
', 'Step 11: Cook in the preheated air fryer for 6 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Increase temperature to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) and air fry for 3 more minutes.
']

', 'Step 2: In a large bowl, combine the roma tomatoes, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, vinegar, basil, salt, and pepper.

Title: Branzino Mediterranean
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 red onion, chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 whole Branzino (sea bass) fish, cleaned', '2 wedges fresh lemon', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '½ cup white wine', '¼ cup lemon juice', '1 tablespoon fresh oregano leaves', '¼ cup chopped Italian flat-leaf parsley', '2 lemon wedges']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Drizzle 1 tablespoon olive oil into a large baking pan; add onion and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Place the 2 cleaned fish into the baking pan and stuff each cavity with 1 lemon wedge, 1 rosemary sprig, and some of the red onion.
', 'Step 4: Pour white wine and lemon juice over each fish and sprinkle with oregano.
', 'Step 5: Drizzle the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil over the 2 fish.
', 'Step 6: Bake in the preheated oven until fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Gently slide a spatula between the bones to separate fish; remove all the bones.
', 'Step 8: Serve fish on a platter and garnish with parsley and lemon wedges.
']

Title: Italian Meatball Sandwich Casserole
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup chopped green onions', '¼ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 pound ground beef', '1 (1 pound) loaf Italian bread, cut into 1-inch cubes', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '½ cup mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '3 cups spaghetti sauce', '1 cup water', '2 cloves garlic, minced']
Cooking Instructions:

', 'Step 2: Mix together onions, bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese and ground beef.
', 'Step 3: Roll into 1 inch diameter balls, and place in a baking pan.
', 'Step 4: Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until beef is no longer pink.
', 'Step 5: Reduce the oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Arrange the bread cubes in a single layer in an ungreased 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 7: Mix together the cream cheese, mayonnaise, Italian seasoning and black pepper until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Spread this mixture over each bread cube.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle with 1/2 cup of the grated mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 10: In a large bowl, mix together spaghetti sauce, water, and garlic.
', 'Step 11: Gently stir in meatballs.
', 'Step 12: Pour over the bread and cheese mixture in the baking pan.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle the remaining mozzarella cheese evenly over the top.
', 'Step 14: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 30 minutes, or until heated through.
']

Title: Chef John's Steak Pizzaiola
Ingredients: ['1 pound beef tenderloin steaks, cut into 4 medallions', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms', '2 teaspoons butter', '1 pinch salt', '1 cup sliced sweet and hot peppers', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', '½ cup white wine', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 cup tomato concasse (see footnote for recipe link)', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Season steak medallions with salt and black pepper on both sides.
', 'Step 2: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over high heat.
', 'Step 3: Add steaks and cook until browned, about 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: Transfer to a plate.
', 'Step 5: Reserve oil in skillet.
', 'Step 6: Place mushrooms and butter into the skillet and season with salt; cook and stir until mushrooms are softened and beginning to brown, 5 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to medium; add peppers and cook and stir until softened, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in garlic and cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 9: Pour in wine and sprinkle in dried oregano.
', 'Step 10: Increase heat to medium-high and cook until the wine is nearly evaporated, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Stir tomato concasse into the mushroom mixture and simmer until tomato is softened, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Add fresh oregano, balsamic vinegar, and red pepper flakes; stir to combine.
', 'Step 13: Adjust salt and black pepper to taste.
', 'Step 14: Place steaks back into the skillet with the mushroom mixture and cook until warmed through and cooked to desired doneness, 4 to 10 minutes.
']

Title: Peppered Shrimp Alfredo
Ingredients: ['12 ounces penne pasta', '¼ cup butter', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 red bell pepper, diced', '½ pound portobello mushrooms, diced', '1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 (15 ounce) jar Alfredo sauce', '½ cup grated Romano cheese', '½ cup cream', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '¼ cup chopped parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: Meanwhile, melt butter together with the olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Stir in onion, and cook until softened and translucent, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in garlic, red pepper, and mushroom; cook over medium-high heat until soft, about 2 minutes more.
', 'Step 6: Stir in the shrimp, and cook until firm and pink, then pour in Alfredo sauce, Romano cheese, and cream; bring to a simmer stirring constantly until thickened, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Season with cayenne, salt, and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 8: Stir drained pasta into the sauce, and serve sprinkled with chopped parsley.
']

Title: Lasagna Alfredo
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach', '3 cooked, boneless chicken breast halves, diced', '2 (16 ounce) jars Alfredo-style pasta sauce', '4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 pints ricotta cheese', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 4: Cook spinach according to package directions; drain.
', 'Step 5: In a medium bowl, combine chicken and one jar of Alfredo sauce, stir together.
', 'Step 6: In a separate bowl, combine ricotta and drained, cooked spinach, and stir.
', 'Step 7: In a 9 x 13 baking dish, place one layer of lasagna noodles, edges overlapping.
', 'Step 8: Pour chicken and Alfredo sauce mixture over noodle layer and spread evenly.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle 1 cup of shredded mozzarella over chicken mixture.
', 'Step 10: Top with another layer of noodles.
', 'Step 11: Spread spinach mixture evenly over noodles.
', 'Step 12: Pour 1/2 of remaining jar of Alfredo sauce over spinach mixture, spread evenly.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle another cup of mozzarella over sauce, lay on the final noodle layer and top with remaining 1/2 jar of Alfredo sauce, 2 cups of mozzarella, and salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 14: Bake 50 to 60 minutes, until top is brown and bubbly.
']

Title: Torrone (Italian Nut and Nougat Confection)
Ingredients: ['2 (8x10-inch) sheets wafer paper', '1 ⅓ cups honey', '1 cup white sugar', '3 tablespoons white sugar', '2 large egg whites, at room temperature', '1 pinch salt', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '3 cups roasted almonds', '1 cup roasted pistachios']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Line an 8x11-inch baking dish with plastic wrap, allowing ends to hang over the sides.
', 'Step 2: Place 1 sheet of 8x10 wafer paper in the bottom of the pan.
', 'Step 3: Keep the roasted almonds and pistachios in a warm place until ready to add at the end.
', 'Step 4: This makes it easier to mix them in.
', 'Step 5: Pour honey into a heavy-bottomed pot.
', 'Step 6: Add sugar.
', 'Step 7: Mix and stir over low heat with a spatula, stirring constantly until mixture turns from grainy to silky and smooth, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove pot from heat.
', 'Step 9: Place the egg whites in a mixing bowl; add a pinch of salt.
', 'Step 10: Whisk until whites form soft peaks, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Place pot back on low heat.
', 'Step 12: Gradually whisk about a quarter of the whipped egg whites into the honey/sugar mixture; whisk in the remaining egg whites in 3 more batches.
', 'Step 13: Continue cooking over low heat, stirring constantly with a spatula until mixture turns a brighter white and a ribbon of the mixture does not immediately incorporate back into the rest of the mixture and stays intact on the surface for a while.
', 'Step 14: This will take about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 15: You can add a few drops of the mixture into a small bowl of ice cold water to test the consistency; ideally it should feel like soft clay.
', 'Step 16: Whisk in vanilla and lemon zest.
', 'Step 17: Add warm almonds and pistachios and stir to incorporate evenly.
', 'Step 18: Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 19: Even out as best you can with a clean oiled spatula.
', 'Step 20: Top with 2nd sheet of wafer paper, shiny side up.
', 'Step 21: Cover with plastic wrap and press down evenly, tamping mixture down gently but firmly.
', 'Step 22: Remove top layer of plastic.
', 'Step 23: Allow torrone to sit at room temperature until cool, firm, and ready to cut, 1 or 2 hours.
', 'Step 24: Lift torrone from baking dish with the edges of the bottom layer of plastic wrap.
', 'Step 25: Invert and remove plastic from the bottom.
', 'Step 26: If the plastic wrap is difficult to remove from the edges of the torrone, you can trim off the edges.
', 'Step 27: Cut torrone into 1-inch squares using a sharp serrated knife.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '137.3 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '18.2 g', 'fatContent': '6.8 g', 'fiberContent': '1.6 g', 'proteinContent': '3.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '0.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '20.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '16 g'}

Title: Chef John's Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: ['¼ cup olive oil', '1 onion, finely diced', '1 rib celery, finely diced', '1 pinch salt', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (28 ounce) cans whole peeled San Marzano tomatoes', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon anchovy paste', '1 teaspoon white wine vinegar', '½ teaspoon dried Italian herbs', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '2 tablespoons chopped Italian flat-leaf parsley', 'water, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place olive oil, onion, celery, and a pinch of salt into a large heavy saucepan or Dutch oven over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook until onions are very soft, about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 3: Mix garlic into onion mixture and cook just until fragrant, about 1 more minute.
', 'Step 4: n Pour tomatoes and their juice into a large mixing bowl and use your hands to crush the tomatoes until they look pureed.
', 'Step 5: n Mix sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, anchovy paste, white wine vinegar, Italian herbs, and red pepper flakes into vegetable mixture.
', 'Step 6: Raise heat to medium and cook just until liquid has evaporated.
', 'Step 7: Stir in tomato paste and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 8: Pour in San Marzano tomatoes and parsley.
', 'Step 9: Bring sauce to a simmer, turn heat to low, and simmer for 1 1/2 hours, adding a little water as the sauce cooks down.
', 'Step 10: Stir occasionally.
']

Title: Light Lemon Pesto Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '4 ounces Pecorino-Romano cheese, cut into cubes', '6 cloves garlic', '2 cups loosely packed baby spinach leaves', '1 cup firmly packed basil leaves', '½ cup chopped walnuts', '¼ cup lemon juice', '¼ teaspoon lemon zest', '¼ teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook spaghetti at a boil until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 3: Transfer spaghetti to a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Put cubed Romano cheese in the bowl of a food processor; process until coarsely grated, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 5: Put garlic into the food processor and process until the cheese and garlic are combined.
', 'Step 6: Add spinach, basil, walnuts, lemon juice, lemon zest, and salt; process until the mixture comes together into a thick paste.
', 'Step 7: Scrape down the sides of the bowl with a spatula.
', 'Step 8: With food processor running, drizzle olive oil into the mixture.
', 'Step 9: Continue processing until the oil is integrated smoothly.
', 'Step 10: Pour sauce over spaghetti and toss to coat.
']

Title: Eggs Florentine
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '½ cup mushrooms, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '½ (10 ounce) package fresh spinach', '6 large eggs, slightly beaten', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons cream cheese, cut into small pieces']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir mushrooms and garlic until garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 2: Add spinach to mushroom mixture and cook until spinach is wilted, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir eggs into mushroom-spinach mixture; season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Cook, without stirring, until eggs start to firm; flip.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle cream cheese over egg mixture and cook until cream cheese starts to soften, about 5 minutes.
']

Title: Eggplant Parmesan For the Slow Cooker
Ingredients: ['4 eggplant, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch slices', '1 tablespoon salt, or as needed', '1 cup extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed', '2 eggs', '⅓ cup water', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '⅓ cup seasoned bread crumbs', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (32 ounce) jar prepared marinara sauce', '1 (16 ounce) package mozzarella cheese, sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place eggplant slices in a large bowl in layers, sprinkling each layer with salt.
', 'Step 2: Let stand for 30 minutes to drain.
', 'Step 3: Rinse and dry on paper towels.
', 'Step 4: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Whisk eggs with water and flour until smooth.
', 'Step 6: Dip eggplant slices in batter and fry in the hot oil until golden brown, working in batches of 2 to 3 slices at a time.
', 'Step 7: Mix seasoned bread crumbs with Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
', 'Step 8: Place 1/4 of the eggplant slices into a slow cooker and top with 1/4 of the crumbs, 1/4 of the marinara sauce, and 1/4 of the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 9: Repeat layers three more times.
', 'Step 10: Cover and cook on Low until tender and flavors have blended, 4 to 5 hours.
']

Title: Homemade Lasagna Sheets
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ cups Italian-style tipo 00 flour, plus additional for dusting', '3 large eggs', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon water as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place flour on a marble or wooden work surface.
', 'Step 2: Make a well in the center and crack in eggs; add salt.
', 'Step 3: Gently beat eggs using a fork, incorporating the surrounding flour, until mixture is runny.
', 'Step 4: Bring remaining flour into the mixture using a bench scraper until dough forms a ball.
', 'Step 5: Mix in water, 1 tablespoon at a time, if dough feels too stiff.
', 'Step 6: Knead dough with your hands by flattening the ball, stretching it, and folding the top towards the center.
', 'Step 7: Turn 45 degrees and repeat until dough is soft and smooth, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Shape dough into a ball.
', 'Step 9: Place in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 10: Refrigerate until firm, 30 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 11: Divide the dough into 3 equal portions.
', 'Step 12: Take one piece and flatten it a bit with your hands.
', 'Step 13: Dust a work surface with flour and roll dough out using a rolling pin 5 to 6 times.
', 'Step 14: Turn the dough 45 degrees and roll out again, 5 to 6 times.
', 'Step 15: Keep rolling and turning in the same way until the dough is evenly very thin.
', 'Step 16: When you hold up the dough, you should be able to see your fingers through it.
', 'Step 17: Cut the pasta into rectangular sheets to fit your baking dish using a pastry wheel or a knife.
', 'Step 18: Transfer lasagna sheets to a floured kitchen towel and let air-dry about 30 minutes before assembling.
']

Title: Roast Chicken with Rosemary
Ingredients: ['1 (3 pound) whole chicken, rinsed', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 small onion, quartered', '¼ cup chopped fresh rosemary']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Season chicken with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 3: Stuff with the onion and rosemary.
', 'Step 4: Place chicken in a 9x13 inch baking dish or roasting dish.
', 'Step 5: Roast in the preheated oven for 2 to 2 1/2 hours, or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear.

']

Title: Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 small onions, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon minced fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon minced celery', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 ½ cups sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 cup whole milk', '¼ cup heavy cream', '1 cup rice', '5 cups vegetable stock', '1 teaspoon butter', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Saute the onion and garlic in the olive oil until onion is tender and garlic is lightly browned.
', 'Step 3: Remove garlic, and stir in the parsley, celery, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 4: Cook until celery is tender, then add the mushrooms.
', 'Step 5: Reduce heat to low, and continue cooking until the mushrooms are soft.
', 'Step 6: Pour the milk and cream into the skillet, and stir in the rice.
', 'Step 7: Heat to a simmer.
', 'Step 8: Stir the vegetable stock into the rice one cup at a time, until it is absorbed.
', 'Step 9: When the rice has finished cooking, stir in the butter and Parmesan cheese, and remove from heat.
', 'Step 10: Serve hot.
']

Title: Italian Sunday Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 pounds pork neck bones', '2 teaspoons kosher salt, plus more to taste', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 ¼ pounds Italian sausage links', '1 ½ cups finely chopped white onion', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (12 ounce) cans tomato paste', '1 (28 ounce) can tomato puree', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '7 cups water', '1 tablespoon white sugar, or more to taste', '1 bay leaf', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '12 large cooked meatballs']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Sprinkle neck bones on all sides with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 2: Heat 4 teaspoons oil in a large, heavy-bottomed stockpot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Place neck bones in the pot and cook for 6 minutes, flipping halfway through.
', 'Step 4: Transfer to a plate.
', 'Step 5: Add sausage links to the drippings and brown for 3 minutes on each side, adding remaining oil as needed.
', 'Step 6: Set aside with the pork.
', 'Step 7: Add onion to the drippings and season with salt.
', 'Step 8: Cook, stirring often, until onion is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 10: Stir in tomato paste and cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 11: Add tomato puree and crushed tomatoes, than add water and sugar; cook, stirring constantly, until smooth.
', 'Step 12: Add bay leaf.
', 'Step 13: Rub basil and oregano between your fingers to release the aroma and add to the sauce.
', 'Step 14: Slice sausages into large chunks and return to the pot with the neck bones; bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 15: Add meatballs, reduce heat to low, and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 4 to 6 hours.
', 'Step 16: Remove neck bones and bay leaf.
', 'Step 17: Remove any meat remaining on the bones, shred, and return to the sauce.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '569.4 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '28.5 g', 'cholesterolContent': '144.6 mg', 'fatContent': '32.3 g', 'fiberContent': '5.5 g', 'proteinContent': '42.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '10.8 g', 'sodiumContent': '2035 mg'}

Title: Simple Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach', '½ onion, chopped', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 (32 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 ½ cups water', '2 cups non-fat cottage cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package part skim mozzarella cheese, shredded', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon black pepper', '1 egg', '8 ounces lasagna noodles']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a large pot over medium heat saute spinach, onion, oregano, basil and garlic in the olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Pour in spaghetti sauce and water; simmer 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl mix cottage cheese, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, pepper and egg.
', 'Step 5: Place a small amount of sauce in the bottom of a lasagna pan.
', 'Step 6: Place 4 uncooked noodles on top of sauce and top with layer of sauce.
', 'Step 7: Add 4 more noodles and layer with 1/2 sauce and 1/2 cheese mixture, noodles and repeat until all is layered, finishing with sauce.
', 'Step 8: Cover with foil and bake in a preheated oven for 55 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove foil and bake another 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Let sit 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Gnocchi with Sage-Butter Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 (12 ounce) packages potato gnocchi', '¼ cup butter', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '¼ teaspoon salt', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add the gnocchi pasta, and cook until they float to the surface, 2 to 3 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 3: Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Stir in the garlic, and cook until the garlic has softened and is beginning to turn golden brown, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the sage and salt for a few seconds, then add the cooked gnocchi.

', 'Step 7: Sprinkle with the remaining 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese to serve.

Title: Veal Marsala
Ingredients: ['2 pounds veal cutlets', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '½ teaspoon seasoning salt', '½ cup butter', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '¾ pound fresh mushrooms, quartered', '¼ cup Marsala wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place meat on a solid, level surface, or between sheets of waxed paper, and pound thinly with a mallet or moistened cleaver, using a glancing motion.
', 'Step 2: In shallow dish, combine flour and seasoning salt.
', 'Step 3: Dredge cutlets in flour mixture, and let rest 15 minutes on wire rack.
', 'Step 4: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter with oil.
', 'Step 5: Cook floured cutlets on both sides until brown.
', 'Step 6: Introduce mushrooms, reduce heat to low, cover and cook 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour in Marsala and simmer 5 minutes more, until veal is tender and sauce is hot.
', 'Step 8: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Spinach Tomato Tortellini
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package cheese tortellini', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with garlic and onion', '1 cup chopped fresh spinach', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon pepper', '1 ½ teaspoons dried basil', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '¾ cup milk', '¾ cup heavy cream', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

Title: Randy's Slow Cooker Ravioli Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 (24 ounce) jars prepared pasta sauce', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 (25 ounce) package frozen cheese ravioli', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']

['Step 1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir beef, garlic, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in the hot skillet until meat is browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 4: Stir pasta sauce, Italian seasoning, basil, and oregano into ground beef mixture.
', 'Step 5: Ladle a generous layer of meat sauce into the bottom of a slow cooker; add a layer of ravioli.
', 'Step 6: Ladle another layer of meat sauce over ravioli layer; alternate with remaining ravioli and meat sauce until all ingredients are used.
', 'Step 7: Cook on Low for 3 to 5 hours.
', 'Step 8: Sprinkle ravioli mixture with mozzarella cheese and continue cooking until cheese is melted, 45 minutes to 1 hour more.
']

Title: Creamy Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients: ['¼ cup butter, or more to taste', '1 clove garlic, minced', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese (such as Kraft®)', '2 cups milk', '1 ½ teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 pinch ground black pepper']

', 'Step 2: Lower heat to medium and gradually stir flour into garlic-butter mixture until dissolved and smooth, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: n Gradually stir Parmesan cheese into garlic-flour mixture until cheese is melted and mixture is thickened, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Slowly pour milk into cheese mixture, stirring constantly, until smooth, about 5 minutes; season with Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir until sauce reaches desired consistency, 5 to 10 minutes.
']

Title: Pesto Stuffed Pork Chops
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese', '2 tablespoons chilled basil pesto', '1 tablespoon toasted pine nuts', '4 bone-in pork loin chops, 1 1/4-inch thick', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '¼ teaspoon ground thyme', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Mix feta cheese, basil pesto, and pine nuts in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Use the tip of a sharp boning or paring knife to cut a 3-inch slit in the side of each pork chop, 2 inches deep and 1/4-inch away from the bone, to make a pocket for stuffing.
', 'Step 4: Stuff pork chops with pesto filling and secure with toothpicks.
', 'Step 5: Mix black pepper, oregano, garlic, red pepper flakes, and thyme in a small bowl; rub both sides of each chop with the spice mix.
', 'Step 6: Place chops into a shallow baking dish.
', 'Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven until chops are browned and stuffing is hot, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 8: An instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the center of the stuffing should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).

Title: Chicken Fettuccini Alfredo
Ingredients: ['6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into cubes', '6 tablespoons butter, divided', '4 cloves garlic, minced, divided', '1 tablespoon Italian seasoning', '1 pound fettuccini pasta', '1 onion, diced', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced mushrooms', '⅓ cup all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon salt', '¾ teaspoon ground white pepper', '3 cups milk', '1 cup half-and-half', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '8 ounces shredded Colby-Monterey Jack cheese', '3 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced', '½ cup sour cream']
