['Step 1: In a large skillet over medium heat combine chicken, 2 tablespoons butter, 2 cloves garlic, and Italian seasoning.
', 'Step 2: Cook until chicken is no longer pink inside.
', 'Step 3: Remove from skillet and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, melt 4 tablespoons butter in the skillet.
', 'Step 7: Saute onion, 2 cloves garlic, and mushrooms until onions are transparent.
', 'Step 8: Stir in flour, salt and pepper; cook 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Slowly add milk and half-and-half, stirring until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 10: Stir in Parmesan and Colby-Monterey Jack cheeses; stir until cheese is melted.

', 'Step 12: Serve over cooked fettuccini.

Title: Grandma's Best Ever Sour Cream Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '½ pound ground pork sausage', '½ pound ground beef', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 pinch white sugar', '1 (16 ounce) container sour cream', '3 eggs, lightly beaten', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup chopped pitted green olives', '2 teaspoons salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 (12 ounce) packages shredded mozzarella cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the lasagna noodles, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Drain.
', 'Step 6: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and cook and stir the sausage, ground beef, and garlic until the meat is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink.
', 'Step 7: Drain any excess grease.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, parsley, basil, oregano, and sugar.
', 'Step 9: Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to medium-low, and simmer, stirring occasionally, until the sauce is thickened, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Stir together the sour cream, eggs, Parmesan cheese, green olives, salt, black pepper, and 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese in a bowl.
', 'Step 11: To assemble the lasagna, spread a thin layer of the meat sauce evenly over the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking pan.
', 'Step 12: Cover with 1/3 of the lasagna noodles, 1/3 of the remaining meat sauce, 1/3 of the sour cream mixture.
', 'Step 13: Repeat this layering 2 more times.
', 'Step 14: Sprinkle the remaining mozzarella cheese evenly over the lasagna.
', 'Step 15: Bake in the preheated oven until the sauce is bubbly and the top is golden brown, about 30 minutes.
']

Title: Bolognese Sauce

', 'Step 2: Melt the butter in a saucepan over low heat, and cook the garlic until tender, about 5 minutes.

Title: Incredibly Delicious Italian Cream Cake
Ingredients: ['1 cup buttermilk', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '½ cup butter', '½ cup shortening', '2 cups white sugar', '5 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup flaked coconut', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '8 ounces cream cheese', '½ cup butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', "4 cups confectioners' sugar", '2 tablespoons light cream', '½ cup chopped walnuts', '1 cup sweetened flaked coconut']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease three 9 inch round cake pans.
', 'Step 3: In a small bowl, dissolve the baking soda in the buttermilk; set aside.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl, cream together 1/2 cup butter, shortening and white sugar until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 5: Mix in the eggs, buttermilk mixture, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 cup coconut, baking powder and flour.
', 'Step 6: Stir until just combined.
', 'Step 7: Pour batter into the prepared pans.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
', 'Step 9: Allow to cool.
', "Step 10: To Make Frosting: In a medium bowl, combine cream cheese, 1/2 cup butter, 1 teaspoon vanilla and confectioners' sugar.
", 'Step 11: Beat until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 12: Mix in a small amount of cream to attain the desired consistency.
', 'Step 13: Stir in chopped nuts and remaining flaked coconut.
', 'Step 14: Spread between layers and on top and sides of cooled cake.
']

Title: Pizza Balls

', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a large baking sheet.

Title: Pasta de Sardine
Ingredients: ['8 ounces dry fettuccine pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium yellow onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 (3.75 ounce) can sardines in tomato sauce', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta, and cook for about 8 minutes, or until almost tender.
', 'Step 3: While the pasta is cooking, heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Add the onion, and cook for a few minutes until soft, then add the garlic, and cook until fragrant.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the sardines with their sauce.
', 'Step 6: When the sardines heat through, reduce heat to low, and simmer until the pasta is ready.
', 'Step 7: When the pasta is almost done, drain, and add it to the sardine sauce.
', 'Step 8: Stir, cover, and turn the heat off.
', 'Step 9: Let stand for a few minutes to absorb the flavors of the sauce.
', 'Step 10: Squeeze juice from the lemon over the pasta.
', 'Step 11: Divide onto serving plates, and top with red pepper flakes and grated Parmesan cheese.
']

Title: Gelato
Ingredients: ['2 cups milk', '1 cup heavy cream', '4 egg yolks', '½ cup sugar']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium saucepan, mix milk and cream.
', 'Step 2: Warm until foam forms around the edges.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl, beat the egg yolks and sugar until frothy.
', 'Step 5: Gradually pour the warm milk into the egg yolks, whisking constantly.
', 'Step 6: Return mixture to saucepan; cook over medium heat, stirring with a wooden spoon until the mixture gels slightly and coats the back of the spoon.
', 'Step 7: If small egg lumps begin to show, remove from heat immediately.
', 'Step 8: Pour the mixture through a sieve or fine strainer into a bowl.
', 'Step 9: Cover, and chill for several hours or overnight.
', "Step 10: Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker, and freeze according to the manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 11: Transfer to a sealed container, and freeze until firm.
', 'Step 12: If the gelato is too firm, place it in the refrigerator until it reaches the desired consistency.
']

Title: Fettuccini Carbonara

', 'Step 2: Saute shallots until softened.
', 'Step 3: Stir in onion and bacon, and cook until bacon is evenly browned.

Title: Jamie's Minestrone
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 onions, chopped', '2 cups chopped celery', '5 carrots, sliced', '2 cups chicken broth', '2 cups water', '4 cups tomato sauce', '½ cup red wine', '1 cup canned kidney beans, drained', '1 (15 ounce) can green beans', '2 cups baby spinach, rinsed', '3 zucchinis, quartered and sliced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '½ cup seashell pasta', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese for topping', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large stock pot, over medium-low heat, heat olive oil and saute garlic for 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add onion and saute for 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add celery and carrots, saute for 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add chicken broth, water and tomato sauce, bring to boil, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 5: If desired add red wine at this point.
', 'Step 6: Reduce heat to low and add kidney beans, green beans, spinach leaves, zucchini, oregano, basil, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Simmer for 30 to 40 minutes, the longer the better.
', 'Step 8: Fill a medium saucepan with water and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Add macaroni and cook until tender.
', 'Step 10: Drain water and set aside.
', 'Step 11: Once pasta is cooked and soup is heated through place 2 tablespoons cooked pasta into individual serving bowls.
', 'Step 12: Ladle soup on top of pasta and sprinkle Parmesan cheese on top.
', 'Step 13: Spray with olive oil and serve.
']

Title: Easy Lasagna I
Ingredients: ['1 pound lean ground beef', '1 onion, chopped', '1 (4.5 ounce) can mushrooms, drained', '1 (28 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '1 (16 ounce) package cottage cheese', '1 pint part-skim ricotta cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 eggs', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '8 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a large skillet, cook and stir ground beef until brown.
', 'Step 3: Add mushrooms and onions; saute until onions are transparent.
', 'Step 4: Stir in pasta sauce, and heat through.
', 'Step 5: In a medium size bowl, combine cottage cheese, ricotta cheese, grated Parmesan cheese, and eggs.
', 'Step 6: Spread a thin layer of the meat sauce in the bottom of a 13x9 inch pan.
', 'Step 7: Layer with uncooked lasagna noodles, cheese mixture, mozzarella cheese, and meat sauce.
', 'Step 8: Continue layering until all ingredients are used, reserving 1/2 cup mozzarella.
', 'Step 9: Cover pan with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 10: Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Uncover, and top with remaining half cup of mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 12: Bake for an additional 15 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove from oven, and let stand 10 to 15 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Italian Rice Balls
Ingredients: ['2 eggs', '⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 quart water', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup uncooked white rice', '1 ½ cups dried bread crumbs', '2 cups olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs, cheese, parsley, pepper, and 1 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 2: Cover and refrigerate.
', 'Step 3: Pour water and 1 teaspoon salt into a large saucepan and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Stir in rice and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 5: Cook rice until water is almost absorbed, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 6: Remove from heat and slowly pour in egg mixture, stirring rapidly to prevent egg from scrambling.
', 'Step 7: Allow rice mixture to cool for 1 hour.
', 'Step 8: Pour bread crumbs into a pile on one end of a cutting board.
', 'Step 9: Dampen hands and roll rice mixture into 1 inch balls, then coat each one with bread crumbs.
', 'Step 10: In a small, deep skillet, heat olive oil to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: (Should have enough oil to completely cover rice balls.
', 'Step 12: ) Fry rice balls 6 at a time, turning as needed to ensure even browning.
', 'Step 13: Drain on paper towels and serve warm.
']

Title: Italian Easter Bread (Anise Flavored)
Ingredients: ['3 cups all-purpose flour, divided', '¼ cup white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (.25 ounce) package rapid rise yeast', '⅔ cup milk', '1 teaspoon anise extract', '2 tablespoons butter at room temperature', '2 eggs', '1 egg, beaten', '½ tablespoon colored candy decorating dragees, or as desired']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix 1 cup of flour with sugar, salt, and yeast in a bowl, stir well.
', 'Step 2: Place milk and anise extract into a small saucepan over low heat, and warm to about 110 degrees F (43 degrees C).
', 'Step 3: Make a well in the center of the flour mixture with your hand, and pour in the milk mixture; swirl with your hand in a circular motion to combine the flour mixture with the milk mixture.
', 'Step 4: Mix in butter and eggs, one at a time, then mix in remaining flour until dough begins to pull together.
', 'Step 5: Turn the dough out onto a floured work surface, and knead until soft but elastic, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Cover with a damp cloth, and let dough rest for 10 minutes; cut dough into halves.
', 'Step 7: On floured work surface, roll each half into a ball, then shape the balls into 2 long pieces, about 1 1/2 inches thick and 18 to 20 inches long.
', 'Step 8: Pinch the 2 top ends together, and loosely twist the pieces to form a twisted loaf; pinch the bottom ends together, and tuck the two ends underneath the loaf.
', 'Step 9: (Alternately, form the twist into a ring, and pinch the ends together.
', 'Step 10: ) Grease a baking sheet, lay the loaf onto the prepared sheet, and cover with a damp towel; let rise until doubled, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 11: Brush loaf with beaten egg, and sprinkle with colored decorating dragees.
', 'Step 12: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Bake the decorated loaf in the preheated oven until golden, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Watch closely towards the end of the baking time that the bread does not begin to burn.
', 'Step 15: Transfer to wire rack immediately after baking to cool.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '211.5 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '35.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '63.2 mg', 'fatContent': '4.6 g', 'fiberContent': '1.2 g', 'proteinContent': '6.6 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '2.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '287.9 mg', 'sugarContent': '6.6 g'}

Title: Jay's Signature Pizza Crust
Ingredients: ['2 ¼ teaspoons active dry yeast', '½ teaspoon brown sugar', '1 ½ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 ⅓ cups all-purpose flour']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large bowl, dissolve the yeast and brown sugar in the water, and let sit for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir the salt and oil into the yeast solution.
', 'Step 3: Mix in 2 1/2 cups of the flour.
', 'Step 4: Turn dough out onto a clean, well floured surface, and knead in more flour until the dough is no longer sticky.
', 'Step 5: Place the dough into a well oiled bowl, and cover with a cloth.
', 'Step 6: Let the dough rise until double; this should take about 1 hour.
', 'Step 7: Punch down the dough, and form a tight ball.
', 'Step 8: Allow the dough to relax for a minute before rolling out.
', 'Step 9: Use for your favorite pizza recipe.
', 'Step 10: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: If you are baking the dough on a pizza stone, you may place your toppings on the dough, and bake immediately.
', 'Step 12: If you are baking your pizza in a pan, lightly oil the pan, and let the dough rise for 15 or 20 minutes before topping and baking it.
', 'Step 13: Bake pizza in preheated oven, until the cheese and crust are golden brown, about 15 to 20 minutes.
']

Title: Chicken Milano
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '½ cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', '1 cup chicken broth, divided', '1 cup heavy cream', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '8 ounces dry fettuccini pasta']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large saucepan over low heat, melt butter; add garlic and cook for 30 seconds.
', 'Step 2: Add the tomatoes and 3/4 cup of the chicken broth; increase to medium heat and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for about 10 minutes or until the tomatoes are tender.
', 'Step 4: Add the cream and bring to a boil; stirring.
', 'Step 5: Simmer over medium heat until the sauce is thick enough to coat the back of a spoon.
', 'Step 6: Sprinkle the chicken with salt and pepper on both sides.
', 'Step 7: In a large skillet over medium heat, warm oil and saute chicken.
', 'Step 8: Press on chicken occasionally with a slotted spatula.
', 'Step 9: Cook for about 4 minutes per side or until the meat feels springy and is no longer pink inside.
', 'Step 10: Transfer to a board; cover and keep warm.
', 'Step 11: Discard the fat from the skillet.
', 'Step 12: In the same skillet, over medium heat, bring 1/4 cup chicken broth to a boil; stirring the pan juices.
', 'Step 13: Reduce slightly and add to the cream sauce; stir in basil and adjust seasonings to taste.
', 'Step 14: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 15: Add fettuccine and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain, transfer to a bowl and toss with 3 to 4 tablespoons of the sauce.
', 'Step 16: Cut each chicken breast into 2 to 3 diagonal slices.
', 'Step 17: Reheat the sauce gently if needed.
', 'Step 18: Transfer the pasta to serving plates; top with chicken and coat with the cream sauce; serve.
']

Title: Calamari
Ingredients: ['3 cups vegetable oil', '¼ cup all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '12 squid, cleaned and sliced into rings', '1 lemon - cut into wedges, for garnish']

', 'Step 6: Beware of overcooking, squid will be tough if overcooked.
', 'Step 7: Dry squid on paper towels.
', 'Step 8: Serve with wedges of lemon.

Title: Italian Sausage Stuffed Shells
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package jumbo pasta shells', '3 teaspoons vegetable oil, divided', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 (16 ounce) package finely shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '1 teaspoon dried Italian seasoning, plus more for garnish if desired', '1 (24 ounce) jar prepared marinara sauce']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly oil a 9x13 baking dish.

Title: Zeppole
Ingredients: ['2 quarts vegetable oil for frying', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 ½ teaspoons white sugar', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 cup ricotta cheese', '¼ teaspoon vanilla extract', "½ cup confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a deep-fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a medium saucepan, combine the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.
', 'Step 3: Stir in the eggs, ricotta cheese and vanilla.
', 'Step 4: Mix gently over low heat until combined.
', 'Step 5: Batter will be sticky.
', 'Step 6: Drop by tablespoons into the hot oil a few at a time.
', 'Step 7: Zeppole will turn over by themselves.
', 'Step 8: Fry until golden brown, about 3 or 4 minutes.
', "Step 9: Drain in a paper sack and dust with confectioners' sugar.
", 'Step 10: Serve warm.
']

Title: Arancini
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 cup uncooked Arborio rice', '½ cup dry white wine', '2 ½ cups boiling chicken stock', '½ cup frozen green peas', '2 ounces finely chopped ham', 'salt and pepper to taste', '½ cup finely grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg, beaten', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon milk', '4 ounces mozzarella cheese, cut into 3/4 inch cubes', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '1 cup dry bread crumbs', '1 cup vegetable oil for deep frying']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onion and garlic, and cook, stirring until onion is soft but not browned.
', 'Step 3: Pour in the rice, and cook stirring for 2 minutes, then stir in the wine, and continue cooking and stirring until the liquid has evaporated.
', 'Step 4: Add hot chicken stock to the rice 1/3 cup at a time, stirring and cooking until the liquid has evaporated before adding more.
', 'Step 5: When the chicken stock has all been added, and the liquid has evaporated, stir in the peas and ham.
', 'Step 6: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 7: Remove from the heat, and stir in the Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 8: Transfer the risotto to a bowl, and allow to cool slightly.
', 'Step 9: Stir the beaten egg into the risotto.
', 'Step 10: In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining egg and milk with a fork.
', 'Step 11: For each ball, roll 2 tablespoons of the risotto into a ball.
', 'Step 12: Press a piece of the mozzarella cheese into the center, and roll to enclose.
', 'Step 13: Coat lightly with flour, dip into the milk mixture, then roll in bread crumbs to coat.
', 'Step 14: Heat oil for frying in a deep-fryer or large deep saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 15: Fry the balls in small batches until evenly golden, turning as needed.
', 'Step 16: Drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 17: Keep warm in a low oven while the rest are frying.
']

Title: Slow Cooker Bolognese
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup finely chopped baby carrots', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pound lean ground beef', '1 ½ cups whole milk, divided', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat, and cook and stir the carrots, onion, and garlic until tender, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Place the ground beef into the skillet and cook and stir, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until browned.
', 'Step 3: Drain off excess fat from the skillet, and pour in 1 cup milk.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until the milk is absorbed, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 5: n Place the beef mixture into a slow cooker, and set the cooker to High.
', 'Step 6: Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, salt, pepper, basil, oregano, and red pepper flakes, and cook for 2 hours.
', 'Step 7: Mix in 1/2 cup milk and Parmesan cheese, stir well, and cook for 2 more hours.
']

Title: Grilled Chicken Spiedies
Ingredients: ['¾ cup white wine vinegar', '½ cup olive oil', '¼ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice', '½ cup fresh mint leaves', '6 cloves garlic', '4 teaspoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '3 pounds boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into 3 pieces', '6 skewers', '6 Italian-style hoagie buns']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine vinegar, olive oil, lemon juice, mint, garlic, sugar, oregano, basil, salt, red pepper flakes, and black pepper in a blender.
', 'Step 2: Puree until liquefied, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 3: Place chicken thighs in a large resealable plastic bag, pour in marinade and massage to coat.
', 'Step 4: Squeeze out excess air and seal the bag.
', 'Step 5: Marinate in the refrigerator for 24 hours, turning occasionally.
', 'Step 6: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate.
', 'Step 7: Remove chicken and place on the skewers.
', 'Step 8: Season with salt.
', 'Step 9: Pour the marinade into a small saucepan.
', 'Step 10: Bring to a simmer and cook until reduced slightly, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Place skewers on the preheated grill and cook for 5 to 6 minutes, turn and cook until the chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 5 to 6 more minutes.
', 'Step 12: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 13: Remove from grill and rest the meat for a few minutes.
', 'Step 14: Toast hoagie rolls and spread each with some of the reserved marinade.
', 'Step 15: Place a skewer on each roll and carefully remove the skewer, leaving the chicken in the bun.
']

Title: Fresh Semolina and Egg Pasta
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '2 cups semolina flour', '1 pinch salt', '6 large eggs', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Thoroughly sift together all-purpose flour, semolina flour, and pinch of salt.
', 'Step 2: On a clean surface, make a mountain out of flour mixture then make a deep well in center.
', 'Step 3: Break the eggs into the well and add olive oil.
', 'Step 4: Whisk eggs very gently with a fork, gradually incorporating flour from the sides of the well.
', 'Step 5: When mixture becomes too thick to mix with a fork, begin kneading with your hands.
', 'Step 6: Knead dough for 8 to 12 minutes, until it is smooth and supple.
', 'Step 7: Dust dough and work surface with semolina as needed to keep dough from becoming sticky.
', 'Step 8: Wrap dough tightly in plastic and allow it to rest at room temperature for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Roll out dough with a pasta machine or a rolling pin to desired thickness.
', 'Step 10: Cut into your favorite style of noodle or stuff with your favorite filling to make ravioli.
', 'Step 11: Bring water to a boil in a large pot, then add 4 teaspoons salt.
', 'Step 12: Cook pasta until tender but not mushy, 1 to 8 minutes depending on thickness.
', 'Step 13: Drain immediately and toss with your favorite sauce.
']

Title: Enhance That Jar of Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 cup red wine, divided', '1 pound ground beef', '1 cup diced yellow onion', '1 cup diced tomatoes', '½ cup chopped red bell pepper', '½ cup chopped green bell pepper', '¼ cup minced garlic', '2 tablespoons oregano', '2 tablespoons basil', '1 tablespoon rosemary', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 (28 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter with olive oil in a small skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir mushrooms in butter mixture until softened, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add 1/4 cup red wine; bring to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook until the mushrooms are very dark and shrunken in size, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 4: n Heat a large pot over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Cook and stir ground beef, yellow onion, diced tomatoes, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, and garlic together until the beef is completely browned, about 10 minutes; season with oregano, basil, and rosemary.
', 'Step 6: Stir 3/4 cup red wine and tomato paste into the beef mixture.
', 'Step 7: Pour spaghetti sauce into the pot; stir.
', 'Step 8: Return mixture to a simmer and continue cooking until the flavors blend, 10 to 30 minutes.
']

Title: Chicken Scallopini
Ingredients: ['1 clove garlic, pressed', '¼ cup butter, softened', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '½ cup all-purpose flour', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '4 ounces sliced mushrooms', '20 capers, or to taste', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '¼ cup white wine', '2 tablespoons chicken-flavored demi-glace, or to taste', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste', '2 lemon slices']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a small bowl, stir together the garlic and butter until well combined.
', 'Step 2: Set aside.
', "Step 3: Place a chicken breast half on a work surface with the thick side facing to the right (if you're right-handed), and place your left hand down on the chicken breast.
", 'Step 4: Using a very sharp knife, carefully cut the chicken breast from the thick side to about 1/2 inch from the edge of the thin side, in a horizontal cut.
', 'Step 5: Open the cut chicken breast and spread it out like an open book.
', "Step 6: Using a meat mallet, gently pound the butterflied chicken breast out until it's an even thickness.
", 'Step 7: Place the flour into a shallow dish, and dredge each chicken breast on both sides with flour.
', 'Step 8: Melt the garlic butter in a large skillet over medium heat until it stops foaming, and cook each chicken breast until golden brown on both sides, 6 to 8 minutes per side.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle each breast with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 10: Remove the chicken breasts to a platter, and keep warm.
', 'Step 11: Cook and stir the mushrooms in the same skillet as the chicken until the mushrooms have absorbed the remaining butter in the skillet and have begun to turn brown at the edges.
', 'Step 12: Stir in capers, lemon juice, white wine, and chicken demi-glace, and stir to combine.
', 'Step 13: Reduce to a simmer.
', 'Step 14: Adjust salt and pepper again, and stir the parsley into the sauce.
', 'Step 15: Remove the chicken breasts to plates, and serve the sauce over the chicken.
', 'Step 16: Garnish each serving with a lemon slice.
']

Title: Chef John's Minestrone Soup
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 ounces chopped pancetta', '1 onion, diced', '1 cup diced celery', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '4 cups chicken broth', '2 cups water, plus more as needed', '1 (28 ounce) can plum tomatoes, crushed fine', '1 cup cranberry beans, shelled', '2 cups chopped cabbage, or more to taste', '1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 bunch Swiss chard, chopped', '⅔ cup ditalini pasta', 'salt and ground black pepper', '¼ cup extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', '¼ cup finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '¼ cup chopped fresh Italian flat-leaf parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in large stock pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add pancetta; cook and stir until it begins to brown, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Stir in onions and celery; cook and stir until onions start to turn translucent, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir in minced garlic and cook for another minute.
', 'Step 5: Pour chicken broth, water, and plum tomatoes into the pancetta and onion mixture.
', 'Step 6: Bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 7: Stir cranberry beans, cabbage, garbanzo beans, red pepper flakes, Italian seasoning, and 2 teaspoons salt into broth mixture.
', 'Step 8: Bring to a simmer and cook until cranberry beans are tender, adding more water as needed if the soup becomes too thick, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in Swiss chard and simmer until softened, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
', 'Step 11: Stir in pasta and increase heat to medium-high and simmer until pasta is tender, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Ladle into bowls and top with extra virgin olive oil, Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, and Italian parsley.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '483.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '53.9 g', 'cholesterolContent': '15.8 mg', 'fatContent': '23 g', 'fiberContent': '14.4 g', 'proteinContent': '17.9 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.9 g', 'sodiumContent': '2019.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '7.5 g'}

Title: Classic Alfredo Sauce

', 'Step 5: Simmer over medium low heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Garnish with additional grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.
']

Title: Chicken Piccata with Angel Hair Pasta
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup all-purpose flour', '¼ teaspoon fresh ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon paprika', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, pounded thin and cut into 2-inch pieces', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove garlic, minced', '¼ cup butter, divided', '1 cup dry white wine', '⅓ cup chicken broth', '¼ cup fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons capers', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 (8 ounce) package angel hair pasta, cooked and drained']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Whisk together flour, black pepper, and paprika in a shallow dish.
', 'Step 2: Dredge the chicken pieces in the flour mixture, coating evenly; set aside.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat; stir and cook the garlic until light brown, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Remove the garlic from the skillet and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Place 2 tablespoons of butter into the skillet with the olive oil.
', 'Step 6: Cook the chicken pieces in the oil and butter over medium-high heat until brown, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 7: Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
', 'Step 8: Pour the wine into the hot skillet and bring to a boil over high heat, scraping the browned pieces from the bottom and sides of the pan.
', 'Step 9: Boil the wine until it is reduced by half, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Whisk in the chicken broth, reserved garlic, lemon juice and capers.
', 'Step 11: Cook for 5 minutes over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 12: Stir in the remaining 2 tablespoons butter and parsley.
', 'Step 13: Return the chicken pieces to the skillet and continue cooking over medium heat until the sauce thickens, about 15 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Meanwhile, fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 15: Once the water is boiling, stir in the angel hair pasta, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 16: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Drain well.
', 'Step 18: Remove the chicken pieces to a serving dish and drizzle with a few tablespoons of the sauce and capers.
', 'Step 19: Place the cooked angel hair pasta into the skillet with the remaining piccata sauce and toss to coat.
']

Title: Chef John's Ricotta Meatballs
Ingredients: ['½ onion, minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pound ground beef', '1 cup whole milk ricotta cheese', '¼ cup packed chopped Italian parsley', '1 egg, beaten', '1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '⅓ cup dry bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (28 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '1 cup water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Saute onion in 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir garlic into onion and turn off heat.
', 'Step 3: Transfer onion mixture to a large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 4: Stir ground beef, ricotta cheese, parsley, egg, kosher salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper with onion mixture until almost combined; stir in bread crumbs and continue to mix until thoroughly blended.
', 'Step 5: Roll about 2 tablespoons of mixture into a 1-inch ball for each meatball.
', 'Step 6: Pour 2 tablespoons olive oil in same skillet used to cook onions.
', 'Step 7: Place skillet over medium heat and brown meatballs on all sides in hot oil, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Hold a crumpled paper towel in a tongs and use it to remove excess grease from skillet.
', 'Step 9: Pour marinara sauce and water over meatballs in skillet.
', 'Step 10: Stir to combine and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 11: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring occasionally, until meatballs are cooked through and no longer pink in the center, about 30 minutes.
']

Title: Almond Ricotta Cake
Ingredients: ['½ cup unsalted butter, at room temperature', '¾ cup white sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '1 large lemon, zested and juiced', '4 large eggs, separated', '2 cups blanched almond flour', '9 ounces ricotta cheese', '⅓ cup white sugar', '¼ cup sliced almonds, or to taste', "1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease an 8-inch springform pan and line with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Combine butter and 3/4 cup sugar in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Add vanilla sugar, lemon zest, and lemon juice; mix until well combined.
', 'Step 5: Add egg yolks, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition.
', 'Step 6: Fold in almond flour and ricotta cheese with a silicone spatula.
', 'Step 7: Wash and dry the beaters and beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl until foamy.
', 'Step 8: Gradually add 1/3 cup sugar, continuing to beat until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 9: Fold stiff egg whites into the batter.
', 'Step 10: Pour batter into the prepared pan.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle with sliced almonds.
', 'Step 12: Bake on the center rake of the preheated oven until edges of the cake are lightly browned, about 50 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Cake will still be a little wobbly in the middle.
', 'Step 14: Remove from the oven and let the cake to cool completely in the pan before transferring to a cake platter, about 1 hour.
', "Step 15: Dust with confectioners' sugar before serving.
"]

Title: Baked Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients: ['2 eggplant, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch slices', '1 tablespoon salt, or as needed', '1 cup Italian-style bread crumbs', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 (28 ounce) jar garlic-and-tomato pasta sauce', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (16 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese, or as needed', '½ teaspoon dried basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place eggplant slices in a colander; sprinkle both sides of each slice with salt.
', 'Step 2: Allow to sit for at least 3 hours.
', 'Step 3: Wipe excess moisture from eggplant slices with paper towels.
', 'Step 4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Grease a baking sheet.
', 'Step 6: Mix bread crumbs and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese together in a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Dip eggplant slices in beaten egg; coat with bread crumb mixture.
', 'Step 8: Arrange coated eggplant slices in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned and crisp, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 10: Cover the bottom of a 9x13-inch casserole dish with a layer of spaghetti sauce; top with a layer of eggplant slices.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle with about 1 tablespoon of the remaining Parmesan cheese and 1/3 the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 12: Repeat layers with remaining ingredients, ending with a cheese layer.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle with basil.
', 'Step 14: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is bubbling and golden brown, about 35 minutes.
']

Title: Eggplant Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil for brushing', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons water', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 cup Italian-seasoned breadcrumbs', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 large eggplants, peeled and sliced into 1/2-inch rounds', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound ground beef', '48 ounces chunky tomato sauce (such as Prego®)', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Oil 2 baking sheets and a 9x13-inch baking dish with 1 teaspoon olive oil.
', 'Step 3: Whisk eggs and water together in a shallow dish.
', 'Step 4: Combine Parmesan cheese, bread crumbs, salt, and ground black pepper in a separate shallow dish.
', 'Step 5: Dip eggplant slices into egg mixture, then press each gently into bread crumb mixture.
', 'Step 6: Gently tap off any excess crumbs.
', 'Step 7: Arrange slices on the prepared baking sheets.
', 'Step 8: Bake eggplant slices in the preheated oven until tops are golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Flip eggplant and bake an additional 20 to 25 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Remove eggplant from the oven and increase temperature to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat and stir in ground beef.
', 'Step 12: Season beef with salt and ground black pepper.
', 'Step 13: Cook and stir until beef is browned and crumbly, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Drain excess grease.
', 'Step 15: Stir tomato sauce into ground beef; bring to a simmer and set sauce aside.
', 'Step 16: Place 1/3 of the eggplant slices on bottom of the dish.
', 'Step 17: Pour 1/3 of tomato sauce with ground beef on top of eggplant layer.
', 'Step 18: Sprinkle 1/3 of mozzarella cheese on top of sauce layer.
', 'Step 19: Repeat 2 more times, finishing with a layer of mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 20: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and sauce is bubbling, 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 21: Cool for 5 minutes before slicing.
']

Title: Italian Bread Using a Bread Machine
Ingredients: ['4 cups unbleached all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon light brown sugar', '1 ⅓ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 ½ teaspoons olive oil', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water', '2 tablespoons cornmeal']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place flour, brown sugar, warm water, salt, olive oil and yeast in the pan of the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer.
', 'Step 2: Select dough cycle; press Start.
', 'Step 3: Deflate the dough and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 4: Form dough into two loaves.
', 'Step 5: Place the loaves seam side down on a cutting board generously sprinkled with cornmeal.
', 'Step 6: Cover the loaves with a damp cloth and let rise, until doubled in volume about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Meanwhile, preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 8: In a small bowl, beat together egg and 1 tablespoon water.
', 'Step 9: Brush the risen loaves with egg mixture.
', 'Step 10: Make a single long, quick cut down the center of the loaves with a sharp knife.
', 'Step 11: Gently shake the cutting board to make sure that the loaves are not sticking.
', 'Step 12: If they stick, use a spatula or pastry knife to loosen.
', 'Step 13: Slide the loaves onto a baking sheet with one quick but careful motion.
', 'Step 14: Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until loaves sound hollow when tapped on the bottom.
']

Title: Italian Butterball Cookies
Ingredients: ['1 stick butter', "¾ cup confectioners' sugar", '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', "¼ cup confectioners' sugar"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a baking sheet.
', "Step 3: Beat together the butter and 3/4 cup confectioners' sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth.
", 'Step 4: Add the egg, vanilla extract, and almond extract.
', 'Step 5: Stir together the flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl and mix into the butter mixture until just incorporated.
', 'Step 6: Shape the dough into 1-inch balls and arrange on the prepared baking sheet spaced about 2 inches apart.

Title: Real Italian Calzones
Ingredients: ['1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '1 cup warm water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 ½ cups all-purpose flour, divided', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '½ cup ricotta cheese', '1 ½ cups shredded Cheddar cheese', '½ cup diced pepperoni', '½ cup sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 tablespoon dried basil leaves', '1 egg, beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To Make Dough: In a small bowl, dissolve yeast in water.
', 'Step 2: Add the oil, sugar and salt; mix in 1 cup of the flour until smooth.
', 'Step 3: Gradually stir in the rest of the flour, until dough is smooth and workable.
', 'Step 4: Knead dough on a lightly floured surface for about 5 minutes, or until it is elastic.
', 'Step 5: Lay dough in a bowl containing 1 teaspoon olive oil, then flip the dough, cover and let rise for 40 minutes, or until almost doubled.
', 'Step 6: To Make Filling: While dough is rising, combine the ricotta cheese, Cheddar cheese, pepperoni, mushrooms and basil leaves in a large bowl.
', 'Step 7: Mix well, cover bowl and refrigerate to chill.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: When dough is ready, punch it down and separate it into 2 equal parts.
', 'Step 10: Roll parts out into thin circles on a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 11: Fill each circle with 1/2 of the cheese/meat filling and fold over, securing edges by folding in and pressing with a fork.
', 'Step 12: Brush the top of each calzone with egg and place on a lightly greased cookie sheet.
', 'Step 13: Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Serve hot.
']

Title: Meat-Lover's Slow Cooker Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 small onions, chopped', '¼ pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 pound ground beef', '1 teaspoon dried Italian herb seasoning', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon dried marjoram', '1 (29 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 (14.5 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes', '1 (14.5 ounce) can Italian-style stewed tomatoes', '¼ teaspoon dried thyme leaves', '¼ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '1 tablespoon white sugar']

', 'Step 2: Transfer the sausage and onions to a slow cooker.
', 'Step 3: In the same skillet, cook and stir the ground beef, Italian seasoning, 1 teaspoon of garlic powder, and marjoram, breaking the meat up as it cooks, until the meat is browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Transfer the ground beef into the slow cooker.
', 'Step 5: n Stir in the tomato sauce, tomato paste, diced tomatoes, stewed tomatoes, thyme, basil, oregano, and 2 teaspoons of garlic powder.
', 'Step 6: Set the cooker on Low, and cook the sauce for 8 hours.
', 'Step 7: About 15 minutes before serving, stir in the sugar.
', 'Step 8: Serve hot.

Title: Ciabatta
Ingredients: ['⅛ teaspoon active dry yeast', '2 tablespoons warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '⅓ cup warm water', '1 cup bread flour', '½ teaspoon active dry yeast', '2 tablespoons warm milk (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '⅔ cup warm water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cups bread flour', '1 ½ teaspoons salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To Make Sponge: In a small bowl stir together 1/8 teaspoon of the yeast and the warm water and let stand 5 minutes, or until creamy.
', 'Step 2: In a bowl stir together yeast mixture, 1/3 cup of the water, and 1 cup of the bread flour.
', 'Step 3: Stir 4 minutes, then cover bowl with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 4: Let sponge stand at cool room temperature for at least 12 hours and up to 1 day.
', 'Step 5: To Make Bread: In a small bowl stir together yeast and milk and let stand 5 minutes, or until creamy.
', 'Step 6: In bowl of a standing electric mixer fitted with dough hook blend together milk mixture, sponge, water, oil, and flour at low speed until flour is just moistened; add salt and mix until smooth and elastic, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Scrape dough into an oiled bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
', 'Step 8: Let dough rise at room temperature until doubled in bulk, about 1 1/2 hours.
', 'Step 9: (Dough will be sticky and full of air bubbles.
', 'Step 10: ) Turn dough out onto a well-floured work surface and cut in half.
', 'Step 11: Transfer each half to a parchment sheet and form into an irregular oval about 9 inches long.
', 'Step 12: Dimple loaves with floured fingers and dust tops with flour.
', 'Step 13: Cover loaves with a dampened kitchen towel.
', 'Step 14: Let loaves rise at room temperature until almost doubled in bulk, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
', 'Step 15: At least 45 minutes before baking ciabatta, put a baking stone on oven rack in lowest position in oven and preheat oven to 425 F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Transfer 1 loaf on its parchment to a rimless baking sheet with a long side of loaf parallel to far edge of baking sheet.
', 'Step 17: Line up far edge of baking sheet with far edge of stone or tiles, and tilt baking sheet to slide loaf with parchment onto back half of stone or tiles.
', 'Step 18: Transfer remaining loaf to front half of stone in a similar manner.
', 'Step 19: Bake ciabatta loaves 20 minutes, or until pale golden.
', 'Step 20: Cool loaves on a wire rack.
']

Title: Focaccia Bread
Ingredients: ['2 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon active dry yeast', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '1 pinch ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 cup water', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '1 cup mozzarella']

Title: Air Fryer Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients: ['½ cup Italian bread crumbs', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon onion powder', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '¼ cup flour', '2 large eggs eggs, beaten', '1 medium eggplant, sliced into 1/2-inch rounds', '1 cup marinara sauce, or more to taste', '8 slices mozzarella cheese, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, Italian seasoning, salt, basil, garlic powder, onion powder, and black pepper in a shallow bowl.
', 'Step 2: Place flour in a separate shallow bowl and beaten eggs in a third shallow bowl.
', 'Step 3: Dip sliced eggplant first in flour, then in beaten eggs, and finally coat with bread crumb mixture.
', 'Step 4: Place coated eggplant on a plate and let rest for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Preheat an air fryer to 370 degrees F (185 degrees C).
', 'Step 6: Place breaded eggplant rounds in the air fryer basket, making sure they are not touching; work in batches if necessary.
', 'Step 7: Cook for 8 to 10 minutes, flip each round, and cook until desired crispiness is achieved, 4 to 6 minutes more.
', 'Step 8: Top each eggplant round with marinara sauce and 1 slice mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 9: Place basket back in the air fryer and cook until cheese has started to melt, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Repeat with remaining eggplant, if necessary.
']

Title: How to Make Homemade Pizza Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 anchovy fillets', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh oregano leaves', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes (preferably San Marzano), crushed', 'salt to taste', '½ teaspoon white sugar', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper', '1 small pinch baking soda']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil over medium-low heat in a saucepan; stir anchovy fillets into olive oil and cook, stirring often, until the fillets begin to sizzle, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 2: Mix garlic into oil and cook just until fragrant, 1 minute more.
', 'Step 3: Add fresh oregano and reduce heat to low; cook until oregano is wilted, 2 or 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 4: n Mix red pepper flakes, dried oregano, and tomatoes into olive oil mixture.
', 'Step 5: Bring sauce to a simmer and season with salt, sugar, and black pepper.
', 'Step 6: Turn heat to low; simmer sauce until thickened and oil rises to the top, 35 to 40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 7: n Stir baking soda into pizza sauce, mixing until thoroughly combined.
']

Title: Shrimp Fettuccine Alfredo
Ingredients: ['1 pound fettuccini pasta', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 pound cooked shrimp - peeled and deveined', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup half-and-half', '6 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', 'salt to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 3: In a large skillet, cook and stir shrimp and garlic in the butter for about one minute.
', 'Step 4: Pour in half and half; stir.
', 'Step 5: Sprinkle Parmesan cheese in one tablespoon at a time, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 6: After all Parmesan is added, mix in parsley and salt.
', 'Step 7: Stir frequently making sure it does not boil.
', 'Step 8: Sauce will take a while to thicken.
', 'Step 9: When sauce has thickened, combine with cooked pasta noodles; serve hot.
']

Title: Chef John's Spaghetti al Tonno
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 anchovy fillet', '2 tablespoons capers', '3 cloves minced garlic', '½ cup dry white wine', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste', '3 cups crushed Italian (plum) tomatoes (such as San Marzano)', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '1 (7 ounce) can oil-packed tuna, drained', '¼ cup chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', '1 (12 ounce) package spaghetti', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir anchovy and capers in hot oil until anchovy crumbles, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Add garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 4: Pour white wine, oregano, and red pepper flakes into the skillet and increase heat to high; cook until mixture reduces and about 3 tablespoons of liquid remain, 2 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Stir tomatoes into the skillet and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 6: Season tomato mixture with salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to medium and simmer until slightly reduced, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir tuna and 1/4 cup parsley into tomato sauce, breaking up tuna with a wooden spoon while stirring.
', 'Step 9: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 11: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until almost cooked through and still slightly firm to the bite, 9 to 11 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Drain and transfer spaghetti back to the pot.
', 'Step 13: Pour tomato sauce over spaghetti into the pot; stir to combine, cover the pot with a lid, and let sit until spaghetti is cooked through, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Ladle spaghetti into bowls, drizzle with extra-virgin olive oil, and sprinkle Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese and parsley over the top.
']

Title: Capellini Pomodoro (Pasta with Fresh Tomato Sauce)
Ingredients: ['1 ½ pounds Roma tomatoes', '1 pound capellini pasta', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '4 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 leaves basil, thinly sliced']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Fill a large bowl with ice and cold water.
', 'Step 3: Score a shallow "x" in the bottom of the tomatoes.
', 'Step 4: Add tomatoes to the boiling water and cook uncovered until skin starts to peel off, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 5: Drain in a colander and immediately immerse in ice water for several minutes to stop the cooking process.
', 'Step 6: Peel tomatoes.
', 'Step 7: Transfer peeled tomatoes to a food mill, and process until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 9: Cook angel hair pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Drain, saving 1/4 cup of the pasta water for the sauce.
', 'Step 11: While pasta cooks, melt butter in a large skillet over low heat.
', 'Step 12: Add garlic and salt and cook until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Add pureed tomatoes and as much pasta water as desired.
', 'Step 14: Simmer until thickened, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 15: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
', 'Step 16: Divide pasta amongst 4 serving bowls.
', 'Step 17: Top with tomato sauce and sprinkle with fresh basil.
', 'Step 18: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Italian Easter Cookies
Ingredients: ['½ cup butter', '¾ cup white sugar', '3 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '¼ cup milk', '¼ cup vegetable oil', '3 ¾ cups all-purpose flour', '5 teaspoons baking powder', "4 cups confectioners' sugar", '½ cup butter, softened', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '3 tablespoons milk', '3 drops red food coloring']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease cookie sheets.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, cream together 1/2 cup butter and white sugar until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 4: Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1 teaspoon almond extract, 1/4 cup milk and oil.
', 'Step 5: Combine the flour and baking powder, stir into the wet mixture.
', 'Step 6: Roll dough into 1 inch balls.
', 'Step 7: On a lightly floured surface, roll the balls out into ropes about 5 inches long.
', 'Step 8: Tie into loose knots and place cookies 1 inch apart onto the prepared cookie sheets.
', 'Step 9: Bake for 5 minutes on the bottom shelf and 5 minutes on the top shelf of the preheated oven, until the bottoms of the cookies are golden brown.
', 'Step 10: When cookies are cool, dip them into the icing.
', "Step 11: To make the icing, cream together the confectioners' sugar, 1/2 cup butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1 teaspoon almond extracts.
", 'Step 12: Beat in 3 tablespoons milk, one tablespoon at a time, then stir in the food coloring if desired.
']

Title: Italian Lemon Coffee Cake
Ingredients: ['¼ cup sliced almonds', '2 eggs', '¾ cup white sugar', '½ cup vegetable oil', '¼ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice', '1 lemon, zested', '1 ½ cups all-purpose flour', '1 packet Lievito Pane Degli Angeli (such as Paneangeli®)', '⅓ cup powdered sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons lemon juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour a 6-cup, 7-1/2x3-inch Bundt® pan.
', 'Step 3: Sprinkle almonds evenly around the bottom of the pan.
', 'Step 4: Set aside.
', 'Step 5: Beat eggs and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl.
', 'Step 6: Add oil, lemon juice, and lemon zest; mix until well combined.
', 'Step 7: Gradually beat in flour until it has been incorporated.
', 'Step 8: Add Lievito and mix well.
', 'Step 9: Pour batter evenly into the prepared pan.
', 'Step 10: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 28 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Let cool for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Run a knife down the sides of the pan to assist in releasing the cake from the pan.
', 'Step 13: Place in the freezer for 20 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove from the freezer and invert cake onto a serving platter.
', 'Step 15: Mix powdered sugar and lemon juice in a small bowl until glaze is smooth.
', 'Step 16: Place glaze in a small resealable bag and snip the corner of the bag.
', 'Step 17: Drizzle glaze over the top of the cake.
']

Title: Spinach Basil Pesto
Ingredients: ['1 ½ cups baby spinach leaves', '¾ cup fresh basil leaves', '½ cup toasted pine nuts', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '4 cloves garlic, peeled and quartered', '¾ teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '½ teaspoon lemon zest', '½ cup extra-virgin olive oil']

Title: Mediterranean Chicken
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons white wine', '6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '½ cup diced onion', '3 cups tomatoes, chopped', '½ cup white wine', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '½ cup kalamata olives', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the oil and 2 tablespoons white wine in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add chicken and saute about 4 to 6 minutes each side, until golden.
', 'Step 3: Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Saute garlic in pan drippings for 30 seconds, then add onion and saute for 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add tomatoes and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Lower heat, add 1/2 cup white wine and simmer for 10 minutes.

', 'Step 8: Return chicken to skillet and cover.
', 'Step 9: Cook over low heat until the chicken is cooked through and no longer pink inside.

', 'Step 11: Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.
']

Title: Chef John's Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 ½ pounds lean ground beef', '1 (8 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, coarsely chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon dried Italian herb seasoning', '¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '6 cups prepared marinara sauce', '2 tablespoons water, plus more as needed', '2 eggs', '2 pounds whole-milk ricotta cheese', '1 (8 ounce) container fresh mozzarella cheese, diced', '⅔ cup freshly shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '1 teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '¼ cup chopped fresh parsley', '1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '1 (8 ounce) container fresh mozzarella cheese, diced', '½ cup freshly shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place sausage and ground beef into a large saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until meat is browned and crumbly, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Break the meat apart as it cooks.
', 'Step 3: Stir in mushrooms, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, Italian herb seasoning, and red pepper flakes.
', 'Step 4: Turn heat to medium-high and cook until mushrooms have given off their juices and bottom of pan is almost dry.
', 'Step 5: Pour prepared marinara sauce into meat mixture.
', 'Step 6: Pour water into marinara sauce jar and shake to get all the sauce out of the jar; add to mixture.
', 'Step 7: Reduce heat to low and simmer until meat is extremely tender, about 2 hours.
', 'Step 8: Add a little more water if sauce becomes too thick.
', 'Step 9: Skim excess fat from surface of the sauce and season with more salt and black pepper, if needed.
', 'Step 10: Turn off heat.
', 'Step 11: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 12: Beat eggs in a large bowl and stir in ricotta cheese, 8 ounces diced mozzarella cheese, and 2/3 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
', 'Step 13: Season cheese mixture with 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, and cayenne pepper; mix in parsley.
', 'Step 14: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 15: Cook lasagna in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Drain and rinse noodles and set aside in a bowl of cold water.
', 'Step 17: Spread 1/4 the sauce into the bottom of a 10x15-inch baking pan.
', 'Step 18: Top with 1/3 the noodles and spread 1/2 the ricotta cheese mixture over noodles.
', 'Step 19: Spread 1/4 the meat sauce over the cheese, top with 1/3 the noodles, and spread remaining 1/2 the ricotta mixture over the noodles.
', 'Step 20: Spread 1/4 the meat sauce over the cheese filling.
', 'Step 21: Tap the casserole dish lightly on a sturdy work surface to settle the layers.
', 'Step 22: Arrange last 1/3 the noodles over sauce and spread remaining 1/4 the sauce over the noodles.
', 'Step 23: Dot top of the casserole with 4 ounces diced fresh mozzarella cheese and sprinkle with 1/2 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
', 'Step 24: Cover casserole with aluminum foil, being sure not to touch the top of the casserole with the foil.
', 'Step 25: Place casserole onto a baking sheet to catch spills.
', 'Step 26: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
', 'Step 27: Remove foil and cook until lasagna is golden brown and bubbling, 30 to 35 more minutes.
', 'Step 28: Let set for 20 minutes before cutting into squares.
']

['Step 1: Preheat the broiler.

', 'Step 9: Serve at once.
']

Title: Hot Italian Giardiniera
Ingredients: ['2 green bell peppers, diced', '2 red bell peppers, diced', '8 fresh jalapeno peppers, sliced', '1 celery stalk, diced', '1 medium carrot, diced', '1 small onion, chopped', '½ cup fresh cauliflower florets', '½ cup salt', 'water to cover', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ teaspoon black pepper', '1 (5 ounce) jar pimento-stuffed green olives, chopped', '1 cup white vinegar', '1 cup olive oil']

', 'Step 3: Place plastic wrap or aluminum foil over the bowl, and refrigerate overnight.
', 'Step 4: n The next day, drain salty water, and rinse vegetables.

', 'Step 6: Pour in vinegar and olive oil, and mix well.

Title: Easter Grain Pie
Ingredients: ['5 cups water', '½ cup whole wheat berries', '6 eggs', '1 cup white sugar', '1 (8 ounce) package mixed candied fruit', '1 ½ pounds ricotta cheese', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest', '2 teaspoons grated orange zest', '1 tablespoon shortening', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 pastries for 9-inch lattice-top pies', "2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar for dusting"]
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring water to a boil in a large saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Pour in wheat and allow to boil 40 minutes.

', 'Step 4: Mix in fruit, ricotta, vanilla extract, cinnamon, lemon rind, and orange rind.
', 'Step 5: When wheat is ready, drain in a colander and rinse with warm water.
', 'Step 6: Place 3/4 cup of cooked wheat in a small bowl, and mix in shortening and salt.

', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Line two 9 inch pie pans with pastry.
', 'Step 10: Cut remaining pastry into strips for tops of pies.

', 'Step 13: Crimp edges.
', 'Step 14: Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes, until crust is golden brown.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle each pie with 1 tablespoon sugar and allow to cool at room temperature.
', 'Step 16: Chill overnight before serving.
', 'Step 17: Store any leftovers in refrigerator.
']

Title: Baked Italian Chicken Thighs
Ingredients: ['½ cup low-fat ricotta cheese', '¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '½ teaspoon Italian seasoning', '⅛ teaspoon salt', '1 pound skinless, boneless chicken thighs', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 ½ cups marinara sauce', '¾ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Combine ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, Italian seasoning, and salt in a small bowl and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Season chicken thighs on both sides with garlic powder and salt.
', 'Step 4: Heat olive oil in an oven-proof skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 5: Place chicken thighs, smooth-side down in pan and brown, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Flip thighs over and remove skillet from heat.
', 'Step 7: Top each thigh with an equal amount of ricotta cheese mixture.
', 'Step 8: Spoon marinara sauce over the ricotta cheese and around the chicken thighs.
', 'Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 25 minutes.
', 'Step 10: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 11: Remove from the oven and leave oven on.
', 'Step 12: Top chicken with mozzarella cheese and return to the oven until cheese has melted, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Garnish with parsley and serve.

Title: Homemade Mozzarella Cheese
Ingredients: ['¾ cup cool water, divided', '1/4 teaspoon liquid rennet', '1 ½ teaspoons citric acid', '1 gallon raw milk', '1 teaspoon salt']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine 1/4 cup water and rennet in a small bowl; mix well.
', 'Step 2: Combine remaining 1/2 cup water and citric acid in another small bowl; mix until dissolved.
', 'Step 3: Pour milk into a large pot set over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Stir in water-citric acid mixture.
', 'Step 5: Heat milk, stirring occasionally, until it registers 90 degrees F (32 degrees C) on an instant-read thermometer, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove milk from heat and stir in rennet mixture in a figure-8 motion for 30 seconds.
', 'Step 7: Stir counterclockwise for 30 seconds to still the milk.
', 'Step 8: Let stand, covered, until milk sets into curd, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Press edge of the curd gently with a palette knife or the back of a spoon to check for firmness.
', 'Step 10: Slice vertically into the pot to cut curd into 3/4-inch cubes with a palette knife.
', 'Step 11: Stir curds gently, but leave cubes mostly intact.
', 'Step 12: Return pot to the heat; cook over medium heat, stirring curds gently, until temperature reaches 109 degrees F (43 degrees C), about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 14: Ladle curds into a colander set over a large bowl using a slotted spoon.
', 'Step 15: Press curds gently to extract liquid whey.
', 'Step 16: Pour drained whey back into the pot.
', 'Step 17: Heat whey to 185 degrees F (85 degrees C), about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Wearing gloves, tear off a piece of curd and place on a slotted spoon.
', 'Step 19: Dip curd into hot whey for 5 to 10 seconds.
', 'Step 20: Stretch, fold, and knead the curd.
', 'Step 21: Repeat until mozzarella is smooth and elastic.
', 'Step 22: Knead in salt and form curd into a ball.
', 'Step 23: Repeat dipping and kneading process with remaining curd.
', 'Step 24: Allow mozzarella to cool.
', 'Step 25: Wrap tightly in plastic wrap and transfer to the refrigerator.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '195.2 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '15 g', 'cholesterolContent': '32.5 mg', 'fatContent': '10.6 g', 'proteinContent': '10.5 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '6.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '324.4 mg', 'sugarContent': '14.7 g'}

Title: Cheese Lasagna

Title: Pork Chops Italiano
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil', '2 cups sliced mushrooms', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '6 (3/4 inch thick) pork loin chops', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 cup chopped onion', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced Italian tomatoes, undrained', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '½ cup water, if necessary', '1 large green bell pepper, cut in 6 pieces']

Title: Chef John's Meatless Meatballs
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pound fresh white mushrooms, finely chopped', '1 pinch salt', '1 tablespoon butter', '½ cup finely chopped onion', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '½ cup quick-cooking oats', '1 ounce very finely shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '½ cup bread crumbs', '¼ cup chopped flat-leaf (Italian) parsley, packed', '2 eggs, divided', '1 teaspoon salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '1 pinch dried oregano', '3 cups pasta sauce', '1 tablespoon very finely shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped flat-leaf (Italian) parsley, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Add mushrooms to the hot oil, sprinkle with salt, and cook and stir until liquid from mushrooms has evaporated.
', 'Step 3: Stir butter into mushrooms, reduce heat to medium, and cook and stir mushrooms until golden brown, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Stir onion into mushrooms and cook, stirring often, until onion is translucent, 5 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove skillet from heat and stir garlic into mushroom mixture until fragrant, about 1 minute.
', 'Step 6: Transfer mixture to a mixing bowl.
', 'Step 7: Mix oats into mushroom mixture until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 8: Gently stir 1 ounce Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese into mixture.
', 'Step 9: Add bread crumbs, 1/4 cup parsley, and 1 egg; season with salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and oregano.
', 'Step 10: Mix together with a fork until crumbly.
', 'Step 11: Stir in remaining 1 egg.
', 'Step 12: Mixture should hold together when pressed.
', 'Step 13: Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 4 hours.
', 'Step 14: For best flavor and texture, refrigerate overnight.
', 'Step 15: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 16: Line a baking sheet with a silicone baking mat or parchment paper.
', 'Step 17: Form mixture into small meatballs using a 2-tablespoon scoop.
', 'Step 18: Roll meatballs lightly between your hands until smooth, if desired; arrange meatballs on prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 19: Bake in the preheated oven until meatballs are lightly golden brown, 12 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 20: Bring pasta sauce to a boil in a large saucepan; reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 21: Gently stir meatballs into sauce until coated.
', 'Step 22: Simmer meatballs in sauce until cooked through, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
', 'Step 23: Transfer to a serving bowl and garnish with 1 tablespoon Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese and 1 tablespoon parsley.
']

Title: Italian Carbonara with Bacon
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '12 slices thick-cut, applewood-smoked bacon', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 large cloves garlic, minced', '¼ cup dry vermouth', '1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '½ cup whipping cream', '4 eggs, beaten', '1 tablespoon ground black pepper']

']

Title: Basic Pasta

Title: Eggplant Caponata (Sicilian Version)
Ingredients: ['1 eggplant, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes', 'salt to taste', '¼ cup olive oil, divided', '1 cup finely chopped celery', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 ½ cups canned plum tomatoes, drained and coarsely chopped', '12 green olives, pitted and coarsely chopped', '1 ½ tablespoons drained capers', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 teaspoon minced oregano', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 teaspoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', 'ground black pepper to taste', '2 teaspoons minced fresh parsley, or to taste']

', 'Step 2: Let sit, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Rinse and pat dry.
', 'Step 4: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 5: Add celery; cook, stirring often, until softened, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until onion is soft and lightly golden, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Transfer mixture to a bowl using a slotted spoon.

']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Beat eggs with salt and pepper in a shallow dish.

Title: Limoncello
Ingredients: ['10 lemons', '1 liter vodka', '3 cups white sugar', '4 cups water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Zest the lemons, and place zest into a large glass bottle or jar.
', 'Step 2: Pour in vodka.
', 'Step 3: Cover loosely and let infuse for one week at room temperature.
', 'Step 4: After one week, combine sugar and water in a medium saucepan.
', 'Step 5: Bring to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Do not stir.
', 'Step 7: Boil for 15 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Allow syrup to cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 9: Stir vodka mixture into syrup.
', 'Step 10: Strain into glass bottles, and seal each bottle with a cork.
', 'Step 11: Let mixture age for 2 weeks at room temperature.
', 'Step 12: Place bottled liqueur into the freezer.
', 'Step 13: When icy cold, serve in chilled vodka glasses or shot glasses.
']

Title: Instant Pot® Chicken Cacciatore
Ingredients: ['4 (6 ounce) bone-in chicken thighs, with skin', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 stalks celery, chopped', '½ onion, chopped', '1 (4 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (14 ounce) can stewed tomatoes', '2 teaspoons herbes de Provence', '¾ cup water', '3 cubes chicken bouillon, crumbled', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '1 pinch ground black pepper to taste']

['Step 1: Rinse chicken thighs and pat dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 2: Heat oil in the pot of an electric pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) on "Saute" mode; add chicken.

', 'Step 10: Close and lock the lid.
', "Step 11: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions.
", 'Step 12: Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.
', 'Step 13: Cook for 11 minutes.
', "Step 14: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes.
", 'Step 15: Unlock and remove lid carefully, turning it away from you.

', 'Step 17: Season the chicken to taste with red pepper flakes and black pepper.
']

Title: Spinach Lasagna III
Ingredients: ['20 lasagna noodles', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cup chopped fresh mushrooms', '1 cup chopped onion', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '2 cups fresh spinach', '3 cups ricotta cheese', '⅔ cup grated Romano cheese', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil leaves', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 egg', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '3 cups tomato pasta sauce', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.

']

Title: How to Make Bolognese Sauce
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 cup finely diced onion', '½ cup finely diced celery', '½ cup finely diced carrot', '1 pinch salt', '1 ½ pounds ground beef', 'salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 ½ cups 2% milk', '2 cups white wine', '1 (28 ounce) can whole Italian plum tomatoes (preferably San Marzano)', '2 cups water, or as needed']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter with olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat; cook onion, celery, and carrot with pinch of salt until onion turns translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Stir ground beef into vegetables and cook, stirring constantly until meat is crumbly and no longer pink, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Season meat mixture with 1 1/2 teaspoon salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and nutmeg.
', 'Step 4: Pour milk into ground beef mixture and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 5: Cook, stirring often, until most of the milk has evaporated and bottom of pan is still slightly saucy, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Raise heat to medium high and pour white wine into ground beef mixture; cook and stir until white wine has mostly evaporated, about 5 more minutes.
', 'Step 7: Pour tomatoes with juice into a large mixing bowl and crush them with your fingers until they resemble a slightly chunky sauce.
', 'Step 8: Pour tomatoes into sauce; fill can with 2 cups water and add to sauce.
', 'Step 9: Bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 10: Reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring often, until mixture cooks down into a thick sauce, at least 3 hours but preferably 4 to 6 hours.
', 'Step 11: Skim fat from top of sauce if desired.
', 'Step 12: If sauce is too thick or too hot on the bottom, add a little more water.
', 'Step 13: Taste and adjust seasonings before serving.
']

Title: Baked Ziti with Sausage
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package dry ziti pasta', '1 pound mild Italian sausage', '1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 egg', '1 large yellow onion, minced', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 ½ (26 ounce) jars spaghetti sauce, divided', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded Italian cheese blend', '1 teaspoon dried basil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 4: Once the water is boiling, stir in the ziti, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain well in a colander set in the sink.
', 'Step 7: While pasta is cooking, heat a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 8: Add the sausage, and cook and stir until brown, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain sausage and set aside.
', 'Step 10: Stir together the ricotta, egg, onion, garlic, and oregano in a large bowl until well combined.
', 'Step 11: Stir in the drained pasta, the drained sausage, salt, pepper, and 1/2 jar of the spaghetti sauce; mix well.
', 'Step 12: In the prepared baking dish, cover the bottom with 1/3 jar of spaghetti sauce.
', 'Step 13: Layer 1/2 of the pasta mixture, 1/3 jar of spaghetti sauce, and 1/2 of the shredded cheese.
', 'Step 14: Then layer the remaining 1/2 of the pasta, 1/3 of the sauce, and 1/2 of the cheese.
', 'Step 15: Sprinkle with basil.
', 'Step 16: Cover the dish tightly with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 17: Bake in the preheated oven until heated through, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Uncover; return to the oven and bake until cheese is melted, 5 to 10 more minutes.
']
