Title: Biscotti
Ingredients: ['½ cup vegetable oil', '1 cup white sugar', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon anise extract, or 3 drops anise oil', '3 ¼ cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease cookie sheets or line with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: In a medium bowl, beat together oil, sugar, eggs, and anise flavoring until well blended.
', 'Step 4: Combine flour and baking powder; stir into the egg mixture to form a heavy dough.
', 'Step 5: Divide dough into two pieces.
', 'Step 6: Form each piece into a roll as long as your cookie sheet.
', 'Step 7: Place rolls on the prepared pans, and press down to 1/2-inch thickness.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 25 to 30 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove cookies from the pans to cool on wire racks.
', 'Step 10: When cookies are cool enough to handle, slice each one crosswise into 1/2-inch-thick slices.
', 'Step 11: Place slices cut-sides up on the pans.
', 'Step 12: Bake for an additional 6 to 10 minutes on each side.

Title: Bow Ties with Sausage, Tomatoes and Cream
Ingredients: ['1 (12 ounce) package bow tie pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound sweet Italian sausage, casings removed and crumbled', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', '½ cup diced onion', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (28 ounce) can Italian-style plum tomatoes, drained and coarsely chopped', '1 ½ cups heavy cream', '½ teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons minced fresh parsley']

['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Cook pasta in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain.

Title: Artichoke Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '9 uncooked lasagna noodles', '1 onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 (14.5 ounce) can vegetable broth', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1 (14 ounce) can marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped', '1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed, drained and squeezed dry', '1 (28 ounce) jar tomato pasta sauce', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '1 (4 ounce) package herb and garlic feta, crumbled']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Spray a 9x13 inch baking dish with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Add noodles and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
', 'Step 5: Spray a large skillet with cooking spray and heat on medium-high.
', 'Step 6: Saute onion and garlic for 3 minutes, or until onion is tender-crisp.
', 'Step 7: Stir in broth and rosemary; bring to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Stir in artichoke hearts and spinach; reduce heat, cover and simmer 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in pasta sauce.

', 'Step 13: Sprinkle crumbled feta on top.

Title: Pasta Salad with Homemade Dressing
Ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package uncooked tri-color rotini pasta', '6 ounces pepperoni sausage, diced', '6 ounces provolone cheese, cubed', '1 medium red onion, very thinly sliced and cut into 1-inch pieces', '1 small cucumber, thinly sliced', '¾ cup chopped green bell pepper', '¾ cup chopped red bell pepper', '1 (6 ounce) can pitted black olives, drained', '¼ cup minced fresh parsley', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '½ cup olive oil', '¼ cup red wine vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon ground mustard seed', '¼ teaspoon salt', '⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add rotini and cook until tender yet firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain, rinse with cold water, and drain again.
', 'Step 4: Transfer drained, cooked pasta to a large bowl.
', 'Step 5: Add pepperoni, provolone cheese, red onion, cucumber, bell peppers, olives, parsley, and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 6: Mix olive oil, vinegar, garlic, basil, oregano, ground mustard, salt, and pepper for dressing in a jar with a lid.
', 'Step 7: Seal the jar, and shake until well combined.
', 'Step 8: Pour dressing over the pasta salad; toss until well coated.
', 'Step 9: Serve immediately, or cover and chill in the refrigerator for up to 8 hours before serving.
']

Title: Pizzagaina
Ingredients: ['4 unbaked 9-inch pie crusts, divided', '2 (16 ounce) containers whole-milk ricotta cheese', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 eggs', '¼ pound pepperoni', '½ pound sweet capicola (coppa)', '½ pound hot capicola (coppa)', '1 egg white, slightly beaten']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Press 1 pie crust each into the bottom of two 9-inch pie pans.
', 'Step 3: Mix ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, and eggs together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Roughly chop the pepperoni, sweet capicola and hot capicola; fold in chopped meats.
', 'Step 5: Spoon half the mixture into each of the 2 prepared pie pans.
', 'Step 6: Top each pie with a pie crust, crimping the edges together creating a seal.
', 'Step 7: Brush the top of each pie with egg white.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven until crust is golden brown, 45 to 60 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Let cool for about 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: The Best Baked Ziti
Ingredients: ['¾ pound hot Italian sausage', '¾ pound sweet Italian sausage', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large yellow onion, diced', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon dried thyme', '¼ teaspoon dried rosemary', '2 (24 ounce) jars prepared marinara sauce', '2 cups water', '1 (16 ounce) package ziti pasta', '1 drizzle olive oil', '1 ½ cups whole-milk ricotta cheese', '8 ounces mozzarella cheese, cut into small cubes', '1 cup grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '1 teaspoon chopped flat-leaf (Italian) parsley, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Cut down the length of each sausage with a sharp knife.
', 'Step 2: Remove and discard casings.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan set over high heat.
', 'Step 4: Add sausages and onion.
', 'Step 5: Cook, stirring occasionally and breaking up with a spatula, until the sausage begins to brown, and the onion turns translucent, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add oregano, thyme, and rosemary and cook for 1 minute more.
', 'Step 7: Pour in marinara sauce.
', 'Step 8: Pour 1 cup water into each jar to rinse out remaining sauce; add to the saucepan.
', 'Step 9: Stir together and bring sauce to a simmer.
', 'Step 10: Reduce the heat to medium-low, and let simmer, stirring occasionally, for 1 hour.
', 'Step 11: Taste for seasoning and adjust if needed.
', 'Step 12: Turn off heat and reserve until needed.
', 'Step 13: Before using, skim any excess fat that rises to the surface.
', 'Step 14: While sauce simmers, bring a large pot of generously salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 15: Add ziti and cook, stirring occasionally, for 1 or 2 minutes less than the directions on the package call for, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Drain well and transfer into a large mixing bowl.
', 'Step 17: Carefully add the meat sauce and stir until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 18: Let rest for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 20: Grease a large 9x15-inch or 9x13-inch casserole dish with a drizzle of olive oil.
', 'Step 21: Use a slotted spoon to transfer half of the pasta and sauce mixture to the prepared dish, then use a spatula to even out into a uniform layer.
', 'Step 22: Top with 1/2 of the ricotta cheese, 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese, and then 1/2 of the grated Pecorino Romano cheese, being sure to distribute evenly.
', 'Step 23: Top with the rest of the pasta and sauce mixture and give the pan a little shake to settle the sauce.
', 'Step 24: Repeat the cheese application.
', 'Step 25: Bake in the center of the preheated oven until the cheese is melted and the casserole is piping hot, 30 to 35 minutes.
', 'Step 26: Remove from the oven and let cool 10 to 15 minutes before serving.
', 'Step 27: Top with parsley.
']

Title: Refreshing Limoncello Cake
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '1 cup plain yogurt', '2 eggs', '⅓ cup canola oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons lemon zest', '1 cup sugar', '¼ cup limoncello liqueur', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 ½ teaspoons baking powder', '½ teaspoon baking soda', '1 pinch salt', "¾ cup confectioners' sugar", '3 tablespoons limoncello liqueur']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Prepare an 8-inch cake pan with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Whisk together the yogurt, eggs, canola oil, lemon juice, lemon zest, sugar, and 4 tablespoons limoncello in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: In a separate large bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
', 'Step 5: Gently stir the dry ingredients into the wet.
', 'Step 6: Do not over mix or the cake will be tough.
', 'Step 7: Pour batter into prepared pan.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven until top is golden and a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean, about 35 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly.
', 'Step 10: Stir the powdered sugar and 3 tablespoons of limoncello together in a small bowl until smooth.
', 'Step 11: Poke small holes all over the top of the still-warm cake with a fork or toothpick.
', 'Step 12: Spoon the glaze over the cake and spread with the back of a spoon.
', 'Step 13: The glaze will seep into the cake and add moisture.
']

Title: Mama's Italian Wedding Soup
Ingredients: ['1 pound extra-lean ground beef', '2 eggs, beaten', '¼ cup dried bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '3 tablespoons minced onion', '2 ½ quarts chicken broth', '2 cups spinach - packed, rinsed and thinly sliced', '1 cup seashell pasta', '¾ cup diced carrots']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium bowl, combine the beef, egg, bread crumbs, cheese, basil and onion.
', 'Step 2: Shape mixture into 3/4-inch balls and set aside.
', 'Step 3: In a large stockpot heat chicken broth to boiling; stir in the spinach, pasta, carrot and meatballs.
', 'Step 4: Return to boil; reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 5: Cook, stirring frequently, at a slow boil for 10 minutes or until pasta is al dente, and meatballs are no longer pink inside.
', 'Step 6: Serve hot with Parmesan cheese sprinkled on top.
']

Title: Chicken Parmigiana
Ingredients: ['1 egg, beaten', '2 ounces dry bread crumbs', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '¾ (16 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '2 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a medium baking sheet.
', 'Step 3: Pour egg into a small shallow bowl.
', 'Step 4: Place bread crumbs in a separate shallow bowl.
', 'Step 5: Dip chicken into egg, then into the bread crumbs.
', 'Step 6: Place coated chicken on the prepared baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 40 minutes, or until no longer pink and juices run clear.
', 'Step 7: Pour 1/2 of the spaghetti sauce into a 7x11 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 8: Place chicken over sauce, and cover with remaining sauce.
', 'Step 9: Sprinkle mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses on top and return to the preheated oven for 20 minutes.
']

Title: Sausage, Potato and Kale Soup
Ingredients: ['1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '4 cups half-and-half', '3 cups cubed potatoes', '2 cups low-sodium chicken broth', '2 cups whole milk', '1 onion, chopped', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or more to taste', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 cups torn kale leaves (bite-size pieces)']

['Step 1: Heat a large soup pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Crumble sausage into pot; cook and stir until browned, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain and discard grease.
', 'Step 4: Stir half-and-half, potatoes, chicken broth, milk, onion, oregano, and red pepper flakes into sausage, bring to a boil, and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 5: Simmer until potatoes are tender, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Season with black pepper; stir kale into soup.
', 'Step 7: Simmer until kale is tender, 10 to 15 more minutes.
']

Title: Pasta Fazool (Pasta e Fagioli)
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '12 ounces sweet bulk Italian sausage', '1 stalk celery, diced', '½ yellow onion, chopped', '¾ cup dry elbow macaroni', '¼ cup tomato paste', '3 cups chicken broth, or more as needed, divided', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon dried oregano', '3 cups chopped Swiss chard', '1 (15 ounce) can cannellini (white kidney) beans, drained', '¼ cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, plus additional for serving, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Brown sausage while breaking it into small pieces, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat to medium.
', 'Step 4: Add diced celery and chopped onion.
', 'Step 5: Cook until onions are translucent, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add dry pasta.
', 'Step 7: Cook and stir 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Stir in tomato paste until evenly distributed, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Add 3 cups broth.
', 'Step 10: Raise heat to high and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 11: Add salt, black pepper, pepper flakes, and oregano.
', 'Step 12: When soup comes to a boil, reduce heat to medium and let it simmer about 5 minutes, stirring often.
', 'Step 13: Check soup consistency and add more broth, if needed.
', 'Step 14: Place chopped chard in a bowl.
', 'Step 15: Cover with cold water and rinse the leaves; any grit will fall to the bottom of the bowl.
', 'Step 16: Transfer chard to colander to drain briefly; add to soup.
', 'Step 17: Cook and stir until leaves wilt, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Stir in white beans; continue cooking and stirring until pasta is perfectly cooked, another 4 or 5 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Remove from heat and stir in grated cheese.
', 'Step 20: Serve topped with grated cheese, if desired.
']

Title: Italian Sausage Soup
Ingredients: ['1 pound Italian sausage', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 (14 ounce) cans beef broth', '1 (14.5 ounce) can Italian-style stewed tomatoes', '1 cup sliced carrots', '1 (14.5 ounce) can great Northern beans, undrained', '2 small zucchini, cubed', '2 cups spinach - packed, rinsed and torn', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '¼ teaspoon salt']

['Step 1: In a stockpot or Dutch oven, brown sausage with garlic.
', 'Step 2: Stir in broth, tomatoes and carrots, and season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 15 minutes.

', 'Step 5: Cover, and simmer another 15 minutes, or until zucchini is tender.

', 'Step 8: Soup is ready to serve after 5 minutes.

Title: Tiramisu Layer Cake
Ingredients: ['1 (18.25 ounce) package moist white cake mix', '1 teaspoon instant coffee powder', '¼ cup coffee', '1 tablespoon coffee flavored liqueur', '1 (8 ounce) container mascarpone cheese', "½ cup confectioners' sugar", '2 tablespoons coffee flavored liqueur', '2 cups heavy cream', "¼ cup confectioners' sugar", '2 tablespoons coffee flavored liqueur', '2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 (1 ounce) square semisweet chocolate']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease and flour 3 (9 inch) pans.
', 'Step 3: Prepare the cake mix according to package directions.
', 'Step 4: Divide two thirds of batter between 2 pans.
', 'Step 5: Stir instant coffee into remaining batter; pour into remaining pan.
', 'Step 6: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
', 'Step 7: Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely.
', 'Step 8: In a measuring cup, combine brewed coffee and 1 tablespoon coffee liqueur; set aside.
', "Step 9: To make the filling: In a small bowl, using an electric mixer set on low speed, combine mascarpone, 1/2 cup confectioners' sugar and 2 tablespoons coffee liqueur; beat just until smooth.
", 'Step 10: Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate.
', "Step 11: To make the frosting: In a medium bowl, using an electric mixer set on medium-high speed, beat the cream, 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar and 2 tablespoons coffee liqueur until stiff.
", 'Step 12: Fold 1/2 cup of cream mixture into filling mixture.
', 'Step 13: To assemble the cake: Place one plain cake layer on a serving plate.
', 'Step 14: Using a thin skewer, poke holes in cake, about 1 inch apart.
', 'Step 15: Pour one third of reserved coffee mixture over cake, then spread with half of the filling mixture.
', 'Step 16: Top with coffee-flavored cake layer; poke holes in cake.
', 'Step 17: Pour another third of the coffee mixture over the second layer and spread with the remaining filling.
', 'Step 18: Top with remaining cake layer; poke holes in cake.
', 'Step 19: Pour remaining coffee mixture on top.
', 'Step 20: Spread sides and top of cake with frosting.
', 'Step 21: Place cocoa in a sieve and lightly dust top of cake.
', 'Step 22: Garnish with chocolate curls.
', 'Step 23: Refrigerate at least 30 minutes before serving.
', 'Step 24: To make the chocolate curls, use a vegetable peeler and run it down the edge of the chocolate bar.
']

Title: Slow Cooker Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound lean ground beef', '1 medium onion, chopped', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', '1 (29 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 (12 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '12 ounces cottage cheese', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '16 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese']

Title: Slow Cooker Italian Beef for Sandwiches

Title: Spinach Alfredo Sauce (Better than Olive Garden®)
Ingredients: ['½ cup butter', '¾ cup thawed frozen chopped spinach', '1 pint heavy whipping cream', '3 tablespoons cream cheese', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste']

Title: White Cheese Chicken Lasagna
Ingredients: ['9 lasagna noodles', '½ cup butter', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 cups chicken broth', '1 ½ cups milk', '4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 cups ricotta cheese', '2 cups cubed, cooked chicken meat', '2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese for topping']

', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.

Title: Classic and Simple Meat Lasagna
Ingredients: ['12 whole wheat lasagna noodles', '1 pound lean ground beef', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dried oregano, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package cottage cheese', '2 eggs', '½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese', '1 ½ (25 ounce) jars tomato-basil pasta sauce', '2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 3: Once the water is boiling, add the lasagna noodles a few at a time, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 4: Cook the pasta uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Remove the noodles to a plate.
', 'Step 6: Place the ground beef into a skillet over medium heat, add the garlic, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and black pepper to the skillet.
', 'Step 7: Cook the meat, chopping it into small chunks as it cooks, until no longer pink, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Drain excess grease.
', 'Step 9: In a bowl, mix the cottage cheese, eggs, and Parmesan cheese until thoroughly combined.
', 'Step 10: Place 4 noodles side by side into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking pan; top with a layer of the tomato-basil sauce, a layer of ground beef mixture, and a layer of the cottage cheese mixture.
', 'Step 11: Repeat layers twice more, ending with a layer of sauce; sprinkle top with the mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 12: Cover the dish with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven until the casserole is bubbling and the cheese has melted, about 30 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Remove foil and bake until cheese has begun to brown, about 10 more minutes.
', 'Step 15: Allow to stand at least 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Cioppino

Title: Ricotta Pie (Old Italian Recipe)
Ingredients: ['12 large eggs eggs', '2 cups white sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '3 pounds ricotta cheese', '¼ cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips, or to taste', '4 cups all-purpose flour', '5 teaspoons baking powder', '1 cup white sugar', '½ cup shortening, chilled', '1 tablespoon shortening, chilled', '4 large eggs eggs, lightly beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon milk']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Beat the 12 eggs, 2 cups sugar and vanilla extract together in a large bowl.
', "Step 2: Stir in the ricotta cheese and the chocolate chips, if using (see Cook's Note).
", 'Step 3: Set aside.
', 'Step 4: Combine the flour, baking powder, and 1 cup sugar together.
', 'Step 5: Cut in 1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon shortening until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
', 'Step 6: Mix in 4 beaten eggs and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract.
', 'Step 7: Divide dough into 4 balls, wrap in plastic, and chill for at least 30 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
', 'Step 9: Grease two deep-dish pie plates.
', 'Step 10: Roll out 2 of the balls to fit into the pie pans.
', 'Step 11: Do not make the crust too thick, as it will expand during cooking.
', 'Step 12: Do not flute the edges of the dough.
', 'Step 13: Roll out the other 2 balls of dough and cut each into 8 narrow strips for the top of the crust.
', 'Step 14: (Alternately, you can use cookie cutters and place the cutouts on the top of the pies.
', 'Step 15: ) Pour the ricotta filling evenly into the pie crusts.
', 'Step 16: Top each pie with 8 narrow strips of dough or cookie cut-outs.
', 'Step 17: Brush top of pie with milk for shine, if desired.
', 'Step 18: Place foil on the edge of crust.
', 'Step 19: Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 30 minutes; remove foil.
', 'Step 20: Rotate pies on the rack so they will bake evenly.
', 'Step 21: Continue to bake until a knife inserted in the center of each pie comes out clean, 25 to 30 minutes more.
', 'Step 22: Cool completely on wire racks.
', 'Step 23: Refrigerate until serving.
']

Title: Traditional Osso Buco

Title: Cannoli
Ingredients: ['3 cups all-purpose flour', '¼ cup white sugar', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3 tablespoons shortening', '1 egg', '1 egg yolk', '½ cup sweet Marsala wine', '1 tablespoon distilled white vinegar', '2 tablespoons water', '1 egg white', '1 quart oil for frying, or as needed', '1 (32 ounce) container ricotta cheese', "½ cup confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon lemon zest, or to taste', '4 ounces semisweet chocolate, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium bowl, mix together the flour, sugar and cinnamon.
', 'Step 2: Cut in the shortening until it is in pieces no larger than peas.
', 'Step 3: Make a well in the center, and pour in the egg, egg yolk, Marsala wine, vinegar and water.
', 'Step 4: Mix with a fork until the dough becomes stiff, then finish it by hand, kneading on a clean surface.
', 'Step 5: Add a bit more water if needed to incorporate all of the dry ingredients.
', 'Step 6: Knead for about 10 minutes, then cover and refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours.
', 'Step 7: Divide the cannoli dough into thirds, and flatten each one just enough to get through the pasta machine.
', 'Step 8: Roll the dough through successively thinner settings until you have reached the thinnest setting.
', 'Step 9: Dust lightly with flour if necessary.
', 'Step 10: Place the sheet of dough on a lightly floured surface.
', 'Step 11: Using a form or large glass or bowl, cut out 4 to 5 inch circles.
', 'Step 12: Dust the circles with a light coating of flour.
', 'Step 13: This will help you later in removing the shells from the tubes.
', 'Step 14: Roll dough around cannoli tubes, sealing the edge with a bit of egg white.
', 'Step 15: Heat the oil to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) in a deep-fryer or deep heavy skillet.
', 'Step 16: Fry shells on the tubes a few at a time for 2 to 3 minutes, until golden.
', 'Step 17: Use tongs to turn as needed.
', 'Step 18: Carefully remove using the tongs, and place on a cooling rack set over paper towels.
', 'Step 19: Cool just long enough that you can handle the tubes, then carefully twist the tube to remove the shell.
', 'Step 20: Using a tea towel may help you get a better grip.
', 'Step 21: Wash or wipe off the tubes, and use them for more shells.
', 'Step 22: Cooled shells can be placed in an airtight container and kept for up to 2 months.
', 'Step 23: You should only fill them immediately or up to 1 hours before serving.
', "Step 24: To make the filling, stir together the ricotta cheese and confectioners' sugar using a spoon.
", 'Step 25: Fold in lemon zest and chocolate.
', 'Step 26: Use a pastry bag to pipe into shells, filling from the center to one end, then doing the same from the other side.
', "Step 27: Dust with additional confectioners' sugar and grated chocolate for garnish when serving.
"]

Title: Spaghetti alla Carbonara: the Traditional Italian Recipe
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 pound guanciale (cured pork cheek), diced', '1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti', '3 eggs', '10 tablespoons grated Pecorino Romano cheese, divided', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
["Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; add guanciale (see Cook's Note).
", 'Step 2: Cook, turning occasionally, until evenly browned and crispy, 5 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat and drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 4: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 5: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, about 9 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Drain and return to the pot.
', 'Step 7: Let cool, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Whisk eggs, half of the Pecorino Romano cheese, and some black pepper in a bowl until smooth and creamy.
', 'Step 9: Pour egg mixture over pasta, stirring quickly, until creamy and slightly cooled.
', 'Step 10: Stir in guanciale.
', 'Step 11: Top with remaining Pecorino Romano cheese and more black pepper.
']

Title: Quick Italian Pasta Salad
Ingredients: ['1 (12 ounce) package tri-color rotini pasta', '¾ pound Italian salami, finely diced', '½ green bell pepper, sliced', '½ red bell pepper, sliced', '½ red onion, chopped', '1 cup Italian-style salad dressing', '1 (6 ounce) can sliced black olives', '8 ounces small fresh mozzarella balls (ciliegine)', '3 (.7 ounce) packages dry Italian-style salad dressing mix, or to taste', '½ cup shredded Parmesan cheese']

', 'Step 3: Mix dry salad dressing into pasta; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

Title: Johnny Marzetti Casserole
Ingredients: ['8 ounces rotini pasta', '1 pound ground beef', '½ pound bulk mild Italian sausage', '¾ cup chopped onion', '¼ cup chopped celery', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon minced green bell pepper', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (14.4 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '2 cups shredded Italian cheese blend', '1 ½ cups shredded sharp Cheddar cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 3: Add pasta and cook until just al dente, 6 to 8 minutes; drain.
', 'Step 4: Run cold water over the pasta to stop pasta from cooking further.
', 'Step 5: Set aside.
', 'Step 6: Meanwhile, cook the ground beef and sausage until completely browned and crumbled, 7 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Mix in the onion, celery, garlic, and pepper; continue to cook and stir another 5 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Season with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Remove from heat and stir in tomatoes and tomato sauce.
', 'Step 10: Allow to cool five minutes.
', 'Step 11: Lightly grease a large casserole dish.
', 'Step 12: Spread the pasta over the bottom of the dish.
', 'Step 13: Sprinkle the Italian cheese blend over the pasta.
', 'Step 14: Pour the meat mixture over the pasta and cheese.
', 'Step 15: Cover dish with heavy aluminum foil.
', 'Step 16: Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes; remove foil and sprinkle Cheddar cheese evenly over the casserole.
', 'Step 17: Continue baking until Cheddar cheese has melted, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Rest for 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Tender Italian Baked Chicken

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: In a bowl, mix the mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, and garlic powder.
', 'Step 3: Place bread crumbs in a separate bowl.
', 'Step 4: Dip chicken into the mayonnaise mixture, then into the bread crumbs to coat.
', 'Step 5: Arrange coated chicken on a baking sheet.
', 'Step 6: Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until chicken juices run clear and coating is golden brown.
']

Title: Fried Mozzarella Cheese Sticks
Ingredients: ['2 eggs, beaten', '¼ cup water', '1 ½ cups Italian seasoned bread crumbs', '½ teaspoon garlic salt', '⅔ cup all-purpose flour', '⅓ cup cornstarch', '1 quart oil for deep frying', '1 (16 ounce) package mozzarella cheese sticks']

['Step 1: In a small bowl, mix the eggs and water.
', 'Step 2: Mix the bread crumbs and garlic salt in a medium bowl.
', 'Step 3: In a separate medium bowl, blend the flour and cornstarch.
', 'Step 4: In a large heavy saucepan, heat the oil to 365 degrees F (185 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: One at a time, coat each mozzarella stick in the flour mixture, then the egg mixture, then in the bread crumbs and finally into the oil.
', 'Step 6: Fry until golden brown, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 7: Remove from heat and drain on paper towels.
']

Title: Chef John's Zabaglione
Ingredients: ['½ cup strawberries - hulled, halved and sliced', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '3 large egg yolks', '3 tablespoons white sugar', '¼ cup dry Marsala wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Gently stir the strawberries and sugar together in a bowl.
', 'Step 2: Cover and let sit at room temperature until juices release, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 3: Divide fruit between 2 small, clear serving bowls or stemmed cocktail glasses.
', 'Step 4: Place egg yolks, sugar, and marsala into metal mixing bowl.
', 'Step 5: Set over burner on low heat.
', 'Step 6: Hold rim of bowl with a potholder.
', 'Step 7: Whisk until mixture forms loose peaks, 7 or 8 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Mixture should feel warm to the touch.
', 'Step 9: Spoon custard over the strawberries.
', 'Step 10: Serve while custard is still warm.
']

Title: Easter Meat Pie
Ingredients: ['4 (9 inch) unbaked pie crusts', '2 pounds ricotta cheese', '6 eggs', '8 ounces mozzarella cheese, grated', '1 pound cooked ham, chopped', '½ pound Genoa salami, chopped', '¼ pound prosciutto, chopped', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese']

', 'Step 2: Place ricotta in a large mixing bowl and add eggs one at a time while mixing on low speed.

Title: Quick Chicken Piccata
Ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', 'cayenne pepper, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', 'all-purpose flour for dredging', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon capers, drained', '½ cup white wine', '¼ cup fresh lemon juice', '¼ cup water', '3 tablespoons cold unsalted butter, cut in 1/4-inch slices', '2 tablespoons fresh Italian parsley, chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place chicken breasts between 2 layers of plastic wrap and pound to about 1/2-inch thick.
', 'Step 2: Season both sides of chicken breasts with cayenne, salt, and black pepper; dredge lightly in flour and shake off any excess.
', 'Step 3: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Place chicken in the pan, reduce heat to medium, and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes per side; remove to a plate.
', 'Step 5: Cook capers in reserved oil, smashing them lightly to release brine, until warmed though, about 30 seconds.
', 'Step 6: Pour white wine into skillet.
', 'Step 7: Scrape any browned bits from the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 8: Cook until reduced by half, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir lemon juice, water, and butter into the reduced wine mixture; cook and stir continuously to form a thick sauce, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Reduce heat to low and stir parsley through the sauce.
', 'Step 11: Return chicken breasts to the pan cook until heated through, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Serve with sauce spooned over the top.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '320.6 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '8.4 g', 'cholesterolContent': '87.5 mg', 'fatContent': '18.2 g', 'fiberContent': '0.4 g', 'proteinContent': '24.7 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '7.2 g', 'sodiumContent': '223.6 mg', 'sugarContent': '0.7 g'}

Title: Chicken and Shrimp Carbonara
Ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-sized pieces', '3 tablespoons minced garlic, divided', '2 tablespoons Italian seasoning', '1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta', '8 slices smoked bacon, diced', '1 onion, diced', '1 ½ cups heavy whipping cream', '1 ½ cups grated Parmesan cheese', '4 egg yolks', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '¼ cup Sauvignon Blanc wine']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Cook and stir chicken with 1 tablespoon garlic and 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning, until cooked through, 6 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Transfer chicken to a bowl and set aside.
', 'Step 4: Heat 1 tablespoon garlic and 1 tablespoon olive oil in the same pan.
', 'Step 5: Fry shrimp until red on the outside and white on the inside, 6 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Place with the chicken.
', 'Step 7: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and add remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil.
', 'Step 8: Cook linguine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Drain.
', 'Step 10: Add bacon to the pan; cook until just crispy, not crunchy, about 6 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Drain on 2 paper towels.
', 'Step 12: Saute onion in the bacon grease until translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 13: While onion is sauteeing, mix cream, Parmesan cheese, egg yolks, salt, pepper, and remaining Italian seasoning together in a bowl.
', 'Step 14: Pour wine into the pan with the onions.
', 'Step 15: Increase heat and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 16: Cook until wine is mostly evaporated, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 17: Add the creamy egg mixture and reduce heat.
', 'Step 18: Simmer until sauce begins to thicken, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Add the chicken and shrimp; mix to coat.
', 'Step 20: Serve on top of pasta.
']

Title: Homemade Sweet Italian Sausage (Mild or Hot)
Ingredients: ['3 pounds ground pork', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon freshly cracked black pepper', '1 ¼ tablespoons dried parsley', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '2 teaspoons paprika', '2 teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', '¾ teaspoon ground fennel seed', '¼ teaspoon brown sugar', '⅛ teaspoon dried oregano', '⅛ teaspoon dried thyme']

['Step 1: Place the pork and red wine vinegar in a mixing bowl.
', 'Step 2: Sprinkle with salt, black pepper, parsley, garlic powder, onion powder, basil, paprika, red pepper flakes, fennel seed, brown sugar, oregano, and thyme.
', 'Step 3: Knead until flecks of spice are evenly distributed through the sausage.
', 'Step 4: Divide the sausage into thirds, and form into 3 logs; wrap each in plastic wrap.
', 'Step 5: Place wrapped sausage into a freezer bag before freezing, or store in refrigerator for at least 12 hours before cooking.
']

Title: Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['6 large egg yolks', '¾ cup white sugar', '⅔ cup milk', '1 ¼ cups heavy cream', '½ teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pound mascarpone cheese, at room temperature', '¼ cup strong brewed coffee, at room temperature', '2 tablespoons rum', '2 (3 ounce) packages ladyfinger cookies', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a medium saucepan, whisk together egg yolks and sugar until well blended.
', 'Step 2: Whisk in milk and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture boils.
', 'Step 3: Boil gently for 1 minute, remove from heat and allow to cool slightly.
', 'Step 4: Cover tightly and chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
', 'Step 5: In a medium bowl, beat cream with vanilla until stiff peaks form.
', 'Step 6: Whisk mascarpone into yolk mixture until smooth.
', 'Step 7: In a small bowl, combine coffee and rum.
', 'Step 8: Split ladyfingers in half lengthwise and drizzle with coffee mixture.
', 'Step 9: Arrange half of soaked ladyfingers in bottom of a 7x11 inch dish.
', 'Step 10: Spread half of mascarpone mixture over ladyfingers, then half of whipped cream over that.
', 'Step 11: Repeat layers and sprinkle with cocoa.
', 'Step 12: Cover and refrigerate until set, 4 to 6 hours.
']

Title: That Zucchini Spaghetti Stanley Tucci Loves (Spaghetti alla Nerano)
Ingredients: ['1 quart sunflower oil, or as needed', '6 medium green zucchini', '4 ounces spaghetti', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pinch salt', '2 basil leaves, torn into small pieces', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '5 tablespoons grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '3 tablespoons grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place sunflower oil in a deep fryer and heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Slice zucchini into 1/8-inch rounds.
', 'Step 3: Add some zucchini to the hot oil and deep-fry until lightly browned, 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Transfer to a single layer on paper towels to drain and repeat to cook remaining zucchini.
', 'Step 5: Let zucchini cool to room temperature.
', 'Step 6: Transfer cooled zucchini to a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Cover and refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 8: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', "Step 9: Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until it's 2 minutes away from being tender yet firm to the bite, 9 to 10 minutes.
", 'Step 10: As you are cooking the spaghetti, heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Add zucchini and salt and cook, stirring occasionally, until it starts to release juices, soften, and break down, 3 to 5 minutes.
', "Step 12: Add a couple splashes of the pasta water to the zucchini, but don't overdo it.
", 'Step 13: Break zucchini into small pieces with the edge of a spoon or spatula.
', 'Step 14: Reduce heat to low and toss in basil and butter; stir until butter melts.
', 'Step 15: Grab spaghetti with tongs and transfer it right into the sauce; stir until coated.
', 'Step 16: Mix in Pecorino Romano and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheeses.
', 'Step 17: Add a final splash of pasta water and adjust salt if needed.
', 'Step 18: Serve with more grated cheese and fresh basil.
']

Title: Lemon Chicken Piccata
Ingredients: ['3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1/2-inch medallions', 'salt and pepper to taste', '½ cup all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or as needed', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 cup low sodium chicken broth', '½ lemon, thinly sliced', '¼ cup fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons capers, drained and rinsed', '3 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons minced Italian (flat-leaf) parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place a serving platter into the oven to warm.
', 'Step 3: Season the chicken breast pieces with salt and pepper and dredge them in flour.
', 'Step 4: Shake off excess flour.
', 'Step 5: Heat the vegetable oil in a skillet; pan-fry the chicken pieces until golden brown on both sides, about 3 minutes per side.
', 'Step 6: Work in batches and do not crowd skillet, adding oil as needed .
', 'Step 7: Place the chicken pieces onto the warmed platter in the oven.
', 'Step 8: When finished with all the chicken, drain most of the oil from the skillet, leaving a thin coating on the surface of the pan.
', 'Step 9: Cook and stir the minced garlic in the skillet until fragrant, about 20 seconds.
', 'Step 10: Pour in the chicken broth.
', 'Step 11: Scrape and dissolve any brown bits from the bottom of the skillet.
', 'Step 12: Stir in the lemon slices and bring the mixture to a boil.
', 'Step 13: Let cook, stirring occasionally, until the sauce reduces to about 2/3 cup, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 14: Add the lemon juice and capers; simmer until the sauce is reduced and slightly thickened, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 15: Drop the butter into the skillet and swirl it into the sauce by tilting the skillet until the butter is melted and incorporated.
', 'Step 16: Add the parsley; remove from heat and set aside.
', 'Step 17: Arrange the chicken medallions on serving plates and spoon sauce over each portion to serve.
']

Title: Meatball Pasta Bake
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package ziti pasta', '1 ½ pounds frozen cooked meatballs, thawed', '2 (28 ounce) jars prepared marinara sauce', '1 cup ricotta cheese', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided', '⅔ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 2: Add ziti and cook, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes less than the package instructions, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Drain pasta.
', 'Step 4: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Lightly grease a 13x9 inch baking dish.
', 'Step 6: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook meatballs until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Add marinara sauce and ricotta cheese; mix to combine.
', 'Step 8: Add cooked pasta and mix to combine.
', 'Step 9: Season with Italian seasoning and garlic powder.
', 'Step 10: Cover the bottom of the prepared baking dish with a layer of sauce without meatballs.
', 'Step 11: Sprinkle 1 cup mozzarella cheese on top.
', 'Step 12: Add another layer of sauce with meatballs on top and sprinkle with 1/3 cup Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 13: Add another layer of 1 cup mozzarella cheese.
', 'Step 14: Add the rest of the sauce and meatball mixture on top, followed by remaining 1 cup mozzarella cheese and 1/3 cup Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 15: Cover baking dish with aluminum foil.

', 'Step 17: Remove foil and bake until cheese starts to turn golden brown, 10 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Enjoy!
']

Title: Italian Cream Cheese and Ricotta Cheesecake
Ingredients: ['2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened', '1 (16 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 ½ cups white sugar', '4 eggs', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons cornstarch', '3 tablespoons flour', '½ cup butter, melted and cooled', '1 pint sour cream']

Title: Easy Italian Chicken II
Ingredients: ['6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 (16 ounce) bottle Italian-style salad dressing']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: To Marinate: Pour salad dressing into a large, resealable plastic bag.
', 'Step 2: Add chicken breasts, seal bag and shake to coat.
', 'Step 3: Place in refrigerator for at least 1 hour or overnight (the longer you marinate, the more taste the chicken will absorb).
', 'Step 4: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 5: Remove chicken from bag, discarding remaining marinade.
', 'Step 6: Place chicken in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour, or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear.
', 'Step 7: Note: Turn chicken occasionally while baking.

Title: Easy Lasagna II
Ingredients: ['1 pound lean ground beef', '1 (32 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '32 ounces cottage cheese', '3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese', '2 eggs', '½ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '9 lasagna noodles', '½ cup water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a large skillet over medium heat brown the ground beef.
', 'Step 2: Drain the grease.
', 'Step 3: Add spaghetti sauce and simmer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl, mix together the cottage cheese, 2 cups of the mozzarella cheese, eggs, half of the grated Parmesan cheese, dried parsley, salt and ground black pepper.
', 'Step 5: To assemble, in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish evenly spread 3/4 cup of the sauce mixture.
', 'Step 6: Cover with 3 uncooked lasagna noodles, 1 3/4 cup of the cheese mixture, and 1/4 cup sauce.
', 'Step 7: Repeat layers once more: top with 3 noodles, remaining sauce, remaining mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 8: Add 1/2 cup water to the edges of the pan.
', 'Step 9: Cover with aluminum foil.
', 'Step 10: Bake in a preheated 350 degree F(175 degrees C) oven for 45 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Uncover and bake an additional 10 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Air Fryer Saucy Chicken Milanese
Ingredients: ['1 pound chicken tenders', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 large eggs, beaten', '1 tablespoon water', '1 cup Italian-style bread crumbs', '¼ cup plain panko bread crumbs', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', 'cooking spray', '⅔ cup dry white wine', '½ cup low-sodium chicken broth', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons anchovy paste', '½ teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon cornstarch', '1 tablespoon water', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Season chicken tenders with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 3: Whisk eggs and water together in a bowl.
', 'Step 4: Mix both bread crumbs and garlic powder together in a second bowl.
', 'Step 5: Dip chicken tenders in the egg mixture, then in the bread crumb mixture, shaking off any excess crumbs.
', 'Step 6: Spray tenders on both sides with cooking spray and place in the air fryer basket.
', 'Step 7: Air-fry for 4 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Flip tenders and air-fry until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 3 more minutes.
', 'Step 9: The breading should be crispy and golden, and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the centers should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: While the tenders are cooking, combine white wine, chicken broth, balsamic vinegar, garlic, anchovy past, and rosemary for sauce in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Cook, stirring occasionally, until sauce reduces just slightly, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Whisk water and cornstarch together in a small bowl; add to the sauce and cook, stirring constantly, until it starts to thicken slightly.
', 'Step 13: Stir in parsley and reduce heat to low.
', 'Step 14: Add air-fried chicken tenders to the skillet.
', 'Step 15: Spoon sauce over top to coat, and warm for 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Serve immediately.
']

Title: Stuffed Eggplant Parmesan Rolls
Ingredients: ['1 large eggplant, ends trimmed', '2 teaspoons sea salt, or as needed', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '3 eggs, beaten', '1 cup dried bread crumbs', 'vegetable oil for frying, or as needed', '2 cups ricotta cheese', '½ cup grated Romano cheese', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with butter.
', 'Step 3: Slice eggplant into 1/4-inch thick slices lengthwise; discard the end slices with skin.
', 'Step 4: Lay the eggplant slices on paper towels and sprinkle both sides generously with sea salt.
', 'Step 5: Let slices drain for 30 minutes; rinse and pat dry with paper towels.
', 'Step 6: Place flour, eggs, and bread crumbs in separate shallow bowls.
', 'Step 7: Dip each eggplant slice in flour and shake off excess; dip into egg and then into bread crumbs.
', 'Step 8: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat and fry the slices until golden brown, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 9: Drain on paper towels, place on baking sheets, and refrigerate eggplant for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Mix ricotta cheese, Romano cheese, and garlic in a bowl; season to taste with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 11: Place a cooled eggplant slice onto a work surface and mound 1/3 to 1/2 cup of cheese mixture in the center; roll up slice and place seam side down into the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 12: Repeat with remaining slices and cheese filling.
', 'Step 13: Bake rolls in the preheated oven until filling is hot, about 25 minutes.
']

Title: Homemade Four Cheese Ravioli
Ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '2 eggs', '1 ½ tablespoons water', '1 (8 ounce) container ricotta cheese', '1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '½ cup provolone cheese, shredded', '1 egg', '1 ½ teaspoons dried parsley', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '3 tablespoons prepared basil pesto sauce', '2 cups heavy cream', '¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (24 ounce) jar marinara sauce', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mound the flour and salt together on a work surface and form a well.
', 'Step 2: Beat the teaspoon of olive oil, 2 eggs, and water in a bowl.
', 'Step 3: Pour half the egg mixture into the well.
', 'Step 4: Begin mixing the egg with the flour with one hand; use your other hand to keep the flour mound steady.
', 'Step 5: Add the remaining egg mixture and knead to form a dough.
', 'Step 6: Knead the dough until smooth, 8 to 10 minutes; add more flour if the dough is too sticky.
', 'Step 7: Form the dough into a ball and wrap tightly with plastic.
', 'Step 8: Refrigerate for 1 hour.
', 'Step 9: While the dough is resting, prepare the ravioli filling.
', 'Step 10: Combine the ricotta cheese, cream cheese, mozzarella cheese, provolone cheese, egg, and parsley and mix well.
', 'Step 11: Set the filling aside.
', 'Step 12: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 13: Add the crushed garlic and pesto sauce and cook for one minute.
', 'Step 14: Pour in the heavy cream, raise the heat to high, and bring the sauce to a boil.
', 'Step 15: Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Add the Parmesan cheese and stir until the cheese melts.
', 'Step 17: Remove the pan from the heat and keep warm.
', 'Step 18: Meanwhile, in a separate saucepan, warm the marinara sauce over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 19: Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 20: Beat the egg with the tablespoon of water to make the egg wash.
', 'Step 21: Roll out the pasta dough into thin sheets no thicker than a nickel.
', 'Step 22: To assemble the ravioli, brush the egg wash over a sheet of pasta.
', 'Step 23: Drop the filling mixture on the dough by teaspoonfuls about one inch apart.
', 'Step 24: Cover the filling with the top sheet of pasta, pressing out the air from around each portion of filling.
', 'Step 25: Press firmly around the filling to seal.
', 'Step 26: Cut into individual ravioli with a knife or pizza cutter.
', 'Step 27: Seal the edges.
', 'Step 28: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat.
', 'Step 29: Stir in the ravioli, and return to a boil.
', 'Step 30: Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the ravioli float to the top and the filling is hot, 4 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 31: Drain well.
', 'Step 32: Grease a baking sheet.
', 'Step 33: Place the cooked ravioli on the sheet pan and bake in the preheated oven until brown, about 4 minutes.
', 'Step 34: To serve the ravioli, divide them among four warmed serving bowls.
', 'Step 35: Drizzle the marinara sauce over the ravioli and then top with the cream sauce.
']

Title: Panna Cotta
Ingredients: ['⅓ cup skim milk', '1 (.25 ounce) envelope unflavored gelatin', '2 ½ cups heavy cream', '½ cup white sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract']

['Step 1: Pour milk into a small bowl, and stir in the gelatin powder.
', 'Step 2: Set aside.
', 'Step 3: In a saucepan, stir together the heavy cream and sugar, and set over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Bring to a full boil, watching carefully, as the cream will quickly rise to the top of the pan.
', 'Step 5: Pour the gelatin and milk into the cream, stirring until completely dissolved.
', 'Step 6: Cook for one minute, stirring constantly.
', 'Step 7: Remove from heat, stir in the vanilla and pour into six individual ramekin dishes.
', 'Step 8: Cool the ramekins uncovered at room temperature.
', 'Step 9: When cool, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, but preferably overnight before serving.
']

Title: Meatball Sandwich
Ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '¾ cup bread crumbs', '2 teaspoons dried Italian seasoning', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 egg, beaten', '1 French baguette', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '1 pinch salt, or to taste', '1 (14 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce', '4 slices provolone cheese']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Title: The Best Parmesan Chicken Bake

Title: Lasagne Alla Bolognese Saporite
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 carrot, chopped', '1 shallot, minced', '3 ½ ounces prosciutto, chopped', '11 ounces ground pork', '11 ounces ground beef', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'salt to taste', '6 fluid ounces red wine', '21 ounces peeled San Marzano tomatoes', '6 tablespoons butter', '⅔ cup all-purpose flour', '3 ¼ cups milk', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '11 ounces lasagna noodles', '2 ½ cups grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir onion, carrot, shallot, and prosciutto until onion is translucent and prosciutto releases some fat, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Add pork and beef; season with 1 teaspoon nutmeg, cinnamon, and salt to taste.
', 'Step 3: Cook and stir over medium-high heat until browned and crumbly, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Pour red wine over meat mixture; increase heat and cook until wine evaporates, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Add tomatoes and mix well; bring to a boil, cover, reduce heat, and simmer, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes break down and flavors of Bolognese sauce have combined, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
', 'Step 6: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat; add flour.
', 'Step 7: Whisk vigorously until mixture is smooth.
', 'Step 8: Pour in milk and cook, stirring occasionally, over medium heat until white sauce thickens enough to cover the back of a spoon, about 10 minutes; season with 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg, salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 9: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 10: Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Drain and run under cold water to stop the cooking process.
', 'Step 12: Lay noodles on a clean towel and pat dry.
', 'Step 13: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 14: Pour a ladleful of Bolognese sauce and a ladleful of white sauce over the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish; top with 3 or 4 lasagna noodles.
', 'Step 15: Cover noodles with 1/3 of the white sauce and 1/3 of the Bolognese sauce.
', 'Step 16: Sprinkle some of the Parmesan cheese on top; cover with lasagna noodles.
', 'Step 17: Repeat layers, ending with white sauce and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 18: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbling and top is golden brown, 30 to 40 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Let stand 3 to 4 minutes before slicing.
']

Title: Chef John's Italian Meatballs

', 'Step 11: Arrange onto prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 12: Bake in the preheated oven until browned and cooked through, 15 to 20 minutes.
']

Title: How to Make Perfect Polenta
Ingredients: ['4 cups water', '1 teaspoon fine salt', '1 cup polenta', '3 tablespoons butter, divided', '½ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, plus more for garnish']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring water and salt to a boil in a large saucepan; pour polenta slowly into boiling water, whisking constantly until all polenta is stirred in and there are no lumps.
', 'Step 2: Reduce heat to low and simmer, whisking often, until polenta starts to thicken, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Polenta mixture should still be slightly loose.
', 'Step 4: Cover and cook for 30 minutes, whisking every 5 to 6 minutes.
', 'Step 5: When polenta is too thick to whisk, stir with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 6: Polenta is done when texture is creamy and the individual grains are tender.
', 'Step 7: Turn off heat and gently stir 2 tablespoons butter into polenta until butter partially melts; mix 1/2 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese into polenta until cheese has melted.
', 'Step 8: Cover and let stand 5 minutes to thicken; stir and taste for salt before transferring to a serving bowl.
', 'Step 9: Top polenta with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and about 1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese for garnish.
']

Title: Ciabatta Bread

Title: World's Best Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 pound sweet Italian sausage', '¾ pound lean ground beef', '½ cup minced onion', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste', '2 (6.5 ounce) cans canned tomato sauce', '½ cup water', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons dried basil leaves', '½ teaspoon fennel seeds', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', '1 ½ teaspoons salt, divided, or to taste', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '12 lasagna noodles', '16 ounces ricotta cheese', '1 egg', '¾ pound mozzarella cheese, sliced', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: In a Dutch oven, cook sausage, ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat until well browned.
', 'Step 2: Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, tomato sauce, and water.
', 'Step 3: Season with sugar, basil, fennel seeds, Italian seasoning, 1 teaspoon salt, pepper, and 2 tablespoons parsley.
', 'Step 4: Simmer, covered, for about 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
', 'Step 5: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
', 'Step 6: Cook lasagna noodles in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Drain noodles, and rinse with cold water.
', 'Step 8: In a mixing bowl, combine ricotta cheese with egg, remaining parsley, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
', 'Step 9: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: To assemble, spread 1 1/2 cups of meat sauce in the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 11: Arrange 6 noodles lengthwise over meat sauce.
', 'Step 12: Spread with one half of the ricotta cheese mixture.
', 'Step 13: Top with a third of mozzarella cheese slices.
', 'Step 14: Spoon 1 1/2 cups meat sauce over mozzarella, and sprinkle with 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 15: Repeat layers, and top with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 16: Cover with foil: to prevent sticking, either spray foil with cooking spray, or make sure the foil does not touch the cheese.
', 'Step 17: Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Remove foil, and bake an additional 25 minutes.
', 'Step 19: Cool for 15 minutes before serving.
']

Title: Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 large eggs', '1 cup panko bread crumbs, or more as needed', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or more if needed', '½ cup olive oil for frying, or as needed', '½ cup prepared tomato sauce', '¼ cup fresh mozzarella, cut into small cubes', '¼ cup chopped fresh basil', '½ cup grated provolone cheese', '2 teaspoons olive oil']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat an oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Place chicken breasts between two sheets of heavy plastic (resealable freezer bags work well) on a solid, level surface.
', 'Step 3: Firmly pound chicken with the smooth side of a meat mallet to a thickness of 1/2-inch.
', 'Step 4: Season chicken thoroughly with salt and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Beat eggs in a shallow bowl and set aside.
', 'Step 6: Mix bread crumbs and 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese in a separate bowl, set aside.
', 'Step 7: Place flour in a sifter or strainer; sprinkle over chicken breasts, evenly coating both sides.
', 'Step 8: Dip a flour-coated chicken breast in beaten eggs.
', 'Step 9: Transfer breast to the bread crumb mixture, pressing crumbs into both sides.
', 'Step 10: Repeat for each breast.
', 'Step 11: Let chicken rest for 10 to 15 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Heat 1/2 inch olive oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat until it begins to shimmer.
', 'Step 13: Cook chicken in the hot oil until golden, about 2 minutes per side.
', 'Step 14: The chicken will finish cooking in the oven.
', 'Step 15: Transfer chicken to a baking dish.
', 'Step 16: Top each breast with 2 tablespoons tomato sauce.
', 'Step 17: Layer each chicken breast with equal amounts of mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and provolone cheese.
', 'Step 18: Sprinkle remaining Parmesan over top and drizzle each with 1/2 teaspoon olive oil.
', 'Step 19: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is browned and bubbly and chicken breasts are no longer pink in the center, 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 20: An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '470.8 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '24.8 g', 'cholesterolContent': '186.7 mg', 'fatContent': '24.9 g', 'fiberContent': '0.6 g', 'proteinContent': '42.1 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '9.1 g', 'sodiumContent': '840.3 mg', 'sugarContent': '1.7 g'}

Title: Sicilian Roasted Chicken
Ingredients: ['cooking spray', '1 whole chicken, cut into 8 pieces', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon dried oregano']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Grease a 9x13-inch pan with cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: Arrange chicken pieces in the baking pan.
', 'Step 4: Sprinkle salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, and oregano over both sides.
', 'Step 5: Roast in the preheated oven until chicken is browned and the juices run clear, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 6: An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
']

Title: Gourmet Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients: ['6 cups chicken broth, or as needed', '3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 pound portobello mushrooms, thinly sliced', '1 pound white mushrooms, thinly sliced', '2 medium shallots, diced', '1 ½ cups Arborio rice', '½ cup dry white wine', '4 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons finely chopped chives', '⅓ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese', 'sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Warm broth in a saucepan over low heat.
', 'Step 2: Meanwhile, warm 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 3: Add portobello and white mushrooms; cook and stir until soft, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Remove mushrooms and their liquid to a bowl; set aside.
', 'Step 5: Add remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil to the saucepan.
', 'Step 6: Stir in shallots and cook for 1 minute.
', 'Step 7: Add rice; cook and stir until rice is coated with oil and pale, golden in color, about 2 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Pour in wine, stirring constantly until wine is fully absorbed.
', 'Step 9: Add 1/2 cup warm broth to the rice, and stir until the broth is absorbed.
', 'Step 10: Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly, until the liquid is absorbed and the rice is tender, yet firm to the bite, about 15 to 20 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Remove from heat.
', 'Step 12: Stir in reserved mushrooms and their liquid, butter, chives, and Parmesan cheese.
', 'Step 13: Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately.
']

Title: Shrimp Scampi with Pasta
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 shallots, finely diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '1 pound shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 pinch kosher salt and freshly ground pepper', '½ cup dry white wine', '1 lemon, juiced', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '¼ cup finely chopped fresh parsley leaves', '1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil; cook linguine in boiling water until nearly tender, 6 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 2: Drain.
', 'Step 3: Melt 2 tablespoons butter with 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook and stir shallots, garlic, and red pepper flakes in the hot butter and oil until shallots are translucent, 3 to 4 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Season shrimp with kosher salt and black pepper; add to the skillet and cook until pink, stirring occasionally, 2 to 3 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Remove shrimp from skillet and keep warm.
', 'Step 7: Pour white wine and lemon juice into skillet and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off of the bottom of the skillet with a wooden spoon.
', 'Step 8: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in skillet, stir 2 tablespoons olive oil into butter mixture, and bring to a simmer.
', 'Step 9: Toss linguine, shrimp, and parsley in the butter mixture until coated; season with salt and black pepper.
', 'Step 10: Drizzle with 1 teaspoon olive oil to serve.
']

Title: Balsamic Bruschetta
Ingredients: ['1 loaf French bread, cut into 1/4-inch slices', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '8 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced', '⅓ cup chopped fresh basil', '1 ounce Parmesan cheese, freshly grated', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon good quality balsamic vinegar', '2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil', '¼ teaspoon kosher salt', '¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']

['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Brush bread slices on both sides lightly with 1 tablespoon oil and place on large baking sheet.

', 'Step 5: Mix in balsamic vinegar, 2 teaspoons olive oil, kosher salt, and pepper.
', 'Step 6: Spoon tomato mixture onto toasted bread slices and serve immediately.
']

Title: Sausage, Peppers, Onions, and Potato Bake
Ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '2 pounds Italian sausage links, cut into 2-inch pieces', '¼ cup olive oil', '4 large potatoes, peeled and thickly sliced', '2 large green bell peppers, seeded and cut into wedges', '2 large red bell peppers, seeded and cut into wedges', '3 large onions, cut into wedges', '½ cup white wine', '½ cup chicken stock', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']

Title: Super-Delicious Zuppa Toscana
Ingredients: ['1 pound bulk mild Italian sausage', '1 ¼ teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes', '4 slices bacon, cut into 1/2 inch pieces', '1 large onion, diced', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '5 (13.75 ounce) cans chicken broth', '6 potatoes, thinly sliced', '1 cup heavy cream', '¼ bunch fresh spinach, tough stems removed']

', 'Step 3: Cook the bacon in the same Dutch oven over medium heat until crisp, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Drain, leaving a few tablespoons of drippings with the bacon in the bottom of the Dutch oven.
', 'Step 5: Stir in the onions and garlic; cook until onions are soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Pour the chicken broth into the Dutch oven with the bacon and onion mixture; bring to a boil over high heat.
', 'Step 7: Add the potatoes, and boil until fork tender, about 20 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Reduce the heat to medium and stir in the heavy cream and the cooked sausage; heat through.
', 'Step 9: Mix the spinach into the soup just before serving.

Title: Better-Than-Olive Garden® Alfredo Sauce

Title: Homemade Lasagna
Ingredients: ['1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles', '½ pound ground pork', '½ pound lean ground beef', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '½ cup minced onion', '⅛ teaspoon white sugar', '1 ½ teaspoons dried basil', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 pound small curd cottage cheese', '3 eggs', '¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese', '2 teaspoons salt', '¼ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 pound shredded mozzarella cheese']

Title: The Best Meatballs

Title: Italian Spaghetti Sauce with Meatballs
